[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/phal chen a bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]]@##/_/sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po dang po/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dge slong blta na sdug pa de'i gdams 
[\[1b.2\]]ngag rjes su slos shing spel ba dang /_bsdud pa dang rab tu dbye ba dang /_bshad pa dang /_so sor rnam par bsgom pa dang brjod pa dang /_yang dag par bstan pa dang /_rjes su bsam pa 
[\[1b.3\]]dang /_mngon par 'jug par bya ba dang /_bkur ba dang khong du chud par bya ba dang /_yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba dang /_yang dang yang bslas pa dang /_shin tu rtogs par bya ba dang /_rab 
[\[1b.4\]]tu bstan pa dang /_snang bar bya ba dang /_rjes su rnam par lta ba dang /_lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /_dri za'i 'khor dang bcas pa de mthar gyis yul dge sbyong gi dkyil 'khor gyi grong khyer sgo bzang 
[\[1b.5\]]po gang na ba der phyin te/_khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug yongs su tshol tshol ba las de'i steng gi bar snang las lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za rnams kyis bos pa/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug ni/_chu klung gi chu 'dus pa nye ba zhig na/_byis pa stong phrag bcu tsam gyis bskor te/_bye ma la rtse bas rtse zhing 'dug go zhes nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]grong khyer sgo bzang po dang /_nye ba'i chu klung 
[\[2a.2\]]gi chu 'dus gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /_des khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug byis pa stong phrag bcu tsam gyis bskor cing bye ma la rtse bas rtse ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gang na ba der song ste/_khye'u dbang po'i dbang 
[\[2a.3\]]phyug gi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/_khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi mdun du 'dug ste/_thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags 
[\[2a.4\]]pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan tu bgyi ba ma 'tshal ta/_'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[2a.5\]]rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/_'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/_smras 
[\[2a.6\]]pa rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yi ge dang /_grangs dang /_brda dang /_/rtsis kyi tshul bslabs te/_bzo thams cad mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ye shes kyi sgor bcug go_/de ltar rigs kyi bu kho bos ni 'jig 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]rten na yi ge dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]gi rnam pa dang /_grangs dang /_rtsis dang /_brda dang /_shod thabs shes par bya ba dang /_bzo sna tshogs shes par bya ba dang /_khams kyi cho ga dang /_dug gso ba'i thabs dang /_skem pa dang /_brjed byed dang /_'byung po'i gdon gyis btab pa gso ba dang /_
[\[2b.2\]]grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_tshong dus dang /_bza' shing gi ra ba dang /_dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang /_gnas rnam par dgod pa shes par bya ba dang /_ra ba dang /_khang pa dang /_skar khung dang /_khang pa brtsegs pa'i tshad shes par bya ba dang /_'khrul 'khor dang /_shing rta sbyar ba'i 
[\[2b.3\]]tshul sna tshogs shes par bya ba dang /_dge mi dge dang /_'jigs mi 'jigs kyi ltas dang /_mtshan ma shes par bya ba dang /_rmos dang /_tshong dang /_rnam par spyad pa sbyar ba'i cho ga shes par bya ba dang /_sems can gyi yan lag dang /_nying lag gi mtshan gyi rgyud dang /_rgyus dang /_rnam 
[\[2b.4\]]par dpyad pa shes par bya ba dang /_bde 'gro dang ngan song gi las kyi lam rnam par dag par bya ba'i tshul shes par bya ba dang /_dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos dang /_tshogs mchod pa shes par bya ba dang /_bde 'gro dang ngan song gi tshogs shes par bya ba dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang 
[\[2b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i tshogs shes par bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i tshogs shes par bya ba dang /_rgyu dang byed pa dang /_sbyor ba'i rgyud shes par bya ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad shes te/_de dag la sems can yongs su gzud pa byed do/_/rab tu dgod pa byed do/_/
[\[2b.6\]]yongs su gzhog pa byed do/_/slob tu 'dzud do/_/sbyong du 'dzud do/_/brtan par byed do/_/lhur len par byed do/_/rdzogs par byed do/_/yongs su sgrub par byed do/_/yongs su spyod par byed do/_/gsal bar bstan par byed do/_/rnam par 'phel bar byed do/_/mtshan 
[\[2b.7\]]mar byed do/_/mthar phyin par byed do/_/rnam par sbyong bar byed do/_/dri ma med par byed do/_/shin tu dag par byed do/_/'od gsal zhing dang bar byed do/_/shin tu yangs par byed do/_/de ltar rigs kyi bu kho bos byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtsis kyi tshul shes pa de 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]gang zhe na/_/brgya stong phrag brgya na bye ba'o/_/bye ba bye ba na khod khod do/_/khod khod khod khod na tha dgu'o/_/tha dgu tha dgu na khrig khrig go_/khrig khrig khrig khrig na thams thams so/_/thams thams thams thams na myang myid do/_/myad myid myad myid na 
[\[3a.2\]]gang ya'o/_/gang ya gang ya na ban bun no/_/ban bun ban bun na phyar phyur ro/_/phyar phyur phyar phyur na lcag lcig go_/lcag lcig lcag lcig na byang bying ngo /_/byang bying byang bying na chem chem mo/_/chem chem chem chem na phyal phyol lo/_/phyal phyol phyal phyol na khyud khyud do/_/khyud khyud 
[\[3a.3\]]khyud khyud na zar zer ro/_/zar zer zar zer na khrib khrib bo/_/khrib khrib khrib khrib na ya gangs so/_/ya gangs ya gangs na cho ma'o/_/cho ma cho ma na khram khrim mo/_/khram khrim khram khrim na nab nub bo/_/nab nub nab nub na sang sang ngo /_/sang sang sang sang na brgyud yas so/_/brgyud 
[\[3a.4\]]yas brgyud yas na btang yas so/_/btang yas btang yas na bkra yar ro/_/bkra yar bkra yar na gsa' yas so/_/gsa' yas gsa' yas na mtshungs med do/_/mtshungs med mtshungs med na lam lum mo/_/lam lum lam lum na yal yol lo/_/yal yol yal yol 
[\[3a.5\]]na khral khrul lo/_/khral khrul khral khrul na thud thud do/_/thung thung thung thung na bsam phyod do/_/bsam phyod bsam phyod na brang breng ngo /_/brang breng brang bred na bgrod yas so/_/bgrod yas bgrod yas na bsngo yas so/_/bsngo yas bsngo yas na zang yag go_/zang yag zang 
[\[3a.6\]]yag na 'phro ba kye'o/_/'phro bkye 'phro bkye na rtse 'phyo'o/_/rtse 'phyo rtse 'phyo na yong tan no/_/yong tan yong tan na brug g.yos so/_/brug g.yos brug g.yos na sang yal lo/_/sang yal sang yal na 'thing yug go_/'thing yug 'thing yug na yid 'phyo'o/_/yid 'phyo yid 
[\[3a.7\]]'phyo na nab neb bo/_/nab neb nab neb na khrig thams so/_/khrig thams khrig thams na yal yal lo/_/yal yal yal yal na bgrad yas so/_/bgrang yas bgrang yas na thug yal lo/_/thug yal thug yal na shang shang ngo /_/shang shang shang shang na yag yag go_/
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]yag yag yag yag na tham thim mo/_/tham thim tham thim na rlom bsnyal lo/_/rlom bsnyal rlom bsnyal na gzhal 'phyos so/_/gzhal 'phyos gzhal 'phyos na gzhal yal lo/_/gzhal yal gzhal yal na gzhal med do/_/gzhal med gzhal med na gzhal 'khor to/_/
[\[3b.2\]]gzhal 'khor gzhal 'khor na gzhal thim mo/_/gzhal thim gzhal thim na gar gzhal lo/_/gar gzhal gar gzhal na gzhal sangs so/_/gzhal sangs gzhal sangs na gzhal thag go_/gzhal thag gzhal thag na gzhal phul lo/_/gzhal phul gzhal phul na gzhal 
[\[3b.3\]]zhi'o/_/gzhal zhi gzhal zhi na 'phyo 'gyur ro/_/'phyo 'gyur 'phyo 'gyur na nyar nyer ro/_/nyar nyer nyar nyer na phyag phyig go_/phyag phyig phyag phyig na zal zul lo/_/zal zul zal zul na sal sal lo/_/sal sal sal sal na g.yo ldeg go_/g.yo ldeg g.yo ldeg na phan phun no/_/phan phun 
[\[3b.4\]]phan phun na brnang ya'o/_/brnang ya brnang ya na rem 'drol lo/_/rem 'drol rem 'drol na rdzi ngad do/_/rdzi ngad rdzi ngad na rdzi rdul lo/_/rdzi rdul rdzi rdul na phun yol lo/_/phun yol phun yol na ngad ngad do/_/ngad ngad ngad ngad na bgrang brtsi'o/_/bgrang brtsi bgrang brtsi na zab bgrang ngo /_/
[\[3b.5\]]zab bgrang zab bgrang na dga' rkyang ngo /_/dga' rkyang dga' rkyang na gzhung 'dal to/_/gzhung 'dal gzhung 'dal na khrug phyad do/_/khrug phyad khrug phyad na 'ol phyod do/_/'ol phyod 'ol phyod na gdab yas so/_/gdab yas gdab yas na gcal yas so/_/gcal yas 
[\[3b.6\]]gcal yas na bgrang yas so/_/bgrang yas bgrang yas na byim 'phyo'o/_/byim 'phyo byim 'phyo na yam me'o/_/yam me yam me na bsnyal yas so/_/bsnyal yas bsnyal yas na ldab ldeb bo/_/ldab ldeb ldab ldeb na 'phan chad do/_/'phan chad 'phan chad na phang phung ngo /_/phang phung phang 
[\[3b.7\]]phung na khe'u tshang ngo /_/khe'u tshang khe'u tshang na zhung zung ngo /_/zhung zung zhung zung na mchog yal lo/_/mchog yal mchog yal na mtha' rtul to/_/mtha' rtul mtha' rtul na yun 'gyangs so/_/yun 'gyangs yun 'gyangs na bun lob bo/_/bun lob bun lob na lam 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]lom mo/_/lam lom lam lom na bsnyad yas so/_/bsnyad yas bsnyad yas na lang ling ngo /_/lang ling lang ling na ljab ljib bo/_/ljab ljeb ljab ljib na [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtsal to/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]brtsal [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtsal na 'byam yas so/_/'byam yas 'byam yas na nga 'grang ngo /_
[\[4a.2\]]nga 'grang nga 'grang na smos yal lo/_/smos yal smos yal na bkra chal lo/_/bkra chal bkra chal na lo rgyas so/_/lo rgyas lo rgyas na 'bum rdib bo/_/'bum rdib 'bum rdib na gang gum mo/_/gang gum gang gum na la lo'o/_/la lo la lo na bgrang 'phyos so/_/bgrang 'phyos bgrang 
[\[4a.3\]]'phyos na bgrong 'phyos la bsgres ba'o/_/bgrang 'phyos la bsgres pa bgrang 'phyos la bsgres na dpag yas so/_/dpag yas dpag yas na dpag yas la bsgres pa'o/_/dpag yas la bsgres pa dpag yas la bsgres na yal phyod do/_/yal phyod yal phyod na 
[\[4a.4\]]yal phyod la bsgres pa'o/_/yal phyod la bsgres pa yal phyod la bsgres na mu yal to/_/mu yal mu yal na mu yal la bsgres pa'o/_/mu yal la bsgres ba mu yal la bsgres pa na bgrang yol lo/_/bgrang yol bgrang yol na bgrang yol la bsgres pa'o/_/bgrang yol la 
[\[4a.5\]]bsgres pa bgrang yol la bsgres na [{]myi [,]mi [}]mjal to/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]mjal [{]myi [,]mi [}]mjal na mi mjal la bsgres pa'o/_/mi mjal la bsgres ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]mjal la bsgres na bsam phyod do/_/bsam phyod bsam phyod na bsam phyod la bsgres pa'o/_/bsam phyod la 
[\[4a.6\]]bsgres pa bsam phyod la bsgres na mtha' 'byam mo/_/mtha' 'byam mtha' 'byam na dpag thag go/_/dpag thag dpag thag na dpag thag la bsgres pa'o/_/dpag thag la bsgres pa dpag thag la bsgres na brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/brjod du med pa 
[\[4a.7\]]brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa na brjod du med pa la bsgres pa'o/_/brjod du med pa la bsgres pa brjod du med pa la bsgres na brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la bsgres pa shin tu bstan pa'o/_/de'i mdun na bye ma'i phung po chen po dpag tshad du ma'i 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]tshad dang ldan pa zhig 'dug 'dug pa las/_/'di la bye ma'i 'bru 'di snyed cig yod do zhes bya ba nas/_bye ma'i 'bru brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la bsgres pa la 'di snyed cig yod do zhes rab tu phye nas bgrang brtsis te grangs su bcad do/_/des bye ma'i phung po de brtsis kyi 
[\[4b.2\]]brdar bstan pas/_shin tu bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bgrang ba'i tshul 'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa kun na'ang yod de/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis shar phyogs kyi 
[\[4b.3\]]'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa dag kyang bgrang zhing rtsi'o/_/de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams dang /_shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams dang /_lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams dang /_nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams dang /_/'og 
[\[4b.4\]]dang steng gi phyogs su yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas ba dag kyang bgrang zhing rtsi'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bgrang ba'i tshul 'di ni/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi [{]mying [,]ming [}]du bya ba gcig nas 
[\[4b.5\]]gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa thams cad na'ang yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi [{]mying [,]ming [}]gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bgrang zhing rtsi'o/_/ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kyi [{]mying [,]ming [}]gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa 
[\[4b.6\]]bstan du yod pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i bskal pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa dang /_chos kyi [{]mying [,]ming [}]gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa dang /_sems can gyi [{]mying [,]ming [}]gcig 
[\[4b.7\]]nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa dang /_las kyi [{]mying [,]ming [}]gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa kun la'ang 'jug ste/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bgrang ba'i tshul 'di nyid ni/_phyogs bcu na [{]mying [,]ming [}]du bya ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du rung ba ji snyed pa 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]thams cad la'ang 'jug ste/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bgrad ba'i tshul 'dis phyogs bcu na [{]mying [,]ming [}]gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa ji snyed yod pa thams cad kyang bgrang zhing rtsi'o/_/de ltar rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang 
[\[5a.2\]]ba chos thams cad shes par bya ba'i bzo mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa 'di shes bar zad na/_kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa/_chos kyi tshul thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa/_dus gsum gyi grangs la zhugs pa/_sems can thams cad 
[\[5a.3\]]kyi grangs la zhugs pa/_chos kyi phung po thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa/_/chos thams cad kyi ming gi 'khor lo la dbang bsgyur ba de dag gi spyod pa shes ba'am/_yon tan brjod pa'am/_spyod 
[\[5a.4\]]yul smos pa'am/_/yul brjod pa'am/_stobs bsngags pa'am/_bsam pa brtan pa'am/_tshogs yongs su brjod pa'am/_smon lam bshad par bya ba 'am/_spyod pa yongs su bstan pa'am/_pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa mngon par brjod pa'am/_yang 
[\[5a.5\]]dag par bsgrub pa yongs su dag pa'am/_yang dag par bstan pa'am/_ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par smos pa'am/_ye shes snang ba khong du chud par nus re skan/_song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer rgya mtsho brtan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na dge bsnyen ma 
[\[5a.6\]]phul du byung ba zhes bya ba 'dug gis/_de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig thos nas spu g.yos te/_dga' 
[\[5a.7\]]ba chen po'i shugs skyes nas/_rab tu dga' ba'i yid dang ldan par gyur ba ngo mtshar gyi bsam pa/_rin po che rab tu dkon pa thob pa/_'gro ba mang po la phan pa'i sems dang bsam pas byung ba sangs rgyas skyes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud par 'gro ba la dbang bsgyur ba/_
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]chos kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i blo gros la rten pa/_thams cad du rjes su song pa'i rig pa rnam par phye bas 'byung ba bstan pa la brtson pa/_dus gsum gyi dbyings su ma 'dres pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul dang ldan pa/_bsod nams mi zad pa'i rgya mtsho las byung ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_
[\[5b.2\]]ye shes kyi snang ba chen po la dbang bsgyur ba/_khams gsum gyi khyim du sdud pa'i sgo shin tu gcod pa des/_khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/_khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_yang dang 
[\[5b.3\]]yang bltas te/_khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi drung nas song ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi sprin gyi char yongs su 'dzin pa byed cing /_gang chen mtsho ltar sprin chen po'i char gyis ngoms [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi nyi 
[\[5b.4\]]ma'i ye shes kyi 'od gzer gyis dge ba yongs su smin par byas pa'i sa gzhi las dbang po'i myu gu 'thon cing skyes ba/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi zla ba nya zhing rgyas pa'i gdams ngag gi 'od gzer gyi dra bas lus dang /_sems shin tu tshim par byas ba/_/dpyid kyi nyi ma'i 
[\[5b.5\]]'od kyis gdungs pa'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi tshogs gsal zhing bsil ba'i gangs chu la 'thung bar 'dod pa ltar/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi chu la 'thung bar 'dod pa/_bung ba mang po 'khor zhing lding bas rgyas par gyur pa'i pad mo dang ldan pa'i pad+mo'i mtsho ltar dge ba'i bshes 
[\[5b.6\]]gnyen gyi gdams ngag gis sems kyi me tog bun da ri ka kha phye ba/_rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su rgyas pa'i rin po che'i gling ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag rin po che 'phel ba'i snang bas sems shin tu snang bar byas ba/_'dzam bu'i shing chen po'i me tog dang /_
[\[5b.7\]]'bras bu'i tshogs chen po dang ldan pa ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs su gyur pa/_/phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/_klu'i dbang po chen po rtsed mo dam pas rtse ba las byung ba'i nam mkha'i sprin chen po ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]gdams ngag thos pa'i tshogs su gyur pa'i rnang shin tu che ba/_/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i 'jig rten gyi brgyan pa'i sna tshogs kyi spo ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag las byung ba'i chos dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa sna tshogs brtsegs pa'i spor gyur pa/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs 
[\[6a.2\]]kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba'i brgya byin lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i tshogs rab tu 'joms pa ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag las byung ba'i yon tan dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing zil gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnon la gzhan la zil gyis gnon pa de/_mthar gyis grong khyer rgya mtsho 
[\[6a.3\]]brtan pa gang na ba der phyin te/_dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba yongs su tshol tshol ba las de la skye bo mang pos bstan te/_rigs kyi bu dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba de grong khyer gyi dbus kyi rang gi khyim na 'dug go zhes nas/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i 
[\[6a.4\]]gnas gang na ba der song ste/_thal mo sbyar nas sgo gang na sdong sdod pa dang /_des dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i khyim de shin tu rgya che la yangs shing rin po che'i ra bas yongs su bskor ba phyogs bzhi nas sgo shin tu mdzes pa rnam par phye ba/_rin po che tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rgyan gyis 
[\[6a.5\]]brgyan pa/_bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pas mngon par grub pa mthong nas/_de khyim der song ste/_kun tu bltas na dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba na chung shin tu gzhon pa thog ma dar la bab pa/_gzugs mngon zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa kha dog dam pa/_pri yab 
[\[6a.6\]]shin tu rgyas pa dang ldan pa/_skra phye mar bzhag pa/_lus la rgyan [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gos dang smad g.yogs dkar po bgos pa/_rin po che'i khri la 'dug pa mthong ste/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par de'i lus sam/_sems kyi dbang ngam/_
[\[6a.7\]]gzi brjid dang /_kha dog gis zil gyis ma non pa'i sems can ni khyim de na gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_lha'am mi'ang rung ste/_sems can gang gis dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang /_dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba la ston pa'i 'du 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]shes su bsam pa zhig_/rin po che'i khri la 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/gzhan yang khyim de na stan lha rdzas dang /[ {]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]rdzas las shin tu 'phags pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su grub pa bye ba stong phrag bcu bting ba dang /_mdun du phru ba gcig cig 
[\[6b.2\]]bzhag pa las kha zas dang skom gyi bag gam/_gos dang rgyan gyi longs spyod kyi bag gzhan ci yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]snang ngo /_/bud [{]myed [,]med [}]stong phrag bcu tsam zhig mdun du 'dug par mthong na'ang de dag thams cad kyang lha'i bu mo'i kha dog dang ldan pa/_lha'i bu mo'i gzugs dang ldan pa/_
[\[6b.3\]]lha'i bu mo'i tshul dang ldan pa/_lha'i bu mo'i spyod pa dang ldan pa/_lha'i bu mo'i longs spyod dang ldan pa/_lha'i bu mo'i tshul du shis pa dang ldan pa/_lha rdzas kyi gos yid bzhin du gyon pa/_lha rdzas kyi lhab lhub kyis shin tu klubs pa/_lha'i bu mo'i skad lta bu'i 
[\[6b.4\]]dbyangs snyan pa dang ldan pa lha'i bu mo'i chu zheng mdzes pa dang ldan pa sha stag ste/_de'i 'khor gyi bud [{]myed [,]med [}]kyang des ci bsgo ba bzhin du byed cing mdun na 'khod do/_/rim gro byed do/_/bkur sti byed do/_/gdong du lta'o/_/ci bsgo ba nyan cing gnas so/_/rje sar 'khod do/_
[\[6b.5\]]yongs su lta'o/_rnam par lta'o/_/'dud do/_/rab tu 'dud do/_/phyag 'tshal lo/_/de dag gi lus las spos kyi ngad ldang bas ni/_grong khyer de'i 'khor thams cad du dri zhim pos khyab par 'dug ste/_sems can gang gis dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad 
[\[6b.6\]]kyang gnod sems [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems dang /_shar gnyer ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems dang /_'tshe ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems dang /_phrag dog dang /_'jungs pa dang bral ba'i sems dang /_sgyu dang g.yo [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems dang /_chags pa dang /_khong khro ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems dang /_
[\[6b.7\]]zhum pa dang /_gzengs mthong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems dang /_byams pa'i sems dang /_phan pa'i sems dang /_sdom pa la gnas pa'i sems dang /_gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba la re ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems su gyur te/_gang gis de dag gi skad thos pa de dag 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]thams cad kyang dga' ba dang /_mos pa dang /_dul ba'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/gang gis de dag mthong bar gyur pa de dag kyang /_'dod chags dang bral ba tsam du rang rang gis shes par 'gyur ro/_de ltar mthong nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]dge 
[\[7a.2\]]bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/_thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma bdag gis bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/_
[\[7a.3\]]ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/_'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/_'phags ma ji ltar byang 
[\[7a.4\]]chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/_smras pa rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/_bsod nams kyi mdzod [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 
[\[7a.5\]]thob pa ste/_rigs kyi bu kho mo ni phru ba gcig po 'di las mos pa sna tshogs can rnams kha zas ci la dga' ba bzhin du tshod ma sna tshogs dang /_ro sna tshogs dang /_kha dog sna tshogs dang /_dri sna tshogs kyis tshim par byed de/_rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo ni phru ba 
[\[7a.6\]]gcig po 'di las ci la dga' ba'i kha zas kyis sems can brgya 'ang yongs su tshim par byed do/_/sems can stong dang sems can brgya phrag stong dang /_sems can bye ba dang /_sems can bye ba phrag brgya dang /_sems can bye ba phrag stong dang /_sems can bye ba brgya phrag 
[\[7a.7\]]stong dang /_sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong nas/_sems can brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i yang brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa mos pa sna tshogs can rnams kyang ci la dga' ba'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed do/_/yongs su stobs par byed do/_/yongs su dga' bar byed do/_
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]yongs su mgu bar byed do/_/yongs su spro bar byed do/_/shin tu tshim par byed do/_/yid bde bar byed do/_/'on kyang phru ba 'di las 'gong bar 'gyur ba med do/_/'grib [{]myed [,]med [}]de dma' bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/zad par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_'bri bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/sa mtshams yod par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur 
[\[7b.2\]]ro/_/mthar thug par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/mur thug par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gzhung de dang 'dra bar sems can 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_de bzhin du gling ba zhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul 
[\[7b.3\]]shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas sems can mos pa sna tshogs can sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i yang brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rdul shin 
[\[7b.4\]]tu phra ba snyed cig 'ongs kyang /_ci la dga' ba'i kha zas tshod ma sna tshogs dang /_ro sna tshogs dang /_kha dog sna tshogs dang /_dri sna tshogs kyis yongs su tshim par byed do/_/yongs su dga' bar byed do/_/nyams bde bar byed do/_/shin tu tshim par byed do/_yid shin tu 
[\[7b.5\]]bde bar byed do/_/'on kyang phru ba 'di las 'gong bar 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'grib pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dma' bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/zad par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/sa mtshams yod par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/mthar thug par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/mur thug par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gal te 
[\[7b.6\]]phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can mos pa sna tshogs can dang /_bsam pa sna tshogs can thams cad 'ongs par gyur na yang /_de dag thams cad ci la dga' ba'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed pa nas/_yid bde 
[\[7b.7\]]bar bya ba'i bar du byed do/_/kha zas sna tshogs kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_ro rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_stan sna tshogs dang /_mal cha sna tshogs dang /_bzhon pa sna tshogs dang /_gos sna tshogs dang /_me tog sna tshogs dang /_phreng ba sna 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]tshogs dang /_spos sna tshogs dang /_bdug spos sna tshogs dang /_byug pa sna tshogs dang /_phye ma sna tshogs dang /_rin po che sna tshogs dang /_rgyan sna tshogs dang /_rin po che'i shing rta sna tshogs dang /_gdugs sna tshogs dang /_rgyal mtshan sna tshogs dang /_lha'i ba dan sna 
[\[8a.2\]]tshogs dang /_yo byad kyi yul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su tshim par byed pa nas/_yid dga' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du byed do/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas sku'i tha ma 'dzin pa gang ji snyed cig 
[\[8a.3\]]bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi 'bras bu brnyes par mdzad do/_/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[8a.4\]]stong dang /_'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong dang /_'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang /_'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag stong dang /_'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong dang /_'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya 
[\[8a.5\]]phrag stong dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul 
[\[8a.6\]]shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas/_de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i yang brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[8a.7\]]sku'i tha ma 'dzin pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu brnyes par mdzad do/_/shar phyogs na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang /_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /_'og dang steng gi phyogs na ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin no/_/rigs kyi bu shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[8b.2\]]gcig na sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing /_snying po byang chub tu bzhugs nas bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par mdzad de/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon 
[\[8b.3\]]par 'tshang rgya'o/_/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang /_'jig rten gyi khams stong dang /_'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[8b.4\]]bye ba brgya dang /_'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong dang /_'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong dang /_'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 
[\[8b.5\]]rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_/stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas/_shar phyogs kyi sangs 
[\[8b.6\]]rgyas kyi zhing brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i yang brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/_byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i kha zas las gsol zhing snying po byang chub la bzhugs nas/_
[\[8b.7\]]bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par mdzad do/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o//_shar phyogs na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /_shar 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]lho'i phyogs mtshams dang /_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /_'og gi phyogs dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na/_byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa ji snyed cig 
[\[9a.2\]]bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing snying po byang chub tu bzhugs te/_bdud sde dang bcas pa rab tu pham par mdzad nas/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na 
[\[9a.3\]]bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang /_'jig rten gyi khams stong dang /_'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong dang /_'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya dang /_'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong dang /_'jig rten 
[\[9a.4\]]gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong dang /_'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_gling bzhi ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_stong gi 'jig rten gyi 
[\[9a.5\]]khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas/_rigs kyi bu steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod 
[\[9a.6\]]du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i yang brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed na/_byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing /_snying po byang chub tu bzhugs nas bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par mdzad de/_bla na 
[\[9a.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kho mo'i 'khor bud [{]myed [,]med [}]stong phrag bcu po 'di dag mthong ngam/_smras pa 'phags ma bdag gis mthong ngo /_/smras pa rigs kyi bu bud [{]myed [,]med [}]'di dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]ba brgya stong grangs 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa phrag bcu kho mo dang skal ba mnyam par spyod pa/_smon lam gcig pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig pa/_'byung ba'i rgyan gcig pa/_mos pa'i lam rnam par dag pa gcig pa/_kho mo dang skal ba mnyam par dran pa rnam par dag pa/_skal ba mnyam par blo rnam par dag pa/_skal 
[\[9b.2\]]ba mnyam par blo tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]par gyur pa/_skal ba mnyam par dbang po rab tu thob pa/_skal ba mnyam par sems kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/_skal ba mnyam par spyod yul gyi yul dang ldan pa/_skal ba mnyam par chos kyi tshul la zhugs pa/_skal ba mnyam par don nges 
[\[9b.3\]]par rtogs pa/_skal ba mnyam par chos kyi don ston pa/_skal ba mnyam par gzugs rnam par dag pa/_skal ba mnyam par stobs tshad med pa/_skal ba mnyam par brtan pa gzhan gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]thub pa/_skal ba mnyam par chos kyi sgra sgrog pa/_skal ba 
[\[9b.4\]]mnyam par dbyangs rnam par dag pa/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i yon tan brjod du yod pas rnam par spyod pa thams cad la skal pa mnyam par yon tan rnam par dag pa/_las kyi rnam par smin pa la kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]cing rnam par dag pas/_skal ba mnyam par las kyi rnam par smin 
[\[9b.5\]]pa rnam par dag pa/_'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pas/_skal ba mnyam par byams pa chen pos rgyas par 'gengs pa/_'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par byed pas/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]skyo ba'i phyir skal ba mnyam par snying rje chen pos rgyas par 'gengs pa/_bsam 
[\[9b.6\]]pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa'i lus yongs su ston pas/_skal ba mnyam par lus kyi las rnam par dag pa/_chos kyi dbyings kyi nges pa'i tshig gi tha snyad la skal ba mnyam par dag gi las rnam par dag pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad 
[\[9b.7\]]kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du skal pa mnyam par 'dod pa/_sangs rgyas la mchod cing rim gro bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skal ba mnyam par rgyu ba/_chos thams cad kyi tshul khong du chud par bya ba la skal ba mnyam par mngon sum 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]du gyur pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad thob par bya ba la skal ba mnyam par spyod pa/_rnam par dag pa sha stag cig kyang yod de/_rigs kyi bu bud med stong phrag bcu po 'di dag kyang skad cig 
[\[10a.2\]]gcig tu 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa rnams la zhal zas yongs su 'bul ba'i phyir phyogs bcur rgyas par 'dong ngo /_/phru ba 'di nyid nas kha zas blangs shing /_srid pa'i tha ma pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa 
[\[10a.3\]]rnams la bsod snyoms 'bul ba'i phyir phyogs bcur rgyas par 'dong ngo /_/phru ba 'di nyid nas kha zas blangs shing phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi tshogs thams cad kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo ni phru ba 'di nyid 
[\[10a.4\]]nas lha rnams ni lha'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed do/_/klu rnams ni klu'i kha zas kyis/_gnod sbyin rnams ni gnod sbyin gyi kha zas kyis/_dri za rnams ni dri za'i kha zas kyis/_lha ma yin rnams ni lha ma yin gyi kha zas kyis/_nam mkha' lding 
[\[10a.5\]]rnams ni na ma mkha' lding gi kha zas kyis/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'am ci rnams ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'am ci'i kha zas kyis/_lto 'phye chen po rnams ni lto 'phye chen po'i kha zas kyis/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rnams ni [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]kha zas kyis/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]ma yin pa rnams ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]ma yin pa'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par 
[\[10a.6\]]byed do/_/rigs kyi bu yud tsam zhig sdod dang de'u re mngon du 'gyur ro/_/dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba des tshig de brjod ma thag tu de'i mod la 'di lta ste/_dge bsnyen ma phul du byung bas/_sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas sems can grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig shar phyogs kyi 
[\[10a.7\]]sgo nas nang du 'ongs par gyur to/_/de bzhin du 'di lta ste/_dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas/_sems can grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig_/lho phyogs dang nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs kyi sgo nas nang du 'ongs par gyur te/_de ltar 'ongs pa de 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]dag dge bsnyen ma phul du byung bas/_/stan de dag la bkod de/_so so nas ci dga' ba'i kha zas tshod ma sna tshogs dang /_ro sna tshogs dang /_kha dog sna tshogs dang /_dri sna tshogs dang ldan pas yongs su tshim par byas so/_/yongs su bstabs par byas so/_/yongs su 
[\[10b.2\]]dga' ba byas so/_/yongs su mgu bar byas so/_/yongs su spro bar byas so/_/shin tu tshim par byas so/_/yid bde bar byas so/_/kha zas sna tshogs kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_ro rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_stan sna tshogs dang /_mal 
[\[10b.3\]]cha sna tshogs dang /_bzhon ba sna tshogs dang /_gos sna tshogs dang /_me tog sna tshogs dang /_phreng ba sna tshogs dang /_spos sna tshogs dang /_bdug spos sna tshogs dang /_byug pa sna tshogs dang /_phye ma sna tshogs dang /_rin po che sna tshogs dang /_rgyan sna tshogs dang /_
[\[10b.4\]]rin po che'i shing rta sna tshogs dang /_gdugs sna tshogs dang /_rgyal mtshan sna tshogs dang /_lha'i ba dan sna tshogs dang /_yo byad kyi yul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su tshim par byas pa nas/_yid dga' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du byas so/_/lha rnams ni lha'i kha zas 
[\[10b.5\]]kyis yongs su tshim par byas so/_/klu dang gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha'i lding dang /[ {]myi'am [,]mi'am [}]ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ma yin pa rnams kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ma yin pa'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byas pa nas/_yid bde bar 'gyur ba'i 
[\[10b.6\]]bar du byas so/_/'on kyang phru ba de las 'gong bar gyur ba [{]myed[,]med[}]/_'grib pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_dmas pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_zad par gyur pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_sa mtshams su gyur pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_mthar thug pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_mur thug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de nas dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba des/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor 
[\[10b.7\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsod nams kyi mdzod mi zad pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 'di shes par zad na/_byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams chen po'i rgya mtsho mi zad pas/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa'i bsod 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]nams dang ldan pa bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po shin tu bstsags pas/_nam mkha' lta bur gyur pa/_'gro ba thams cad kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pas/_nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po lta bu/_'gro ba 
[\[11a.2\]]thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsrung bas/_bsod nams chen po'i 'khor yug dang ldan pa/_'gro ba thams cad du rin po che snyim pa nas char ltar 'thor bas bsod nams chen po'i sprin du gyur ba/_chos kyi grong khyer gyi sgo 'byed pas/_bsod 
[\[11a.3\]]nams chen po'i mdzod la mngon sum du lta ba/_'gro ba thams cad kyi phongs pa'i mun pa sel bas bsod nams chen po'i sgron mar gyur pa/_de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/_/yon tan brjod par nus re skan/_song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di 
[\[11a.4\]]nyid na grong khyer 'byung ba chen po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na khyim bdag mkhas pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis/_de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dris shig_/
[\[11a.5\]]de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_yang dang yang bltas te/_dge bsnyen ma phul 
[\[11a.6\]]du byung ba'i drung nas blta bas mi ngoms bzhin du song ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bsod nams kyi mdzod [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par thar pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa de/_bsod nams rgya mtsho de la ni rjes su sems/_bsod nams 
[\[11a.7\]]nam mkha' de la ni kun tu blta/_bsod nams kyi phung po de ni yongs su 'dzin/_bsod nams kyi ri bo de la ni mngon par 'dzeg_/bsod nams kyi tshogs de ni yang dag par sdud/_bsod nams kyi chu bo de la ni yongs su 'bog_/bsod nams kyi 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]mu stegs de las ni rab tu 'bab/_bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor de ni yongs su sbyong /_bsod nams kyi gter de la ni yang dag par blta/_bsod nams kyi tshul de ni rjes su dran par byed/_bsod nams kyi chos de ni yongs su 'dzin/_bsod nams kyi rgyud de ni 
[\[11b.2\]]yongs su sbyong ba byed cing /_mthar gyis grong khyer 'byung ba chen po gang na ba der phyin nas/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'dod cing dge ba'i bshes gnyen lta bas bsgos pa'i sems kyi rgyud dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i bsam pa dang /_dge 
[\[11b.3\]]ba'i bshes gnyen la thogs pa med pa'i sbyor ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bya bas skyo ba med pa'i brtson 'grus dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag lus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis nges par gyur pa'i bsod 
[\[11b.4\]]nams kyi tshogs thams cad dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rnam par spel ba'i thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa dang /_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bya ba la mkhas pa dang /_rnam par 'phel ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang /_
[\[11b.5\]]rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_yang dag par 'phel ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po dang /_yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang /_yang dag par 'phel ba'i smon lam chen po mngon par 
[\[11b.6\]]bsgrub pa dang /_shin tu yangs par 'gyur ba'i snying rje chen pos bdag nyid thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur par yang dag par mthong nas/_sangs rgyas thams cad las byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas chos kyi snang ba yang dag par blang ba 
[\[11b.7\]]dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu snang ba rnam par 'phel bar byed cing khyim bdag mkhas pa yongs su tshol tshol ba las/_grong khyer gyi dbus lam gyi bzhi mdo zhig na rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu zhig la/_rin po che grangs med pa las byas pa'i 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]khri nor bu rin po che'i rkang pa rdo rje dang /_in dra nI la sna tshogs kyis spras pa bkye ba/_gser gyi lcag phod kyi dra bas legs par blas pa/_nor bu rin po che dri ma med pa'i snying po can rin po che lnga brgya tsam gyis gzugs legs par brgyan pa/_lha 
[\[12a.2\]]rdzas kyi stan sna tshogs bting ba/_gam yo nas lha rdzas kyi gos kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan mang po bsgreng ba/_rin po che du ma'i dra bas kun nas yog pa rin po che'i bla re chen po bres pa/_bla nas gser dang rin po che'i me tog gi lda ldi mang po bkye ba zhig la 'dug cing /_
[\[12a.3\]]'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi gdugs yu ba dri ma med pa baiDUr+ya las byas pa ni drung na bsgreng zhing bzung /_rin po che'i g.yag rnga dri ma med pa'i rdul yab ngang pa'i rgyal po lta bus ni legs par g.yab spos kyi rim gro'i yo byad sna tshogs kyis ni bdugs shing bsangs/_rol mo brdung ba dang /_dkrol 
[\[12a.4\]]ba lha rdzas kyi dbyangs las 'das par sgra 'byin pa lnga brgya tsam ni g.yas g.yon nas brdungs shing dkrol/_grong khyer 'byung ba chen po na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams shin tu dga' bar bya ba'i don du lha rdzas kyi [{]mye [,]me [}]tog gi sprin gyi char ni kun nas 'bab par 
[\[12a.5\]]gyur/_g.yog srog chags stong phrag bcu tsam sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba skal ba mnyam par spyod spyod pa dag nyan cing ci dga' bar byed pa/_lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongs su grub pa/_lha dang mi'i 
[\[12a.6\]]gzugs las shin tu 'das pa sha stag gis kun nas bskor cing 'dug pa mthong nas/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyim bdag mkhas pa gang na ba der song ste/_phyin nas khyim bdag mkhas pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_khyim bdag 
[\[12a.7\]]mkhas pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/_thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/_'phags pa bdag ni 'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bgyi ba dang /_sems can thams cad 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]shin tu bde ba la dgod pa dang /_sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho nas mngon par gdon pa dang /_sems can thams cad chos rin po che'i gling du yang dag par bskyal ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sred pa'i brlan shin tu bskam pa dang /_sems can 
[\[12b.2\]]thams cad kyi snying rje'i brlan yang dag par bskyed pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang /_sred pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /_sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos shing bsgrub par bgyi ba dang /_sems can thams cad 
[\[12b.3\]]'khor ba'i dgon pa las yang dag par bzla ba dang /_sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang chos la dga' zhing mos pa yang dag par bskyed pa dang /_sems can thams cad khams gsum gyi grong rdal nas gdon pa dang /_sems can thams 
[\[12b.4\]]cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i pho brang du gzud par sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs kyis kyang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du 
[\[12b.5\]]bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/_'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang /_rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/_'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar bslab na 
[\[12b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ba bdag la bshad du gsol/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_khyim bdag mkhas pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang 
[\[12b.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu sems can gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]blta bas [{]myi [,]mi [}]ngoms pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro bas [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyo ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bya bas sgyid lug pa med pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bas yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyed pa dang /_dge ba'i 
[\[13a.2\]]bshes gnyen btsal ba las phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mos shing dang ba'i yid las rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi ngor blta ba las phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi tshul la zhum pa [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[13a.3\]]pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya bas [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyo ba de lta bu ni shin tu dkon no/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kho bo'i 'khor 'di dag mthong ngam/_smras pa 'phags pa mthong ngo /_smras pa rigs kyi bu 'di dag kun kyang kho bos bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang 
[\[13a.4\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dag ste/_'di dag ni kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su bskyed pa'o/_/'di dag ni kho bos pha rol tu phyin pas bsdus te gsol pa'o/_/'di dag ni kho bos chos dkar po thams cad kyis bskyed pa'o/_/'di dag 
[\[13a.5\]]ni kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rnam par bskyed pa'o/_/'di dag ni kho bos 'jig rten gyi rigs las gyen du bskyod pa'o/_/'di dag ni kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la bkod pa'o/_/'di dag ni kho bos 'jig rten gyi lam gyi 'khor lo las 
[\[13a.6\]]bzlog pa'o/_'di dag ni kho bos chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la btsud pa'o/_/'di dag ni kho bos ngan song gsum gyi rgyud du ltung ba las yongs su bzung ba'o/_/'di dag ni kho bos chos nyid khong da chud par bya ba la bkod pa ste/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems 
[\[13a.7\]]dpa' rnams sems can thams cad kyi skyabs su gyur pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu kho bo ni yid kyi mdzod nas byung ba'i bsod nams mang po thob pa ste/_de'i mthus kho bo ni zas 'dod pa rnams la kha zas kyi sbyin pa byed do/_/btang ba 'dod pa rnams la btung ba dang /_
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]ro'i dam pa 'dod pa rnams la ro'i dam pa dang /_bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la bza' ba dang /_bca' ba 'dod pa rnams la bca' ba dang /_bldag pa 'dod pa rnams la bldag pa dang /_mur pa 'dod pa rnams la mur pa dang /_gos 'dod pa rnams la gos dang /_me tog 
[\[13b.2\]]'dod pa rnams la me tog dang /_phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba dang /_spos 'dod pa rnams la spos dang /_bdug pa 'dod pa rnams la bdug pa dang /_byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa dang /_phye ma 'dod pa rnams la phye ma dang /_rgyan dang lhab lhub 'dod pa rnams la 
[\[13b.3\]]rgyan dang lhab lhub dang /_rin po che 'dod pa rnams la rin po che dang /_gser 'dod pa rnams la gser dang /_dngul 'dod pa rnams la dngul dang /_mu tig 'dod pa rnams la mu tig dang /_rten 'dod pa rnams la rten dang /_stan 'dod pa rnams la bstan dang /_mal cha 'dod pa rnams la mal cha dang /_
[\[13b.4\]]na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad 'dod pa rnams la na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad dang /_bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa dang /_dga' ba 'dod pa rnams la dga' ba dang /_glang po dang rta dang /_shing rta dang /_ba lang dang /_bong bu dang ma he dang /_
[\[13b.5\]]ra lug 'dod pa rnams la glang po dang /_rta dang shing rta dang ba lang dang /_bong bu dang ma he dang /_ra lug dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_gdugs dang /_ba dan 'dod pa rnams la rgyal mtshan dang /_gdugs dang ba dan dang /_bran pho dang bran mo 'dod pa rnams la 
[\[13b.6\]]bran pho dang bran mo dang 'khor gyi byis pa 'dod pa rnams la 'khor gyi byis pa dang /_bud med 'dod pa rnams la bud [{]myed [,]med [}]dang /_bu mo gzhon nu 'dod pa rnams la bu mo gzhon nu dang /_cod pan dang gtsug gi rin po che 'dod pa rnams la cod pan dang gtsug gi rin 
[\[13b.7\]]po che dang /_thor pag dang bcas pa'i gtsug gi rin po che 'dod pa rnams la thor pag dang bcas pa'i gtsug gi rin po che dang /_skra mthon ting dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dod pa rnams la skra mthon ting dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin pa byed 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]pa nas/_yo byad sna tshogs thams cad 'dod pa rnams la yang yo byad sna tshogs thams cad kyi sbyin pa byed do/_/rigs kyi bu yud tsam zhig sdod dang /_de'u re mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/_de skad du khyim bdag mkhas pas/_
[\[14a.2\]]tshig de brjod ma thag tu de'i mod la sems can grangs med pa zhig khyim bdag mkhas pa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas/_phyogs tha dad pa dang /_yul tha dad pa dang /_gnas tha dad pa dang /_grong khyer tha dad pa dang /_grong rdal tha dad pa dang /_tshong 
[\[14a.3\]]'dus tha dad pa dang /_ljongs tha dad pa dang /_'khor gyi grong tha dad pa dang /_khyim tha dad pa dang /_sems can gyi rgyud tha dad pa dang /_sems can gyi ris tha dad pa dang /_sems can rnam pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthun pa tha dad pa dang /_lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa dang /_gnas kyi rnam pa dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]du bya 
[\[14a.4\]]ba tha dad pa nas/_sems can skye mched rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_kha zas sna tshogs don du gnyer ba kha zas sna tshogs 'dod pa/_bsam pa tha dad pa bza' ba dang btung ba/_gtsang ma 'dod pa dang /_sha 'dod pa dang /_kha zas rnam pa tha dad pa 
[\[14a.5\]]sna tshogs don du gnyer ba/_lam gyi rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khyad par du skyes pa'i skye mched la gnas pa 'di lta ste/_mi'i nang nas 'bras chan dang /_sran chan dang /_khur ba dang /_skyo ma dang /_nya dang /_sha la sogs pa kham gyis bza' ba'i kha zas sna tshogs don du gnyer ba 
[\[14a.6\]]dang /_mi'i nang nas ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad na rnam par spyod pa dag las kyang /_kha zas dang btung ba sna tshogs don du gnyer ba dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par gtong ba'i rnga'i sgra dang /_
[\[14a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas kun kyang 'ongs bar gyur te/_'ongs nas kyang khyim bdag mkhas pa la slongs mo 'debs so/_/gdong du lta'o/_/sdod de/_gsol ba 'debs so/_de nas khyim bdag mkhas pas slong ba de dag kun nas 'dus 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]par shes nas/_yud tsam du bsams te nam mkha' la bltas pa dang /_nam mkha'i dbyings nas/_kha zas dang btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_dri sna tshogs dang ldan pa mang po 'thon te/_lag mthil du 'ongs par gyur to/_
[\[14b.2\]]des de dag yongs su blangs shing de ltar kun nas 'dus pa'i slongs mo ba mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_de dag ci 'dod pa'i zas dang /_btung ba'i rnam pa dang /_yo byad kyi khyad par thams cad kyis yongs su tshim par byas so/_/ci 'dod pa yongs su byin no/_/rab tu 
[\[14b.3\]]dga' bar byas so/_shin tu tshim par byas so/_dga' ba shin tu skye bar byas so/_/nyams shin tu bde bar byas so/_/yid rab tu dga' bar byas so/_/de ltar de dag shin tu tshim par byas nas/_des kyang ma chog ste/_de'i 'og tu chos bstan pa 'di lta ste/_ye shes 
[\[14b.4\]]kyi tshogs rgya chen po bstsags pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod de chos bstan to/_/phongs pa thams cad 'byung ba mi srid pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang /_skyid pa chen po yongs su 'grub par 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang /_chos kyi ye shes kyi tshul 'thob ba 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs 
[\[14b.5\]]su brjod pa dang /_bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po bstsags pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang /_dga' ba bza' ba'i zas rab tu 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos shin tu brgyan pa'i lus 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang /_
[\[14b.6\]]thub pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i stobs rnam par dag par 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i kha zas yongs su shes pa 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang /_bdud kyi dpung thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa rab tu 'thob pa 'byung 
[\[14b.7\]]ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa byas te chos ston to/_/des kha zas don du gnyer cing 'ongs pa rnams la nam mkha'i dbyings nas kha zas rnam pa sna tshogs blangs shing tshim par byas te/_de dag la tshe dang /_mdog dang /_stobs dang /_bde ba dang /_spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa/_
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]'thob par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to/_/des btung ba don du gnyer cing 'ongs pa rnams la btung ba mang po zhim pa kha na ma tho ba med pa/_yid shin tu dga' bar byed pa dag gis tshim par byas nas/_de dag la 'khor bas skom zhing 'khor ba la dga' 
[\[15a.2\]]ba las rnam par bzlog pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos la dga' zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir chos bstan to/_des ro'i mchog don du gnyer cing 'ongs pa rnams la ro'i mchog sna tshogs dang rab dang /_skyur ba dang /_lan tsha dang /_tsha ba dang /_kha ba 
[\[15a.3\]]dang /_/bska ba rnam pa tha dad pas yongs su tshim par byas te/_de'i 'og tu skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog thob par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to/_/des bzhon pa don du gnyer cing phyogs kyi rgyud sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa rnams la bzhon pa sna tshogs kyi sbyin 
[\[15a.4\]]pas yongs su bsdud de/_de dag theg pa chen po la gnas par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to/_/des gos don du gnyer cing phyogs sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa kun nas 'dus par shes nas/_yud tsam du bsams te/_nam mkha'i dbyings la bltas pa dang /_nam 
[\[15a.5\]]mkha'i dbyings las gos sna tshogs dang /_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_le brgan dang /_shel gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa kha dog sna tshogs can kha dog du mar rnam par dag pa dag 'thon cing lag pa'i mthil du 'ongs pas/_des de dag gis 
[\[15a.6\]]slongs mo ba de dag la yongs su bsdud nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo tsha shes pa dang /_khrel yod pa bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu thob par 'gyur ba rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to/_/de bzhin du yo byad sna tshogs thams cad kyis 
[\[15a.7\]]ji ltar 'ongs pa'i slongs mo ba rnams la sdud pa byas nas/_ci rigs su chos bstan to/_/de ltar khyim bdag mkhas pas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul bstan pa byas nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu kho bos ni yid kyi mdzod nas byung ba'i bsod nams kyi rnam par thar pa 'di shes par zad na/_kho bos byang chub sems dpa' yo byad la dbang thob pa rin po che'i lag pa thob par gyur pa/_'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad lag pas yongs su 
[\[15b.2\]]khebs par byas shing /_sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa sna tshogs bsgrub pa'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du rin po che kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa de bzhin du rgyan kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang /_cod pan kha dog sna tshogs 
[\[15b.3\]]kyi sprin dang /_khang pa brtsegs pa kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang /_na bza' kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang /_lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdung ba dang dkrol ba dang /_glu yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs snyan pa sna tshogs kyi sprin dang /_me tog kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang /_spos kha dog 
[\[15b.4\]]sna tshogs kyi sprin dang /_bdug spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang /_phye ma dang chos gos dang /_gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dang /_rnam pa thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa'i sprin gyi char dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 
[\[15b.5\]]'khor thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad kyi gnas su sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba dang /_gdul bar bya ba'i phyir yo byad thams cad kyi sprin gyi char 'bebs pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 
[\[15b.6\]]'am/_yon tan brjod pa'am/_rnam par 'phrul ba bstan pa nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer seng ge'i gzugs shes bya ba yod de/_de na chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud ces bya ba 'dug gis/_de'i gan du song la ji 
[\[15b.7\]]ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dga' rangs te/_mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas khyim bdag mkhas pa la 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]chos kyi rim gros slob ma'i tshul bstan te/_de'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thob par 'gyur bar yongs su blta zhing /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de la rang lus par blta ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dben par 
[\[16a.2\]]sems pa rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad par bstan pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bka' shin tu nyan pa'i sems dang ldan par bstan pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang du 'gyur ba'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag dang /_tshig 
[\[16a.3\]]mnyan par bya ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ba'i dad pa'i dbang po la bsam pa byed cing /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis btam ste btang bas/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen cig bkur ba dang /_/rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i sems kyis/_khyim bdag 
[\[16a.4\]]mkhas pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_khyim bdag mkhas pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_yang dang yang bltas te/_khyim bdag mkhas pa'i drung nas song ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bsod 
[\[16a.5\]]nams kyi chu bo de la ni yid ches par sems/_bsod nams kyi zhing de la ni yang dag par blta/_bsod nams kyi ri bo de ni yongs su sbyong /_bsod nams kyi mu stegs de la ni yang dag par 'dzeg_/bsod nams kyi mdzod de ni rnam par 'byed/_bsod nams 
[\[16a.6\]]gyi gter de la ni shin tu lta/_bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor de ni yongs su sbyong /_bsod nams kyi phung po de ni yang dag par len/_bsod nams kyi stobs de ni yongs su bskyed/_bsod nams kyi shugs de ni rnam par 'phel bar byed cing /_mthar gyis grong 
[\[16a.7\]]khyer seng ge'i gzugs gang na ba der phyin te/_chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud yongs su tshol tshol ba las/_tshong 'dus kyi srang zhig na 'dug pa mthong nas/_des de'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_g.yas phyogs su bskor ba 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]byas nas/_mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa bdag gis bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji 
[\[16b.2\]]ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal na/_'phags pa lam gang gis bdag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi ma na ngag legs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]stsal tam/_de nas chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud kyis tshong 
[\[16b.3\]]dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]lag pa nas bzung ste/_rang gi khyim gang na ba der khrid de khyim de bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu kho bo'i khyim la ltos shig ces nas/_des bltas na khyim de dag cing 'od gsal ba 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser 
[\[16b.4\]]las byas pa ste/_yangs shing mtho la dngul gyi ra bas bskor ba/_shel gyi rtsig pas shin tu legs par brtsigs te/_mdzes par byas ba/_bai DUr+ya'i phung po brgya phrag stong gis rab tu brgyan pa/_mus rag la pa'i ka ba bkye ba/_mu tig dmar po 
[\[16b.5\]]las byas pa'i seng ge'i khri shin tu bshams pa/_nor bu rin po che rang bzhin snang ba'i seng ge'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba/_nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i bla re bres pa/_gser gyi dra ba yid bzhin gyi nor bus brgyan pas kun nas yog pa/_nor bu rin po 
[\[16b.6\]]che sna tshogs grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pas rab tu brgyan pa/_a sma gar b+ha las brtsigs pa'i rdzing bu chu bsil bas gang ba dang ldan pa/_rin po che thams cad kyi shing gis bskor ba/_rgya che zhing yangs pa rim pa bcur brtsegs pa/_shin tu mtho ba/_
[\[16b.7\]]sgo brgyad dang ldan par 'dug pa mthong nas/_des khyim de'i nang du phyin te/_kun tu bltas na rim khang tha ma'i nang na bza' ba dang btung ba'i rnam pa yongs su gtong ba mthong ngo /_rim khang gnyis pa'i nang na gos kyi rnam pa thams cad yongs su 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]gtong ba mthong ngo /_/rim khang gsum pa'i nang na rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan dang /_lhab lhub yongs su gtong ba mthong ngo /_rim khang bzhi pa'i nang na btsun mo'i 'khor dga' ba'i yo byad du bya ba bud med rin po ches chen po'i steng na gzung du bya 
[\[17a.2\]]ba yongs su gtong ba mthong ngo /_/rim khang lnga pa'i nang nas lnga pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chos yang dag par bgro ba'i dga' ba la mos pa/_'jig rten la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i sems kyi spyod pa dang ldan pa/_gtsug lag thams cad mngon 
[\[17a.3\]]par bsgrub pa gzungs kyi tshul dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang /_ting nge 'dzin las rnam par ldang ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin la rnam par dpyad pa dang /_ye shes kyi snang ba mngon par sgrub pa 'dus shing 'khod par mthong ngo /_/rim khang drug pa'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[17a.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa rab tu thob pa shes rab shin tu zab pa/_rab tu zhi ba'i chos thams cad mngon par shes pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_snying po mang pos sgo kun nas byung pa/_bsgribs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spyod yul can [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[17a.5\]]gnyis pa la yang dag par spyod pa/_chos yang dag par bgro ba la rnam par 'phrul ba/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang zhing rnam par dbye ba dang /_rab tu gsal bar byed pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mang po yang dag par bgro ba 
[\[17a.6\]]byed pa rnams kun nas 'dus shing 'khod pa mthong ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo zhi ba'i snying po zhes bya ba dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'gro ba thams cad du ye shes rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 
[\[17a.7\]]sgo [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo ba'i [(]glong [,]klong [)]zhes bya ba dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo rdul dang bral ba'i 'od ces bya ba dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba zhes bya ba dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'gro ba thams cad mos par byed cing 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]rjes su 'brang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i tshul gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo kun tu lta ba'i 
[\[17b.2\]]btang snyoms thob pa zhes bya ba dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mi zad pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo chos thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho zhes bya ba dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i rjes su 
[\[17b.3\]]song ba zhes bya ba dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pa zhes bya ba dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo chos kyi sprin la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas rim pas [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i gnas shes bya ba dang /_de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa shes rab kyi pha 
[\[17b.4\]]rol tu phyin pa grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang bar yang dag par bgro ba byed cing /_rgyan brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa shin tu rnam par phye ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'khod pa mthong bar gyur to/_/rim khang bdun pa'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' sgra brnyan lta bu'i bzod pa 
[\[17b.5\]]rab tu thob pa thabs dang ye shes rnam par gdon mi za ba la shin tu byung ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yang dag par 'dzin pa sha stag 'dus shing 'khod pa mthong ngo /_/rim khang brgyad pa'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' ma nyams par 'gro ba'i 
[\[17b.6\]]mngon par shes pa rab tu thob pa/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par rgyu ba/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du gzugs brnyan rab tu 'byung ba/_chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus shin tu rnam par phye ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 
[\[17b.7\]]zhabs kyi drung nas gud du mi 'phags pa'i yul dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku la yang dag par gzhol ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du sngon du brjod pa'i gtam gyi skyes bur gyur pa sha stag kun nas 'dus shing 'khod pa 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]mthong ngo /_/rim khang dgu ba'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag 'dus shing 'khod pa mthong ngo /_rim khang bcu pa'i nang na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thog ma byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa dang /_spyod pa 
[\[18a.2\]]dang /_'byung ba dang /_smon lam rgya mtsho dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i yul dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang bcas pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu sgrog pa dang bcas pa dang /_sems can 'dul ba mdzad pa'i 
[\[18a.3\]]byin gyis rlabs dang bcas par mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa khyod la 'di lta bu'i phun sum tshogs pa mnga' na/_phun sum tshogs pa'i rnam pa de ci lta bu zhig tu sbyang ba mdzad mdzad/_
[\[18a.4\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba ni su zhig la yongs su bskrun bskrun/_des smras pa/_rigs kyi bu kho bos dran te/_'das pa'i dus kyi bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i yang pha rol cig na/_'jig rten gyi khams 'khor lo sna tshogs zhes 
[\[18a.5\]]bya bar/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings 'od gzer mtha' yas pas yongs su brgyan pa'i chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo 
[\[18a.6\]]sgyur ba/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa de ye shes rnam par snang ba la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa nyan thos bye ba phrag brgyad dang /_ye shes nyi ma'i gzi brjid la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa/_byang chub 
[\[18a.7\]]sems dpa' bye ba brgya phrag stong dang /_thabs gcig tu rgyal po chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal pos spyan drangs nas/_bza' shang gi ra ba chen po rin po che rgyal mtshan rgyan gyis mdzes pa zhes bya bar gshegs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]grong khyer du gshegs nas/_tshong 'dus kyi srang nas tshur bzhud pa'i tshe/_kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/_sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra zhig kyang phyung /_spos kyi ri lu 
[\[18b.2\]]gcig cig kyang bsregs te/_bdug spos kyis bsangs so/_/spos kyi ri lu gcig po de/_de ltar bsregs pas zhag bdun du 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyang spos kyi na bun gyi sprin kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_sems can thams cad kyi lus dang 'dra bas yongs su khebs 
[\[18b.3\]]par gyur to/_/spos kyi na bun gyi sprin de dag las kyang sgra 'di skad du brjod de/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/_dus gsum du drim [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ye shes kyi phung po dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_sgrib pa thams cad [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga' ba'o/_nyon 
[\[18b.4\]]mongs pa'i bag chags thams cad yongs su sbyangs pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba thams cad kyang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i don chen po tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bsgrub par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ro zhes/_
[\[18b.5\]]de skad du kho bo'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba la shugs yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir/_spos kyi na bun gyi sprin de las/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis sgra'i rnam pa de lta bu byung ngo /_rigs kyi bu 
[\[18b.6\]]de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis/_bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang kho bos gnas gsum du yongs su bsngos te/_gsum gang zhe na/_'di ltar phongs pa thams cad shin tu rgyun gcad pa dang /_dam pa'i chos mnyan pa 
[\[18b.7\]]dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'bral ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mthong ba/_yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngos so/_/rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba smon lam gyi dkyil 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]'khor thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 'di shes par zad na/_kho bos byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin po che tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa/_sangs rgyas kyi sku rgya mtsho dang /_tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad pa la zhugs pa/_tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad pa'i 
[\[19a.2\]]chos kyi sprin gyi char yang dag par 'dzin pa/_tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/_kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dra ba rnam par rgyas par gyur pa/_ting nge 'dzin tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad pa'i yul la zhugs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad pas dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[19a.3\]]rgyun gcig tu gyur pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad cing rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog par spyod pa/_dus gsum tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad pas mnyam pa nyid la zhugs pa/_bskal pa thams cad tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad par yongs su gnas pas [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyo ba/_kun tu lta ba tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad pa'i yul 
[\[19a.4\]]gyi sa la gnas pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/_yon tan brjod par nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na yul sba'i rtsa ba zhes ba ba yod de/_de'i grong khyer kun nas sgo zhes bya ba na/_tshong dpon spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba zhes bya ba 'dug 
[\[19a.5\]]gis/_de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 
[\[19a.6\]]'tshal te/_chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/_chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud kyi drung nas song ngo //_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad 
[\[19a.7\]]ces bya ba shin tu rgyas chen po'i mdo/_/bam po gnyis pa/_de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa mthong ba la zhugs pa/_byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa dang 'grogs pa rab tu thob pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]lam mtha' yas pa'i tshul gyis snang bar gyur ba/_chos kyi tshul mtha' yas pas mngon par brlan pas shin tu rtogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa mtha' yas pa'i lam gyis rnam par dag pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po 
[\[19b.2\]]mtha' yas pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa mtha' yas pa'i stobs la gnas pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' yas ba'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mtha' yas pa'i stobs 
[\[19b.3\]]yongs su skyes pa/_byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyis thub pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_mtha' yas ba'i rgyal mtshan can/_byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba mtha' yas pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos mtha' yas pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa de 
[\[19b.4\]]mthar gyis yul sba'i rtsa ba gang na ba der phyin nas/_grong khyer kun nas sgo yongs su tshol zhing phyogs dang /_phyogs mtshams dang /_yul phyogs nyen kor kun dang /_sgang dang gshong dang /_mnyam pa dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa thams cad du yongs su skyo ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[19b.5\]]bsam pa dang /_'jigs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems dang /_ldog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i brtson 'grus dang /_thub pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems kyis/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag ma brjed pa dang /_rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi spyod pa ma nor bas sems rab tu 
[\[19b.6\]]bsgos pa dang /_sgo kun nas rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa dang /_bag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa thams cad dang bral ba dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]dang rna ba g.yeng ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par kun tu tshol tshol nas yul spa'i rtsa ba'i dbus shig na/_grong khyer kun nas sgo tshong 'dus kyi rdal 
[\[19b.7\]]stong phrag bcu'i gnas su gyur pa/_de shin tu bzang por grub pa/_rab brtan pas bskor ba/_shin tu mtho ba bzhi mdo brgyad kyis brgyan pa 'dug par mthong ste/_de'i nang na spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba yang spos 'tshong gi khyams shig na 'dug pa mthong 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]nas/_spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba gang na ba der phyin te/_spos 'tshong kun du lta ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/_mdun du 'dug ste/_thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa bdag gis bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag 
[\[20a.2\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma mtshal to/_smras pa rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[20a.3\]]sems bskyed pa legs so legs so/_rigs kyi bu kho bos ni sems can thams cad kyi nad shes te/_rlung las gyur pa dang /_mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /_bad kan las gyur pa dang /_cha mnyam par 'khrugs pa dang /_gzhan gyis gnod par byas pa dang /_
[\[20a.4\]]mi ma yin pa las gyur pa dang /_dug 'thungs pa dang /_sngags dang /_mtshon dang /_ro langs pa'i sbyor ba sna tshogs dang /_me las gyur pa dang /_chus bskyod pa las gyur pa dang /_sngangs pa dang 'jigs pa sna tshogs las gyur pa thams cad kyang shes so/_nad 
[\[20a.5\]]de dag thams cad zhi bar bya ba yang shes te/_'di ltar snum par bya ba yang rab tu shes so/_/skyug par bya ba dang /_bkru ba dang /_brta ba dang /_gtar ba dang /_sna'i cho ga dang /_nya ra dang /_dugs dang /_lums dang /_byug pa dang /_dug gso ba dang /_'byung po'i gdon [{]myed [,]med [}]par 
[\[20a.6\]]bya ba dang /_bcud dang /_khrus dang /_bzhag pa dang /_bskyed pa dang /_kha dog sbyang ba dang /_nyam bstod pa'ang rab tu shes te/_rigs kyi bu phyogs bcu nas sems can gang ji snyed cig kho bo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyi nad thams cad kyang rab tu zhi 
[\[20a.7\]]bar byed de/_nad sos nas kyang legs par bkru ba dang lus la byug pas byug pa byas nas/_ci tshul gyi rgyan gyis yan lag shin tu brgyan te/_ci rigs pa'i gos lus la bskon nas/_kha zas bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su tshim par 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]byas te/_nor dpag tu med pas kyang phun sum tshogs par byed do/_/de'i 'og tu yang de dag la mi gtsang ba bstan cing /_/'dod chags spang ba'i phyir chos ston to/_byams pa chen po yongs su bsngags shing zhe sdang spang ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/chos rnam par dbye ba'i 
[\[20b.2\]]bye brag bstan cing gti mug spang ba'i phyir chos ston to/_khyad par khong du chud pa'i tshul gyi sgo yang dag par bstan cing cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa dang /_nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi chos dang ldan pa'i gtam thams cad yongs su brjod 
[\[20b.3\]]cing byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal tshad gzung du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su bstan cing /_snying rje chen po 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/_/bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po bstsags pa yang dag par bsngags shing 
[\[20b.4\]]yon tan tshad med pa 'thob pa dang /_'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/_/sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul bar bya ba yongs su bstan cing theg pa chen po'i smon lam 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 
[\[20b.5\]]dang /_bskal pa thams cad du gnas par bya ba'i spyod pa'i dra ba shin tu rgyas par bshad cing byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa 'thob pa dang /_'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsngags shing mtshan dang dpe 
[\[20b.6\]]byad bzang pos brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'thob pa dang 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yongs su dag pa thams cad du 'gro ba 'thob pa dang 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/_/
[\[20b.7\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dang /_sku mdog rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyu yongs su ston to/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]thub par dka' ba yongs su ston to/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zil gyis [(]mnon [,]gnon [)]la/_zil gyis gnon pa rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs 
[\[21a.2\]]su brjod cing chos kyi sku yongs su dag pa yongs su ston to/_/thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing 'gro ba thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i sku gtsang zhing rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to/_/smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing bskal 
[\[21a.3\]]pa thams cad kyi dus su 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang 'grogs pa'i sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to/_/stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du mngon par 'byung ba'i sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to/_/ye shes kyi pha 
[\[21a.4\]]rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing 'gro ba thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par mdzad pa'i sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i chos thams cad las rnam par ldog pa yongs su brjod cing blta na phul du bzang ba'i sku rnam par dag pa yongs su 
[\[21a.5\]]ston to/_/de ltar de dag chos kyi sbyin pas yongs su bsdus te/_nor dang rin po che mtha' yas pa'i tshogs kyis nye bar brtan pa byas shing so sor 'gyed do/_/yang rigs kyi bu kho bo ni spos dang /_bdug spos dang /_bsgo ba dang /_bsku ba sbyor shes te/_'di 
[\[21a.6\]]ltar spos kyi rgyal po gzhal du med pa la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dang /_spos kyi rgyal po sin+du ba ra la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dang /_spos kyi rgyal po mi pham pa la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dang /_spos kyi rgyal po rnam par gsal byed la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dang /_spos kyi rgyal po nyi ma yod pa la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]
[\[21a.7\]]pa dang /_spos kyi rgyal po dus dang 'thun pa la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dang /_spos kyi rgyal po sbrul gyi snying po'i tsan dan la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dang /_spos kyi rgyal po sprin gyi a ga ru la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dang /_spos kyi rgyal po dbang po mi 'khrug pa la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa/_spos sbyar ba thams cad 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]kyang rab tu shes so/_/yang rigs kyi bu kho bo ni sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa dang /_sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur ba'i spos kyi gzugs shes te/_rigs kyi bu/_sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par 
[\[21b.2\]]byed pa dang /_sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur ba'i spos kyi gzugs 'dis kho bo'i bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_de'i mthus kho bo sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i rgyan gyi sprin byin gyis rlob pa 
[\[21b.3\]]byed de 'di ltar spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyi rgyan nas rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i rgyan gyi sprin gyi bar du byin gyis rlob pa byed do/_/rigs kyi bu kho bo na ni ma de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya bar 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe/_
[\[21b.4\]]kho bos sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa dang /_sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur ba'i spos kyi gzugs 'di las spos kyi mdzod kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin tshad gzung du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bton cing /_phyogs 
[\[21b.5\]]bcu'i chos kyi dbyings thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi dbyings thams cad du spos thams cad kyi mdzod kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyi rgyan byin gyis rlob pa byed do/_/chos kyi dbyings thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams 
[\[21b.6\]]cad yongs su sbyong ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang /_spos kyi khang pa'i sprin gyi rgyan dang /_spos kyi ra ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang /_spos kyi ba gam gyi sprin gyi rgyan dang /_spos kyi rta babs kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang /_spos kyi skar khung gi sprin gyi rgyan dang /_spos kyi pu shu'i sprin gyi rgyan
