[\[21b.7\]]dang /_spos kyi zla gam gyi sprin gyi rgyan dang /_spos kyi gdugs kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang /_spos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang /_spos kyi lha'i ba dan gyi sprin gyi rgyan dang /_spos kyi bla bre'i sprin gyi rgyan dang /_spos kyi gzugs kyi dra ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang /_spos kyi 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]'od kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang /_spos kyi snang ba dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sprin gyi rgyan dang /_spos thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan byin gyis rlob ste/_rigs kyi bu kho bos ni sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa dang /_sgo thams 
[\[22a.2\]]cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur ba'i spos kyi gzugs kyi chos kyi sgo 'di shes par zad na/_kho bos byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po lta bur gyur pa/_blta na don yod pa/_'grogs na don yod pa/_rjes su dran na don yod pa/_brtul 
[\[22a.3\]]zhugs rjes su byas na don yod pa/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]thos na don yod pa/_mthong pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zhi bar 'gyur ba/_mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams ngan song gi rgyud las ldog par 'gyur ba/_mthong pa tsam gyis sems can thams 
[\[22a.4\]]cad sangs rgyas kyi chos la skabs phye ba thob par gyur pa/_mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba mthong tsam gyis sems can thams cad 'jigs pa dang /_'khor ba'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad kyi 'jigs pa dang 
[\[22a.5\]]bral bar 'gyur ba mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i phyogs la rten par 'gyur ba'i phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba/_mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams rga shi'i grog po dang g.yang sar mi ltung ba/_mthong ba tsam gyis sems 
[\[22a.6\]]can rnams chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba 'thob par 'gyur ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am yon tan brjod par nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer ta la'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod 
[\[22a.7\]]de/_de na rgyal po me zhes bya ba 'dug gis/_de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs[,]bzang[}]/_tshong dpon spos 'tshong kun 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]tu blta ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_tshong dpon spos 'tshong kun tu blta ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/_tshong dpon spos 'tshong kun tu blta ba'i drung nas song ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dge 
[\[22b.2\]]ba'i bshes gnyen gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de dag rjes su dran par byed cing /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi sgo de dag rjes su dran par bya ba dang /_bdag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ngo /_/zhes rang gi sems yongs su tshim par bya ba dang /_
[\[22b.3\]]bdag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bsrungs pas/_nga ni bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/snyam du rnam par sems shing /_sems dga' ba ni rab tu thob/_sems dang ba dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang /_
[\[22b.4\]]sems rangs pa dang /_sems mgu ba dang /_sems mos pa dang /_sems kyi shugs dang /_sems rnam par zhi ba dang /_sems rgya chen po dang /_sems kyi rgyan dang /_sems la thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang sems la sgrib pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_sems rnam par phye ba dang /_sems 
[\[22b.5\]]yang dag par gzhol ba dang /_sems kyi dbang dang /_sems dbang sgyur ba dang /_sems kyi chos khong du chud pa dang /_sems kyis zhing rgyas bar dgang ba dang /_sems sangs rgyas mthong bas brgyan pa dang /_sems stobs bcu'i yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba'ang 
[\[22b.6\]]thob nas/_de mthar kyis ljongs nas ljongs dang /_grong nas grong dang /_yul nas yul du tshol zhing grong khyer ta la'i rgyal mtshan gang na ba der phyin te/_rgyal po me gang na bzhugs zhes dris na/_de la 'gro ba gzhan dag gis 'di skad du bstan te/_rigs kyi bu 'de re rgyal 
[\[22b.7\]]po me ni rgyal po'i don bsgrub pa'i phyir seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs shing /_rgyal po'i phrin las mdzad do/_/khams rab tu skyong ngo /_/chad pas gcad par 'os pa ni chad pas gcod do/_bya dgas sdud par 'os pa ni bya dgas sdud do/_g.yon yod pa rnams 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]la ni gyod rmed do/_/rtsod pa rnams kyi zhal ce ni yongs su gcod do/_/dma' ba rnams ni dbugs 'byin to/_/dregs pa rnams ni 'dul ba mdzad do/_/srog gcod pa las ni rnam par zlog go_/ma byin par len pa dang ni rnam par 'byed pa mdzad do/_/gzhan 
[\[23a.2\]]gyis yongs su bzung ba la mngon par zhen pa ni rnam par zhi bar mdzad do/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba las ni phyir zlog pa mdzad do/_/phra ma'i tshig dang ni rnam par 'bral bar mdzad do/_/zhe gcod pa'i ngag ni rgyun gcod pa mdzad do/_/tshig kyal pa las ni yongs su glon no/_/chags sems 
[\[23a.3\]]dang ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dre ba mdzad do/_/gnod sems dang ni rgyang sring ngo /_/log par lta ba dang ni 'dre ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par mdzad do/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rgyal po me gang na ba der phyin na/_des mthong ba/_rgyal po me de ni rin po che'i seng ge'i khri chen po rdo rje mthu bo che'i nor bu sna tshogs 
[\[23a.4\]]kyis smras pa/_rin po che 'od gsal ba rnam pa sna tshogs grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa las byas pa'i rkang pa bkye ba/_rin po che gcig ma yin pas legs par spras shing brgyan pas yid du 'ong ba'i lhun dang ldan pa/_gser gyi lcag pod kyi dra bas legs par blas shing chub par 
[\[23a.5\]]btags pa/_nor bu rin po che du ma'i sgron mes shin tu snang bar byas pa/_nor bu rin po cha dbang gi rgyal po las byas pa'i pad mo'i snying po can/_lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i stan rim pa du mar bting ba/_gam yo nas lha rdzas kyi spos sna tshogs kyi bdug spos kyis shin tu bdugs 
[\[23a.6\]]pa/_rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba/_brgya phrag stong gis mdzes par byas pa/_rin po che'i ba dan brgya phrag stong rnam par bres pas brgyan pa/_rin po che'i me tog gi chun po sna tshogs kyi lda ldi rab tu bkye bas shin tu mdzes par byas pa/_steng nas lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i bla re sna 
[\[23a.7\]]tshogs bres pa zhig la 'dug cing /_de ni gzhon zhing dar la bab pa/_gzugs mdzes shing blta na yid du 'ong ba/_skra mthon ting g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang ldan pa/_mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa gtsug tor gyi spyi bo can/_'phral ba yangs pa/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]dkar 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]nag 'byes shing ring la/_rdzi ma ba'i rdzi ma ltar 'dug pa/_sna'i dbyibs legs shing bzang la ran par mdzes pa dang ldan pa/_mchu mtshal ltar mdog bzang zhing shin tu legs pa dang ldan pa/_so mnyam zhing thags bzang la shin tu dkar ba bzhi bcu tshang ba dang ldan pa/_
[\[23b.2\]]'gram pa'i lha nga seng ge'i 'gram pa ltar 'dug pa khur ba shas rgyas pa/_smin tshugs gzhu ltar 'dug cing ring la shin tu mdzes pa/_mdzod spu zla ba'i kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i thig le can/_rna ba'i shal ring zhing lhod par 'phyang ba/_zla ba nya ba ltar bzhin mdangs 
[\[23b.3\]]dang ldan zhing shin tu bzang ba/_mgul zlum zhing dung ltar mdzes pa/_snying ka dpal gyi be 'us brgyan pa/_ro stod seng ge'i ro stod ltar 'dug pa/_thal gong shin tu rgyas la/_dpung mgo'i lhun legs shing zlum pa/_lag pa ring ba dra bar 'brel ba'i sor mo 
[\[23b.4\]]can/_rkang lag 'khor los brgyan pa/_rkang lag 'jam zhing gzhon la shas rgyas pa/_bdun shin tu mtho ba/_rked pa rdo rje ltar 'dug pa/_lus che zhing drang ba/_brla zlum pa/_pho mtshan gsang ba'i sbubs na 'dug pa/_byin pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]e ne ya'i byin pa ltar 'dug 
[\[23b.5\]]pa/_sor mo ring ba/_rkang pa'i rting ba yangs pa/_'od 'dom gang ba dang ldan pa mdog gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa/_ba spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su gyen du 'khyil ba/_shing n+ya gro da'i rgyal po ltar chu zheng gab pa/_lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos shin tu 
[\[23b.6\]]brgyan pa/_mgo la nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi cod pan thogs pa/_'dzam bu chu klung gi gser las byas pa'i 'bral ba'i rgyan zla gam gyis mdzes par brgyan pa/_rna ba las rin po che in dra nI la'i rna cha dri ma med pa 'phyang ba/_nor bu rin po che rin thang [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[23b.7\]]pa'i se mo de'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pas/_dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ro stod rgyas pa dang ldan pa/_lha rdzas kyi nor bu dam pa'i dpung rgyan dang /_gdu bus lag pa mdzes par brgyan pa zhig ste/_rin po che'i gdugs chen po rin po che baiDUr+ya dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i yu ba can/_
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]rin po che'i shar bu brgya phrag bcus rnam par phye ba/_'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi bla gab can nor bu rin po che sgra snang ba rnam par dag pa'i snying po can/_rin po che'i dril bu'i phreng ba las sgra snyan cing /_yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba/_nor bu rin po che'i 'od 
[\[24a.2\]]phyogs kun tu 'phro ba can drung nas bzung zhing bsgreng ba/_rgyal po'i gzi brjid dang dbang chen po la gnas pa/_srid la gzhan gyi 'khor gyis gtse ba med pa/_dgra'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i dbang phyug dang ldan par 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/de'i 'khor kun nas kyang blon po stong 
[\[24a.3\]]phrag bcu tshogs shing rgyal po'i dgos pa bsgrub pa la brtson pa mthong ngo /_/de'i mdun na chad pas gcod pa'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]sems can dmyal ba'i srungs ma lta bu/_gshin rje'i g.yog 'khor lta bu 'jigs 'jigs lta'i gos gyon pa/_gtum zhing [{]myi [,]mi [}]bzad la 'jigs pa chen po bskyed pa 
[\[24a.4\]{]myig [,]mig [}]dmar ba so gtsigs pa/_gdong gi gnyer ma gsum khro gnyer du bsdus pa/_ral gyi dang /_sta re dang /_lcags kyi chang mdud dang /_mda' dang /_be rga dang /_mdung la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa'i mtshon cha dang /_lag cha thogs pa'i lus dang /_bzhin gyi dbyibs [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug cing 'jigs 
[\[24a.5\]]su rung ba/_sprin nag po ltar 'dug pa/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]snyan cing brlang la [(]bsdangs [,]bsngangs [)]pa'i sgra drag po 'byin pa/_gzi lta bar dka' ba/_'jigs pa chen po bskyed pa/_srog chags brgya phrag stong gi snying 'gems par byed pa/_de lta bu dag chad pas gcad par 'os pa'i sems can chad pas 
[\[24a.6\]]gcod pa la brtson pa mthong ngo /_/de na srog chags rku ba gzhan gyi nor la 'phrog pa/_sems can gyi longs spyod chud gson pa/_lam sgugs shing 'phrog pa/_grong dang grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_lhas la myes gtong ba/_grong du chom po byed pa/_khyim phugs 'debs pa/_
[\[24a.7\]]sdig sdig ltar byed pa/_dug ldud pa/_dkrugs ma byed pa/_thong mi byed pa/_byi bo byed pa/_log par zhugs pa/_gnod par sems pa/_'dod chen che ba/_sdig pa sna tshogs kyi las [{]myi [,]mi [}]bzad pa byed pa/_brgya stong mang po bcing ba dam po lngas bcings shing rgyal po [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]drung du khrid pa dag kyang mthong ngo /_/de dag la'ang rgyal po myes ci rigs bar chad pas gcad par gyur pa mthong ngo /_/des de na rgyal po mes bsgo zhing la la ni rka lag gcad/_la la ni rna ba dang sna bcad/_la la ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]phyung /_la la ni yan lag dang nying lag dang /_mgo bcad/_la la ni lus thams 
[\[24b.2\]]cad mes btang /_la la ni ba tshwa'i chu khol mas lus la gtor cing pags pa brnyil ba la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa/_de lta bu'i chad pa sna tshogs du ma mi bzad pa drag pa brlang ba yid du mi 'ong ba srog 'phrog pa dag kyang byed par mthong ngo /_/gsad pa'i sa de na 'ang bsad pa'i rka lag dang /_rna ba dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]dang /_
[\[24b.3\]]sna dang /_mgo dang /_yan lag dang /_nying lag gi phung po ri rab tsam du spungs pa mthong ngo /_/khrag gi mtsho dpag tshad gsum tsam du zabs su zab la chu zhing du dpag tshad du ma yod pa yang mthong ngo /_/de na shi ba'i [(]rkeng [,]keng [)]rus yan lag dang nying lag dang /_mgo dang bral ba brgya stong du ma la/_
[\[24b.4\]]spyang ki dang wa dang /_khyi dang bya rog dang /_bya rgod dang /_khra dang bya ku rar mang pos gang ste/_'drad cing 'thog pa mthong ngo /_/de la'ang la la ni kha dog gyur te/_sngon por gyur pa tsam/_la la ni rnags pa tsam/_la la ni bam pa tsam/_la la ni 'bu zhugs pa tsam du gyur te/_
[\[24b.5\]]shin tu skyi g.ya' zhing 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/gsang ba de dag gsod pa'i tshe/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]sdug pa cho dgur byas pas na 'jigs 'jigs skad dang /_snying rdo rje skad du sgra 'byin cing cho nges 'debs pa'i sgra chen po thos na/_skyi g.ya' zhing mi dga' ba 
[\[24b.6\]]chen po bskyed pa/_sems can dmyal ba chen po ris gzhom pa'i sgra lta bu'ang thos so/_/des de ltar kha btags te brdungs pa dang /_shin tu 'jigs pa'i drag shul mthong nas/_'di snyam du gyur te bdag ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[24b.7\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par zhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol zhing 'bad de/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la dge ba ni ci zhig bgyi/_mi dge ba ni gang zhig spang zhes 'dri 'dri na/_rgyal po me 'di la ni dge ba'i chos kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]kha na ma tho ba chen po'i las la spyod pa yid kyi yongs su rtog pa shin tu gtum pa dang ldan pa/_sems can pha rol gyi srog gcad pa la zhugs pa/_sems can pha rol shin tu mnar ba la brtson pa/_tshe phyi ma la lta ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_ngan song gi g.yang 
[\[25a.2\]]sa'i gad ka na 'dug pa zhig na/_'di las cig byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'ang thos par 'gyur ram snyam ste/_de de ltar sems shing yid la byed de/_sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa la mngon par brtson pa/_snying rje chen po skyes pa'i sems dang ldan pa 
[\[25a.3\]]de la steng gi nam mkha'i dbyings las lha mang pos bos pa/_rigs kyi bu drang srong rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag tu bya ba mi dran nam/_des gyen du nam mkha'i dbyings la bltas nas/_dran no zhes brjod do/_/lha rnams kyis smras pa/_
[\[25a.4\]]rigs kyi bu khyod dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la de ltar the tshom ma bskyed cig_/rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni yang dag pa ma nor bar ston gyi log pa ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhas pas spyod pa'i 
[\[25a.5\]]ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/sems can yongs su sdud pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/sems can tshar gcod pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/sems can gzengs bstod 
[\[25a.6\]]pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/sems can yongs su sbyong ba'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/sems can yongs su skyong ba'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/sems can 'dzudapa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/sems can yongs su 
[\[25a.7\]]smin par byed pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_sems can 'dul ba'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/song rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dris shig ces nas/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]lha'i ngag mnyan te/_rgyal 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]po me gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_rgyal po me'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_rgyal po me la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/_thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[25b.2\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/_'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag 
[\[25b.3\]]gis thos na/_'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/_de nas rgyal po myes rgyal po'i bya ba byas te/_seng ge'i khri las langs nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[25b.4\]]kyi lag pa g.yas pa nas bzung ste/_rgyal po'i pho brang ta la'i rgyal mtshan du khrid do/_/de mthar gyis rang gi gnas su phyin nas/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du khrid de khri la bzhag nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu nga'i khyim dang 
[\[25b.5\]]longs spyod la ltos shes nas/_des bltas na khyim de rgya che zhing yangs la rin po che bdun gyi ra bas yongs su bskor ba/_nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pas shin tu mdzes par byas pa/_rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa brgya stong du mas rab tu brgyan pa/_nor bu rin po 
[\[25b.6\]]che bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od shin tu 'bar bas gzi brjid rab tu 'bar bar byas pa/_nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam pa tha dad pa rnam par phye zhing bris pas rnam par mdzes par byas pa/_mu tig dmar po'i ka ba bkye ba/_nang du seng ge'i khri mu sar gal ba las byas pa/_
[\[25b.7\]]rin po che brgya stong du mas rnam pa sna tshogs su brgyan pa/_shin tu bshams pa/_nor bu rin po che'i sgra snang ba'i seng ge'i rgyal mtshan shin tu bsgreng ba/_steng nas nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i bla re bres pa/_yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]bas kun nas yog pa/_nor bu rin po che sna tshogs grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pas rab tu brgyan pa'i ba gam gyi rgyan dang ldan pa/_a sma gar b+ha las byas pa'i rdzing chu bsil bas gang ba dang ldan pa/_rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gis 'khor bar 'dug pa 
[\[26a.2\]]mthong ngo /_/de'i 'khor bud [{]myed [,]med [}]bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa/_kha dog rgyas pa/_bzang ba'i phul du bya ba dang ldan pa/_sgyu rtsal thams cad kyi tshul la mkhas pa sngon du ldang ba/_phyi nas nyal ba byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_ci bsgo ba bzhin du byed cing /_ngag nyan pa 
[\[26a.3\]]bye ba phrag bcu yang 'khod par mthong ngo /_/de nas rgyal po myes tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu ji snyam du sems/_cig sdig pa byed pa rnams la las kyi rnam par smin pa mngon par grub pa 'di lta bu yod dam/_lus phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu 
[\[26a.4\]]yod dam/_'khor phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu yod dam/_skyid pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu yod dam/_dbang phyug dang dbang chen po thob pa phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu yod dam/_smras pa 'phags pa de lta bu ni ma mchis so/_/des smras pa/_rigs kyi 
[\[26a.5\]]bu nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/_sgyu ma'i rnam pa thob pa ste/_rigs kyi bu nga'i yul na gnas pa'i sems can 'di dag kyang phal cher srog gcod pa byed pa/_ma byin par len pa/_'dod pas log par g.yem pa/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba/_phra ma can tshig brlang bor smra ba/_
[\[26a.6\]]byung rgyal du brjod pa/_chags sems dang ldan pa/_gnod sems can/_log par lta ba/_sdig pa'i las byed pa/_khro zhing gtum pa/_bab rgyal can/_mi dge ba'i las kyi bya ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa dag ste/_de dag ni rnam pa gzhan gyis sdig pa'i spyod pa las bzlog 
[\[26a.7\]]pa dang /_dgag pa dang /_bstan par mi nus te/_de ltar rigs kyi bu nga ni sems can 'di dag gdul ba dang /_yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_shin tu dul bar bya ba dang /_phan pa la dgod par bya ba'i phyir/_snying rje chen po mdun du byas te/_gsod pa'i gshed ma sprul pa rnams 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]gsad pa'i myir sprul pa rnams la/_gsod du gzung pa dang /_chad pas gcod pa'i mi sprul pa rnams mi dge ba'i las kyi lam la spyod par sprul pa'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]rnams la chad pa sna tshogs kyis gcod du gzud pa dang /_rka lag dang sna dang rna ba dang /_yan lag dang nying lag dang /_mgo bcad pa 
[\[26b.2\]]las byung ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa nyams su tshor bar gyur ba lta bu dag kyang yongs su ston pa byed de/_de mthong nas nga'i khams na gnas pa'i sems can de dag nyes pa gtong zhing skyo ba'i shugs thob par 'gyur ro/_/'jigs pa skye zhing bag tsha ba skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag sdig 
[\[26b.3\]]pa'i las byed pa rnams gtong zhing bag byed par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar nga ni sems can 'di dag thabs des nyes pa stong zhing 'jigs pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_skyo ba'i yid dang ldan par shes nas/_mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam las bzlog ste/_dge ba bcu'i 
[\[26b.4\]]las kyi lam dang ldan par byas nas dga' zhing bde ba'i mthar phyin pa/_sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bde ba la dgod pa byed kyi/_rigs kyi bu nga ni lus dang ngag gam/_yid kyis kyang sems can su la'ang co mi 'dri/_tho mi 'tsham mo/_rigs 
[\[26b.5\]]kyi bu nga ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mnar [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sdug bsngal gyis bgrings shes pa ste/_byol song gi skye gnas glen pa'i khams su gtogs pa las kyang chung ngu na/_rtswa'i rtse mos blta ba'i srog chags phre'u 'ga' la yang sems bskyed pa gcig tsam du yang sdug bsngal bar bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[26b.6\]]dga' na/_zhing du gyur cing dge ba'i las kyi lam bskyed par nus pa'i mi lta zhig ci smos/_rigs kyi bu nga ni rmi lam na yang mi dge ba'i chos yongs su rgyu ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]bskyed na/_ched du bsams te lta smos re skan/_rigs kyi bu de ltar ngas ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar 
[\[26b.7\]]pa sgyu ma'i rnam pa 'di shes par zad na/_ngas ni byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob pa/_srid pa dang lam gyi rgyud thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam pa khong du chud pa sprul pa lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas byung ba/_gzugs brnyan lta bu'i 'jig rten thams 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]cad rnam par rig pa/_rmi lam lta bu'i chos nyid khong du chud pa/_thogs pa med pa'i sgo'i chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la rjes su zhugs pa/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]'phrul lta bu'i spyod pa'i dra ba rtogs par gyur pa/_ye shes bsgribs pa med pa'i spyod yul gyi yul dang 
[\[27a.2\]]ldan pa/_kun tu yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi lam gyis byung ba/_klong kun tu 'khyil pa'i rgyud kyi gzugs la dbang bsgyur ba/_sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul gyi yul khong du chud pa rnams kyi spyod yul shes pa'am/_yon tan brjod par nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu lho 
[\[27a.3\]]phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/_grong khyer 'od bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na rgyal po 'od chen po zhes bya ba 'dug gis/_de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod po la bslab par bya ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi 
[\[27a.4\]]bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]rgyal po [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/_rgyal po me la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/_yang dang yang bltas nas rgyal po me'i drung nas song ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ye shes sgyu ma de rjes su dran par byed cing /_
[\[27a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/_sgyu ma'i rnam pa de la bsam pa dang /_chos nyid sgyu ma'i rnam pa de la rab tu brtag pa dang /_las kyi sgyu ma mnyam pa de khong du chud par bya ba dang /_chos kyi sgyu ma mnyam pa de la rjes su bsam pa dang /_chos kyis yongs su smin par bya 
[\[27a.6\]]ba'i sprul pa mnyam pa de khong du chud par bya ba dang /_ye shes las byung ba'i snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /_smon lam gyi sgyu ma'i rnam pa mtha' yas pa mngon par bsgrub pa de/_mngon par bsgrub par bya ba dang /_spyod pa sprul pa'i chos nyid chags 
[\[27a.7\]]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de rnam par sbyong bar bya ba dang /_dus gsum gyi sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i mtshan nyid de yang rnam par dbye bar byed cing /_mthar gyis yul nas yul du dri ba dang /_kun tu btsal ba dang /_rjes su rnam par lta bu byed cing /_phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dang lam dang /_sman 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]ljongs dang /_thang dang /_thag thug dang /_khal khol dang /_ri dang ri sul dang /_grong dang grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang khams dang /_rgyal po'i gnas thams cad du yongs su skyo ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems dang lus la du ba med par tshol tshol te/_grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po'i 
[\[27b.2\]]nyen kor zhig tu phyin pa na/_rgyal po 'od chen po gang na bzhugs shes dris na/_de la 'gro ba mang pos bstan pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di re 'di ni grong khyer 'od bzang po zhes bya ba yin te/_'di na rgyal po 'od chen po bzhugs so zhes nas/_de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]grong khyer chen 
[\[27b.3\]]po 'od bzang po gang na ba der phyin nas/_grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang dga' rangs te/_mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/_'di snyam du bsams so/_/'di na bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen bzhugs pa lta ste/_de ring ni dge 
[\[27b.4\]]ba'i bshes gnyen de yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang thos par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba'i sgo dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan bsam gyis mi 
[\[27b.5\]]khyab pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la rnam par spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[27b.6\]]rnam par thar pas rnam par rol pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i brtsams pa chen po mthar dbyung ba rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'ang thos par 'gyur ro zhes de ltar bsam pa yid la byed cing grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po gang na ba der song ste phyin 
[\[27b.7\]]nas grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po de la bltas na/_gser dang dngul dang baiDUr+ya dang /_shel dang mu tig dmar po dang /_a sma gar b+ha dang /_mu sa ra gal pa dang /_rin po che 'di bdun gyis shin tu bzang zhing blta na mdzes pa/_rin po che'i 'obs zabs su zab pa/_chus gang ba gzhi 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]gser gyi gram pas gang ba/_lha rdzas kyi ut+pa la dang /_pad+mo dang /_ku mud dang /_bun+da ri kas kun nas yog pa/_dus dang 'thun pa'i tsan dan gyi 'dam dang /_lu mas 'khor ba bdun gyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba/_rin po che 
[\[28a.2\]]sna bdun gyi ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba/_rdo rje rin po che'i ra ba bdun gyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba/_'di lta ste/_seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i rdo rje'i ra ba dang /_rdo rje gzhan gyis thub pa med pa'i ra ba dang /_'bug pa'i ngang tshul 
[\[28a.3\]]gyi rdo rje'i ra ba dang /_thub par dka' ba'i ngang tshul gyi rdo rje'i ra ba dang /_rdo rje brtan pa chags pa med pa'i ra ba dang /_rdo rje'i 'od gzer dra ba'i snying po'i ra ba dang /_rdul dang bral ba'i kha dog gi rgyan gyi rdo rje'i ra bas yongs su bskor ba ste/_rdo rje rin po che'i ra ba de dag thams cad 
[\[28a.4\]]kyang /_nor bu rin po che grangs med pas yongs su spras pa/_'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi lan kan dang /_ba so mdzes par bkye ba dngul rin po che'i ba so phreng ba mdzes pas brgyan pa/_rin po baiDUR+Ya'i ba so'i phreng ba mdzes pas brgyan pa/_rin po che shel gyi ba 
[\[28a.5\]]so'i phreng ba mdzes pas brgyan pa/_rin po che byi ru'i ba so'i phreng ba mdzes pas brgyan pa/_mu tig dmar po'i ba so'i phreng ba mdzes pas brgyan pa/_mu tig rin po che rgya mtsho'i snying po'i ba so'i phreng ba mdzes pas brgyan pa ste/_grong khyer chen po de'i sgo chen po brgyad kyi 
[\[28a.6\]]bar bar na yang dpag tshad bcu bcu yod do/_/sgo de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun las sna tshogs mdzes par byas pa ste/_blta na yid du 'ong ba'o/_/grong khyer chen po de ni de ltar rgya che zhing yangs la yan lag rnam par brgyad du rnam par phye ba/_baiDUr+ya sngon po'i sa la gnas pa ste/_
[\[28a.7\]]grong khyer chen po de'i nang na yang srang chen po bye ba phrag bcu yod de/_srang re re'i glo gnyis nas kyang khyim chen po brgya phrag stong stong mkhos legs par 'grigs pa ste/_kun kyang rin po che sna tshogs las byas pa dag go_/rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]rab tu brgyan pa dag go_rin po che'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba dang /_ba dan che phra dang ldan pa dag go_/yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dag go_/_sems can khrag khrig du ma gnas pa dag go_/grong khyer chen po de yang nor bu rin po che'i kha dog grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i khang pas mdzes 
[\[28b.2\]]par byas pa ste/_'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi khang pa brtsegs pa la rin po che bai DUr+ya'i dra bas kun nas khebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang ldan pa'o/_/dngul gyi khang pa brtsegs pa la mu tig dmar po'i dra bas kun nas khebs pa bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[28b.3\]]khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang ldan pa'o/_/bai DUr+ya'i khang pa brtsegs pa la rin po che'i mdzod sna tshogs kyi dra bas kun nas khebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o/_/shel gyi khang pa brtsegs pa la rin po 
[\[28b.4\]]che'i rgyal po snying po yangs pa'i dra bas kun nas khebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgya na pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o/_/nor bu rin po che 'gro ba'i yid du 'ong ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa la rin po che nyi ma'i snying po'i dra bas kun nas khebs pa bsam gyis mi 
[\[28b.5\]]khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang ldan pa'o/_/rin po che in dra nI la'i khang pa brtsegs pa la rin po che dpal gyi 'od zer gyi dra bas kun nas khebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o/_rin po che'i rgyal 
[\[28b.6\]]po 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i khang pa brtsegs pa la rin po che'i rgyal po skar ma'i 'od gzer gyi dra bas kun nas khebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa bgrangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang ldan pa'o/_/rin po che rdo rje'i khang pa brtsegs pa la rin po che'i rgyal po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i 
[\[28b.7\]]dra bas kun nas khebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang ldan pa'o/_dus dang 'thun pa'i tsan dan gyi khang pa brtsegs pa la lha rdzas kyi me tog man+dAr bas kun nas khebs ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]ba dang ldan pa'o/_spos kyi rgyal po mtshungs pa med pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa la lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs kyi dra bas kun nas khebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o/_/rin po che'i khang 
[\[29a.2\]]pa brtsegs pa de dag re re zhing yang rin po che'i lan kan du mas brgyan pa/_rin po che'i stegs bu rim pa bdun gyis bskor ba/_rin po che'i ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis 'khor bar 'grigs pa'o/_/rin po che'i lan kan de dag dang /_rin po che'i [(]te [,]de [)]la de dag thams cad du 'ang 
[\[29a.3\]]phan tshun rin po che'i srad bu'i 'brel ba'o/_/rin po che'i srad bu de dag thams cad kyang gser gyi dril gyi phreng bas brgyan pa'o/_/gser gyi dril gyi phreng ba de dag thams cad kyang rin po che'i chun po'i lda ldi sna tshogs kyis rnam par bres shing sbrel ba'o/_/rin po che'i chun po'i 
[\[29a.4\]]lda ldi de dag thams cad las kyang /_rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba mngon par sbyangs pa dag ste/_de ltar grong khyer chen po de dag thams cad ni nor bu rin po che'i dra ba grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o/_rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba grangs med pas kun nas 
[\[29a.5\]]khebs pa'o/_lha rdzas kyi spos kyi dra ba grangs med pas kun nas khebs ba'o/_/lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs kyi dra ba grangs med pas kun nas khebs ba'o/_/rin po che'i 'bru'i dra ba grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o/_/rdo rje'i bla re grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o/_
[\[29a.6\]]rin po che'i bla re grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o/_/rin po che'i bla re grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o/_rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i bla re grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o/_/gos rin po che'i bla re grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o/_/me tog gi 
[\[29a.7\]]phreng ba'i bla re grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o/_rin po che'i gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan sna tshogs btsugs shing bsgreng ba ste/_grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po de'i dbus su/_rgyal po 'od chen po bzhugs pa'i pho brang brtsigs pa 'khor kun tu dpag 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]tshad bzhi yod pa ste/_rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'o/_rin po che sna tshogs kyi stegs bu rim bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba'o/_/rin po che'i dril bu yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan par 'khrol ba'i dra ba rim bdun gyi sgra kun nas 'byung ba'o/_/rin pa che sna bdun gyi ta la'i 'phreng ba rim pa 
[\[29b.2\]]bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba'o/_/rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i rgyan brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'o/_rdzing rin po che sna tshogs du ma las byas pa/_gser gyi gram pa kun tu bkram pa yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus sa yongs su gang ba/_lha rdzas kyi 
[\[29b.3\]]uta pa la dang /_pad mo dang ku mud dang me tog pun da ri kas chu'i steng kun tu yog pa/_rin po che'i me tog dang 'bras bu shing sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa/_phyogs bzhi nas rin po che'i pha gus brtsigs pa'i them skas rnam par bkye ba can gyis shin tu mdzes par byas pa dang ldan 
[\[29b.4\]]pa/_/lha rdzas kyi sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba 'byin pa'i bya bran sna tshogs kyi sgra shin tu 'byung ba yod pa/_lha'i dbang po'i pho brang dang 'gran pa ste/_de'i dbus na rin po che 'gro ba la snang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa/_shin tu bzang la mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba/_rin po che grangs med pa'i 
[\[29b.5\]]rgyan bsam gyis ma khyab pas gya nom par brgyan pa yod de/_de'i nang na rgyal po 'od chen po'i dam pa'i chos gces pa'i dbyig tu bya ba bzhugs so/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rin po che'i 'obs de dag la ni chags pa'i sems [{]myed[,]med[}]/_rin po che'i ra ba de dag la ni ngo mtshar du 'dzin 
[\[29b.6\]]pa'i sems [{]myed[,]med[}]/_rin po che'i ta la'i 'phreng ba de dag la ni 'dod cing chags pa med/_rin pa che'i dril gyi dra ba'i sgra la ni ro myong bar byed pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sgra dang /_glu nga ro snyan pa'i dbyangs la ni chags pa'i sems [{]myed[,]med[}]/_rin po che rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal [{]myed [,]med [}]khang dang /_
[\[29b.7\]]khang pa brtsegs pa sna tshogs kyi longs spyod ni yid la bya ba med par shin tu dga' bar gyur pa'i/_skyes pa dang bud [{]myed [,]med [}]kyi tshogs kyi chos kyi dga' ba'i mos pas shin tu dga' zhing /_gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg la dga' bas dben pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_chos 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]nges par brtags pa la shin tu mos pas sems can gang dang phrad kyang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen rtag tu 'dri zhing mthar gyis grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i drung zhig du phyin nas kun tu bltas na/_grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i dbus kyi mchod rten gyi khang pa nas 
[\[30a.2\]]ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na/_rgyan chen po dang ldan pa'i khri chen po bai D+'uR+Ya sngon po'i rkang pa bkye ba/_bai D+'uR+Ya dkar po'i seng ges blangs pa/_'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi lcags pod kyi dra ba legs par btags pa/_lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i rin po che'i stan sna tshogs bting ba/_
[\[30a.3\]]rin po che'i 'bru grangs med pas rnam par brgyan pa/_nor bu rin po che'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dra bas kun nas khebs pa/_'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi snam bu la/_lha rdzas rin po che sna tshogs kyi gur shin tu spa bar bkye ba'i gnam yol bres pa/_nor bu rin po che yid bzhin 
[\[30a.4\]]gyi rgyal po'i pad mo'i snying po dang ldan pa/_de ltu bu'i chos kyi khri chen po la rgyal po 'od chen po [{]myi [,]mi [}]chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis lus shin tu brgyan pa dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs brgyad cu tham pas lus shin tu mdzes pa gser gyi ri bo ltar rin po che sna tshogs rnam par bkod pas rnam par 
[\[30a.5\]]mdzes pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar gzi brjid rab tu 'bar ba/_zla ba nya zhing rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor ltar lta na bzang ba/_tshangs pa ltar tshangs pa'i 'khor gyi nang na rnam par mdzes pa/_rgya mtsho ltar zab mo'i chos dang yon tan mtha' yas pa'i rin po che'i tshogs dang ldan pa/_
[\[30a.6\]]sprin chen po ltar chos kyi rang bzhin gyi 'brug sgra sgrog pa/_nam mkha' ltar chos kyi tshul gyi skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa/_ri rab ltar kha dog bzhi po'i sems can rgya mtsho'i sems la gzugs brnyan rab tu snang ba rin po che'i gling ltar gzhi ye shes sna tshogs rin po ches 
[\[30a.7\]]yongs su gang ba de skyil mo krung du 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/de'i mdun na yang gser dang nor bu dang mu tig dang /_baiDUr+ya dang dung dang man shel dang byi ru dang /_sa le sbram dang dngul rin po che'i phung po dang /_lha rdzas kyi gos kha dog sna tshogs kyi phung po dang /_lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyan 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]sna tshogs kyi phung po dang /_kha zas dang spyan gzigs sna tshogs kyi phung po dang /_zhim pa'i mchog khyad par du 'phags pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phung po dgod pa dang /_dngar ba'i thabs sna tshogs kyi yul du bkod pa mthong ngo /_/lha rdzas kyi shing rta rin po che bye ba brgya stong du ma dang /_lha rdzas kyi 
[\[30b.2\]]sil snyan bye ba brgya stong du ma dang /_lha rdzas kyi spos kyi rnam pa brgya stong du ma dang /_nad kyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad kyi phung po du ma dang /_yo byad kyi khyad par thams cad kyi phung po spyad du rung zhing kha na ma tho ba med pa mang po sems can rnams ci dga' bar spyod du gzud pa'i phyir 
[\[30b.3\]]bshams te/_bkod pa dang /_ba bzhon gser gyi ru [{]myig [,]mig [}]can stong phrag du ma/_'o ma bres 'jal ba mang po yang sems can phongs pa rnams yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir bkod pa mthong ngo /_bu mo rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bzhin bzang ba/_shin tu mdzes pa lta na sdug pa/_
[\[30b.4\]]rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par klubs pa/_lha rdzas kyi gos rin po che gyon pa/_lha rdzas kyi tsan dan sbrul gyi snying pos lus byugs pa/_sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi'i tshul shes pa/_'dod pa'i spyod pa dang /_cho ga thams cad la mkhas pa dag kyang ba[{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]shing bkod par mthong ngo /_/de'i mdun na ji 
[\[30b.5\]]lta ba de bzhin du sems can rnams yongs su bsdu ba dang /_sems can rnams yongs su gzung ba dang /_sems can rnams dga' ba bskyed pa dang /_sems can rnams spro ba bskyed pa dang /_sems can rnams kyi yid dang bar bya ba dang /_sems can rnams kyi sems shin tu bde bar 
[\[30b.6\]]bya ba dang /_sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa rnam par zhi bar bya ba dang /_sems can rnams chos kyi rang bzhin gyi don la yongs su dgod pa dang /_sems can rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du don mnyam par bya ba dang /_sems can rnams gzhan la 'khu ba rnam par bzlog par bya ba dang /_
[\[30b.7\]]lus dang ngag gis ngan du spyod pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang /_sems can rnams kyi lta ba'i zug rngu yang dag par dbyung ba dang /_sems can rnams kyi lam yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir/_srang dang lam gyi bzhi mdo dang /_lam gyi sum mdo dang /_sgo dang khyams dag na'ang de bzhin te/_
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]srang re re'i ngos g.yas g.yon nas kyang stegs bu bye ba nyi shu nyi shu tsam la yo byad thams cad yongs su spungs te bkod pa mthong ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]rgyal po 'od chen po la lus thams cad kyis phab nas phyag byas te/_rgyal po 'od chen po la 
[\[31a.2\]]lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/_thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/_'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab 
[\[31a.3\]]par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/_'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/_'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba 
[\[31a.4\]]dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan yongs su dag pa dang /_yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste/_rigs kyi bu ngas byang chub 
[\[31a.5\]]sems dpa'i spyod pa byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan 'di yang sangs rgyas brgya phrag du ma dang /_sangs rgyas stong phrag du ma dang /_sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma nas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[31a.6\]]'das rnams la yongs su dris so/_yongs su zhus so/_rnam par sbyangs so/_yongs su sbyangs so/_rnam par bkod do/_rnam par bltas so/_rnam par dpyad do/_rjes su btsal to/_yongs su brtags so/_rnam par bris so/_rgya cher byas so/_rigs kyi bu de ltar da ni byang chub 
[\[31a.7\]]sems dpa'i spyod pa byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan 'di la gnas shing chos dang 'thun par khams skyong zhing ston to/_/chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten la phan par byed do/_/chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten na rjes su spyod do/_/chos dang 'thun par sems can bcos ba byed do/_
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]chos dang 'thun par sems can rnams la nan tan byed do/_chos kyi dkyil 'khor la sems can rnams yongs su 'dzud do/_chos kyi tshul sems can rnams la nye bar bsgrub bo/_chos dang 'thun par sems can rnams la yongs su bsgo ba byed do/_chos kyi nan tan la sems can rnams yongs 
[\[31b.2\]]su sbyor ro/_chos kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa la sems can rnams rab tu dgod do/_/byams pa'i sems dang /_byams pa chen po'i dbang dang /_byams pa'i stobs dang /_phan pa'i sems dang /_bde ba'i sems dang /_snying rje'i sems dang /_phan 'dog pa'i sems dang /_yongs su bsrung ba'i sems 
[\[31b.3\]]dang /_sems can yongs su 'dzin pa mi gtong ba'i sems dang /_sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i smon lam rgyun mi gcod pa'i sems dang /_bde ba'i mthar phyin pa la rab tu dgod par yang dag par spyod pa rgyun mi gcod pa la sems can rnams rab tu dgod do/_bag 
[\[31b.4\]]yangs kyi bde ba yang dag par bskyed pas sems can de dag gi lus kyang shin tu bde bar byed do/_/de dag gi 'khor ba'i bde ba la zhen pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyang rnam par bzlog pa byed do/_de dag gi sems kyi rgyun kyang chos kyi dga' ba dang mos pa la yongs su gzhol bar byed 
[\[31b.5\]]do/_/nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad las rnam par sbyong ba byed do/_mi dge ba'i chos thams cad las yongs su sbyong ba byed do/_'khor ba'i rgyun las rnam par bzlog pa byed do/_chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho la yongs su gzud pa byed do/_/de dag gis srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud du 
[\[31b.6\]]skye ba thams cad rgyun gcad pa'i phyir/_sems kyi ma rig pa yongs su bsrag pa byed do/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir de dag gi sems kyi myu gu bskyed do/_mi 'phrogs pa'i dad pa'i stobs yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir de dag gi sems kyi rgya mtsho 
[\[31b.7\]]yang rab tu dang bar byed do/_rigs kyi bu de ltar nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan la gnas te/_chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten skyong zhing ston to/_rigs kyi bu nga'i khams na gnas pa'i sems can rnams ni ngas 'jigs shing sdang pa'am/_
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]bag tsha zhing skyi g.ya' ba med de/_rigs kyi bu sems can gang phongs shing yo byad sna tshogs kyis brel ba/_bza' ba 'dod pa'am/_btung ba 'dod pa'am/_gos 'dod pa nas yo byad sna tshogs thams cad gang 'dod kyang rung ste/_de dag thams cad nga'i 
[\[32a.2\]]drung du 'ong ngo /_/de dag la'ang ngas snga nas bsham bsham pa'i mdzod sgo phye zhing ci 'dod pa khyer cig ces bstabs te/_gang gi don du khyed sdig pa'i las la spyod par gyur cing /_srog gcod pa'am/_ma byin par len pa'am/_'dod pas log par g.yem pa'am/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]
[\[32a.3\]]du smra ba 'am/_phra ma 'am/_ngag rtsub po'am/_tshig kyal pa'am/_chags sems dang /_gnod sems sam/_log par lta ba'am/_de ma yin pa'i lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhen par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /_grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po 'di'i sgo dang /_srang dang /_
[\[32a.4\]]khyams dang /_lam gyi sum mdo dang /_bzhi mdo kun tu spungs te/_snga nas byin pa yin gyi/_su ci 'dod pa kun kyang khyer cig ces bstabs shing byin no/_/rigs kyi bu grong khyer 'od bzang po 'di na sems can ji snyed cig gnas pa de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' ste theg pa 
[\[32a.5\]]chen po la zhugs pa'o/_/de bas na grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po 'di yang de dag la bsam pa rnam pa ji lta bur dag pa'i tshul bzhin du snang ste/_la la la ni dog par snang ngo /_/la la la ni yangs par snang ngo /_/la la la ni gzhis la gnas par snang ngo /_/la la la ni gzhi rin po che bai 
[\[32a.6\]]DUr+ya las blangs par snang ngo /_/la la la ni sa'i ra bas bskor bar snang ngo /_/la la la ni rin po che rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ra bas bskor bar snang ngo /_/la la la ni gseg ma dang gyo mos gang zhing thag thug dang grog po dang /_g.yang sa mang po can du snang ngo /_/la la 
[\[32a.7\]]la ni nor bu rin po che dam pa grangs med pas/_gzhi brgyan cing yongs su bkram pa dang /_lag mthil bzhin du gzhi mnyam par snang ngo /_/la la la ni sa las byas par snang ngo /_/la la la ni rin po che grangs med pa'i khang pa dang /_gzhal med khang dang /_khang bzang dang /_khang pa 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]brtsegs pa dang /_khang steng dang /_ba gam dang /_skar khung gi shar bu dang /_zla gam rin po che seng ge'i dra bas brgyan par snang ngo /_/grong khyer gyi phyi rol na gnas pa'i sems can sngon ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su bsdus pa/_bsam 
[\[32b.2\]]pa dag pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/_sangs rgyas mang po bsnyen bkur ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par mos pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rab tu gzhol ba de dag la yang rin po che las byas par snang ngo /_/de ma yin pa gzhan dag la ni sa las byas par snang ste/_rigs kyi 
[\[32b.3\]]bu nga'i khams na gnas pa'i sems can yul dang phyogs dang /_grong khyer dang grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang khams dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang dag na rnyog pa lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi dus kyi rang bzhin gyis dkrugs te/_mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam zhig byed par 'dod par gyur na yang /_de'i 
[\[32b.4\]]tshe nga de dag la phan par bya ba'i sems kyis/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i glong zhes bya ba byams pa chen po'i sngon du 'gro ba la snyoms par 'jug ste/_rigs kyi bu de ltar nga ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pa dang /_de nyid kyi mod la sems 
[\[32b.5\]]can de dag gi 'jigs pa de dag dang mi bde ba de dag dang /_shar gnyer ba de dag dang thab mo dang rtsod pa de dag dang /_sems kyi 'khrug pa de dag dang /_'tshe ba'i sems de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i glong byams pa chen po'i sngon 
[\[32b.6\]]du 'gro ba de'i chos nyid thob pas rab tu zhi bar gyur to/_/nye bar zhi bar gyur to/_/rnam par ldog par gyur to/_/'gag par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu yud tsam zhig sdod dang de'u re mngon sum du 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal po 'od chen pos de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin byams 
[\[32b.7\]]pa chen po'i sngon du 'gro ba 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i glong la mnyam par gzhog go_/de ltar rgyal po 'od chen pos/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin byams pa chen po'i/_sngon du 'gro ba 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i glong la mnyam par bzhag ma 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]thag tu de'i mod la grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po yul dang /_phyogs su bcas pa/_grong khyer dang grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang khams dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang gi 'khor dang bcas pa rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/de g.yos pa'i tshe rin po che'i ra ba de dag dang rin po 
[\[33a.2\]]che'i khang pa dang /_rin po che'i snying po dang /_rin po che'i khyim dang /_rin po che'i gnas dang /_rin po che'i gzhal med khang dang /_rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang /_rin po che'i ba gam dang /_rin po che'i pu shu dang /_rin po che'i skar khung dang /_rin po che'i stegs bu dang /_rin po che'i rta babs dang /_
[\[33a.3\]]rin po che'i zla gam dang /_rin po che'i seng ge'i dra ba dang /_rin po che'i lan kan dang /_rin po che'i 'bru dang /_rin po che'i bla re dang /_rin po che'i srad bus brgyus pa'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang /_rin po che'i dril bu dang /_rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /_rin po che'i ba dan dang /_
[\[33a.4\]]rin po che'i ta la de dag kyang rab tu g.yos te/_sgra 'byin to/_rab tu 'khrol lo/_de dag de ltar sgra 'byin cing yid du 'ong la snyan pa dang /_mnyan na dga' ba'i dbyangs rjod cing /_rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba der 'dud te phyag 'tshal lo/_/grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po'i 
[\[33a.5\]]nang na/_sems can ji snyed cig gnas pa de dag thams cad kyang /_dga' ba dang rangs pa'i sems kyis yongs su rgyas nas/_rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba der logs su mngon tu lta ste/_lus thams cad kyis phab cing phyag 'tshal lo/_/de'i khams kyi grong dang grong 
[\[33a.6\]]khyer dang /_ljongs dang yul dang khams dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na gnas pa de dag thams cad kyang lus dang sems bde bar gyur te/_dga' zhing rangs pa skyes nas/_rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba de logs su phyag 'tshal lo/_/byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs 
[\[33a.7\]]pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems dang /_phan pa'i sems su ldan par gyur nas/_rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba der logs su lta zhing mngon par 'dud do/_/ri dang sgangamathon po'i sa'i phyogs thams cad kyang rgyal po 'od chen po gang na 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]bder mngon par 'dud do/_me tog gi shing dang /_'bras bu'i shing dang /_lo ma'i shing dang /_sa bon gyi tshogs dang /_'byung ba'i tshogs dang /_lo tog dang /_ldum bu dang /_rtsa dang gel pa dang /_sman dang nags tshal thams cad kyang rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba de logs su lta zhing mngon par 'dud par 
[\[33b.2\]]gyur to/_/de'i khams na mtsho dang /_mtshe'u dang /_lu ma dang /_ldeng ka dang /_'bab chu dang /_chu klung dang /_rdzing dang /_khron pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba de logs su mngon par gzhol zhing rlabs kyi sgra 'byin par gyur to/_/klu'i rgyal po stong phrag bcu yang /_a ga ru nag po'i 
[\[33b.3\]]bdug spos kyi dud pa na bun du 'grigs pa'i spos kyi sprin las glog sna tshogs 'gyu ba'i 'od kyi snang bar byed cing /_'brug sgra sgrog pa dang /_spos chu'i char gyi rgyun shin tu phra ba mngon par 'bebs par gyur to/_/brgya byin dang rab mtshe ma dang dga' ldan dang /_rab 'phrul dga' dang /_
[\[33b.4\]]dbang bsgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa lha'i bu stong phrag bcus kyang steng gi bar snang la 'khod de nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad lha rdzas kyi rol mo sil snyan gyi sprin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi sgra phyung bas dbyangs snyan pa rgya cher bsgrags pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /_lha'i bu 
[\[33b.5\]]mo grangs med pa lha'i glu snyan pa len pa'i sprin gyi sgra bsgrags pa'i dbyangs snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin kha dog 
[\[33b.6\]]sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i phreng ba sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi phye ma kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan 
[\[33b.7\]]pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i lhab lhub sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi gos sna tshogs dri ma med cing 'jam pa kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa'i sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi rin 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]po che'i gdugs rnam par bye ba sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi 
[\[34a.2\]]rin po che 'bar ba'i lce shin tu 'phro ba'i rin po che'i ba dan gyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par rgyal po 'od chen pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir byin gyis brlabs so/_glang po'i rgyal po chen po shugs 'dzin gyis kyang glang po'i dbang po'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung 
[\[34a.3\]]ba dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthus nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad mo'i sprin grangs med pas kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs so/_/lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i se mo do grangs med par rab tu 'phyad ba dang /_lha rdzas kyi rin po 
[\[34a.4\]]che'i snam bu'i lda ldi dang /_chun po grangs med par rab tu 'phyang ba dang /_lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba'i rgyud grangs med pa mngon par 'phyang ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi rin pa che sna tshogs kyi lhab lhub dang /_phreng ba grangs med pa mngon par 'phyang 
[\[34a.5\]]ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog gi lda ldi grangs med pa mngon par bris pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /_lha rdzas spos kyi rgyal po'i kha dog sna tshogs phyogs thams cad du dri zhim pos rgyas par 'gengs pa'i sprin grangs med pas kun 
[\[34a.6\]]nas khebs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i gos kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi bdug spos kyi dud pa na bun du 'grigs pa'i sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan 
[\[34a.7\]]gyis brgyan pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi phye ma kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char phra mo rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /_lha'i bu mo'i tshogs lha rdzas kyi rol mo byed pa dang /_glu snyan pa'i dbyangs yid du 'ong bar len cing bstod pa'i sprin gyis yog 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]pa'i char mngon par 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par nam mkha'i dbyings byin gyis brlabs so/_srin po'i dbang po brgya stong grangs med pa rgya mtsho la gnas pa dang /_gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rten gyis gzhi la gnas pa/_kha zas su sha dang khrag 'thung zhing za ba/_
[\[34b.2\]]chu la spyod pa dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_phyugs dang bya dang ba lang dang rta dang /_glang po dang bong bu dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med kyi tshogs kyi mdangs 'phrogs pa/_zhe sdang ba'i yid kyi rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa/_rtag tu 'gro ba la 'tshe zhing 'tho 'tsham pa la zhugs pa rnams kyang byams pa 
[\[34b.3\]]dang /_phan pa'i sems dam pa dang ldan zhing bzhin gyi mdog shin tu dang ba dang /_'gro ba thams cad la mi 'tshe zhing mtho 'tsham pa med pa la zhugs te/_'jig rten pha rol la lta bar gyur nas/_thal mo sbyar cing shin tu dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba de 
[\[34b.4\]]logs su btud nas phyag 'tshal bar gyur to/_/lus dang sems kyi bde ba rgya chen po mtshungs pa med pa yang myong bar gyur to/_/gnod sbyin dang grul bum dang /_sha za dang 'byung bo'i dbang po brgya stong du ma yang byams pa dang /_phan pa'i sems dam pa dang ldan zhing bzhin 
[\[34b.5\]]gyi mdog shin tu dang ba dang /_'gro ba thams cad la mi 'tshe zhing 'tho 'tsham med pa la zhugs te/_'jig rten pha rol la lta bur gyur nas/_thal mo sbyar cing shin tu dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba der 'dud cing phyag 'tshal bar gyur te/_lus 
[\[34b.6\]]dang sems kyi bde ba rgya chen po mtshungs pa med pa yang myong bar gyur to/_/de ltar gling bzhi ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can kun gyi 'jigs pa dang /_gnod pa dang /_mi bde ba dang /_shar gnyer ba dang /_thab mo dang /_rtsod pa dang /_sems kyi 'khrug pa dang /_
[\[34b.7\]]'tshe ba'i sems thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar gyur to/_/rnam par zhi bar gyur to/_/rnam par log par gyur to/_/'gags par gyur to/_/phyir log par gyur to/_/gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi/_
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]khams thams cad nas/_phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i bar gyi sems can kun gyi 'jigs pa dang /_gnod pa dang /_mi bde ba dang /_shar gnyer ba dang /_thab mo dang /_rtsod pa dang /_sems kyi 'khrug pa dang /_
[\[35a.2\]]'tshe ba'i sems thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin byams pa chen po'i sngon du 'gro ba/_'jig rten gyi dbang po'i klong gi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir/_rab tu zhi bar gyur to/_rnam par zhi bar gyur to/_rnam par log par gyur to/_/'gags par gyur to/_phyir log par gyur to/_
[\[35a.3\]]de nas rgyal po 'od chen po ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i ye shes snang ba'i sgo byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan 'di shes par zad na/_ngas byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi 
[\[35a.4\]]khams thams cad bde ba'i bsam pas rgyas par 'gengs pas byams pa chen po'i gdugs tshad med pa dang ldan pa/_'khor mi phyed pa dang ldan pas/_'gro ba thams cad 'khor du gyur pa/_rab 'bring dang tha ma'i sbyor bas 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa la zhugs pa/_
[\[35a.5\]]'gro ba thams cad yongs su bzung bu la zhugs pas/_byams pa'i sems lta bu dang ldan pa/_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi 'od zer 'gro ba thams cad du 'byung bas/_zla ba nya zhing rgyas pa lta bur gyur pa/_shes bya thams cad ye shes kyi 'od kyis snang bar byed 
[\[35a.6\]]pa'i phyir nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gyur ba/_sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi mun pa thibs po rab tu sel bas/_sgron ma chen po lta bur gyur pa/_sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi mtsho'i g.yo sgyu'i rnyog pa dang bar byed pas/_nor bu rin po che chu 'dod dang 'dra ba/_
[\[35a.7\]]'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa dang /_smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pas/_nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po dang 'dra ba/_'gro ba thams cad ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa'i khang pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brang chen por gzhog 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]pas rlung mar chen po dang 'dra ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/_yon tan brjod pa'am/_bsod nams kyi ri bo gzhal ba'am/_yon tan gyi skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i nam mkha' la blta ba'am/_smon lam chen po'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor las mtshams bcad pa'am/_chos mnyam 
[\[35b.2\]]pa nyid kyi stobs la tshad gzung ba'am/_theg pa chen po'i rgyan gyi bsngags pa yongs su brjod pa'am/_kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i tshul gyi khyad par brjod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po bsgom pa'i sgo dbye ba'am/_snying rje chen po'i sprin yongs su smos par nus 
[\[35b.3\]]re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na rgyal po'i gnas brtan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba 'dug gis/_de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /_ji ltar 
[\[35b.4\]]nan tan du bya ba dris shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]rgyal po 'od chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/_rgyal po 'od chen po la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/_yang dang yang bltas nas/_rgyal po 'od chen po'i drung 
[\[35b.5\]]nas song ngo //_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po gsum pa/_de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po nas byung ste yud tsam du lam gyi 'go btsal nas/_rgyal po 'od chen po'i 
[\[35b.6\]]gdams ngag de la rjes su bsam pa byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshul byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan de rjes su dran par bya ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i glong gis snang ba chen po de yongs su bsgom pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[35b.7\]]lus rnam par dag pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pas brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri'i rgyan rnam par phye ba/_rnam pa sna tshogs de dag mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang /_bsod nams kyi dbang dang /_stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_de dag rjes su 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]spel ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i ye shes kyi tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de shin tu bstan par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod kyi bdag nyid che ba thun mong du gyur pa/_bsam gyis 
[\[36a.2\]]mi khyab pa de la rjes su bsam pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i gnas rnam pa tha dad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag kyang mtshan mar bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de/_rjes su dran par bya ba dang 
[\[36a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor phun sum tshogs shing yongs su dag pa de la brtag pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sems can gyi don bsam pa snang ba'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de la yid ches par byed byed pas/_sems dga' zhing mos pa'i shugs dang /_sems kyi 
[\[36a.4\]]nyams bde ba dang /_sems shin tu tshim pa dang /_sems khong nas dga' ba dang /_sems rnyog pa med pa dang /_sems 'od dang ba dang /_sems brtan pa dang /_sems rgya che ba dang /_sems mi zad pa thob ste/_de de ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen rjes su dran zhing yid 
[\[36a.5\]]la byed pa la brtson pas/_gdong mchi mas gang nas rjes su sems pa/_kyi hud kye dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba 'di ni yon tan rin pa che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs sa dag pa dang /_yongs su rdzogs 
[\[36a.6\]]par 'gyur ba'i rgyur gyur pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba thams cad yongs su bskyed pa'o 
[\[36a.7\]]sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ba yongs su sgrub pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi tshul thams cad rab tu brjod pa'o/_/shes rab dang ye shes kyi snang ba bsam gyis 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]mi khyab par yang dag par skyed pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po brtan pa'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]gu skyed par byed pa'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag ngan song gi g.yang sa thams cad nas skyob pa'o/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag chos mnyam pa nyid kyi 
[\[36b.2\]]tshul khong du chud par bya ba la gzhog pa'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la lam bde ba dang /_mi bde ba ston pa'o/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la theg pa chen po yongs su ston pa'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la byang chub sems 
[\[36b.3\]]dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i gdams ngag gis 'dems pa'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer gyi lam ston pa'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas su phyin par skyel ba'o/_/
[\[36b.4\]]dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug par byed pa'o/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la dus gsum gyi shes bya rgya mtsho'i tshul rab tu ston pa'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la 'phags pa'i tshogs 
[\[36b.5\]]kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu ston pa'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag gi dkar po'i chos thams cad rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'o zhes de de ltar du zhing smre sngags 'don pa'i tshe/_nam mkha'i dbyings la 'khod pa'i lha'i tshogs dang /_rtag tu phyi bzhin 
[\[36b.6\]]'brang zhing yang dag par bskul ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ltar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'di skad 'dzer to/_/rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 
[\[36b.7\]]kyang thugs shin tu dgyes par 'gyur ba yin/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig dang /_mi 'gal bar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du'ang shin tu bsnyen pa yin/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig la the tsom mi za ba'i byang chub 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]sems dpa' la ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyang nye bar bsnyen pa yin/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni don thams cad kyang mngon du 'gyur ba yin gyis/_rigs kyi bu rgyal po'i pho brang brtan par dge 
[\[37a.2\]]bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba gang na ba der song shig dang /_de las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thos par 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes snang ba las langs nas mthar gyis rgyal po'i pho brang brtan par dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba gang na ba der song nas/_
[\[37a.3\]]dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba yongs su tshol zhing rmed rmed pa las/_de la 'gro ba mang pos bstan pa/_rigs kyi bu dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de ni rang gi khyim na pha ma dang /_'grogs shing gzhon nur gyur pa ste/_rang gi gnyen bshes kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /_skye bo'i 
[\[37a.4\]]tshogs chen po la chos ston to/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dga' ba chen po dang /_mos shing spro bas/_yongs su rgyas pa'i sems dang ldan pa de dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i khyim gyi sgo na sdod pa'i tshe/_des 
[\[37a.5\]]khyim de thams cad 'od lus dang sems shin tu bde bar byed pa/_gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa zhig gis khyab cing gsal bar gyur nas/_'od des tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la phog par gyur ma thag tu tshor ba thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po 
[\[37a.6\]]dang /_zhi ba'i gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang /_'gro ba thams cad dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang /_kun tu lta ba'i btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa/_
[\[37a.7\]]ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo lnga brgya tsam la zhugs par gyur te/_yongs su skyes so/_/de dag kyang shin tu phra zhing gzhon pa ste/_'di ltar dper na thog ma mngal du zhugs pa'i rnam par shes pa lta bu ste/_ting nge 'dzin de dag kyang shin ti+u phra zhing gzhon par skyes par gyur to/_/des dri 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]zhim po zhig tshor na'ang de ni lha la'ang med lha'i bu mo la yang med/_klu la yang med klu'i bu mo la yang med/_gnod sbyin la yang med gnod sbyin gyi bu mo la yang med/_dri za la yang med/_dri za'i bu mo la yang med/_lha ma yin la yang med/_lha ma yin gyi bu mo yang med/_nam mkha'i lding 
[\[37b.2\]]la yang med/_nam mkha' lding gi bu mo la yang med/_mi'am ci la yang med/_mi'am ci'i bu mo la yang med/_lto 'phye chen po la yang med/_lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo la yang med/_mi la yang med/_mi'i bu mo la yang med cing mi srid pa de lta bu'i dri zhim po tshor bar gyur to/_bud med 
[\[37b.3\]]de'i gzugs dang mnyam pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong /_kha dog dang mdog de lta bu yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog dang kha dog dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba'i kha dog dang mdog ma gtogs par de'i kha dog dang /_
[\[37b.4\]]mdog tu mnyam pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong /_lus kyi chu zheng dang dbyibs de la bu yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khrun chu zheng dang /_dbyibs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba thob pa'i lus kyi chu zheng dang /_dbyibs ma gtogs 
[\[37b.5\]]par de'i lus kyi chu zheng dang dbyibs su mnyam pa/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong /_'od kyi rgyan de lta bu'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi rgyan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba thob pa'i 'od kyi rgyan ma gtogs par de'i 'od kyi rgyan 
[\[37b.6\]]dang /_mnyam pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong /_de'i kha'i ngad kyi dri zhim po dang mnyam pa'i dri de lta bu yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi lha'i gnas sam/_klu dang gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_
[\[37b.7\]]lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa'i gnas na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong /_khyim gyi rgyan dang /_longs spyod de lta bu'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i longs spyod dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba thob pa'i longs spyod ma gtogs par de'i khyim gyi rgyan 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]dang /_longs spyod du mnyam pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong /_g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa/_de lta bu'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 
[\[38a.2\]]phun sum tshogs pa ma gtogs par de'i g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang /_mnyam pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong ste/_dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de la 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems kyis blta bar nus pa'i sems 
[\[38a.3\]]can de lta bu'ang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi sems can gyi ris na med do/_/dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de mthong ma thag du nyon mongs pa zhi bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems can yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi sems can gyi ris na med de/_'di lta ste dper na/_tshangs pa chen 
[\[38a.4\]]po stong phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba la ni 'dod pa la spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams mi rgyu'o/_/de bzhin du dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'ang mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa mi rgyu'o/_/dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de la blta bas ngoms par 'gyur ba'i sems 
[\[38a.5\]]can de lta bu'ang shes rab kyis ngoms pa ma gtogs par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gyi ris na med do/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i lus kyi byin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_gzugs dang kha dog dang dbyibs 
[\[38a.6\]]dang /_chu zheng bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_sa'i gzhi dang /_grong khyer dang rin po che thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_sems can gyi don bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsgrub pa mthong ste/_ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas byung ba'i dri 
[\[38a.7\]]zhim po tshor nas/_'khor rgya mtsho phun sum tshogs pa mtha' yas pa mthong ste/_khyim dang gzhal med khang gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa mi 'phrogs pa mthong nas yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa khong du chud de/_dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bstod do/_/khyod 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]kyis rtag tu tshul khrims dri med yongs bsrungs te/_/bzod pa shin tu yangs pa'ang yongs su bsgoms mdzad cing /_/brtson 'grus brtan pa rdo rje lta bu bsgrubs pas na/_/ri bo'i rgyal po lta bur 'gro bar 'phags shing 'bar/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis[,]bzang gis[}]/_dge 
[\[38b.2\]]bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba la tshigs su bcad pa des mngon par bstod de 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/_/ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan 
[\[38b.3\]]du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/_'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do/_/zhes bdag gis thos na/_'phags ma ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la 
[\[38b.4\]]bshad du gsol/_de nas dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo bas/_byang chub sems dpa'i ngag 'jam zhing yid du 'ong la nyams su bde bas/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la dga' bar 'gyur ba'i tshig tu brjod nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[38b.5\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba thub par dka' ba'i ye shes snying po thob ba ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo yi dam brtan pa la slob pa/_chos thams cad mnyam 
[\[38b.6\]]pa nyid kyi sa'i gzungs kyi sgo thob pa'o/_/kho mo ni sbos pa'i ye shes snang ba/_chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang bar brjod pa thob pa'o/_/kho mo ni chos thams cad yong su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thob ba'o/_/smras pa 'phags ma byang chub sems 
[\[38b.7\]]dpa'i rnam par thar ba thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po de'i yul ni ji lta bu zhig mchis/_yi dam la brtan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo dang /_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sa'i gzungs kyi sgo dang /_chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang bar brjod 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]pa'i spobs pa snang ba'i sgo dang /_chos yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo'i yul ni ji lta bu zhig mchis/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu gnas 'di ni yid ches par dka'o/_/smras pa 'phags ma bstan du gsol/_sangs rgyas kyi byin dang /_
[\[39a.2\]]dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung na yid ches par mchi grang /_rtogs pa dang 'tshal ba dang /_rnam par rtogs pa dang /_rjes su rtogs pa dang /_rig pa dang /_dmigs su phebs pa dang /_goms pa dang /_mi 'gal ba dang /_rnam par mi rtog pa dang /_sgro 'dogs pa ma 
[\[39a.3\]]mchis pa dang /_mnyam par bgyid par yang mchi grang /_de nas dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo bas/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i dus shig na dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi bskal pa la/_de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rab tu brkyang ba zhes 
[\[39a.4\]]bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_kho mo yang de'i tshe rgyal po glog gis byin pa'i bu cig ma zhig tu gyur nas/_de'i tshe nub mo mi nyal tsam zhig na rgyal po'i sgo yang bcad/_pha dang ma yang nyal/_skyes ba dang bud med dag kyang gnyid kyis log_/rol mo brdung ba dang dkrol ba'i 
[\[39a.5\]]sgra yang zhi/_lhan cig spyod pa'i bud med lnga brgya tsam dag kyang nyal bar gyur ba zhig na/_kho mo mal gyi steng na 'dug cing /_nam mkha'i dbyings la rgyu ba'i skar ma'i tshogs kyi phreng ba rnam par 'khod pa la lta lta ba las/_steng gi bar snang la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[39a.6\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyag rab tu brkyang ba/_ri'i dbang po ri rab ltar lha dang klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor mang pos bskor ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[39a.7\]]tshogs grangs med pas yongs su bskor ba/_phyogs thams cad du 'od zer gyi dra ba thogs pa med pas rgyas par khyab pa'i sku bzhugs pa mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas kyang dri zhim po rnam pa 'di lta bu byung ste/_des kho mo'i lus 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]dang sems shin tu bde bar gyur/_yid shin tu dga' bar gyur te/_mal gyi steng nas langs nas sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te sa la babs nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rab tu brkyang ba de la phyag 'tshal te/_de'i spyi gtsug la bltas na'ang /_mthar thug 
[\[39b.2\]]par ma rung /_g.yas g.yon gyi tshad kyang zin par ma rung /_mtshan dang dpe byad phun sum tshogs pa la bsams na'ang ngoms par ma rung ste/_de'i tshe kho mo 'di snyam du bsams so/_/las ji lta bu zhig byas na lus phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu ni 'thob par 'gyur/_mtshan 
[\[39b.3\]]dang dpe byad bzang po phun sum tshogs pa ni skye bar 'gyur/_'od kyi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_'khor phun sum tshogs pa ni 'grub par 'gyur/_yid kyi rang bzhin gyi gnas dang /_longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_bsod nams 
[\[39b.4\]]phun sum tshogs pa ni skye bar 'gyur/_ye shes phun sum tshogs pa ni rnam par dag par 'gyur/_ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa phun sum tshogs pa ni yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur/_gzungs phun sum tshogs pa ni yongs su rdzogs 
[\[39b.5\]]par 'gyur/_spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa ni dbang du 'gyur snyam pa dang /_rigs kyi bu de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rab tu brkyang ba des kho mo'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bu mo khyod kyis nyon mongs pa thams 
[\[39b.6\]]cad gzhom pa'i phyir thub pa med pa'i sems skyed cig_/mngon par zhen pa thams cad bsal ba'i phyir pham pa med pa'i sems skyed cig_/chos zab mo'i tshul khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir zhum pa med pa'i sems skyed cig_/sems can bsam pa mi zad pa dang ldan 
[\[39b.7\]]pa'i rgya mtsho'i klong du ltung bas mi sgul ba'i sems skyed cig_/srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad du skye ba'i skye mched du mgo rmongs pa med pa'i sems skyed cig_/sangs rgyas thams cad blta bar mos pa rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir ngoms mi shes pa'i sems skyed cig_/
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongs su gzung ba'i phyir chog mi shes pa'i sems skyed cig_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul snang ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir nges par rtogs pa'i sems skyed cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 
[\[40a.2\]]chos kyi 'khor lo gzung ba'i phyir yang dag par gzung ba'i sems skyed cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas byung ba shes par bya ba lta la ci smos kyi chung ngu na brdar byed pa tsam la yang 'khrul pa med pa'i sems skyed cig_/bu mo khyod kyis sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta 
[\[40a.3\]]ba bzhin du chos rin po chen rnam par dbye ba'i phyir/_rnam par dbye ba'i sems skyed cig ces byung ste/_de ltar rigs kyi bu kho mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyag rab tu brkyang ba las/_chos kyi tshul gyi gdams 
[\[40a.4\]]ngag gi sgo rnam pa de lta ba dag thos nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la ni mngon par mos par gyur/_stobs bcu'i rang bzhin la ni mngon par smon par gyur/_sangs rgyas gsung la ni mngon par dad par gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi rgyan ni yongs su sbyang bar dga'/_sangs 
[\[40a.5\]]rgyas kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa ni yongs su bsgrub par dga'/_sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pa la ni mngon par mos par gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs pa la ni mngon par smon par gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par 
[\[40a.6\]]dag pa la ni mngon par dad par gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa la ni mngon par mos par gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi sku tshe'i tshad phun sum tshogs pa la ni mngon par dga' nas/_rdo rje ltar ri dang mtshon ca thams cad kyi mthus thub par dka' ba'i sems nyon 
[\[40a.7\]]mongs pa thams cad dang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi phyed mi tshugs pa bskyed de/_rigs kyi bu de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du sems bskyed pa de'i mthus bskal pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig tu yid kyi dgu las kyang 'dod 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]pa la spyad par yang mi dran na/_gnyis kyis gnyis 'du ba lta ci smos/_rigs kyi bu de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du rang gi gnyen bshes la'ang khong khro ba'i sems cig ma bskyed na/_de ma yin pa'i sems can ma nyes pa'i gzhan lta ci smos/_de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du 
[\[40b.2\]]bdag tu lta ba dang /_ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig tsam yang bskyed par mi dran na/_de ma yin pa'i yo byad gzhan la bdag gir byas te/_mngon par chags pa lta ci smos/_shi 'pho ba dang mngal na gnas pa'i tshe'ang sems rmongs pa'am/_'du shes sna tshogs sam/_lung 
[\[40b.3\]]du ma bstan pa'i sems kyang byung du mi dran na/_legs par bsams shing gnas pa lta ci smos/_bskal pa de snyed cig tu sangs rgyas gcig kyang chung ngu na rmi lam du mthong ba'i rnam par dmigs par yang brjod du mi dran na/_byang chub sems dpa'i mig bcus mthong bar gyur pa lta ci smos/_
[\[40b.4\]]de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yang dag par 'dzin kyang chung ngu na [{]mying [,]ming [}]du bya ba'i chos kyi tshig dang /_yi ge gcig kyang brjod par mi dran na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi mdzod nas byung ba lta ci smos/_de 
[\[40b.5\]]nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du chos kyi rgya mtsho de snyed cig 'thung 'thung yang /_chung ngu na 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams la/_tshig 'ga' 'ang ma bsams ma brtags par mi dran no/_/de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du de snyed cig gi chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho las kyang /_chung ngu na 'jig 
[\[40b.6\]]rten pa'i bzo'i rgyus dang /_tshul yang rung ste/_chos kyi tshul gyi sgo gang la yang kho mos ting nge 'dzin mngon par ma bsgrubs pa de lta bu med do/_/de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du de bzhin gshegs pa de snyed kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bzung yang ji ltar yongs su bzung ba las 
[\[40b.7\]]sems can 'dul ba'i dbang du bya ba ma gtogs par chung ngu na rjes su brgyud pa'i rgyus tsam gyi tshig dang /_yi ge 'ga' yang bor bar mi dran no/_/de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du sangs rgyas rgya mtsho de snyed cig mthong yang chug chung ngu na sprul pa'i sangs rgyas kyi smon lam 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]gyi rgyud kyang rung ste/_smon lam 'ga' yang kho mos sems can rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir/_mngon par ma bsgrubs pa med do/_/de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du sangs rgyas rgya mtsho de snyed cig gi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod 
[\[41a.2\]]pa rgya mtsho las/_byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa 'ga' tsam yang kho mos bdag gi spyod pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par ma bsgrubs pa de lta bu mi dran no/_/de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du sems can gang kho mos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma 
[\[41a.3\]]bskul ba de lta bu gcig kyang mig lam du 'ong par mi dran no/_/de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig kyang mngon par bsgrubs su mi dran no/_/rigs kyi bu de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du bskal 
[\[41a.4\]]pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig lon yang tshig dang /_yi ge 'ga' la yang the tshom bskyed pa'am/_gnyis kyis 'du shes sam/_rnam par rtog pa'i 'du shes sam/_sna tshogs kyi 'du shes sam/_rab kyi 'du shes sam/_bzang ngan gyi 'du shes 
[\[41a.5\]]sam/_sdug mi sdug gi 'du shes bskyed du ma dran no/_/rigs kyi bu kho mo ni de phyin cad du sangs rgyas byung ba dang ma bral lo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang ma bral lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ma bral lo/_/yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams 
[\[41a.6\]]dang ma bral lo/_/sangs rgyas kyi smon lam thos pa dang ma bral lo/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thos pa dang ma bral lo/_/byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul thos pa dang ma bral lo/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i ye shes snang ba'i tshul thos pa dang ma bral 
[\[41a.7\]]lo/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin mi zad pa'i mdzod dang /_gter thos pa thob pa dang ma bral lo mtha' dang dbus med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba la 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba'i tshul thos pa dang ma bral lo/_/mtha' dang dbus med 
[\[41b\]]
