[\[41b.1\]]pa'i sems can gyi khams 'byung ba'i rgyu thos pa thob pa dang ma bral lo/_/'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dra ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su zad par bya ba'i ye shes snang ba dang ma bral lo/_/sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'byung ba'i rgyu'i ye shes thob pa dang ma bral lo/_/
[\[41b.2\]]sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus yongs su ston pa dang ma bral lo/_/sems can thams cad kyi shes par byed pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa dang ma bral lo/_/rigs kyi bu kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba'i sgo thub par dka' 
[\[41b.3\]]ba'i ye shes kyi snying po 'di dang /_chos thams cad yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'di la snyoms par zhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo yi dam la brtan pa 'di rnam par phye ba dang /_gzungs kyi sgo chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid 
[\[41b.4\]]kyis 'di dang /_spobs pa'i ye shes snang ba'i sgo chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang bar brjod pa 'di rnam par phye ba dang /_cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa yod na rigs kyi bu khyod mngon sum du blta bar 'dod dam/_smras pa/_'phags ma 'tshal lo/_de nas dge bsnyen ma mi 
[\[41b.5\]]g.yo ba de na de ltar 'dug bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo don yod pa'i dkyil 
[\[41b.6\]]'khor gyi rgyan la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mngon du 'gyur ba la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi zad pa'i mdzod la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong phrag bcu la rnam par blta ba dang /_rnam 
[\[41b.7\]]par dpyad pa dang /_rjes su 'jug pa dang /_nges par rtogs par byas so/_/de ltar dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]snyed rnam pa drug du g.yos pa dang /_bai DUr+ya yongs su dag pa'i rgyu las gyur par gnas par mthong ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya brgyan/_de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya brgya bzhugs par mthong ste/_la la ni dga' ldan 
[\[42a.2\]]gyi gnas na bzhugs pa nas/_la la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mdzad pa'i bar du 'ang mthong ngo /_/de yang 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin de dag yongs su dag cing sgrib pa med pa'i phyir te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag so so nas 'od zer dang /_'od kyi dkyil 
[\[42a.3\]]'khor chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par khyab pa mnga' ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag so so'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho yang mthong bar gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag re re'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor chos kyi 'khor lo thams 
[\[42a.4\]]cad brjod pa sems can thams cad kyi rna lam du rnam par grags pa'ang thos par gyur to/_/de nas dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis mthong ngam/_thos sam shes sam/_
[\[42a.5\]]smras pa 'phags ma mthong ngo /_/thos so rig go_/rigs kyi bu kho mo ni de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yi dam brtan pa la slob cing /_chos thams cad yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 
[\[42a.6\]]par thar pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying pa la gnas nas/_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sa'i gzungs khong du chud pa dang /_spobs pa'i ye shes snang ba chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang ba brjod pa la mkhas pa'i legs par bshad pas sems can thams 
[\[42a.7\]]cad yongs su tshim par byed par zad na kho mos byang chub sems dpa' yon tan tshad med bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa dang ldan pa nam mkha'i dbyings la 'dab chags khyu mchog 'khod pa ltar gnas med par spyod pa/_nam mkha' lding gi dbang po chen po ltar yongs su smin pa'i 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' gdon pa'i phyir/_sems can thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa tshong pa ltar stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che mngon par 'dod cing /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che'i gling du rgyu ba/_mthu dang ldan pa'i nya ba ltar/_yid du 'ong ba'i chos kyi dkyil 
[\[42b.2\]]'khor gyi rgya dang ldan pa'i lag pas sred pa'i chu las byung ba'i sems can yongs su smin par mngon par gdon pa'i phyir/_chos kyi rgya mtsho la rnam par rgyu ba/_lha'i dbang po ltar nyon mongs pa'i lha ma yin gyi g.yul chen po rtul ba bzlog pa'i phyir/_khams gsum gyi 
[\[42b.3\]]gnas yongs su bkang zhing rnam par rgyu ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar sems can gyi sred pa'i chu dang /_nyon mongs pa'i 'dam shin tu bskam pa'i phyir/_chos kyi dbyings kyi nam mkha'i dbyings la yang dag par 'phags pa zla ba nya zhing rgyas pa ltar 'dul ba'i yid kyi me tog ku mu ta 
[\[42b.4\]]rnam par kha dbye ba'i phyir/_ye shes kyi nam mkha' la mngon par shar ba/_sa'i gzhi ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i dbang po'i myu gu bskyed cing /_rnam par spel ba'i phyir byams mi byams dang /_mthon dman med par 'jig rten na mnyam par gnas pa rlung 
[\[42b.5\]]mar ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang /_lta ba'i shing dang shing phran gyi nags tshal dang /_kun dga' rtsa ba nas gdon pa'i phyir chags pa med par phyogs thams cad tu rnam par rgyu ba/_'khor los sgyur ba ltar bsdu ba'i dngos po'i yo byad dang /_rkyen gyis 
[\[42b.6\]]'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir/_'jig rten na rnam par spyod pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/_yon tan brjod par nus re skan/_song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi yul dga' 'dzin tshad med pa na/_grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa zhes bya ba 
[\[42b.7\]]yod de/_de na kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba zhes bya ba 'dug gis/_de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]dge bsnyen 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]ma mi g.yo ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal to/_/dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/_dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i drung nas song ngo /_de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dge 
[\[43a.2\]]bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba mngon du byas te/_dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i gdams ngag rjes su dran par byed cing /_dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo bas bstan pa dang /_yang dag par bstan pa dang /_bsgrags pa dang /_bshad pa dang /_brjod pa dang /_yang dag par brjod pa dang /_gzhag pa dang /_
[\[43a.3\]]rnam par phye ba dang /_smos pa dang /_rgya cher bstan pa de dag thams cad la gdon mi za bar yid ches shing rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /_rjes su bsam pa dang /_khong du chud par bya ba dang /_sgom pa dang /_yongs su bsgom pa dang /_gzhan du mi 'gyur ba dang /_rtogs par bya ba dang /_
[\[43a.4\]]snang bar bya ba dang /_mnyam par bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]cing /_mthar gyis gnas nas gnas dang yul nas yul du rgyu ste/_rgyu zhing song song nas yul dga' 'dzin tshad med pa gang na ba der phyin nas/_grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa rmed cing tshol tshol te/_nyi ma nub tu chab zhig na grong khyer dga' ba 
[\[43a.5\]]'dzin par phyin nas/_grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa'i nang du song ste/_grong khyer gyi lam gyi bzhi mdo'i dbus shig tu phyin nas srang gi sgo nas/_srang gi sgo dang lam gyi bzhi mdo nas lam gyi bzhi mdo dang /_grong phrag nas grong phrag tu kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro 
[\[43a.6\]]ba tshol zhing rmed rmed pa dang /_mtshan mo mi nyal tsam zhig na grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa'i byang phyogs logs na/_ri shin tu mod pa zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de'i rtse mo rtswa dang gel pa dang /_sman sna tshogs dga' dga' ltar skyes pas brgyan pa 'od chen po dang ldan pa la nyi 
[\[43a.7\]]ma shar ba lta bur gnas pa mthong ngo /_/des snang ba de mthong nas dga' ba'i shugs chen po skyes te 'di snyam du bsams so/_/bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen ri'i rtse mo 'di la gdon mi za bar mthong bar 'gyur ba lta zhig snyam nas/_grong khyer de nas byung ste/_ri shin du 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]mod pa gang na ba der phyin pa dang /_ri shin tu mod pa de la 'dzegs nas/_ri'i rtse mo snang ba chen po can gang na ba der phyin pa dang /_rgyang ring po zhig nas kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba tshangs pa chen po bas kyang lhag pa'i kha dog dang ldan pa dpal gyis shin tu 'bar ba zhig tshangs pa stong phrag bcus 
[\[43b.2\]]kun nas bskor te/_'chags nas 'chag cing 'dug pa mthong nas/_de'i drung du phyin te/_rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/_de la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/_mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te/_'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa bdag 
[\[43b.3\]]gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/_'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes 
[\[43b.4\]]su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/_'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/_smras pa rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod/_bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[43b.5\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa legs so/_/legs so rigs kyi bu kho bo ni thams cad du 'gro ba ste/_thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa'o/_/sgo thams cad du rnam par spyod pas snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang /_dngos po 
[\[43b.6\]]med pa la gnas pas/_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /_chos kyi dbyings kun gyi gzhir thug par thal ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes snang ba'i sgo dang ldan pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo ni sems can gyi snod kyi 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad dang /_
[\[43b.7\]]sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad dang /_sems can gyi shi 'pho ba'i sgo thams cad dang /_sems can gyi skye ba'i sgo thams cad dang /_srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa thams cad dang /_skye ba'i skye mched sna tshogs kyi 'jig rten gyi gnas rnam pa tha dad pa dag 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]gi sems can kha dog dang /_dbyibs dang /_chu zheng rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_skye ba kun tu 'brel pa/_rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_sbyor ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_mos pa sna tshogs can 'di lta ste lha'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang /_klu'i lam gyi 
[\[44a.2\]]rgyud du gtogs pa dang /_gnod sbyin gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang /_dri za'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang /_lha ma yin gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang /_nam mkha' lding gi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang /_mi'am ci'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang /_lto 'phye 
[\[44a.3\]]chen po'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang /_sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang /_byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang /_mi'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang /_mi ma 
[\[44a.4\]]yin pa'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang /_lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la gnas pa nyan thos kyi theg pa la mos pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa dang /_theg pa chen po la mos pa'i sems can rnams kyi don thabs sna tshogs dang /_ye shes kyi tshul dang sbyor ba sna 
[\[44a.5\]]tshogs kyis byed de/_'di ltar sems can la la la ni bzo'i rgyud tha dad pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i gzugs snang bas 'jig rten gyi bzo sna tshogs bslabs shing don byed do/_/sems can la la ni 'di lta ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bstabs pa'i phyir 
[\[44a.6\]]bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su bsdu ba'i thabs kyis don byed do/_/sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i ye shes kyi sgo snang ba yongs su bskyed pas pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par brjod cing don byed do/_/sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/_
[\[44a.7\]]byang chub kyi sa bon chud mi za bar brtan cing yongs su bskyed pas/_byang chub sems dpa'i sems yongs su brjod cing don byed do/_/sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]ba'i smon lam yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par brjod pas don byed do/_/sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/_ngan du spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa dang /_mthun pa'i rgyus sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong 
[\[44b.2\]]bar 'gyur ba yongs su bstan pas/_skyo ba yongs su bskyed cing don byed do/_/sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa la bskyed pa'i yon tan thams cad ni gdon mi za bar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'bras bu'i mthar thug par 'gyur bar brjod pas/_dga' ba 
[\[44b.3\]]chen po bskyed cing don byed do/_/sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang sku la mngon par mos pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam 'debs par bya ba'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang /_bsngags pa yang dag par brjod 
[\[44b.4\]]pas don byed do/_/sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/_mi zlogs shing lhun gyis grub pa dang /_rgyun chad pa med par sangs rgyas kyi phrin las nan tan du mdzad pa'i mthu dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'thob par mos pa bskyed pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba 
[\[44b.5\]]brjod pas don byed do/_/sems can la la ni 'di lta ste/_tshur zil gyis gnon la phar zil gyis mi gnon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par mos pa bskyed pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po yongs su brjod cing don byed do/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan 
[\[44b.6\]]yang kho bo ni grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa 'di'i bzhi mdo'i phongs thams cad dang /_srang thams cad dang /_lam gyi sum mdo thams cad dang /_grong mtshams thams cad dang /_khyim thams cad dang /_mthun par 'dus pa'i rdal thams cad dang grong thams cad dang /_grong gi rgyud 
[\[44b.7\]]thams cad du rnam pa ji ltar tshogs shing 'dus pa'i bud med dang /_skyes pa dang khye'u dang bu mo rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba dang /_sbyor ba ji lta ba dang /_mthu ji lta ba dang /_rnam par spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du de dag dang /_mthun pa'i lus kyi chu zheng dang dbyibs mngon 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]par bsgrubs shing /_chos ston kyang /_sems can de dag gis de sus bstan pa dang /_de ga las 'ongs pa mi shes te/_gzhan du na thos nas ma nor bar nan tan du byed pa ni med pa'ang ma yin no/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na/_zhags pa 
[\[45a.2\]]'thub pa lta ba rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhen pa/_dgu bcu rtsa drug 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyi nang du yang sems can lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la chags pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thams cad dang mthun par gnas te/_rigs kyi bu ci ltar kho bo grong khyer dga' ba 
[\[45a.3\]]'dzin pa 'di na sems can gyi don byed cing 'dug pa de bzhin du 'dzam bu'i gling gi grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_ljongs dang /_yul dang /_khams dang /_rgyal po'i phong brang 'khor thams cad na yang sems can gyi don byed do/_/'dzam bu'i gling na ji lta ba de bzhin du gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[45a.4\]]thams cad dang /_de bzhin du stong dang stong gnyis pa dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sems can gyi rten du bya ba thams cad dang /_sems can gyi gnas su bya ba thams cad dang /_sems 
[\[45a.5\]]can gyi gzhir bya ba thams cad dang /_sems can gyi khams su bya ba'i ming du gtogs pa thams cad dang /_sems can yongs su rgyu ba thams cad dang /_sems can yongs su 'du ba thams cad dang /_sems can rgya mtsho na gnas pa thams cad dang /_sems can gyi rgyud 
[\[45a.6\]]gnas pa thams cad dang /_sems can gyi phyogs su bya ba thams cad dang /_sems can gyi phyogs mtshams su bya ba thams cad dang /_sems can spyod pa'i gnas thams cad du 'ang /_thabs sna tshogs dang /_tshul sna tshogs dang /_sgo sna tshogs dang /_rigs pa 
[\[45a.7\]]sna tshogs dang /_'phrad pa sna tshogs dang /_thabs kyi tshul sna tshogs dang /_bya ba sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed do/_/gzugs dang kha dog sna tshogs yongs su bstan cing mos par bya ba dang /_tshig gi lam sna tshogs brjod pas kyang sems can rnams kyi 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]don byed do/_/rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad du 'gro ba thams cad kyi rjes su song ba 'di shes par zad na/_kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad dang /_mnyam pa'i lus dang ldan pa bdag dang /_sems can gyi lus su tha mi dad pa'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[45b.2\]]thob pa/_'phrul ba'i 'khor lo rgya chen pos srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad du khyab pa/_'jig rten gyi skye ba thams cad rang gi lus la rjes su spyod pa/_'gro ba thams cad kyis lta na dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sprul pa'i 'khor lo la brtson pa/_'gro ba thams cad kyi rigs dang 
[\[45b.3\]]rgyud dang tsher skye ba rab tu ston pa/_bskal pa thams cad du gnas pa la thogs pa med pa'i smon lam gyi 'khor lo dang ldan pa/_mig 'phrul lta bu'i spyod pa rnam par phye ba'i snang ba rab tu thob pa/_'gro ba thams cad kyi don byed kyang /_gos pa med par gnas pa la brtson pa/_dus 
[\[45b.4\]]gsum gyi 'gro ba'i dbyings mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa/_ye shes kyi dbyings bdag med pa dang ldan pas/_snang bar byas pa'i snying rje chen po mtha' yas pa'i snying po dang ldan pa/_'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskyed pa la mngon par brtson pa/_de dag gi spyod 
[\[45b.5\]]pa shes pa'am/_yon tan brjod par nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na yul khams chen po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod uta pa la zhes bya ba 'dug gis/_de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub 
[\[45b.6\]]sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas 
[\[45b.7\]]nas/_yang dang yang bltas te/_kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba'i drung nas song ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]lus dang srog la ni mi lta/_srid pa'i longs spyod dang yongs sa zin pa dang /_nye bar blangs pa la mngon par chags pa'i gnas thams cad la ni mi lta 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]sems can gyi yul gyi dga' ba thams cad la ni mi lta/_gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang /_bro dang /_reg bya thams cad la ni mi lta/_g.yog 'khor dang longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod pa thams cad la ni mi lta ste/_rgyal srid dang dbang phyug gi dbang gi bde ba thams cad la ni mi lta la 
[\[46a.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing bla na med par yongs su dag pa mngon par bsgrubs pas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba dang yongs su dag par bya ba la lta ba/_mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur ba dang /_rim gro bya bas mi ngoms pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[46a.3\]]cad la lta ba dang /_rang bzhin med pa yongs su shes pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir chos thams cad la blta ba yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad kyi don du nan tan bya ba las nyam pa med par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad la blta ba dang /_bskal 
[\[46a.4\]]pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yang dag par gnas par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam chen po la lta ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad du'ajug par bya ba la lta ba/_ting nge 
[\[46a.5\]]'dzin gyi sgo re rer byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa thams cad gzung ba la rnam par 'phrul par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la lta ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par 
[\[46a.6\]]bzung bas mi ngoms par bya ba'i phyir/_chos kyi ye shes snang ba'i 'khor lo thams cad la lta ba/_de sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan 'di dag dang /_gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen las 'byung ba ste/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni de dag 
[\[46a.7\]]thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa ma yin par yang dag par lta zhing mthar gyis yul khams chen po gang na ba der phyin nas/_spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la yongs su rmed cing tshol tshol ba las mthong nas/_spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]ud pa la gang na ba der phyin te/_drung du song nas/_spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon 
[\[46b.2\]]longs spyod ud pa la'i mdun du 'dug te/_thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa bdag sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa'i ye shes 'tshal te/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar yang dga'/_
[\[46b.3\]]sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sku yongs su grub par bgyi bar yang dga'/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku yongs su 'tshal bar bgyi bar yang dga'/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su dag par bgyi bar yang dga'/_byang chub 
[\[46b.4\]]sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar bgyid par yang dga'/_byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su brten par yang dga'/_sgrib pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par gtor bar yang dga'/_zhing gi 
[\[46b.5\]]dkyil 'khor thams cad du rnam par rgyu bar yang 'tshal nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyis na byang chub 
[\[46b.6\]]sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur bar ma 'tshal to/_/smras pa rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu kho bo ni spos thams cad shes te/_spos sbyar 
[\[46b.7\]]ba thams cad dang /_bdug spos thams cad dang /_bdug spos sbyar ba thams cad dang /_byug pa thams cad dang /_byug pa sbyar ba thams cad dang /_phye ma thams cad dang /_phye ma sbyar ba thams cad dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma'i rnam pa thams cad kyang shes 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]te/_lha'i spos kyang shes so/_/klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa'i spos kyang shes so/_/nad gso ba'i spos dang /_yid mi bde ba bstsal ba'i spos dang /_'jig 
[\[47a.2\]]rten gyi dga' ba yongs su bskyed pa'i spos dang /_nyon mongs pa 'bar bar bya ba'i spos dang /_nyon mongs pa zhi bar ba ba'i spos dang /_'dus byas kyi dga' ba dang /_bde ba sna tshogs yongs su bskyed pa'i spos dang /_'dus byas thams cad las skyo ba yongs su bskyed pa'i spos 
[\[47a.3\]]dang /_bag bya ba'i gnas thams cad sel ba'i spos dang /_sangs rgyas yid la bya ba'i rgyud yang dag par 'byung ba'i spos dang /_chos kyi tshul khong du chud par bya ba'i spos dang /_'phags pas spyad pa'i spos dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spos rnam pa tha dad pa 
[\[47a.4\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad rnam par dgod pa'i spos kyang shes te/_/kho bos sposade dag thams cad rnam pa ji lta bu'ang rab tu shes so/_/'byung ba dang /_skye ba dang /_'grub pa dang /_yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_yongs su dag pa dang /_yongs su spang ba 
[\[47a.5\]]dang /_rab tu sbyar ba dang /_yongs su spyad pa dang /_yul dang mthu dang las dang rgyu yang rab tu shes so/_/rigs kyi bu mi'i 'jig rten na spos glang po'i snying po zhes bya ba/_klu yongs su 'khrug par byed pa yod de/_de'i ri lu til gyi 'bru tsam gyis kyang yul khams chen 
[\[47a.6\]]po thams cad spos kyi sprin gyi dra ba shin tu stug pas kun nas khebs par gyur te/_zhag bdun du spos chu'i rgyun shin tu phra ba'i char mngon par 'bab bo/_/de'i tshe sems can su'i lus sam gos la spos chu'i rgyun de dag gis bab par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang me 
[\[47a.7\]]tog gser gyi kha dog du 'dug pas rnam par brgyan pa'i gos dang lus su 'gyur ro/_/khang pa dang gzhal med khang dang /_khang pa brtsegs pa gang du bab par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang me tog gser gyi kha dog lta bur rnam par brgyan par gnas so/_/sems 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]can khyim gyi nang na gnas pa gang gis spos kyi sprin gyi dra ba de la rlung gis ma dad pa'i dri tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang zhag bdun du dga' ba dang /_mos pa chen pos yongs su rgyas par 'gyur te/_lus dang sems la bde ba dang dga' ba sna tshogs kyang rab tu myong bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[47b.2\]]de dag gi las la yang khams 'khrug pa la sa gyur pa'am/_gzhan gyis gnod par bya ba las gyur pa'i nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ba med do/_/sems kyi sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba yang mi 'byung ngo /_/'jigs pa'am/_sdang ba'am bag tsha ba'am/_yid 'khrug pa 
[\[47b.3\]]'am/_gnod sems kyang mi rgyu ste/_de dag thams cad zhag bdun du dga' ba dang bde ba skyes te/_gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems su 'gyur ro/_rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de dag de ltar dga' ba dang /_nyams bde ba skyes [(]ba [,]pa [)]rnams la bsam pa dag par bya ba'i phyir ci 
[\[47b.4\]]nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu ri ma la ya las 'byung ba'i tsan dan sa steng sa dam pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de lus la bskus na me'i 'obs su mchongs kyang tshig pa med do/_
[\[47b.5\]]rigs kyi bu rgya mtsho'i mtha' nas 'byung ba'i spos gzhan gyis thub pa med pa zhes ba yod de/_de rnga'am dung la bskus na de'i sgras gzhan gyi 'khor thams cad pham par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu mtsho ma dros pa'i ngogs nas 'byung ba'i a ga ru nag po pad mo'i 
[\[47b.6\]]snying po zhes bya ba yod de/_de'i ri lu til gyi 'bru tsam gcig gi dris kyang 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad rgyas par gang bar 'gyur te/_sems can gang gis spos kyi dri de tshor ba de dag thams cad kyang sdig pa la smod cing sdom pa'i sems rab tu thob bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[47b.7\]]rigs kyi bu ri'i rgyal po kha ba can las 'byung ba'i spos kyi rnam pa 'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de'i dri tshor na sems can de dag 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems su 'gyur te/_kho bo ni de dag la ci nas kyang rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]'dzin thob par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to/_/rigs kyi bu srin po'i 'jig rten nas 'byung ba'i spos kyi rnam pa rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba yod do/_/de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i longs spyod kyi don du 'byung ste/_des bdugs ma thag tu 'khor los sgyur 
[\[48a.2\]]ba'i rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa yang nam mkha'i dbyings la gnas so/_/rigs kyi bu lha'i 'khor chos bzang po nas 'byung ba'i spos kyi rnam par rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba yod de/_des bdugs ma thag tu lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi dri zhim po dran par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[48a.3\]]rigs kyi bu lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'i gnas na spos kyi rnam pa dag pa'i mdzod ces bya ba yod de/_des bdug ma thag tu mtshe ma'i lha'i bu thams cad lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'i drung du 'dong ngo /_/de dag der phyin nas kyang lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe mas chos kyi gtam bya'o/_/
[\[48a.4\]]rigs kyi bu dga' ldan gyi gnas na/_spos kyi rnam pa sin du bar zhes bya ba yod de/_de'i spos kyi dud pa byang chub sems dpa' tshe gcig gis thogs pa chos kyi stan la 'dug pa'i mdun du phyung na/_spos kyi sprin chen pos chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par gang zhing /_
[\[48a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i chos kyi sprin chen po'i char rab tu 'bab bo/_/rigs kyi bu lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga'i gnas na/_spos kyi rnam pa yid 'phrog pa zhes bya ba yod de/_des lha'i 
[\[48a.6\]]rgyal po rab 'phrul dga'i gnas su bdugs na/_zhag bdun du chos kyi sprin gyi char bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu kho bos ni spos sbyar ba de shes su zad na/_kho bos byang chub sems dpa' skyon gyi dri ma med pa 'dod pa'i 'jig 
[\[48a.7\]]rten thams cad nas gyen du 'phags pa/_nyon mongs pa'i bdud kyi zhags pa dang bral ba/_srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/_ye shes sgyu ma'i rnam pa dang /_gzugs kyis rnam par spyod pa/_'jig rten thams cad kyis gos pa med 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]pa/_chags pa med pa'i ngang tshul can/_sgrib pa med par ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/_thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang /_yul du ldan pa/_kun gyi gzhi'i gnas thams cad la mi gnas par/_srid pa'i kun gzhi dang gnas thams cad du rgyu ba rnams 
[\[48b.2\]]kyi spyod pa che shes pa'am/_yon tan brjod pa'am/_tshul khrims kyi spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo yongs su smos pa'am/_kha na ma tho ba med pa'i spyod pa brjod pa'am/_gnod par spyod pa med pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rgyud bstan par nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs 
[\[48b.3\]]kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/_grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na mnyan pa dpa' bo zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i drung du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig_/de nas tshong 
[\[48b.4\]]dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis[,]bzang gis[}]/_spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/_spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod uta pa la la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_yang dang yang bltas te/_
[\[48b.5\]]spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod uta pa la'i drung nas song ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]grong khyer khang pa brtsegs par 'gro ba'i lam du 'jug pa'i tshe/_lam gyi gyen thur dang /_lam mnyam pa dang /_lam gyi thag thug dang /_lam rdul yod pa 
[\[48b.6\]]dang /_lam rdul med pa dang /_lam bde ba dang /_lam mi bde ba dang /_lam dog pa dang /_lam bgegs med pa dang /_lam 'khyug pa dang /_lam 'khyug pa med pa la rnam par dpyad de bltas nas 'di snyam du bsams so/_/'di ltar bdag dge ba'i bshes gnyen de'i 
[\[48b.7\]]drung du 'gro ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro/_/pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro/_/sems can la phan gdags pa'i lam gyi rgyur 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad byams sdang dang /_mthon dman du gyur 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]ba'i g.yang sa las rnam par bzlog pa dang /_sems can thams cad mi mnyam pa'i nan tan las bsgyur ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i rdul rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi mi dge ba'i lta ba sna tshogs kyi sdong dum 
[\[49a.2\]]dang /_tsher ma dang /_gyo mo dang gseg ma bstsal ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings bsgribs pa med pa la gzhol par bya ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i pho brang du thogs pa med par bskyal ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni dge ba'i chos 
[\[49a.3\]]thams cad kyi 'byung gnas so/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rag lus so zhes de de ltar sems shing yid la byed pas spyod pa thub par dka' ba de mthar gyis grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa der phyin nas mnyan pa dpa' bo yongs su rmed cing tshol tshol 
[\[49a.4\]]ba las grong khyer chen po zhig gi sgo rgya mtsho chen po'i ngogs na/_mnyan pa dpa' bo de tshong pa brgya phrag stong tsam dang /_srog chags brgya stong du ma gtam sna tshogs mnyan par 'dod pa sha stag gis kun nas bskor cing /_rgya mtsho'i gtam yongs su brjod pas/_
[\[49a.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho sems can rnams la ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang mnyan pa dpa' bo gang na ba der song ste/_phyin nas mnyan pa dpa' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_mnyan pa dpa' bo la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas 
[\[49a.6\]]phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_mnyan pa dpa' bo'i mdun du 'dug ste/_thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/_'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems 
[\[49a.7\]]dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/_'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang /_rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/_'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/_smras pa rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_ye shes chen po 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu 'dri ba dang /_'khor ba'i 
[\[49b.2\]]sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyi rgyud 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gling gi gnas su 'gro ba 'byung ba'i rgyu dang /_dbyer med pa'i theg pa chen po 'byung ba'i rgyu dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bas 'jigs pa dang 'bral bar 'gyur ba'i lam gyi 
[\[49b.3\]]nan tan 'byung ba'i rgyu dang /_zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang /_rgyud sna tshogs khong du chud par bya ba'i ye shes kyi lam 'byung ba'i rgyu dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad du 'gro bas rnam par spyod pa'i smon lam gyi shing rta'i 'khor lo thogs pa med pa'i 
[\[49b.4\]]lam 'byung ba dang /_rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gzi brjid kyi dba' rlabs kyis rnam par brgyan pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang /_tshul gyi lam 'byung ba dang /_rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang /_chos kyi phyogs dang /_
[\[49b.5\]]sgo thams cad kyi phyi ma'i mtha'i lam 'byung ba dang /_rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i lam 'byung ba dang /_rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu 'di 'dri ba legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu kho bo ni rgya 
[\[49b.6\]]mtsho'i ngogs kyi grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa 'di na/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa snying rje chen po'i rgyal mtshan yongs su sbyong zhing gnas te/_rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can phongs pa rnams mthong nas/_de dag gi don du dka' ba spyod de/_
[\[49b.7\]]de dag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/'jig rten gyi zang zing gis yongs su bsdu bar bya'o/_/chos kyi longs spyod kyis de dag yongs su tshim par bya'o/_/de dag la bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi lam man ngag du bstan par bya'o/_/ye shes kyi tshogs 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]rnam par spel bar bya'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs yongs su spel bar bya'o/_/byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bya'o/_/byang chub kyi bsam pa rnam par dag par bya'o/_/snying rje chen po'i stobs nye bar brtan par bya'o/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnam 
[\[50a.2\]]par zhi bar bya'o/_/'khor ba'i spyod pas yongs su mi skyo ba'i stobs shin tu brtan par bya'o/_/sems can rgya mtsho bsdu ba la 'di dag sbyar bar bya'o/_/yon tan rgya mtsho'i nan tan gyi sgo la dgod par bya'o/_/'di dag la chos rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba nye bar bsgrub par bya'o/_/
[\[50a.3\]]sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad kyang 'di dag gis mngon par mthong bar bya'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho la yang 'di dag gzud par bya'o zhes de lta bu'i bsam pa dang /_yid la bya ba la brtson par kho bos rgya mtsho'i ngogs kyi grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa 'di na 
[\[50a.4\]]gnas so/_/rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de ltar 'gro ba la phan pa dang /_bde bar brtson pas rgya mtsho chen po'i rin po che'i gling thams cad kyang shes so/_/rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad dang /_/rin po che'i rigs thams cad dang /_rin po che'i gtos thams cad kyang rab tu 
[\[50a.5\]]shes so/_/klu'i gnas thams cad dang /_klu'i 'khrug pa thams cad dang /_gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad dang /_gnod sbyin 'khrug pa thams cad dang /_srin po'i gnas thams cad dang /_srin po'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_'byung po'i gnas 
[\[50a.6\]]thams cad dang /_'byung po'i bar chad thams cad rnam par zhi bar bya ba yang rab tu shes te/_glong yod pa thams cad glong thams cad bkol ba dang dba' rlabs chen po yongs su spang ba dang /_chu'i kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa'ang rab tu shes so/_/gnyi zla dang gza' 
[\[50a.7\]]skar gyi tshogs yongs su 'khor ba dang /_nyin zhag dang skad cig dang /_yud tsam dang thag cig kyang rab tu shes so/_/phan tshun du 'gro ba'i shol 'dums dang /_bde mi bde dang /_gru'i 'khrul 'khor brtan par bya ba dang /_gru bzur ba dang /_gru phul ba dang /_
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]rlung brngo ba dang rlung bskyed pa dang /_gru bsgyur zhing bzlog pa dang /_gru brtod pa dang /_gru btang ba yang rab tu shes so/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo ni shes pa de lta bu dang ldan pas rtag tu sems can gyi don dang dgos pa byed de/_tshong pa'i tshogs gru brtan pos lam bde zhing nye zhor mi 'gyur la mi 
[\[50b.2\]]'jigs pa nas/_chos kyi gtam gyis dga' ba dang /_spro ba bskyed cing bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rin po che'i gling du phyin par byas nas/_de dag rin po che thams cad kyis tshogs te/_phun sum tshogs par gyur pa dang /_phyir yang 'dzam bu'i gling du 'gyed 'gyed kyang 
[\[50b.3\]]rigs kyi bu kho bo'i gru ni nam yang bub pa'am/_nye zhor gyur ma myong ste/_sems can gang gis kho bo mthong bar gyur pa dang /_sems can gang gis kho bo'i chos bstan pa thos pa de dag kyang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad du nye zhor 'gyur ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar 
[\[50b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang mngon sum du 'gyur ro/_/sred pa'i rgya mtsho bskam pa'i don du'ang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur te/_dus gsum rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba'ang rab tu thob bo/_/sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal 
[\[50b.5\]]rgya mtsho zad par bya ba'i phyir yang mngon par mos par 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho'i rnyog pa dang bar bya ba'i phyir yang rab tu brtson par 'gyur ro/_/zhing rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yang brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur ro/_/phyogs 
[\[50b.6\]]rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par gang ba las kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho tha dad pa'ang khong du chud par 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho'i rjes su'ang 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/'gro ba'i bsam pa rgya mtsho 
[\[50b.7\]]ji lta ba bzhin du yang gzugs brnyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang 'grogs pa dang /_rjes su dran pa'i chu klung gi dbyangs shes bya ba thob par zad na kho bos byang chub sems 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]dpa' 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad du rnam par spyod pa nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad kyis gos pa med pa/_lta ba'i rnam pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad kyi chags pa'i chu srin gyi 'jigs pa dang bral ba/_chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang /_
[\[51a.2\]]gzhi las rnam par rgyu ba/_'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad bsdu ba'i dngos pos yongs su sdud pa'i rgya mtsho dang ldan pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho dang 'grogs pa/_sems can gyi mngon par chags pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu bsrub pa/_dus rgya mtsho thams 
[\[51a.3\]]cad dang /_tha mi dad par rnam par spyod pa/_'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i dmigs pa shes pa/_'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad kyi 'dul ba'i dbres las mi 'da' bar de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/_yon tan brjod par nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu 
[\[51a.4\]]lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer dga' ba'i phreng ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis/_de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig_/de nas 
[\[51a.5\]]tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]mnyan pa dpa' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/_mnyan pa dpa' bo la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/_yang dang yang bltas nas gdong mchi mas bkang ste/_ngu zhing /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen 
[\[51a.6\]]blta bas ma ngoms bzhin du mnyan pa dpa' bo'i drung nas song ngo //_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po bzhi ba/_de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byams pa chen pos sems can gyi khams tshad 
[\[51a.7\]]med par rgyas ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_snying rje chen po'i rlan gyis mngon par brlan pa'i rgyud can/_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po'i rgyan shin tu bstsags pa nyon mongs pa'i rdul dang mun pa dang dri ma dang 'dam thams cad dang bral ba/_chos mnyam pa nyid khong du chud 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]pas/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam gyen thur med pa la zhugs pa/_dge ba'i chos tshad med pa la 'jug pa'i sgor zhugs pa/_mi dge ba thams cad kyis mi shigs pa'i brtson 'grus brtan pa'i mthu sngon du 'dor ba dang ldan pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis 
[\[51b.2\]]mi khyab pa rab tu byang ba/_rgya chen po'i bde ba rab tu thob pa/_shes rab kyi nyi ma'i 'od zer snang bas/_ma rig pa'i mun pa ma lus pa bsal ba/_thabs kyi ser bu bde zhing bsil bas blags pa'i ye shes kyi me tog gis rgyas pa/_smon lam chen po'i rgya mtshor 'byung ba'i ye 
[\[51b.3\]]shes kyi tshul dang mthun pa/_chos kyi dbyings thams cad du thogs pa med par rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brang du thogs pa med par 'gro ba la mngon du gyur pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i lam la mngon par mos pa de/_grong 
[\[51b.4\]]khyer dga' ba'i phreng ba gang na ba der phyin te/_tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa yongs su rmed cing tshol tshol ba las/_grong khyer dga' ba'i phreng ba'i shar phyogs logs kyi 'dab cig na/_shing a sho ka'i nags tshal rgyal mtshan sna tshogs zhes bya ba 'dug pa de'i 
[\[51b.5\]]nang na khyim bdag stong phrag du ma zhig gis bskor te/_grong khyer gyi bya ba sna tshogs yongs su 'gro zhing de las brten te/_bdag tu bya ba thams cad yang dag par gzhom pa dang /_yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad yongs su gtang ba dang /_dngos por 'dzin pa thams cad rab 
[\[51b.6\]]tu spang ba dang /_mngon par zhen pa thams cad shin tu gzhig pa dang /_sred pa'i 'ching ba thams cad gcad par bya ba dang /_lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad kyi sgo glegs gcag pa dang /_the tsom dang yid gnyis dang /_nem nur gyi rab rib thams cad rnam par bsal ba dang /_
[\[51b.7\]]g.yo sgyu'i rnyog pa shin tu gdang ba dang /_phrag dog dang ser sna'i dri ma yongs su sbyang ba dang /_sems kyi mtsho shin tu gsal bar bya ba dang /_sems rnyog pa med pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang /_dad pa rnyog pa med pa'i stobs bskyed de/_sangs rgyas blta 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]bar mos pa bskyed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bsngags shing /_sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par blang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa smos te/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs yongs su bskyed pa dang /_byang chub 
[\[52a.2\]]sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs yang dag par ston cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa'i mthar phyin par bya ba'i phyir/_chos kyi gtam byed cing 'di lta ste/_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la mngon par mos par bya ba'i phyir chos ston cing 'dug 
[\[52a.3\]]pa mthong ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]gtam de'i rjes chad chad du bsdad nas tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_ring mo zhig tu btud nas chos la shin tu gus pa'i bsam pas tshig 'di skad du brjod do/_/'phags pa bdag ni 
[\[52a.4\]]nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]shes bgyi ba ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol na ci nas kyang bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slob par 'gyur ba dang /_bslabs nas kyang ci nas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang /_gdul ba'i don la mngon du mos par 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad 
[\[52a.5\]]kyi zhal blta ba las mi 'phang ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos thos par 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yongs su gzung ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul la nan tan du bgyi ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams 
[\[52a.6\]]cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa dang /_bskal pa thams cad du gnas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas yongs su mi skyo ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su btsal bar 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams 
[\[52a.7\]]cad kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag par mnod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs rnams la snang ba thob par 'gyur ba de ltar 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/_/de nas tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pas/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'di lta ste/_dngos po med pa la gnas pas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa'i mthus/_
[\[52b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo thams cad du 'gro ba yongs su sbyong ste/_de ltar kho bo byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i sgo thams cad du 'gro ba 'di la gnas shing /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sum cu rtsa gsum gyi 
[\[52b.3\]]lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang /_mtshe ma'i lha'i gnas thams cad dang /_dga' ldan gyi lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang /_'phrul dga'i lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang /_bdud kyi gnas thams cad 
[\[52b.4\]]dang /_'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i ris su gtogs pa thams cad dang /_lha'i gnas thams cad dang /_klu'i 'jig rten thams cad dang /_klu'i gnas thams cad dang /_gnod sbyin gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang /_gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad dang /_srin 
[\[52b.5\]]po'i 'jig rten thams cad dang /_srin po'i gnas thams cad dang /_grul bum gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang /_grul bum gyi gnas thams cad dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'jig rten thams cad dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi gnas thams cad dang /_dri za'i 'jig rten 
[\[52b.6\]]thams cad dang /_dri za'i gnas thams cad dang /_lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang /_lha ma yin gyi gnas thams cad dang /_nam mkha' lding gi 'jig rten thams cad dang /_nam mkha' lding gi gnas thams cad dang /_mi'am ci'i 'jig rten thams 
[\[52b.7\]]cad dang /_mi'am ci'i gnas thams cad dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i 'jig rten thams cad dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i gnas thams cad dang /_mi'i 'jig rten thams cad dang /_mi'i gnas thams cad dang /_grong dang grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]khams dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i sems can gyi rgyud thams cad du chos ni ston to/_/chos ma yin pa ni bzlog go_/rtsod pa ni zhi bar byed do/_/'thab pa ni rnam par bzlog go_/'khrug pa ni nye bar zhi bar byed do/_/
[\[53a.2\]]g.yul du lhags pa ni rnam par bzlog go_/shags 'gyed pa ni zhi bar byed do/_/mdud par 'dzin pa ni rab tu sel to/_bcings pa thams cad ni yongs su gcod do/_/btson ra thams cad ni mngon par 'dral lo/_/'jigs pa ni rnam par bzlog go_/mi dge ba'i las kyi 'du 
[\[53a.3\]]byed ni rgyun gcod do/_/srog gcod pa las ni sems can rnams rnam par zlog go_/ma byin par len pa dang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang phra ma dang zhe gcod pa dang /_tshig kyal pa dang chags sems dang /_gnod sems dang log par lta ba las ni sems 
[\[53a.4\]]can rnam par zlog go_/mi bya ba thams cad ni byed du mi 'dzud do/_/dge ba'i chos bya ba thams cad ni byed du 'dzud do/_/sems can thams cad ni bzo thams cad la slob tu 'dzud de/_'jig rten rnams rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par 
[\[53a.5\]]bya ba dang /_zhags pa 'thub pa thams cad la gong ma'i ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa brjod pa'i phyir rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /_lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad brjod cing bstan pa'i phyir 'jig rten la phan par 
[\[53a.6\]]'gyur ba'i gtsug lag thams cad kyang ston to/_/rnam par 'god do/_/rab tu gsal bar byed do/_/brjod do/_/de bzhin du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du gzugs kyi khams kyi lha thams cad zil gyis mnan te chos ston to/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig 
[\[53a.7\]]rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs bcur yang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag tu chos ston te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ston to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]chos dang nyan thos kyi chos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ston to/_sems can dmyal ba yang ston to/_sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'i lam dang /_sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can gyi mi bde ba'ang ston to/_/byol song gi skye gnas kyang ston to/_/byol song gi skye gnas kyi 
[\[53b.2\]]lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa dang /_byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam du 'gro ba'i lam dang /_byol song gi skye gnas su skyes pa'i sdug bsngal yang ston to/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten yang ston to/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba'i lam dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[53b.3\]]sdug bsngal yang ston to/_/mtho ris kyi 'jig rten yang ston to/_/mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du 'gro ba'i lam dang /_mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi dga' ba spyod pa dang /_longs spyod kyang ston to/_/mi'i 'jig rten yang ston to/_/[{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud du 'gro ba'i lam dang 
[\[53b.4\]]mi'i 'jig rten gyi bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba sna tshogs kyang ston te/_de ltar rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'jig rten gyi chos kyang ston to/_/'jig rten kun 'byung ba dang /_'jig rten nub par 'gyur ba dang /_'jig rten gyi kha na ma tho ba dang /_'jig rten nas 
[\[53b.5\]]'byung pa yang ston to/_/de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lam yang dag par bstan pa dang /_'khor ba'i skyon rnam par bzlog pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan yang dag par brjod pa dang /_srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud du mgo 'khor ba dang sdug bsngal 
[\[53b.6\]]du gyur pa yang dag par ston pa dang /_sgrib pa med pa'i chos nyid brjod pa dang /_'jig rten rgyu'i bya ba yongs su bstan pa dang /_'jig rten 'byung ba dang /_ldog pa'i bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal thams cad smos pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi gnas kyi ming du 
[\[53b.7\]]bya ba rnam par bsgom pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gnas pa med pa mngon par bstan pa dang /_las dang nyon mongs pa'i 'khor lo thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba shin tu brjod pa'i phyir chos 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]ston to/_/rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo thams cad du 'gro ba dngos po med pa la gnas pas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus brgyan pa 'di shes par zad na kho bos byang chub sems dpa' thams 
[\[54a.2\]]cad mngon par shes pa zhing gi dbyings thams cad du sgyu ma lta bu'i ye shes kyi lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa kun tu lta ba'i ye shes kyis rab tu thob pa tshig gi lam dang /_sgra thams cad rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa la shin tu gzhol ba'i rna ba dang ldan pa/_dus gsum rgyas par 'gengs 
[\[54a.3\]]pa'i chos kyi sgo snang ba la dbang rab tu thob pa/_chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes la dbang gis dbang sgyur ba'i skyes bu dpa' bo sems can tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par bya ba lam 'dres pa'i 
[\[54a.4\]]dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i lce yangs shing srab la yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/_bsam pa tha dad pa'i sems can rgya mtsho'i yid du 'ong ba'i kha dog dang /_dbyibs su ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mnyam pa'i lus sgyu ma lta bu dang ldan pa/_de 
[\[54a.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mi gnyis pa'i spyod lam gyis/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lus la gzhol ba/_dus gsum thams cad du rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa nam mkha'i dbyings ltar tshad med pa'i spyod yul dpag tu med pa'i yul dang ldan pa 
[\[54a.6\]]de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/_yon tan brjod par nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi yul shu ma phyi ma'i mtha' na/_grong khyer ka ling ga'i nags tshal zhes bya ba yod te/_de na dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings ba zhes bya ba 'dug 
[\[54a.7\]]gis/_de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]'tshal te/_tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_yang dang yang bltas te/_tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa'i drung nas song ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mthar gyi yul shu ma phyi ma'i mtha'i grong khyer ka ling ga'i nags tshal gang 
[\[54b.2\]]na ba der song ste phyin nas/_dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa yongs su tshol zhing sems can kun la rmed pa'i tshe/_gang nas gang du song ba de dang der rogs pa brgya phrag du ma dang /_bu mo brgya phrag du ma zhig srang dang lam gyi bzhi mdo dang /_lam gyi sum mdo dag na tshogs te/_
[\[54b.3\]]rjes su 'brang ngo /_/skyes pa brgya phrag du ma dang /_bud med brgya phrag du ma zhig gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'di re dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa ni/_grong khyer ka ling ga'i nags tshal 'di nyid kyi bza' shing gi ra ba chen po rgyal ba'i 'od kyis byin pa nyi ma'i mdog na sems 
[\[54b.4\]]can tshad med pa'i don du chos ston cing 'dug go zhes bstan to/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bza' shing gi ra ba nyi ma'i mdog der phyin nas kun tu btsal te/_bltas na bza' shing gi ra ba de na/_shing zla ba shar ba zhes bya ba khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug 
[\[54b.5\]]pa/_'od sna tshogs kyi kha dog can 'od kyi mdog dang ldan pa/_'khor kun tu dpag tshad kyi khyon tsam du 'od kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa mang po dang /_lo ma'i shing yongs su 'gengs pa zhes bya ba gdugs kyi rnam pa dang dbyibs su 'dug pa'i 'dab mas kun nas 
[\[54b.6\]]khebs pa/_baiDUr+ya sngon po'i kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i sprin gyi mdog dang ldan pa mang po dang me tog gi shing me tog gi mdzod ces bya ba/_ri'i rgyal po kha ba can ltar mdangs dga' ba'i dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan pa kha dog sna tshogs kyi me tog mi zad pa'i char rab tu 'bebs pa/_sum 
[\[54b.7\]]cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i pho brang gi rgyan gyi kun nas 'du ba dang /_sus kyang mi shigs pa lta bu mang po dang /_shing tog gi shing rtag tu smin pa'i ro dpe med pa'i 'bras bu'i tshogs shes bya ba gser gyi ri bo'i lhun ltar 'dug pa/_rtag tu shing tog phun sum tshogs 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]par gnas pa mang po dang /_rin po che'i rgyal po'i shing rnam par snang ba'i mdzod ces bya ba rin po che'i rgyal po dpe med pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/_lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i phreng ba dang /_se mo do dang /_rgyan rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i mdzod nas byung ba 
[\[55a.2\]]ltar phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/_rin po che'i kha dog grangs med pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa mang po dang /_gos kyi shing dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba lha rdzas kyi gos rin po che'i kha dog sna tshogs kyi tshogs rab tu 'gyed cing 'phyang bas shin tu brgyan pa mang po dang /_rol 
[\[55a.3\]]mo'i shing dga' bskyed pa zhes bya ba lha rdzas las kyang lhag pa'i rol mo yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byin pa mang po dang /_spos kyi shing kun tu zhim pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba phyogs thams cad du thogs pa med par rnam pa thams cad du yid du 'ong ba'i spos kyi ngad 'byung ba mang 
[\[55a.4\]]po dag kyang yod par mthong /_mtshe'u dang lu ma dang /_lteng ka dang /_rdzing bu rin po che bdun gyi pha gus mtha' brtsigs pa/_phyogs bzhi nas rin po che'i them skas btsugs pa/_rin po che sna tshogs kyi khri 'phang dus dang 'thun pa'i tsan dan gyi dri zhim pos bskus pas 
[\[55a.5\]]kun nas bskor ba/_gzhi rin po che'i rgyal po baiDUr+ya sngon po las legs par blangs pa/_'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi bye ma bdal ba yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu lha rdzas kyi dri yid du 'ong ba can gyis yongs su gang ba/_rin po che'i pad mo dang /_ut+pa la dang /_
[\[55a.6\]]ku mu ta dang /_me tog pun da ri ka kha dog sna tshogs lha rdzas kyi bsung dang ldan pas/_chu kun nas yog pa/_bya bran sna tshogs kyi khyu lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i gzugs yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/_sgra snyan pa 'byin cing brjod pas gang ba/_lha rdzas kyi 
[\[55a.7\]]rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi phreng ba legs par bkye bas yongs su bskor cing brgyan pa dang ldan pa shing sna tshogs de dag gi drung thams cad du'ang rin po che'i seng ge'i khri sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa/_rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]pa du mas brgyan pa/_lha rdzas kyi stan rin po che sna tshogs 'bel bar bting ba/_lha rdzas kyi spos dang /_bdug spos kyi rnam pa thams cad kyis bdugs pa/_lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i dar rin pa che mngon par spyangs ba/_rin po che sna tshogs kyi bla re bkye ba/_rin po che sna tshogs 
[\[55b.2\]]dang 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi dra ba sna tshogs kun nas bres pa/_rin po che'i dril gyi dra ba yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa/_mang pos brgyan pa/_'khor du lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i stan brgya phrag du ma bting zhing bshams pa mthong ngo /_/rin po che'i shing drung la lar ni seng 
[\[55b.3\]]ge'i khri rin po che'i pad+mo'i snying po can bshams pa mthong ngo /_/la lar ni seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che'i spos kyi rgyal po'i pad mo'i snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo /_/la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po klu'i rgyan gyi pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong 
[\[55b.4\]]ngo /_/la lar ni seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge'i bya la'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo /_/la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo /_/la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i 
[\[55b.5\]]rgyal po phyogs rnam par snang ba'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo /_/la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po dbang po'i rdo rje'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo /_/la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba'i yid du 'ong ba'i pad+mos 
[\[55b.6\]]snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo /_/rin po che'i shing drung la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po mdog dkar po'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo /_/bza' shing gi ra ba de'i gzhi thams cad kyang rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang zhing rgya mtsho chen po ltar 
[\[55b.7\]]rin po che'i gling gis yongs su gang ba mthong ngo /_/baiDUr+ya sngon po'i dam pas spras te/_rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i sa phyogs ka tsa lin da ltar reg na bde zhing 'jam pa/_gom pa bor zhing bteg pa'i tshe mtho dman med pa/_rdo rje rin po che mchog gi 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]pad+mo'i dri yid du 'ong bar zhim zhing reg na bde ba'i sil ma kun tu bkram pa/_nga ngur dang /_rma bya dang /_khrung khrung dang /_ku na la dang /_ka la ping ka dang /_ko ki la dang /_dzi ban dzi ba ka sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i nga ro 'byin pa mang pos gang ba/_lha rdzas kyi rin po 
[\[56a.2\]]che'i tsan dan gyi shing mang po'i nags tshal shin tu legs par 'grigs pas brgyan pa/_rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad+mo'i sprin gyi char dang /_rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs mi zad pa'i char rgyun tu 'bab pa/_'dres pa'i nags tshal las kyang khyad par du 'phags pa/_rin po che sna 
[\[56a.3\]]tshogs kyi khang bu brtsegs ma brgyan par bkod pa'i nang nas/_spos kyi rgyal po'i bdug spos rin thang med pa rtag tu 'thul zhing zhim pa lha'i mdun sa chos bzang po'i rgyan las kyang lhag par brgyan pa/_lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i rin po che'i dra ba sna tshogs kyis 
[\[56a.4\]]kun nas bres pa/_mu tig rin po che'i me tog gi phreng ba dang /_lda ldi kun nas bres pas rab tu brgyan pa/_rin po che'i dril bu rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam par bkye ba'i gser gyi dra ba 'bar bas/_kun nas dkrigs pa/_rol mo'i shing dang /_rin po che'i ta la 
[\[56a.5\]]las dril bu'i dra ba rlung gis legs par bskyod pas yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa'i dbyangs 'byung ba dang ldan pa/_dbang bsgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po'i lha mo dpe tshul shin tu bzang ba rnams kyis glu snyan pa'i sgra rab tu yid du 'ong ba len ma/_lha rdzas kyi yid bzhin gyi 
[\[56a.6\]]gos kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pas rnam par mdzes pa/_rgya mtsho chen po ltar kha dog dang /_mdog sna tshogs su ldan pas blta na gtang [{]myi [,]mi [}]bra ba/_khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa brgya stong grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pas rab tu brgyan pa/_
[\[56a.7\]]sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i pho brang ltar blta na bzang ba/_rin po che sna tshogs rnam par phye bas rnam pa thams cad du brgyan pa'i gdugs shin tu legs pa/_rnam par bsgreng zhing bkram pas kun nas blta na mdzes pa/_dbang po chen po'i 'jig rten ltar 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]shin tu mdzes pa'i de'u sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/_yid du 'ong ba'i 'od snang ba chen po rtag par 'byung ba/_tshangs pa chen po'i gzhal [{]myed [,]med [}]khang ltar nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba yid du 'ong ba'i 'od kyis 'bar ba ste/_bza' shing gi ra ba chen po nyi ma'i mdog ces bya ba 
[\[56b.2\]]de/_dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu stobs dang /_byin gyi rlabs che zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pas/_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs shing tshad med de/_rgya chen po dang ldan pa mthong 
[\[56b.3\]]ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]de ltar yon tan tshad [{]myed[,]med[}]/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa tshogs pa'i bza' shing gi ra ba'i rgyan byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su grub pa/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po 
[\[56b.4\]]las skyes pa/_sangs rgyas la mchod cing rim gror byas pa'i rgyu 'thun pa bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa las byung ba/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma lus pas [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phrogs pa/_chos kyi rang bzhin sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bus grub pa/_dge ba'i 
[\[56b.5\]]bsod nams dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rgya chen pos grub cing byung ba/_dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i sngon gyi spyod pa bzang po legs par byas pa dang /_rgyu 'thun pa'i stobs dang /_shugs kyis byung ba nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_thun mong ma yin 
[\[56b.6\]]pa/_mu stegs can dang /_phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa/_bdud kyi lam yongs su rgyu ba thams cad kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]tshugs pa/_byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis bltar med pa mthong ste/_shing sna tshogs de dag gi drung gi seng ge'i khri chen po de dag la 
[\[56b.7\]]'ang dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa/_lus shin tu mdzes pa/_spyod lam zhi ba/_yid zhi ba/_shin tu dben pa/_dbang po thul ba/_glang po ltar shin tu dul ba/_mtsho ltar dang zhing gsal la rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_rin po che'i rgyal po 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]yid bzhin gyi nor bu ltar 'dod pa thams cad sgrub pa/_pad mo la chus mi chags pa ltar 'jig rten gyi chos kyis ma gos pa/_seng ge ltar 'jigs pa dang /_skyi g.ya' ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas/_ri'i dbang po chen po ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sgul 
[\[57a.2\]]ba/_tshul khrims rnam par dag pas yid du 'ong ba'i spos kyi rgyal po ltar 'gro ba'i sems tshim par byed pa/_kha ba'i tsan dan ltar nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa/_sman gyi rgyal po blta na bzang ba ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rnam par zhi bar byed pa/_
[\[57a.3\]]chu'i lha'i zhags pa ltar blta na don yod pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od ltar lus dang sems kyi bag yangs bde ba bskyed pa/_tshangs pa chen po ltar 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba/_rin po che'i rgyal po nor bu chu 
[\[57a.4\]]'dang ltar nyon mongs pas rnyog pa can du gyur pa'i sems can gyi sems rab tu dang bar byed pa/_zhing gshin pa ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'dug par mthong ngo /_/'khor gyi stan de dag la'ang 'khor sna tshogs 'khod par mthong ste/_'khor 
[\[57a.5\]]gyi stan la la la ni lha'i bu dbang po chen po la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa/_gtsang ma'i gnas kyi rigs su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams 'khod cing dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/_chos kyi sgo rnam par thar pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa yang dag par 'byed pa zhes bya ba yang dag par 
[\[57a.6\]]bstan pa mthong ngo /_/'khor gyi stan la la ni tshangs pa yid du 'ong ba la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa/_tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams 'khod cing dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/_dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/_gzhi kun 
[\[57a.7\]]nas 'byed pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo /_/'khor gyi stan la la ni lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dag 'khod cing /_dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/_chos 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]kyi sgo byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i dbang gis rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo /_/'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing /_
[\[57b.2\]]dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/_chos kyi sgo thams cad dge bas rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo /_/'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa/_dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu lha'i bu mo'i 'khor 
[\[57b.3\]]dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing /_dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo rang gi sems kyi mdzod kyi glong zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo /_/'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa lha'i bu lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 
[\[57b.4\]]'khod cing /_dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/_chos kyi sgo rgyan mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo /_/'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po brgya byin la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu lha'i 
[\[57b.5\]]bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnam 'khod cing /_dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/_chos kyi sgo skyo ba'i sgo zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo /_/'khor gyi stan la la la ni klu'i rgyal po gang chen mtsho la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa klu'i rgyal po 'od brgya pa dang /_dga' bo 
[\[57b.6\]]dang bsnyen dga' bo dang /_yid du 'ong ba dang /_shugs ldan dang /_ma dros pa la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa klu'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa klu'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing /_dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/_chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 
[\[57b.7\]]'phrul dang /_yul gyi 'od kyi brgyan ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo /_/'khor gyi stan la la la ni rgyal po chen po ngal bso po la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa gnod sbyin gyi dbang po gnod sbyin gyi bu mo dang /_gnod sbyin gyi byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing /_
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/_chos kyi sgo 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i mdzod ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo /_/'khor gyi stan la la la ni dri za'i rgyal po gnas srung po la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dri za mang po dri za'i bu mo dang /_dri za'i byis pa'i 
[\[58a.2\]]'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing /_dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/_chos kyi sgo dga' ba mi zad pa char rab tu 'beb pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo /_/'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa lha ma yin rnams 
[\[58a.3\]]lha ma yin gyi bu mo dang /_lha ma yin gyi byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing /_dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/_chos kyi sgo chos kyi dbyings shes pa'i tshul gyi shugs kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo /_/'khor gyi stan la 
[\[58a.4\]]la la ni nam mkha' lding gi dbang po shugs 'dzin chen po la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa nam mkha' lding gi dbang po nam mkha' lding gi bu mo dang /_nam mkha' lding gi byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing /_dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/_chos kyi sgo 
[\[58a.5\]]srid pa'i rgya mtshos 'jigs pa'i yul zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo /_/'khor gyi stan la la la ni mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa/_mi 'am ci'i dbang po mi'am ci'i bu mo dang /_mi'am ci'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod 
[\[58a.6\]]cing /_dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/_chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa snang ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo /_/'khor gyi stan la la la ni lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po khro gnyer gdong la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa/_lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo dang /_lto 'phye 
[\[58a.7\]]chen po'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing /_dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/_chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas la dga' ba skye ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo /_/'khor gyi stan la la la ni skyes pa dang /_bud [{]myed [,]med [}]dang /_khye'u dang bu mo 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]brgya stong mang po 'khod cing /_dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/_chos kyi sgo khyad par du 'gro ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo /_/'khor gyi stan la la la ni srin po'i dbang po rtag tu mdangs 'phrog pa sdong po'i rgyal po la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa srin po'i dbang po srin po'i 
[\[58b.2\]]bu mo dang srin po'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing /_dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/_chos kyi sgo snying rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo /_/'khor gyi stan la la la ni sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa la mos pa rnams 'khod cing /_dge 
[\[58b.3\]]slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/_chos kyi sgo ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa'i mthu zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo /_/'khor gyi stan la la la ni sems can rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa rnams 'khod cing /_dge slong ma seng ge rnam 
[\[58b.4\]]par bsgyings pas/_chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya chen po'i 'od ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo /_/'khor gyi stan la la la ni sems can theg pa chen po la mos pa rnams 'khod cing /_dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/_ting nge 
[\[58b.5\]]'dzin gyi ye shes snang ba'i sgo kun tu sgo zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo /_/'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' thog mar sems bskyed pa rnams 'khod cing /_dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sangs 
[\[58b.6\]]rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam gyi phung po zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo /_/'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa gnyis pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing /_dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rdul dang bral ba'i 
[\[58b.7\]]dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo /_/'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa gsum pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing /_dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu zhi ba'i rgyan ces bya ba yang 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]dag par bstan pa mthong ngo /_/'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa bzhi pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing /_dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad mkhyen pa'i shugs kyi 
[\[59a.2\]]yul 'byung ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo /_/'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa lnga pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing /_dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sems kyi rgyud me tog gi snying po zhes bya ba yang 
[\[59a.3\]]dag par bstan pa mthong ngo /_/'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa drug pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing /_dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnam par snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo /_/'khor gyi stan la la la 
[\[59a.4\]]ni byang chub sems dpa' sa bdun pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing /_dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sa kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo /_/'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa brgyad pa la gnas pa rnams 
[\[59a.5\]]'khod cing /_dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo chos kyi dbyings su lus shin tu rnam par phye ba'i yul zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo /_/'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa dgu pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing /_dge 
[\[59a.6\]]slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings bas/_chos kyi sgo mi dmigs pa'i stobs kyi gnas kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo /_/'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing /_dge slong ma seng ge rnam par 
[\[59a.7\]]bsgyings pas/_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sgrib pa med pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo /_/'khor gyi stan la la la ni lag na rdo rje'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'khod cing /_dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/_chos 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]kyi sgo ye shes rdo rje mthu bo che'i rgyan ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo /_/de ltar skye ba'i skye mched rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad kyi sems can du gdags pa dang /_sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud ji snyed pa de dag gi sems can yongs su smin pa rnam par 'dul ba/_snod du gyur 
[\[59b.2\]]ba ji snyed cig bza' shing gi ra ba der 'ongs shing /_'khor gyi stan la so sor 'khod pa/_bsam pa tha dad pa mos pa mi mtshungs pa/_bsam pa shin tu gzhol bar gyur ba/_dad pa'i ro rngams chen po dang ldan pa rnams la/_dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas ci nas kyang 
[\[59b.3\]]thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba/_de lta de ltar chos bstan pa mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa des kun tu lta ba'i btang snyoms dang ldan pa la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams 
[\[59b.4\]]cad shin tu bstan pa la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi tha dad pa la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dang /_sgrib pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i sems yang dag par 'byung ba la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dang /_khyad par 
[\[59b.5\]]yod pa'i rgyan la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dang /_chags pa med pa'i tshul gyi snying po la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dang /_sems kyi mdzod la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dang /_kun tu mos pa mngon par sgrub pa'i snying po la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa shes rab kyi pha 
[\[59b.6\]]rol tu phyin pa'i sgo brgya stong grangs med pa non pa'i phyir te/_bza' shing gi ra ba nyi ma'i mdog der byang chub sems dpa' 'am/_sems can gzhan ji snyed cig dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa la lta ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ong ba de dag thams 
[\[59b.7\]]cad kyang sngon/_dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/_dge ba'i chos yang dag par blang ba la shin tu bkod pa nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i bar du byas pa sha stag go_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]kyis/_dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i bza' shing gi ra ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /_nags tshal phun sum tshogs pa dang /_gtsug lag khang phun sum tshogs pa dang /_'chag sa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_longs su spyod phun sum tshogs pa 
[\[60a.2\]]dang /_mal cha phun sum tshogs pa dang /_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang /_dbang chen po phun sum tshogs pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_dbyangs kyi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa de lta bu mthong ste/_chos kyi tshul 
[\[60a.3\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang thos nas/_chos kyi sprin gyi char chen pos sems mngon par brlan pa de'i yid la dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/_bsam pa rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs par byas kyis da ni g.yas phyogs su bskor ba lan brgya stong 
[\[60a.4\]]du ma zhig tu bya'o snyam pa dang /_de'i mod la dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/_bza' shing gi ra ba dang /_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du bcas pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/_/de ltar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba bya'o/_/snyam du 
[\[60a.5\]]bsams nas bskor ba byed pa'i tshe/_'khor thams cad na'ang dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'dug pa mthong nas mdun du 'dug ste/_thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[60a.6\]]sems bskyed na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/_'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do/_/zhes bdag 
[\[60a.7\]]gis thos na/_'phags ma ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/_des smras pa/_rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rlom sems 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]thams cad yongs su bcom pa zhes ba ba thob pa'o/_/smras pa/_'phags ma byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rlom sems thams cad yongs su bcom pa de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/_smras pa rigs kyi bu de ni ye shes snang ba ste/_dus gsum du byung ba'i 
[\[60b.2\]]rgyan sems skad cig gi cha shas la rnam par dmigs pa'i rang bzhin no/_/smras pa/_'phags ma ye shes snang ba de'i yul yang ji lta bu zhig mchis/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu kho mo ye shes snang ba 'di la sgrub pa dang yongs su sgrub pa'i tshe chos thams cad 
[\[60b.3\]]rab tu 'thad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin skyes te/_ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus kyis phyogs bcu thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/_byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa dga' ldan gyi pho brang na bzhugs 
[\[60b.4\]]pa/_thams cad re re la yang lus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod pa rnam pa tha dad pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mchod pa sbyar ba'i phyir 'gro ste/_'di ltar lha'i lus dang klu dang 
[\[60b.5\]]gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa'i dbang po'i lus me tog gi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_spos kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_bdug spos kyi sprin yongs su 
[\[60b.6\]]'dzin pa dang /_phreng ba'i sprin yongs sa 'dzin pa dang /_byug pa'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_phye ma'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_na bza'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_gdugs kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_rgyal mtshan gyi sprin yongs 
[\[60b.7\]]su 'dzin pa dang /_ba dan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_rin po che'i lhab lhub kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_rin po che'i dra ba'i rgyan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_rin po che'i gnam yol gyi rgyan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_rin po che'i rgyan 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]rnam par phye ba'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_rin po che'i sgron ma'i rgyan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_rin po che'i gdan gyi rgyan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa mang pos mchod pa sbyar ba'i phyir 'gro'o/_/dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa'i byang chub 
[\[61a.2\]]sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/_ji ltar 'gro ba de bzhin du yum gyi skur gshegs pa dang /_bltam pa dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang /_mngon par 'byung ba dang /_snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa dang /_
[\[61a.3\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas shing snying po byang chub la bzhugs pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_de bzhin du lha'i gnas na bzhugs pa dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_
[\[61a.4\]]dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa'i gnas na bzhugs pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang bsam pa yongs su tshim par mdzad nas/_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar de 
[\[61a.5\]]dag thams cad la'ang yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus rnam pa de lta bu dag gis rnam pa de lta bu'i mchod pa byed cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'gro'o/_sems can gang gis kho mos sangs rgyas mchod pa dang /_rim gro byed pa'i las 'di shes 
[\[61a.6\]]par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro/_/sems can gang kho mo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad la'ang kho mo ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gdams ngag dang /_rjes su bstan pa 'di nyid 
[\[61a.7\]]ston te/_rigs kyi bu kho mo ye shes kyi mig gis sems can thams cad la lta yang /_sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi bskyed la/_rlom sems kyang mi byed de/_'gro ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho yang nyan te/_tshig gi lam thams cad la mngon par 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]zhen pa med pas/_rlom sems su byed pa med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mthong ste/_chos kyi lus yongs su shes pas rlom sems su byed pa med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su 'dzin kyang /_chos kyi rang bzhin 
[\[61b.2\]]khong du chud pas rlom sems su byed pa med do/_/sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs kyang /_chos nyid sgyu ma'i rang bzhin khong du chud pas rlom sems su byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rigs kyi bu kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par
