[\[61b.3\]]thar ba rlom sems thams cad yongs su bcom pa 'di shes par zad na/_kho mos byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa la zhugs pa/_chos thams cad la rlom sems med par gnas kyang skyil mo krung gcig gis chos kyi dbyings 
[\[61b.4\]]thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rang gi lus su 'dus par ston kyang /_skad cig gcig gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'dong ba/_lus la sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul thams cad la 'byung zhing rgyu ba/_sangs rgyas 
[\[61b.5\]]kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa ba spu'i nyag ma gcig gis sbams shing mngon par 'phen pa/_rang gi ba spu'i bu gar 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa 'du ba dang /_'jig pa'i bskal pa yongs su ston pa/_skad cig 
[\[61b.6\]]gcig la bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par gnas pa/_mnyam pa nyid kyis yang dag par 'dzud pa/_skad cig gcig gis brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal par 'khor ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/_yon tan brjod 
[\[61b.7\]]par nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi yul bgrod dka' ba na/_grong khyer rin po che'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/_de na bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_dge slong ma seng ge rnam par 
[\[62a.2\]]bsgyings pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/_dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i drung nas song ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]shes rab kyi snang ba chen po des sems snang bar gyur pa de thams cad 
[\[62a.3\]]mkhyen pa'i ye shes snang ba de la ni sems/_chos nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi stobs snang ba de la ni yang dag par rjes su lta/_sems can thams cad kyi skad rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i mdzod kyi gzungs kyi tshul de ni brtan par byed/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[62a.4\]]kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi tshul de ni shin tu rgya che bar byed/_snying rje chen po 'gro ba thams cad kyi skyabs su gyur pa'i stobs de ni nye bar ston/_chos thams cad kyi tshul snang ba'i sgo nas yang dag par 'byung ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 
[\[62a.5\]]shugs de la ni rab tu rtog_/chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor rgyas par 'gengs pa'i smon lam yongs su dag pa de'i rjes su ni 'brang /_chos thams cad kyi phyogs snang bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi 'od de ni shin tu gsal bar byed/_chos thams cad 
[\[62a.6\]]kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba rgyas par 'gengs pa'i mngon par shes pa'i stobs de ni mngon par sgrub/_byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang /_dran pa thams cad nye bar blangs pas brtsams pa mthar dbyung ba'i smon lam de ni yongs su 
[\[62a.7\]]rdzogs par byed cing /_mthar gyis yul bgrod dka' ba'i grong khyer rin po che'i rgyan gang na ba der phyin te/_bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma yongs su tshol tshol ba dang /_de la bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen gyi yon tan mngon par mi shes la ye shes kyi 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]spyod yul gyi tshul la mi mkhas pa'i mi ji snyed pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_mi 'di de ltar zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang po dang ldan la de ltar shes bzhin dang ldan te/_de ltar 'khrul pa med cing de ltar yid 'khrug pa med la de ltar gnya' shing gang tsam du lta ste/_de ltar gnod 
[\[62b.2\]]pas mi tshugs shing de ltar mtshan mar mi 'dzin la/_gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad la g.yeng ba med pa'i mig dang ldan te/_yid la brel ba med cing /_bsam pa zab la mngon par mdzes te/_rgya mtsho ltar 'dug cing sems mi nyams mi 'khrug pa de la bcom 
[\[62b.3\]]pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen mas ko ci zhig bya/_'di lta bu dag ni 'dod chags la dga' ba med de/_sems phyin ci log dang ldan yang mi srid do/_/'di lta bu dag ni sdug cing gtsang ba'i 'du shes yongs su rgyu ba med de/_'di lta bu dag ni 'dod pas 'khol kyang mi 
[\[62b.4\]]srid do/_/'di lta bu dag ni bud med kyi dbang du 'gyur ba med de/_'di lta bu dag ni bdud kyi spyod yul la spyod kyang mi srid do/_/'di lta bu dag ni bdud kyi spyod yul la chags pa med de/_'di lta bu dag ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba yang mi srid do/_/'di lta bu 
[\[62b.5\]]dag ni bdud kyi zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ba med de/_mi dgos pa byed kyang mi srid do snyam mo/_/gang yang bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i yon tan gyi khyad par mngon par shes shing /_ye shes kyi spyod yul mngon du gyur pa de dag ni 'di skad ces 
[\[62b.6\]]'dzer te/_rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma la yongs su dri bar sems pa ni khyod kyang thob par bya ba legs par thob pa ste/_legs so legs so/_/khyod ni nges par sangs rgyas su smon pa'o/_/khyod ni bdag nges par sems 
[\[62b.7\]]can thams cad kyi gnas su bsgyur bar 'dod pa'o/_/khyod ni nges par sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags kyi zug rngu dbyung bar 'dod pa'o/_/khyod ni nges par sdug cing gtsang ba'i 'du shes rnam par gtor bar 'dod pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'de re bcom pa 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma ni grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i byang phyogs logs shig na rang gi khyim na 'dug go_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]tshig de thos nas dga' rangs te/_mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba 
[\[63a.2\]]skyes nas/_bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i khyim gang na ba der phyin nas/_de'i khyim che zhing yangs la rin po che'i ra ba rim pa bcus bskor ba/_rin po che ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bcus kun nas bskor ba/_'obs spos chus gang ba/_lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i 
[\[63a.3\]]pad mo dang /_uta pa la dang /_ku mu ta dang /_me tog pun da ri kas chu yongs su khebs pa yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba/_gzhi gser gyi bye ma bdal ba/_spos yid du 'ong ba dang /_'dres pa'i chudri zhim pas gang ba/_rin po che 
[\[63a.4\]]sil ma mang pos shin tu brgyan pa/_rim pa bcus kun nas bskor ba/_rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i khang pa dang /_gzhal med khang dang /_khang pa brtsegs pas rnam par dgrigs shing ba gam dang rta babs dang /_skar khung gi shar bu dang /_zla gam 
[\[63a.5\]]seng ge'i shing tags dang /_snang ba'i rgyal mtshan la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa/_rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyis 'bar ba rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs grangs med pa'i 'byung gnas kyis brgyan pa/_rin po che'i dag baiDUR+Yas sbas pa'i gzhi dang ldan pa/_lha rdzas kyi spos 
[\[63a.6\]]zhim po thams cad kyis 'khor thams cad nas bdugs shing bsangs pa/_a ka ru nag po mchog gi bdug spos kyis dri zhim par bdug pa/_spos kyi byug pas 'khor kun nas byugs pa/_rin po che sna tshogs kyi lan kan gyis rtsig ngos kun tu bres pa/_
[\[63a.7\]]steng 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi dra ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis rab tu spras pas kun nas bkab pa/_gser gyi dril gyi dra ba brgya stong rlung gis bskyod cing 'khrol ba'i sgra yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa 'byung ba/_rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi sprin sil ma 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]kun tu bkram pas/_rin po che'i me tog gi rgyan dang ldan pa/_rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bas sgo shin tu brgyan pa/_nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi dra ba snang ba/_mu med par brjod du yod pa/_rin po che byu ru'i sdong po dang /_rdo rje dang /_man shel 
[\[63b.2\]]la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa'i gter brgya stong kun gyis shes pa/_phun sum tshogs pas mdzod mi zad pa dang ldan pa/_bza' shing gi ra ba chen po bcus brgyan pa mthong ste/_de nas bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma gzugs mdzes shing bzang la blta na sdug pa/_gya nom pa'i kha 
[\[63b.3\]]dog dam pa rgyas pa dang ldan pa/_gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i mdog can skra mthon ting du 'dug pa/_lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag tshul dang 'dra bar rnam par grub pa/_'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dang mi thams cad las 'phags pa'i kha dog dang 
[\[63b.4\]]gzugs dang dbyibs mdzes pa dang ldan pa/_tshangs pa las kyang 'das pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag dang ldan pa/_sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad kyi tshul la mkhas pa/_rgyan thams cad dang ldan zhing yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs can rnam par thar pa yi ge'i 'khor lo'i 
[\[63b.5\]]rgyan la mkhas pa dang ldan pa/_bzo dang gtsug lag thams cad la mkhas par byung ba/_chos kyi ye shes sgyu ma la mkhas par bslabs pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i thabs dang tshul rnam pa thams cad du thob pa/_rin po che'i lhab lhub sna tshogs 
[\[63b.6\]]kyis rnam par brgyan pa'i lus yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/_rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i dra ba 'od shin tu gsal bas lus rab tu brgyan pa/_lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyan dang /_lhab lhub grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pas/_lus shin tu 
[\[63b.7\]]'bar ba/_nor bu rin po che dam pa yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i cod pan thogs pa/_rin po che bai DUr+ya'i phreng ba mdo zungs rdo rje rin po che sna tshogs dang /_nor bu rin po che seng ge mdzes pa sna tshogs bkye ba mgul na thogs pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba spyad pa 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]la skal ba 'thun pa dang /_smon lam gcig pa'i 'khor mang po gzhan gyis mi phyed cing yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po'i gter mi zad pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa 'dug pa mthong ste/_des khyim de dag 
[\[64a.2\]]thams cad dang /_rin po che'i gnas dang /_gzhal med khang gi rgyan de dag thams cad kyang rang gi lus las byung ba'i 'od dga' bar byed pa/_lus bde ba dang sim pa skyed pa/_sems khong nas dga' bar byed pas gsal zhing snang bar byas pa mthong ngo /_/
[\[64a.3\]]de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[64a.4\]]tu sems bskyed na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/_'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag 
[\[64a.5\]]gis thos na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags mas bdag la bstan du gsol/_/des smras pa rigs kyi bu kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar 
[\[64a.6\]]pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa zhes bya ba thob ste/_rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo ni lha rnams la lha mo'i gzugs dang kha dog dang /_dbyibs dang chu zheng las kyang lhag par kha dog gsal ba dang /_rnam par dag pas ci la mos pa bzhin du snang 
[\[64a.7\]]bar byed do/_/de bzhin du klu dang gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams la yang bud med kyi gzugs dang /_kha dog dang dbyibs dang /_chu zheng lhag par 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]'od gsal zhing rnam par dag pas ci la mos pa bzhin du snang bar byed do/_/sems can gang 'dod chags kyis kun nas 'khor ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag_/kho mo'i drung du 'ong na'ang de dag thams cad la kho mo ni 'dod chags dang 'bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir chos 
[\[64b.2\]]ston te/_de dag gis chos de thos nas kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chags pa med pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo/_/la la ni kho mo mthong ma thag tu 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur te/_
[\[64b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dga' ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo/_/la la ni gtam byas pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chags pa med pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba 
[\[64b.4\]]yang rab tu 'thob bo/_/la la ni lag nas bzung ba tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rjes su 'gro zhing gnas pa zhes bya ba'ang rab tu 'thob bo/_/la la ni 
[\[64b.5\]]gcig tu 'grogs pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bral bas snang ba zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo/_/la la ni bltas pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/_
[\[64b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu zhi ba'i rnam par brgyan ces bya ba yang rab tu thob bo/_/la la ni glel ba tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phas kyi rgol ba rnam par 'thor 
[\[64b.7\]]pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo/_/la la ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]btsums pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi yul snang ba zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo/_/la la ni pang du 'khyud 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sdur cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo/_/la la ni 'o byas pa tsam gyis 'dod 
[\[65a.2\]]chags dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad bsod nams kyi mdzod la reg par byed pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo/_/de ltar kho mo ni sems can gang ji snyed cig kho mo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams 
[\[65a.3\]]cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa chags pa med pa la mngon du gyur pa 'di nyid la rab tu 'god do/_/smras pa/_'phags ma khyod de lta bu'i phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa de khyod 
[\[65a.4\]]kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba ni gang du bskyed/_phrin las ni ji lta bu zhig bstsags/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu kho mos dran na 'das pa'i dus shig na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_
[\[65a.5\]]bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_bla na med pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_lha dang mi'i ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shin tu mtho bar gshegs pa zhes ba ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu 
[\[65a.6\]]mtho bar gshegs pa de sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i sku don tu rgyal po'i gnas sgo bzang po zhes bya bar gshegs nas sgo'i them pa la zhabs kyis gnon pa'i tshe/_grong khyer de thams cad kyang /_rab tu g.yos nas yangs shing rgya che la rin 
[\[65a.7\]]po che du ma las byas par yongs su grub par gyur te/_steng gi bar snang yang rin po che mang po'i 'od kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang /_rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang /_lha rdzas kyi rol mo sna tshogs kyi sgra rab tu 'byung ba dang /_lha'i lus kyi 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]sprin tshad med pa rgya che bas khebs par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu kho mo yang de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi chung ma zhig tu gyur te/_blo gros bzang mo zhes bya'o/_/de nas kho mo cho 'phrul gyis yang dag par bskul nas khyim thab dang lhan cig tu dong dong ste/_de bzhin 
[\[65b.2\]]gshegs pa grong bar gyi srang du gshegs pa la dad pa rgya chen po skyes te/_kho mos ni rin po che'i dril bu gcig cig phul lo/_/de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mtho bar gshegs pa'i zham 'bring 
[\[65b.3\]]na 'dug te/_des kho mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa 'di shes par zad na/_kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[65b.4\]]thabs dang ye shes mtha' yas pa la gnas pa/_bsod nams rgya che zhing yangs pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa/_ye shes kyi yul la thub pa med pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/_yon tan brjod par nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 
[\[65b.5\]]'di nyid na grong khyer dge ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes ba ba yod de/_de na khyim bdag nan khugs shes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten tsan dan gyi khri 'phang can la mchod pa byed pa zhig 'dug gis/_de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub 
[\[65b.6\]]sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom pa ma lha'i 
[\[65b.7\]]bshes gnyen ma la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_yang dang yang bltas te/_bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i drung nas song ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]grong khyer dge ba'i pha rol tu phyin par 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]khyim bdag nan khugs kyi khyim ga la ba der phyin nas/_khyim bdag nan khugs kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te/_'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[66a.2\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/_'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan 
[\[66a.3\]]pa mdzad do/_/zhes bdag gis thos nas/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/_des smras pa rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub 
[\[66a.4\]]sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba yongs su mi zad pa thob pa ste/_rigs kyi bu kho bo'i sems kyi rgyud las ni/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas kyang /_sems can 'dul ba'i dbang du mdzad pa ma gtogs par 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas 
[\[66a.5\]]kyang shin tu mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med do/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba med do/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba med do/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[66a.6\]]mchod rten tsan dan gyi khri 'phang gi sgo 'byed pa ste/_kho bo mchod rten gyi sgo 'byed 'byed pas byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi zad pa'i rgyan ces bya ba thob bo/_/rigs kyi bu kho bo ni ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid la sems kyi skad cig skad cig tu mnyam 
[\[66a.7\]]par gzhog ste/_sems kyi skad cig thams cad la'ang khyad par gyi rnam pa du ma rab tu 'thob bo/_/smras pa/_'phags pa ting nge 'dzin de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/_smras pa rigs kyi bu kho bo ting nge 'dzin 'di la snyoms par zhugs pa'i tshe/_'jig 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'di sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud po bsod skyabs la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_gser thub dang /_log par dad sel dang /_thams cad mnga' ba dang /_gtsug tor can dang /_rnam par gzigs dang /_rgyal dang /_
[\[66b.2\]]rdzogs mdzad dang /_grags mchog dang /_pad mo'i bla la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang sangs rgyas mthong ba'i mtshams 'brel pas/_sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshul gyis mngon sum du mthong ste/_
[\[66b.3\]]sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas brgya yang mthong ngo /_/de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas stong yang mthong ngo /_/de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag stong yang mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du sangs rgyas bye ba dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba 
[\[66b.4\]]phrag brgya dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag stong dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba dung phyur dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dang /_de'i 'og ma'i sems 
[\[66b.5\]]kyis sangs rgyas 'byung ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang mthong ngo /_/de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo /_/de'i 'og ma'i sems 
[\[66b.6\]]kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa'i tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la'ang 'jug go_
[\[66b.7\]]thugs dang po bskyed pas 'thob pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la'ang 'jug go_/smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa mngon par bsgrubs pa rnam par dag pa la 'ang 'jug go_/spyod pa rnam par dag pa la'ang 'jug go_/pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]mdzad pa la'ang 'jug go_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad yongs su bsgrubs pa la 'ang 'jug go_/bzod pa brnyes pa rnam par dag pa la'ang 'jug go_/bdud kyi dkrugs ma rnam par 'thor ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung 
[\[67a.2\]]ba la'ang 'jug go_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan la'ang 'jug go_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par mdzad pa rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go_/sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug 
[\[67a.3\]]go_/'khor kun nas 'dus pa rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go_/'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba la'ang 'jug go_/sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa 
[\[67a.4\]]dang /_cho 'phrul la'ang 'jug go_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis chos bstan pa yang shin tu rnam par gsal ba dang /_ma 'dres par dran te/_yang dag par 'dzin to/_/dran pas yongs su bcangs so/_/rig pas rab tu shes par byed 
[\[67a.5\]]do/_/blo gros kyis shin tu rnam par 'byed do/_/blos rtogs par byed do/_/shes rab kyis snang bar byed do/_/ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i byams pa la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dag kyang mthong zhing shes te/_sems kyi skad cig gcig 
[\[67a.6\]]la sangs rgyas brgya yang mthong ngo /_/de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas stong yang mthong ba nas/_de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag kyang 
[\[67a.7\]]mthong ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa'i tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la'ang 'jug go_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis chos bstan pa yang shin tu gsal ba dang /_ma 'dres par rjes su dran 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]te yang dag par 'dzin to/_/dran pas yongs su bcangs so/_/rig pas rab tu shes par byed do/_/blo gros kyis rnam par 'byed do/_/blos rtogs par byed do/_/shes rab kyis snang bar byed do/_/ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'di sngon gyi 
[\[67b.2\]]mtha' dang phyi ma'i mthar gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mthong zhing shes pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa snyed kyi 
[\[67b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad kyang shes shing mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa'i tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la'ang 'jug go_/sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud 
[\[67b.4\]]pa de la'ang rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /_mi zad pa dang /_dad pas shes par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus dang /_zho non pas khong du chud par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 
[\[67b.5\]]dang /_'jig rten thams cad dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_de'i yul la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa shes shing khong du chud par byed do/_/rnam par snang mdzad la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]
[\[67b.6\]]pa da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad kyang mthong zhing shes te/_sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas brgya yang mthong zhing shes so/_/de'i 
[\[67b.7\]]'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas stong yang mthong ba nas/_de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar du yang mthong ste/_nam de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]gang gi zhal blta bar dga' ba de'i tshe 'ang de bzhin du mthong ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bstan pa dang /_bstan pa mdzad pa dang /_bstan par 'gyur ba de dag kyang thos so/_/thos nas kyang 'dzin to/_/dran 
[\[68a.2\]]pas yongs su bcangs so/_/rig pas rab tu shes par byed do/_/blo gros kyis rnam par 'byed do/_/blos rtogs par byed do/_/shes rab kyis snang bar byed do/_/rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i mthar phyin pa 'di 
[\[68a.3\]]shes bar zad na/_kho bos byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum skad cig gcig tu shes pa rab tu thob pa/_skad cig gcig gi cha shas la ting nge 'dzin rnam par phye ba la spyad pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma las byung ba rtog pa dang /_rnam par 
[\[68a.4\]]rtog pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin rjes su rtogs pa/_bdag dang sems can dang /_sangs rgyas mi gnyis par spyod pa/_rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i chos kyi rgyan gyi dkyil 
[\[68a.5\]]'khor dang ldan pa/_ye shes kyi 'khrul 'khor kyis 'jig rten gyi dra ba 'gengs pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho thams cad dang /_mi 'gal bar rnam par spyod pa/_chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rnam par rtogs par byed pa'i ye shes kyi yul 
[\[68a.6\]]dang ldan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos bstan pa rnam par rig par byed pa'i ye shes kyi yul can de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/_yon tan brjod par nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na ri gru 'dzin ces bya 
[\[68a.7\]]ba yod de/_de na byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po zhes bya ba 'dug gis/_de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dris shig ces 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]nas de'i tshe/_tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis smras so/_/song shig nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dpal gyi chu rgyal dpung zhig na/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis ri rgyal gru 'dzin mdzes pa yod/_/rin chen rgyus byas shing dang nags tshal me tog mang /_/bza' shing ra ba rdzing dang chu bran 
[\[68b.2\]]'bab par ldan/_/ri mchog de la brtan par spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang /_/'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i don du rnam par spyod/_/de'i gan song dang nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod la mgon po yis/_/yon tan rgya chen tshul la 'jug pa ston par byed/_/de nas 
[\[68b.3\]]tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]khyim bdag nan khugs kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/_khyim bdag nan khugs la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/_yang dang yang bltas nas khyim bdag nan khugs kyi 
[\[68b.4\]]drung nas song ngo //_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo//_bam po lnga pa/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyim bdag nan khugs kyi gdams ngag rjes su sems shing /_byang chub 
[\[68b.5\]]sems dpa'i mos pa'i mdzod de ni shes par byed/_byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su dran pa'i stobs de ni rjes su dran par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi tshul gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i stobs ni yang dag par 'dzin/_sangs rgyas gcig nas 
[\[68b.6\]]gcig tu brgyud pa'i mtshams ni khong du chud par byed/_rnas thos pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan de dag gi rjes su ni 'brang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa'i tshul de dang ni 'thun par byed/_sangs rgyas kyis yang dag par bsgrub pa'i rgyan de ni khong du chud 
[\[68b.7\]]par byed/_sangs rgyas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de la ni yid ches par byed/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las bsam gyis mi khyab pa de ni mngon du byed cing /_mthar gyis ri gru 'dzin gang na ba der 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]song nas/_ri gru 'dzin gyi steng du phyin te/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po yongs su rmed cing tshol tshol ba las/_nub phyogs logs kyi ri'i sman ljongs mtsho dang /_mtshe'u dang 'bab chus mdzes par gyur pa/_baiDUr+ya 
[\[69a.2\]]sngon po'i dkyil 'khor ltar sngo zhing 'jam la gzhon pa'i spang /_nags tshal chen po'i mthongs na 'dug pa zhig na/_rin po che'i rdo rje'i rdo stegasashig la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug cing /_rin po che sna tshogs kyi rdo stegs la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[69a.3\]]dpa'i tshogs dpag tu med pas/_kun nas bskor cing chos ston te/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sdud pa'i yul byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po'i sgo gsal bar ston pa zhes ba ba yang dag par ston cing 'dug pa mthong 
[\[69a.4\]]ngo /_/mthong nas kyang dga' rangs te mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas dga' bas rgyas zhing mi 'dzum pa'i mig gis thal mo sbyar nas/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la dad pa'i shugs dang ldan pas sems mi 'khrug pa/_dge 
[\[69a.5\]]ba'i bshes gnyen mthong na/_sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'dzin pa/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ba'i chos kyi sprin thams cad yang dag par gzung ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/_yon tan dang nan tan thams cad dge ba'i bshes 
[\[69a.6\]]gnyen la rag lus pa'i 'du shes can/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa shin tu dka' bar sems pa/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen las stobs bcu'i ye shes rin pa che 'byung zhing thob par 'gyur ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/_dge ba'i bshes 
[\[69a.7\]]gnyen las snang ba mi zad pa 'byung ba'i 'du shes can/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rten gyi bsod nams kyi rgyud rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo yang dag par ston pa'i 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]'du shes dang ldan pa/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni ye shes kyi rgya mtsho chen po la 'jug pa'i yongs su ston par 'du shes pa/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs yang dag par 'dus pa/_yongs su bskyed pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa de/_
[\[69b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po gang na ba der phyin to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ring zhig nas tshur 'ong ba mthong nas/_smras pa/_tshur shog dpe med pa'i theg pa chen po 
[\[69b.3\]]yangs shing bsam gyis mi khyab pa la zhugs pa/_skye ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses shing skyabs med par gyur pa'i 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa/_
[\[69b.4\]]'jig rten thams cad las 'das te dpe med tshad med pa la mngon par mos pa/_snying rje chen pos byin gyis brlabs pas/_'gro ba thams cad yongs sa bskyab pa'i blo gros can/_blta na kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la mngon du bltas pa/_smon lam chen po'i 
[\[69b.5\]]dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongs su gzung bar mos pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bstsags pas ngoms mi shes pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la yang dag par 
[\[69b.6\]]zhugs pa/_'jam dpal gyi ye shes rgya mtsho las byung ba'i yon tan gyi 'byung gnas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs thob par bya ba la mngon du bltas pa/_ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba dang shugs rab tu thob pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yang 
[\[69b.7\]]dag par gzung ba la mngon par mos pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas mthong bas dga' ba dang /_mos pa'i shugs kyis yid rab tu bde bar gyur pa/_legs par spyod pa tshad med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i shugs kyis mngon par brlan 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_yon tan la nan tan du bya ba'i shugs kyis rnam par dag pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi mdzod bdag la mngon du gyur pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i lam gyi shugs gzhan la yongs 
[\[70a.2\]]su bstan pa'i bsam pa can/_snying rje chen po'i shugs ma nyams pa'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes snang ba'i shugs yang dag par gzung ba'i blo gros can khyod 'ongs pa legs so legs so/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byang chub 
[\[70a.3\]]sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po gdan pa der song nas/_byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la lan brgya stong du mar 
[\[70a.4\]]g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/_thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub 
[\[70a.5\]]sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/_'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang 
[\[70a.6\]]chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos mdog 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa 
[\[70a.7\]]'od kyi dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs tshad med pa 'phro ba'i rgyan gyi sprin rab tu 'gyed pa'i lag pa g.yas pa brkyang te/_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po las byung ba'i 'od gzer sna tshogs dri ma med pa/_lus dang sems kyi bde ba tshad med pa rab tu skyed 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]pa'i tshogs kyis shin tu rgyas pa'i lag pa/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]spyi bo la bzhag ste/_'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu nga 
[\[70b.2\]]ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba shes te/_rigs kyi bu nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa de ni 'gro ba thams cad la dbye ba med par sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba la 
[\[70b.3\]]zhugs pa sgo kun nas thos shing rnam par rig par 'gyur bas/_sems can yongs su bsdu ba dang /_gdul ba la nye bar gnas pa ste/_rigs kyi bu de ltar nga byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa la gnas pas/_de bzhin 
[\[70b.4\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas kyang mi g.yo la/_sems can thams cad kyi dgos pa la'ang sta gon du gnas te/_sbyin pas kyang sems can yongs su sdud do/_/ngag snyan pa dang don bya ba dang /_don 'thun pas kyang sems can yongs 
[\[70b.5\]]su bsdud do/_/gzugs kyi lus rnam par bstan pas kyang /_sems can yongs su smyin par byed do/_/kha dog dang dbyibs dang gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan te/_rnam par dmigs par bya ba dang /_'od gzer kyi dra ba dgye bas kyang 
[\[70b.6\]]sems can rab tu tshim par byed cing yongs su smyin par byed do/_/bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dbyangs brjod pa dang /_ci la dga' ba'i spyod lam yongs su bstan pa dang /_mos pa sna tshogs dang /_tshul 'thun par chos bstan pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul 
[\[70b.7\]]dang rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang /_dge ba'i chos bstsags par bag [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pa'i sems can gyi sems yongs su bskul ba dang /_bsam pa dang 'thun par sprul pa sna tshogs tshad med pa yongs su bstan pa dang /_rigs sna tshogs su skyes pa'i 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]sems can rnams dang skal ba 'thun pa'i gzug yongs su bstan pa dang /_gnas gcig tu 'grogs pas kyang sems can yongs su bsdus shing yongs su smyin par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje 
[\[71a.2\]]chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa 'di yongs su sbyangs pas/_'gro ba thams cad rab tu rten pa'i smon lam bskyed de/_'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi g.yang sa'i 'jigs pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi rgyud kyi 'jigs pa zhi bar bya ba dang /_sems can 
[\[71a.3\]]thams cad kyi mgo rmongs pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi bcings pa'i 'jigs pa yongs su gcad pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi srog la bab par mi bde ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /_sems can thams 
[\[71a.4\]]cad kyi yo byad kyis phongs pa'i 'jig pa bsal ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs pa zhi bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi grags pa med pa'i 'jig rten pa las yongs su bzla ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i 
[\[71a.5\]]'jigs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi 'khor du bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa las rnam par bzla ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi ngan song gi 'jigs pa rnam par 
[\[71a.6\]]bzlog pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi lam mun pas nyam nga ba phyir mi ldog pa'i snang bas gsal bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad skal ba mi mnyam pa dang 'grogs pa'i 'jigs pa shin tu bsal ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sdug pa 
[\[71a.7\]]dang bral ba'i 'jigs pa dgag par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi mi sdug pa dang /_'grogs pa'i 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad lus la mi bde ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad sems la mi bde 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]ba'i 'jigs pa las dgrol ba dang /_sems can thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang 'khrugs pa las yongs su bzla ba'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad rab tu rten pa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa 'di byas so/_/sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa rnam 
[\[71b.2\]]par zhi bar bya ba'i phyir yang 'jig rten du rjes su dran pa'i sgo byin gyis brlabs so/_/sems can thams cad 'jigs pa dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir/_rang gi [{]mying [,]ming [}]'khor lo yang 'jig rten du rnam par dmigs par byas so/_/dus ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro bas rnam par 
[\[71b.3\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad kyi rnam pa'i bye brag mtha' yas pa dang mnyam par nga'i lus kyang byin gyis brlabs so/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar nga ni thabs 'dis sems can thams cad 'jigs pa las yongs su bkrol cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams 
[\[71b.4\]]cad thob par bya ba'i phyir/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing phyir mi ldog par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa 'di thob par zad na/_des byang chub sems 
[\[71b.5\]]dpa' kun tu bzang po rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par dag pa/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa khong du chud par rtogs pa/_dge ba'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba rgyun mi gcod pa'i rgyud dang ldan 
[\[71b.6\]]pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyud la rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa/_bskal pa thams cad du gnas shing spyod pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/_dus gsum thams cad kyi tshul rjes su rtogs pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/_
[\[71b.7\]]'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi klong yongs su 'khyil ba'i rgyud la mkhas pa/_sems can thams cad kyi mi dge ba'i sems rnam par zhi bar byed pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/_sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i sems yongs su 'phel ba'i rgyud dang ldan pa/_
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i rgyud las phyir mi ldog par byed pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/_de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/_yon tan brjod par nus re skan/_de la 'di skad ces bya'o/_/g.yas phyogs bskor ba byas te gus par bkur bstod nas/_/
[\[72a.2\]]nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]shin tu dul ba lho phyogs rgyud du song /_/spyan ras gzigs dbang drang srong snying rje rnam spyod pa/_/rin chen ri'i sul na gnas par des kyang mthong /_/rin chen sna tshogs rdo rje'i ri yi sman ljongs na/_/pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la brtan par 'dug_
[\[72a.3\]]lha dang lha min klu dang srin po mi'am ci/_/rgyal ba'i sras kyis bskor cing de la chos kyang ston/_/mthong nas nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dga' ba tshad med skyes par gyur/_/bsnyen te yon tan rgya mtsho'i rkang la phyag 'tshal nas/_/ci nas bzang po'i spyod pa bdag gis thob 
[\[72a.4\]]'gyur bar/_/'phags pas thugs rje bskyed de gdams shing bslab par gsol/_/bsod nams brgya pas brgyan pa'i dri med lag brkyang ste/_/'od sprin dra ba rgya chen bzang po rab bton nas/_/nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]spyi bor bzhag ste sems can rnam 
[\[72a.5\]]dag pa/_/spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po mkhas pas tshig 'di smras/_/sangs rgyas sras bo nga ni rnam thar gcig sgo shes/_/ye shes snying po rgyal ba kun gyi thugs rje sdug_/'gro ba thams cad bskyab cing yongs su bsdu phyir byung /_/kun 
[\[72a.6\]]tu bdag nyid rang la byams pa bzhin du rgyu/_/'gro ba mang po thams cad sdug bsngal kun las skyob/_/gang rnams dam du bcings shing dgra lag phyin pa dang /_/lus la gzer cing de bzhin btson rar btsud pa yang /_/nga yi ming thos bcings 
[\[72a.7\]]shing bzung ba thar bar 'gyur/_/rgyal po dag la nyes pa'i g.yon byas gsad spangs pa/_/de tshe de dag nga yi ming yang dran gyur na/_/mda' 'phangs de yi lus la phog par mi 'gyur te/_/mtshon rnon btab kyang de dag mi 'dzug sgal bar 'gyur/_/
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]dbang po'i 'khor du phyin kyang gang rnams rtsod gyur pa/_/dgra rnams kun las rgyal 'gyur grags pa 'thob par 'gyur/_/grags dang grogs dang rigs dang nor rnams 'phel bar 'gyur/_/nga yi ming dran de dag thub pa med par 'gyur/_/gang gis nga yi ming ni rjes su dran 
[\[72b.2\]]byas pa/_/de dag rkun pos 'jigs dogs dgras 'jigs nags phyin te/_/seng ge dom gzig gcan zan g.yag rgod sbrul gang yang /_/dgra rnams kun las rgyal zhing 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/_/gang rnams la las nga yi ming zhig dran byas na/_/sdang ba'i 
[\[72b.3\]]sems kyis rin chen ltongasasu bor gyur tam/_/sol mdag lci me rab tu 'bar bar bor gyur kyang /_/me rnams pad mos gang ba'i chu yi gter du 'gyur/_/nga yi ming ni skad 'ga' yud tsam rjes dran na/_/rgya mtsho'i chur bor de yi nang du 'chi mi 'gyur/_/chu bos mi 
[\[72b.4\]]'khyer me yi dbus su tshig mi 'gyur/_/don med kun tu mi 'gyur don rnams 'grub par 'gyur/_/shing sgrog dbyig chings lcags sgrog de bzhin ltung rnams dang /_/brnyas shing khyad bsad de bzhin brid cing bslus pa dang /_/spyos shing bsdigs te gshe dang sma phab rnam pa 
[\[72b.5\]]las/_/nga yi ming tsam dran par byas na thar pa thob/_/gang rnams shar gnyer sna tshogs glags lta ji snyed dang /_/gang rnams rtag tu zhe sdang mi snyan brjod pa'i rnams/_/nga yi ming thos dran byas snyan par brjod par 'gyur/_/mthong ba tsam gis mod la byams pa'i sems kyang 
[\[72b.6\]]skye/_/nga yi ming tsam la la gang gis dran byas nas/_/gnod pa'i don du ro langs sngags dang byad byed pa'i/_/dgra rnams rtag tu de yi zil gyis non par 'gyur/_/ma lus dug gis de yi lus la mi tshugs so/_/la la gang gis nga yi ming tsam dran byas na/_/
[\[72b.7\]]klu dbang srin tshogs mkha' lding sha za thams cad dang /_/grul bum srul po 'tshe byed gtum po'i sems dang ldan/_/mdangs 'phrog 'jigs byed rmi lam 'ong ba'ang zhi bar 'gyur/_/nga yi ming ni skad cig yud tsam dran byas kyang /_/pha dang ma dang gnyen bshes 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]mdza' ba kun dang yang /_/'bral bar mi 'gyur sdang dang 'grogs par de bzhin min/_/nor zad mi 'gyur phongs pa'i dngos su mi 'gyur ro/_/nga yi ming gi rjes su la la dran byed na/_/'di nas shi 'phos mnar med sems dmyal mi 'gro ste/_/byol song skye 
[\[73a.2\]]gnas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mi khom gnas su min/_/sems can dag la lha dang mi yi gnas su skye/_/nga yi ming ni la la gang gis dran byas na/_/dmus long zhar ba 'on pa zha bor mi 'gyur te/_/'theng po long bar mi 'gyur gsal smra blta sdug 'gyur/_/bskal pa bye ba mang por dbang por 
[\[73a.3\]]kun ldan 'gyur/_/la la gang gis nga yi [{]mying [,]ming [}]ni rjes dran na/_/sems can dag pa 'di nas shi 'phos phyogs bcu yi/_/'jig rten khams su sangs rgyas mngon sum skye bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas mthong 'gyur de dag chos kyang thos par 'gyur/_/'di dang de bzhin 
[\[73a.4\]]gzhan dag thabs mang ji snyed kyis/_/'gro bar sems can nga 'dul gzhal dang zad mi nus/_/sangs rgyas sras po ngas ni rnam thar gcig bsgoms te/_/yon tan can gyi yon tan thams cad ngas mi shes/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba 
[\[73a.5\]]zhes bya ba shar phyogs nas nam mkha'i dbyings las 'ongs te/_mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor yug gi rtse mor 'dug go_/byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro bas/_mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor yug gi rtse mo la rkang pa gnyis 
[\[73a.6\]]bor ma thag du/_mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/_rin po che du ma'i rang bzhin du kun nas gnas par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro ba des/_nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od thams cad zil gyis non pa dang /_lha dang 
[\[73a.7\]]klu dang gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang /_brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten gyi mgon po dang /_me dang rin po che dang /_glog dang /_skar ma'i 'od kyang zil gyis non pa de lta bu'i 'od lus las 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]bkye ste/_sems can dmyal ba chen po dag kyang snang bar byas/_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thibs po thams cad kyang snang bar byas te/_ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyang de ma thag tu zhi'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi nyon 
[\[73b.2\]]mongs pa yang nyams su mi gnod par gyur to/_/mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyang rtse zil bar gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad du 'ang rin po che'i sprin gyi char phab ste/_me tog dang spos dang /_bdug pa dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' 
[\[73b.3\]]dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan gyi rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char yang mngon par phab ste/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ngo /_/de'i lus de'i gzugs brnyan ni sems can thams cad gnas su snang ba ste bsam 
[\[73b.4\]]pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par byed pa la mngon par gzhol bas/_ri gru 'dzin de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i drung du yang phyin par snang ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[73b.5\]]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir phyin pa mthong ngam/_smras pa 'phags pa mthong ngo /_/smras pa rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i gan du 
[\[73b.6\]]song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 
[\[73b.7\]]'tshal te/_byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la/_lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i drung nas song ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i ye shes kyi gting ma rnyed pa'i sems kyis spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po blta bas kyang ma ngoms bzhin du bsgo ba dang /_mi 'gal bar byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba gang na 
[\[74a.2\]]ba der song ste/_byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas mdun du 'dug ste/_thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/_ji ltar byang chub 
[\[74a.3\]]sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/_'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub 
[\[74a.4\]]sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/_/des smras pa rigs kyi bu nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba sgo kun tu 'gro ba thob pa'o/_/smras pa/_'phags pa khyod kyis de bzhin 
[\[74a.5\]]gshegs pa gang gi zhabs kyi drung nas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo kun tu 'gro ba zhes bya ba 'di brnyes/_'jig rten gyi khams de ni 'di nas ji srid cig na mchis/_'jig rten gyi khams de nas bzhud nas ni ji srid cig lags/_smras pa rigs kyi bu gnas 
[\[74a.6\]]'di ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgus kyang shes par dka' ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus mi ldog pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mi 
[\[74a.7\]]'phrogs pa'i yul te/_de ni rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma zin pa/_sangs rgyas kyis ma dgongs pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bstsags pa/_bsam pa yongs su ma dag pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po ma thob pa/_shes rab kyi mig dang mi 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]ldan pa rnams kyis thos ba 'am/_yongs su gzung ba'am/_yid ches pa'am/_khong du chud par bya bar mi nus so/_/smras pa/_sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gzungs kyis dad pa dang /_mos par bgyi na 'phags pas bdag la bka' mi stsal tam/_
[\[74b.2\]]des smras pa rigs kyi bu nga ni shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi snying po dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa dpal kun nas yang dag par 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas 'ongs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dpal kun nas yang dag par 'byung ba'i zhabs kyi drung 
[\[74b.3\]]nas ngas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgo kun tu 'gro ba 'di thob bo/_/rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi snying po dang ldan pa de nas nga song nas ni bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig 
[\[74b.4\]]'das te/_sems bskyed pa re re zhing yang gom pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig bor ro/_/gom pa re res kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin 
[\[74b.5\]]gshegs pa dang ldan par shes te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad la 'ang de bzhi gshegs pa'i mchod pa bla na med pa yid kyis rang bzhin chos nyid mngon par 'du ba ba med pa'i rgyas btab pa de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[74b.6\]]dga' ba yongs su bskyed pas mchod pa byas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ste/_de dag thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho yang khong du chud do/_/de dag thams cad kyi dbang po'i 'khor lo yang 
[\[74b.7\]]yongs su shes shing bsam pa dang /_mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs kyi lus yongs su bstan to/_/chos kyi dbyangs rab tu bsgrags so/_/'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su bkye'o/_/yo byad sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pas kyang nye bar bsdud do/_rang gi lus kyang de dag 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]la byin gyis brlabs te/_de ni yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba'i sbyor ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir ro/_/shar phyogs nas ji ltar 'ongs pa de bzhin du lho phyogs dang nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /_shar 
[\[75a.2\]]lho'i phyogs mtshams dang /_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /_'og dang steng gi phyogs nas kyang de bzhin te/_rigs kyi bu ngas ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba'i sgo kun tu 'gro ba zhes bya ba 'di shes par zad na/_ngas byang chub 
[\[75a.3\]]sems dpa' phyogs kun tu mngon par gzhol ba/_tha mi dad pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/_chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus rnam par bkod pa/_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang /_mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthun par spyod pa/_zhing thams cad 
[\[75a.4\]]lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/_chos thams cad kyi rgyud kyi rjes su song ba/_dus gsum gyi rgyud mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa/_chos phyogs kyi rgyud dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad du rnam par snang ba/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[75a.5\]]pa'i rgyud thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med pa/_chags pa med pa'i rgyud thams cad khong du chud pa/_gnas med pa'i rgyud la rab tu gnas pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/_yon tan brjod par nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer 
[\[75a.6\]]sgo dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na lha lha chen po zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]byang chub 
[\[75a.7\]]sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/_byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i drung 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]nas song ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya chen po'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i ye shes kyi spyod yul 'dod pa'i ngang tshul can mngon par shes pa chen po mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul la 
[\[75b.2\]]yon tan gyi khyad par du lta ba/_brtson 'grus brtan pa'i go cha rab tu dga' ba'i khyad par thob pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par rtse ba'i rjes su song ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa de byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi sa la ni nan tan du byed/_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[75b.3\]]gyi sa la ni rnam par dpyod/_gzungs kyis la ni rab tu gnas par byed/_smon lam gyi sa la ni 'jug par byed/_so so yang dag par rig pa'i sa la ni rjes su slob/_stobs kyis la ni yongs su bsgrub cing mthar gyis grong khyer sgo dang ldan pa gang na ba der song ste/_lha lha 
[\[75b.4\]]chen po kun du dris pa dang /_de la 'gro ba mang pos bstan pa/_rigs kyi bu 'de re/_lha lha chen po grong khyer gyi lam gyi bzhi mdo na bdag nyid shin tu che bas sems can rnams la chos ston cing 'dug go_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]lha lha chen po gang na ba der song ste/_
[\[75b.5\]]lha lha chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/_mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/_'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[75b.6\]]spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/_'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi 
[\[75b.7\]]ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/_/de nas lha lha chen pos lag pa bzhi phyogs bzhir brkyang ste/_rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las shin tu myur ba'i shugs kyis chu blangs te/_bdag gis gdong bkrus nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la gser gyi me tog gis gtor te 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni mthong bar shin tu dka' ste/_thos par yang rab tu dka'o/_/skyes bu mchog gi me tog pun da ri ka ni 'jig rten gyi phul du bya ba 
[\[76a.2\]]yin pas/_ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba yin te/_'jig rten gyi gnas su gyur pa'o/_/'gro ba'i rten du gyur pa'o/_/sems can rnams la snang ba chen po 'byin pa'o/_/lam rmongs pa rnams la lam bde ba ston pa'o/_/chos kyi tshul du gzung ba la mgon du gyur pa'o/_/
[\[76a.3\]]thams cad mkhyen pa'i grong khyer du phyin par bya ba la ded dpon chen por gyur pa ste/_de la kho bo 'di snyam du sems so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ming ni sems dri ma med pa rnams la rang gi lus kyi gzugs brnyan ston cing lus rnam par dag pa 
[\[76a.4\]]rnams la mngon par snang ba dang /_ngag gi nyes pa spangs pa rnams dbyangs kyi snang ba yongs su gdon par byed pa dang /_bsam pa dag pa rnams la dus thams cad du mngon sum du gyur par gnas pas/_lta ba ngan pa 'joms pa yin par bsams so/_/
[\[76a.5\]]rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sprin gyi dra ba thob pa'o/_/smras pa 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba'i sprin gyi dra ba de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/_de nas lha lha chen pos tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[76a.6\]]kyi mdun du ri chen po tsam gyi gser gyi phung po dang /_dngul gyi phung po dang /_bai DUr+ya'i phung po dang /_shel gyi phung po dang /_mu sa ra gal pa'i phung po dang /_a sma gar b+ha'i phung po dang /_nor bu rin po che ngang gis snang ba'i phung po dang /_nor bu 
[\[76a.7\]]rin po che dri ma med pa'i snying po'i phung po dang /_nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i phung po dang /_nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu mngon pa'i phung po dang /_gtsug gi nor bu rin po che dang /_cod pan gyi phung po dang /_nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyise mo do'i phung po 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]dang /_dpung rgyan gyi phung po dang /_rna cha'i rgyan gyi phung po dang /_gdub bu'i phung po dang /_ska rags kyi phung po dang /_rkang gdub kyi phung po dang /_mu tig dmar po'i dra ba'i phung po dang /_nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi phung po dang /_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad kyi rgyan gyi phung po dang /_nor bu rin po che yid 
[\[76b.2\]]bzhin gyi rgyal po'i phung po dang /_me tog thams cad dang /_spos thams cad dang /_bdug pa thams cad dang /_phreng ba thams cad dang /_byug pa thams cad dang /_phye ma thams cad dang /_gos thams cad dang /_gdugs thams cad dang /_rgyal mtshan thams cad dang /_
[\[76b.3\]]lha'i ba dan thams cad dang /_rol mo brdung ba thams cad dang /_rol mo dkrol ba thams cad dang /_'dod pa'i yul thams cad dang /_bu mo bye ba brgya stong grangs med pa dag kyang nye bar bstan nas/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor 
[\[76b.4\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di dag las khyer la/_sbyin pa mang po ni byin cig_/bsod nams mang po ni gyis shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod cig_/sems can mang po ni sbyin pas bsdu ba'i dngos pos yongs 
[\[76b.5\]]su bsdus te/_gtong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa la khod cig_/'jig rten ni sbyin pa la slobs shig_/gtang bar dga' ba yongs su gtang ba ni ston cig_/rigs kyi bu khyod la kho bos ji ltar yo byad kyi rnam pas bsdud pa 'di bzhin du sbyin pa'i bsam pa dang /_ma 
[\[76b.6\]]bral ba'i sems can tshad med pa dag gi bsam pa'i rgyud kyang gtong bas yongs su bsgo ba byed do/_/sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing /_bla na med pa yang 
[\[76b.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byed do/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang kho bo ni sems can 'dod pa'i dga' bas myos pa/_yul gyi longs spyod la yongs su chags pa rnams la yul de dag mi sdug par byin gyis rlob bo//
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]khro bas non pa dang nga rgyal can dang /_rgyags shing dregs pa dang /_rlom pa tshar gcod pas/_gdul ba rnams la ni gtum zhing srin po ltar mi sdug la 'jigs pa'i lus sha za zhing khrag 'thung ba'i tshul dang ldan par bstan te/_
[\[77a.2\]]rlom pa dang /_snyems pas 'khrug pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byed do/_/le lo can brtson 'grus bor ba'i sems can rnams la ni me dang /_chu dang /_rgyal po dang rkun po dang /_gnod pa'i 'jigs pa yongs su bstan cing skyo bar byas te/_brtson 
[\[77a.3\]]'grus rtsom pa la 'god par byed do/_/de ltar thabs de dang de dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi phyogs dang mi mthun par rab tu gzhom pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi tshogs bstsags pa dang /_sgrib pa'i ri'i g.yang sa'i lam thams cad las yang 
[\[77a.4\]]dag par bzla ba dang /_sgrib pa med pa'i chos la gzud pa'i phyir mi dge ba thams cad las rnam par bzlog ste/_dge ba thams cad phun sum tshogs pa la yang dag par 'god pa byed do/_/rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 
[\[77a.5\]]sprin gyi dra ba 'di shes par zad na/_kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po ltar nyon mongs pa'i lha ma yin rab tu 'joms pa/_chu ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi me'i phung po zhi bar byed pa/_me'i phung po ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi sred pa'i 
[\[77a.6\]]chu skems pa/_rlung ltar 'dzin pa'i mngon par chags pa thams cad kyi ri rnam par 'thor ba/_rdo rje ltar bdag gi 'du shes sra ba'i brag rab tu rnyil ba/_de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/_yon tan brjod par nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu 'dzam 
[\[77a.7\]]bu'i gling 'di nyid kyi yul ma ga d+ha'i snying po byang chub na sa'i lha mo brtan ma zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig_/
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]lha lha chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_lha lha chen po la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_yang dang yang bltas te/_lha lha chen po'i drung nas song ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon 
[\[77b.2\]]gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mthar gyis yul ma gad+ha'i snying po byang chub tu sa'i lha mo brtan ma gang na ba der song ba dang de 'gro ba'i tshe sa'i lha mo brgya stong phrag bcu gcig la gcig 'di skad ces 'dzer to/_/sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ba zhig ni 'di nas 
[\[77b.3\]]tshur 'ong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs 'dra la bar 'gyur ba zhig ni 'di nas tshur 'ong ngo /_/chos kyi rgyal po'i rigs su byung ba chags pa med cing dri ma med pa'i chos kyi rgyal po'i go 'phang dam 
[\[77b.4\]]pa 'thob par 'gyur ba zhig ni 'di nas tshur 'ong ngo /_/ye shes kyi mthu bo che rdo rje'i mtshon cha can dpa' bo phas kyi rgol ba'i 'khor thams cad rab tu 'dul ba zhig ni 'di nas tshur 'ong ngo zhes nas/_de'i mod la lha mo brtan ma la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa/_sa'i lha 
[\[77b.5\]]mo brgya stong phrag bcus sa chen po rab tu bskyod de/_'brug sgra zab mo lta bu'i sgra chen po grag par byas nas/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'od chen pos snang bar byas te/_lus rin po che'i rgyan dang /_lhab lhub thams cad 
[\[77b.6\]]kyis shin tu brgyan nas/_glog gi phreng ba'i tshogs nam mkha'i dbyings las 'gyu zhing snang ba lta bu sha stag du byas te/_shing thams cad kyi myu gu ni skye bar byed/_me tog gi shing thams cad ni kha 'bu bar byed/_chu klung gi rgyun thams cad ni 
[\[77b.7\]]'bab par byed/_mtsho dang mtshe'u dang lu ma thams cad ni rgyas par byed/_spos chu'i char pa ni rab tu 'bab par byed/_me tog gi sprin rab tu 'thor ba'i rlung chen po ni ldang bar byed/_sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni rab tu 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]sgra sgrog par byed/_lha rdzas kyi gzhal med khang dang rgyan gyi tshogs mang po ni rab tu 'khrol bar byed/_ba lang dang /_khyu mchog dang /_glang po dang /_stag dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi dbang po ni rab tu sgra 'byin par byed/_lha dang 
[\[78a.2\]]lha ma yin dang /_klu dang 'byung po'i dbang po rnams ni 'brug sgra 'byin par byed/_ri'i dbang po chen po rnams ni phan tshun thug par byed/_gter gyi tshogs bye ba brgya stong ni mngon du byung bar byed cing sa'i 'og nas 'thon to/_/de nas sa'i lha mo 
[\[78a.3\]]brtan mas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod 'dir 'ongs pa legs so/_/sa'i phyogs 'di ni sngon khyod kyi gnas su gyur te/_kho mo'i mngon sum du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin na/_de'i rnam 
[\[78a.4\]]par smyin pa'i phyogs 'ga' tsam blta bar 'dod dam/_de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_sa'i lha mo brtan ma la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_
[\[78a.5\]]sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma 'tshal lo/_/de nas sa'i lha mo brtan mas rkang pa'i mthil gyis sa chen po la brdabs te/_rin po che'i gter bye ba brgya stong grangs med pa rab tu brgyan 
[\[78a.6\]]pa bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu rin po che'i gter bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di dag kyang khyod kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/_/khyod kyi sngon du 'gro ba'o/_/khyod kyis ci dgar spyad pa'o/_/khyod kyi bsod nams kyi rnam par 
[\[78a.7\]]smin pa las byung ba'o/_/khyod kyi bsod nams kyi stobs kyis bsrungs pa'o/_/'di las long ste/_khyod kyis ci dgos pa de dag gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]ba'i snying po can thob pa ste/_de ltar kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'di dang ldan pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad tshun chad du byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su 'brang zhing /_rtag tu bsrung ba la zhugs pa ste/_de tshun chad 
[\[78b.2\]]du rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi spyod pa la rnam par spyod do/_/ye shes kyi yul la 'jug go_/smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor khong du chud par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa rjes su rtogs par byed 
[\[78b.3\]]do/_/ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi tshul gyi rjes su 'brang ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thams cad dang /_sems rgya chen pos rgyas par 'gengs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi stobs kyis dbang 
[\[78b.4\]]bsgyur ba dang /_zhing gi dra ba thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan pa yang dag par mnod pa dang /_dus thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yang dag par bstan pa dang /_chos kyi 
[\[78b.5\]]'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul thams cad dang /_mdo sde yang dag par brjod pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi tshul thams cad dang /_chos snang ba chen pos snang bar bya ba'i tshul dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba'i tshul dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rnam 
[\[78b.6\]]par 'phrul pa thams cad yang dag par bstan pa'i tshul yang rjes su rtogs par byed do/_/yang dag par 'dzin to/_/yang dag par nod do/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can 'di yang bskal pa 
[\[78b.7\]]ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol de'i yang pha rol cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar bskal pa snang bas rnam par brgyan pa la de bzhin gshegs pa spyan bzang po las thob ste/_rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo byang chub 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can 'di la yongs su dpyod dpyod/_rnam par dpyod dpyod/_shin du dpyod dpyod/_yang dag par 'phel bar byed byed de/_shin tu 
[\[79a.2\]]rgyas par byed byed pas/_bskal pa bzang po la thug gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang ma bral lo/_/de srid kyi bar gyis kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du 
[\[79a.3\]]med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig bsnyen bkur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yang mthong ste/_kho mo ni de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon sum 
[\[79a.4\]]du mthong ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can 'di shes par zad na/_kho mos byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zham ring du 'brang ba/_
[\[79a.5\]]sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi rjes su 'brang ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'jug par dka' ba la rab tu zhugs pa/_sems kyi skad cig gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i shugs dang ldan 
[\[79a.6\]]pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa dri ma med pa'i snying por gyur pa/_sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad rtag tu mngon par bsgrubs pa/_sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las 
[\[79a.7\]]tha mi dad pa'i pho nyar gyur pa/_de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/_yon tan brjod par nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid kyi yul ma ga d+ha zhes bya ba na grong khyer ser skya'i gnas zhes bya ba yod de/_de na mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_sa'i lha mo brtan ma 
[\[79b.2\]]la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/_sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i drung nas song ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i gdams ngag rjes su dran par byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying 
[\[79b.3\]]po can de rjes su dran par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa de rab tu goms par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi tshul de'i rjes su bsam pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par rtse ba de la rnam par dpyad pa dang /_byang chub 
[\[79b.4\]]sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes shin tu phra ba de la rnam par blta ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho de la 'jug par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes tha dad pa de la yid ches par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[79b.5\]]dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes shin tu sbyang ba de rjes su rtogs par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho de la 'bab par bya ba byed cing /_grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas gang na ba der phyin te/_grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas la g.yas phyogs su 
[\[79b.6\]]bskor nas/_shar phyogs logs kyi grong khyer gyi sgo nas song ste/_nyi ma nub nas ring po ma lon pa zhig tu grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i dbus shig na/_byang chub sems dpa'i gdams ngag mthun par len pa de mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang 
[\[79b.7\]]ldan pa mthong bar 'dod cing /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen yod na sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thob par 'gyur bar nges pa'i blo gros dang ldan pa/_ye shes kyi mig kun tu lta ba'i yul gyi rang bzhin gyi byin gyi rlabs dang ldan pa/_phyogs thams cad du mngon par 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]gzhol zhing /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la blta ba'i sems kyis mos pa dang /_ye shes chen po'i snying por gyur pa'i 'du shes kyi sems dang ldan pa/_dmigs pa thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa'i ye shes kyi mig dang 
[\[80a.2\]]ldan pa/_chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad du ye shes rgya mtsho 'byam klas pas rgyas par 'gengs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mig gis phyogs thams cad du shes bya'i rgya mtsho la rnam par lta ba/_ye shes chen po'i mig 'thob par bya ba la rab tu gzhol zhing bsam 
[\[80a.3\]]pa rtse gcig tu bzhag nas 'dug pa dang /_mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa de grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas kyi steng gi nam mkha'i dbyings las nor bu rin po che sna tshogs dpe med pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa zhig na/_rin po che'i seng ge'i khri chen po spos 
[\[80a.4\]]zhim po thams cad kyi pad+mo'i snying po can zhig la lus kyi mdog gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa/_skra 'jam zhing mang la mthon ting du 'dug pa/_mig dkar nag 'byes pa/_gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_lus rgyan dang lhab lhub 
[\[80a.5\]]thams cad kyis klubs shing brgyan pa/_kha dog bsgyur ba'i gos bgos pa tshangs pa'i gtsug tor gyi cod pan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa thogs pa lus la rgyu skar dang /_gza' dang skar chen dang /_skar ma'i tshogs thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan snang 
[\[80a.6\]]bar gyur ba 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/des sems can gyi khams yangs par mi khom pa dang /_ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba nas sems can ji snyed cig yongs su bgrol ba de dag thams cad kyang de'i ba spu'i sbubs su chud par mthong ngo /_/
[\[80a.7\]]ji snyed cig mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du bkod pa dang /_ji snyed cig nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smyin par byas pa/_de dag thams cad kyang de'i ba spu'i sbubs su chud par mthong ngo /_/lus mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]gzugs mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_kha dog mngon par bsgrub pa'i thabs sna tshogs kyis ji snyed cig yongs su smyin par byas pa de dag kyang de'i ba spu'i sbubs su chud par mthong ngo /_/nga ro mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_dbyangs kyi yan lag mngon par 
[\[80b.2\]]bsgrub pa dang /_skad kyi tshul sna tshogs yongs su sbyar ba ji snyed cig gis yongs su smyin par byas pa de dag kyang /_de'i ba spu'i sgo nas rjes su brjod pa thos so/_/dus mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can kyi rjes su 'brang 
[\[80b.3\]]bar bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[80b.4\]]dpa'i rnam par spyod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su lta ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par lta ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyes bu seng ge chen po'i rnam par bsgyings pa dang /_
[\[80b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas/_rnam par rtse ba ji snyed cig gis des sems can yongs su smyin par byas pa de dag kyang /_de'i ba spu'i sbubs su chud par mthong ngo /_/des thabs sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho de dag 
[\[80b.6\]]mthong zhing thos nas dga' rangs te mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/_mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa de la lus thams cad kyis phab nas phyag 'tshal te/_langs nas mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas 
[\[80b.7\]]phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa'i mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha mo bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de de ltar bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad 'byung bar yang dag par mthong pas/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi phyag tu bdag nyid bor ba lags na/_lha mo shul gang la brten na/_byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu'i sar 
[\[81a.2\]]'byung bar 'gyur ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i shul bdag la bshad du gsol/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pas/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod dge ba'i 
[\[81a.3\]]bshes gnyen kyi sbyin gyis non te/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen kyi tshig mnyan par 'dod pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams dag la nan tan du byed pa'i legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen 
[\[81a.4\]]gyi gdams ngag la nan tan du byed pas/_gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel 
[\[81a.5\]]ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo thob pa ste/_bsam pa mi mnyam pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/_/mi dge ba'i las kyi lam la zhugs pa rnams la snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa'o/_/dge 
[\[81a.6\]]ba'i las kyi lam la zhugs pa rnams la dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o/_/sems mnyam par dang mi mnyam par ldan pa'i sems can rnams la mi gnyis pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/_/kun nas nyon mongs ba rnams la rnam par byang 
[\[81a.7\]]ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o/_/nyam nga bar gyur pa rnams la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/_/dma' ba la mos pa rnams la yangs pa la mos pa yongs su bskyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/_/dbang po zhum pa rnams la brtson 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]'grus chen po'i shugs rnam par spel ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o/_/'khor ba la mngon par mos pa rnams la 'khor ba'i rgyud kyi 'khor lo las rnam par bzlog pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 
[\[81b.2\]]mngon par mos pa'i sems can rnams la/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam la dgod pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo de lta bu'i sems dang yid la bya bar ldan la/_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems 
[\[81b.3\]]can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di dang yang ldan pas sems can gang ji snyed cig mun nag smag tu gyur pa'i nam la mi ni nyal bar gyur/_'byung po'i tshogs ni rgyu bar 
[\[81b.4\]]gyur/_rkun chom mang pos ni rgyas par gyur/_sems can mi bsrun pa'i tshul can ni phyogs su rgyu bar gyur/_sprin stug po nag pos ni kun nas khebs par gyur/_dud pa dang rdul gyi tshogs kyis ni kun nas 'grigs par gyur/_rdzi char mi bzad 
[\[81b.5\]]pas ni rab tu gtags par gyur/_zla skar gyi tshogs ni mi snang bar gyur/_mig gis bya ba'i mthu ni med par gyur pa'i mun pa la sems can gang ji snyed cig rgya mtsho la spyod dam/_thang la spyod dam/_ri la spyod dam/_nags tshal gzhan na spyod 
[\[81b.6\]]dam/_yul gzhan na spyod dam/_grong gzhan na spyod dam/_phyogs gzhan na spyod dam/_phyogs mtshams gzhan na spyod dam/_lam gzhan na spyod kyang rung ste/_rgya mtsho la spyod spyod pa las gru bub par gyur pa'am/_thang la spyod spyod pa las nyam nyes pa 
[\[81b.7\]]'am/_ri la spyod spyod pa las g.yang sa chen por lhung bar gyur pa'am/_'brog dgon pa la spyod spyod pa las kha zas kyis 'phongs par gyur pa 'am/_nags tshal thibs por sba'i zad zing la thogs sam/_tshul ma yin pa'i nyam nyes 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]shig tu gyur tam/_yul gzhan na spyod spyod pa las chom pos bcom pa'am/_grong gzhan na spyod spyod pa las mi bsrun pa'i tshul can gyis gtses pa'am/_phyogs gzhan na spyod spyod pa las 'brog rmis pa'am/_phyogs 
[\[82a.2\]]mtshams gzhan na spyod spyod pa las mgo rmongs pa'am/_lam gzhan na spyod spyod pa las nye zhor gyur kyang rung ste/_rigs kyi bu kho mo ni sems can de dag la thabs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas skyabs su gyur par byed pa ste/_'di ltar rgya mtsho chen po la spyod 
[\[82a.3\]]pa rnams kyi rlung sprin nag po gtor ba dang /_chu'i rnyog pa gdang ba dang /_rlung mi zad pa'i dkyil 'khor bzlog pa dang /_rlabs kyi shugs chen po zhi bar bya ba dang /_glog gi 'jigs pa las thar bar bya ba dang /_phyogs bstan pa dang /_chu'i 
[\[82a.4\]]lam legs par dmigs pa dang /_'gram bstan pa dang /_rin po che'i gling du phyin par bya ba'i phyir lam yongs su bstan te/_yongs su sdud pa'i gzugs dang /_ded dpon gyi gzugs dang /_rta'i rgyal po rngog chen gyi gzugs 
[\[82a.5\]]dang /_glang po'i rgyal po'i gzugs dang /_ru sbal gyi rgyal po'i gzugs dang /_lha ma yin gyi rgyal po'i gzugs dang /_nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po'i gzugs dang /_mi'am ci'i rgyal po'i gzugs dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i rgyal po'i 
[\[82a.6\]]gzugs dang /_rgya mtsho'i lha'i gzugs dang /_mnyan pa'i gzugs kyis skyabs su gyur par byed do/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang 'di ltar sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad las yongs su bzlog pa'i phyir skyabs su gyur par 
[\[82a.7\]]shog shig ces yongs su bsngo'o/_/thang la spyod pa'i sems can mun pa chen po shin tu gnas pa'i nam la/_sa gzhi 'od mdang /_tsher ma dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mos gang ba/_sbrul gdug pa gtum po shin tu mang ba/_thag thug dang /_mi bde ba'i lam 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]can rdul dang phyar dar shin tu 'thul pa/_rdzi char drag pos gtags pa/_tsha ba dang /_grang ba'i sdug bsngal yod pa/_sbrul dang gcan zan gyis bag tsha ba yod pa/_thong mi dang /_chom po rgyu bar gyur pa zhig na/_mgo 'khor bar gyur 
[\[82b.2\]]pa'i sems can rnams la/_nyi ma'i gzugs dang /_zla ba'i gzugs dang /_skya reng 'char ba'i gzugs dang /_skar mda' chen po'i gzugs dang /_glog gi phreng ba 'byung ba'i gzugs dang /_rin po che'i 'od kyi gzugs dang /_
[\[82b.3\]]gza'i 'khor gyi gzugs dang /_rgyu skar dang skar ma'i tshogs kyi gzhal med khang gi 'od kyi gzugs dang /_lha'i gzugs dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis skyabs su gyur par byed do/_/sems kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 
[\[82b.4\]]nyon mongs pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par bsal ba'i phyir/_sems can thams cad kyi skyabs su shog shig par bskyed do/_/ri'i g.yang sa la spyod cing 'chi bas 'jigs skrag pa rnams srog dbyung ba dang /_grags pa 'dod pa'i 
[\[82b.5\]]dbang du gyur pa dang /_snyan pa dang /_sgra'i rgyal mtshan 'dod pa dang /_longs spyod tshol ba dang /_'dod pa'i zil gyis non pa dang /_yo byad yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa dang /_'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa 'dod cing brtson pa dang /_bu dang 
[\[82b.6\]]chung ma gtong mi phod pas thogs par gyur ba dang /_lta ba'i thibs por 'khyams pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_'jigs pa sna tshogs kyis gtses pa rnams la yang thabs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas skyabs su gyur bar byed de/_'di ltar ri'i 
[\[82b.7\]]phug dang /_bya skyibs mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_shing thog dang /_rtsa ba bzar rung ba mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_chu'i lam dang /_chu mig mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_tsha ba dang /_grang ba'i gnyen po mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]yang dag pa'i lam bstan pa dang /_ka la ping ka'i sgra skad bsgrag pa dang /_rma bya'i rgyal po'i skad 'byin pa'i dbyangs dang /_sman 'bar bas snang ba'i gzugs dang /_ri'i lha'i 'od kyi gzugs dang /_ri'i phug dang sul dang /_
[\[83a.2\]]ltongs su rlag ste/_sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa'i sems can rnams kyi mun pa'i rab rib rnam par bsal ba dang /_sa'i gzhi mnyam par mngon par bsgrub pas skyabs su gyur par byed de/_sems kyang ji ltar bdag gis sems can 
[\[83a.3\]]ri la spyod pa 'di dag yongs su bskyabs pa de bzhin du 'khor ba'i ri'i lam rgyud g.yang sa la gnas shing rga shi'i gdon gyis zin pa de dag gi skyabs su'ang bdag 'gyur bar shog shig par bskyed do/_/nags tshal thibs po'i dra bas thogs pa'i 
[\[83a.4\]]sems can mtshan mo mun pa'i mun nag gis chod de/_shing dang /_shing 'phran 'dzings pa'i gseb shin tu nyam nga ba dang /_chu dang /_rtswa dang /_spong po dang /_'khri shing gis lam chod pa dang /_shing dang shing phran sna tshogs kyi nags tshal thibs pa'i nang du phyin 
[\[83a.5\]]te/_stag gi sgra thos pas skrag pa'i snying can don ma grub pas/_sems 'khrugs par gyur pa dang /_'jigs pa dang 'tshe ba dang /_mi dga' ba sna tshogs kyis nyams mi bde ba nags tshal stug pa nas 'byung ba'i phyogs mi shes pa rnams la/_
