[\[83a.6\]]kho mo ni bde bar 'gro ba'i lam yongs su ston pa byed de/_sems kyang 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can lta ba'i thibs po sna tshogs la gnas pa/_sred pa'i dra bas 'khris par gyur pa/_'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses 
[\[83a.7\]]pa rnams sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su 'grel bar shog shig par bskyed do/_/'brog dgon pa la spyod pa'i sems can mun pa'i nang na 'thoms pa rnams kyang thabs kyi sgo sna tshogs kyis bde ba yongs su bskyed cing lam bstan te/_de dag 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]'jigs pa med pa dang /_bde ba la rab tu bkod nas/_sems kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa na 'thoms pa ngan song thams cad kyi lam du zhugs pa rnams sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su bkrol te shin tu 
[\[83b.2\]]phun sum tshogs pas/_bde ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam la rab tu dgod par bya bar shog shig par bskyed de/_rigs kyi bu yul dang ljongs la chags pa'i sems can mngon par chags pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar gyur pa 
[\[83b.3\]]rnams la'ang kho mo ni skyo bar bya ba'i thabs sna tshogs kyis yul la mngon par chags pa de las gyen du bskyod par byed de sems kyang 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad phung po la mngon par chags pa las gyen du bskyod de/_
[\[83b.4\]]gnas med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dgod par bya bar shog shig par bskyed do/_/rigs kyi bu kho mo ni grong na spyod pa'i sems can khyim dang gnas kyi 'ching bas glags pa rnams mtshan mo mun pa shin tu gnag pas chod pa'i nang na khyim 
[\[83b.5\]]gyi don sna tshogs nyams su gnod pas/_sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams kyang skyo bar 'gyur ba'i sgo sna tshogs kyis skyo bar byas te/_chags pa med pa'i sems yongs su bskyed nas/_chos kyi sbyin pas yongs su bzung ste/_tshim par 
[\[83b.6\]]byas nas rten pa med pa'i chos la bkod de/_sems kyang 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can skye mched drug gi grong la gnas pa rnams 'khor ba'i lam gyi rgyud kyi spyod yul las gyen du bskyod de/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye 
[\[83b.7\]]shes kyi spyod yul la dgod par bya bar shog shig par bskyed do/_/rigs kyi bu gang yang mtshan mo mun pa shin tu gnag pa'i nang na/_shar phyogs la sogs pa'i phyogs dang /_phyogs mtshams re rer phyogs bslad par gyur pa/_
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]sa'i phyogs mnyam pa la mi mnyam pa'i g.yang sar 'du shes pa dang /_sgang bu la gshong du 'du shes par gyur te/_phyogs kyi lam dang sa tshod la mgo 'khor bar gyur pa de dag la'ang kho mo ni thabs sna tshogs 
[\[84a.2\]]kyis snang bar byas te/_phyir 'byung ba rnams la ni sgo yongs su stonato/_/grol bar 'dod par rnams la ni mu stegs yongs su ston to/_/rgyal par 'dod pa rnams la ni gru yongs su ston to/_/khyim du 'gro bar 'dod pa rnams la ni khyim yongs su ston to/_/
[\[84a.3\]]rnam par blta bar 'dod pa rnams la ni phyogs yongs su ston to/_/sa gzhi mtho ba dang /_dma' ba yang yongs su ston to/_/sa'i phyogs mnyam pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang /_gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyang yongs su ston to/_/lam 
[\[84a.4\]]gyis dub pa rnams la grong dang grong khyer dang ljongs dang khams dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor kyang yongs su ston to/_/tsha ba dang skom pas mnar ba rnams la yang mtsho dang mtshe'u dang /_lu ma dang rdzing dang rdzing bu dang chu klung dang /_nags tshal 
[\[84a.5\]]dang bza' shing gi ra ba dang /_kun dga' yid du 'ong ba yongs su ston to/_/sdug pa dang bral zhing phrad par 'dod pa rnams la pha dang ma dang bu dang chung ma dang /_mdza' bo dang /_blon po dang /_gnyen bshes dang yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[84a.6\]]yongs su ston to/_/sems kyang ji ltar bdag gis sems can mtshan mo mun pa mun nag gis chod pa/_mig rab rib kyis nyams pa/_phyogs bslad pa/_lam 'khor ba rnams la gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir/_
[\[84a.7\]]snang ba bskyed de/_'od byas pa de bzhin du bdag gis yun ring po nas 'khor ba'i mun pa na gnas pa'i sems can yang dag pa nyid kyi phyogs la bslad pa ma rig pa'i mun par 'thoms pa ye shes kyi mig mi shes pa'i ling tog gis chod pa/_'du shes 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]dang /_sems dang lta bas byin ci log tu gyur pa/_mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa/_sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa/_bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa/_mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa/_bdag dang sems can dang /_
[\[84b.2\]]srog dang /_gso ba dang /_gang zag tu 'dzin pa dam po la gnas pa/_phung po dang khams dang skye mched la gnas pa/_rgyu dang 'bras bu la mgo 'khor ba/_mi dge ba'i las kyi lam gyi phyogs su zhugs pa/_srog gcod pa/_ma byin par len pa/_
[\[84b.3\]]'dod pas log par g.yem pa/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba/_phra ma zer ba/_ngag rtsub po 'byin pa/_tshig kyal ba smra ba/_chags sems dang ldan pa/_gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa/_log par lta ba can/_phar mi shes pa/_mar mi shes pa/_dge sbyong dang /_
[\[84b.4\]]bram zer mi shes pa/_dbang po mi shes pa/_skyes bu dam par mi shes pa/_chos ma yin pa la chags shing zhen pa/_mi tshul ba'i 'dod pas zil gyis non pa/_log pa'i chos kyis yongs su 'khris pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa la skur ba 'debs pa/_chos 
[\[84b.5\]]kyi 'khor lo nub par bya ba la zhugs pa/_bdud kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa/_byang chub sems dpa' la gnod par byed pa/_theg pa chen po la zhe sdang ba/_byang chub kyi sems la mos pa spong bar byed pa/_byang chub sems dpa' la mi snyan du rjod pa/_
[\[84b.6\]]snod ma skams par snying ring ba/_gnod pa ma byas par dgrar len pa/_'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa/_skyes bu dam pa ma yin pas/_spyod pa'i chos kyi spyod yul can/_mchod rten dang /_dge 'dun gyi dngos po la 'khu ba/_pha ma la log par sems pa/_mtshams 
[\[84b.7\]]med pa'i las byed pa/_g.yang sa chen po la mngon par ltas pa'i sems can rnams kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa shes rab kyi snang ba chen pos bsal te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul nas/_theg pa chen po kun tu bzang pos stobs 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]bcu'i ye shes kyi sa'i lam yongs su ston par gyur cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul rgya mtsho dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul dang /_
[\[85a.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi yul dang /_stobs bcu yongs su grub pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi gzungs kyi stobs dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku mchog tu gyur pa yongs su ston par shog shig_/yongs su bstan nas kyang /_sangs rgyas thams cad 
[\[85a.3\]]kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas la rab tu dgod par shog shig par bskyed do/_/rigs kyi bu kho mo ni sems can yun ring po nas na zhing nad kyis yongs su skyo ba/_lus nyam chung ba dang /_rgas pa/_rga ba'i zil gyis non pa dang /_mgon med 
[\[85a.4\]]pa dang /_phongs shing dbul ba dang /_log par ltung ba dang /_yul gzhan du phyin pa dang /_phyogs log par zhugs pa dang /_btson ra na 'dug pa dang /_chad pas bcad pa dang /_nyes pa byung ste/_rgyal pos gsad par bkri ba rnams kyang srog dang 
[\[85a.5\]]bral gyi 'jigs pa las yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir gnas so/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo ni sems can nad pa rnams kyi nad thams cad ni thabs thams cad kyis gso ba nan tan du byed do/_/rgas pa dang rga ba'i zil gyis non pa rnams la ni bsnyen 
[\[85a.6\]]bkur ba dang /_rim gro dang /_yo byad kyis mi phongs par yongs su bsdud pa byed do/_/mgon med pa'i sems can rnams la mgon byed do/_/phongs shing dbul ba rnams la ni nor dang /_gser gyi phung pos yongs su sdud do/_/log par 
[\[85a.7\]]ltung ba rnams ni don 'thun pas yongs su sdud do/_/yul gzhan du phyin pa rnams ni/_rang gi yul du phyin par byed do/_/phyogs log par zhugs pa rnams ni/_phyogs ma nor bar 'dzud do/_/
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]brtson ra na 'dug pa rnams ni brtson ra nas thar bar byed do/_/chad pas gcad pa ni chad pa'i sdug bsngal las grol bar byed do/_/nyes pa byung ste/_rgyal pos gsad par bkri ba rnams ni srog gi dbugs phyin pa thob par byed do/_/sems kyang 
[\[85b.2\]]bdag ji ltar sems can 'di dag 'jigs pa dang /_gnod pa sna tshogs las yongs su skyob cing /_mgon byed pa de bzhin du bdag gis 'di rnams bla na med pa'i chos kyi yongs su bsdu bas yongs su bsdus te/_nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs 
[\[85b.3\]]su dgrol bar bya'o/_/skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang /_'chi ba dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yang dag par bzla bar bya'o/_/ngan song dang log par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa 
[\[85b.4\]]thams cad las yongs su dgrol bar bya'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gzungs la rab tu dgod par bya'o/_/chos rin po che sbyin pa'i yongs su bsdu bas yongs su bsdu bar bya'o/_/kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las la rab tu dgod par bya'o/_/de bzhin 
[\[85b.5\]]gshegs pa'i sku rnam par dag la yang dag par bskul bar bya'o/_/rga shi yongs su med pa'i dbyings shin tu rtogs pa la rab tu dgod par bya bar bskyed do/_/rigs kyi bu kho mo ni sems can log pa'i lam la zhugs pa/_lta ba'i rnam pa thibs po sna tshogs la mngon 
[\[85b.6\]]par zhen pa/_log par lta ba'i spyod yul can lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las nyam nga bar 'gyur ba la yongs su spyod pa/_brtul zhugs dang dka' thub sna tshogs la gnas pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin yang /_yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[85b.7\]]pa'i sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa/_lus gdung ba dang /_yongs su gdung ba la rab tu brtson pa/_mtsho dang /_mtshe'u dang /_lu ma dang /_rdzing bu dang /_chu klung dang /_ri'i gzar dang /_phyogs dang phyogs mtshams la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal ba mos pa/_sdig pa'i 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]grogs po'i dbang du gyur brnams la yang thabs sna tshogs kyis mgon du gyur par byed de/_de dag sdig pa'i lta ba'i rnam pa dang /_ngan song thams cad kyi g.yang sar ltung ba'i lam las rnam par bzlog go_/'jig rten 
[\[86a.2\]]pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba la rab tu bkod cing /_lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa la'ang yongs su 'god do/_/sems kyang ji ltar bdag gis sems can 'di dag nyam nga ba'i nan tan dang /_sdug bsngal las yongs su bkrol ba de bzhin du bdag gis 
[\[86a.3\]]sems can thams cad kyang /_'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam la bkod de/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las phyir mi ldog par byas la kun tu bzang po'i smon lam chen pos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/_/
[\[86a.4\]]sems can gyi khams thams cad ma dul gyi bar du byang chub sems dpa'i sa las kyang mi g.yo bar bya bar bskyed do/_/de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pas de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i phyogs sems can thams cad 
[\[86a.5\]]kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di brnan te/_bstan par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la tshigs su bcad pa 'di 
[\[86a.6\]]dag smras so/_/gti mug ma rig mun nag bstsal don du/_/sems can phan phyir kho mo chos bstan te/_/dus la bsdad cing 'gro ba bde bar byas/_/'di ni rnam thar tshul mchog zhi ba yin/_/kho mos byams yangs shin tu spyad pa byas/_/
[\[86a.7\]]bskal pa mtha' yas sngon cad shin tu bsgoms/_/des ni 'jig rten rgyas bkang snang bar byas/_/nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]brtan pas tshul 'di shes par gyis/_/kho mo'i snying rje rgya mtsho tshad med de/_/'di las dus gsum rgyal ba 'jig rten 'byung /_/
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]des ni 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byed/_/nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]brtan pas tshul 'di shes par gyis/_'jig rten bde ba mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_/ma byas 'phags pa'i bde ba mngon bsgrub cing /_/des ni kho mo dga' mgu rangs par byed/_/rgyal sras khyod 
[\[86b.2\]]kyis tshul 'di shes bar gyis/_/sangs rgyas stobs rnams yongs su sbyong byed cing /_/nyan thos ye shes rnam thar 'bras bu dang /_/'dus byas skyon las rtag tu phyir phyogs kyis/_/rgyal sras khyod kyis tshul 'di shes par gyis/_/kho mo'i mig ni rgya che yongs su dag_
[\[86b.3\]]des ni phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams mang po mthong /_/zhing dbyings de dag kun gyi rang byung rnams/_/byang chub shing dbang drung na bzhugs pa mthong /_/sangs rgyas sku ni mtshan gyis yongs brgyan cing /_/'od bzang rnam pa sna tshogs kun 'gyed de/_/ba spu kun 
[\[86b.4\]]nas 'od gzer mang 'gyed pa'i/_/sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa kho mos mthong /_/zhing dbyings de dag kun gyi sems can rnams/_/shi 'pho skye ba'i sgor yang kun mthong ste/_/byis pa de dag 'gro rgyud rgya mtsho na/_/'khor zhing rang rang las kyang 
[\[86b.5\]]myong par byed/_/kho mo'i rna ba rgya mtsho rnam dag ste/_/der ni sgra rnams ma lus yongs su 'du/_/'gro ba kun kyi sgra skad rgya mtsho dag_/kun kyang thos nas dran pas yongs su 'dzin/_/dbyangs kyi yan lag sgra skad thams cad kyis/_/dpe zla med pa'i 
[\[86b.6\]]gsung ni rab brgyan te/_/des ni rgyal ba 'khor lo rab tu bskor/_/de dag kho mos thos shing dran pas 'dzin/_/kho mo'i sna yi mthu yang rnam dag ste/_/chos tshul rgya mtsho dag la thogs pa med/_/rnam thar gnas rnams kun tu rab 'jug pa'i/_/tshul 
[\[86b.7\]]'di rgyal sras khyod kyis shes par gyis/_/kho mo'i lce ni rgya che rab tu yangs/_/srab cing mdog dmar rin chen 'od du dag_/sems can bsam pa ji bzhin de shes byed/_/rgyal sras khyod kyis tshul 'di shes par gyis/_/kho mo'i chos lus shin tu 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]rnam dag ste/_/dus gsum kun tu 'od gsal rab tu gnas/_/gzugs lus sems can bsam pa ji bzhin te/_/de dag kun gyi dad pa'i dbang du mthong /_/kho mo'i sems ni chags med zag pa med/_/sgra 
[\[87a.2\]]dbyangs sprin gyi nga ro ji bzhin te/_/de yi khongs su mi mchog kun chud kyang /_/de la kho mo rnam par rtog pa med/_/zhing gi dbyings kyi sems can bsam mi khyab/_/de dag sems kyi rgya mtsho kho mos shes/_/de dag dbang po bsam pa rab shes kyang /_/
[\[87a.3\]]de la kho mo rnam par rtog pa med/_/kho mo'i rdzu 'phrul rab yangs shin tu grub/_/des ni bsam yas zhing yang rab tu bskyod/_/lus kyi 'od dang mthu yang de bzhin te/_/des ni sems can gdul dka' shin tu 'dul/_/kho mo'i bsod nams rnam yangs yongs su dag_/
[\[87a.4\]]kun tu rgyan byed zad pa med pa'i mdzod/_/des ni rgyal ba rnams la mchod pa byed/_/'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba'ang yin/_/kho mo'i shes rab rnam yangs shin tu dag_/des ni chos mang rgya mtsho rab tu shes/_/'gro ba kun gyi the tshom yongs su gcod/_/rgyal 
[\[87a.5\]]sras khyod kyis tshul 'di shes par gyis/_/dus gsum kun la kho mo zhugs gyur pas/_/sangs rgyas rgya mtsho kun kyang mthong zhing shes/_/de dag smon lam la yang rab tu zhugs/_/tshul 'di dpag yas rab tu rdzogs pa yin/_/rdul mang kun la zhing rnams 
[\[87a.6\]]rgya mtsho mthong /_/de dag dus gsum 'jug pa de bzhin te/_/de dag kun gyi sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong /_/'di ni kun tu gnas pa'i tshul gyis/_/rnam par snang mdzad byang chub sangs rgyas te/_/phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing rnams yongs bkang zhing /_/rdul 
[\[87a.7\]]sbubs kun gyi byang chub shing drung na/_/zhi ba'i chos rnams gsung du sgrog pa ltos/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha mo khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs nas/_
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]ji srid cig lags/_de ltar khyod tshul 'di lta bus sems can gyi don bgyi ba la sta gon du zhugs pa'i rnam par thar pa de ni khyod kyis brnyes nas ji srid cig lags/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 
[\[87b.2\]]'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i dus ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bskal pa'i yang /_pha rol cig tu bskal ba rab tu zhi ba'i 'od ces bya ba/_sangs rgyas bye ba phrag lnga brgya skyes pa byung ste/_de'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni rin chen 
[\[87b.3\]]dpal 'byung zhes bya bar gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams de'i gling bzhi pa 'bring po rin chen zla ba sgron ma'i 'od ces bya ba de na/_rgyal po'i gnas pad mo'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/_rgyal po'i gnas der rgyal po chos rab mu stegs zhes bya ba chos dang mthun pa'i 
[\[87b.4\]]rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba gling bzhi la dbang ba rin po che bdun dang ldan pa byung ste/_des sa chen po de yang ri dang rgya mtshor bcas pa'i mthas gtugs par chos kyis rgyas par byas nas/_bde bar gnas par byas so/_/rgyal po chos rab mu stegs de'i btsun mo 
[\[87b.5\]]chos kyi blo gros zla ba zhes bya ba byung ste/_de srod la 'dod pas myos shing dga' bar rtse rtse bas dub nas nam gyi gung la btsun mo'i 'khor gyi gnas su phyin te nyal lo/_/de nas rgyal po'i gnas pad mo'i 'od de'i shar phyogs kyi nags tshal chen po zhi ba'i dpal 'byung ba zhes bya bar rin 
[\[87b.6\]]po che'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad kyi 'od dang ldan pa'i lhun can/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba'i byang chub kyi shing chen po'i drung du/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[87b.7\]]chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/_de'i mthus 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen dpal 'byung ba thams cad 'od chen po kha dog tu ma can gyis rgyas shing sang bar gyur to/_/rgyal po'i gnas pad mo'i 'od ces bya ba de na mtshan mo'i lha mo zla ba shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]ba 'dug 'dug ste/_des rgyal po'i btsun mo chos kyi blo gros zla ba'i gan du song nas/_rgyan bkrol ba'i sgras sad par byas te/_'di skad ces smras so/_/'di ltar rgyal po'i btsun mo shes par gyis shig_/nags tshal chen po zhi ba'i dpal 
[\[88a.2\]]'byung bar de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so/_/de nas des rgyal po'i btsun mo de'i mdun du sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa dang /_
[\[88a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /_smon lam rgya cher bshad do/_/rigs kyi bu rgyal po'i btsun mo de 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis snang bar gyur te/_bsam pa thag pas bla na med pa 
[\[88a.4\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas/_des de bzhin gshegs pa de dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun du bcas pa la mchod pa dang /_rim gro cher byas so/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/_
[\[88a.5\]]de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po'i btsun mo chos kyi blo gros zla ba zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na ni/_de ltar mi blta ste/_kho mo ni de'i tshe de'i dus na/_rgyal po'i btsun mo chos kyi blo gros zla ba zhes bya bar gyur to/_rigs kyi bu kho mo ni mos 
[\[88a.6\]]ba'i sems bskyed pa de dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la bskyed ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/_bskal pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed tshun chad du nam yang ngan song log par ltung bar ma skyes te/_sems can dmyal bar ma yin no/_/byol song gi skye 
[\[88a.7\]]gnas su ma yin/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su ma yin no/_/nam yang rigs dma' bar ma skyes so/_/nam yang dbang po dang mi ldan par ma gyur to/_/nam yang sdug bsngal bar ma gyur te/_de ltar kho mos rtag par lha'i nang du lha'i bdag nyid che ba nyid thob/_
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]mi'i nang du ni/_mi'i bdag nyid che ba nyid thob ste/_'di ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang yang ma bral lo/_/dus ngan par yang ma skyes so/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mos sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu dge 
[\[88b.2\]]ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de bskal pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig tu lam bde zhing mnyam pa nas nye zho med par phyin kyang de tsam gyis kho mo'i byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po yongs su grub par ma gyur te/_ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bskal pa de dag ni 
[\[88b.3\]]'das/_bskal pa bzang po 'di'i snga rol gyi ni bskal pa chen po stong phrag bcu'i thog ma la bab pa de'i tshe/_'jig rten gyi khams gzi brjid rdul gyi dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya bar/_bskal pa mya ngan med cing /_rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba byung ste/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[88b.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams gzi brjid rdul gyi dri ma med pa'i dpal de ni/_kun nas nyon mongs la rnam par dag par gyur te/_der sangs rgyas lnga brgya byung ngo /_/sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de dag gi thog ma la de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_
[\[88b.5\]]'jig rten mkhyen pa/_bla na med pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_lha dang mi'i ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ri rab rgyal mtshan spyan yangs shing zhi ba'i dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe kho mo yang tshong dpon 
[\[88b.6\]]snyan pa rnam par grags pa'i bu mo shes rab snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba/_gzugs mdzes shing bzang la blta na sdug pa kha dog shin tu mdzes shing rgyas pa dang ldan pa zhig tu gyur te/_mtshan mo'i lha mo zla ba shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 'od 
[\[88b.7\]]ces bya ba de yang /_smon lam gyi dbang gis gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba'i rgyal po'i gnas rgyal mtshan sna tshogs su mtshan mo'i lha mo mig rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar gyur te/_des kho mo mtshan mo mi nyal tsam zhig na/_pha ma nyal 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]bar gyur pa dang /_khyim de yang yongs su bskyod de 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas rang gi gzugs bstan te/_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa brjod nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thog ma mngon par sangs rgyas nas/_
[\[89a.2\]]zhag bdun lon te/_snying po byang chub la bzhugs pa de bstanato/_/de nas kho mo pha ma dang gnyen bshes kyi tshogs chen po dang 'grogs te/_mtshan mo'i lha mo shin tu rnam par dag pa'i zla ba'i 'od sngon du bdar nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan sngar 
[\[89a.3\]]phyin to/_/de nas kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhal mthong ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba 'dul zhing sangs rgyas mthong bar byed pa zhes bya ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gyi dbyings ye 
[\[89a.4\]]shes kyis snang ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yang thob par gyur to/_/de thob pas kyang kho mos bskal pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag kyang rjes su dran par gyur to/_/kho mo'i byang chub kyi sems de yang mngon du gyur te/_de ltar kho mos 
[\[89a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa de las chos bstan pa thos te/_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di yang thob par gyur to/_/de thob pas kyang 'jig rten 
[\[89a.6\]]gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs te/_'jig rten gyi khams de dag de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i mig lam du snang zhing /_bdag nyid kyang de dag thams cad kyi 
[\[89a.7\]]zhabs kyi drung na 'dug par shes so/_/'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu sems can ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i mig lam du snang ste/_de dag gi sgra skad rnam pa tha dad pa'i brda yang rab tu shes so/_/sems dang bsam pa dang /_dbang po dang mos pa yang rab 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]tu shes so/_/sngon gyi mtha'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyi drung du yongs su smin par gyur pa'ang rab tu shes so/_/de dag la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par 'gyur ba'i lus kyang yongs su ston to/_/kho mo'i rnam par thar pa de yang sems kyi 
[\[89b.2\]]skad cig re re la rnam par 'phel te/_rnam par thar pa'i sems de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs so/_/de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[89b.3\]]zhing 'jig rten gyi khams stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs so/_/de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs so/_/de 
[\[89b.4\]]bzhin du sems kyi skad cig re re zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar dag kyang lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig 
[\[89b.5\]]bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i mig lam du snang ste/_bdag nyid kyang de dag gi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug par shes so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang len to/_/'dzin to/_/yongs 
[\[89b.6\]]su 'dzin to/_/nye bar 'dzin to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sngon gyi tshul rgya mtsho dang /_smon lam rgya mtsho la yang 'jug go_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa de dag thams cad kyang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[89b.7\]]yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/_mngon par sgrub bo/_/sems can ji snyed cig 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag du skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /_kho mo'i mig lam du snang ste/_sems can de dag gi bsam pa dang dbang po dang mos 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]pa'i bye brag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi bye brag du de dag yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba'i phyir lus byin gyis rlob ste/_de ltar kho mo'i rnam par thar pa de ni sems kyi skad cig re re la yang chos kyi dbyings 'byam klas pa 
[\[90a.2\]]rgyas par 'gengs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par 'phel lo/_/rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di shes par zad na/_kho mos byang chub 
[\[90a.3\]]sems dpa' mtha' dang dbus med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /_smon lam gyis byung ba/_chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i tshul 'byam klas par 'dal ba la 'jug par dbang sgyur ba/_byang chub sems dpas yang dag par 
[\[90a.4\]]bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes rdo rje'i dpal gyis rnam par rtse ba/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad yang dag par gzung ba la smon lam chen pos byung ba/_'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams 
[\[90a.5\]]cad sems kyi skad cig gcig gis yongs su dag par bya ba'i bsod nams kyi rgya mtsho chen po yongs su grub pa/_sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba'i ye shes la dbang bsgyur ba'i 'jig 
[\[90a.6\]]rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i ye shes kyi nyi ma'i mig dang ldan pa/_sems can gyi khams thams cad la theg pa chen po rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i mthu dang ldan pa/_'gro ba thams 
[\[90a.7\]]cad kyi the tsom dang /_nem nur dang /_yid gnyis kyi rab rib rnam par sel ba'i blo gros kyi zla ba dang ldan pa/_srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad la mngon par chags pa las gyen du bskyod pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/_chos kyi dbyings thams cad 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]kyis rdul gyi cha shas la rnam par 'phrul ba/_yongs su ston pa la dbang bsgyur ba/_dus gsum gyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la ye shes dbyer med pa/_de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/_yon tan brjod pa'am/_spyod yul la 'jug pa'am/_rnam par 
[\[90b.2\]]thar pas rnam par rtse ba yongs su bstan par nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu yul ma ga d+ha 'di nyid kyi snying po byang chub la kho mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed bskyed pa/_yang dang yang bskul bskul ba'i mtshan mo'i 
[\[90b.3\]]lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor 
[\[90b.4\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gyis/_mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/khyod sku shin tu rnam par dag pa mthong /_/mtshan gyis rnam brgyan ri bo ji bzhin du/_/'jig rten kun las mngon 
[\[90b.5\]]'phags 'jig rten du/_/phun sum tshogs sku 'jam dpal bzhin du mdzes/_/khyod kyi chos sku shin tu rnam dag ste/_/dus gsum kun tu mnyam zhing rnam mi rtog_/der ni 'jig rten ma lus kun 'dus te/_/'byung zhing rnam par 'jig kyang 
[\[90b.6\]]chags mi mnga'/_/lam rgyud 'byam klas thams cad kun tu yang /_/khyod kyi sku ni gzugs brnyan rnam par phye/_/skar chen zla skar rgyu skar tshogs la ji bzhin du/_/spu rtse kun la'ang khyod ni bdag gis mthong /_/khyod kyi thugs yangs shin tu rnam 
[\[90b.7\]]dag ste/_/phyogs rnams kun tu nam mkha'i dbyings su rgyas/_/der ni mi mchog kun kyang yongs su 'du/_/khyod la ye shes mi rtog dam pa mnga'/_/zhing gi rdul snyed rnam pa sna tshogs sprin/_/khyod kyi spu rtse kun nas mngon 'thon cing /_
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]rgyan [{]mangs [,]mang [}]sna tshogs char pa mngon 'bebs shing /_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhabs drung rgyas par 'gengs/_/'gro ba kun snyed lus rnams mtha' yas ba/_/khyod kyi spu rtse kun nas mngon 'thon cing /_/phyogs 
[\[91a.2\]]bcu'i 'jig rten rgyas par yongs bkang nas/_/sna tshogs thabs kyis sems can rnam par spyod/_/spu rtse kun la bsam yas zhing gi rnams/_/sna tshogs rgyan ldan rnam pa tha dad mthong /_/lam rgyud sems can khyod kyis rnam sbyangs pa/_/
[\[91a.3\]]ji snyed de dag bsams bzhin kun kyang byung /_/gang zhig khyod kyi mtshan thos dga' gyur pa/_/de dag thob bya legs thob legs par 'tsho/_/sems can gang gis khyod kyi sku mthong ba/_/byang chub lam la mngon du bltas par 'gyur/_/de ltar 
[\[91a.4\]]thos nas rab tu sems dga' la/_/mthong ba tsam gyis nyon mongs zhi mdzad pas/_/bskal pa bsam yas ngan song gnas kyang chung /_/khyod kyi zhal lta'i don du mos par bgyi/_/zhing rnams stong gi rdul snyed lus byas te/_/de snyed bskal 
[\[91a.5\]]pa brgyud de khyod 'dra ba'i/_/spu rtse gcig gi yon tan legs brjod kyang /_/legs pa'i mthar phyin nam du'ang mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis[,]bzang gis[}]/_mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon 
[\[91a.6\]]par bstod nas/_/mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_yang dang yang bltas te/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen 
[\[91a.7\]]la bsnyen bkur bya bas/_ma ngoms bzhin du mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa'i drung nas song ngo //_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po drug pa/_de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa thog ma byang chub tu zhugs pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa ni khong du chud par byed/_byang chub sems dpa'i snying po yang dag par 'byung ba la ni rjes su dpyod/_byang chub sems 
[\[91b.2\]]dpa'i smon lam rgya mtsho la ni yongs su 'jug_/byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam ni yongs su sbyong /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor ni yongs su gnon/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor ni rgya cher byed/_
[\[91b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba rgya mtsho ni rjes su 'brang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i snang ba chen po rgya mtsho la ni rnam par lta/_'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa la gzhol pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po'i sprin ni rgya cher byed/_
[\[91b.4\]]mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /_smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor ni zhing thams cad du phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis brlab pas mngon par sgrub cing /_mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 
[\[91b.5\]]'od gang na ba der song ste/_mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od la/_lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas 
[\[91b.6\]]nas/_mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi mdun du 'dug ste/_thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma bdag gis bla na med ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/_ji ltar byang chub 
[\[91b.7\]]sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i sa la spyod pa dang /_ji ltar 'byung ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal to/_/smras pa rigs kyi bu khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa la spyod 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]pa dang /_'byung ba dang yongs su 'grub pa 'dri ba legs so/_/legs so/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yongs su grub pa yin te/_bcu gang zhe 
[\[92a.2\]]na/_'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon du gyur par mthong ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa rnam par dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku mtshan sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnam par blta ba'i mig rnam par dag pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[92a.3\]]pa'i kha dog rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par bya ba la 'jug pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho tshad med pa la chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi tshad kyis 'jug pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[92a.4\]]kyi ba spu'i sgo nas 'od zer rgya mtsho sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa dang /_sems can sna tshogs kyi don du bkye ba la 'jug pa dang /_ba spu'i bu ga re re nas 'od 'phro ba rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog du 'dug pa rgya mtsho ston pa dang /_sems kyi skad 
[\[92a.5\]]cig re re la sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa rgya mtshos chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bkang zhing sems can 'dul ba'i byin gyi rlabs la 'jug pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sems can thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag dang 
[\[92a.6\]]ldan pas/_dus gsum du byung ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra sgrog pas/_mdo sde thams cad kyi sprin gyi 'brug sgra 'byin pa'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug pa dang /_
[\[92a.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bstan pas sems can 'dul ba la 'jug pa ste/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yongs su 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]grub pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/_bsam gtan zhi ba'i bde bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa thob pa ste/_rigs kyi bu kho mo ni de'i mthus/_dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs 
[\[92b.2\]]pa thams cad kyang mthong ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa la'ang 'jug go_/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dang /_ting nge 'dzin mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba rgya mtsho dang /_
[\[92b.3\]]sngon gyi tshul rgya mtsho dang /_mtshan rgya mtsho la 'ang 'jug go_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu 'khor ba rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad sna tshogs dang /_dbyangs 
[\[92b.4\]]kyi yan lag rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sku'ang 'jug ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la dngos por mngon par zhen pa'ang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig 
[\[92b.5\]]rten gyi khams thams cad du bzhud pa 'gags pa'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni bzhud pa med pa'o/_/rang bzhin gyis byung ba med pas na/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni byon pa med pa'o/_/mi skye ba'i chos nyid dang /_
[\[92b.6\]]mnyam pa'i sku mnga' ba'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni ma skyes pa'o/_/mi skye ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni ma 'gags pa'o/_/sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bur mthong zhing rnam par dmigs 
[\[92b.7\]]pa'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni mi bden pa ma yin pa'o/_/'gro ba thams cad kyi don du byung ba'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa ma yin pa'o/_/shi 'pho dang skye ba las rnam par 'das pa'i phyir/_de bzhin 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]gshegs pa de dag ni 'pho ba med pa'o/_/chos kyi rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa med pa'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni 'jig pa med pa'o/_/ngag gi lam thams cad las yongs su 'das 
[\[93a.2\]]pa'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad ni mtshan nyid gcig pa'o/_/chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi mthar thug pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni mtshan nyid mi mnga' ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu kho mo ni de ltar de bzhin 
[\[93a.3\]]gshegs pa thams cad khong du chud par byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gtan zhi ba'i bde bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor snang bas shin tu rgya cher byed do/_/
[\[93a.4\]]shin tu yangs par byed do/_/khong du chud par byed do/_/rtogs par byed do/_/mnyam par byed do/_/mngon par sgrub bo/_/gzhi snyoms par byed do/_/rab tu 'jug go/_rnam par 'phel bar byed do/_/nges par sems so/_/nye bar rtog go_/
[\[93a.5\]]dran par byed do/_/spyod yul du byed do/_/brtan par byed do/_/snang bar byed do/_/rab tu brjod do/_/rnam par dpyod do/_/rnam par 'byed do/_/tshogs su byed do/_/yid ches par byed do/_/yongs su rtog pa thams cad rgyu ba med pa'i snying rje chen po de la 
[\[93a.6\]]gnas te/_sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa la yang dag par spyad par sems rtse gcig tu bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan dang po sgom mo/_yid kyi las thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang /_ye shes kyi stobs dang /_mthus sems 
[\[93a.7\]]can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba la dga' ba'i bde ba la sems rtse gcig tu bya ba'i phyir/_bsam gtan gnyis pa sgom mo/_/'khor bar log par zhugs pa la btang snyoms su byas te/_sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs par 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]bya ba'i phyir/_bsam gtan gsum pa sgom mo/_/sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang /_sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan bzhi pa sgom mo/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu yongs par 
[\[93b.2\]]bya ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par rtse ba'i ye shes thams cad 
[\[93b.3\]]mngon par shes par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir/_sgo kun nas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi tshul yongs su sbyong zhing /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar 
[\[93b.4\]]ba bsam gtan zhi ba'i bde bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa 'di sgom mo/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo rnam par thar pa 'di sgom zhing thabs sna tshogs kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed de/_'di ltar nub mo zhi bar gyur pa'i tshe dga' ba la mos 
[\[93b.5\]]pa'i sems can rnams kyis mi sdug pa'i 'du shes skyed do/_/mi dga' ba'i 'du shes dang /_yongs su skyo ba'i 'du shes dang /_bgegs su 'gyur ba'i 'du shes dang /_'ching ba'i 'du shes dang /_srin mo'i 'du shes dang /_mi rtag pa'i 
[\[93b.6\]]'du shes dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang /_bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang /_rje med pa'i 'du shes dang /_gzhan la rag las pa'i 'du shes dang /_rga shi'i 'du shes dang /_'dod pa'i yul dang longs spyod thams 
[\[93b.7\]]cad la dga' ba med pa'i 'du shes skyed de/_sems can de dag kyang sems de la yongs su sgom pas/_'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad la/_mngon par dga' ba med pas chos la mos pa'i dga' ba la 'jug cing khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo /_/de dag 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]dgon pa la gnas pa'i tshe 'ang chos dang mthun pa'i dad pa yongs su skyed de/_sgra chen po 'jigs pa mi snyan pa'i sgra skad thams cad kyang zhi bar byed do/_/mtshan mo zhi bar gyur pa lhas sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo yang yang dag par 
[\[94a.2\]]ston to/_/spang ba dang 'thun pa'i rkyen yang nye bar ston to/_/khyim gyi sgo yang rnam par 'byed do/_/lam yang yongs su ston to/_/snang bas kyang mngon par byed do/_/mun pas chod pa yang rnam par sel to/_/'jigs pa'ang med par byed do/_/rab tu byung 
[\[94a.3\]]ba la yang yang dag par bsngags pa byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi legs pa'ang rjod do/_/chos kyi legs pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi legs pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi legs pa yang rjod do/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba la'ang bsngags 
[\[94a.4\]]ba byed do/_/rigs kyi bu kho mo rnam par thar pa 'di la sgom zhing sems can rnams kyi chos ma yin pa'i 'dod chags kyis zhen pa rnams kyi chos ma yin pa'i 'dod chags kyi yongs su rtog pa rnams kyang med par byed do/_/tshul ma yin pa'i 'dod pas non pa 
[\[94a.5\]]rnams dang /_log par yongs su rtog pa'i spyod yul can rnams kyi yongs su rtog pa de dag dang yid la bya ba de dag kyang med par byed do/_/sdig to mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skye ba dang /_sdig to'i yongs su rtog pa skyes par gyur pa rnams kyang med par 
[\[94a.6\]]'gyur ba'i rkyen nye bar sgrub bo/_/dge ba'i yongs su rtog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa dang /_spyod pa dang ldan pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su 'byung ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa dang ldan pa dang /_byams pa'i tshul dang ldan pa dang /_sems 
[\[94a.7\]]can rnams la snying rje chen pos rgyas par 'gengs pa dang ldan pa dang /_lha dang mi'i bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su bskyed pa dang /_ldan pa'i yongs su rtogs pa bskyed pa dang /_skyes nas kyang tshul sna tshogs kyi rkyen nye bar bsgrub par byed pa nas 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mthun pa'i rkyen kyang nye bar sgrub pa byed de/_rigs kyi bu kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gtan zhi ba'i bde bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa 'di shes par zad na/_kho mos byang chub sems 
[\[94b.2\]]dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /_smon lam gyis byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa mtha' yas pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rab tu thob pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis rnam par spel ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[94b.3\]]pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mthus sems kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul la gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_gnas thams cad du sgrib pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 
[\[94b.4\]]smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_zhing rgya mtsho thams cad du zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad mthong bar bya ba la zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 
[\[94b.5\]]chos kyi sprin gyi char yang dag par gzung ba'i sems dang ldan pa sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa rnam par sel ba/_'khor ba'i bde ba la dga' zhing sred pa zad cing mthar phyin par 'gyur ba'i lam gyis/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 
[\[94b.6\]]snang ba skyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/_yon tan brjod par nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu 'di nyid na nga dang yang rgyang mi ring ste/_rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po byang chub kyi g.yas rol cig na/_mtshan 
[\[94b.7\]]mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i las la brtson par bya ba dris shig_/de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gtan zhi ba'i bde bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa 'di nyid brnan te/_bstan par bya ba'i phyir/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la tshigs su 
[\[95a.2\]]bcad de smras pa/_dus rnams kun tu byung ba'i bde gshegs rnams/_/mngon du bya bar mos pa'i sems dang ldan/_/de dag mig yangs rnam par dag par 'gyur/_/des ni sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong bar 'ong /_/rgyal ba'i sku gsal 
[\[95a.3\]]dri ma med la ltos/_/mtshan gyis yongs su rgyan pas shin tu mdzes/_/rgyal ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa chos dbyings rnams/_skad cig re res rgyas 'gengs de la 'ang ltos/_/byang chub shing drung sangs rgyas gdan rab la/_/bde gshegs rnam 
[\[95a.4\]]par snang mdzad mngon sangs rgyas/_/chos dbyings yangs pa rgyas mdzad cing /_/'gro ba'i bsam pa ji bzhin 'khor lo bskor/_/rgyal bas chos nyid lus med rab zhi ba/_/gnyis med rang bzhin med pa thugs chud nas/_/gzugs sku 
[\[95a.5\]]bzang po mtshan gyis brgyan pa yis/_/'gro ba ma lus bkang zhing ston pa mdzad/_/sangs rgyas sku ni rgya che bsam mi khyab/_/chos kyi dbyings kun yongs su rgyas bkang zhing /_/de ni kun tu mnyam par snang ba ste/_/rgyal ba thams cad kun tu ston pa 
[\[95a.6\]]mdzad/_/zhing rnams kun gyi rdul rab phra ba snyed/_/'od kyi dkyil 'khor mnga' ba'i sangs rgyas sku/_/kha dog bzang po gzhan dang gzhan snang bas/_/chos dbyings rgyas par skad cig re res 'gengs/_/rgyal ba'i ba spu'i sgo nas 'od zer 
[\[95a.7\]]sprin/_/rgya che bsam yas mi zad mngon 'byung ba/_/de dag 'gro ba ma lus 'gengs byed cing /_/srog chags rnams kyi nyon mongs gdung ba sel/_/sangs rgyas sprul pa rgya mtsho mi zad pa/_/rgyal ba'i spu yi 'khor nas yongs ston cing /_/chos dbyings 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]yangs pa rgyas par kun bkang ste/_/srog chags rnams kyi sdug bsngal ngan song sel/_/sangs rgyas gsung snyan rab tu sgrog mdzad pa/_/dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho'i sgra 'od can/_/chos char chen po rab tu 'bebs pa mdzad/_/srog 
[\[95b.2\]]chags byang chub bsam pa yongs su skyed/_/bskal pa rgya mtsho spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_/'dis ni sngan cad yongs su gzung mdzad pa/_/de dag kun gyi rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad pa/_/zhing rnams kun tu gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid mthong /_/de bzhin 
[\[95b.3\]]gshegs pa 'jig rten kun tu 'byung /_/sems can re re kun la'ang mngon par bzhugs/_/mos pa'i tshul bzhin spyod yul gzhan dang gzhan/_/de dag kho mos kun tu shes mi nus/_/rgyal sras dam pa thams cad ma lus par/_/bde 
[\[95b.4\]]gshegs ba spu gcig gi rtse las 'byung /_/rnam thar de la gang rnams bsam yas pa/_/de dag thams cad kho mos shes mi nus/_/kho mo'i 'dab na gnas pa'i lha mo 'di/_/'jig rten mgon la mngon gyur rab tu dga'/_/ming du snang ba 'od 'phro mig 
[\[95b.5\]]ces bya/_/de la byang chub spyod pa ci 'dra dris/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od 
[\[95b.6\]]la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/_mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi drung nas song ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi 
[\[95b.7\]]byin gyis brlabs pa/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi/_tshig la nan tan du bya ba'i sems yang dag par skyes pa/_dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi sman pa la nad pa lta bu'i 'du shes kyis yongs su spyad pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_dge ba'i 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]bshes gnyen mthong ba yid la byed pa ma 'khrugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba la bsgribs pa'i ri thams cad rnam par gtor ba'i glags rnyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen 
[\[96a.2\]]mthong ba la sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i snying rje chen po'i tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa thob pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba la chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa'i sems dang ldan 
[\[96a.3\]]pa de/_mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]'gro bar rnam par snang ba gang na ba der song ngo /_/de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]'gro bar rnam par snang bas/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de 
[\[96a.4\]]bas kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs las byung bas yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba tshogs chen po las byung bar byin gyis brlabs so/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba 
[\[96a.5\]]rnam par gnon pa chen por byin gyis brlabs so/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba brtson 'grus kyi las 'jug par dka' bar byin gyis brlabs so/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba bsdad cing shin tu legs par byin gyis brlabs so/_/
[\[96a.6\]]dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba phyogs mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug par byin gyis brlabs so/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba yun ring por gnas pas byung bar byin gyis brlabs so/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba don mtha' 
[\[96a.7\]]yas pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs so/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba lam gyi rgyan mtha' dang dbus med pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su gnon par byin gyis brlabs so/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]ba sgo kun nas rnam par gnon pas byung bar byin gyis brlabs so/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba g.yo ba med par 'ong bas rnam par gnon par byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshogs 
[\[96b.2\]]kyi brtson 'grus la rab tu brtson pas/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang smon lam chen po rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrub pa'i rnam par gnon pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang /_sems can gcig gi don du phyi ma'i mtha'i 
[\[96b.3\]]bskal pa'i mur thug par sdug bsngal nyams su blang ba'i zhe non pas/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang /_rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la chos kyi dbyings thams cad du sgra sgrog cing yun ring por gnas pa'i rnam par gnon pa dang /_brtson 'grus 
[\[96b.4\]]chen po'i go bgos pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang /_phyogs rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa thams cad du shugs kyis 'gro bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang /_ba spu'i sbubs gcig tu phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par byang chub sems 
[\[96b.5\]]dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pas/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas nas kyang sems kyi skad cig re re la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'gengs pa la gnas par bya bas/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung 
[\[96b.6\]]du 'gro ba dang /_dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan dang /_lam yongs su gnon par zhe non pas/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i lam yongs 
[\[96b.7\]]su gnas pas/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad la dmigs pa las ma g.yos par/_chos kyi dbyings kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro bas mtshan mo'i lha mo 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba gang na ba der phyin pa dang /_des mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba/_bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na seng ge'i khri me tog gi snying 
[\[97a.2\]]po can la 'dug cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba yangs shing dri ma med pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan la/_mnyam par bzhag pa mthong ngo /_/de'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sbyin pa la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]
[\[97a.3\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa mngon par ston pa'i sprin sems can thams cad/_mngon par dga' ba/_sems can thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba/_sems can thams cad kyis blta na nyams su bde ba/_sems can thams cad 
[\[97a.4\]]kyis blta na sdug pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba yang mthong ste/_'di ltar sems can thams cad la phan gdags shing rtsod pa med par bya ba dang /_dngos po thams cad la phangs par rtsi ba med par bya ba dang /_sems can thams 
[\[97a.5\]]cad la sbyor ba mtshungs pas yongs su gtang bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems su bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad la brnyas pa med par yongs su gtang ba dang /_nang dang phyi'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtang ba dang 
[\[97a.6\]]dga' ba chen po yongs su gtang bar bstan pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad du sems can gyi bsam pa ji bzhin gyi sbyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan par bya ba'i phyir/_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs 
[\[97a.7\]]pa dang mthun pa'i sgras sbyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su ston pa'i sprin dang /_dus gsum du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams gtang bar dka' ba yongs su gtong ba'i sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sprin 'thon nas/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]rten gyi khams 'byam klas par gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par gyur pa mthong ngo /_/'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi_/mthu phyung ba dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob pas/_
[\[97b.2\]]ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas/_sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa'i skye ba sna tshogs su sprul pa'i lus kyi sprin mngon par 'thon te/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/_gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad la rgyas par khyab par byas 
[\[97b.3\]]nas/_mngon sum du brtul zhugs thams cad kyi yid dam las mi g.yo bar yongs su bstan pa dang /_sems can gyi khams dang mnyam pa'i dka' thub dang /_brtul zhugs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs rab tu ston pa dang /_'jig rten 
[\[97b.4\]]thams cad du gnas pa med pa dang /_yul thams cad la ltos pa med pa dang /_'khor ba thams cad du gnas pa las phyir phyogs pa dang /_lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa rgud pa'i sgor gzhol ba yongs su ston pa dang /_mi sdug pa'i dkyil 'khor rab 
[\[97b.5\]]tu ston pa dang /_'jig rten gyi sdug pa'i 'du shes kyis phyin ci log rnam par bzlog pa dang /_mi rtag pa dang /_g.yo ba dang /_'jig pa dang /_'gyur ba'i chos nyid yongs su ston pa dang /_'du byed thams cad kyi chos nyid sdug bsngal 
[\[97b.6\]]zhing bdag med pa yongs su ston pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la gnas pa dang /_mi 'bral bar mos par byed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims shin tu dag par bya ba'i phyir/_sems can rnams la yang 
[\[97b.7\]]dag par bskul ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi sgras tshul khrims kyi spyod pa yongs su ston pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po yongs su ston pa byed cing /_
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo /_/ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa'i lus kha dog sna tshogs su sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te/_yan lag dang nying lag thams 
[\[98a.2\]]cad kyang nyams su bzod pa sems can thams cad la yongs su ston pa/_sems can thams cad kyis lus la gnod par tho brtsams kyang nyams su bzod par byed pa dang sems can thams cad kyi tshul dang mi 'dra ba'i tshig gis 
[\[98a.3\]]spyo ba dang /_brgyad pa dang /_smad pa dang /_bskyung ba dang /_brdeg pa dang /_bsdigs pa nyams su bzod par byed pa yongs su ston pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyis mi sgul ba yongs su ston pa dang /_rim gror byas pa dang /_rim gror ma byas pa thams 
[\[98a.4\]]cad kyis mtho ba dang dma' bar mi 'gyur ba yongs su ston pa dang /_sems can thams cad la nga rgyal med pa yongs su ston pa dang /_chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la bzod pa mi zad pas ye shes mi zad pa yongs su ston pa dang /_sems can 
[\[98a.5\]]thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir bzod pa'i spyod pa yongs su ston pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi lus dbyibs mi sdug cing /_kha dog mi mdzes pa'i gzugs rnam par zlog pa byed pa dang /_sems can 
[\[98a.6\]]thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog rnam par dag pa bla na med pa yongs su ston cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo /_/ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa'i skye ba sna tshogs kyi lus kha dog 
[\[98a.7\]]dang dbyibs dang /_chu zhengasna tshogs su sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te/_sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par khyab par byas nas/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs chen po la brtson 'grus kyis sngon du 'dor ba/_yang dag 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]par ston pa dang /_bdud kyi dkrugs ma thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i brtson 'grus dang /_byang chub tu brtsams pa mi 'khrugs mi zlogs pa'i brtson 'grus dang /_sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rab tu bsgral ba'i brtson 'grus 
[\[98b.2\]]dang mi khom pa dang ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba'i lam thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i brtson 'grus dang /_mi shes pa'i ri rnam par gtor ba'i brtson 'grus dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur 
[\[98b.3\]]bas yongs su mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par blang ba dang /_yongs su bzung ba'i brtson 'grus dang /_sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rab tu gzhom zhing rnam par gtor ba'i brtson 'grus dang /_
[\[98b.4\]]sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul bas mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i brtson 'grus dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa bla na 
[\[98b.5\]]med pa yongs su ston cing /_sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo /_/ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas lus sna tshogs kha dog dang dbyibs rnam pa tha dad par sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te/_thabs sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams kyi dga' 
[\[98b.6\]]ba yongs su bskyed pa dang /_yid bde ba rnam par zlog pa dang /_'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad rnam par smod pa dang /_ngo tsha shes pa'i chos nyid 'jig rten du sgrog pa dang /_dbang po bsdams pa la sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa dang /_
[\[98b.7\]]tshangs pa'i spyod pa bla na med pa yang dag par bsngags pa byed pa dang /_'dod pa'i 'jig rten bdud kyi yul 'jig pa dang bcas par yongs su ston pa dang /_'dod pa'i dga' ba dang bral ba rnams la 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa dang /_dga' ba'i yul 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]thams cad yongs su ston pa dang /_chos la mos shing dga' ba la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang /_mthar gyis bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgo mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_sems 
[\[99a.2\]]can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par gsal ba la nges par rtogs pa'i sems yongs su rjod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongs su ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[99a.3\]]mngon par shes pa dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yongs su ston pa byed cing /_sems can rnams kyi dga' ba yongs su bskyed pa dang /_spro ba 'phel bar bya ba dang /_nyams bde ba yongs su bskyed pa dang /_yid 
[\[99a.4\]]mi bde ba bzlog pa dang /_sems skyon med pa yongs su bsgrub pa dang /_sems can las su rung bar bya ba dang /_bsam pa rnam par sbyang ba dang /_dbang po gsal bar bya ba dang /_lus kyi bde ba yongs su bskyed pa dang /_chos la dga' ba'i 
[\[99a.5\]]shugs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba byed cing /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo /_/ba spu'i sga thams cad nas/_skye ba thams cad dang 'dra ba'i lus kyi sprin sna tshogs 'thon te/_zhing thams cad kyi khongs su chud pa'i sems 
[\[99a.6\]]can thams cad kyi yid bzhin du bstan pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gan du 'gro bas skyo ba med pa yongs su ston pa dang /_slob dpon dang /_bla ma dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gror bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bas skyo ba med pa 
[\[99a.7\]]yongs su ston pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba yang dag par blang zhing yongs su bzung bas skyo ba med pa'i brtson 'grus yongs su ston pa dang /_sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i tshul yang 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]dag par brjod pa dang /_chos kyi sgo rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par 'byed pa dang /_chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dang rang bzhin dang tshul mngon par brjod pa dang /_chos thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyi sgor yongs su ston pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi 
[\[99b.2\]]dri ba dang the tsom rgya mtsho rnam par sel bas shes rab kyi yul yongs su ston pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi lta ba'i ri shin tu 'joms pa'i shes rab rdo rje yongs su ston pa dang /_sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pas/_sems can thams cad 
[\[99b.3\]]kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa rnam par sel ba'i shes rab kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba yongs su ston pa byed cing /_sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba yongs su skye bar bya bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo /_/ba spu'i sgo thams cad 
[\[99b.4\]]nas kha dog dang dbyibs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lus mang po 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam pa'i sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad la mngon du gnas shing /_sgra skad sna tshogs kyis yongs su sbyang ba'i bstan pas 'jig 
[\[99b.5\]]rten pa'i bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa mngon par ston pa dang /_'jig rten pa'i bya ba thams cad rab tu rgyu ba dang khams gsum pa 'byung ba thams cad yongs su bstan pa dang /_khams gsum pa thams cad las 'byung ba'i phyogs yang dag par brjod pa dang /_lta 
[\[99b.6\]]ba'i mya ngan mi bzad pa thams cad las 'byung ba'i phyogs yang dag par bstan pas/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam gyi khyad par yongs su brjod pa dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i lam las yongs su bzla ba yang dag par ston pa 
[\[99b.7\]]dang /_rim gror byas pa dang /_rim gror ma byas pa la byams sdang gis gos pa med par yongs su ston pa dang /_'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo la mi gnas pa yang dag par ston pa dang /_dga' ldan gyi gnas la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa gcig nas 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]gcig tu rgyu ba rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa dang /_snying po byang chub tu song zhing mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa byed cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems can yongs su smin par byed 
[\[100a.2\]]pa mthong ngo /_/ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lus sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te/_sems can gyi 'jig rten thams cad la mngon sum du gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' kun tu 
[\[100a.3\]]bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam yongs su brjod pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings thams cad rnam par dag pa'i mthar thug pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par yongs su brjod pa dang /_sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su 
[\[100a.4\]]dag par bya ba yongs su brjod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod cing rim gror bya ba rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su brjod pa dang /_sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs 
[\[100a.5\]]su ston pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa dang /_zhing thams cad du phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par gnas shing /_thams 
[\[100a.6\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam rnam par dag par bya ba yongs su brjod pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yang dag par ston pa dang /_sems kyi skad cig re re la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yang dag par brjod pa dang /_dus gsum 
[\[100a.7\]]gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa dang /_zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su bstan pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yang dag par ston pa byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang /_spyod 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]pa yongs su bstan pas sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu 'god pa mthong ngo /_/ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang mnyam pa'i lus kyi sprul pa'i sprin mang po 'thon te/_sems can 
[\[100b.2\]]thams cad la mngon par gnas shing /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs kyi stobs mu med pa yongs su ston pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems kyi stobs mi zad pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_chud mi za ba'i chos can yongs su ston pa dang /_
[\[100b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su sgrub pa'i stobs phyir mi ldog cing phyir mi zlog thub pa med pa dang /_rgyun med pa dang /_bla na med pa yongs su ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs 'khor ba'i nyes pa thams cad kyis mi gos pa yongs su ston pa dang /_
[\[100b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dri mas nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa yongs su ston pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[100b.5\]]rnams kyi stobs las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rnam pa 'thor ba yongs su ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje chen po'i stobs bskal pa thams cad du gnas kyang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas skyob med pa yongs su ston 
[\[100b.6\]]pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su bskyod cing bskul bas/_sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar byed pa yongs su ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs bdud dang /_
[\[100b.7\]]phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad rab tu 'josam pa yongs su ston pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i ye shes kyi stobs chen po 'jig rten du rab tu brjod pa byed cing sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo /_/
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang lus kyi sprul pa rgya mtsho kha dog mtha' yas pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang mnyam pa'i sprin phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i sems can gyi khams su rgyas par 'gengs pa 'thon te/_sems can rnams kyi bsam 
[\[101a.2\]]pa dang /_mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /_ye shes kyi rnam par gnon pa yongs su ston pa dang /_sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa 
[\[101a.3\]]dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho yongs su shes pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba'i dus las mi 'da' ba'i ye shes yongs su 
[\[101a.4\]]ston pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings thams cad du grags par sgrog pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang /_sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad du ye shes kyi tshul rgya mtshos rgyas par 'gengs ba'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang /_
[\[101a.5\]]'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad 'du ba dang /_'jig pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gzhi dang dbyibs dang /_rgyan rnam par dgod pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang /_de bzhin 
[\[101a.6\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa rnam par sprul te/_spyan sngar phyin nas/_mchod cing rim gror byed pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin yang dag par 'dzin pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa byed cing /_de ltar ye shes 
[\[101a.7\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su ston pas sems can rnams kyi dga' bskyed pa dang /_sems rab tu dang bar byed pa dang /_rab tu dga' ba skyed pa dang /_mos pa 'phel bar byed pa dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par zlog pa dang /_sems 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]rnam par spyod pa dang /_sems skyon med par skye bar byed pa dang /_dbang po gsal bar byed pa dang /_mos pa'i stobs yongs su skyed pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las phyir mi ldog par byed pa mthong ngo /_/pha rol tu 
[\[101b.2\]]phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pas 'jig rten du ci ltar sems can yongs su smin par gyur pa mthong ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i tshul gyis mtshan mo'i lha mor rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'phro bar rnam par snang 
[\[101b.3\]]ba'i thog ma sems bskyed pa'i tshogs dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur ba'i thabs dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du phyin cing mchod pa dang /_rim gro byas pa'i tshul dang /_dge ba'i chos spyad pa'i thabs ji snyed 
[\[101b.4\]]pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pas gtang bar dka' ba yongs su gtong ba dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang ba'i thabs dang /_rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po dang /_'khor mang po dang /_longs spyod kyi dbang chen 
[\[101b.5\]]po yongs su btang ste/_mngon par 'byung ba'i thabs ji snyed pa dang /_'jig rten gyi dka' ba'i spyod pa brtul zhugs dang dka' thub chen po'i dkyil 'khor la bzod pa mngon par bsgrubs pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i brtul 
[\[101b.6\]]zhugs yang dag par blang ba'i sbyor ba la mi g.yo bar bya ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i yi dam brtan pa'i chos rgya mtsho sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi nyes byas dang /_ngan du smra ba dang /_nyes par spyod pa thams cad 
[\[101b.7\]]bag la zha bar byed pa'i sbyor ba dang /_lus dang sems kyi gnod pa nyams su bzod par byed pa'i sbyor ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i chos nyid la bzod pa dang /_chos thams cad la yid ches pa'i bzod pa dang chos thams cad 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa'i bzod pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rtsom zhing sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus ji 
[\[102a.2\]]snyed cig yod pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa ji snyed pa thams cad dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya ba dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[102a.3\]]pa'i bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa'i spyod pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pas/_rnam par 'phrul ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rgya mtsho la 'jug pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_bsam gtan 
[\[102a.4\]]gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa ji snyed pa thams cad dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs ji snyed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab chen po'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par sbyang ba'i tshul ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_shes rab chen 
[\[102a.5\]]po'i sprin yongs su 'du ba'i tshul ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_shes rab kyi gter chen po'i tshogs ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_shes rab kyi rgya mtsho chen po la rnam par dpyad pa'i tshul dang /_sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang /_thabs chen po la 
[\[102a.6\]]mkhas pa'i tshul gyi sbyor ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_thabs chen po la mkhas pa yongs su dag bar bya ba dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i lus ji snyed cig yod pa dang 
[\[102a.7\]]smon lam chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su grub pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_smon lam chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_smon lam chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi/_sbyor ba ji snyed pa 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]thams cad dang /_stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par bya ba'i tshogs chen po ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rkyen du gyur pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rgya mtsho chen po ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_
[\[102b.2\]]stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bstan pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang /_ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sbyor ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[102b.3\]]rnam par dag pa'i tshul ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byam klas pa ji snyed cig 
[\[102b.4\]]yod pa dang /_ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rnam par dmigs par bya ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byam klas pa'i rjes 
[\[102b.5\]]su 'brang bar bya ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rgyas par 'gengs pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya chen po ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i lhun ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_
[\[102b.6\]]ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'grub par bya ba dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang /_ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa'i rnam par rab tu phye ba la 'jug pa 'byung ba yongs su bsgrub pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_ye shes kyi 
[\[102b.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i chos rnams dang /_chos yongs su bsdu ba dang /_chos kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_las kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_zhing gi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]dang /_bskal pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_dus kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_byang chub 
[\[103a.2\]]sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sems yongs su 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba'i 
[\[103a.3\]]ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_
[\[103a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnam par 'byed pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos rgya mtsho'i tshul gyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos gang chen mtsho'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_
[\[103a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi rgyud kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi gter gyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi lugs kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_
[\[103a.6\]]mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' dang dbus med pa'i dmigs pa can de dag thams cad de'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas mngon par 'thon te/_sems 
[\[103a.7\]]can gyi lus kyi sprin kha dog sna tshogs can du mngon par mchod cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo /_/'di lta ste/_'og min dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_ma dros pa dang /_mi che ba'i gtsang ma'i gnas kyi lha lta bu'i lus 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing /_sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du 'bras bu che ba dang /_bsod nams 'phel ba dang /_sprin dang bral ba'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed 
[\[103b.2\]]pa mthong ngo /_/dge rgyas dang tshad med dge ba dang /_dge ba chung ba'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing /_sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo /_/kun snang dang ba dang /_tshad med snang ba dang /_snang ba chung ngu'i lha lta bu'i 
[\[103b.3\]]lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing /_sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo /_/tshangs chen dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun ris kyi lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing /_sems can yongs su smin par byed 
[\[103b.4\]]pa mthong ngo /_/dbang sgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po lha mo'i tshogs dang lha'i bu dang bcas pa lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo /_/lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' lha mo'i tshogs dang /_lha'i 
[\[103b.5\]]bu dang bcas pa lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo /_/rab dga' ldan gyi lha'i rgyal po lha mo'i tshogs dang lha'i bu dang bcas pa lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing /_sems 
[\[103b.6\]]can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo /_/rab mtshe ma'i lha'i rgyal po lha mo'i tshogs dang lha'i bu dang bcas pa lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo /_/lha'i rgyal po brgya byin lha mo'i 
[\[103b.7\]]tshogs dang /_lha'i bu dang bcas pa lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo /_/dri za'i rgyal po gnas srung po dang /_dri za'i bu dang /_dri za'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo /_/grul bum gyi rgyal po 'phags skyes po dang /_grul bum gyi bu dang grul bum gyi bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong 
[\[104a.2\]]ngo /_/klu'i rgyal po mig mi bzang dang /_klu'i bu dang /_klu'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo /_/gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po chen po ngal bso po dang /_gnod sbyin gyi bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du 
[\[104a.3\]]mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo /_/mi'am ci'i rgyal posdong po dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu dang /_mi'am ci'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing /_sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo /_/lto 'phye chen po'i dbang 
[\[104a.4\]]po blo gros bzang po dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i bu dang /_lto 'phyi chen po'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing /_sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo /_/nam mkha' lding gi dbang po shugs drag stobs chen dang /_nam mkha' 
[\[104a.5\]]lding gi bu dang nam mkha' lding gi bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing /_sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo /_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang /_lha ma yin gyi bu dang /_lha ma yin gyi bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 
[\[104a.6\]]'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo /_/chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje dang /_gshin rje'i bu dang /_gshin rje'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo /_/mi'i dbang po dang 
[\[104a.7\]]skyes pa dang bud med dang khye'u dang /_bu mo thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing /_sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad du thogs pa'i sems can thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo /_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang drang srong thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo /_/rlung dang chu dang me'i phung po lha lta 
[\[104b.2\]]bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo /_/rgya mtsho dang /_chu klung dang /_ri dang /_nags tshal dang /_lo tog dang /_sman dang /_shing dang /_sa'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs 
[\[104b.3\]]su smin par byed pa mthong ngo /_/bza' shing gi ra ba dang /_grong khyer dang /_snying po byang chub dang /_nyin par dang /_mtshan mo dang /_nam mkha' dang /_phyogs dang /_rkang gis 'gro ba dang /_lus kyi ris su gtogs pa dang /_lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 
[\[104b.4\]]'thon cing /_sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ba nas/_de bzhin du lag na rdo rje lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing /_phyogs bcur rgyas par bkang ste/_chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul 'byam klas pa thams cad du sems can thams 
[\[104b.5\]]cad la mngon par gnas shing /_sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i bar du mthong ste/_mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i sems thog ma bskyed pa'i tshogs la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa'i sngon gyi/_tshe rabs la yongs su bsgrubs 
[\[104b.6\]]pa'i dge ba'i sems gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de/_rgyun ma chad pa'i tshul ji snyed pa dang /_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bsngags pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /_shi 'pho dang skye ba yongs su bzung ba gcig nas 
[\[104b.7\]]gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /_lus yongs su bzung ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /_ming gi 'khor lo gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gan du 'gro ba gcig 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /_sangs rgyas byung ste bsnyen bkur ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /_chos kyi tshig dang /_yi ge blangs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab 
[\[105a.2\]]chags pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi sems gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin thob pas sangs rgyas mthong ba 
[\[105a.3\]]gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /_zhing mthong ba'i mig gi rgyas par bkang pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /_bskal ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo 'dab chags ba dang /_chos 
[\[105a.4\]]kyi dbyings khong du chud pa'i ye shes gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /_sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtshor gtogs pa'i sems 
[\[105a.5\]]can pha rol gyi shi 'pho dang /_skye ba shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /_lha'i rna ba yongs su dag pa rtogs par byed pa'i shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /_sems can gyi khams 
[\[105a.6\]]thams cad kyi sems la rnam par blta zhing dbyings la 'jug pa'i sgo gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /_thog ma lha'i mig la zhugs pa'i sgo gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /_thog ma lha'i rna ba rnam par 
[\[105a.7\]]dmigs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /_thog ma sems can pha rol gyi sems shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /_thog ma bdag dang sems can pha rol gyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /_thog ma dngos po med pa la rab tu gnas te/_mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa'i rkyen gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chag pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul chen po'i rnam par gnon pas/_
[\[105b.2\]]phyogs rgyas pa 'gengs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thob pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho'i tshul
