[\[105b.3\]]bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa la 'jug pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa 
[\[105b.4\]]gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su gnon pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ming du bya ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa 
[\[105b.5\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lam la 'jug pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa nas/_mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes shin tu phra ba gcig nas gcig tu 
[\[105b.6\]]brgyud cing 'dab chags pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sprul pa'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon to/_/sems can rnams la chos 'chad pa dang /_yang dag par ston pa dang /_gsal bar byed pa dang /_yongs 
[\[105b.7\]]su ston pa dang /_rjes su rjod pa dang /_rab tu 'byed pa dang /_shin tu rgya cher byed pa dang /_'grang ba dang /_nges par ston pa dang /_rnam par rig par byed pa dang /_nye bar bsgrub pa mthong ste/_la la la ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor shin tu 'khrugs 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]pa'i sgra skad kyis chos ston par mthong ngo /_/la la la ni chu'i phung po rab tu rlob pa'i sgra skad kyis/_la la la ni me'i me lce shin tu rlob pa'i sgra skad kyis/_la la la ni rgya mtsho'i 'brug gi sgra skad kyis/_la la la ni 
[\[106a.2\]]sa yongs su g.yos pa'i sgra skad kyis/_la la la ni ri chen po phan tshun thug cing 'thab pa'i sgra skad kyis la la la ni lha'i grong khyer g.yos pa'i nga ro snyan pa'i sgra skad kyis/_la la la ni lha'i gzhal med khang 'thub cing 'khrol ba'i sgra skad kyis chos ston pa mthong 
[\[106a.3\]]ngo /_/la la la ni lha'i dbang po'i skad kyis/_la la la ni klu'i dbang po'i skad kyis/_la la la ni gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'i skad kyis/_la la la ni dri za'i dbang po'i skad kyis/_la la la ni lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i skad kyis/_la la la ni nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i skad kyis/_la la la 
[\[106a.4\]]ni mi'am ci'i dbang po'i skad kyis/_la la la ni lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i skad kyis/_la la la ni mi'i dbang po'i skad kyis/_la la la ni tshangs pa'i dbang po'i skad kyis/_la la la ni lha mo'i glu'i dbyangs kyis/_la la la ni lha rdzas kyi rol mo legs par blangs pa'i dbyangs kyis/_
[\[106a.5\]]la la la ni nor bu rin po che'i sgra dbyangs kyi/_la la la ni sems can gyi ris thams cad kyi skad sna tshogs kyis mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa'i yul sems can rnams la rab tu rjod pa mthong ngo /_/de 
[\[106a.6\]]bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi sprin gyis byang chub sems dpa'i sgra skad sna tshogs dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku'i sprin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rnam pa tha dad pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag gi tshul 
[\[106a.7\]]gyis mtshan mo'i la mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa'i yul thog ma sems bskyed pa dang bcas pa yongs su byung ste/_grub cing yang dag par 'dus pa dang bcas rnam par thar pa'i rnam par rtse ba dang bcas pa/_
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]sems can thams cad la rnam par dmigs par byed pa mthong ngo /_/de'i sprul pa'i gzugs kyi sprin re res kyang sems kyi skad cig re re la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa rnam par sbyong ba mthong ngo /_/
[\[106b.2\]]sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa dag kyang ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par 'grel pa mthong ngo /_/sems can gyi khams mtha' dang /_dbus med pa dag kyang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa la rab tu 'god pa mthong ngo /_/sems can rgya mtsho 
[\[106b.3\]]mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las gyen du bskyod pa mthong ngo /_/sems can rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la rab tu 'god pa mthong ngo /_/sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can 
[\[106b.4\]]rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi sar 'dzud pa/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]mthong ngo /_/thos so rnam par dpyad do/_/zhugs so khong du chud do/_/nges par rtogs so/_/rjes su shes so/_/rjes su 
[\[106b.5\]]'brangs so/_/rjes su zhugs so/_/mnyam pa nyid du byin gyis brlabs te/_de ni mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang pos dga' ba shin tu yangs pa'i rgya mtsho 
[\[106b.6\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'i byin dang /_sngon skal pa mnyam par spyad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa 
[\[106b.7\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa kun tu bzang po'i snod du gyur pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba'i shugs drag po gang chen mtsho snang ba chen po rab tu thob pa/_phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa des/_mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i mdun du 'dug ste/_thal mo sbyar nas mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang 
[\[107a.2\]]ba la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/rgyal pa'i chos rnams shin tu zab/_/de la khyod kyis bskal pa tshad med bslabs/_/bsam pa ji bzhin gzugs rnams kyis/_/'gro ba kun bkang 'jig rten 
[\[107a.3\]]rim pas bstan/_/bdag med mgon med log pa yi/_/'du shes rtag tu 'khrul pa mkhyen gyur nas/_/rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du ma yis/_/lus dang dbang phyug ston mdzad 'gro ba 'dul/_/shin tu rims bral rab tu zhi/_/chos sku gnyis med 
[\[107a.4\]]rnam par dag par mnga'/_/'gro ba ma lus gnyis gnas pa/_/sprul pa'i sprin sgra 'brug gis rnam par 'dul/_/phung po khams dang skye mched la/_/khyod ni nam yang mi gnas mi rten te/_/yan lag kun rgyas gzugs mchog dang /_/dbang 
[\[107a.5\]]phyug yongs su bsgrags pas 'gro ba 'dul/_/phyi dang nang las rnam par grol/_/gnyis las byung ba'i mtsho las 'phags gyur kyang /_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i/_/gzugs brnyan 'gro ba'i rgyud du rab tu ston/_/khyod la g.yo 
[\[107a.6\]]ba mi mnga' ste/_/nam yang rlom sems g.yo ba'i spros mi mnga'/_/'jig rten spros mos byis pa rnams/_/chos kyi rang bzhin ston cing 'dul ba mdzad/_/ting 'dzin rgya mtsho kun spyod pas/_/bskal pa mang por rtse gcig thub bzhugs 
[\[107a.7\]]kyang /_/phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs mchod don du/_/spu rnams rtse las sprul pa'i sprin kyang 'gyed/_/sangs rgyas stobs la 'jug pa'i tshul/_/skad cig re rer mtha' yas thugs su chud/_/sems can bsdu ba'i sbyor ba rnams/_/
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]so so'i rkyen bzhin go bar bgyi bas bstan/_/khyod kyis srid pa'i rgya mtsho dag_/las kyis rnam bris sna tshogs gzugs gzigs shing /_/chos kyi sgrib pa med pa'i lam bstan te/_/sems can kun kyang rnam par sbyong ba mdzad/_/khyod sku 
[\[107b.2\]]mtshan bris rnam dag kyang /_/kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dam pa yis/_/sems can bsam pa'i dbang tshul du/_/khyod ni lha mo'i sku gzugs sa ston/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis[,]bzang gis[}]/_mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro 
[\[107b.3\]]bar rnam par snang ba la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod de/_'di skad ces smras so/_/lha mo khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs nas ji srid cig lags/_lha mo khyod kyis byang chub 
[\[107b.4\]]sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba shin tu yangs shing dri ma med pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan 'di thob nas ji srid cig lags/_de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang bas/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor 
[\[107b.5\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_dran pa bskal pa mang 'das pa/_/zhing gi rdul snyed de yi snga rol na/_/zhing ni rin chen mdog bde 'byung /_/de yi bskal pa zhi ba'i dbyangs shes bya/_/gling bzhi bye ba khrag khrig ste/_/brgya stong phrag 
[\[107b.6\]]bcu rnams kyis yongs su gang /_/tshad med rin chen ri bo 'dra/_/gling bzhi bar ma bzang po rnam par bkram/_sa/_rgyal po'i pho brang bye ba brgya/_/stong phrag bcu rnams yongs su tshang ba ste/_/rgyal po'i pho brang mdangs dga' ba/_/dbus na gnas 
[\[107b.7\]]pa spos kyi rgyal mtshan 'od/_/der ni phyogs kyi dbang po sa yi bdag_/'khor los sgyur ba mngon par gzugs bzang byung /_/mtshan rab sum cu gnyis dang ldan/_/de yi lus kyang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan/_/pad mo'i sbubs nas rdzus te byung /_/
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]gser gyi mdog bzang 'od byung lus dang ldan/_/'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan thams cad du/_/mkha' las 'gro zhing 'od kyis de 'gengs so/_/de yi bu ni stong tshang ste/_/kun kyang yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan/_/
[\[108a.2\]]blon po mkhas shing gsal ba dang /_/mdzangs shing yid gzhungs bye ba shin tu mang /_/btsun mo bya ba phrag bcu tshang /_/lha mo ji bzhin dga' ba'i tshul la mkhas/_/de dag phan sems bde sems kyis/_/rgyal po de la nye ba'i yid du gnas/_/
[\[108a.3\]]rgyal po de ni sa chen de/_/ri dang khor yug kun gyi mthas klas pa'i/_/gling bzhi'i phun sum tshogs pa dag_/kun kyang chos kyi stobs kyis gnas par byed/_/kho mo 'khor los sgyur ba yi/_/btsun mo tshangs pa'i sgra skad rin chen lus/_/
[\[108a.4\]]gser gyi mdog 'chang dri med 'od/_/dpag tshad stong du 'od kyis rgyas par 'gengs/_/nyi ma nub par gyur nas kyang /_rgyal po sras dang 'khor bcas gzims gyur nas/_/rol mo'i dbyangs kyang zhi gyur te/_/kho mo mal na bde bar nyal 
[\[108a.5\]]nyal na/_/nam gyi phyed tsam gung zhig la/_/sangs rgyas dpal gyi rgya mtsho byung bar gyur/_/de tshe rgyal bas rnam 'phrul ba/_/phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste bstan pa mdzad/_/rgyal ba'i 'od zer rgya mtsho des/_/zhing gi rdul snyed 'jig 
[\[108a.6\]]rten khyab par gyur/_/rnam 'phrul sku rnams sna tshogs kyis/_/phyogs bcu thams cad ma lus rgyas par bkang /_/sa rnams ri dang bcas par g.yos/_/rgyal ba byung zhes sgra yang yongs su brjod/_/lha dang lha min mi dang klu/_/kun kyang 
[\[108a.7\]]rgyal ba byung bas rab tu dga'/_/sangs rgyas ba spu'i sgo kun nas/_/sprul pa'i rgya mtsho mang po mngon par byung /_/des ni phyogs bcu rgyas bkang nas/_/'jig rten bsam pa bzhin du chos kyang bstan/_/rnam 'phrul mtha' yas de dag kyang /_/
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]rgyal bas thams cad bdag gi rmi lam bstan/_/zab mo'i 'brug sgra thos gyur nas/_/khong du chud pas kho mo dga' yid gyur/_/mtshan mo'i lha mo stong steng kyang /_/kho mo'i steng gi bar snang mkhar gnas shing /_/rgyal ba'i legs pa brjod 
[\[108b.2\]]byas nas/_/kho mo sad par smra zhing brjod/_/lha yi blo gros btsun mo longs/_/khyod kyi rgyal po'i khams su rgyal ba skyes/_/bskal pa rgya mtsho brgya dag tu/_/de 'dra'i phun sum tshogs pa rnam dag kun/_/kho mo dgar gyur sad par gyur/_/'od 
[\[108b.3\]]gsal dri med rnam dag mthong /_/'od bzang de ni ga las blta blta na/_/byang chub shing rgyal drung gi rgyal ba mthong /_/mtshan nyid sum cu gnyis kyis brgyan/_/ba spu kun nas 'od zer rgya mtsho bkye/_/ri rab ji bzhin mngon par 'phags/_/
[\[108b.4\]]rgyal ba g.yas g.yos kun tu'ang de bzhin no/_/mthong nas kho mo rab dga' ste/_/de 'drar 'gyur bar sems kyang yongs su bskyed/_/sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul yangs mthong nas/_/kho mos smon lam shin tu rgya chen btab/_/kho mos rgyal po 
[\[108b.5\]]bzhengs su gsol/_/de yi 'khor dang bud med tshogs kyang bslang /_/sangs rgyas 'od yangs mthong gyur nas/_/kun kyang bde ba'i lus su gyur/_/rgyal po de dang lhan cig tu/_/bzhon pa bye ba srog chags khrag khrig gis/_/yongs su 
[\[108b.6\]]bskor te dpung bcas pa/_/rgyal ba'i spyan sngar kun kyang dong /_/lo grangs stong phrag nyi shur yang /_/kho mos rgyal ba de la mchod bkur byas/_/rin chen bdun yang yon du phul/_/rgya mtsho yongs dang bcas pa'i sa yang gsol/_/mdo 
[\[108b.7\]]sde rgya mtsho yon tan sprin/_/smon lam mtsho las yongs su byung ba'i rgyan/_/kun kyang de bzhin gshegs las byung /_/bsam pa ji bzhin 'gro bar de bzhin bstan/_/mtshan mo'i lha mo ji snyed cig_/de tshe snying brtser kho mo phan bstan pa/_/
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]de 'drar gyur te myos bsal zhes/_/kho mo mos pa yongs su skyes par gyur/_/kho mo'i smon lam de 'dra'i sems/_/thog ma byang chub mchog tu skyes par gyur/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho gnas pa'i tshe/_/srid pa'i rgya mtshos de ni zhig 
[\[109a.2\]]ma gyur/_/sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig rnams/_/kho mos dad pa bskyed de mchod pa byas/_/'khor ba'i lha dang mi dbus su/_/yul gyi dga' dang bde lam mngon par smon/_/rgyal ba'i dang po dpal gyi mtsho/_/de yi 'og ma yon tan sgron ma ste/_/
[\[109a.3\]]rgyal ba gsum pa rin chen dpal/_/sangs rgyas bzhi pa nam mkha'i shes rab bo/_/rgyal ba lnga pa me tog mchog_/rgyal ba drug pa chags med zla ba'i blo/_/rgyal ba bdun pa 'od rgyal chos kyi zla/_/brgyad pa ye shes dkyil 'khor snang ba'o/_/
[\[109a.4\]]rin chen 'od 'phro ri sgron te/_/rgyal ba dgu pa de tshe byung bar gyur/_/bcu pa dus gsum 'od dbyangs te/_/de dag kho mos dad pas mchod/_/bcu po de la sa sogs pa dag_/mi yi dbang po dam pa kun mchod de/_/tshul gyi rgya mtsho 'dir zhugs 
[\[109a.5\]]pa'i/_/mig ni de srid yun gyis thob ma gyur/_/de 'og zhing gi 'tshams sbyor ba/_/rin chen thams cad 'od ces bya ba byung /_/bskal pa lha yi dpal zhes bya/_/sangs rgyas lnga brgya de la byung bar gyur/_/thog ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor byung /_/
[\[109a.6\]]gnyis pa nyi ma'i sgron ma mngon par skyes/_/snang ba'i rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas gsum/_/de yi 'og tu rin chen ri bo'o/_/me tog 'od 'phro rgya mtsho sgron/_/me yi dpal dang lha yi dpal gyi mchog_/snang ba'i rgyal po 'od kyi dpal/_/bcu 
[\[109a.7\]]pa ye shes kun snang rgyal po 'o/_/bcu po de la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dag_/mi yi dbang po de dag kho mo yis/_/phung po'i gnas la dad dga' zhing /_/gnas med chos la gnas kyi blo mchod do/_/de 'og de yi mtshams sbyor ba/_/'jig 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]rten khams bzang byung bar gyur pa ni/_/pad ma'i sgron ma sprin gyi dpal/_/de tshe bskal pa tshangs pa'i 'od ces bya/_/de la rgyal ba tshad med de/_/de dag 'khor dang bcas pa kho mos mchod/_/rgyal ba de dag thams cad las/_/rim gro chen pos 
[\[109b.2\]]kho mos chos kyang thos/_/rgyal ba'i dang po rin chen ri/_/de yi 'og ma yon tan rgya mtsho ste/_/rgyal ba chos dbyings dbyangs kyi dpal/_/chos rab rgya mtsho sgrog pa bzhi pa'o/_/chos kyi rgyal mtshan gzungs kyi 'od/_/chos stobs 'od dang nam 
[\[109b.3\]]mkha'i blo gros te/_/chos 'od ri bos spo mthon dang /_/de dag tha ma'i mtshan ni sprin dpal lo/_/bcu po de la sogs pa dag_/mi yi dam pa de dag kun mchod de/_/rgyal ba'i rgya mtsho 'dir zhugs pa'i/_/chos nyid de ni dag ma gyur/_/
[\[109b.4\]]de yi 'og tu de bzhin gshegs/_/nyi ma'i sgron ma dpal gyi dpal zhes bya/_/zhing ni sangs rgyas yod pa ste/_/de la bskal pa zla ba'i dpal byung ngo /_/de la stobs bcu byung ba ni/_/bye ba brgyad cu yongs su tshang ba ste/_/de dag kun la'ang mchod 
[\[109b.5\]]pa'i sgo/_/rgya che mtha' yas yid 'ong du ma byas/_/thog mar byung ba dri za'i rgyal/_/de yi 'og tu sangs rgyas shing rgyal te/_/rgyal ba gsum pa yon tan ri/_/de yi 'og tu rin chen spyan gshegs so/_/rnam par snang mdzad 'od kyi rgyan/_/
[\[109b.6\]]chos kyi rgya mtsho sangs rgyas gzi brjid dpal/_/'jig rten dbang po 'od bzang dpal/_/kun gyi tha ma chos 'od rgyal po'o/_/bcu po de la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dag_/bde gshegs de dag thams cad mchod byas kyang /_/chos kyi rgya mtshor 'jug pa yi/_/
[\[109b.7\]]ye shes kho mos thob par ma gyur to/_/de yi 'og tu zhing dag pa/_/rdo rje'i rang bzhin mi phyed gzi brjid brtan/_/kun tu 'od sprin ming ldan byung /_/rgyan gcig kun nas mdzes par gnas pa'o/_/de la sems can dag pa mang /_/nyon mongs dri mas 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]nyon mongs shin tu nyung /_/bskal pa rab zhi blo gros 'od/_/sangs rgyas stong rnams byung bas rnam par brgyan/_/rgyal ba'i dang po rdo rje gtsug_/gnyis pa chags med stobs mnga'i mtshan ldan pa/_/rgyal ba chos nyid 
[\[110a.2\]]gzugs brnyan dang /_/phyogs rnams kun tu sgron ma gsal ba'i bdag_/rgyal ba lnga pa thugs rje'i 'od/_/rgyal ba drug pa brtul zhugs rgya mtsho'o/_/bde gshegs bzod 'khor sgron ma dang /_/brgyad pa chos kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba ste/_/
[\[110a.3\]]snang ba rgya mtshos brgyan pa dang /_/de dag tha ma zhi ba'i rgyal po'o/_/bcu po de la sogs pa dag_/mi yi dam pa de kun kho mos mchod/_/chos nyid nam mkha' mnyam pa 'di/_/rang bzhin yongs su kun nas dag pa ste/_/de la gnas shing 
[\[110a.4\]]zhing gi rnams/_/'byam klas kun tu spyod spyad ma dag go_/de yi 'og tu mdangs dga' ba'i/_/zhing gi spos sgron sprin gyi dpal zhes bya/_/kun nas nyon mongs yongs su dag_/de yi bskal pa legs par byung zhes bya/_/rgyal ba bye ba 
[\[110a.5\]]de tshe byung /_/de dag kun gyi de tshe'i bskal pa brgyan/_/mgon po de dag chos gsung ba/_/kho mos dran pa'i stobs kyis yongs su bzung /_/rgyal ba'i dang po grags yangs te/_/chos kyi rgya mtsho shugs drag dpal gyi rgyal/_/chos dbang 
[\[110a.6\]]rgyal po yon tan sprin/_/chos kyi dpal dang lha yi cod pan no/_/ye shes 'od 'phro gzi brjid dpal/_/rkang gnyis dam pa bdun pa de yin no/_/rgyal ba brgyad pa nam mkha'i dbyings/_/dgu pa kun tu 'byung ba'i sgron ma ste/_/de dag 
[\[110a.7\]]tha ma'i sangs rgyas ni/_/mdzod spu'i dpal gyi 'od kyi blo gros te/_/rgyal ba mi mchog de dag la/_/mchod pa byas nas chags med de ma sbyangs/_/de yi 'og ma rgyan rab can/_/rin chen sna tshogs kun tu gnas pa ste/_/'jig rten 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]rnam par phye ba'i mtha'/_/rin chen rgyal mtshan blo gros mchog_/de tshe'i bskal pa snying po'i tshogs/_/de la sangs rgyas brgya phrag lnga byung ste/_/rnam thar chags med 'di 'dod cing /_/rang byung de dag thams cad kho mos mchod/_
[\[110b.2\]]thog ma'i mtshan ni yon tan 'khor/_/zhi ba'i dbyangs dang rgya mtsho phun sum tshogs/_/nyi ma'i gzi brjid dpal gyi bdag_/mtshan gyi sprin sgra dbyangs shes bya ba dang /_/chos dbyangs rgyal po yon tan bdag_/bsod nams ri rab zhi ba'i 
[\[110b.3\]]'od kyi rgyal/_/bcu po de la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dag_/rgyal ba de dag kun kyang kho mos mchod/_/rgyal ba'i lam ni der sbyangs te/_/de la rgyal ba kun kyang yang dag gzhol/_/'on kyang da dung rgyal ba yi/_/tshul 'dir 'jug pa'i bzod pa 
[\[110b.4\]]ma thob bo/_/de 'og yid 'ong 'od ldan pa/_/yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten khams byung ste/_/zhing dbyangs phreng ba'i blo gros can/_/sems can nyon mongs nyung ba'i gnas yin no/_/bskal pa bde zhing mngon dga' ste/_/de la 
[\[110b.5\]]sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad cu byung /_/mi mchog de kun kho mos mchod/_/rgyal ba mchog gi lam yang rnam par sbyangs/_/rgyal ba'i dang po me tog brtsegs/_/rgya mtsho' snying po yang dag 'byung ba'i mchog_/lha dbang gtsug phud 
[\[110b.6\]]rin chen gtso/_/gser gyi ri bo rin chen brtsegs pa dang /_/chos kyi rgyal mtshan nor gyi dpal/_/de dag kun gyi tha ma ye shes blo/_/bcu po de la sogs pa dag_/lha dang mi gtso de dag kho mos mchod/_/de 'og mtshams sbyor 
[\[110b.7\]]zhing byung ba/_/sprul pa bzang po'i rgyal mtshan sgron ma ste/_/bskal pa stong gi dpal zhes bya/_/de la sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig drug_/zhi ba'i rgyal mtshan zhi gnas dpal/_/zhi ba'i sgron ma sprin gyi rgyal po'i dpal/_/snang ba'i 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]'od kyi rgyal po dang /_/rnam par sprin mched nyi ma'i gza brjid dang /_/chos kyi sgron ma dpal gyi ri/_/'od 'phro'i dpal dang lha yi snying po'i dpal/_/de dag tha mar byung ba ni/_/seng ge'i sgra sgrogs mkhas pa sgron 
[\[111a.2\]]ma'o/_bcu po de la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dag_/bde gshegs zla ba de dag kho mos mchod/_/'on kyang tshul mtsho 'dir 'jug pa'i/_/bzod pa kho mos thob par ma gyur to/_/de 'og 'tshams sbyor zhing byung ba/_/kun tu snang ba'i dpal 
[\[111a.3\]]zhes bya ba ste/_/bskal pa gnas med rnam par brgyan/_/de la sangs rgyas bye ba sum cu drug_/dang po yon tan kun tu sprin/_/de yi 'og ma sangs rgyas nam mkha'i thugs/_/sangs rgyas legs byung rnam brgyan dang /_/rgya mtsho chos 
[\[111a.4\]]kyi sprin sgra sgrogs pa'i dbyangs/_/rgyal ba chos dbyings gsung dbyangs dang /_/sprul pa'i sprin sgra snyan pa'i dpal mnga' dang /_/sangs rgyas phyogs kun gzi brjid dang /_/chos kyi rgya mtsho yongs byung sgra dbyangs dang /_/yon tan rgya mtsho dpal 
[\[111a.5\]]gyi sgron/_/rgyal ba'i nyi ma dgu pa byung bar gyur/_/de dag kun gyi tha ma ste/_/rin chen dpal sgron yon tan dpal mchod do/_/rin chen dpal sgron yon tan dpal/_/rkang gnyis dam pa byung bar gyur pa'i tshe/_/kho mo lha mo zla bzhin te/_/mi yi dam pa byung tshe mchod pa byas/_/rgyal 
[\[111a.6\]]ba des ni kho mo la/_/mdo sde smon lam rgya mtsho 'byung ba'i rgyan/_/gnas med rgyan kyang rab tu bshad/_/thos nas kho mos dran pa'i stobs kyis bzung /_/kho mos mig yangs der thob ste/_/tinga'adzin zhi dang gzungs kyi stobs kyang thob/_/
[\[111a.7\]]skad cig re re zhing brgyud pa'i/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho mang po'ang kho mos mthong /_/byams tshul kun tu snang ba'i sprin/_/byang chub sems rab mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_/snying rje'i snying pos brgyan pa yang /_/sangs rgyas stobs kyi tshul du 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]yangs par skyes/_/'gro ba phyin ci log gyur te/_/rtag dang bde dang gtsang dang bdag zhen pa/_/gti mug mdongs gyur ma rig bsgribs/_/nyon mongs 'khrugs shing log par 'du shes pa/_/lta ba'i rnam par stug la spyod/_/lam gyi 
[\[111b.2\]]'gro rgyud nyam ngar sred dbang gyur/_/rnam pa sna tshogs bye brag tu/_/las kyis rnam par bris pas kun byung ba/_/'gro rgyud kun gyi shi 'pho'i sgor/_/skye bar 'gyur bas kun tu skyer 'gyur cing /_/skye dang rga shi gnod pa rnams/_/lus dang sems kyi 
[\[111b.3\]]nyams su myong gyur pa/_/mthong nas de dag phan bde'i phyir/_/zhing rnams 'byam klas thams cad kyi/_/stobs bcu gang las byung ba yi/_/bla na med pa'i sems kyang kho mos bskyed/_/de las smon lam sprin byung ba/_/'gro ba kun la bde bar gzhol 
[\[111b.4\]]ba'i mchog_/tshogs rnams 'byung ba mtha' yas dang /_/lam tshul rgya mtsho rtogs pa'ang de nas byung /_/'jug pa'i sprin yangs thob gyur pa/_/lam chud kun tu sgo gsal shugs ldan te/_/pha rol phyin gyi sprin yangs pa'ang /_/chos dbyings 
[\[111b.5\]]'byam klas kun tu rnam par 'byed/_/sa gnon shugs drag yangs ldan dang /_/dus gsum rgya mtsho'i tshul gyi sa rnams la/_/chags pa med par spyod par gyur/_/skad cig gcig gis rgyal ba kun drung 'gro/_/gzhan yang rgyal sras kho mos ni/_/
[\[111b.6\]]spyod pa kun tu bzang po yongs su non/_/chos dbyings bye brag bcu rnams kyi/_rgya mtsho'i tshul la'ang kho mo rtogs par 'jug_/rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na/_rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba/_sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi rgyun 
[\[111b.7\]]mi gcod pa la zhugs pa/_mi'i bdag po zhes bya ba byung ba/_de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na ni/_rigs kyi bu de ltar mi blta ste/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni/_de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po mi'i bdag po zhes bya ba 'khor los sgyur ba 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi rigs rgyun mi gcod pa la zhugs pa'o/_/kho mo sad par byed pa'i mtshan mo'i lha mo de ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos sprul pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los 
[\[112a.2\]]sgyur ba'i btsun mo bud med rin po che bzang po'i blo gros ma zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na ni de ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}]blta ste/_kho mo ni de'i tshe de'i dus na/_'khor los sgyur ba'i btsun mo bud med rin po che bzang po'i blo gros ma zhes bya bar 
[\[112a.3\]]gyur te/_kho mo mtshan mo'i lha mo des sad par byas nas/_sangs rgyas blta ba la yang dag par bskul to/_/rigs kyi bu kho mos ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems de srid cig nas bskyed de/_de ltar kho mo sems 
[\[112a.4\]]bskyed pa de'i mthus/_bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du nam yang ngan song log par ltung bar ma skyes te/_rtag tu rgyun ma 'chad par lha dang mi'i 'gro ba'i rgyud la rten cing /_thams cad du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa blta 
[\[112a.5\]]ba dang ldan par gyur to/_/tha mar kho mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dpal gyi sgrol ma yon tan rgyal mtshan mthong ba tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu 
[\[112a.6\]]bzang po'i dga' ba shin tu yangs shing dri ma med pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'di thob ste/_de thob pas kho mo sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba'i don du rnam pa 'di lta bus sta gon du gnas pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu kho 
[\[112a.7\]]mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba rgya chen po'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan 'di shes par zad na/_kho mos byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'khod cing /_sems kyi skad 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]cig re re la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'jug pa'i shugs drag po rgya mtsho chen po rab tu thob pa/_'jug pa'i sgo thams cad la sems kyi skad cig re re zhing smon lam chen po rgya mtshos 'jug pa/_rab tu thob pa/_sems kyi skad cig re re zhing smon 
[\[112b.2\]]lam rgya mtsho thams cad kyi tshul la phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par spyad pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/_spyod pa re re la'ang lus sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/_lus re res 
[\[112b.3\]]kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa la mkhas pa/_chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho re re la'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du/_sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus rnam par dmigs pa'i spyod pa 
[\[112b.4\]]yongs su ston pa la mkhas pa/_zhing thams cad du'ang zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug par mkhas pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing yang chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par 
[\[112b.5\]]rgyas par 'gengs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug par mkhas pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i sngon gyi mtha'i bskal pa la/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshogs yongs su bsgrub pa yang dag par bsdus pa la 
[\[112b.6\]]'jug par mkhas pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu yangs pa/_yang dag par blang ba dang /_yongs su gzung ba la mkhas pa/_dus gsum thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug par 
[\[112b.7\]]mkhas pa/_de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/_yon tan brjod par nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid na kho mo dang /_rgyang mi ring ba zhig na mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]dpal zhes bya ba 'dug gis/_de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug par bya ba dang /_ji ltar yongs su sbyang bar bya ba dris shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis[,]bzang gis[}]/_mtshan 
[\[113a.2\]]mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba la/_lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas 
[\[113a.3\]]yang dang yang bltas te/_mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i drung nas song ngo //_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po 
[\[113a.4\]]bdun pa/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba shin tu yangs shing dri ma med pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan de la mos par bya ba dang /_
[\[113a.5\]]khong du chud par bya ba dang /_rtogs par bya ba dang /_shes par bya ba dang /_yid ches par bya ba dang /_rab tu gzhol bar bya ba dang /_rgyas par dgang bar bya ba dang /_rjes su shes par bya ba dang /_rjes su dran par bya ba dang /_rjes su gzhol bar bya ba dang /_bsgom pa byed cing dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi 
[\[113a.6\]]gdams ngag la nan tan du bya ba dang /_gdams ngag rjes su bstan pa la bar chad med par bya ba'i phyir mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang bas/_'gro khar gdams pa rjes su dran par byed cing /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba'i rjes 
[\[113a.7\]]su sems pa'i dbang po'i dkyil 'khor dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba thob par bya ba la yang dag par spyod pa/_phyogs kun tu mngon par ltas pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar yid la bya ba dang /_nga rgyal thams cad dang bral ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]gnyen bsnyen bkur ba'i mthu tshogs chen pos yongs su bsgrub par zhe non pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang /_rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa thams cad la bsam pa mi phyed pas zhugs pa/_/
[\[113b.2\]]dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brtan pa yongs su 'phel bar bya ba la brtson 'grus kyi shugs chen po rgya mtsho yongs su skyes pa/_bskal pa thams cad du dge ba'i bshes gnyen mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pas gnas par bya ba'i smon lam dang ldan pa de/_mtshan 
[\[113b.3\]]mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyi drung du song ngo /_/de de ltar 'gro ba'i tshe/_mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon du gyur pas 'gro ba rnam par 
[\[113b.4\]]'dul ba ston pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos yongs su grub pa'i lus bstan te/_mdzod spu nas 'od zer ye shes kyi 'od kun tu snang ba dri ma med pa'i mdangs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'od zer gyi 'khor mtha' 
[\[113b.5\]]dang dbus med pa dang ldan pa bkye'o/_/des 'jig rten thams cad snang bar byas nas/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]spyi bor 'dus te lus thams cad du khyab par gyur to/_/tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'od zer des reg par gyur ma thag tu de nyid kyi mod la 
[\[113b.6\]]ting nge 'dzin shin tu rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor thob par gyur to/_/de thob pas mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba dang /_mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun nas skyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi dpal gnyis kyi bar gyi lam na 
[\[113b.7\]]sa'i dkyil 'khor yod pa de la me'i rdul shin tu phra ba'am/_chu'i rdul shin tu phra ba'am/_sa'i rdul shin tu phra ba'am/_rdo rje'i rdul shin tu phra ba'am/_nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dam pa sna tshogs kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'am/_me tog dang /_spos dang /_phye ma'i rdul shin tu phra ba'am 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]rgyan thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'am/_dmigs pa thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed cig yod pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba de dag thams cad la rdul phra mo re re zhing yang /_'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed/_
[\[114a.2\]]chu'i phung po dang bcas/_me'i phung po dang bcas/_rlung gi phung po dang bcas/_sa'i phung po dang bcas/_'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtshams dang bcas/_gzhi dang bcas rten dang bcas pa dbyibs sna tshogs can sa'i gzhi rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri'i 'khor sna tshogs can/_
[\[114a.3\]]chu rlung dang mtsho sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa rgya mtsho sna tshogs kyis kun nas 'khor ba/_lha rdzas kyi khyim sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa/_shing sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba/_nam mkha'i dbyings kyi rgyan sna tshogs can/_lha'i grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/_
[\[114a.4\]]klu'i grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/_gnod sbyin gyi grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/_dri za'i grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/_lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/_nam mkha' lding gi grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/_
[\[114a.5\]]mi'am ci'i grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/_lto 'phye chen po'i grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/_mi'i grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/_phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad na rnam par gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyi grong khyer gyi 
[\[114a.6\]]khyim gyi gnas dang /_sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten gyi yul dang /_byol song gi skye gnas kyi 'jig rten gyi yul dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi yul dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa'i lam gyi rgyud kyi shi 'pho dang /_skye ba'i yul dang bcas pa/_skye ba sna tshogs 
[\[114a.7\]]kyis ma 'dres pa'i rgyud mtha' yas pa'i bye brag la yongs su gzhol ba rnams 'du zhing 'jig par gyur pa mthong ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang rnam pa sna tshogs su mthong ste/_'jig rten gyi khams la la ni kun nas nyon mongs par mthong ngo /_/la la 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]ni yongs su dag par mthong ngo /_/la la ni shin tu kun nas nyon mongs par mthong ngo /_/la la ni lam gyi rgyud yongs su dag par mthong ngo /_/la la ni kun nas nyon mongs pa la yongs su dag par mthong ngo /_/la la ni rnam par dag pa la kun nas nyon mongs par mthong ngo /_/
[\[114b.2\]]la la ni shin tu yongs su dag par mthong ngo /_/la la ni gzhi mnyam par mthong ngo /_/la la ni spyi'u tshugs su gnas par mthong ngo /_/la la ni snrel zhir 'dug par mthong ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud dang /_sems can 
[\[114b.3\]]gyi skye gnas thams cad na mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal sems can so so nas 'dul ba'i rkyen bzhin du 'jig rten thams cad la ma 'dres par yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/_sems can thams cad la mngon du gyur par gnas par 
[\[114b.4\]]mthong ngo /_/sems can tshe'i tshad rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa dang /_mos pa'i spyod yul rnam pa sna tshogs can dang /_lus rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa dang /_ngag rnam par phye ba dang /_nges pa'i tshig gi 'du byed kyi tha 
[\[114b.5\]]snyad rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa dang /_sbyor ba'i rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa dang /_dbang gi rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba'i don du sems can thams cad la ma 'dres par mngon sum du gnas par mthong ngo /_/de 
[\[114b.6\]]yang 'di lta ste/_sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dang /_'jig pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /_byol song gi skye gnas sna tshogs su skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi gcig la gcig 
[\[114b.7\]]za ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi bkres pa dang /_skom pa la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa'i sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /_klu'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]pa'i sems can rnams kyi klu'i sdug bsngal dang /_'jigs pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang /_'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i khams kyi sdug bsngal dang /_'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /_
[\[115a.2\]]mi'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi mtshan mo'i mun pa mun nag gis/_chod pa'i mun pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang /_mi snyan pa dang /_bsngags pa'i ma yin pa dang /_grags pa ma yin pa'i sgra dang /_
[\[115a.3\]]tshigs su bcad pa la mngon par zhen pa'i sems can rnams kyi grags pa ma yin pa dang /_bsngags pa ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /_'khor gyi 'jigs par lhung ba'i sems can rnams kyi 'khor tu bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par 
[\[115a.4\]]bzlog pa dang /_'chi bas 'jigs shing sdang ba'i sems can rnams kyi 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /_ngan song gi g.yang sas 'jigs shing sngang ba'i sems can rnams kyi ngan song gi g.yang sa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa 
[\[115a.5\]]dang /_'tsho ba med pas 'jigs shing skrag pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba chud zos kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba chud 
[\[115a.6\]]zos kyi 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems nyams kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i sems can rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems nyams kyi 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /_sdig to'i grogs po dang phrad kyis 'jigs shing 
[\[115a.7\]]bag tsha ba'i sems can rnams sdig to'i grogs po dang phrad pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral gyis dogs shing bag tsha ba'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung gis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i sems can rnams kyi nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /_'khor ba'i gnas sna tshogs kyi sdug bsngal gyis 
[\[115b.2\]]'jigs shing skrag pa rnams kyi 'khor ba'i gnas sna tshogs kyi sdug bsngal kyi 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /_sems can skal ba mi mnyam pa dang phrad kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba rnams kyi sems can skal ba mi mnyam pa dang phrad pa'i 
[\[115b.3\]]'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /_dus mi bzang bar skyes kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba rnams kyi dus mi bzad par skye ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /_rigs ngan par skyes kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba rnams kyi rigs ngan par skye ba'i 'jigs 
[\[115b.4\]]pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /_sdig to'i las byas kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba rnams kyi/_sdig to'i las byed pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /_las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pas 'jigs shing sngang ba rnams kyi las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i 
[\[115b.5\]]'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /_'du shes kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gnas dang 'ching bas 'jigs shing sngang ba rnams kyi 'du shes rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gnas dang /_'ching ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir sems can thams cad 
[\[115b.6\]]la so sor mngon tu gyur par gnas pa mthong ngo /_/'di lta ste sgo nga las skyes pa'i sems can dang /_mngal nas skyes pa dang /_drod gsher las skyes pa dang /_rdzus te skyes pa dang /_gzugs yod pa dang /_gzugs med pa dang /_'du shes yod 
[\[115b.7\]]pa dang /_'du shes med pa dang /_'du shes yod pa'ang ma yin/_'du shes med pa yang ma yin pa'i sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i smon lam gyi stobs mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi shugs 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]drag po dang /_rnam par gnon pa shin tu yangs pa'i stobs dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa chen po'i stobs dang /_mthu dang /_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /_smon lam 
[\[116a.2\]]mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis snying rje chen po'i tshul rgya mtsho'i shugs drag po shin tu skyes pa'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i byams pa chen pos rgyas par dgang ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi bde ba yongs su bsgrub pa dang /_
[\[116a.3\]]dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i ye shes rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang ldan pas 
[\[116a.4\]]zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba la mngon du gyur par gnas par mthong ngo /_/chos thams cad kyi rgyus shes par bya ba la mngon du gyur pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing rim gror bya ba la mngon du gyur pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[116a.5\]]cad kyi bstan pa yongs su gzung ba la mngon du gyur pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bstsags pa la mngon du gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad rnam par 'phel bar bya ba la mngon du gyur pa dang /_sems can thams cad 
[\[116a.6\]]kyi sems la sgrib pa med par mngon du gyur par gnas pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su smin par bya ba la mngon du gyur par gnas pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi mos pa rgya mtsho rnam par sbyang ba la mngon du gyur pa 
[\[116a.7\]]dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i chos rnam par bzlog pa la mngon du gyur pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi mi shes pa'i mun pa rnam par bstsal ba la mngon du gyur cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes snang ba yongs su bskyed pa'i don du 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]gnas pa mthong ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyi byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa 'jig rten thams cad la mngon 
[\[116b.2\]]par gnas shing /_'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba ston pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de lta bur mthong nas rab tu dga' ba skyes te/_spro ba chen po'i shugs drag po rgya mtsho rab tu thob nas/_mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal la lus thams 
[\[116b.3\]]cad kyis phab ste phyag byas nas ngor gyen du bltas so/_/de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs dang /_mtshan rnam par dag pa re mi snang bar byas te/_mtshan mo'i lha mo'i gzugs su byas 
[\[116b.4\]]te/_rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad 'byin cing 'dug par gnas so/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyi mdun du 'dug ste/_thal mo sbyar nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag 
[\[116b.5\]]smras so/_/khyod kyi sku yang mtshan rab rgyan gyis brgyan/_/shin tu bzang zhing mdzes pa bdag gis mthong /_/nam mkha' skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa bzhin/_/dpe byad bzang pos rnam par bris pa mthong /_/'od kyi 'khor can sku 
[\[116b.6\]]bzang dam pa'i mchog_/mtha' yas zhing gi rdul khams mang po snyed/_/kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa'i dpe tshul du/_/phyogs rnams kun gyi dbyings su khyab par gang /_/'od zer dra ba mang po 'gro sems mnyam/_/khyod kyi ba spu'i sgo nas 'gyed 
[\[116b.7\]]pa mdzad/_/'od zer sgo la pad+mo'i yid 'ong gnas/_/khyod kyi sprul pa 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel/_/spos kyi na bun sprin du chags pa 'gyed/_/'gro ba'i gzugs su gnas te kun nas mdzes/_/me tog sgo rnams kun nas dgye mdzad pas/_/
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]chos dbyings bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba kun tu khyab/_/khyod kyi phrag pa'i lhun yangs 'phags pa ni/_/rin chen 'od 'phro ri bo ri rab 'dra/_/dri med de ni 'gro ba kun tu gsal/_/gti mug mun nag rnam par bzlog pa mdzad/_/khyod 
[\[117a.2\]]kyi dri med zhal mdog bzang ba las/_/na bun sprin dang nyi ma yangs pa 'byung /_/khyod kyi nyi ma'i 'khor 'dra 'od bzang ba/_/rnam par snang mdzad spyod yul yangs pa 'byin/_/khyod kyi spyan nas zla skar 'od 'byung ba/_/rtag tu dri med sprin ltar mang 
[\[117a.3\]]ba ste/_de dag phyogs bcur bkang zhing 'gro ba rnams/_/rab tu snang byed 'jig rten rab rib sel/_/khyod kyi mtshan las 'gro ba'i lus mnyam pa'i/_/sprul pa rgya mtsho phyogs su khyab par 'phro/_/de dag chos dbyings yangs par rgyas 'gengs shing /_/
[\[117a.4\]]sems can tshad med tshogs rnams yongs su 'dul/_/khyod kyi sku ni 'byam klas phyogs su snang /_/'gro ba kun la mngon gyur dga' ba bskyed/_/rgyal po me dang rkun po chus bskyed pa'i/_/'jigs pa thams cad rnam sel zhi bar mdzad/_/gang tshe 
[\[117a.5\]]khyod kyi spyan sngar bdag btang nas/_/yon tan rnam par sems shing nyer phyin pa/_/de'i tshe 'od zer dri med 'khor bzang ba/_/khyod kyi zhal gyi smin mtshams gseb nas 'thon/_/phyogs rnams rgya mtsho brgya mang snang mdzad nas/_/'jig rten snang ba 
[\[117a.6\]]rgya che yongs bskyed de/_/rnam 'phrul rnam pa mang po rnam bstan nas/_/de tshe bdag gi lus kyi gseb tu zha/_/gang tshe 'od kyi 'khor gyis bdag reg pa/_/de tshe bde ba rmad byung yangs pa myong /_/gzungs dang ting 'dzin brgya mang yongs su gnon/_/
[\[117a.7\]]phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba dpag yas mthong bar 'gyur/_/gom pa rnam bor gyen du bteg pa la'ang /_/rdul phran grangs snyed tshul ni bdag gis rig_/rdul phran shin tu phra ba gcig la yang /_/zhing gi rdul snyed zhing rnams mthong bar gyur/_/rdul la gnas 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]kyang rnam pa tha dgu ste/_/zhing mang brgya ni shin tu nyon yang mongs/_/de yi 'gro ba sdug bsngal nyams su myong /_/chong nger ngu zhing smre sngags yongs su 'don/_/zhing mang la la kun nas nyon mongs dag_/de na sdug bsngal mang zhing bde ba chung /_/rgyal ba 
[\[117b.2\]]thugs rje can yang der skyes te/_/rgyal ba'i nyan thos rang rgyal de bzhin no/_/zhing tshul la la yongs dag nyon mongs te/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gnas [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mang pos brgyan/_/skyes pa bud med yongs brgyan blta na sdug_/skyon med rgyal ba'i gdung 
[\[117b.3\]]yang rgyun mi 'chad/_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho yangs shing dri med pa/_/rdul la gnas shing mnyam pa'i gzhi dang ldan/_/de dag bskal pa brgya mang sngon gyi tshe/_/rnam par snang mdzad spyod mdzad yongs su sbyangs/_/zhing rnams 'byam klas kun nas rgyal ba dag_/
[\[117b.4\]]shing dbang dam pa'i drung du gshegs pa ston/_/rnam par 'phrul zhing byang chub 'tshang yang rgya/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cing 'dul ba ston/_/rnam par snang mdzad spyod yul yangs pa la/_/khyod kyang kun tu rjes su bzhud par mthong /_/mchod pa stong phrag tshad 
[\[117b.5\]]med khrag khrig gis/_/rgyal ba kun la mngon par mchod mdzad mthong /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas/_mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha mo byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[117b.6\]]rnam par thar pa de/_de lta bu zab pa ni ngo mtshar che na/_rnam par thar ba de'i ming ni ci zhes bgyi/_de khyod kyis brnyes nas yun ni ji srid cig lags/_byang chub sems dpas ji ltar nan tan du bgyis na rnam par thar pa de yongs su dag par 'gyur/_smras pa rigs kyi 
[\[117b.7\]]bu gnas 'di ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su bcas pas yid ches par dka' ba ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /_smon lam khong du chud pa rnams kyi spyod yul te/_'di ni byang chub 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]sems dpa' snying rje chen po lhur len pa/_'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa la zhugs pa/_mi khom pa dang ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro'i lam thams cad rnam par bzlog pa la zhugs pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams 
[\[118a.2\]]cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa/_bla na med par bya ba la zhugs pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rgyun mi gcad pa la zhugs pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa yongs su gzung ba la zhugs pa/_bskal 
[\[118a.3\]]pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pas/_gnas par bya ba'i smon lam chen po rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/_chos rgya mtsho thams cad la bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes snang ba rnam par sbyang ba la zhugs pa/_skad cig re re zhing dus gsum gyi tshul rgya mtsho 
[\[118a.4\]]thams cad du ye shes snang bas/_rnam par gnas pa rab tu thob pa rnams kyi yul te/_'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bstan par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig 
[\[118a.5\]]gi pha rol tu 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang mdzad gzi brjid dpal zhes bya bar bskal pa rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba byung ste/_bskal pa de las sangs rgyas ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung bar gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams rnam 
[\[118a.6\]]par snang mdzad gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba de ni rin po che thams cad kyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste/_rdo rje las byas pa'i gzhal med khang dang /_gnas kyis yongs su mdzes par byas pa'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams de'i gzhi ni rin po che'i rgyal po 
[\[118a.7\]]dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rgya mtsho las blangs pa ste/_lhun dang lus ni nor bu rin po che'i spos thams cad kyi rgyal po las gyur pa'o/_/de ni dbyibs kun tu zlum pa ste/_rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/_lhab lhub thams cad kyi sprin gyi bla res 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]kun nas khyab pa/_rin po che'i khor yug rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa/_rim pa stong gis yongs su bskor ba/_gling bzhi pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gis shin tu rgyas par brgyan pa ste/_de la gling bzhi pa la la ni kun nas nyon mongs 
[\[118b.2\]]pa ste/_sems can kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las dang ldan pa rnams kyi gnas so/_/la la ni kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa ste/_sems can las 'dren ma dang ldan pa rnams kyi gnas so/_/la la ni rnam par dag cing 
[\[118b.3\]]kun nas nyon mongs pa ste/_sems can yongs su dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa/_kha na ma tho ba nyung ba rnams kyi gnas so/_/la la ni shin tu yongs su dag pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' dag pa rnams kyi 
[\[118b.4\]]gnas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang mdzad gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba de'i shar phyogs logs kyi khor yug gi mtshams na/_gling bzhi ba'i rin chen me tog sgron ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/_
[\[118b.5\]]ma rmos ma bskyed pa'i 'bras la yongs su spyod pa/_sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas mngon par grub pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas dang /_gzhal med khang la yongs su spyod pa/_'khor kun nas yid bzhin gyi shing gis 'khor ba/_spos 
[\[118b.6\]]kyi shing sna tshogs kyi lhun las spos kyi sprin rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ba/_phreng ba sna tshogs kyi shing las phreng ba'i sprin rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ba/_me tog sna tshogs kyi shing las me tog kha dog dang /_dri bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sprin kyi char 
[\[118b.7\]]rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab pa/_phye ma dang /_kha dog sna tshogs kyi shing gi lhun las spos rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi phye ma'i char rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab pa/_rin po che'i shing sna tshogs las rin po che'i 'bru mang po 'brul ba'i/_kha dog snang 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]bas shin tu snang bar byas pa/_lha rdzas kyi rol mo sna tshogs kyi shing las/_sil snyan sna tshogs kyi sprin rlung gis bskyod cing /_nam mkha'i dbyings las sgra dbyangs snyan pa 'byung ba/_nyin mtshan gyi bde ba nyi ma dang zla bas 'byung ba/_nor 
[\[119a.2\]]bu rin po che kun tu snang bas gzhi byas pa'i sa rab tu mnyam par gyur pa ste/_gling bzhi pa der rgyal po'i/_pho brang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong byung bar gyur te/_rgyal po'i pho brang de dag re re zhing yang chu klung stong gis yongs su bskor ba'o/_/chu 
[\[119a.3\]]klung de dag thams cad kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog sil mas gang ba'o/_/lha rdzas kyi rol mo dang /_glu'i sgra skad snyan cing yid du 'ong ba 'byin pa'o/_/chu 'gram rin po che'i shing yid du 'ong bas rnam par brgyan pa'o/_/rin po che sna tshogs kyis shin 
[\[119a.4\]]tu brgyan pa'i gru phan tshun du rgyu ba'o/_/bde ba sna tshogs ci dga' bar yongs su spyad du yod pa'o/_/chu klung gi mtshan mas kyi gzhi re re dag na 'ang /_grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu kun nas gnas pa ste/_grong khyer de dag 
[\[119a.5\]]re re zhing yang grong rdal bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gis yongs su bskor ba'o/_/grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal de dag thams cad kyang lha rdzas kyi bza' shing gi ra ba dang /_gzhal med khang dang /_khang pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi 
[\[119a.6\]]'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba'o/_/gling bzhi pa de'i 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus na rgyal po'i pho brang dbu ma rin po che'i me tog sgron ma zhes bya ba yod par gyur to/_/de ni skyid cing longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan la/_rtag 
[\[119a.7\]]du lo legs shing bde ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'o/_/lha dang mi mang pos yongs su gang ba'o/_/sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa rnams kyi gnas su gyur pa ste/_rgyal po'i pho brang rin po che me tog sgron ma 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]zhes bya ba de na rgyal po rnam par snang ba rin chen pad mo dpal gyi gtsug phud snying po zhes bya ba 'khor los sgyur ba/_gling bzhi la dbang ba pad mo'i snying po las rdzus te byung ba/_mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis lus shin tu brgyan pa chos dang ldan pa 
[\[119b.2\]]chos kyi rgyal po rin po che bdun dang ldan pa gnas par gyur to/_/de'i bu dpa' zhing rdul phod la yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa/_gzhan gyi 'khor rab tu 'joms pa/_rnam pa thams cad yongs su tshang ba'i yan lag dam pa dang ldan pa stong 
[\[119b.3\]]tshang bar byung nga ngo /_/de'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi bud med kyang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu yod par gyur to/_/de dag kun kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i skal ba dang mnyam pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba mthun par spyod pa rin po che'i rgyan rang 'khrungs 
[\[119b.4\]]su byung ba/_dge ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_lha'i bu mo dang khyad par med par 'dra ba'i gzugs can/_'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i mdog dang ldan pa'i lus can/_lus kyi ba spu las lha rdzas kyi spos sna tshogs 'byung ba/_lus 
[\[119b.5\]]las lha rdzas kyi 'od dri zhim po dri ma med par rab tu 'gyed pa sha stag go/_/de'i blon po bye ba phrag bcu byung ste blon po rin po che la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dag go_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba rin chen pad mo dpal gyi gtsug phud snying po de'i btsun mo dam pa 
[\[119b.6\]]bud med rin po che dpal gyi bzhin yongs su rgyas pa zhes bya ba gzugs mdzes shing sdug la/_blta na yid du 'ong ba kha dog bzang po shin tu rgyas pa'i dam pa dang ldan pa/_skra mthon ting du 'dug pa/_mig dkar nag 'byes pa/_mdog gser gyi kha 
[\[119b.7\]]dog du 'dug pa/_tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa/_lus las 'od rtag tu 'byung ba/_'khor kun tu dpag tshad stong gi tshad du 'od kha dog du ma dang ldan pa/_lha rdzas kyi dri zhim po can 'gyed pa byung ngo /_/rgyal po'i btsun mo dpal gyi bzhin yongs su rgyas pa zhes bya ba de 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]las bu mo pad+mo bzang mo mig yid du 'ong ba'i dpal gyi zla ba zhes bya ba yan lag thams cad tshang ba/_gzugs mdzes shing sdug pa/_blta na yid du 'ong ba/_'jig rten thams cad gyis blta na mi ngoms pa byung bar gyur te/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_
[\[120a.2\]]'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la blta na su yang ngoms par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du 'khor los sgyur ba'i bu mo pad+mo bzang mo mig yid du 'ong ba'i dpal de la blta bas kyang su yang ngoms par mi 'gyur te/_shes rab kyis yongs su ngoms par 'gyur ba ni ma gtogs so/_/de'i tshe 
[\[120a.3\]]de'i dus na/_sems can rnams kyang tshe dpag tu med par gyur te/_tshe la gcig tu nges pa med pas bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/de'i dus na sems can rnams kyi dbyibs sna tshogs dang /_kha dog sna tshogs dang /_dbyangs sna tshogs dang /_ming sna tshogs dang /_rigs sna tshogs dang /_
[\[120a.4\]]tshe'i tshad sna tshogs dang /_chu zheng rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_mos pa dang stobs dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_mthu rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_yid du 'ong ba dang /_yid du mi 'ong ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_yangs pa dang dma' ba la mos pa sna tshogs kyang yod par gyur te/_de la sems can ji snyed 
[\[120a.5\]]cig kha dog bzang ba dang /_yangs pa la mos pa dang /_yan lag tshang ba dang /_blta na sdug cing yid du 'ong bar gyur pa de dag ni 'di skad ces 'dzer te/_kye mi dag nga ni khyed bas kha dog ches bzang ngo zhes zer ro/_/de bzhin du sems can ji snyed cig lus kyi dbyibs legs pa dang ldan 
[\[120a.6\]]par gyur pa de dag kyang /_sems can lus kyi dbyibs mi sdug par 'gyur ba rnams la rlom zhing khyad du gsod do/_/de dag de ltar gcig la gcig khyad du gsod pa las byung ba'i mi dge ba'i rtsa bas tshe'i tshad las kyang yongs su bri bar gyur to/_//kha dog dang stobs dang bde ba las kyang yongs su bri 
[\[120a.7\]]bar gyur to/_/rgyal po'i pho brang rin po che'i me tog sgron ma de'i byang phyogs logs na/_snying po byang chub kyi shing kun tu grags pa'i chos kyi sprin sgra'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub kyi rgyan skad cig re re la yongs su ston pa/_rtsa ba rin po che'i rgyal po 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi 'jig pa/_nor bu rin po che thams cad las grub pas lhun shin tu yangs shing rgyas pa/_sdong po dang yal ga dang lo ma dang /_mdab ma dang me tog dang /_'bras bu rin po che thams cad kyi rgyu las grub pa/_kun tu cha mnyam par bkod cing /_kun tu khyab pa'i yan lag dang 
[\[120b.2\]]ldan pa/_rgyan kun tu rgyas par 'gengs shing mi zad pa dang ldan pa/_rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od 'phro dang /_'od gzer kun tu snang ba 'gyed pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i dbyangs rjes su sgrog pa yod de/_snying po byang chub de'i mdun rol na/_
[\[120b.3\]]spos chu'i mtsho rin po che'i me tog dang /_glog dang chos kyi 'brug sgra'i sprin gyi dbyangs shes bya ba yod de/_de ni rin po che'i shing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor ba ste/_rin po che'i shing de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi shing gi dbyibs su 'khod pa sha stag go_/spos chu'i mtsho chen 
[\[120b.4\]]po rin po che'i me tog dang /_glog dang chos kyi 'brug sgra'i sprin gyi dbyangs zhes bya ba de'i 'gram thams cad kyang nor bu rin po che thams cad bkram zhing rnam par bkod pa ste/_rin po che thams cad kyi phreng ba sna tshogs su dgrigs pa'o/_/rin po che rnam par dag pa las byas pa'i khang pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan 
[\[120b.5\]]gyis yongs su brgyan pa'o/_/rgyan rnam par dag pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan pa'o/_/snying po byang chub de'i 'khor thams cad kyang nor bu rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa chen po rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/_pad+ma'i snying po can sha stag gis yongs su 'khor ba ste/_spos 
[\[120b.6\]]chu'i mtsho chen po rin po che'i me tog dang glog dang chos kyi 'brug sgra'i sprin gyi dbyangs zhes bya ba de'i dbus nas/_pad+mo'i rgyal po chen po lo ma'i mtshams nas dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul rnam par ston pa'i 'od gzer gyi sprin gyi rgyan ces bya ba byung bar gyur te/_pad+mo chen po de 
[\[120b.7\]]la de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de dag gi nang nas bskal pa'i thog ma pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rin po che'i 'od kun tu 'phro ba'i dpal yon tan dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba byung bar gyur te/_de ni bskal pa de la thams cad kyi thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_des lo stong phrag du ma zhig du chos bstan pas/_sems can yongs su smin par mdzad nas/_lo stong phrag bcur 'od gzer snang ba'i rnam par 'phrul pas yongs su smin par mdzad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de 
[\[121a.2\]]lo stong phrag bcu na 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba'i tshe pad+ma'i rgyal po chen po lo ma'i mtshams nas/_dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul rnam par ston pa'i 'od gzer gyi sprin gyi rgyan ces bya ba de las sems can thams cad rdul dang 'byed pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i 
[\[121a.3\]]'od zer byung bar gyur te/_'od des phog pa'i sems can rnams kyis kyang lo stong phrag bcu na de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar shes so/_/lo stong phrag dgu na de bzhin gshegs pa de 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshe/_byang chub kyi shing de las rdul dang bral ba'i 
[\[121a.4\]]dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba'i 'od gzer byung ste/_'od gzer des phog pa'i sems can de dag gis kyang gzugs thams cad shin tu phra bar mthong bar gyur to/_/lo stong phrag brgyad na de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i tshe/_byang chub kyi shing chen po de nyid las 'od zer sems can 
[\[121a.5\]]thams cad kyi las rnam par smin pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba byung ste/_des phog pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis kyang rang rang gi las rgya mtsho khong du chud par gyur te/_las dran pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur to/_/lo stong phrag bdun na de bzhin gshegs pa de 'byung bar 'gyur ro 
[\[121a.6\]]zhes bya ba'i tshe/_byang chub kyi shing de nyid las 'od gzer dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba byung ste/_'od gzer des sems can de dag la phog nas dbang po nyams pa med cing yongs su tshang bar gyur to/_/lo stong phrag drug na de bzhin gshegs pa de 'byung 
[\[121a.7\]]bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshe/_byang chub kyi shing chen po de nyid las 'od gzer sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba byung ste/_des sems can de dag la phog nas bsam pa rgya chen pos rnam par 'phrul bar gyur to/_/lo stong phrag ldan de bzhin gshegs pa de 'byung 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshe/_byang chub kyi shing chen po de nyid las 'od gzer sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par sgra 'byin ba'i gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa zhes bya ba byung ste/_des sems can de dag la phog nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam pa thams cad du yongs su 
[\[121b.2\]]dag par mthong bar gyur to/_/lo stong phrag bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa de 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshe/_byang chub kyi shing chen po de nyid las 'od gzer de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul tha mi dad pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba byung ste/_des sems can de dag la phog nas de 
[\[121b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa de'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad du song ba la zhugs par gyur to/_/lo stong phrag gsum na de bzhin gshegs pa de 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshe/_byang chub kyi shing chen po de las 'od zer 'gro ba thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba byung ste/_des sems can de 
[\[121b.4\]]dag la phog nas de bzhin gshegs pa de yang mngon du mos pas mthong bar gyur to/_/lo stong phrag gnyis na de bzhin gshegs pa de 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshe/_byang chub kyi shing chen po de las 'od gzer dus gsum gyi ye shes kyi glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[121b.5\]]kyi sngon gyi tshul rab tu sgrog pa byung ste/_des sems can de dag la reg nas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sngon gyi tshul rgya mtsho la rtog cing 'jug par gyur to/_/lo stong na de bzhin gshegs pa de 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshe/_byang chub kyi shing chen po de las 'od gzer ye shes rab rib 
[\[121b.6\]]med pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba byung ste/_des sems can de dag la phog nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_zhing thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ba'i mig kun tu lta ba thob par gyur to/_/de bzhin 
[\[121b.7\]]gshegs pa de lo brgya na 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshe/_byang chub kyi shing chen po de nyid las 'od zer 'gro ba thams cad kyis sangs rgyas mthong ba rnam par smin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba zhes bya ba byung ste/_des sems can de dag la phog nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]skye ba'i 'du shes thob par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de zhag bdun na skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshe/_byang chub kyi shing chen po de nyid las 'od zer sems can thams cad rab tu dga' ba dang /_spro ba dang mos pa yongs su 'byung ba'i 
[\[122a.2\]]dbyangs shes bya ba byung ste/_des sems can de dag la phog nas sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ba'i dga' ba'i shugs chen po skyes par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar 'od zer gyis yongs su smin par bya ba'i tshul tshad med pa rnam pa de lta bus lo stong du sems can rnams 
[\[122a.3\]]yongs su smyin par mdzad nas zhag bdun pa la thug pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad yongs su bskyod pa'i tshul tshad med pas yongs su bskyod nas shin tu dag par byin gyis brlabs so/_/phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[122a.4\]]yongs su dge pa ji snyed pa rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems kyi skad cig re re la yongs su bstan par gyur to/_/de nas zhag bdun pa tha ma la bab pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can sangs 
[\[122a.5\]]rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ba yongs su smin pa de dag thams cad snying po byang chub tu mngon par gzhol bar gyur to/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de'i khor yug thams cad dang /_ri rab thams cad dang /_ri thams cad dang /_chu klung thams cad dang /_rgya mtsho thams cad dang shing 
[\[122a.6\]]thams cad dang /_sa'i gzhi thams cad dang /_grong khyer thams cad dang /_ra ba thams cad dang /_gnas thams cad dang /_gzhal med khang thams cad dang /_gos dang rgyan dang longs spyod thams cad dang /_rol mo'i shing thams cad dang /_rol mo brdung ba'i dbyangs 
[\[122a.7\]]thams cad dang /_sprul pa'i rgyan thams cad kyi dmigs pa re re las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul dang /_mthu'i sgra rab tu sgrog pa'i spos dang /_bdug spos thams cad kyi sprin mngon par 'thon te/_rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i sprin dang /_spos dang bdug spos 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba dam pa dang /_spos rin po che thams cad kyi gzugs kyi sprin dang /_gos rin po che dang /_rgyan rin po che thams cad kyi sprin dang /_rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyi ri rab kyi sprin dang phye ma sna tshogs kyi sprin mang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od gzer 
[\[122b.2\]]gyi sprin rnam par ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin rab tu 'gyed pa/_rol mo brdung ba dang /_dkrol ba thams cad kyi sprin yongs su 'khrol zhing rdung ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam gyi sgra skad kyi sprin rab tu 'byin pa/_de 
[\[122b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag dang /_gsung rgya mtsho'i sprin rab tu sgrog pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i gzugs brnyan sna tshogs kyi sprin rab tu ston par byed cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i ltas sngon du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa 
[\[122b.4\]]yongs su ston te/_rin po che'i rgyal po'i pad+mo chen po'i lo ma'i mtshams nas/_dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul rnam par ston pa'i 'od gzer gyi sprin gyi rgyan de'i pad+mo'i 'khor rin po che'i rgyal po las byas pa chen po sha stag tu byas te 'khod do/_/rin po che'i 
[\[122b.5\]]rgyal po'ipad+mo chen po'i 'khor kyi rin po che'i pad mo chen po de dag gi ze ba dang /_snying po la seng ge'i khri rin po che'i pad+mo chen po'i snying po can/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag byung bar gyur te/_rin po che'i snying po can gyi khri de dag la'ang byang chub sems 
[\[122b.6\]]dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das ye shes rin po che'i 'od kun tu 'phro ba'i dpal yon tan dpal gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 
[\[122b.7\]]sangs rgyas ma thag tu de'i mod la/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa mang po dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/_sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon sum du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur to/_/
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]de nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can tshad med pa rnams ngan song dang log par ltung ba thams cad las rnam par bzlog go_/sems can tshad med pa ni mtho ris su skye ba la rab tu bkod do/_/sems can tshad med pa ni nyan thos kyi sa la 
[\[123a.2\]]rab tu bkod do/_/sems can tshad med pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so/_/sems can tshad med pa ni shugs drag po'i 'od kyis 'byung ba'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so/_/sems can tshad med pa ni brtson 'grus dri ma 
[\[123a.3\]]med pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so/_/sems can tshad med pa ni chos rab tu bsgom pa'i gnas su byung ba'i byang chub la rab tu bkod do/_/sems can tshad med pa ni dbang po yongs su dag pa rab tu bsgoms pas 'byung ba'i byang 
[\[123a.4\]]chub tu yongs su smin par byas so/_/sems can tshad med pa ni stobs mnyam pa nyid la yang dag par spyod pa khong du chud pas 'byung ba'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so/_/sems can tshad med pa ni chos kyi grong khyer mngon du 'gyur ba'i yul gyi theg ba skye 
[\[123a.5\]]pas 'byung ba'i byang chub la rab tu bkod do/_/sems can tshad med pa ni thams cad du rjes su song ba'i rdzu 'phrul tha mi dad pa'i tshul gyi theg pas 'byung ba'i byang chub la rab tu bkod do/_/sems can tshad med pa ni spyod pa'i sbyor ba la yang dag par gzhol ba'i tshul gyis 
[\[123a.6\]]'byung ba'i byang chub la rab tu bkod do/_/sems can tshad med pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyis 'jug pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba'i byang chub la rab tu bkod do/_/sems can tshad med pa ni dmigs pa'i yul thams cad yongs su dag pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis 'byung ba'i byang chub 
[\[123a.7\]]la rab tu bkod do/_/sems can tshad med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/sems can tshad med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam la rab tu bkod do/_/sems can tshad med pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam rnam par dag pa la rab tu bkod do/_/sems 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]can tshad med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la rab tu bkod do/_/sems can tshad med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang lnga pa dang /_drug pa dang bdun pa dang /_brgyad pa dang dgu pa la rab tu bkod do/_/sems can tshad med pa 
[\[123b.2\]]ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa la rab tu bkod do/_/sems can tshad med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa smon lam gyi khyad par can la btsud do/_/sems can tshad med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /_smon lam rnam par dag pa la rab 
[\[123b.3\]]tu bkod do/_/de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa des sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa rnam par dul bar gyur to/_/
[\[123b.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku sna tshogs dang /_thabs mkhas pa sna tshogs kyis bsgrubs pa'i chos bstan pa yongs su shes par gyur te/_rgyal po'i pho brang rin po che'i me tog sgron ma'i sems can 
[\[123b.5\]]gzugs dang /_kha dog dang yul dang longs spyod kyis rgyags shing dregs te gcig la gcig khyad du gsod pa de rnams gdul ba'i don du byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos kha dog dang gzugs mchog tu phyin par mngon par sprul te/_rgyal po'i pho brang 
[\[123b.6\]]der phyin to/_/de'i 'od shin tu yangs pas rgyal po'i gnas de dag thams cad du yongs su snang bar gyur te/_rgyal po'i gnas de'i 'od dang /_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba rin chen pad+mo'i dpal gyi gtsug phud snying po'i lus las byung ba'i 'od dang /_
[\[123b.7\]]bud med rin po che'i 'od dang /_rin po che'i shing gi 'od dang /_nor bu rin po che chen po'i 'od dang /_gnyi zla dang gza' skar dang rgyu skar gyi 'od dang /_'dzam bu'i gling na 'od ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mi snang bar gyur te/_dper na nyi ma shar te mun 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]pa dang /_zla ba dang gza' skar dang /_rgyu skar gyi 'od kyang mi snang la me dang nor bu'i 'od kyang mi snang ngo /_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos zil gyis non nas 'dzam bu'i gling de na 'od yod pa thams cad kyang mi snang bar gyur to/_/
[\[124a.2\]]'di lta ste dper na/_'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi sa le sbram gyi drung du snag tsha'i gzugs bzhag na mdzes par mi rung /_lha ger mi rung /_lha mer mi rung /_lha der mi rung ngo /_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'i mdun du sems can de dag gi 
[\[124a.3\]]gzugs kyi lus kyang mdzes par ma rung /_lha ger ma rung /_lha mer ma rung /_lha der ma rung ngo /_/de nas de dag 'di snyam du gyur te/_de lta bu zhig de ltar de'i drung du bdag cag gi lus sam/_'od dam kha dog gam/_gzi brjid kyis kyang mdzes par ma 
[\[124a.4\]]rung /_lha ger ma rung /_lha mer ma rung /_lha der ma rung ba de lta lha'am/_tshangs pa'am/_ci zhig de'i mtshan ma ni gzung bar mi nus so snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos rgyal po'i gnas rin po che'i me tog sgron ma'i dbus 'khor 
[\[124a.5\]]los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba rin chen pad+mo dpal gyi gtsug phud snying po'i gzhal med khang gi steng gi bar snang la 'dug ste/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba rin chen pad+mo dpal gyi gtsug phud snying po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po 
[\[124a.6\]]shes par gyis shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ste/_khyod kyi khams 'di nyid kyi snying po byang chub chos kun tu snang ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi sgra dbyangs rgyal mtshan 'di nyid na rnam par spyod do zhes pa dang /_
[\[124a.7\]]rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes kyi 'od kun tu 'phro ba pad+mo bzang po mig yid du 'ong ba'i dpal gyi zla bas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'i gzugs kyi lus dang /_'od dang rnam par 'phrul pa dang rgyan mthong ste/_dbyangs thos nas dga' ba dang /_mos pa'i shugs chen po 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]skyes te/_de'i tshe sems 'di snyam du bskyed do/_/bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci bstsags pa des bdag kyang lus 'di 'dra bar thob par shog shig_/rgyan 'di 'dra ba dang /_mtshan 'di 'dra ba dang /_spyod lam 'di 'dra ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul 'di 'dra bar shog shig_/ji ltar 
[\[124b.2\]]'dis mtshan mo mun nag gi nang na sems can rnams la snang ba chen po bskyed de/_sangs rgyas skye ba yongs su brjod pa de bzhin du/_bdag gis kyang sems can rnams kyi mi shes pa'i mun pa bstsal te ye shes chen po 'di snang bskyed par bya'o/_/gang dang gang du skyes pa thams 
[\[124b.3\]]cad du'ang dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'di dang mi 'bral bar shog shig_/de nas rigs kyi bu 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba rin chen pad+mo dpal gyi gtsug phud snying po yan lag bzhi'i dpung gi tshogs dang lhan cig_/rin po che bdun dang lhan cig_/bud med kyi tshogs 
[\[124b.4\]]kyi 'khor dang lhan cig bu dang blon po dang /_ljongs kyi mi dang lhan cig tu rgyal po'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_rgyal po'i mthu chen pos rgyal po'i gnas rin po che'i me tog sgron ma de nas 'phags te gyen tu nam mkha' la dpag tshad gcig tsam du mngon par 'phags nas/_
[\[124b.5\]]'dzam bu'i gling thams cad dang /_gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang ba chen pos rgyas par bkang ste/_sems can thams cad sangs rgyas blta ba la yongs su bskul ba'i don du rin po che'i ri thams cad la gzugs brnyan mngon par bstan cing gling bzhi pa'i 
[\[124b.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams la mngon sum du gnas te sangs rgyas la blta ba de tshigs su bcad de glu'i dbyangs kyis bsngags pa/_/lus can thams cad skyabs mdzad pa'i/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten byung bar gyur/_/'jig rten gtso bo de blta 
[\[124b.7\]]bar/_/kun kyang langs te 'dong bar gyis/_/lus can kun la phan don du/_/chos rab ston par gang mdzad pa'i/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba ni/_/bskal pa bye ba'i brgya lam na'o/_/'jig rten phyin cir log gyur cing /_/mi shes sgrib pas bsgribs gyur te/_/'khor 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]ba'i sdug bsngal myong pa rnams/_/gzigs shing thugs rje che bskyed nas/_/sdug bsngal thams cad gzhil don du/_/sems can yongs su smin bya'i phyir/_/bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/_/byang chub spyod pa spyad pa mdzad/_bskal pa mtha' 
[\[125a.2\]]yas mu med par/_/sangs rgyas byang chub mchog don du/_/zhabs dang phyag kyang yongs su btang /_/spyan dang snyan dang dbu yang btang /_/mthong zhing bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /_/thos pa don yod 'gyur ba yin/_/'jig rten mgon po 'jig rten du/_/'byung ba bskal pa bye bar dkon/_
[\[125a.3\]]de ni byang chub gdan la bzhugs/_/gsung ba'i dam pa bltar yang yod/_/bdud rnams sde dang bcas btul te/_/byang chub mchog tu rnam sangs rgyas/_/'od gzer dkyil 'khor mtha' yas pa/_/sangs rgyas sku las mngon bkye zhing /_/'gro ba tshim par mdzad pa yi/_/
[\[125a.4\]]kha dog sna tshogs 'di la ltos/_/'od zer sprin mang grangs med pa/_/sangs rgyas sku las 'thon pa rnams/_/des ni sems can snang gyur na/_/bde ba dpe med 'thob par 'gyur/_/brtson 'grus chen po rab rtsom ste/_/rang dang rang gi bsam pa yis/_/mgon po de la 
[\[125a.5\]]mchod pa gyis/_/tshur sheg de yi gan du 'dong /_/de nas rgyal po rnam par snang ba rin chen pad+mo dpal gyi gtsug phud snying pos tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis bdag gi khams na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad yongs su bskul te/_mchod pa'i sprin sna tshogs brgya 
[\[125a.6\]]stong phrag bcu 'khor los sgyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su grub pa'i char pa/_snying po byang chub kun nas ldang ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi dbyangs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi 'khor kun tu mngon par 'bebs shing /_rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin gyi nam mkha' kun nas yog 
[\[125a.7\]]par bya ba dang /_me tog thams cad kyi bla re'i sprin gyis nam mkha' bla nas kheb par bya ba dang /_na bza' sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis nam mkha' kun nas yog cing brgyan par bya ba dang /_rin po che sna tshogs kyi dril bu'i dra ba'i sprin gyis nam mkha'i dbyings brgyan 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]par bya ba dang /_spos sna tshogs rgya mtshos dri zhim par byas pa'i spos kyi 'od zer gyi sprin gyi rgyan nam mkha'i dbyings la byin gyis brlab par bya ba dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi khri la rin po che'i gdan 'bel bar bting ba'i sprin gyi rgyan nam mkha'i dbyings la byin kyis brlab pa 
[\[125b.2\]]dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan gyi sprin mngon par bsgreng ba'i rgyan nam mkha'i dbyings la byin gyis brlab pa dang /_khang pa dang gzhal med khang thams cad kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa'i rgyan nam mkha'i dbyings la byin gyis brlab pa dang /_me tog sna tshogs kyi sprin 
[\[125b.3\]]gyis kun nas yog pa'i rgyan nam mkha'i dbyings la byin gyis brlab pa dang /_mchod pa'i rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan nam mkha'i dbyings la byin gyis brlab pa byed cing /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rin po che'i 'od kun tu 'phro ba'i dpal 
[\[125b.4\]]yon tan dpal gyi rgyal po gang na ba der song ste/_phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rin po che'i 'od kun tu 'phro ba'i dpal yon tan dpal gyi rgyal po'i zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su 
[\[125b.5\]]bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar stan nor bu rin po che chen po'i phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can la 'dug go_/de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i bu mo ye shes rin po che'i 'od kun tu 'phro ba'i pad+mo bzang mo mig yid du 'ong ba'i dpal gyi zla bas 
[\[125b.6\]]rang gi rgyan rnams lus las bkrol te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi 'od kun du 'phro ba'i dpal yon tan dpal gyi rgyal po la gtor to mngon par gtor to/_/de nas rgyan de dag bcom ldan 'das de'i dbu'i gtsug gi steng gi bar snang la nor bu rin po 
[\[125b.7\]]che'i rgyan gyi gdugs chen po nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra bas yongs su bskor ba klu'i dbang po'i lus kyis gzung ba rgyan thams cad kyi lus kyis dbyibs shin tu legs par kun nas bskor ba/_rgyan gyi gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor bcus yongs su bskor ba/_shin tu dag pa 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/_rin po che thams cad kyi lhab lhub kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/_nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi shing gi rgyan gyis kun nas khebs pa/_nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po spos thams cad kyi rgya 
[\[126a.2\]]mtshos yongs su brgyan par 'dug par gyur te/_de'i dbus na byang chub kyi shing chen po chos kyi dbyings las byung ba'i rin po che thams cad kyi yal ga dang /_lhun du ldan pa zhes bya ba rgyan brjod na mtha' dang dbus med pa skad cig re re zhing rgyan sna tshogs yongs su 
[\[126a.3\]]ston pa yod pa mthong bar gyur to/_/de'i drung na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phreng ba snyed kun kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'i spyod pa dang /_smon lam gyis 
[\[126a.4\]]byung ba byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan sna tshogs tha mi dad cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rnam par spyod pa sha stag gis bskor cing mdun du byas pa dang /_'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyang de la mngon tu gyur pa mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de'i 
[\[126a.5\]]sangs rgyas kyis rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa yang mthong bar gyur to/_/sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la'ang zhugs par gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams de'i 'du ba dang 'jig pa'i bskal pa la'ang zhugs 
[\[126a.6\]]par gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams der 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la'ang zhugs par gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na sangs rgyas mchod pa 
[\[126a.7\]]la brtson par gnas pa yang mthong ngo /_/sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul bar bya ba la mngon du gyur par yang mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lus la gzugs brnyan du gyur 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]par 'khod cing bdag nyid kyang rjes su 'brang bar mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi drung dang /_sems can thams cad kyi gnas dang /_'jig rten gyi khams de dang de dag thams cad na'ang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[126b.2\]]kun tu bzang po'i gzugs brnyan kun tu byung ste/_'jig rten gyi khams de dag re re na'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mtshams kyi rgyan dang bcas pa dang gzhi dang bcas pa dang /_dbyibs dang bcas pa dang /_lhun dang bcas pa dang /_
[\[126b.3\]]rgyan sna tshogs yongs su dag pa dang bcas pa/_rgyan sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis kun nas khebs pa rnam par bkod pa dang /_myid dang grags rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud sna tshogs las brjod pa dus gsum gyi tshul sna tshogs su 
[\[126b.4\]]gtogs pa dang /_phyogs 'byam klas pa sna tshogs su 'du ba chos kyi dbyings 'byam klas pa sna tshogs kyi khongs su gtogs pa/_chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi sna tshogs su 'dus pa/_nam mkha'i dbyings sna tshogs la rnam par gnas pa/_snying po byang chub sna tshogs 
[\[126b.5\]]kyis brgyan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis byung ba sangs rgyas kyi seng ge'i gdan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 
[\[126b.6\]]'khor gyi rgyud sna tshogs can/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs mkhas pa sna tshogs yongs su brjod pa dang ldan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba'i tshul sna tshogs can de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag dang /_gsung gi nga ro
