[\[126b.7\]]sna tshogs rab tu 'byung ba/_skad sna tshogs rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa dang ldan pa dang /_mdo sde'i sprin sna tshogs rjes su sgrog pa can dag kyang mthong bar gyur to/_/mthong nas de bas kyang dga' ba dang /_mos pa'i shugs chen po thob par gyur te/_de de ltar 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]dga' ba'i shugs chen po skyes par gyur ba la/_bcom ldan 'das ye shes rin po che'i 'od kun tu 'phro ba'i dpal yon tan dpal gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bsgrags pa zhes bya ba'i mdo 
[\[127a.2\]]sde 'khor gyi mdo sde/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang bcas pa yang dag par bstan te/_des mdo sde de thos par gyur nas/_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo stong phrag bcu shin tu phra zhing reg na bde bar thob par gyur te/_de ni dper na ma'i mngal du rnam par shes pa 
[\[127a.3\]]zhugs par gyur ma thag pa lta bu dang 'di lta ste dper na/_sems can rnams kyi las mngon par bsgrubs pa lta bu dang /_'di lta ste dper na/_zhing bzang po dam pa'i sa bon btab nas ring por ma lon yang myu gu skye ba'i rgyur gyur pa lta bu ste/_de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de 
[\[127a.4\]]dag kyang 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba ste/_'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon du rnam par dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad du snang ba rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dus gsum gyi tshul thams cad la 
[\[127a.5\]]'jug pa khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sgrog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam rgyu mtsho rnam par dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'khor ba thams 
[\[127a.6\]]cad kyi sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba'i sems can 'byung ba'i nga ro rab tu bsgrags pas rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sems can thams cad kyi mun nag rnam par sel ba'i smon lam gyi rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sems can thams 
[\[127a.7\]]cad sdug bsngal dang dbral ba'i smon lam gyis rnam par dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sems can thams cad kyi bde ba 'grub pa yongs su 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_'dul bas mi skyo 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lam la 'jug pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad yongs su gnon par sgrub pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_de dag la 
[\[127b.2\]{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo stong phrag bca rnams des thob par gyur te/_de phra ba la mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems dang /_mi g.yo ba'i sems dang /_rab tu dga' ba'i sems dang /_dbugs phyin pa'i sems dang /_dpag tu med pa'i sems dang /_dge 
[\[127b.3\]]ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i sems dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu zab pa la dmigs pa'i sems dang /_byams pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i tshul rgya mtsho la zhugs pa'i sems dang /_mngon par zhen pa thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa'i 
[\[127b.4\]]sems dang /_'jig rten gyi yul thams cad la mi gnas pa'i sems dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la 'jug pa'i sems dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs dang /_kha dog rgya mtshos snang bar gyur pa'i sems dang /_'khrug pa med pa'i 
[\[127b.5\]]sems dang /_g.yo ba med pa'i sems dang /_khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang /_mthon dman med pa'i sems dang /_mi skyo ba'i sems dang /_mi zlogs pa'i sems dang /_zhum pa med pa'i sems dang /_chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par 
[\[127b.6\]]rtogs pa'i sems dang /_chos thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang /_chos thams cad rab tu 'byed pa'i tshul kyi rjes su song ba'i sems dang /_sems can rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa'i sems dang /_'gro ba thams 
[\[127b.7\]]cad yongs su bskyab pa'i sems dang /_sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mang po'i snang ba yongs su skyes pa'i sems dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i sems dang /_sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rnam par 'thor ba'i sems dang /_
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po yang dag par sgrub pa'i sems dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spobs pa mngon sum du gyur ba'i sems dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i yul thams cad la snang ba thob pa'i sems dang /_byang 
[\[128a.2\]]chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad 'phel bar byed pa'i sems dang /_phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i sems dang ldan pas kun tu bzang po'i smon lam chen po la lhag par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par bya bas smon lam rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i 
[\[128a.3\]]rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi smon lam rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i don du mngon par sgrub ste/_'di ltar sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul bar bya 
[\[128a.4\]]ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings 'byam klas pa yongs su shes par bya ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du phyi ma'i bskal par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[128a.5\]]spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par gnas par bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'gro bar bya ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad bsnyen bkur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod cing 
[\[128a.6\]]rim gror bya ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems kyi skad cig re re la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par bsgrub pa dang /_rnam par 'tshang rgya bar bya bas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyun mi gcod par bya ba'i phyir/_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa smon lam 
[\[128a.7\]]mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la smon lam mngon par sgrub par gyur to/_/de'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /_smon lam mngon 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]par bsgrub pa'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rin po che'i 'od kun tu 'phro ba'i dpal yon tan dpal gyi rgyal pos sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskul ba mdzad do/_/rab tu bstan pa mdzad do/_/yongs su bstan pa mdzad do/_/rnam 
[\[128b.2\]]par dbye ba mdzad do/_/rnam par dgrol ba mdzad do/_/yang dag par bstan par mdzad do/_/chud za bar mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir rab tu brtan par mdzad do/_/rgya chen por khyab par bya ba'i phyir shin tu yangs par mdzad do/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[128b.3\]]lhur len par bya ba'i phyir rab tu gnas par mdzad de/_de ni 'di lta ste/_thog ma sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ba phyin cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i 
[\[128b.4\]]dus de'i yang pha rol gyi bskal pa bcu pa la 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen nyi ma'i 'khor lo rnam par snang ba'i 'od ces bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi dpal gyi gsung rab la bu mo ye shes kyi 'od kun tu 'phro ba pad+mo bzang mo mig yid du 'ong ba'i 
[\[128b.5\]]dpal gyi zla ba de/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yongs su bskul te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs pad+mo la bzhugs pa zhig bcos so/_/bcos nas kyang ri mo bris so/_/ri mo bris nas kyang rin po ches shin tu brgyan to/_/dge 
[\[128b.6\]]ba'i bshes gnyen byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la brten te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'ang sems bskyed do/_/de dge ba'i rtsa ba des log par mi ltung ba'i chos can du gyur te/_rtag tu lha'i dbang po'i rigs 
[\[128b.7\]]dang mi'i dbang po'i rigs su skyes par gyur to/_/thams cad du yang gzugs mdzes shing sdug la blta na yid du 'ong ba dang /_kha dog bzang po shin tu rgyas pa dam pa dang ldan par gyur te/_rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang /_byang chub 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang yang bral bar ma gyur to/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen de nyid kyis tshe rabs de dang de dag du yongs su smin par byas so/_/dran par byas so/_/da yang des byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po yongs su bsnyen bkur te/_
[\[129a.2\]]yid 'byung bar ma byas so/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba rin chen pad+mo dpal gyi gtsug phud snying po zhes bya bar byung ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na ni/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi 
[\[129a.3\]]blta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa ni/_de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba rin chen pad+mo dpal gyi gtsug phud snying po zhes bya ba gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i btsun mo dpal gyi bzhin 
[\[129a.4\]]yongs su rgyas pa zhes bya ba byung ba de/_gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na yang de ltar mi blta ste/_mtshan mo'i lha mo kho ma'i drung na 'dug pa sgra rgya mtsho rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa 'di yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe'i de'i dus na rgyal 
[\[129a.5\]]bo'i bu mo ye shes kyi 'od kun tu 'phro ba/_pad+mo bzang mo mig yid du 'ong pa'i dpal gyi zla ba zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na ni de ltar mi blta ste/_kho mo ni de'i tshe dus na rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes kyi 'od kun tu 'phro ba/_pad+mo bzang mo mig 
[\[129a.6\]]yid du 'ong ba'i dpal gyi zla ba zhes bya bar gyur to/_/kho mo bu mo gzhon nur gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi dpal gyi gsung rab la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku pad+mo la bzhugs pa bcos pa de ni kho mo'i bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[129a.7\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur gyur to/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos/_kho mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bskul ba de ni/_kho mos byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed pa yin no/_/kho mos bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rin po che'i 'od kun tu 'phro ba'i dpal yon tan dpal gyi rgyal po'i drung du phyin te/_rgyan gyis gtor nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_cho 'phrul mthong bar gyur te/_kho mos bcom ldan 'das de'i drung nas chos 
[\[129b.2\]]thos par gyur pa de'i tshe/_kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/_'jig rten thams cad mngon du gyur pas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba ston pa 'di thob bo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de dag thams cad kyang bsnyen bkur te/_yo 
[\[129b.3\]]byad dang mchod cing rim gror bya ba thams cad kyis kyang bkur stir byas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis chos bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mos thos te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa la'ang zhugs par gyur to/_/
[\[129b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la kho mos rim gro cher byas te/_rim gro de'i rnam pas sems kyi skad cig gcig la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor de dag dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams 
[\[129b.5\]]cad kyang mthong ste/_'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i khams de ni 'das par gyur/_bskal pa rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor de ni mthar phyin par gyur nas/_de'i rjes la 'jig rten gyi khams ni rin chen 'khor lo sna tshogs kyis klubs shing brgyan pa 
[\[129b.6\]]zhes bya/_bskal pa ni 'od chen po zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/_de la sangs rgyas lnga brgya byung bar gyur to/_/de dag thams cad kyang kho mos bsnyen bkur te/_bskal pa 'od chen po de la de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen po'i sprin gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 
[\[129b.7\]]bskal pa'i dang po la byung ste/_de mngon par byung ba'i tshe/_kho mo mtshan mo'i lha mor gyur pas mchod pa byas so/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mthu bo che'i dpal zhes bya ba byung ste/_de la kho mo'akhor los sgyur bar gyur pas mchod pa byas 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa des kho mo la mdo sde sangs rgyas thams cad skye zhing 'byung ba zhes bya ba/_mdo snge sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par bstan te/_de yang kho mos thos 
[\[130a.2\]]nas yongs su bzung ngo /_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa me'i 'od 'phro ri'i dpal gyis rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba byung ste de la kho mo tshong dpon gyi bu mor gyur pas mchod pa byas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa des kho mo la mdo sde dus gsum snang 
[\[130a.3\]]ba'i snying po zhes bya ba/_mdo sde 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par bstan te/_de yang kho mos thos nas yongs su bzung ngo /_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyis mngon par 'phags pa'i 
[\[130a.4\]]shugs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba byung ste/_de la kho mo lha'i rgyal por gyur pas mchod pa byas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa des kho mo la mdo sde chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi thams cad shes pa'i bye brag ces bya ba mdo sde lnga brgya'i 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par 
[\[130a.5\]]bstan te/_de yang kho mos thos nas yongs su bzung ngo /_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos zab mo'i dpal rgya mtshos yang dag par 'byung ba'i 'od ces bya ba byung ste/_de la kho mo klu'i dbang po'i bu mor gyur pas/_nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i 
[\[130a.6\]]sprin gyi char mngon par phab ste mchod pa byas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa des kho mo la mad sde dga' ba rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel ba'ishugs shes bya ba mdo sde bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par bstan te/_de yang kho mos 
[\[130a.7\]]thos nas yongs su bzung ngo /_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ri bo'i spo'i 'od zer sgron ma zhes bya ba byung ste/_de la kho mo rgya mtsho'i lha mor gyur pas/_rin po che'i pad+mo'i sprin gyi char gyis nye bar bsnyen te mchod pa byas so/_/de bzhin 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]gshegs pa des kho mo la mdo sde chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i tshul zhes bya ba mdo sde sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par bstan te/_de'ang kho mos thos nas yongs su blangs so/_/dran pas yang dag par bzung ngo /_/de'i 
[\[130b.2\]]'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dpal zhes bya ba byung ste/_de la kho mo drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur pa/_drang srong stong phrag drug cus kun nas bskor bas rdzu 'phrul chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa nye 
[\[130b.3\]]bar bstan te/_spos kyi me tog ri bo tsam gyi sprin gyi char mngon par phab ste/_mchod pa byas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa des kho mo la mdo sde chos gnas med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba mdo sde stong phrag bcu'i 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par bstan ste/_de yang kho mos 
[\[130b.4\]]thos nas yongs su bzung ngo /_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba byung ste/_kho mo yang mnyam pa nyid kyi don 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i sa'i lha mo zhig tu gyur nas/_kho mo sa'i lha mo'i 'khor grangs med pa dang bcas 
[\[130b.5\]]pas rin po che'i shing thams cad kyi lhun las rin po che'i me tog gi sprin gyi char mngon par phab ste rin po che'i phreng ba'i sprin gyi char yang rab tu phab nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir spyan sngar phyin to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa des kho mo 
[\[130b.6\]]la mdo sde de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i gnas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo sde grangs med pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par bstan te/_de yang kho mos thos nas bzung ste chud zos par ma byas so/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin 
[\[130b.7\]]gshegs pa lnga brgya po de dag thams cad kyi tha mar de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' mdzod spus yongs su rgyas pa'i rtse mo dpal gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe kho mo yang gar mkhan gyi bu mo bzhin mngon par 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]mdzes pa'i dpal zhes bya ba zhig tu gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de grong khyer du gshegs nas/_gar mkhan gyi tshogs kyis rol mo byas pa'i tshe/_kho mos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis steng gi nam mkha'i dbyings las/_tshigs su bcad 
[\[131a.2\]]pa stong gis de bzhin gshegs pa de la mngon par bstod de spyan sngar phyin to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa des mdzod spu nas 'od zer chos kyi dbyings rnam par snang ba'i rgyan ces bya ba bkye ste/_kho mo'i lus thams cad kyang snang bar mdzad do/_/'od zer des kho mo la 
[\[131a.3\]]phog ma thag tu rnam par thar pa/_chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul yongs su 'khyil ba'i snying po zhes bya ba thob par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa bskal pa 'od chen po la 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen 'khor lo sna tshogs 
[\[131a.4\]]kyis klubs shing brgyan par sangs rgyas lnga brgya byung bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang mnyes par byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la kho mos mchod pa yang byas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kho mo la chos bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang dran 
[\[131a.5\]]te/_chos kyi tshul de dag las yi ge 'ga' 'am/_tshig 'ga' yang brjed par ma gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag re re'i drung du 'gro ba'i tshe yang sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su brjod par bya bas sems can tshad med pa'i don byas so/_/de bzhin 
[\[131a.6\]]gshegs pa de dag re re la yang kho mos chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin rgya mtsho dus gsum gyi ye shes kyi snying po chos kyi dbyings shin tu yangs pa zhes bya ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i glog mngon par snang ba kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa thams cad la gnas par yang 
[\[131a.7\]]dag par gzhol ba thob par gyur te/_rigs kyi bu kho mo la ni de ltar yang sems kyi skad cig re re la de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su snang ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kho mos mthong bar gyur pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i klog mngon 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]par snang ba/_/sngon chad ma thob pa sngan chad ma mthong ba_dag kyang kho mo'i sems kyi rgyud la gnas par gyur te/_'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa las g.yo ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i klog mngon par snang ba thob 
[\[131b.2\]]pa 'di ni mtha' dang dbus med par bstan pa'o/_/de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi dpal gyis de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon du gyur pas/_'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba zhes bya 
[\[131b.3\]]ba 'di brnan te bstan pa dang /_rnam par dbye bar bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_/zab mo blta dka' khong du chud dka' ste/_/dus gsum dbyings kun tha dad tshul ldan la/_/chos 
[\[131b.4\]]'od dkyil 'khor kun tu 'od 'byung ba'i/_/kho mo'i tshig 'di nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mnyam par gyis/_/sangs rgyas yon tan 'dod pas byang chub tu/_/kho mos thog ma ji ltar sems bskyed dang /_/ji ltar kho mos rnam thar 'di thob pa/_/de dag rnam par phye ba'i tshul 'di nyon/_/
[\[131b.5\]]'di nas sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul snyed kyi/_bskal pa gcig nas gcig brgyud pha rol tu/_/'jig rten khams yangs dri ma'i skyon med pa/_/rnam snang rgyal mtshan sgron ma'i dpal byung ste/_/bskal pa rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor byung /_/de la sangs 
[\[131b.6\]]rgyas rigs ni rgyun ma chad/_/de tshe ri rab rdul phran rab snyed kyi/_/stobs bcu skyon med mang po byung bar gyur/_/de la bde gshegs thog mar rin chen 'od/_/kun tu 'phro dpal yon tan dpal rgyal byung /_rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal mtshan ri rab dpal/_/
[\[131b.7\]]yon tan seng ge'i dbang po rgyal ba zhi/_/rgyal ba zhi ba'i rgyal po skye bcil dang /_/grags pa'i ri bo yon tan ri rab dpal/_/rgyal ba nyi ma zla zhal bcom ldan 'das/_/bcu po de dag tshul 'di thog ma'o/_/rgyal ba nam mkha'i gzhi dang kun nas 'od/_/
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]phyogs su yongs byung dran pa rgya mtsho'i sgo/_/rgyal ba mngon 'phags 'od mnga' ri rab dpal/_/bde gshegs chos kyi 'od 'phro ri bo dpal/_/thugs rje che mnga' dgu pa pad+mos 'phags/_/sangs rgyas bcu pa chos dbyings me tog ste/_/sangs 
[\[132a.2\]]rgyas rgya mtsho yongs su brjod pa las/_/tshul 'di bcu pa gnyis pa 'di yin no/_/'od dpal rgyal po ye shes blo gros dang /_/sna tshogs don dbang dpal gyi blo gros lha/_/rgyal ba shugs kyi rgyal blo ye shes dpal/_/snang ba'i rgyal po 'od kyi rgyal mtshan 
[\[132a.3\]]dpal/_/rgyal ba rnam par gnon pa'i lha stabs dang /_/de bzhin chos dbyings pad+mo bcu pa ste/_/rgya chen pa yongs su bstan las tshul 'di ni/_/tshul 'dir bcu pa gsum pa bstan pa'o/_/rin chen 'od 'phro ri dpal bcom ldan 'das/_/de yi 'og ma yon tan 
[\[132a.4\]]rgya mtsho dpal/_/chos kyi 'od dang pad+mo snying po dpal/_/'gro ba'i zla ba spyan tshul bde bar gshegs/_/spos kyi 'od dang rin chen ri rab dpal/_/rgyal ba dri za lus 'od rgyal po dang /_/rin chen snying po rgyal dpal gzi brjid ldan/_/rgyal ba bcu pa zhi ba'i gzugs 
[\[132a.5\]]kyistabs/_/de yi 'og ma rgyal ba rgya chen blo/_/rin chen 'od dang nam mkha'i sprin gyi dpal/_/rgyal ba dam pa'i mtshan gyi dpal gyur dang /_/brtul zhugs dkyil 'khor rang gi lus kyi 'od/_/mthu chen brtul zhugs ri rab dpal mnga' dang /_/rgyal ba yon tan 
[\[132a.6\]]'khor yug dpal gyi rgyal/_/bcom ldan mi pham brtul zhugs rgyal mtshan dang /_/shing gi ri bo rgyal ba de dag bcu/_/rgyal ba sA la'i rgyal po dpal gyi mchog_/'jig rten dbang po'i lus ni snang ba'i 'od/_/mngon par 'phags 'od dpal gyi bcom ldan 
[\[132a.7\]]'das/_/rdo rje 'od dang sa yi gzi brjid dpal/_/rgyal ba zab chos 'od kyi rgyal po dpal/_/chos kyi rgya mtsho dbyangs kyi blo gros dang /_/ri rab rgyal mtshan dpal dang blo gros snang /_/rgyal ba bcu pa rin chen rgyal po dpo dpal/_/tshangs pa'i 'od dang rgyal ba 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]nam mkha' dbyings/_/de bzhin chos kyi dbyings ni gzugs brnyan dpal/_/snang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od kyi bcom ldan 'das/_/tha dad phyogs mkhyen ye shes blo gros dang /_/nam mkha'i sgron ma mngon par dga' ba'i dpal/_/rnam par snang mdzad 'od dpal bde 
[\[132b.2\]]bar gshegs/_/bsod nams rab tu snang dpal zhi ba'i dpal/_/bcu par snying rje chen po'i sprin gyi dpal/_/de bzhin nyid 'od stobs snang blo gros dang /_/rgyal ba 'gro ba thams cad mngon gzugs dang /_/de tshe rgyal ba mngon 'phags 'od mang 'byung /_/
[\[132b.3\]]de yi 'og ma zhi ba'i sku yi 'od/_/chos 'phags bde gshegs de bzhin byung bar 'gyur/_/de yi 'og ma rlung gi drag shul dpal/_/dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan rin chen lus kyi dpal/_/dus gsum snang ba'i 'od ni bcu pa'o/_/smon lam rgya mtsho rab tu snang 
[\[132b.4\]]dpal dang /_/gnyis pa dgongs pa rdo rje ri bo dpal/_/rgyal ba gsum pa seng ge ri rab dpal/_/dran pa'i rgyal mtshan rgyal po chos dpal blo/_/shes rab sgron ma 'od kyi rgyal mtshan dpal/_/de yi 'og ma rgyal ba rgya chen blo/_/rgyal ba chos dbyings tshul 
[\[132b.5\]]gyi ye shes stabs/_/chos kyi rgya mtsho blo gros ye shes dpal/_/chos 'dzin pa dang rin chen sbyin dpal dang /_/rgyal ba yon tan khor yug dpal gyi sprin/_/bzod pa'i sgron ma dpal dang gzi brjid ldan/_/shugs 'od zhi gnas dbyangs kyi rgyal ba dang /_/zhi 
[\[132b.6\]]ba'i rgyal mtshan 'gro ba'i sgron ma dpal/_/sangs rgyas smon lam chen po shugs kyi dpal/_/bcom ldan gzhan gyis mi thub rgyal mtshan stobs/_/rgyal ba ye shes 'od 'phro rgya mtsho dpal/_/rgyal ba chos dbang blo gros chags pa med/_/'gro skad rgya mtsho 
[\[132b.7\]]dbyangs kyi blo gros dang /_/thams cad dbyangs kyi yan lag sgra skad dpal/_/dbang sgyur mchod sbyin grags pa'i mchod sdong blo/_/phyogs yul 'gro ba mngon sum bcom ldan 'das/_/sems can bsam par mnyam pa sku yi dpal/_/gzhan yang sangs 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]rgyas gnas dang bcas pa'i dpal/_/rgyal ba rang bzhin lus dpal bzang po dang /_/der ni rgyal ba de la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa byung /_/de dag byung nas 'gro ba sgron ma mdzad/_/bskal pa ri rab shin tu phra rdul snyed/_/bdag gis rgyal ba rgya mtsho de dag mchod/_/
[\[133a.2\]]bskal pa sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul snyed po/_/de dag du ni rgyal ba gang byung ba/_/bde gshegs de dag thams cad bdag gis mchod/_/rnam par thar pa'i tshul ni 'di la zhugs/_/rnam par thar pa'i tshul 'di sgom byed cing /_/bskal pa mtha' yas bdag gi sngon spyad 
[\[133a.3\]]kyis/_/khyod kyis thos nas nan tan myur gyis shig_/tshul 'di ring po mi thogs thob par 'gyur/_/rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon du gyur pas/_'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba ston pa 'di shes par zad na/_
[\[133a.4\]]kho mos byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dang dbus med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho la mos pa sna tshogs kyis yang dag par gnas pa/_bsam pa sna tshogs kyis lus dang ldan pa/_/dbang po rgya mtsho sna tshogs yongs su grub pa/_byang chub sems 
[\[133a.5\]]dpa'i spyod pa dang /_smon lam sna tshogs shin tu rtogs pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/_yon tan brjod par nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu snying po byang chub 'di nyid na kho mo dang rgyang mi ring ba zhig na mtshan mo'i lha mo sgra rgya mtsho rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 
[\[133a.6\]]pad+mo'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan pa zhig la 'dug cing /_mtshan mo'i lha mo grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 
[\[133a.7\]]bslab par bya ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun ta skyong ba'i gzi 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]brjid dpal la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/_mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyi drung nas song ngo //_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen 
[\[133b.2\]]po'i mdo/_/bam po brgyad pa/_de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyi byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon du gyur pas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba de la yongs su 
[\[133b.3\]]sgom zhing khong du chud par bya ba dang /_yid ches par bya ba dang /_'jug par bya ba dang /_shin tu rgyas par bya ba dang /_yongs su khyab par bya ba dang /_rab tu mchod par bya ba dang /_dbang du bya ba dang /_snang bar bya ba dang /_yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba 
[\[133b.4\]]byed cing /_mtshan mo'i lha mo sgra rgya mtsho rab tu zhi ba dang /_ldan pa gang na ba der phyin te/_mtshan mo'i lha mo sgra rgya mtsho rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_mtshan mo'i lha mo sgra rgya mtsho rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa la lan brgya stong 
[\[133b.5\]]du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_mtshan mo'i lha mo sgra rgya mtsho rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa'i mdun du 'dug ste/_thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma lha mo bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang 
[\[133b.6\]]dag par zhugs pa ste/_bdag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rten gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slob cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la zhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la nan tan du bgyi ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod 
[\[133b.7\]]pa la rab tu gnas pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'tshal na/_'phags ma lha mo ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/_de nas mtshan 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]mo'i lha mo sgra rgya mtsho rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pas/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rten gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol ba legs so legs so/_/
[\[134a.2\]]rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba dga' ba yangs pa'i shugs 'byung bas sems kyi skad cig rnam par brgyan pa thob pa'o/_/nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]smras pa/_'phags ma khyod ni 'phrin las ci mdzad yul gang dang ldan sbyor ba gang dang ldan/_
[\[134a.3\]]ci la rnam par dpyod/_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dga' ba yangs pa'i shugs 'byung bas sems kyi skad cig rnam par brgyan ba de'i yul ni ji lta bu zhig mchis des smras pa/_rigs kyi bu kho mo ni sems dang bsam pa rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa'i mnyam 
[\[134a.4\]]pa nyid la zhugs pa ste/_'jig rten gyi rdul dang dri ma thams cad rnam par bsal bas mi phyed pas brgyan pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa'o/_/brtsams pa las mi ldog mi bzlog pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/_/rin po che'i ri bo ltar yon tan gyis brgyan pa'i sems mi 
[\[134a.5\]]sgul ba dang ldan pa'o/_/mi gnas mi rten pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/_/'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa la mngon par phyogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/_/sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad mthong bas mi ngoms pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/_/byang chub sems 
[\[134a.6\]]dpa' thams cad kyi stobs kyis bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/_/dran pa'i rgya mtsho ye shes kyi snang ba chen pos brgyan pa la yang dag par gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/_/sems can thams cad mya ngan gyi dgon pa las yang dag par bzla ba la 
[\[134a.7\]]zhugs pa'o/_/sems can thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba las rnam par bzlog pa la mngon par brtson pa'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs dang /_/sgra dang dri dang reg yongs su rgyu ba rnam par bzlog pa la zhugs pa'o/_/
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]sems can thams cad kyi sdug pa dang /_mi sdug pa dang bral zhing phrad pa'i sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar ba ba la zhugs pa'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi yul gyi rkyen las byung bas mgo rmongs ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par bzlog pa la rab tu brtson pa'o/_/log par lhung ba'i 
[\[134b.2\]]sems can thams cad kyi rten du gyur ba'o/_/sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i gnas kyi sdug bsngal las 'byung ba yang dag par ston pa la mngon par brtson pa'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi rga shi dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang 
[\[134b.3\]]yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnam par bzlog pa la zhugs pa'o/_/sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde ba bla na med pa yongs su bsgrub par zhugs pa ste/_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_ljongs dang /_yul dang /_khams dang /_rgyal po'i gnas na 
[\[134b.4\]]'khod pa'i sems can thams cad bde bar rim gror bya bas nyams dga' bar 'gyur zhing de dag la chos dang mthun par bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_rim gror bya ba yang legs par byed de/_de dag rim pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smyin par byed 
[\[134b.5\]]do/_/'di lta ste khang khyim dang /_gzhal med khang na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi mngon par chags pa med pa yongs su bskyed do/_/yid mi bde ba de dang de dag kyang rnam par sel to/_/mngon par zhen pa thams cad rgyun gcod pa dang /_chos thams cad kyi rang 
[\[134b.6\]]bzhin yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/pha ma dang phu nu dang sring mo dang gnyen bshes dang 'grogs pa'i sems can yun ring po nas bshes shing mdza' bar gyur pa dang la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang phrad par bya ba'i phyir chos ston 
[\[134b.7\]]to/_/bu smad dang 'grogs pa'i sems can rnams la 'khor ba'i sred pa thams cad rab tu spang ba dang /_sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems su bya ba dang /_snying rje chen po rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/tshong dus kyi dbus na 'khod 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]pa'i sems can rnams la 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar bya ba la yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/longs spyod kyi dregs pas myos pa'i sems can rnams la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 
[\[135a.2\]]rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/glu dang gar dang rol mo la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams la chos kyi dga' ba la mos par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/yul gyi dga' ba la chags pa'i sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la yang dag par 
[\[135a.3\]]gzhol bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/khro bas yongs su non pa'i sems can rnams la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu dgod par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/sems can le lo can rnams la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir 
[\[135a.4\]]chos ston to/_/sems rnam par myos pa'i sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/lta bu'i rnam pa thibs por subs pa'i sems can ma rig pa'i mun nag na 'thoms pa rnams la 
[\[135a.5\]]lta ba'i rnam pa thibs po dang ma rig pa'i mun pa rnam par bstsal ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/shes rab 'chal ba can gyi sems can rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/khams gsum pa la mngon par zhen pa'i sems 
[\[135a.6\]]can rnams la 'khor ba las 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/dma' ba la mos pa'i sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/bdag la phan par brtson pa'i sems can rnams la 
[\[135a.7\]]sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/bsam pa nyam chung ba'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag par ba ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]ma rig pa'i mun pas sems blong ba'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/gzugs mi sdug pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku rnam par dag par bya 
[\[135b.2\]]ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/lus kyi dbyibs mi mdzes pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la chos kyi sku bla na med pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos ston to/_/kha dog mi sdug pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog gser gyi kha 
[\[135b.3\]]dog lta bu dang shin tu 'jam zhing ka tsa lin+da ka ltar reg na bde ba'i lus rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos ston to/_/sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde ba dam pa thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/bde ba'i sems can rnams la 
[\[135b.4\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bde ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/nad pa na ba'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs brnyan lta bu yongs su grub par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/dga' ba sna tshogs la brtson pa'i sems can 
[\[135b.5\]]rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dga' ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/phongs pa'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi gter dang mdzod rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/bza' shing gi ra ba na gnas pa'i sems 
[\[135b.6\]]can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs sa btsal ba la mngon par brtson pa'i rgyu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/lam du zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam du 'jug par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/grong na gnas pa'i 
[\[135b.7\]]sems can rnams la khams gsum pa thams cad las 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/yul gyi 'dab na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi lam las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la rab tu 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]dgod par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/grong rdal na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams la chos kyi rgyal po'i pho brang du gnas par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/phyogs mtshams na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams la dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi ye 
[\[136a.2\]]shes rab du thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/phyogs na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la chos thams cad kyi ye shes mngon par shes par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/'dod chags la gcig tu dga' ba'i sems can rnams la mi sdug pa'i sgos 'khor ba'i sred pa rnam 
[\[136a.3\]]par bzlog pa'i phyir chos ston to/_/zhe sdang la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la byams pa chen po'i tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/gti mug la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la chos thams cad kyi sgo rgya mtsho rab tu 'byed pa'i ye shes mngon par 
[\[136a.4\]]shes par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/cha mnyam pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la theg pa thams cad kyi smon lam gyi tshul rgya mtshos khyad par du 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/'khor ba'i yul gyi dga' ba'i bsam pa can gyi sems can rnams la 
[\[136a.5\]]'khor ba'i yul la dga' ba rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir chos ston to/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad kyis gtses pa'i sems can rnams la 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad kyis nye bar nyon mongs ba med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/de bzhin 
[\[136a.6\]]gshegs pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la mi skye ba'i gnas yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir chos ston to/_/phung po la gnas pa'i bsam pa can gyi sems can rnams la gzhi med pa'i chos kyi spyod yul la rnam par spyod par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/
[\[136a.7\]]bsam pa zhum pa'i sems can rnams la lam gyi rgyun gyi khyad par yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/mtho ba'i nga rgyal can gyi sems can rnams la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]g.yo sgyu'i yul gyi bsam pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/_de ltar rigs kyi bu kho mo ni sems can thams cad chos kyi sbyin pas yongs su bsdus shing ngan song gi lam gyi rgyud sdug 
[\[136b.2\]]bsngal ba thams cad nas rnam par bzlog pa dang /_lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa dang /_bde ba yongs su bstan pa dang /_khams gsum pa las gyen du bskyod pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu dgod pa dang /_thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su 
[\[136b.3\]]smyin par byed byed pas/_dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho'i snang ba rab tu thob pas dga' zhing spro la yid bde bar gyur pa'o/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu kho mo ni phyogs dang /_phyogs mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho la rnam 
[\[136b.4\]]par lta zhing smon lam rgya mtsho la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lus sna tshogs rnam par dag pa/_'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa/_'od zer dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu 'gyed pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 
[\[136b.5\]]tshul rgya mtsho sna tshogs la zhugs pa'i ye shes snang ba can/_ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho sna tshogs la zhugs par rnam par 'phrul ba sna tshogs kyi yul dang ldan pa/_dbyangs kyi yan lag dang skad rgya mtsho sna tshogs kyi dbyangs dang ldan pa/_rgyan sna tshogs kyis rnam par klubs pa'i lus 
[\[136b.6\]]can/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul sna tshogs la zhugs pa/_zhing rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa sna tshogs su zhugs pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas rgya mtsho sna tshogs la zhugs pa/_so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho sna tshogs la zhugs pa/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[136b.7\]]pa'i rnam par thar pa dang /_ye shes kyi yul sna tshogs kyis snang bar gyur pa/_ye shes rgya mtsho sna tshogs kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho sna tshogs kyi tshul la rnam par spyod pa chos sna tshogs kyi rnam par thar pa'i gzhal med khang na rnam par rtse ba'i yul 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]dang ldan pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo sna tshogs la mngon du gnas pa/_chos kyi dbyings sna tshogs kyi nam mkha'i rgyan dang ldan pa/_rgyan sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sna 
[\[137a.2\]]tshogs la rnam par lta ba/_'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs nas 'dus pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs 'byam klas par rjes su 'dong ba/_phyogs rgya mtsho sna tshogs nas yongs su 'dus pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa tha dad pas bkye ba/_de bzhin 
[\[137a.3\]]gshegs pa tha dad pa'i zhabs kyi drung nas lhags pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs sna tshogs kyi 'khor dang ldan pa/_rgyan sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul sna tshogs la zhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rgya 
[\[137a.4\]]mtsho sna tshogs la rnam par spyod pa/_ye shes sna tshogs rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/_rgyan gyi snying po sna tshogs can gyi stan la 'khod pa rnams kyi dga' ba sna tshogs kyi shugs rgya mtsho yongs su bskyed de/_de dag dga' ba sna tshogs kyi shugs rgya mtsho yongs su 
[\[137a.5\]]skyes nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtshor 'dong ste/_de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs tshad med pa rjes su sems pas kyang dga' ba'i shugs chen po rgya mtsho yongs su 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang kho mo ni bcom 
[\[137a.6\]]ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs kyi sku yongs su dag pa mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa mthong nas dga' ba chen po dang mos shing nyams bde ba rab tu thob ste/_sems kyi skad cig re re la'ang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings ltar 
[\[137a.7\]]yangs pa/_kha dog rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med par snang ba la lta zhing sems kyi skad cig re re la dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho rab tu thob bo/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang 'od 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]gzer chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/_'od zer re re zhing yang 'od zer rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa dang /_
[\[137b.2\]]sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa mthong zhing sems kyi skad cig re re la dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho rab tu thob bo/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbu dang /_sku phrag pa gnyis kyi lhun las 
[\[137b.3\]]sems kyi skad cig re re la rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba'i ri'i sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung zhing /_chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong nas/_dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa 
[\[137b.4\]]rab tu thob bo/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i ba spu'i sgo re re nas sems kyi skad cig re re la kha dog dri zhim po dang /_'od gzer sna tshogs can gyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 
[\[137b.5\]]'byung zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong nas/_dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu thob bo/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku la rnam par bltas na/_sems kyi skad cig re re la mtshan 
[\[137b.6\]]re re nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan pa'i sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong nas dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho 
[\[137b.7\]]shin tu yangs pa rab tu thob bo/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i dpe byad bzang po re re las sems kyi skad cig re re la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i shin tu 'bar ba'i sprin sangs 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i dbyangs su sgrog pa'i 'brug sgra 'byin pa mthong nas dga' ba chen po'i shugs 
[\[138a.2\]]rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu thob bo/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku la rnam par bltas na/_sems kyi skad cig re re la ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa'i sku dang po byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa dang 
[\[138a.3\]]bcas/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam rnam par dag pa'i rgyan dang bcas/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ba mthong nas dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho 
[\[138a.4\]]shin tu yangs pa rab tu thob bo/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku las sems kyi skad cig re re la lha'i dbang po'i lus kyi sprin lha'i dbang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul phra ba snyed 
[\[138a.5\]]byung zhing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/_lha'i dbang po'i lus yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la mngon du gnas shing chos ston pa mthong nas/_dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu 
[\[138a.6\]]thob bo/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku las sems kyi skad cig re re la klu'i dbang po'i lus kyi sprin klu'i dbang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med 
[\[138a.7\]]pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung zhing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/_klu'i dbang po'i lus yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la mngon du gnas shing chos ston pa mthong nas dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]pa rab tu thob bo/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku la rnam par bltas na/_sems kyi skad cig re re la ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'i lus kyi sprin gyi gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa/_
[\[138b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung zhing chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'i lus yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la mngon du gnas shing chos ston pa mthong nas/_
[\[138b.3\]]dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu thob bo/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku la rnam par bltas na sems kyi skad cig re re la ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas/_dri za'i dbang po'i lus kyi sprin dri za'i dbang po'i 
[\[138b.4\]]rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung zhing chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/_dri za'i dbang po'i lus yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la mngon du gnas shing chos ston 
[\[138b.5\]]pa mthong nas dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu thob bo/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku la rnam par bltas na sems kyi skad cig re re la ba spu'i sgo re re nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i lus kyi sprin lha ma 
[\[138b.6\]]yin gyi dbang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung zhing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i lus yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can 
[\[138b.7\]]rnams la mngon par gnas shing /_chos ston pa mthong nas dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu thob bo/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku la rnam par bltas na/_sems kyi skad cig re re la ba 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]spu'i sgo re re nas nam mkha'i lding gi dbang po'i lus kyi sprin nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung zhing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 
[\[139a.2\]]bkang ste/_nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i lus yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la mngon du gnas shing chos ston pa mthong nas/_dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs par rab tu thob bo/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu bcom 
[\[139a.3\]]ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku la rnam par bltas na sems kyi skad cig re re la ba spu'i sgo re re nas mi'am ci'i dbang po'i lus kyi sprin mi'am ci'i dbang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu 
[\[139a.4\]]phra ba snyed byung zhing chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/_mi'am ci'i dbang po'i lus yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la mngon du gnas shing chos ston pa mthong nas/_dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa 
[\[139a.5\]]rab tu thob bo/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku la rnam par bltas na sems kyi skad cig re re la ba spu'i sgo re re nas lto 'phye chen po'i lus kyi sprin lto 'phye chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa/_
[\[139a.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par bkang ste/_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i lus yongs sa bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la mngon du gnas shing chos ston pa mthong nas 
[\[139a.7\]]dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu thob bo/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku la rnam par bltas na/_sems kyi skad cig re re la ba spu'i sgo re re nas mi'i dbang po'i lus kyi sprin 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]mi'i dbang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung zhing chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/_mi'i dbang po'i lus yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la mngon du gnas 
[\[139b.2\]]shing chos ston pa mthong nas/_dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu thob bo/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku la rnam par bltas na sems kyi skad cig re re la ba spu'i sgo re re nas tshangs pa'i dbang po'i lus kyi 
[\[139b.3\]]sprin tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul dang bcas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung zhing chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/_tshangs pa'i dbang po'i lus yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can 
[\[139b.4\]]rnams la mngon du gnas shing tshangs pa'i sgra skad dang dbyangs kyis chos ston pa mthong nas sems kyi skad cig re re la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho chos kyi dbyings ltar rgya che zhing shin tu yangs pa rab tu 'thob ste/_sngon thob 
[\[139b.5\]]par gyur pa 'thob par 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/sngon khong du chud pakhong du chud par 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/sngon zhugs pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/sngon khyab par gyur pa khyab par 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/sngon mthong ba mthong bar 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/
[\[139b.6\]]sngon thos pa thos par 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos kyi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid yongs su shes pa ltar na chos thams cad mtshan nyid gcig pa'ang ci rob ma yin te/_dus gsum gyi tshul la 'jug pa'i sgo nas chos thams cad kyang 
[\[139b.7\]]mtha' dang dbus med par bstan du yod pa ste/_'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i tshul dga' ba yangs pa'i shugs 'byung bas sems kyi skad cig rnam par thar pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i snang ba ste/_rigs kyi bu rnam par thar pa 'di ni 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i phyir mtha' dang dbus med pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa dang /_tha mi dad pas zad mi shes pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ye 
[\[140a.2\]]shes kyi mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba yin pas mu med pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa 'di ni chos kyi dbyings tha mi dad pa'i tshul gyi gtan du rgyas par 'gengs pas gting med pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa 'di ni dmigs pa gcig tu rnam par 'phrul pa 
[\[140a.3\]]thams cad yongs su 'du bar byed pas sgo thams cad dang ldan pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa 'di ni chos thams cad kyi lus dang mi gnyis par spyod pas don yod pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa 'di ni sgyu ma lta bur yongs su spyod pas ma skyes pa'o/_/rnam 
[\[140a.4\]]par thar pa 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi smon lam gyi gzugs brnyan du byung bas gzugs brnyan lta bu'o/_/rnam par thar pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas shin tu sprul pa'i phyir sprul pa lta bu'o/_/rnam par thar pa 'di ni 'gro ba thams 
[\[140a.5\]]cad kyi rten du gyur pas sa chen po lta bu'o/_/rnam par thar pa 'di ni 'gro ba thams cad snying rje chen pos mngon par rlan par byed pas chu'i phung po lta bu'o/_/rnam par thar pa 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi sred pa'i rlan yongs su skems pas 
[\[140a.6\]{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]phung po lta bu'o/_/rnam par thar pa 'di ni sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen po nyid du rab tu ston pa'i phyir rlung gi phung po lta bu'o/_/rnam par thar pa 'di ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyan gyi gzhi yin pas rgya mtsho lta bu'o/_/rnam 
[\[140a.7\]]par thar pa 'di ni chos thams cad kyi ye shes rin po che rgya mtsho las mngon par 'phags pas ri rab ri'i rgyal po lta bu'o/_/rnam par thar pa 'di ni chos thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa'i gzhal med khang rnam par spyod pa'i phyir rnam par spyod pa'i 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]rlung gi dkyil 'khor lta bu'o/_/rnam par thar pa 'di ni dus gsum du 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyi go 'byed pas nam mkha' lta bu'o/_/rnam par thar pa 'di ni sems can thams cad la chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon du 'bebs pas 
[\[140b.2\]]sprin chen po lta bu'o/_/rnam par thar pa 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi mi shes pa'i mun nag rnam par sel bas nyi ma lta bu'o/_/rnam par thar pa 'di ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi rgya mtsho chen pos shin tu bsgrub pa'i phyir zla ba lta bu'o/_/rnam par thar pa 'di ni thams 
[\[140b.3\]]cad du song ba'i phyir de bzhin nyid lta bu'o/_/rnam par thar pa 'di ni las kyi chos kyis shin tu sprul pa'i phyir rang gi grib ma lta bu'o/_/rnam par thar pa 'di ni sems can gyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi sgra rab tu sgrogs pas brag cha lta bu'o/_/rnam par thar pa 'di 
[\[140b.4\]]ni bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyis rnam par dmigs par byed pa'i phyir gzugs brnyan lta bu'o/_/rnam par thar pa 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i phyir shing gi rgyal po lta bu'o/_/
[\[140b.5\]]rnam par thar pa 'di ni mi shig pa'i chos can yin pas rdo rje lta bu'o/_/rnam par thar pa 'di ni rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrub pas/_nor bu yid bzhin rin po che'i rgyal po lta bu'o/_/rnam par thar pa 'di ni dus 
[\[140b.6\]]gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par dmigs par bya ba la sgrib pa med pas rin po che'i rgyal po dri ma med pa'i snying po lta bu'o/_/rnam par thar pa 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo mnyam po nyid du sgrog pas nor bu rin 
[\[140b.7\]]po che dga' ba'i rgyal mtshan lta bu ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dga' ba yangs pa'i shugs shin tu yangs pa 'byung bas sems kyi skad cig rnam par brgyan pa 'di ni dpe tshad med pa rnam par 'god pa'i rjes su 'brang bas bstan par bya'o/_/
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]mtshan mo'i lha mo sgra rgya mtsho rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma lha mo ji ltar nan tan du bgyis na/_byang chub sems dpas de lta bu'i rnam par thar pa de yongs su 'grub par 
[\[141a.2\]]'gyur/_smras pa rigs kyi bu bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs chen po chos yangs pa dang ldan pa/_rnam par rgya chen po gsal ba chen po snang ba chen po/_'od chen po byin chen po rnam par dbye ba chen po 'byung ba chen po phun sum tshogs 
[\[141a.3\]]pa chen po ste/_de dag la nan tan du byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par thar pa 'di lta bu phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dag go_/bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa sems can rgya mtsho thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[141a.4\]]du yongs su tshim par byed pa la zhugs pa ni rgya chen po'i chos so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i nan tan la zhugs pa ni rgya chen po'i chos so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa chos thams cad kyi rang 
[\[141a.5\]]bzhin nges par rtogs par bya ba la zhugs pa ni rgya chen po'i chos so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par brtsams pa las phyir mi ldog pa la zhugs pa ni rgya chen po'i chos so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan sems 
[\[141a.6\]]can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar bya ba la zhugs pa ni rgya chen po'i chos so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi chos rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba la zhugs pa ni rgya chen po'i chos so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i thabs sems can rgya 
[\[141a.7\]]mtsho thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba la zhugs pa ni rgya chen po'i chos so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa'i phyir zhing rgya mtsho 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]thams cad la zhugs pa ni rgya chen po'i chos so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skad cig re re la mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yongs su bstan pa rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs 
[\[141b.2\]]pa ni rgya chen po'i chos so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes dus gsum gyi chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs la zhugs pa ni rgya chen po'i chos so/_/rigs kyi bu bcu po de dag ni byang chub 
[\[141b.3\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi rgya chen po'i chos tshogs chen po dang ldan pa rnams te/_de dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnam par thar pa de lta bu phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/yongs su 'byung bar 'gyur 
[\[141b.4\]]ro/_/yang dag par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/kun nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rab tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/shin tu brtan par 'gyur ro/_/rnam par yangs par 'gyur ro/_/yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/yongs su 
[\[141b.5\]]gnas par 'gyur ro/_/nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]smras pa/_'phags ma lha mo khyod yun ji srid cig nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs/_des smras pa/_rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi me tog gi snying po'i rgyan gyis 
[\[141b.6\]]brgyan pa/_'di'i shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho stong phrag bcu 'das pa'i pha rol na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rin po che thams cad kyi dri ma med pa'i 'od rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de'i dbus na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 
[\[141b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od dang smon lam gyi dbyangs shes bya ba yod do/_/de'i dbus na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyi sprin sna tshogs dang ldan pa 'jig rten gyi 'og gi 'tshams nas/_rin po che thams cad kyi phreng ba'i dra ba 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]rgya mtshos brtan pa/_rin po che'i rgyal po spos kyi rdo rje thams cad kyi rgyan gyi lhun dang ldan pa/_khang pa brtsegs pa'i rgya'i dbyibs su 'dug pa rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa lha rdzas kyi gzhal med khang dang gnas kyi sprin gyis 
[\[142a.2\]]kun tu gang ba/_gser ltar dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rgyan ces bya ba yod pa der bskal pa kun tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan ces bya ba byung ste/_'jig rten gyi khams de nas snying po byang chub rin po che thams cad kyi snying po 'od sna tshogs can zhes bya ba yod de/_der bcom 
[\[142a.3\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi dbyangs shes bya ba/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/_de'i tshe de'i dus na kho mo yang snying po byang chub kyi lha mo bsod nams sgron ma phun sum 
[\[142a.4\]]tshogs pa kun nas dpal gyi 'od ces ba ba zhig tu gyur te/_byang chub kyi shing de la 'dug 'dug nas/_der kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa de mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/
[\[142a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong nas kyang kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/_/de'i 'og tu 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid kyi rgyal po'i gnas kun nas yongs su rgyas pa'i dpal gyi snying po zhes bya bar snying po byang chub de 
[\[142a.6\]]nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sdong po ri bo gzi brjid ces bya ba mngon par sangs rgyas so/_/kho mo ni de nas shi 'phos te snying po byang chub de nyid du ye shes phun sum tshogs pa'i bsod nams 'od ces bya ba'i mtshan mo'i lha mo zhig tu gyur cing 'dug 'dug ste/_
[\[142a.7\]]kho mos der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sdong po ri bo gzi brjid des chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong nas 'gro ba thams cad du yongs su ston pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi 'od kyi yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/_/de'i 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]'og tu kho mos snying po byang chub de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gsung gi rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ma thag tu chos thams cad kyis yang dag pa 'phel bar byed pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob 
[\[142b.2\]]bo/_/de'i 'og tu kho mos snying po byang chub de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i 'od gzer sgron ma'i rgyal mtshan rgyal po zhes ba ba bsnyen bkur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ma thag tu kho mos sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/_/
[\[142b.3\]]de'i 'og tu kho mos snying po byang chub de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sprin sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ma thag tu kho mos chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/_/de'i 'og tu kho mo 
[\[142b.4\]]lha'i bu mo zhig tu gyur te/_snying po byang chub de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes skar mda' snang ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ma thag tu kho mos sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sgron ma 
[\[142b.5\]]snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/_/de'i 'og tu kho mos snying po byang chub de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa chos rnam par 'phrul pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ma thag tu kho mos dus gsum gyi de bzhin 
[\[142b.6\]]gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par 'jug pa'i snying po snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/_/de'i 'og tu kho mos snying po byang chub de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sgron ma ye shes kyi rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur te/_de bzhin 
[\[142b.7\]]gshegs pa de mthong ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du ye shes thogs pa med pa'i 'khor lo snang ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/_/de'i 'og tu kho mos snying po byang chub de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi stobs kyi ri bo'i gzi 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]brjid ces bya ba bsnyen bkur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ma thag tu kho mos dus gsum gyi sems can gyi spyod pa dang /_dbang po rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mos 'jig rten gyi khams gser ltar dri ma 
[\[143a.2\]]med pa'i 'od der bskal pa kun tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan la de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig bsnyen bkur to/_la la ni lha'i dbang por gyur te bsnyen bkur te/_/la la ni klu'i dbang por gyur pas bsnyen bkur to/_/la la ni gnod 
[\[143a.3\]]sbyin gyi dbang por gyur pas/_la la ni dri za'i dbang por gyur pas/_la la ni lha ma yin gyi dbang por gyur pas/_la la ni nam mkha' lding gi dbang por gyur pas/_la la ni mi'am ci'i dbang por gyur pas/_la la ni lto 'phye chen po'i dbang por gyur pas/_la 
[\[143a.4\]]la ni mi'i dbang por gyur pas/_la la ni tshangs pa'i dbang por gyur pas/_la la ni lhar gyur pas/_la la ni mir gyur pas/_la la ni bud med du gyur pas/_la la ni skyes par gyur pas/_la la ni khye'u gyur pas/_la la ni bu mor gyur pas bsnyen bkur 
[\[143a.5\]]te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mos mchod pa'i yo byad ci bdog pas mchod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang rim gror byas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi chos bstan pa yang thos so/_/de nas kho mo shi 'phos 
[\[143a.6\]]nas 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid du bskal ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad do/_/de nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi 
[\[143a.7\]]mjed du skyes te/_kho mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sel bsnyen bkur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ma thag tu kho mos mun pa'i rdul thams cad dang bral bas rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/_/de'i 'og tu kho mos de bzhin 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]gshegs pa gser thub bsnyen bkur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ma thag tu kho mos zhing rgya mtsho thams cad snang ba rjes su 'phro bar bya bas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/_/de'i 'og tu kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa bsod skyabs bsnyen bkur te/_de 
[\[143b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa/_/de mthong ma thag tu/_kho mos sems can thams cad kyi/_skad rgya mtsho 'brug sgra sgrog pa'i/_sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/_/de'i 'og tu/_kho mos bcom ldan 'das/_de bzhin 
[\[143b.3\]]gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'di bsnyen bkur te/_de'i snying po byang chub la de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo rgya mtsho sems kyi skad cig re re la yongs su ston pa mdzad pa mthong nas kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 
[\[143b.4\]]par thar pa dga' ba yangs pa'i shugs 'byung bas sems kyi skad cig rnam par rgyan pa 'di thob bo de thob ma thag tu chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la zhugs par gyur to/_/
[\[143b.5\]]chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho de dag thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa de dag la rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba re re la yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin 
[\[143b.6\]]tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing la zhugs te mthong bar gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad las sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re na yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad snying po byang chub tu gshegs te sems kyi skad cig re re la mngon par rdzogs 
[\[143b.7\]]par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa mdzad cing mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa re res kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho rgyas par 'gengs pa mdzad pa mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad las de bzhin gshegs pa re 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]re'i zhabs kyi drung na yang bdag mngon du 'dug par shes par gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa snying po byang chub la bzhugs pa de dag gis chos bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang thos par gyur to/_/de 
[\[144a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sprul pa rgya mtsho byung ste/_chos kyi sprin rgya mtsho rab tu sgrog pa dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs yongs su ston pa mdzad cing chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du gtogs pa'i zhing 
[\[144a.3\]]rgya mtsho thams cad dang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thams cad dang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad kyi sems can 'byam klas pa thams cad 'gro ba'i rgyud sna tshogs su skyes pa dag gi nang na sems can gyi bsam pa'i dbang du 'du 
[\[144a.4\]]shes kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de dag thams cad kyang yongs su 'dzin to/_/khong du chud par byed do/_/nges par rtogs par byed do/_/don dang tshig dang yi ge 'dzin pa'i shugs kyis rnam par gnon pa'i gzungs kyi mthus 
[\[144a.5\]]yongs su 'dzin to/_/chos kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par dag pa'i snying po khong du chud pa'i shes rab kyis yongs su sbyong ngo /_/chos rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa'i rigs pas khong du chud par byed do/_/dus gsum ltar 
[\[144a.6\]]rnam par yangs pa'i blos rgyas par 'gengs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su 'gra ba'i shes rab kyis mnyam par byed cing chos kyi tshul thams cad mngon par sgrub bo/_/tshul thams cad la mdo sde'i sprin mngon par sgrub bo/_/
[\[144a.7\]]mdo sde'i sprin thams cad la chos rgya mtsho yongs su gzhog par byed do/_/chos rgya mtsho thams cad la chos kyi rgyud thams cad yang dag par gzhol bar byed do/_/chos kyi rgyud thams cad la chos kyi sprin yongs su shes par byed do/_/chos kyi sprin 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]thams cad la chos kyi rlabs yongs su skyed do/_/chos kyi rlabs thams cad la chos kyi dga' ba'i shugs rgya mtsho rab tu thob par byed do/_/chos kyi dga' ba'i shugs rgya mtsho thams cad las rab tu thob par bya ba'i shugs mngon par sgrub bo/_/sa'i shugs 
[\[144b.2\]]thams cad la ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i shugs mngon par sgrub bo/_/ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad la sangs rgyas mthong ba rgya mtsho rab tu thob par byed do/_/sangs rgyas mthong ba rgya mtsho thams cad la snang ba rgya mtsho rab tu thob par byed do/_/snang ba rgya 
[\[144b.3\]]mtsho thams cad la dus gsum gyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis yongs su gzhog par byed do/_/phyogs rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa rgyas par dga' ba'i tshul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi mtha'i spyod pa rgya mtsho tshad med pa la 'jug pa'i tshul dang /_
[\[144b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i ye shes snang ba'i tshul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dka' ba tshad med pa yongs su gtong ba'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i tshul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi dkyil 
[\[144b.5\]]'khor tshad med pa yongs su dag pa snang bar bya ba'i tshul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzod pa'i tshad med pa yongs su sbyong ba'i tshul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus chen po'i shugs tshad med pa rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i mthu'i ye shes 
[\[144b.6\]]snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i tshul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor dang /_bsam gtan gyi yan lag rgya mtsho tshad med pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i sbyor bas snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i tshul dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[144b.7\]]pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rgya mtsho tshad med pa yongs su dag par bya ba dang /_rnam par dmigs pa snang bar bya ba'i tshul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rgya mtsho tshad med pa la 'jug par bya 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]ba'i tshul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rgya mtsho tshad med pa la 'jug par bya ba'i tshul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams dang /_ye shes kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa la gnas 
[\[145a.2\]]par bya ba dang /_yongs su 'phel bar bya ba'i ye shes rab tu thob par bya ba'i tshul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rgya mtsho tshad med pa la rnam par spyad pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i ye shes yongs su bsgrub pa'i tshul dang /_
[\[145a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon par mdzad pa'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i tshul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa yongs su gnon pa'i mtshams kyi rnam par 'phrul pa tshad med pas bskal pa rgya mtsho 
[\[145a.4\]]gnas par bya ba'i tshul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor tshad med pa yongs su gnon pa'i tshul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa tshad med pa la gnas par bya ba'i tshul dang /_
[\[145a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa tshad med pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa tshad med pa ye shes rgya mtshos rnam par dpyad pa'i tshul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i ye shes snang ba tshad med pa 
[\[145a.6\]]rab tu thob par bya ba'i tshul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpar gyur pas sngon gyi sangs rgyas ma lus par gzigs pa dang /_rjes su 'brang bar mdzad pa tshad med pa rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i tshul dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[145a.7\]]pa byang chub sems dpar gyur pas sngon gyi sangs rgyas rgya mtsho ma lus par gzigs shing bskal pa rgya mtshor bzhugs bzhugs pa tshad med pa'i tshul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pas zhing rgya mtsho ma lus par rgyas 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]par dgang ba'i sku mngon par bsgrub pa tshad med pa'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i tshul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa tshad med pas chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa rgyas par dgang ba'i tshul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi byang chub 
[\[145b.2\]]sems dpa'i spyod pa thabs sna tshogs kyi sgo dang ldan pas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang /_rnam par gdul ba mdzad pa tshad med pa yongs su bstan pa'i tshul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od phyogs rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad tu rab tu 
[\[145b.3\]]'phro ba tshad med pas rgyas par dgang bar bya ba'i tshul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la mngon du gyur pa rnam par 'phrul pa tshad med pa yongs sa bstan pa'i tshul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis tshad med pa yongs su 
[\[145b.4\]]gnon pa'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i tshul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa tshad med pa'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba' tshul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu 
[\[145b.5\]]'khor ba dang /_chos kyi sprin tshad med pa thams cad ma lus par yang dag par blang zhing yongs su gzung ba'i tshul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rgya mtsho tshad med par rnam par dmigs pa'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i tshul dang /_de bzhin 
[\[145b.6\]]gshegs pa'i sku rgya mtsho'i rgyud tshad med pa rnam par dmigs pa ye shes snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i tshul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thog ma thugs bskyed pa nas/_
[\[145b.7\]]dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur pa'i bar de dag thams cad la yang 'jug cing khong du chud par byed do/_/de skad du khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dga' ba yangs pa'i shugs 'byung bas sems kyi skad cig rnam par brgyan pa 'di thob nas ji srid cig lon 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]zhes zer ba ni/_de ltar kho mos bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnyis kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gser ltar dri ma med pa'i 'od du byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo bsod nams sgron ma phun sum tshogs pa kun nas dpal gyi 
[\[146a.2\]]'od ces bya bar gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi dbyangs kyis chos bstan pa thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnyis kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de 
[\[146a.3\]]dag tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad na/_mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir skyes te/_log par dad sel la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa tha ma shAkya thub pa'i bar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa bzang po pa dag kyang bsnyen bkur to/_/ma byon pa'i sangs 
[\[146a.4\]]rgyas rnams kyang bsnyen bkur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas kyi rgyud ma byon pa rnams yongs su bsnyen cing bkur ro/_/mchod do/_/rigs kyi bu da dung du'ang 'jig rten gyi khams gser ltar dri ma 
[\[146a.5\]]med pa'i 'od de yang yod la sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyang rgyun ma chad kyis/_de bas na rigs kyi bu tshul 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa chen pos brtson par gyis shig_/de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo sgra rgya mtsho rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pas/_de'i tshe byang 
[\[146a.6\]]chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dga' ba yangs pa'i shugs 'byung bas sems kyi skad cig rnam par brgyan pa 'di nyid brnan te bstan par bya ba'i phyir/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_rnam thar dge 'di ji ltar thob 'gyur 
[\[146a.7\]]ba/_/kho mo'i tshig 'di nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod nyon cig_/thos nas dga' ba'i stobs kyang yongs skyed de/_/rnam thar tshul 'di la ni 'jug par gyis/_/bdag gi sems dang bsam pa yongs sbyong zhing /_/mos pa'i shugs yangs yongs su skyed byas 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]te_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes grong 'dun pas/_/bskal pa rgya mtsho mang por sngon spyad do/_/bde gshegs dus gsum byung ba thos nas kyang /_/de dag kun la mos ba yangs bskyed do/_/bskal pa brgya phrag mang por sgo kun tu/_/de dag 'khor dang bcas par 
[\[146b.2\]]kho mos bkur/_/sngon gyi bde gshegs kho mos mthong gyur nas/_/'gro la phan phyir yun ring mchod byas te/_/spro ba'i stobs ni rnam yangs yongs bskyed nas/_/bdag gis gdung ba med pa'i chos kyang thos/_/rnam par thar pa 'di la 'jug pa na/_pha dang 
[\[146b.3\]]ma dang bla ma'i skye bo la/_/de tshe bdag gis phan bdes bsti stang byas/_/bsnyen bkur sri zhur gnas pa kun kyang byas/_/rgas pa nad pa nor med mi rnams dang /_/dbang po ma tshang sdug bsngal mgon med pa/_/mang po bdag gis byams sems bde bkod nas/_/
[\[146b.4\]]tshe rabs brgyar yang nor phyug mgon yang byas/_/rgyal po [{]mye [,]me [}]dang rkun chom rkyen gyur dang /_/seng ge glang po pha rol dgras 'jigs dang /_/srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i 'jigs dngos sna tshogs las/_/sngon tshe spyod pa'i dus na bdag gis bskyabs/_/rtag tu 
[\[146b.5\]]srid gsum nyon mongs gdungs gyur te/_/las kyis rab gdungs de bzhin mi dge bas/_/'khor ba'i ri gzar g.yang du lhung ba yi/_/skye bo 'gro ba'i rgyud du bdag gis bskyabs/_/sdug bsngal ngan song g.yang sas 'jigs pa dag_/rtag tu mi 
[\[146b.6\]]bde shin tu mi zad dang /_/skye rga na zhing 'chi ba'i 'jigs mang kun/_/bdag gis 'jig rten spyod tshe zhi bar byas/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba dang /_/sems can kun gyi bde ba yongs bskyed cing /_/sangs rgyas bde ba dam pa bskyed pa 
[\[146b.7\]]ni/_/bskal pa phyi mthar kho mo'i smon lam mo/_/rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dga' ba yangs pa'i shugs 'byung bas sems kyi skad cig rnam par brgyan pa 'di shes par zad na/_kho mos byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa phyi nang gi sdug bsngal ma lus pa las rnam par grol ba/_bskal pa'i ming du bya ba thams cad shes par gyur pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad 'byung ba dang /_'jig pa'i rgyus la mkhas pa de 
[\[147a.2\]]dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am yon tan brjod pa nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu snying po byang chub 'di nyid na bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na/_mtshan mo'i lha mo grong khyer thams cad bsrung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba 
[\[147a.3\]]'dug gis/_de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]mtshan mo'i lha mo sgra rgya mtsho rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa la tshul 
[\[147a.4\]]dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/dge ba'i bshes kyis ma nor mthun bstan pas/_/lha mo khyod kyi drung du nye bar mchis/_/mtha' dang dbus mi mnga' ba'i sku tshul du/_/khyod ni gdan la bzhugs par bdag gis mthong /_/kha dog dbyibs dang 
[\[147a.5\]]mtshan ma'i spyod yul ba/_/srid la gnas dang dngos por 'du shes dang /_/'du shes dma' dang log par lta ba yis/_/khyod kyi spyod yul 'tshal bar mi nus so/_/khyod kyi sku gzugs blta na mtha' yas pas/_/khyod kyi sku gzugs mdog gi mtshan ma ni/_/
[\[147a.6\]]bskal pa mtha' yas dag tu yongs brtags kyang /_/lha dang 'jig rten bcas pas shes mi nus/_/lha mo khyod ni phung po'i gnas las 'phags/_/skye mched rnams la'angade bzhin mi gnas te/_/'jig rten rnam par 'das pas the tsom bral/_/'jig rten dag tu rnam 
[\[147a.7\]]par 'phrul pa mdzad/_/g.yo ba mi mnga' skyon bral chags pa med/_/khyod kyis ye shes spyan ni rnam sbyangs pas/_/rdul gyi go la thams cad rdul tshad du/_/sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa mang po gzigs/_/khyod kyi sku ni chos sku'i snying po can/_/khyod kyi thugs 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]kyang ye shes chags pa med/_/khyod ni kun tu 'od kyis snang mdzad pas/_/'jig rten skye bo rnams la mtha' yas snang /_/sems las mtha' yas las rnams yongs su 'byung /_/'jig rten thams cad las kyis rnam par bris/_/'gro ba sems kyi dngos su mkhyen gyur 
[\[147b.2\]]pas/_/rang gi sku yang 'gro ba snyed du bstan/_/'jig rten du ni rmi lam 'drar mkhyen nas/_/sangs rgyas kun kyang gzugs brnyan lta bu dang /_/ma lus chos rnams sgra brnyan 'drar mkhyen pas/_/chags pa mi mnga' 'gro ba kun du spyod/_/dus gsum gnas pa'i 'gro 
[\[147b.3\]]ba thams cad la/_/skad cig re re rang gi sku ston kyang /_/khyod kyi thugs la gnyis su mi rgyu ste/_/phyogs rnams kun tu chos kyang rab tu bstan/_/rdul la 'gro ba rgya mtsho mtha' yas dang /_/de bzhin sems can mtsho chen dpag yas dang /_/mtha' dbus med 
[\[147b.4\]]pa'i bde gshegs gang chen mtsho/_/kun kyang khyod kyi rnam thar dam pa'i yul/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]mtshan mo'i lha mo sgra rgya mtsho rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa la/_tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod de/_lan 
[\[147b.5\]]brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/_mtshan mo'i lha mo sgra rgya mtsho rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa'i drung nas song ngo //_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dgu pa/_
[\[147b.6\]]de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba dga' ba yangs pa'i shugs 'byung bas/_sems kyi skad cig rnam par brgyan pa de ni sgom pa dang /_rjes su sgom pa dang /_yang dag par sgom pa dang /_mtshan mo'i lha mo'i sgra rgya mtsho rab tu zhi 
[\[147b.7\]]ba dang ldan pa'i gdams ngag dang /_rjes su bstan pa la ni rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /_rjes su dran par bya ba dang /_khong du chud par byed/_tshig dang yi ge re re la ni tshul du ma dang bsam pa tshad med pas chos nyid kyi tshul shes pa rjes su dran par byed cing dran 
[\[148a\]]
