[\[148a.1\]]pas rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /_blo gros kyis rnam par dbye ba dang /_rig pas khong du chud par bya ba dang /_blos shin tu yangs par bya ba dang /_lus kyis reg par byas te/_rnam par spyad pa dang /_rjes su 'jug par byed cing /_mthar gyis mtshan 
[\[148a.2\]]mo'i lha mo grong khyer thams cad bsrung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal gang na ba der phyin pa dang /_mtshan mo'i lha mo grong khyer thams cad bsrung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal pad+mo'i khri chen po/_nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po grong khyer dang /_gnas thams cad rab tu snang bar 
[\[148a.3\]]byed pa'i snying po can la phyogs thams cad dang /_'gro ba thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i lus dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi gzugs dang /_mnyam pa'i lus dang sems can thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i lus dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyis ma gos pa'i lus 
[\[148a.4\]]dang /_'gro ba thams cad dang rang bzhin mnyam pa'i lus dang /_'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i lus dang /_'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba la mthun pa'i lus dang /_'gro ba thams cad du sgra rab tu sgrogs pa'i lus dang /_
[\[148a.5\]]'gro ba thams cad du 'pho ba med pa'i lus dang /_sgrib pa thams cad shin tu bcom pa'i lus dang /_de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus dang /_'gro ba thams cad gdul bar_mthar phyin par byed pa'i lus su 'dug cing /_mtshan mo'i lha mo brjod du med pa'i 'khor gyis 
[\[148a.6\]]bskor te/_'dug pa mthong nas/_dga' rangs te mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/_mtshan mo'i lha mo grong khyer thams cad bsrung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_mtshan mo'i lha mo grong khyer thams cad bsrung 
[\[148a.7\]]ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_mtshan mo'i lha mo grong khyer thams cad bsrung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyi mdun du 'dug ste/_thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha mo bdag bla na med pa 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs na/_lha mo ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rjes su bslabs na sems can la sman par 'gyur ba lags/_ji ltar na sems can bla na med pa'i yongs su bsdu bas yongs su sdud par 
[\[148b.2\]]'gyur/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i las la brtson pa lags/_ji ltar brtson par bgyis na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po nye bar 'gyur ba bdag la bshad du gsol/_de skad ces smras pa 
[\[148b.3\]]dang /_mtshan mo'i lha mo grong khyer thams cad bsrung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyis/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_rnam par gdul ba'i mthar phyin 
[\[148b.4\]]par bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs yang dag par gzung ba'i sbyor ba mthar phyin par bya ba dang /_phyogs 'byam klas pa thams cad rgyas par dgang ba'i ye shes rab tu sbyar ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug 
[\[148b.5\]]pa mngon du 'gyur ba dang /_shes bya nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam par mtha' yas pa rgyas par dgang ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu blang zhing yongs su gzung ba'i phyir 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba 
[\[148b.6\]]bzhin du chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa'i spyod pa'i tshul yongs su 'dri ba legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgra yid du 'ong ba dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa zab mo la 'jug pa thob pa ste/_de ltar kho mo 
[\[148b.7\]]rnam par thar pa de dang ldan pas chos smra ba chen po'i go 'phang thogs pa med pa la dmigs pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod yongs su gtang ba'i smon lam dang ldan pa/_snying rje chen po dang byams pa chen po'i 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]stobs rab tu thob pa/_sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems la 'god pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi don bya ba la zhugs pa/_byang chub kyi sems kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_tshogs rab tu bstsags pa rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir/_'gro ba thams 
[\[149a.2\]]cad kha lo bsgyur ba'i sa la yang dag par gnas pa sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir/_'jig rten gyi chos kyi sprin thams cad las chos kyi nyi ma yongs su 'byung ba'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa/_dge ba'i rtse ba tshad med pa bskyed pas/_
[\[149a.3\]]'jig rten thams cad snang bar bya ba'i phyir/_'gro ba thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems su 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa/_'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba yongs su bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba shes par bya ba'i phyir/_sems rnam par dag pa'i 
[\[149a.4\]]sbyor ba dang ldan pa dge ba'i las kyi lam thams cad mthun par bsgrub pas sems can thams cad kyi ded dpon du zhugs pa/_mi dge ba'i las kyi lam thams cad rab tu spangs pa/_sems can thams cad dge ba'i chos la rab tu dgod pa'i sbyor ba dang 
[\[149a.5\]]ldan pa/_sems can thams cad la lam bde ba yongs su ston pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa/_sems can thams cad kyi theg pa'i rgyan gyi thog mar 'dren pa la zhugs pa/_dge ba'i chos kyi spyod pa thams cad la sems can thams cad rab tu dgod pa'i sbyor ba dang 
[\[149a.6\]]ldan pa/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad la mi phyed par bsnyen bkur dang rim gro byed pa la zhugs pa/_sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu dgod pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa/_chos kyi sbyin pa'i sngon 'dren cing 
[\[149a.7\]]chos dkar po thams cad yang dag par brtsam pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems bskyed pas mngon par byung bas bsam pa brtan zhing mi shigs pa/_rdo rje mthu bo che ltar brtan zhing sra bas sangs 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]rgyas kyi stobs la dmigs pa'i sems rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan par dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rten cing rnam par spyod de/_kho mo ni nyon mongs pa dang las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rnam par gtor ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[149b.2\]]nyid kyi tshogs yang dag par rtsom pa'o/_/dkar po'i chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mtha' dang dbus med pa la mngon par 'dun cing dmigs pa'i sems kyi sbyor ba la brtson pa'o/_/rigs kyi 
[\[149b.3\]]bu de ltar kho mo chos snang ba'i sgo sems can thams cad yongs su ston pa rnam pa de la bu yongs su sbyong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba bstsags pa'i tshogs la sta gon tu gnas pas rnam pa bcus chos kyi dbyings la rnam par blta zhing khong du chud pa dang /_rjes su gzhol 
[\[149b.4\]]bar byed do/_/bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_ye shes snang ba shin tu yangs pa thob pas chos kyi dbyings ni tshad med par khong du chud par byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings ni 
[\[149b.5\]]mtha' dang dbus med par khong du chud par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su gnan pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings ni mu med par khong du chud par byed do/_/'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[149b.6\]]rgya mtsho thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings ni sa mtshams med pa khong du chud par byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor tha mi dad pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/_chos 
[\[149b.7\]]kyi dbyings ni ris tshad med par khong du chud par byed do/_/bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyis rnam par dmigs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings ni rgyud kyi tshul 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]gcig tu gyur par khong du chud par byed do/_/'gro ba thams cad rnam par gdul ba'i mthar phyin pas/_de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthar thug pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/_chos kyi dbyings ni rang bzhin gyi rgya che bar khong du 
[\[150a.2\]]chud par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa 'byam klas pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/_chos kyi dbyings ni 'gro ba thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du gyur par khong du chud par byed do/_/kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan la 
[\[150a.3\]]'jug par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings ni rgyan gcig tu gyur par khong du chud par byed do/_/dge ba thams cad kyis chos kyi dbyings rgyas par dgang zhing rnam par dag par bya bar chud mi za ba'i chos can du bya ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings ni thug pa med par khong du 
[\[150a.4\]]chud par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo rnam pa bcu po de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_tshogs thams cad yongs su bstsags pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba nyid la 'jug par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa 
[\[150a.5\]]rjes su rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_chos kya dbyings thams cad la rnam par blta'o/_/khong du chud pa dang rjes su gzhol bar byed do/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang kho mo de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid che ba nyid kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i yid la bya ba dang 
[\[150a.6\]]ldan pas/_gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyud stong phrag bcus sems can rnams la chos ston te/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar chos rgya mtsho thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor dang /_chos thams cad byin gyis rlob 
[\[150a.7\]]ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor dang /_chos kyi sprin thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa sgron ma'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor dang /_sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]rab tu snang bar byed pa'i snying po'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor dang /_theg pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dri ma med pa thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor dang /_sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sgron ma'i snying po'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor dang /_
[\[150b.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i klong rab tu sgrog pa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor dang /_dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sngon gyi smon lam rgya mtsho bstan pa la yang dag par gzhol ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor dang /_chos thams cad la 
[\[150b.3\]]mngon par 'khyil pa'i shugs drag po'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor dang /_rigs kyi bu gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor bcu po de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa gzungs kyi dkyil 
[\[150b.4\]]'khor gyi rgyud stong phrag bcus sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang kho mo ni thos pa'i shes rab kyis sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/bsam pa'i shes rab dang /_bsgom pa'i shes rab kyis sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/
[\[150b.5\]]srid pa'i rgyud gcig las kyang brtsams shing sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/srid pa'i rgyud rgya mtsho thams cad las kyang brtsams shing sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi mtshan gyi 'khor lo rgya mtsho las kyang 
[\[150b.6\]]brtsams shing chos ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo rgya mtsho las kyang brtsam shig chos ston to/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gcig las kyang brtsams shing chos ston to/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad las 
[\[150b.7\]]kyang brtsams shing chos ston to/_/sangs rgyas gcig gis lung bstan pa las kyang brtsams shing chos ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lung bstan pa rgya mtsho las kyang brtsams shing chos ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi 'khor gyi dkyil 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]'khor rgya mtsho las kyang brtsams shing chos ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho las kyang brtsams shing chos ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi chos kyi 'khor lo las kyang brtsams shing chos 
[\[151a.2\]]ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rgya mtsho las kyang brtsams shing chos ston to/_/mdo sde gcig las kyang brtsams shing chos ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo la yang dag par gzhol ba'i mdo sde las 
[\[151a.3\]]kyang brtsams shing chos ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor kun nas 'dus pa las kyang brtsams shing chos ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor kun nas 'dus pa rgya mtsho las kyang brtsams shing 
[\[151a.4\]]chos ston to/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems gcig las kyang brtsams shing chos ston to/_/byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag rgya mtsho thams cad las kyang brtsams shing chos ston to/_/theg pa gcig las kyang brtsams shing chos ston to/_/theg pa 
[\[151a.5\]]thams cad kyi 'byung ba rgya mtsho las kyang brtsams shing chos ston to/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mos bstan pa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa brjod du med pas sems can rnams la chos ston te/_rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mos chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul tha mi dad pas 
[\[151a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho la 'jug cing sems can thams cad la chos ston pas/_bla na med pa'i yongs su bsdu ba byed cing byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal pa rgya mtshor gnas par bya bas byang chub 
[\[151a.7\]]sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgra yid du 'ong ba dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa zab mo la 'jug pa 'di la sems kyi skad cig re re zhing rnam par 'phel ba'i rnam par thar pa'i yul bsgom pa'i tshul gyis yongs su sgom ste rnam par thar pa'i yul bsgom pa'i tshul 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]re res kyang sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs so/_/nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]smras pa/_lha mo byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa de/_de ltar zab pa ngo mtshar che na/_'phags ma khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 
[\[151b.2\]]'di brnyes nas ji srid cig lags smras pa/_rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi 'od 'phro ba'i grong khyer dpal kyi sprin ces bya ba rin po che'i spos thams 
[\[151b.3\]]cad dang ldan pa/_gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sprin la blangs pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi smon lam dbyangs su sgrog pa'i pad+mos mtshams rnam par brgyan pa/_lhun sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtshos 
[\[151b.4\]]byung ba'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po rgya mtsho las grub pa/_pad+mo chen po'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/_rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/_me tog gi khor yug ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor ba/_spos kyi rin po che 
[\[151b.5\]]ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rgyan ri rab ltar mngon par 'phags pa dang ldan pa/_gling bzhi pa chen po'i ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rgyan dang ldan pa/_gling bzhi pa re re zhing yang grong rdal bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa'i yang 
[\[151b.6\]]brjod du med pa dang ldan pa byung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams de'i bskal pa mdog dri ma med pa'i 'od ces byu ba byung ste/_bskal pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi 'od 'phro ba'i 
[\[151b.7\]]grong khyer dpal gyi sprin gyi gling bzhi pa dbu ma rgyal mtshan sna tshogs shes bya ba byung ste/_de'i dbus na rgyal po'i gnas rin chen me tog kun tu/_snang ba zhes ba ba yod par gyur te/_rgyal po'i gnas de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na snying po byang chub 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]chos kyi rgyal po'i pho brang rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/_snying po byang chub de la de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag gi bskal ba'i dang po la de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dbyangs 'od 
[\[152a.2\]]kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba byung ste/_de'i tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nyi ma ltar bzhin mdog dri ma med pa zhes bya ba byung nas/_des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dbyangs 'od kyi rgyal po las mdo sde chos thams cad kyi klong 
[\[152a.3\]]rgya mtsho zhes bya ba yongs su bzung ste/_bzung nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su bskor to/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang rab tu byung ste/_bstan pa yongs su bzung ngo /_/bstan pa nub du cha ste/_bstan pa yang stong du gyes/_chos bstan pa 
[\[152a.4\]]shin du bstan pa'i tshul ni brgya phrag bcur gyur/_rnyog pa'i bskal pa bar ma ni nye bar gnas par gyur pa'i tshe/_sems can las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs pa/_thab mo dang rtsod pa dang dkrugs ma la zhugs par 
[\[152a.5\]]gyur pa dang /_dge slong sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i yon tan don du mi gnyer cing yul gyi dga' ba lhur len par gyur pa/_rgyal po dang rkun po'i gtam la zhugs pa/_bud med dang yul dang rgya mtsho'i gtam la mos 
[\[152a.6\]]pa/_'jig rten rgyang phen pa'i tshig la zhugs pa rnams yongs su skyo ba bskyed pa'i phyir/_kye ma'o bskal pa du mar yongs su bsgrubs pa'i chos kyi sgron ma chen po ni nub par gyur ma khad do/_/zhes chos dang ldan pa'i 'o dod bos te/_yongs 
[\[152a.7\]]su skyo bar 'gyur ba'i gtam byas nas/_de steng gi nam mkha'i dbyings su ta la bdun tsam du mngon par 'phags nas/_'od 'phro ba kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sprin rab tu bkye ste/_'od gzer gyi dra ba'i rgyan chen po kho dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa bkye 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]nas/_'od kha dog du ma dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba zhi bar byas te/_sems can mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang byang chub la rab tu bkod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa de yang phyir gsal bar byas te/_lo stong phrag drug 
[\[152b.2\]]cur gnas par gyur to/_/de'i tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nyi ma ltar bzhin mdog dri ma med pa/_de nyid kyi bu mo dge slong ma chos kyi 'khor los sprul pa'i 'od ces bya ba dge slong ma brgya phrag stong gi 'khor dang ldan pa byung ste/_des yongs su skyo bar 'gyur 
[\[152b.3\]]ba'i sgra de thos nas cho 'phrul chen po de mthong ste/_'khor dang bcas pas byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_dge slong ma brgya phrag stong po de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du 
[\[152b.4\]]'gyur ba la yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang rab tu thob par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor los sprul pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs kyang rab tu thob bo/_/chos rgya mtsho'i tshul thams cad la 'jug pa zhes 
[\[152b.5\]]bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rab tu thob par gyur to/_/dge slong ma chos kyi 'khor los sprul pa'i 'od kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa las byung ba'i 'od kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_/byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[152b.6\]]rnam par thar pa sgra yid du 'ong ba dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa zab mo la 'jug pa 'di yang shin tu phra zhing 'jam pa'i tshul du rab tu thob par gyur te/_de thob pas de la de bzhin gshegs po chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dbyangs 'od kyi rgyal po'i rnam par 
[\[152b.7\]]'phrul pa de dag thams cad kyang mngon du gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nyi ma ltar bzhin mdog dri ma med pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dbyangs 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]'od kyi rgyal po'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su bskor ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang bstan pa nub tu cha ba'i tshe dang dus na bstan pa yongs su 'dzin cing chos kyi sgron ma chen po 'bar bar byed byed pa de gzhan 
[\[153a.2\]]zhig yin pa snyam du sems na ni/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po ni de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nyi ma ltar bzhin mdog dri ma med pa zhes bya bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/_
[\[153a.3\]]de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nyi ma ltar bzhin mdog dri ma med pa'i bu mo dge slong ma chos kyi 'khor los sprul pa'i 'od ces bya ba dge slong ma brgya phrag stong gi 'khor dang ldan pa byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na ni de ltar mi blta 
[\[153a.4\]]ste/_kho mo ni de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong ma chos kyi 'khor los sprul pa'i 'od ces bya bar gyur te/_de ltar kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dbyangs 'od kyi rgyal po'i bstan pa yang yongs su bzung ngo /_/dge slong ma brgya phrag stong po 
[\[153a.5\]]de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du 'gyur ba la yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la'ang rab tu bkod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos kyi 'khor los sprul 
[\[153a.6\]]pa'i 'od kyi gzungs dang /_chos rgya mtsho'i tshul thams cad la 'jug pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang rab tu bkod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 'og tu kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa chos dri ma med pa'i ri bo ye shes kyi rtse mo'i 'od ces bya ba bsnyen 
[\[153a.7\]]bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'od rab tu snang ba'i gtsug phud ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi nyi ma dpal gyi sprin ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]chos rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ye shes kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi me tog dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyi sprin 
[\[153b.2\]]ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'od 'phro ri bo dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi tshul zab mo dpal gyi zla ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin 
[\[153b.3\]]gshegs pa chos kyi ye shes yang dag par 'byung ba kun tu snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas gtsug phud ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ri'i dbang po dpal gyi 
[\[153b.4\]]snying po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa sgo kun nas mkhyen pa'i ri bzang po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi brtson 'grus drag po'i rgyal mtshan ces bya ba bsnyen bkur 
[\[153b.5\]]to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos rin po che'i me tog dpal gyi sprin ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zab mo zhi ba brtsegs pa zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gzer gyi tshul rab 
[\[153b.6\]]tu snang ba'i 'od kyi zla ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od 'phro ba dpal gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/
[\[153b.7\]]de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa sbyi'u tshugs kyi phyogs ye shes kyis snang bar mdzad pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gzer gyi me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa ye shes seng ge'i dpal gyi rgyal mtshan rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od nyi ma kun tu snang ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan rin po ches 
[\[154a.2\]]rnam par brgyan pa'i ri bo zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i rnam par gnon pas kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dra ba rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i dpal gyi zla ba zhes bya ba bsnyen 
[\[154a.3\]]bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi pad+mo rab tu rgyas pa'i dpal gyi sprin ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyi nyi ma'i 'khor lo kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs 
[\[154a.4\]]pa mi bsnyengs pa'i rdo rje seng ge mthu bo che zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgyal mtshan kun tu dpal zhes bya ba snyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa sku chos kyi pad+mo'i me tog shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba 
[\[154a.5\]]bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan me tog dpal gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyig ri bo snang ba'i phung po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs 
[\[154a.6\]]pa ye shes spo'i 'od 'phro sprin ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa sgo kun nas chos ston pa'i ri bo'i 'od ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa snying po byang chub rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i dpal 
[\[154a.7\]]gyi zla ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sgron ma rab tu 'bar ba'i dpal gyi zla ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs brnyan kun tu snang ba'i gtsug phud ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sprin gyi rgyal mtshan sgron ma zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje ltar brtan pa'i rgyal mtshan rgya mtsho'i sprin ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i ri bo dpal gyi sprin 
[\[154b.2\]]ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan dpal gyi zla ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi me tog kun nas rgyas pa'i gzi brjid snang ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[154b.3\]]sems can thams cad tu snang ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan pad+mo dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi 'od 'phro ba rab tu snang ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur 
[\[154b.4\]]to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu pad+mo zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyi ri bo rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa snyan pa kun tu rnam par grags pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya 
[\[154b.5\]]ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kun du snang ba'i ri bo zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi grong khyer rab tu snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa shing 
[\[154b.6\]]gi ri bo gzi brjid ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dpal kun tu rnam par snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho'i nga ro rab tu sgrog pa'i 'od ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/
[\[154b.7\]]de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi gnas bsgrub pa yongs su 'grub pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kun tu snang ba'i dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]gshegs pa mtshan dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi stobs kyi dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i 'od kyi dbyangs 
[\[155a.2\]]zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gzer yon tan gyi cod pan ye shes dang shes rab kyi 'od ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo zla bas 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bsnyen 
[\[155a.3\]]bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi pad+mo rnam par snang bas rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen pad+mo snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs 
[\[155a.4\]]pa rin chen dpal gyi rtse mo'i sprin rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi me tog kun nas rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gzer dpal gyi ri bo'i snying po zhes bya ba bsnyen 
[\[155a.5\]]bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gzer gyi dkyil 'khor spo'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams sna tshogs kyi sprin ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi ri bo rgyal 
[\[155a.6\]]mtshan sprin ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan ri bo'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi nyi ma'i sprin rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[155a.7\]]chos kyi sprin snyan pa rnam par grags pa zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dkyil 'khor na bun sprin ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i ye shes gzi brjid ces bya 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i dpal gyi zla ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa gser rin po che'i ri bo gzi brjid bzang po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de 
[\[155b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi ri bo gzi brjid bzang po zhes bsnyen bkur to/_de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab kyi sgra kun tu 'byung ba'i sprin ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi stobs kyi dpal brtsegs pa zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur 
[\[155b.3\]]to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa spos 'od 'phro ba'i sprin phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa gser rin po che'i ri'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor gyi mdzod 
[\[155b.4\]]chos thams cad 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu 'bar ba'i gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ri'i rtse mo mngon par 
[\[155b.5\]]'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus kyi sgron ma kun tu snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya shin tu yangs pa'i cod pan shes rab kyi 
[\[155b.6\]]'od ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che yid du 'ong ba'i dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sgron ma rin chen bla re'i dbyangs shes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og 
[\[155b.7\]]tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi nam mkha' la seng ge'i 'od shin tu mdzes pa zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyis rnam par brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan zla ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]gshegs pa 'od gzer gyi ri bo rnam par snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi nam mkha' sgrib pa med pa'i 'od ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan yid du 'ong ba'i 
[\[156a.2\]]me tog gi yan lag shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi dbang po dam pa'i 'od kyi dbyangs zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyi 'od kyi dbyangs 
[\[156a.3\]]zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sgo'i dbyangs mang po'i mdzod ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro rgya mtsho'i dbyangs shes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs 
[\[156a.4\]]pa dus gsum gyi mtshan rab tu snang ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dkyil 'khor dpal gyi ri bo snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos dbyings kyi seng ge'i 'od 
[\[156a.5\]]ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dpal gyi ri rab ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho thams cad snang bar mdzad pa'i seng ge zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur te/_/
[\[156a.6\]]de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi 'od kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab kyi 'od kun tu bsal ba chos kyi grong khyer rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de ltar rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas brgya po 
[\[156a.7\]]'di dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa/_bskal pa mdog dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig byung ste/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag thams cad kyi tha mar de bzhin gshegs pa chos 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]kyi dbyings kyi grong khyer ye shes kyi 'od kyis rab tu snang ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba byung bar gyur te/_de ltar rigs kyi bu kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag las chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa 
[\[156b.2\]]tha ma chos kyi dbyings kyi grong khyer ye shes kyi 'od kyi rab tu snang ba'i bar de dag thams cad kho mos mchod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la kho mos rim gror byas so/_/thams cad kyis chos bstan pa yang thos so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de 
[\[156b.3\]]dag thams cad kyi bstan pa la'ang kho mo rab tu byung ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi bstan pa yang kho mos yongs su bzung ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgra yid du 'ong ba dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa zab mo la 'jug pa 'di yang 
[\[156b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad las thob pa'i tshul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu thob bo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du'ang kho mos sems can rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su smin par byas so/_/de tshun 
[\[156b.5\]]chad du bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig byung bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni kho mos chos kyi nan tan gyis mchod pa byas te/_rigs kyi bu de phyin chad du kho mos sems can 'khor ba'i mun pa na 'khod 
[\[156b.6\]]cing mi shes pa'i gnyid kyis log pa rnams kyi mel tshe byas so/_/de dag gi sems kyi grong khyer yang yongs su bsrungs so/_/de dag khams gsum gyi grong khyer nas gyen du bskyod cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong rdal du yang rab tu bkod do/_/
[\[156b.7\]]rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgra yid du 'ong ba dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa zab mo la 'jug pa 'jig rten gyi tshig kyal par rnam par bzlog pa/_gnyis su smra ba med pa la rab tu 'god pa/_bden pa la rab tu gzhog pa'i mthar phyin 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]pa 'di shes par zad na/_kho mos byang chub sems dpa' dag gi lam gyi rang bzhin thams cad thogs pa med par shes pa/_sems kyi skad cig re re la chos thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bar dbang bsgyur ba/_sems can thams cad kyi sgra 
[\[157a.2\]]skad dang /_tshig rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/_skad rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba la mkhas pa/_chos thams cad kyi grangs dang ming rgya mtsho'i tshul dang /_cho ga la mkhas pa/_chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i gzungs rgya mtsho la dbang bsgyur ba/_
[\[157a.3\]]sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin tu chos kyi sprin mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul bar spyod pa'i mthar phyin par byed pa de dag gi spyod pa shes ba'am/_yon tan brjod pa 
[\[157a.4\]]'am/_sems can thams cad yongs su sdud pa'i nan tan shes par bya ba 'am/_byang chub sems dpa'i lam bla na med par brtsams pa'i sbyor ba'am/_byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes shin tu phra ba khong du chud pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[157a.5\]]chos kyi gter dang /_mdzod rnam par 'byed pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu'am/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi gtam la seng ge'i khri yongs su mnan par bya ba shes par nus re skan/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_skyes bu dam pa de dag ni chos thams cad kyi 
[\[157a.6\]]sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzungs yongs su gnon pa sha stag go_/song rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhabs kyi drung 'di nyid du mtshan mo'i lha mo shing thams cad kyi me tog rgyas par bde bar gnas pa zhes bya ba 'dug ste/_kho mo 
[\[157a.7\]]dang rgyang mi ring ba zhig na 'dug gis/_de'i gan du song las ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa dang /_ji ltar nan tan du byed cing sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'god par byed pa dris shig_/de 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]nas mtshan mo'i lha mo grong khyer thams cad bsrung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyis de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sa yid du 'ong ba dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa zab mo la 'jug pa 'di nyid brnan te/_bstan pa'i phyir tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la tshigs su 
[\[157b.2\]]bcad de smras pa/_rnam thar gang gis dus gsum rgyal ba ma lus dang /_/chos dbyings kun du 'byam klas mtha' dang dbus med pa/_/shes byed mtshan nyid kun gyi gzhir thug rtogs pa yi/_/rgyal sras rnams kyi rnam thar zab cing blta bar dka'/_/tshogs 
[\[157b.3\]]las byung ba'i rnam thar tshul ni mtha' yas te/_/chos nyid thos pas tshad med bsam du med pa yin/_/yongs su 'phel zhing kun tu chags med shugs drag par/_/dus gsum byams pa'i tshul gyi lam la 'jug par gyis/_/'di ltar sangs rgyas zhing rgyud rdul 
[\[157b.4\]]phran rab snyed kyi/_bskal pa 'das pa'i snga rol sngon gyi zhing byung ba/_/'jig rten khams ni chos 'od sprin gyi grong khyer dpal/_/bskul pa 'byung ba dri med mdog tu 'od chen no/_/bskal pa de gcig rgyal ba'i gdung ni rgyun ma chad/_/sangs rgyas ri rab rdul phran rab snyed 
[\[157b.5\]]byung bar gyur/_/bde gshegs chos kyi rgya mtsho 'od dbyangs rgyal po ni/_/thog mar byung ste de dag bskal pa dang po ba/_/rgyal ba chos sprin grong khyer 'od snang rgyal po ni/_/bde gshegs de dag kun gyi tha mar 'jig rten byung /_/de dag kun gyi spyan sngar phyin te 
[\[157b.6\]]kho mos mchod/_/de dag kun las chos kyang dga' ba chen pos thos/_/kho mos thog mar mthong ba gser mdog 'od mnga' ba/_/rgya mtsho'i chos 'od sgrog pa'i gsung gi rgyal po ste/_/mtshan rab sum cu gnyis kyis yongs brgyan ri bo 'dra/_/mthong nas 
[\[157b.7\]]bdag ni bde gshegs 'gyur snyam blo gros gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de ni kho mos mthong mod la/_/thams cad mkhyen nyid 'byam klas 'byung ba'i rgyu rkyen kyis/_/mkha' dbyings rnam yangs de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin can/_/rgyal ba'i sems kyi dang po 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]stobs ldan rab tu skyes/_/snying rje bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho che las byung ba des/_/dus gsum gshegs pa'i bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kun/_/rgyal sras rgya mtshos bskor ba ma lus thams cad dang /_/sems can rgya mtshor bcas 
[\[158a.2\]]pa'i rgya mtsho'i zhing yang rgyas/_/lus kyis zhing rnams thams cad ma lus khyab bya dang /_/'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa bzhin du lus bstan phyir/_/zhing rnams ma lus bskyod cing snang bar bya ba dang /_/'gro ba smin bya'i don du bdag gis sems kyang bskyed/_/rgyal 
[\[158a.3\]]ba gnyis pa'i spyan sngar kho mo phyin nas kyang /_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho bcu bzhugs rgyal ba'i dbang po mthong /_/rgyal ba tha ma mthong nas zhing gi rgya mtsho rnams/_/rgya mtsho'i zhing gi rdul phran rab snyed bzhugs pa mthong /_/de yi tshu rol bskal pa zhing rgyud rdul 
[\[158a.4\]]snyed du/_/rgyal ba 'gro ba'i sgron ma ji snyed skyes gyur pa/_/de dag thams cad spyan sngar kho mo phyin gyur te/_/rnam thar rgya mtsho'i tshul 'di spyod tshe mchod pa byas/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgra yid du 
[\[158a.5\]]'ong ba dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa zab mo la 'jug pa thob pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la zhugs pa/_gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho rgya chen po las byung ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa'i snang ba 
[\[158a.6\]]chen po rab tu thob pa/_so so yang dag par rig pa chen po rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/_dga' ba'i shugs rgya mtsho shin du yangs pa rnam par 'phel ba'i sems dang ldan pa des/_mtshan mo'i lha mo grong khyer thams cad bsrung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal la 
[\[158a.7\]]tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/khyod kyi shes rab chos yangs rgya mtsho kun la spyod/_/srid pa'i rgya mtsho mtha' dbus med par khyod kyis spyad/_/ye shes lus mchog snying po tshe ring snyun bral ba/_/lha mo 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]khyod ni 'khor 'dir byon cing rnam par mdzes/_/chos kyi rang bzhin nam mkha' lta bu thugs chud de/_/dus gsum kun gyi tshul yang chags med thugs chud mdzad/_/thugs kyi skad cig gcig la tshad med bsam yas pa'i/_/dmigs pa thams cad rtog pa mi 
[\[158b.2\]]mngar 'jal ba mdzad/_/ye shes spyan mnga' chos nyid sems can med gzigs kyang /_/sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas thugs rjes gzigs pa mdzad/_/thugs kyi rnam thar shin tu yangs la 'jug mdzad cing /_/sems can tshad med 'dul zhing yongs su 
[\[158b.3\]]smin par mdzad/_/khyod ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor rnam dpyad tshul mkhyen te/_/chos kyi rang bzhin shes bya'i tshul la rnam sangs rgyas/_/'phags lam dri ma med pa thams cad yongs bsgom ste/_/'gro ba ma lus rnam par sbyong zhing yongs su 'byung /_/thams 
[\[158b.4\]]cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dri med rtogs mdzad pas/_/khyod ni sems can rgya mtsho'i mchog las mngon par skyes/_/da ni chos dbyings khongs chud sems can kun khyab par/_/chos rab bstan cing 'jig rten 'jigs pa zhi bar mdzad/_/khyod ni rnam par snang 
[\[158b.5\]]mdzad smon lam lam tshul gyis/_/yang dag bzhud cing chags med blo yang dri med ldan/_/thams cad bgrod pa'i rgyal ba'i stabs ni thugs chud cing /_/zhing rnams kun gyi rgyal ba rnam par 'phrul ba gzigs/_/khyod kyi thugs ni mkha' 'dra thub par dka' ba ste/_/
[\[158b.6\]]nyon mongs kun gyi dri mas ma gos snga nas dag_/der ni dus gsum byung ba'i zhing rnams thams cad dang /_/sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa sems can kun bcas 'dus/_/skad cig gcig gis nyin mtshan yud du zla ba dang /_/skad cig yud tsam lo dang 
[\[158b.7\]]'du 'jig bskal pa dang /_bskal pa rgya mtsho ming grangs rgya mtshor bcas pa dang /_/'gro ba rnams kyi 'du shes rgya mtsho'ang thugs su chud/_/phyogs rnams kun gyi sems can skye 'chi ji snyed dang /_/gzugs yod pa dang gzugs med 'du shes yod med kyi/_/
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]rnam spyod bden pa'i tshul ni thugs su chud mdzad cing /_/de dag lam bstan byang chub mchog tu 'god pa mdzad/_/rnam par snang mdzad smon lam 'dri ba'i rigs las 'byung /_/bde gshegs kun gyi sku gcig tshul las yang dag 'khrungs/_/
[\[159a.2\]]khyod ni chos sku yongs dag thugs la chags mi mnga'/_/'jig rten kun tu sku gzugs yid bzhin ston pa mdzad/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]mtshan mo'i lha mo grong khyer thams cad bsrung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal la tshul dang 'dra 
[\[159a.3\]]ba'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod de/_mtshan mo'i lha mo grong khyer thams cad bsrung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/_mtshan mo'i lha mo grong khyer thams cad bsrung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal 
[\[159a.4\]]la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/_yang dang yang bltas nas mtshan mo'i lha mo grong khyer thams cad bsrung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyi drung nas song ngo //_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu 
[\[159a.5\]]rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po bcu pa/_de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgra yid du 'ong ba dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa zab mo la 'jug pa de/_de bas kyang rgya cher bsgom pa dang /_yid ches par 
[\[159a.6\]]bya ba dang /_shin tu rgyas par byed cing /_mtshan mo'i lha mo shing thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pas bde bar gnas pa gang na ba der phyin nas/_mtshan mo'i lha mo shing thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pas bde bar gnas pa spos rin po che thams cad kyi 
[\[159a.7\]]shing gi yal ga'i khang pa brtsegs pa zhig na/_seng ge'i khri rin po che'i shing gi myu gu'i snying po can zhig la 'dug ste/_mtshan mo'i lha mo stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor cing 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]mtshan mo'i lha 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]mo shing thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pas bde bar gnas pa'i/_rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha mo bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na ji ltar byang chub sems 
[\[159b.2\]]dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa dang /_ji ltar slob pa dang /_ji ltar spyod ji ltar slob cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba bdag la bshad du gsol/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_mtshan mo'i lha mo shing thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pas bde bar gnas 
[\[159b.3\]]bas/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu kho mo'i mthus ni mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na nyi ma nub tu cha ba'i tshe/_pad+mo shin ta rgyas pa rnams kyang rnam par par 'gyur ro/_/skyes pa dang bud med bza' shing gi ra 
[\[159b.4\]]ba na gnas shing /_dga' bar rtse ba la brtson pa dag kyang khyim du 'dong ba'i blo bskyed do/_/lam dang srang na rgyu ba'i sems can rnams kyang zhag gi gnas sems shing tshol te 'gro ba'i gnas thams cad du mngon par gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/nags tshal dang gseb 
[\[159b.5\]]dang /_phug la rten pa'i sems can rnams kyang nags tshal dang gseb dang phug tu 'dong ngo /_/shing la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang shing gi gnas la brten par mngon par gzhol lo/_/khung na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang khung du 'dong ngo /_/grong dang grong 
[\[159b.6\]]khyer dang /_ljongs dang yul la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang grong dang grong khyer dang ljongs dang yul du 'dong ngo /_/chu na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang chur 'dong ngo /_/phyogs gzhan gyi yul du phyin pa'i sems can rnams kyang nub mo bde zhing dga' bar 
[\[159b.7\]]gnas pa'i don du rang rang gi yul gyi phyogs kyi bsam pa skyed do/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang /_kho mo ni skyes pa dang bud med gzhon nu dar la bab pa/_dar ba'i nyam drod kyis myos pa dang /_/glu dang gar dang rol mo'i dga' bas myos pa dang /_
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]'dod pa'i yon tan la dga' zhing /_brtson pa rnams la skye ba dang /_rga shi dang /_gti mug gi mun pa chen pos 'jigs pa'i gnyen por dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir/_brtson 'grus kyi legs pas bsngags pa byed do/_/sems 
[\[160a.2\]]can ser sna dang ldan pa rnams ni sbyin pa la rab tu sbyor ro/_/sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can rnams ni/_tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do/_/ngan sems dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la ni/_byams pa'i legs pa brjod par byed do/_/sems 'khrugs pa'i 
[\[160a.3\]]sems can rnams ni bzod pa la rab tu 'god do/_/le lo can gyi sems can rnams ni/_byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus brtsam pa la rab tu 'god do/_/sems can rnam par myos pa'i sems can rnams ni bsam gtan la rab tu 'god do/_/shes rab 'chal 
[\[160a.4\]]ba can gyi sems can rnams ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su sbyor ro/_/theg pa dma' ba la mos pa'i sems can rnams ni theg pa chen po la rab tu 'god do/_/khams gsum la mngon par zhen pa'i sems can rnams ni/_byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[160a.5\]]pa/_srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud mthar phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor la spyod pa la rab tu 'god do/_/dmigs pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i sems can las dang /_nyon mongs pas rab tu mnar ba bsod nams dang /_ye shes kyi stobs med pa rnams ni/_byang chub sems 
[\[160a.6\]]dpa'i stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'god do/_/mi shes pa'i mun nag gis khebs pa'i/_sems can bdag tu bya ba dang /_bdag gir bya bas ma rig pa'i mun nag tu 'thoms pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab 
[\[160a.7\]]tu 'god de/_rigs kyi bu gzhan yang kho mo ni/_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dga' ba'i 'od spro ba yangs pa yang dag par 'byung ba thob pa'o/_/nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]smras pa/_lha mo byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba dga' 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]ba'i 'od spro ba yangs pa yang dag par 'byung ba de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu rnam par thar pa de ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams kyis sems can yongs su sdud pa'i ye shes dang /_thabs snang ba dang ldan pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[160b.2\]]rigs kyi bu sems can rnams kyi bde ba nyams su myong ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams kyi mthus byung ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdams ngag gi tshul gyis byung ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la nan 
[\[160b.3\]]tan tu byas pas byung ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bslabs pas byung ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byung ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i lam la nan tan du byas pas byung ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dang tshul 
[\[160b.4\]]'dra ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pas byung ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan pa'i mthun pa'i rgyus byung ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi nyi ma snang bas byung ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos dkar po'i dkyil 
[\[160b.5\]]'khor gyi snang bas ni/_sems can rnams kyi bde ba yongs su 'byung ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dga' ba'i 'od spro ba yangs pa yang dag par 'byung ba 'di la 'jug pa'i tshe/_bcom ldan 
[\[160b.6\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho rjes su dran par byed cing 'jug pa dang /_khong du chud par byed pa'i tshe/_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das 
[\[160b.7\]]sngon byang chub sems dpa'i sa la bzhugs pas/_sems can bdag tu bya ba dang /_bdag gir bya ba la mngon par zhen pa/_ma rig pa'i mun pas 'thoms pa/_lta ba'i thibs po'i lta bas dgon par 'khyams pa/_srid pa'i dbang du gyur pa/_'dod chags kyi 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]bcings pas glags pa/_zhe sdang gis khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_gti mug gis sems kyi rgyud 'khrugs par gyur pa/_phrag dog dang ser snas kun nas 'khor ba/_nyon mongs pas rab tu dkrugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_
[\[161a.2\]]'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chen po nyams su myong bar gyur pa/_'khor ba na 'phongs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis rab tu gzir ba/_sangs rgyas blta ba las phyir phyogs par gyur pa/_thams cad gzigs nas thugs rje chen po'i dgongs pa skyes par gyur to/_/
[\[161a.3\]]sems can thams cad kyi don du 'gro ba thams cad la yo byad dang /_rin po che yongs su bsdu zhing /_yongs su sdud pa'i dgongs pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi mkho ba'i yo byad yongs su bsgrub pa'i dgongs pa dang /_dngos po thams 
[\[161a.4\]]cad la chags pa mi mnga' ba'i dgongs pa dang /_yul thams cad la ye brngam pa mi mnga' ba'i dgongs pa dang /_dga' ba thams cad la chags pa mi mnga' ba'i dgongs pa dang /_longs spyod thams cad la yongs su ma zhen pa'i dgongs pa dang /_sbyin 
[\[161a.5\]]pa thams cad la rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa'i dgongs pa dang /_'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad la bzhed pa mi mnga' ba'i dgongs pa dang /_rgyu dang rkyen la ma rmongs pa'i dgongs pa dang /_legs par 'tshal ba'i chos la 
[\[161a.6\]]yang dag par ji ltar ba bzhin du mkhyen pa'i dgongs pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi don la gzhol bar bya ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i dgongs pa yang dag par skyes par gyur te/_de de ltar chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la yang dag par zhugs 
[\[161a.7\]]pa'i dgongs pa dang ldan pa sems can gyi khams thams cad du byams pa chen pos snyoms par zhugs pa 'gro ba thams cad thugs rje chen po'i sprin gyis rgyas par dgang ba'i sbyor ba mnga' ba sems can gyi 'jig rten thams cad kun nas 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]khebs pa'i chos kyi gdugs chen po'i dkyil 'khor mnga' ba/_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i ri rnam par 'joms pa'i ye shes rdo rje'i mtshon cha mnga' ba/_'gro ba thams cad kyi bde ba yongs su bsgrub pas dgyes pa'i shugs rnam par 'phel ba'i dgongs 
[\[161b.2\]]pa mnga' ba/_sems can thams cad la bde ba phul du phyin pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i smon lam gyi dgongs pa mnga' ba/_bsam pa dang smon pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad la nor gyi char rab tu dbab pa'i dgongs pa mnga' ba/_sems can thams cad yongs 
[\[161b.3\]]su mi gtong zhing snyoms par sbyor ba'i dgongs pa mnga' ba/_'phags pa'i nor gyis sems can thams cad tshim par mdzad pa'i dgongs pa mnga' ba/_stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che phul du dri ma med pa thob par mdzad pa'i dgongs pa mnga' ba/_byang chub sems 
[\[161b.4\]]dpa'i mngon par shes pa chen po'i stobs dang shugs rab tu brnyes pa de byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyi sprin chen pos sems can kyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/_sems 
[\[161b.5\]]can thams cad la mngon par gyur par bzhugs shing sbyin pa'i dmigs pa thams cad kyi sprin gyi char chen po rnam pa thams cad du dbab pa dang /_rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi sprin chen po'i char mngon par 'bebs pa mdzad de/_'di ltar sems can thams 
[\[161b.6\]]cad so so'i tshul dang ji ltar mthun pas longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir dngos po rnam pa tha dad pa mtha' yas pa yongs su gtang ba dang yo byad rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pa la spyad par bya ba dang sbyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bsdu ba'i tshul dang /_
[\[161b.7\]]dngos po yongs su gtang ba rnam pa du ma la yongs su spyad pa dang /_yo byad kyi rnam pa dang /_rgyan gyi 'du byed brjod du med pa dang /_sbyin pa'i tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs mtshan nyid sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]tshim par bya ba'i sbyin pa'i tshul mtha' yas pa thugs su chud pas sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su tshim par bya bar mngon par bsgrub pa'i dngos po thams cad gtang ba dang /_yongs su gtang ba dang /_sbyin par bya ba dang /_'gro ba thams 
[\[162a.2\]]cad kyi 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal rgyun mi chad pa las yongs su bskyab pa'i tshul du bya ba rnams/_sems can thams cad la lan la re ba mi mnga' ba dang /_'gro ba thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du byung ba'i dgongs pa mnga' bas/_'gro ba thams cad kyi sems rin po che 
[\[162a.3\]]yongs su sbyong ba mdzad cing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtsho gcig tu gyur pa las byung ba'i yongs su bsdu ba'i tshul/_'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yo byad kyi char dbab pa/_'gro ba thams cad la thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsod nams 
[\[162a.4\]]rgya mtsho'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar mdzad pas dgongs pa'i skad cig re re la sems can ma lus pa thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrub par mdzad pa dang /_
[\[162a.5\]]dgongs pa'i skad cig re re la zhing gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa ma lus pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing nye bar nyon mongs pa med cing bla na med pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pas rnam par klub cing rab tu brgyan pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_dgongs pa'i skad cig 
[\[162a.6\]]re re la chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho lus pa thams cad rgyas par dgang ba rnam par dag par bya ba dang dgongs pa'i skad cig re re la nam mkha'i dbyings kyi gtos ma lus pa thams cad rgyas par dgang ba'i ye shes kyi tshul yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_dgongs pa'i skad cig 
[\[162a.7\]]re re la sems can dang dus ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug cing ye shes kyi tshul rnam par dag par bya ba dang /_dgongs pa'i skad cig re re la 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad rnam par 'dul ba'i ye shes kyi tshul snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba dang /_dgongs pa'i skad 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]cig re re la dus ma lus pa thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba las phyir mi ldog par bya ba dang /_dgongs pa'i skad cig re re la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs la mkhas pa ma lus par yongs su bstan pas 'gro ba thams cad la phan thogs par bya ba dang /_
[\[162b.2\]]dgongs pa'i skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa'i grangs su bya ba'i rgyud dang ldan pa/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par bstan pa/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su 'du ba/_'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa sna 
[\[162b.3\]]tshogs brjod du yod pa/_'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam par gnas pa sna tshogs kyi mtshams rnam par brgyan pa/_gzhi sna tshogs dang lhun du mar brjod du yod pa rnam par phye ba sna tshogs kyi bskal pa rnam pa tha dad pa bstan du yod pa/_kun nas nyon mongs shing 
[\[162b.4\]]rnam par dag pa dang rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_gcig tu yongs su dag pa dang gcig tu kun nas nyon mongs pa dang che ba dang yangs pa dang /_tshad med pa dang dog pa dang phra ba dang rgya che ba dang /_gzhi mnyam pa dang snrel zhi dang spyi'u tshugs dang /_
[\[162b.5\]]phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su mngon par bltas pa dang /_phyogs rgya mtsho sna tshogs su gzhol ba sgo sna tshogs nas bstan cing sgo mtha' yas pa'i dbyibs rnam pa sna tshogs su 'dug pa'i rnam par phye ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du 
[\[162b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa spyad de/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa yongs su mnan nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /_rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par dgang bar bya ba dang /_dgongs pa'i skad cig re re la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[162b.7\]]'phrin las ma lus pa thams cad sems can pha rol gyi sems dang bsam pas rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad la thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsod nams rgya mtsho'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar mdzad de/_mngon par bsgrub pa mdzad par 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]gyur pa mngon par shes so rjes su dran no/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe/_'jig rten gnas pa bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang bral 
[\[163a.2\]]ba/_sems can byas pa drin du mi gzo bas yongs su gang ba/_mi shes pa'i mun pas chod pa/_bdag tu bya ba dang /_bdag gir bya ba la mngon par zhen pa ma rig pa'i mun pa dang rab rib kyis bsgribs pa tshul bzhin ma yin par rnam par rtog pa la zhugs pa/_lta 
[\[163a.3\]]ba'i thibs po'i bas dgon par mgo rlag pa/_rgyu dang 'bras bu la mgo rmongs pa nyon mongs pa dang las kyi dbang du gyur pa 'khor ba'i mya ngam chen po'i sdug bsngal gyi sa'i 'og tu ltung ba/_phongs pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar gyur pa rnams la thugs rje chen po 
[\[163a.4\]]bskyed de/_pha rol tu phyin pa spyad pa'i sprin rgya chen po mngon par bsgrubs te dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten par gnas pa yongs su bsngags pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par bzlog pa dang /_bsod nams dang ye 
[\[163a.5\]]shes kyi tshogs chen po la mngon par mos par bya ba dang /_rgyu'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs mngon par bstan pa dang /_las dang chos su mi 'gal ba'i phyogs rab tu brjod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su bsdu ba'i phyogs snang bar 
[\[163a.6\]]bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi mos pa'i phyogs rab tu brjod par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi zhing yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyogs legs par bstan pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs mi gcad pa'i phyogs kyi rjes su 
[\[163a.7\]]'brang bar bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa'i phyogs yongs su gzung ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi phyogs rnam par bzlog pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs kyi phyogs yongs su brjod pa mdzad de/_pha rol tu phyin 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]pa'i sprin chen pos sems can gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/_mngon par bsgrubs nas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can tshim par 'gyur bar chos kyis shin tu bsdu ba la sems can rab tu dgod par mdzad do/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs la 
[\[163b.2\]]yang dag par bskul to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po la rab tu btsud do/_/'phags pa'i nor thams cad rab tu thob par bya bas nye bar brten to/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'dun pa'i shugs kyis sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya 
[\[163b.3\]]mtsho rnam par 'phel bar mdzad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgor yang de dag rab tu btsud de/_phung po shin tu zhi ba'i bde bas yongs su bsdu bas yongs su bsdus te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid che ba nyid la mngon du mos par 
[\[163b.4\]]byas te/_byang chub sems dpa' yongs su gzung ba'i ye shes la rab tu bkod do/_/nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]smras pa/_'phags ma khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas ji srid cig lags/_smras pa/_rigs kyi 
[\[163b.5\]]bu gnas 'di ni yid ches par dka' ba ste/_shes par dka' ba'o/_/mos par dka' ba'o/_/'jug par dka' ba'o/_/brjod par dka' ba'o/_/khong du chud par dka' ba ste/_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams 
[\[163b.6\]]cad kyis kyang khong du chud par mi nus so/_/gzhan du na de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba ma gtogs te/_gnas 'di ni sems can 'khor ba'i bde ba thams cad la mngon par 'dod pa 
[\[163b.7\]]med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde ba la lhag par dmigs pa/_sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba rab tu zhi bar bya ba la zhugs pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i nan tan la mngon par mos pa/_chos 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa nam mkha'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/_mos pa yangs pa'i lam gyis rnam par dag pa/_'khor ba'i rgyun las phyir phyogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rgya mtsho la mngon par mos 
[\[164a.2\]]pa chos kyi grong khyer du 'gro bar gcig tu chad pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul yongs su gnon pa'i brtson 'grus can/_sangs rgyas kyi sa'i rgyud rnam par gnon pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la mngon par mos pa/_stobs bcu rab 
[\[164a.3\]]tu thob par bya ba'i mthar thug pa rnams kyis bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yangs pas nye bar brten pa'i sems dang /_bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang ma zhum pa dang /_nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_ma yo ba dang /_ma nyams pa dang /_ma 'chums pa dang /_
[\[164a.4\]]mun pa med pa'i sems dang /_ye shes kyi snang ba kun tu snang bas snang bar 'gyur ba'i sems dang /_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde bar bya bar shin tu 'dun pa'i sems dang /_bdud kyi 'khor dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi thub pa'i 
[\[164a.5\]]sems dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par bya bar skabs phye ba'i sems kyis khong du chud pa dang /_'jug pa dang /_yid ches par bya ba dang /_gzung ba dang rjes su 'brang bar bya ba 'am/_shes par bya bar nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu gnas 
[\[164a.6\]]'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi yul te/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang yongs su ma non na/_sems can gzhan thams cad kyis lta ci zhig smos/_'on kyang sems can cang shes rnams kyi bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa rnam par dag 
[\[164a.7\]]par bya ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba la spyod pa'i sems can rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa dbang du 'gyur bar bya ba dang /_khyod kyis bsam pa thag pa nas yongs su dris pa'i lung bstan pa'i chos nyid rab tu 'byung ba thob par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]rlabs kyis bstan to/_/de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo shing thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pas bde bar gnas pas de'i tshe/_don de nyid la brnan te bstan pa'i phyir dus gsum du byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la rnam par bltas te/_tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag 
[\[164b.2\]]smras so/_/sangs rgyas sras po khyod kyis gang dris pa/_/de ni bsam yas zab mo sangs rgyas yul/_/bsam yas zhing gi rdul phran rab snyed kyi/_/bskal pa mang pos de kun brjod [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus/_/sems can 'dod pa'i sems ldan sdang ba dang /_/de bzhin 
[\[164b.3\]]gti mug mun pas bsgribs pa dang /_/'chab dang dregs pas bsam pa nyams gyur pas/_/rgyal ba'i chos nyid zhi ba shes mi nus/_/phrag dog 'jungs pa'i dbang gis rjes 'brang dang /_/g.yo sgyus bsam pa rnyogs par gyur pa dang /_/nyon 
[\[164b.4\]]mongs las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa yis/_/sangs rgyas yul 'di shes par mi nus so/_/phung po khams dang skye mched gnas pa dang /_/'jig tshogs mang la gnas par gyur pa dang /_/lta sems 'du shes phyin ci log gyur pas/_/
[\[164b.5\]]zhi ba'i sa 'di shes par mi nus so/_/rgyal ba'i yul ni shes dka' zhi ba ste/_/rang bzhin dri med rnam par rtog pa med/_/srid par rten cing 'khor la chags pa yis/_/chos 'di yang dag shes par mi nus so/_/sangs rgyas rigs su rigs 
[\[164b.6\]]ldan gang skyes pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis byin brlabs shing /_/chos kyi rgyal po'i gdung rabs yongs 'dzin pa/_/drang srong de dag yul ni 'di yin no/_/dkar chos rgya mtshos mi ngoms sems ldan zhing /_/gang rnams 
[\[164b.7\]]dge ba'i bshes kyis yongs bzung ste/_/thub pa'i stobs la dmigs pa'i sems sprin can/_/de dag 'di thos bzod pa thob par 'gyur/_/gang rnams bsam pa dri med rnam rtog med/_/bar snang mkha' bzhin phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su/_/
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]mun pa rnam bsal blo gros sgron ma'i sprin/_/dri med de dag spyod yul 'di yin no/_/snying rje'i bsam pas 'gro ba rgya mtsho rnams/_/dus gsum byung ba gang rnams rgyas byed cing /_/sems can ma lus rjes 'brang byams pa can/_/de dag rgyal 
[\[165a.2\]]ba'i tshul 'dir 'jug par 'gyur/_/gang rnams 'dzin med dga' ba'i sems ldan zhing /_/rtag par bdog pa thams cad sbyin brtson la/_/sems can kun la mnyam par zhugs gyur pa/_/chags med de dag spyod yul sa 'di yin/_/nyon mongs med sems 
[\[165a.3\]]skyon med spyod ldan zhing /_/gang rnams 'gyod pa rnam bstsal sems ldan te/_/sangs rgyas gdams ngag nan tan byed ldan pa/_/dri med de dag spyod yul 'di yin no/_/gang rnams mi sgul_sems ldan mi bskyod sems/_/chos kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa'i sems 
[\[165a.4\]]ldan zhing /_/las kyi rgya mtshor mi 'gal sems ldan pa/_/mi zad de dag rnam thar 'di yin no/_/gang rnams mi skye'i sems dang mi ldog sems/_/brtson 'grus mthu dang rtsal du ldan pa rnams/_/thams cad mkhyen tshogs brtson 'grus mtha' yas pa/_/
[\[165a.5\]]brtul zhugs bzang ldan de dag yul 'di yin/_/zhi ba'i sems ldan mnyam par bzhag pa gang /_/shin tu zhir gyur rims dang bral ba rnams/_/kun mkhyen bsam gtan yan lag mtshor spyod pa/_/rab tu zhi ba de dag tshul 'di yin/_/gang rnams 
[\[165a.6\]]chags pa kun las sems grol zhing /_/chos kyi rang bzhin khong du chud sems can/_/rgyal ba'i chos dbyings rtogs pa khong chud pa/_/shes rab sgron ma de dag tshul 'di yin/_/sems can rang bzhin rtogs sems ldan gyur cing /_/gang rnams 
[\[165a.7\]]srid pa'i mtsho la chags med sems/_/sems can sems la gzugs brnyan zla 'char ba/_/lam mkhan de dag rnam thar 'di yin no/_/dus gsum byung ba'i rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams/_/smon lam gang chen mtsho rgyud skyes pa yi/_/zhing rnams kun tu 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]phyi ma'i mthar spyod pa/_/kun tu bzang po de dag tshul 'di yin/_/gang rnams chos dbyings tshul rnams rgya mtsho yis/_/'gro ba rgya mtsho 'du dang 'jig pa yi/_/bskal par bcas pa khong du chud pa'i rnams/_/rtog med de dag rnam thar 'di yin no/_/zhing 
[\[165b.2\]]rnams kun gyi rdul phran thams cad la/_/sangs rgyas grangs med shing rgyal drung bzhugs shing /_/byang chub 'tshang rgya 'gro 'dul mthong ba yi/_/chags med mig can de dag tshul 'di yin/_/khyod ni bskal pa rgya mtsho rgya chen du/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen 
[\[165b.3\]]mang po bsnyen bkur te/_/chos 'dod chos tshol mi skyo 'dir phyin pas/_/thos nas de ni yongs su gzung bar nus/_/khyod kyi bsam pa yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir/_/bde gshegs byin rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pas/_/rnam par snang mdzad tshad med 
[\[165b.4\]]yul 'di yang /_/kho mo'i tshig las chags pa med par 'byung /_/rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol de'i yang pha snga zhig tu 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gser rin po che'i ri spo rnam par snang 
[\[165b.5\]]ba zhes bya ba byung ste/_rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gser rin po che'i ri spo rnam par snang ba der de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ri bo'i 'od chos kyi dbyings su snang ba'i gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya ba byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ri bo'i 
[\[165b.6\]]'od chos kyi dbyings su snang ba'i gzi brjid rgyal po de/_sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gser rin po che'i ri spo rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sa dang /_ri rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 
[\[165b.7\]]'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa bstan du yod pa dang ldan pa/_'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud re re zhing yang bskal pa'i grangs shin tu bstan pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa bskal pa re re zhing yang bskal pa bar ma shin tu bstan pa du 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]ma dang ldan pa bskal ba bar ma re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa tha dad du bya ba bstan pa du ma dang ldan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bstan du yod pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba re re zhing yang mdo sde yang dag par bstan 
[\[166a.2\]]pa/_'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed brjod du yod pa mdo sde re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i lung bstan pa/_'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed bstan du yod pa sems can 'dul ba mtha' dang dbus med pa shin tu bstan pa/_theg pa 
[\[166a.3\]]tha dad pa'i tshul gyis bsgrubs pa/_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang cho 'phrul sna tshogs kyis rnam par 'dul ba dang ldan pa yongs su sbyangs te/_rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gser rin po che'i ri spo rnam par snang ba der/_'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud 
[\[166a.4\]]phyogs kun tu mngon par bltas pa'i sgo rgyal mtshan gyis rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba byung ste/_rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud phyogs kun tu sgo mngon par bltas pa rgyal mtshan gyis rnam par brgyan pa der/_'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyi mdog 
[\[166a.5\]]kun tu snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzhi dang /_mtshams kyi rgyan rin po che'i rgyal po/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub rab tu snang ba las byas pa/_rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog rgya mtsho la gnas pa/_lhun rin po che'i rgyal 
[\[166a.6\]]po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan rab tu ston pa las bsgrubs pa/_lha'i grong khyer gyi dbyibs su 'dug pa rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa byung bar gyur te/_'jig rten gyi khams der gling bzhi ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi rdul 
[\[166a.7\]]shin tu phra ba snyed byung bar gyur to/_/gling bzhi pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag gi gling bzhi pa dbu ma rin po che sna tshogs kyi rtse mo'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba byung ste/_gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna tshogs kyi rtse mo'i rgyal mtshan der gling chu zheng du 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]dpag tshad brgya phrag stong yod pa bzhi byung nas gling re rer yang grong khyer chen po stong phrag re re byung ngo /_/gling bzhi pa de'i 'dzam bu gling gi dbus su rgyal po'i gnas rin po che'i sa las rnam par brgyan pa/_sprin gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba grong khyer stong phrag bcu'i 'khor dang ldan pa byung 
[\[166b.2\]]ngo /_/de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling de'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]rnams kyang tshe'i tshad lo stong phrag bcu thub par gyur to/_/rgyal po'i gnas rin po che'i sa las rnam par brgyan pa sprin gyi sgron ma der 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa zhes 
[\[166b.3\]]bya ba byung ste/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa de'i blon po ni lnga brgya byung ngo /_/btsun mo ni stong phrag drug cu byung ngo /_/sras ni kun kyang dpa' ba brtul phod pa/_yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa/_
[\[166b.4\]]blta na sdug pa gzi brjid che ba/_stobs che ba brgya phrag bdun byung ngo /_/rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa de'i tshe la 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyang gdugs gcig gis bskyangs par gyur te/_pha rol gyi 'khor dang dgra 
[\[166b.5\]]thams cad kyang shin tu choms par gyur to/_/de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams der bskal pa bar ma ni zad du cha/_rnyog pa lnga ni 'jig rten du byung /_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam ni nub par gyur nas/_sems can mi dge ba bcu'i lam la spyod pa phal cher 
[\[166b.6\]]ngan song du yang 'dong bar gyur to/_/de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyus tshe thung ba dang longs spyod chung ba dang gzugs ma legs pa dang /_kha dog mi sdug pa dang /_lus ma legs pa dang /_bde ba'i rnam pa nyung ba dang /_sdug bsngal 
[\[166b.7\]]nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa mang ba dang /_phan tshun bslu zhing 'drid pa'i rang bzhin can dang /_phan tshun dbye ba la zhugs pa dang /_zhe gcod pa'i tshig la spyod pa dang /_'chal ba'i tshig tu smra ba dang /_'dod pa mi bzad pas zil gyis gnon pa dang /_zhe sdang 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]ba'i yid kyi rtog pa dang ldan pa dang /_lta ba'i thibs po sna tshogs kyi mya ngam du 'khyams par gyur nas/_de dag chos ma yin pa'i 'dod chags la zhen cing 'dod pa mi bzad pas zil gyis non la/_log pa'i chos kyis kun nas 'khor bas sa la shing rtsi dang /_
[\[167a.2\]]lo zas skye bar 'gyur ba'i char yang dus su mi 'bab par gyur te/_sems can de dag kyang rtswa dang gel pa dang sman dang nags tshal dang /_bza' shing gi ra ba dang sdong po dag kyang skams par gyur nas/_nad sna tshogs kyis thebs shing phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su 
[\[167a.3\]]skyabs med pas/_phan tshun khod mi myong zhing g.yen sbyor bar gyur te/_de dag kun kyang gcig tu 'dus nas rgyal po'i gnas rin po che'i sa las rnam par brgyan pa sprin gyi sgron ma gang na ba der dong ste/_kun nas bskor nas/_la la ni lag pa gyen du sgreng /_la la 
[\[167a.4\]]ni thal mo sbyor/_la la ni lus shin tu 'dar/_la la ni gyed/_la la ni bub/_la la ni lus thams cad kyis phab cing phyag 'tshal/_la la ni pus mo sa la 'dzugs/_la la ni lag pa nam mkha'i dbyings su g.yo ba/_la la ni gos med cing sgren 
[\[167a.5\]]mor 'khod/_la la ni kha mig [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug par gyur cing /_rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa la mngon tu bltas shing /_snying rje skad du 'o dod chen po 'bod de/_lha chen po bdag cag ni nyams thag go_/bkres pa 
[\[167a.6\]]dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis rab tu gzir to/_/'jigs pa sna tshogs kyis g.yen spyo'o/_/bdag cag la skyabs ma mchis so/_/bdag cag la mgon dang dpung gnyen ma mchis so/_/sdug bsngal gyi shing thags kyis 'khor to/_/srog chad la 
[\[167a.7\]]thug go_/'chi bar gyur ma khad do/_/zhes te smre sngags sna tshogs su bla zhing dbyangs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_tshig sna tshogs kyis kha gdong mi sdug par gyur par 'du shes dang tshig sna tshogs kyi tha snyad dang /_cho mgreng dang skad kyi gdangs don sna 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]tshogs brjod pa'i tshig dang /_ngag gis 'o dod bos so/_/rgyal po'i gnas de'i skyes pa dang bud med dang khye'u dang /_bu mo bkres pa dang skom pas mnar ba lus la rgyan med pa sgren mo gos med pa/_kha dog dang mdog mi sdug pa lus gas shing rtsub pa/_sdug bsngal 
[\[167b.2\]]zhing yid mi bde la/_mi dga' ba de dag thams cad kyang bde ba ni mngon par 'dod/_sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pas ni brla khyer nas rgyal po shes pa'i skyes bu chen po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa/_de la bde ba thams cad thob 
[\[167b.3\]]par bya ba'i 'du shes dang /_sdug bsngal thams cad dang mi 'grogs par bya ba'i 'du shes dang /_'tsho ba'i bsam pa dang ldan zhing gter thob par bya ba'i 'du shes dang /_mu stegs mthong bar bya ba'i 'du shes dang /_lam chen po la nan tan du bya ba'i 'du shes 
[\[167b.4\]]dang /_gru chen po'i 'du shes dang /_ye shes kyi gling chen po'i 'du shes dang /_don chen po rab tu thob par bya ba'i 'du shes dang /_mtho ris kyi dga' ba dang bde ba thams cad rab tu thob par bya ba'i 'du shes kyis mgon dang skyabs tshol bar gyur to/_/rgyal po 
[\[167b.5\]]chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pas 'khor kun nas slong ba mang po snying rje rje skad du 'bod pa'i 'o dod chen po de thos nas/_de snying rje chen po'i sgo brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu la zhugs par gyur to/_/de snying rje chen po'i 
[\[167b.6\]]tshul yid la bab pa'i sems su gyur nas/_yud tsam zhig rtse gcig tu bsams te snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i tshig bcu brjod do/_/bcu gang zhe na/_kye hud kye sems can 'di dag ni 'khor ba'i g.yang sa chen por lhung yang skyabs med pa lta na/_bdag 
[\[167b.7\]]nam zhig 'khor ba'i g.yang sa chen por lhung ba'i sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la dgod pas gnas su 'gyur/_kyi hud kye sems can 'di dag nyon mongs pa'i gnod pas gtses shing skyabs med pa lta na/_nam zhig bdag sems can nyon mongs 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]pa sna tshogs kyis 'jigs pa dang /_gnod pas gtses te skyabs med pa rnams kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las kyi mtha' la 'god pas skyabs su 'gyur/_kyi hud kye sems can 'di dag 'jig rten na rga shi'i 'jigs pas tshar chod cing mgon med pa 
[\[168a.2\]]lta na nam zhig bdag sems can mgon med pa rnams kyi 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par sel bas mgon du 'gyur/_kyi hud kye sems can 'di dag 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa sna tshogs kyis gtses te/_rten med pa lta na nam zhig bdag sems can 'jig rten gyi 
[\[168a.3\]]'jigs pa sna tshogs kyis gtses pa rnams shin tu bde zhing skyon med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam la 'god pas rten du 'gyur/_kyi hud kye sems can 'di dag 'jig rten na ma rig pa'i mun par 'thoms te the tshom dang yid gnyis kyi rab rib kyis bsgribs pa lta na/_
[\[168a.4\]]nam zhig bdag sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa rnam par sel bas sgron mar gyur par 'ong /_kyi hud kye sems can 'di dag ni snang ba dang bral ba lta na nam zhig bdag ye shes kyi sgo rab rib med par yongs su ston pas ye shes chen po'i snang ba 'byin par 
[\[168a.5\]]'gyur/_kyi hud kye sems can 'di dag ni phrag dog dang 'jungs pa dang /_g.yo dang sgyu'i rnyog pas bsam pa rnyog pa can du gyur te/_ye shes kyi mdog gsal ba med pa lta na/_nam zhig bdag sems can thams cad shin tu dag pa la rab tu 'god cing bla na med pa'i 
[\[168a.6\]]ye shes kyi mdog rab tu gsal bar byed par 'gyur/_kyi hud kye sems can gyi 'jig rten ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i yul gyi rgyud du zhugs shing 'dren pa med pa lta na/_nam zhig bdag sems can thams cad chos rgya mtsho'i tshul la 'dzud cing 'dren par 'gyur bar 
[\[168a.7\]]'ong /_kyi hud kye sems can gyi 'jig rten ma dul zhing rnam par 'dren pa med pa lta na/_nam zhig bdag sems can thams cad rnam pa thams cad du yongs su smyin par bya ba dang /_rnam par gdul ba la de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi dus 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]las mi 'da' zhing rnam par 'dren par 'gyur bar 'ong /_kyi hud kye sems can gyi 'jig rten ni dmus long du gyur te/_yongs su 'dren pa med pa lta na/_nam zhig bdag sems can thams cad sgrib pa med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul la 'dzud cing yongs 
[\[168b.2\]]su 'dren par 'gyur de skad du des snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i tshig rnam pa bcu brjod nas rgyal po'i gnas der dril chen po brdungs te/_gtong ba chen po'i rnga bo che yang yongs su brdungs nas/_su ci 'dod pa de la de sbyin gyis/_'gro ba thams cad kyang yongs su tshim par 
[\[168b.3\]]bya'o zhes sgra brjod de/_des 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyi rgyal po'i gnas thams cad dang /_grong dang grong khyer dang ljongs dang /_yul dang grong rdal thams cad du yo byad thams cad kyi mdzod phye ste/_lam gyi bzhi mdo dang /_lam gyi sum mdo dang srang thams 
[\[168b.4\]]cad du yang yo byad sna tshogs kyi rnam pa mang po bkod de 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar bstabs so/_/mdzod dang bang ba thams cad kyang phye ste/_rin po che'i gter chen po dang tshogs kyang yongs su bstan to/_/rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phung po du ma yang 
[\[168b.5\]]spungs so/_/zas dang skom dang /_gos dang bzhon pa dang me tog dang /_phreng ba dang bdug pa dang byug pa dang /_phye ma dang gos rin po che kha dog sna tshogs kyi mdzod phye nas/_khang pa dang /_gzhal med khang dang /_khyim mang po mal cha dang /_stan dang gos kyis 
[\[168b.6\]]yongs su brgyan te/_nor dang dbyig thams cad phun sum tshogs par byas nas/_nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po snang ba'i gzi brjid rnam par bkod pas mun pa rnam par sel ba bshams nas/_des sems can de dag ci 'dod pa'i bsam pa thams cad yongs su 
[\[168b.7\]]rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/_khyim de dag re rer yang rang gi lus dang 'dra ba'i sprul pa'i lus mngon par sprul te kun tu bkod do/_/sems can thams cad kyi nad thams cad gso ba'i phyir sman pa dang /_rim gro ba dang /_'tsho ba'i yo byad sna tshogs kyi 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]rkyen phun sum tshogs pa yongs su bshams so/_/rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod rnam pa tha dad pa yo byad sna tshogs kyis ci rigs su bkang ba dag kyang nye bar bkod de/_'di ltar rin po che rdo rje'i snod ni spos kyi nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang /_spos kyi nor bu rin po che sna 
[\[169a.2\]]tshogs kyi snod ni gos kha dog dam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang ngo /_/shing rta mang po dbyibs dang /_mdog sna tshogs su 'dug pa/_rin po che sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa/_rta dang glang po dang ba lang cang shes la bcas pa/_rin po che'i shing rta sna tshogs rgyal po'i 
[\[169a.3\]]rkyen du rung ba/_rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyis longs spyod dang ldan pa/_stan sna tshogs bting ba/_rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_bla re sna tshogs bres pa/_rin po che'i dril bu'i dra ba bres pa/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng bas 
[\[169a.4\]]brgyan pa dag gis kyang /_yul gyi phyogs gang bar bkod do/_/grong dang grong khyer dang /_ljongs dang yul thams cad sbyin par yang 'o dod kyis bsgo'o/_/bza' shing gi ra ba dang /_kun dga'i ra ba dang /_dka' thub kyi nags tshal sna tshogs yongs su gtang ba
