[\[169a.5\]]dang /_khyim dang chung ma dang bu dang bu mo thams cad yongs su gtang ba dang /_rin po che rin thang med pa thams cad yongs su gtang ba dang /_rang gi snying dang rkang dang rgyu ma dang mkhal ma dang tshil dang /_sha dang khrag dang pags pa dang rka lag dang rna ba dang /_mig 
[\[169a.6\]]dang sna dang lce dang so dang mchu dang mgo yongs su btang ba nas/_phyi nang gi dngos po thams cad rnam pa thams cad du yongs su gtang bar yang 'o dod kyis bsgo'o/_/des yo byad de lta bu yongs su gtang ba'i rnam pa mang po bshams te ba[{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]nas rgyal po'i gnas 
[\[169a.7\]]rin po che'i sa las rnam par brgyan pa/_sprin gyi sgron ma de'i shar phyogs logs na grong khyer rin po che rtse mo'i gzi brjid ces bya ba'i mdun rol nas gzhi mnyam pa'i phyogs yangs pa chu zheng du rgya che zhing mnyam pa mthon dman med pa/_rnam par dag cing gzhi mnyam 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]pa ngam grog dang g.yang sa dang sdong dum dang /_tsher ma dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo thams cad med pa rin po che thams cad kyi khams las grub pa/_gzhi rin po che thams cad las byas shing /_rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad bkram pa/_nor bu rin po che'i rgyan rnam pa du 
[\[169b.2\]]mas brgyan pa rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyis gang ba phye ma sna tshogs dri shin tu zhim pa'i rdul ldang ba/_bdug spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa/_rin po che'i sgron ma dpal gyi gzi brjid can rab tu 'bar ba/_spos dang bdug spos thams cad kyi na bun dang /_sprin gyi nam 
[\[169b.3\]]mkha' kun tu khebs pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/_rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi phreng ba legs par bkye bas mdzes par brgyan pa/_khang pa dang gzhal med khang dang khang pa brtsegs pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su brgyan pa/_gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan 
[\[169b.4\]]bsgreng ba rin po che'i snam bu lding ba/_rnam par snang ba rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog gi dra bas kun nas khebs pa/_rin po che'i spos thams cad kyi rgyal po'i dra ba'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor can/_gser gyi dra ba las rin po che'i dril bu 'khrol ba dang ldan pa/_bla 
[\[169b.5\]]re rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam par mdzes par byas pas khebs par bres pa/_spos kyi rgyal po sna tshogs kyi phye ma rnam par bkram pa/_rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog sil mas dga' dga' ltar gang ba/_rol mo brdung ba dang /_dkrol ba bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[169b.6\]]brgya stong gi sgra skad yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba/_rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan sna tshogs rnam par dag pas rnam par brgyan pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i las rnam par smyin pas mngon par grub pa zhig yod pa/_de'i dbus su seng ge'i khri chen po rin po che sna bcu las 
[\[169b.7\]]grub pa'i sa'i gzhi sna tshogs la gnas pa/_rin po che'i khri 'phang sna tshogs bcu'i 'khor gyis rnam par mdzes par byas pa/_rin po che'i shing yal ga can bcus stegs bu'i mtshams rnam par klubs pa'i rgyan mdzes pa dang ldan pa/_rdo rje'i 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]'khor lo'i sa'i gzhi mi shigs pa la rkang pa rab tu rten pa/_rin po che thams cad kyi gzugs dang /_mdog yongs su 'dzin pa'i stan gyi 'khor lo can/_rin po che du ma las byas pa'i bog re'i rgyan brgya phrag du mas brgyan pa/_rin po che 
[\[170a.2\]]sna tshogs kyi tshom bu rnam pa tha dad pa'i rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan pa rin po che'i rgyal mtshan kun nas rnam par phye ste/_'brel bar bsgreng ba rin po che sna tshogs kyi ba dan spyangs pa/_rnam pa tha dad pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/_rin po che'i dril bu'i dra bas brgyan pa'i 
[\[170a.3\]]lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs dang /_gser gyi dra ba sna tshogs rnam par bres pa/_rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog gi dra ba dang /_rin po che'i rgyal po chen po'i dra ba dang /_gos rin po che sna tshogs dang /_rin po che'i dra bas ci rigs su kun nas bkab 
[\[170a.4\]]cing mdzes par byas pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/_spos rin po che rnam pa tha dad pa'i tshogs las snyim pas bcus shing spos kyi sprin mngon par gtor ba/_rin po che'i rgyal po kha dog dang dri bsam gyis mi khyab pa las byung ba'i dbyibs yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs 
[\[170a.5\]]dang /_spos thams cad kyi na bun dang sprin 'byung ba/_gam yo nas lha rdzas kyi spos dang /_bdug spos sna tshogs kyis rab tu bdugs pa/_lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i stan reg na bde ba kha dog bzang po du ma can legs par bting ba/_lha rdzas kyi rol mo 
[\[170a.6\]]dang glu snyan pa yid du 'ong ba brgya stong du ma'i sgra kun nas 'byung ba/_rin po che sna tshogs kyi them skas kyi phreng ba ba dan gyis rnam par klubs pas/_rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/_rin po che'i 'bru'i gzugs rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa/_
[\[170a.7\]]rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis rnam par snang bar byed pa'i 'od dang ldan pa mngon par grub ste/_de la rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa/_gzugs bzang ba shin tu mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa kha dog bzang po 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]dam pa rgyas pa dang ldan pa mi chen po'i mtshan rnam par dag pa rab tu thob pa/_rin po che rnam par snang ba'i cod pan can/_rdo rje mthu bo che ltar ma khregs shing mi shigs pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_rtsib ma'i mtshams thags bzang zhing brtan par 'brel ba/_yan 
[\[170b.2\]]lag dang nying lag thams cad yongs su bzang ba kun nas bzang ba/_kun nas mdzes ba kun nas sdug pa/_rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa/_chos kyi rgyal po chen po'i rigs su byung ba/_yo byad thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa/_chos kyi dbang shin tu rnam 
[\[170b.3\]]par dag pa/_rang gi sems la dbang bsgyur ba/_tshig gi dkyil 'khor kha ma bab pa/_mi 'khrugs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/_chos kyi sbyor ba ma nor ba shin tu brtan par byas pa/_yon tan dang legs pa mtha' yas par brjod du yod pa de 'dug par gyur to/_/rgyal 
[\[170b.4\]]po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa de seng ge'i khri chen po la 'dug pa dang /_steng gi spyi bo'i thad ka'i bar snang la gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po rin po che sna tshogs rnam par 'bel ba'i yu ba can nor bu rin po che dam pa'i mdzod kyi snying po 
[\[170b.5\]]dang ldan pa/_rin po che sna tshogs kyi shar bu brgya stong legs par bres pa/_rin po che du ma'i 'od 'phro ba/_dpal gyi gzi brjid rab tu 'bar bas rnam par brgyan pa/_'dzam bu chu klung gi gser 'od 'tsher zhing gsal la rnam par dag pas bla nas bkab pa/_
[\[170b.6\]]rin po che sna tshogs spa b.raspel bas spras pa'i gser gyi dra bas nang shun gyi rgyan byas pa mu tig sna tshogs kyi se mo do mngon par sbyangs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra bas kun nas bkab pa/_rin po che'i dril bu'i dra ba las gser rin po che'i dril chen rin po che'i chun po'i lda ldi 
[\[170b.7\]]la brgyus pa mngon par sbyangs pa/_nor bu rin po che dam pa'i phreng ba kun nas mngon par spyangs pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/_lha rdzas kyi sgra yid du 'ong ba'i gdangs grags par 'byung ba/_sems can thams cad dge ba'i las kyi lam la bskul ba'i dril gyi sgra rnam par 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]grag pa byung bar gyur te/_rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa de/_rin po che'i rdul yab kyis mngon par g.yob cing /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin pas kyang lhag par gzi brjid rab tu 'bar bas shin tu mdzes 
[\[171a.2\]]so/_de seng ge'i khri de la 'dug ma thag tu 'gro ba'i mang po de dag thams cad mngon du gyur te/_thal mo sbyar nas rgyal po de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa de'i drung du slong ba'i srog chags bye ba khrag 
[\[171a.3\]]khrig brgya stong sna tshogs dngos po sna tshogs yongs su len pa yo byad sna tshogs la mos pa/_rigs sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_'gro ba'i rgyud sna tshogs su gtogs pa/_'dod pa sna tshogs kyi sems dang ldan pa/_smon pa dang bsam pa sna tshogs can/_phyogs sna tshogs nas 
[\[171a.4\]]'dus pa/_yul gyi spyod pa sna tshogs la gnas pa/_longs spyod sna tshogs la mngon par smon pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_bsam pa dang yongs su rtog pa sna tshogs can/_mi'i ris sna tshogs su gtogs pa/_rigs kyi skye gnas sna tshogs su skyes pa/_yul sna 
[\[171a.5\]]tshogs nas 'ongs pa/_sgra skad dang tshig gi 'du byed sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs 'byin pa dngos po sna tshogs kyi don du gsol ba 'debs pa/_tshig dang ngag sna tshogs brjod pa/_bsod nams kyi ri rab chen po de 'ba' shig gi gdong du 
[\[171a.6\]]lta ba 'di 'ba' shig shes pa'i skyes bu chen po yin zhes nges par sems pa/_bsod nams chen pos brtan pa'o/_/skyes bu chen po'i zla ba'o/_/gtong ba chen po'i bsam pa dang ldan pa'o/_/zhes bya bar 'dun pa'i sems kyis rtog pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[171a.7\]]smon lam gyi sems kyis 'dus pa byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi sems kyis sprul pa'i slongs mo ba'i tshogs chen po de mthong nas/_slongs mo ba de dag la sems dga' ba dang sems mos pa dang /_sems spro ba dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba'i 'du 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]shes su gyur to/_/snying rje chen po'i shugs drag po shin tu yangs pa yang byung bar gyur to/_/phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par slongs mo ba thams cad yongs su tshim par bya ba las phyir mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs drag po yang skyes par gyur to/_/'gro ba thams cad du 
[\[171b.2\]]snyoms pa'i sbyor bas yongs su gtong ba'i sems kyis rgyas par dgang ba'i sprin kyang mngon par byung bar gyur te/_rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa des/_slongs mo ba de dag mthong ba'i mod la de'i rgyus ches dga' bar gyur gyis/_
[\[171b.3\]]bskal pas mtshams med pa'i mthas klas par stong gsum gyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po thob pas ni ma yin no/_/bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i mthas klas par brgya byin gyi dbang la gnas pas ni ma yin no/_/bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i 
[\[171b.4\]]mthas klas par rab mtshe ma'i lha'i rgyal po'i dbang la gnas pa thob pas ni ma yin no/_/bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i mthas klas par rab dga' ldan gyi lha'i rgyal po'i dbang la gnas pas ni ma yin no/_/bskal ba tshad med pa'i mthasaklas 
[\[171b.5\]]par rab 'phrul dga'i lha'i rgyal po'i dbang phyug gi dbang la gnas pa thob pas ni ma yin no/_/bskal ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mthas klas par dbang bsgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po'i dbang rab tu thob ste/_lha'i bu mo bzhin bzang mo yid du 'ong bas bsnyen bkur 
[\[171b.6\]]bas ni ma yin no/_/bskal ba brjod du med pa'i mthas klas par tshangs pa'i thabs la gnas pa thob pas ni ma yin no/_/bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i mthas klas par gya nom snang ba'i lha'i bde ba thob pas ni ma yin no/_/bskal 
[\[171b.7\]]ba dpag tu med cing mi zad par dge rgyas kyi lha'i bde ba thob pas ni ma yin no/_/bskal ba mu med pa'i mthas klas par gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i rnam par thar pa zhi ba'i bde ba la rnam par spyod pa thob pas ni ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]sred pa la spyod pa/_pha ma dang phu nu dang /_bu sring dang mdza' bo dang /_blon po dang /_gnyen bshes dang /_bu dang bu mo dang chung ma dang /_yun ring po zhig tu bral la 'brog dgon par 'khyams te/_de dag mthong bar 'dod 'dod pa las de dag dang phrad na de dag mthong bas mi ngoms shing /_
[\[172a.2\]]dga' ba dang chags pa chen po skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pas/_slongs mo pa de dag mthong bar gyur pa'i mod la dga' ba'i shugs chen po skyes so/_/sems kyi 
[\[172a.3\]]dga' ba'i ro bde ba dang ldan par gyur to/_/sems spro ba'i shugs rab tu byung ngo /_/rab tu dga' ba chen po'i shugs yongs su skyes so/_/sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu dad pa dang /_mos pa'i shugs kyi stobs chen po 'phel to/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[172a.4\]]du rtsa ba brtan pa'i dad pa rnam par 'phel to/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i stobs mngon par 'phel to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po las su rung ba yongs su byung ngo /_/sems dga' bas rgyas pas mos 
[\[172a.5\]]pa'i shugs chen po skyes par gyur to/_/sems spro ba'i shugs yangs pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen la dbang po dang /_bsam pa shin tu gus par gyur to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa 
[\[172a.6\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs pa la brtson pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu gzhol ba/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam dang sgo la mngon du bltas pa/_'gro ba thams cad shin tu tshim par byas pa'i yid la bya ba la brtson pa/_sangs 
[\[172a.7\]]rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i nan tan la 'dun pa/_bdud dang las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rnam par 'thor ba la brtson pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdams ngag mthun par blang ba la sta gon du 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]gnas pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtsho kun nas/_yongs su bsdu ba la brtson pa'i snying po can/_mngon par zhen pa thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/_'jig rten gyi yul thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa/_chos kyi rang bzhin nam mkha'i 
[\[172b.2\]]spyod yul can/_des slongs mo ba de dag la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bskyed pa'i phyir ro/_/pha dang ma'i 'du shes dang /_sbyin pa'i gnas kyi 'du shes dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi 'du shes dang /_dkon pa'i 'du shes dang /_dka' ba byed pa'i 'du shes dang /_
[\[172b.3\]]mang po byas pa'i 'du shes dang /_phan 'dogs pa dam pa'i 'du shes dang /_byang chub kyi lam nye bar ston pa'i 'du shes dang /_mkhan po'i 'du shes dang /_ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed pa'i phyir te/_de ltar des slongs mo ba de dag don ci la 'ongs pa dang /_
[\[172b.4\]]don ci la phyin pa dang /_dus ji tsam na 'dus pa dang /_yun gang dang gang na gnas pa dang /_dngos po ci dang ci slong ba dang /_rnam pa gang 'dod pa dang /_bsam pa ci 'dra ba dang /_ci dang ci la smon pa dang /_ci dang ci 'dod pa dang /_dngos po gang dang gang 
[\[172b.5\]]tshol ba de dag thams cad tshul bzhin du mi dga' ba med pa'i byams pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang /_slongs mo pa'i 'gro ba las phyin phyogs su ma bltas pa'i gtong ba chen po'i 'od gzer dang /_sems can thams cad la snyoms par sbyor ba'i gtong ba'i 
[\[172b.6\]]sgos yongs su tshim par byas so/_/des zas 'dod pa la ni zas byin no/_/skom 'dod pa la ni skom byin no/_/gos 'dod pa la ni gos byin no/_/me tog 'dod pa la ni me tog byin no/_/de bzhin du spos dang /_bdug spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_
[\[172b.7\]]gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_rin po che dang /_rgyan dang /_stan dang /_mal ca dang /_khyim dang /_gzhal med khang dang /_gtsug lag khang dang /_bza' shing gi ra ba dang /_kun dga'i ra ba dang /_dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang /_rta dang glang po che dang /_shing 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]rta dang /_rkang thang dang /_dga' ba dang /_khyogs dang /_bzhon pa dang /_gser dang /_dbyig dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_sa le sbram dang /_dngul dag kyang byin par gyur to/_/rang gi khyim dang /_gzhal med khang dang /_
[\[173a.2\]]btsun mo'i 'khor dang g.yog 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i mdzod thams cad kyang phye ste/_bgos nas rab tu btang bar gyur te/_su ci 'dod pa de dag de khyer cig ces nas/_yul 'dod pa dag kyang yul byin no/_/grong 'dod pa dag kyang grong byin no/_/grong khyer 'dod pa 
[\[173a.3\]]dag kyang grong khyer byin te/_sems can thams cad la snyoms par zhugs pa des slongs mo ba de dag thams cad la ci bdog pa yongs su btang ste/_dngos po thams cad yongs su btang bas mngon par sdud do//_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu 
[\[173a.4\]]rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po bcu gcig pa/_de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bu mo rin chen 'od ces bya ba bu mo drug cu'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa/_kha dog bzang po'i dam pa rgyas pa dang ldan pa/_mdog gser 
[\[173a.5\]]gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan pa/_sgra mthon ting du 'dug pa/_mig dkar nag 'byes pa/_dri zhim po yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/_tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa/_gos bzang ba/_rgyan gyis legs par brgyan pa/_dran pa dang blo gros dang /_rig pa dang khrel yod pa/_
[\[173a.6\]]dga' ba dang ngo tsha shes pa dang /_spyod pa dang cha lugs phun sum tshogs pa/_bla ma la sri zhu dang ldan pa/_shes bzhin gyi dam pas spyod pa/_byed dgu zab pa/_chos blang ba dang /_gzung ba dang /_khong du chud par bya ba la yid gzhungs pa dang ldan pa/_sngon 
[\[173a.7\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba la legs par byas pa/_chos kyis mngon par brlan pa'i sems kyi rgyud rab tu dang ba/_dge ba'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa/_mos pa yangs pa/_nam mkha'i spyod yul can/_gzhan la phan par dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]lta ba'i phyogs la rnam par bltas pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mngon par 'dun pa zhig mchod sbyin gyi ra ba chen po der 'ongs te/_tshong dpon gyi bu mo rin chen 'od ces bya ba de rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa'i seng 
[\[173b.2\]]ge'i khri chen po'i g.yas rol ha cang yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ring ba zhig na 'dug 'dug ste/_rgyal po de la phyag 'tshal ba las phar ci la yang len pa med do/_/de phyogs gcig na 'dug cing sems 'di ltar bskyed par gyur te/_bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'di lta bu mthong zhing 'grogs su 
[\[173b.3\]]yod pa ni bdag gis thob par bya ba legs par thob po snyam ste/_des rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi 'du shes dang /_ston pa'i 'du shes dang snying brtse bar byed pa'i 'du shes dang /_phan 
[\[173b.4\]]'dogs pa'i 'du shes dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes bskyed de/_g.yo sgyu med pa'i sems kyis dga' ba dang mos pa dang /_spro ba'i shugs rab tu yangs pa thob pas/_rang gi rgyan rnams lus las bkrol te/_rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi 
[\[173b.5\]]dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa gang na ba der mngon par bltas te/_gtor ba dang de dag de'i seng ge'i khri'i 'og_/khri 'phang gi sa'i steng du gram par gyur to/_/de'i rgyan de dag de ltar gtor nas smon lam btab pa/_ji ltar rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[173b.6\]]rab tu sgrog pa 'di sems can mgon med cing mun pa'i nang na 'thoms pa rnams kyi mgon skyabs su gyur pa de ltar bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'gyur bar shog shig_/'dis chos gang shes pa de dag kyang bdag gis kyang shes par shog shig_/'di theg 
[\[173b.7\]]pa gang gis 'byung ba des bdag kyang 'byung bar shog shig_/'di lam gang nas zhugs pa de nas bdag kyang 'jug par shog shig_/ji ltar 'di gzugs blta na btang mi bral zad mi shes pa'i longs spyod dang ldan te/_g.yog 'khor mtha' yas la gzhan 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]gyis mi thub cing thub par dka' ste/_thub pa med pa de bzhin bdag kyang shog shig_/'di gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der bdag kyang skye bar 'gyur bar shog shig_/snyam pa dang de de ltar sems shing yid la byed pa la brtson pa/_rgyal po chos thams cad 
[\[174a.2\]]kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pas shes nas de la bltas te/_'di skad ces smras so/_/bu mo khyod la ci dgos pa khyer cig_/bu mo nga ni bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba ste/_sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par bya ba la zhugs pa'o/_/
[\[174a.3\]]de skad ces byas pa dang /_de'i yid la yang bdag ni rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pas thugs su chud par gyur to/_/snyam nas de bas kyang mos par gyur to/_/de de ltar mos pa'i sems su gyur te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba yangs 
[\[174a.4\]]shing rgya che ba'i shugs yongs su skyes nas rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa la de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/sngon cad sa las rnam brgyan sprin 'di ni/_/rgyal po seng ge khyod 'khrungs ma gyur tshe/_/mdangs 
[\[174a.5\]]dkar ma gyur gzi brjid ma mchis te/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'jigs pa'i gnas dang ci mi 'dra/_/mi dag kun kyang srog gcod mos par gyur/_/ma byin len la tshul dang sbyor ma mchis/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra zhing brlang ba'i tshig kyang brjod/_/phra ma khyal ba'i tshig kyang rab 
[\[174a.6\]]tu smra/_/gzhan gyi nor la chags pa'i sems dang ldan/_/gang zag gzhan la kun kyang ngan du sems/_/lta ba'i rnam gnas sdig to'i spyod yul can/_/log pa'i sbyor bas ngan pa'i 'gro bar lhung /_/chos ngan chos la spyod pa'i [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]rnams/_/ma 
[\[174a.7\]]rig gti mug mun pas bsgribs pa dag_/lta ba log zhugs phyin ci log mthong bas/_/dgung lo mang por dgung char bab ma gyur/_/dgung char ma bab sa bon chab 'tshal te/_/lo thog mi 'khrungs zhugs shing 'khrungs ma gyur/_/mtsho dang lu ma chu phran 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]rgyud kyang skams/_/nags tshal rtsi shing kun kyang de bzhin te/_/rnam dag spyan khyod 'khrungs par ma gyur pas/_/chab klung kun kyang ma lus skams par gyur/_/bza' shing ra ba kun kyang ri dgon 'dra/_/rus pa dkar pos dog sa gtams par gyur/_/gang tshe khyod 
[\[174b.2\]]la slong ba mang 'dus te/_/slong ba thams cad yongs su tshim mdzad nas/_/phyogs bzhi kun nas sprin chen 'dus par gyur/_/thang dang gshong rnams kun kyang ngoms par bgyis/_/slan cad rkun chom g.yon can chad par gyur/_/dgum pa ma mchis 
[\[174b.3\]]su'ang gzung ma mchis/_/mgon med gang yang 'gum par mi 'gyur te/_/khyod ni 'gro ba mgon med kun gyi skyabs/_/srog gcod pa la mngon par mos pa'i /[{]myi[,]mi[}]/_/gzhan rnams bkum zhing de yi khrag 'tshal la/_/gcig la gcig gi sha 'tshal gyur pa 
[\[174b.4\]]dag_/khyod kyi sbyin pa chen pos byams sems gyur/_/brgya stong grangs su 'grangs par gyur pa las/_/de tshe 'ga' zhig rad pa 'tshal gyur gyis/_/gzhan ni rtswa dang lo mar da 'tshal/_/de tshe kun kyang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]bkres mnar bzhin/_/'gro ba 
[\[174b.5\]]mgon med mgon du khyod 'khrungs nas/_/sa bon ma btab ma rmos 'bras kyang byung /_/dpag bsam shing las mdzod rnams rnam par 'thon/_/skyes pa bud [{]myed [,]med [}]mkhas pa gda' bar gyur/_/zla ba zla phyed don du sngon cad ni/_/lam nor gnas pa 
[\[174b.6\]{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]shing sri zhur bgyid/_/deng sang rad pa rab 'tshal rgyan mang ldan/_/dga' ba'i gnas na rtse ba'i lha yang 'dra/_/slan chad log pa rnams la mi zad zhugs/_/chos ngan 'dod chags [{]myi [,]mi [}]rnams zhen cing chags/_/na chung gzhon nu gzhan gyis 
[\[174b.7\]]bsrungs pa rnams/_/nan gyis phrogs rlom chab 'tshal ma rungs bgyis/_/lha mo bzang mo'i kha dog gzugs ldan pa/_/cha gos bzang rgyan ldan pa deng sang mthong gyur te/_/gzhan gyi bud med spos dri gda' mchis kyang /_/dga' ldan ji bzhin mchis 'brad 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]rgyan gyis 'tshal/_/sho be brlang ba phra ma kyal pa rnams/_/sngan cad g.yo sgyu'i dbang gis ngag tu brjod/_/deng sang tshig gi nongs pa bzhi spangs shing /_/lta ba ngan spangs chos la kun kyang spyod/_/tshangs dbyangs ka la ping ka'i sgrar 'byung 
[\[175a.2\]]ba'i/_/khyod kyi gsung mchog 'di yi cha shas la'ang /_/rol mo sgra dbyangs shin tu snyan pa dang /_/lha rdzas glu dbyangs 'di dag nyer [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_/khyod kyi spyi gtsug dbu steng gdugs lding ba/_/rin chen rgyus bgyis gser gyi dra bas bkab/_/
[\[175a.3\]]dpal gyi snying mdzod yu ba baiDur+ya/_/kun nas rin chen mchog gi dril gyis 'khor/_/dril las byung ba'i sgras kyang ma lus pa'i/_/'jig rten sgra dbyangs ma lus zil mnan cing /_/sangs rgyas gsung gi yan lag 'dra bar 'khrol/_/dam 
[\[175a.4\]]pa'i chos kyi sgra dbyangs zhi ba sgrog_/de thos sems can nyon mongs zhi bar bgyid/_/ma lus phyogs kyi zhing rnams brgyud pa yi/_/bskal pa rgya mtsho'i bde gshegs rgya mtsho dang /_/blo ldan rgya mtsho'i mtshan gyi 'khor lo rnams/_/sngon mtha'i zhing 
[\[175a.5\]]rnams gcig nas gcig brgyud du/_/gang mtshan gang dang gang lags rim bzhin dang /_/ma lus phyogs su dam chos 'khor lo yang /_/khyod kyi byin gyis dril rnams rab tu sgrog_/khyod kyi dril sgra thogs pa ma mchis par/_/tshangs 
[\[175a.6\]]dbang lha dbang 'gro ba'i bdag po rnams/_/rang rang las kyi tshul ni kun brjod cing /_/'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan khyab par kun tu sgrog_/dril gyi sgra las lha dang mi rnams kyis/_/rang rang las kyi tshul rgyud thos gyur nas/_/sdig to rnams 
[\[175a.7\]]spangs dge ba spyod par gyur/_/sangs rgyas byang chub mchog la kun kyang gnas/_/khyod kyi yab ni mi bdag skar ma'i 'od/_/de yi btsun mo pad+mo khyod kyi yum/_/rnyog pa lnga rnams shin tu rgyas gyur du/_/chos 'grib rgyal srid des ni bzhes 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]par gyur/_/de yi bza' shing ra ba yangs byung ba/_/me tog rgyas brgyan rin chen sgron ma ste/_shing mang brgyas bskor rdzing bu lnga brgya yis/_/de ni shin tu brgyan pa byung bar gyur/_/de dag so so re re'i ngogs su yang /_/ka ba stong ldan gzhal med khang 
[\[175b.2\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byung /_/stegs bu bzang po sna tshogs stong gis brgyan/_/zla gam dra bas kun nas mdzes par bgyis/_/chos ngan stobs ni rab tu 'phel gyur pas/_/dgung lo mang por dgung char bab ma gyur/_/rdzing bu kun gyi chab dang zhugs shing rnams/_/de tshe lo ma 
[\[175b.3\]]mdog dang bcas te skams/_dgung bdun na ni khyod bltam gyur pa'i tshe/_/de tshe ngo mtshar rmad byung ltas byung ste/_/de dag mthong nas sems can nges rtogs par/_/bdag cag skyob pa nges par 'byung zhes mchis/_/dgung gi gung la bab nas rnam drug 
[\[175b.4\]]du/_/khams kyi dogs yongs su g.yos par gyur/_/ma smad shin tu bzang ba'i rdzing de yi/_/dbus su gdugs dang mnyam pa'i 'od cig byung /_/chab bzang yan lag brgyad ldan rgyas par gyur/_/rdzing bu lnga brgya kun kyang de bzhin te/_/zhugs shing kun kyang lo ma 
[\[175b.5\]]'khrungs par gyur/_/me tog 'bras bu kha dog mdog dang ldan/_/rdzing bu de rnams chab kyis bltam gyur pas/_/nags tshal ma lus de dag ngoms par bgyis/_/chab chen de las byung ba'i rgyud 'phros pas/_/'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan chab kyis bltam par 
[\[175b.6\]]gyur/_/zhugs shing sman dang lo thog ldum bu yang /_/'khrungs gyur zhugs shing me tog 'bras bu rgyas/_/dog sa'i steng na mchis dgu'i sa bon rnams/_/kun kyang chab kyis brlan pas rnam par 'khrungs/_/chab kyis bdas gyur dog sa'i phyogs rnams kyang /_/
[\[175b.7\]]de tshe thams cad rab tu mnyam par gyur/_/sgang gshong dog sa'i phyogs rnams ji snyed pa/_/de dag kun kyang de tshe mnyam par gyur/_/g.yang sa grog po mi bde phyogs kyi rnams/_/de tshe yud kyis kun kyang mnyam par gyur/_/tsher ma gseg ma la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]ma mchis 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]gyur/_/rin chen bzang po'i 'byung gnas yongs su 'thon/_/skyes pa bud med tshogs rnams dga' bar gyur/_/skom pas gdungs ba kun kyang chab la 'tshal/_/kye ma de ring bde na su mthu shes/_/snyan par brjod pa de skad chad tu 
[\[176a.2\]]brjod/_/dog sa'i mnga' bdag skar 'od sras dang bcas/_/sras mo blon po'i tshogs bcas de yi tshe/_/skye bo bye ba stong gis yongs bskor te/_/bza' shing ra bar dgyes par gshegs pa mdzad/_/mdangs dga' rdzing chen yongs su ma smad pa/_/spos 
[\[176a.3\]]chus bltams pa dbus na mchis gyur pa'i/_/de yi dbus su chos stegs bzang po yi/_/pho brang steng gshegs btsun mo bcas par bzhugs/_/dgung bdun lon par gyur nas de yi chab/_/dgung gi gung la gyen du lud par gyur/_/ri dang gzhal med 
[\[176a.4\]]khang gi phreng bcas pa'i/_/dog sa'ang de tshe yongs su g.yos par gyur/_/yongs su ma smad de yi dbus nas kyang /_/pad+mo chen po lo ma stong ldan 'khrungs/_/gdugs stong mdog gsal sprin gyi dra ba can/_/ri rab rtse mo man cad 'od kyis 'gengs/_/chu 
[\[176a.5\]]ba rdo rje nang rim dri gda' ste/_/rin chen dbang po'i lo ma rnam dag yangs/_/'dzam bu chu klung gser bzang snying po can/_/ze ba spos rab 'bar ba phun sum tshogs/_/mgon po khyod ni de yi snying po las/_/skyil mo krung bcas sku ni byung bar gyur/_/
[\[176a.6\]]mtshan gyis rnam brgyan yan lag shin tu mdzes/_/lha mang brgyas kyang mngon par mchod pa bgyis/_/rgyal po pho brang steng nas shod gshegs te/_/phyag gnyis brkyang ste legs par khyod blangs nas/_/btsun mo'i mgo la bzhag ste 'di skad 
[\[176a.7\]]gsungs/_/khyod kyi bu 'di yin gyis dgar gyis shig_/'jig rten mgon khyod de ltar bltams gyur tshe/_/bye ba'i gter rnams rab tu 'thon par gyur/_/zhugs shing kun kyang mngon par kha 'bus te/_/steng gi mkha' las rol mo'i sgra yang byung /_/
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]'dzam bu rgyal mtshan sems can thams cad kyang /_/khyod la mngon lta btud cing phyag kyang 'tshal/_/thal mo sbyar cing kye ma mgon med pa'i/_/mgon zhig byung zhes dga' ba'i tshig kyang brjod/_/khyod kyi sku las 'od gzer mang byung bas/_/dog sa kun tu rab tu 
[\[176b.2\]]snang bar gyur/_/'gro ba'i mun pa kun kyang rnam bstsal nas/_/nad mang ma lus rab tu zhi bar gyur/_/gnod sbyin grul bum sha za mang po'i tshogs/_/rnam par 'tshe ba de dag bstsal bar gyur/_/shin tu gdug pas sems can 'gum pa yi/_/sbrul gdug kun kyang 
[\[176b.3\]]de tshe yongs mi rgyu/_/thob med smad pa mi snyan sdug bsngal dang /_/nad rlung nad mang gnod par 'tshe ba dag_/mdor bsdu kun kyang zhi zhing ma mchis gyur/_/'jig rten kun tu rab dga' byung bar gyur/_/phan tshun ma dang 'dra ba'i 'du shes kyis/_/khong nas byams par de 
[\[176b.4\]]tshe 'gro kun gyur/_/shar gnyer sems bral 'tshe ba ma mchis te/_/thams cad mkhyen lam nan tan ldan par gyur/_/ngan song rgyud rnams rnam par rab tu bzlog_/mtho ris lam chen kun kyang btod par gyur/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam yang shin tu bstan/_/
[\[176b.5\]]de ltar khyod kyis 'gro don yangs pa mdzad/_/rgya mtsho che 'dra yongs su gtong mdzad pa/_/khyod mthong bdag ni thob pa dam pa thob/_/yun ring 'khyams pa'i 'gro ba mgon bral du/_/khyod ni rmad du byung ba'i mgon zhig gshegs/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo rin 
[\[176b.6\]]chen 'od kyis rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod de/_snyan par bkur nas rab tu bsngags te/_lan brgya phrag stong du g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/_phyag 'tshal 
[\[176b.7\]]nas phyogs gcig tu gus pa'i tshul gyis 'dug go_/de nas rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pas/_tshong dpon gyi bu mo rin chen 'od la bltas te 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu mo de ltar khyod sems can pha rol gyi yon 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]tan gyi khyad par shes pa'i mngon par shes pa la zhugs pa legs so legs so/_/bu mo 'jig rten thams cad na'ang sems can gang sems can pha rol gyi yon tan la mos pa de lta bu ni dkon te/_bu mo sems can mun pas bsgribs pas phan 
[\[177a.2\]]btags pa la drin du mi gzo ba'i/_blo phyin ci log la zhugs pa sems 'khrugs par gyur pa/_rgyud 'dzings par gyur pa/_mun pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_bsam pa ngang gis log pa/_nan tan dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa/_sems can pha rol gyi yon tan gyi khyad par mngon 
[\[177a.3\]]par mi shes pa rnams kyis ni byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan la 'jug par bya ba'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la brtag par bya ba'am/_yon tan thams cad shes pa'i khyad par mngon par shes pa thob par bya bar mi nus so/_/bu mo de ltar khyod 
[\[177a.4\]]sems can chen po mngon par shes pas byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu la 'jug pa ni gdon mi za bar byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa'o/_/de ltar nga'i khams su khyod lta bu ye shes de 'dra ba dang ldan pa skyes pa ni/_'dzam bu'i gling du ngas 
[\[177a.5\]]sems can yongs su bsdus pa'i mthu don yod do/_/de nas rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pas/_nor bu rin po che chen po rin thang med pa dang /_nor bu rin po che skar ma'i 'od sna tshogs dang /_gos rin po che rin thang med pa 
[\[177a.6\]]bdag gis lag bdar te blangs nas/_tshong dpon gyi bu mo rin chen 'od la byin no/_/de'i 'khor gyi bu mo thams cad kyang gos rin po che sna tshogs kyis khyed par byin nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu mo gos rin po che 'di khyer la bdag gis yongs su spyad par gyis shig
[\[177a.7\]]de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo rin chen 'od 'khor dang bcas pas pus mo gnyis sa la phab ste/_gos rin po che de dag lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nas spyi po la blangs te/_phyir phyung nas gos rin po che de dag bgos so/_/de'i 'khor gyi bu mo thams cad kyis kyang so so nas 
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]rang rang gi gos rin po che de dag bgos nas/_des gos rin po che de dag bgos pa'i 'og tu rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa la bdag gi 'khor bu mo de dag dang bcas pas g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas so/_/de dag thams cad kyi gos 
[\[177b.2\]]rin po che de dag la rgyu skar dang skar ma thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan snang bar gyur te/_de dag mthong nas 'gro ba'i tshogs mang po 'di skad ces 'dzer te/_bu mo khyod kyi 'khor bu mo 'di dag ni mtshan mo'i lha mo skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa ltar shin tu mdzes pa ste/_khyod de 
[\[177b.3\]]dag gis bskor bas gya nom par mdzes so/_/de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo shing thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pas bde bar gnas pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po chos thams cad 
[\[177b.4\]]kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na/_de ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}]blta ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad 'di ni/_de'i tshe rgyal po 
[\[177b.5\]]chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po skar ma'i 'od kyi btsun mo pad+mo'i 'od ces bya ba rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa'i yum du gyur pa de 
[\[177b.6\]]gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems can yang de ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}]blta ste/_lha mo sgyu ma 'di ni de'i tshe rgyal po btsun mo pad+mo'i 'od ces bya bar gyur te/_rdzus te byung ba'i gzhon nu thu bar len len pa'o/_/yang rigs kyi bu khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po skar ma'i 'od ces bya 
[\[177b.7\]]ba rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa'i yab du gyur pa/_de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na'ang /_de ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}]blta ste/_rgyal po zas gtsang ma ni de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po skar ma'i 'od ces bya bar gyur to/_/
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]yang rigs kyi bu khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu mo rin chen 'od ces bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na'ang de ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}]blta ste/_kho mo ni de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu mo rin chen 'od ces bya bar gyur to/_/yang rigs kyi 
[\[178a.2\]]bu khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can 'dzam bu'i gling der skyes shing rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su bsdus pa de dag gzhan dag cig yin pa snyam du sems na de ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}]blta ste/_bcom 
[\[178a.3\]]ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du 'dus te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la bkod de/_la la ni sa dang po la bkod/_la la ni sa gnyis pa/_la la ni sa gsum pa/_la la ni sa bzhi 
[\[178a.4\]]pa/_la la ni sa lnga pa/_la la ni sa drug pa/_la la ni sa bdun pa/_la la ni sa brgyad pa/_la la ni sa dgu pa/_la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa la bkod par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[178a.5\]]nyid du 'jug pa sna tshogs dang /_tshogs sna tshogs dang /_yang dag par bsgrub pa sna tshogs dang /_spyod pa sna tshogs dang /_'byung ba sna tshogs dang /_lam gyi rgyan rnam par dag pa sna tshogs dang /_rnam par 'phru pa dang /_khyu mchog gi mthu phyug pa sna tshogs dang /_
[\[178a.6\]]lam gyi rgyan rnam par sna tshogs kyis yongs su byung ste/_rnam par thar pa la rnam par spyod pa sna tshogs kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di na chos kyi gzhal med khang sna tshogs na rnams par spyod pas 'khod cing rnam par spyod pa 'di dag yin no/_/de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo 
[\[178a.7\]]shing thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pas bde bar gnas pas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba dga' ba'i 'od spro ba yangs pa yang dag par 'byung ba 'di nyid brnan te bstan pa'i phyir tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_rgyal ba'i 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]sras po kho mo'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]yangs te/_/phyogs kun zhing mang rgya mtsho sna tshogs kyi/_/sems can rgya chen gang chen mtsho yi rnams/_/'khor bar gyur tshe kun la rnam par blta/_/'byam klas zhing rnams kun na bzhugs pa yi/_/rgyal ba byang chub shing gi drung bzhugs pa/_/rdul 
[\[178b.2\]]med kun kyang phyogs bcu rgyas bkang ste/_/chos sgrog rtag par 'gro 'dul mthong bar byed/_/kho mo'i rna ba rgya mtsho yongs su dag_/sgra rnams ma lus thams cad des thos te/_/bde bar gshegs pas chos gsungs ma lus par/_/thams cad dga' bas yang dang 
[\[178b.3\]]yang du thos/_/kho mo'i ye shes gnyis med chags pa med/_/sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi yul la 'jug_/'gro ba'i sems kyi rgya mtsho yangs pa rnams/_/ma lus kun la mtshan nyid dngos kyis 'jug_/sngon gyi mtha' dran ting nge 'dzin stobs kyis/_/
[\[178b.4\]]bskal pa'i rgya mtsho tshad med kho mos shes/_/tshe rabs rgyud mang gang chen mtsho dag kyang /_/pha rol dag dang bdag la'angade bzhin shes/_/rgya mtsho'i zhing gcig rdul phran rab snyed kyi/_/bskal pa skad cig cig gis ma lus shes/_/sems can 'gro rgyud 
[\[178b.5\]]dag na 'khor ba dang /_/sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul tshogs bcas de bzhin no/_/de dag thog ma'i smon lam ci 'dra dang /_/yang dag bsgrub tshul 'jug tshul rnam yangs dang /_/spyod la brten pas tshogs rnams yangs bsgrub pa/_/'jig rten mkhyen pa rnams kyang 
[\[178b.6\]]kho mos dran/_/mnyam med tshad med tshogs gyur yon tan mtsho mnga' ba'i/_/dbang bskur sar byon ji snyed de dag dang /_/byang chub 'tshang rgya'i tshul ni rnam yangs la/_/sems kyi skad cig gcig gis kho mo 'jug_/thabs kyi rnam pa gang dang gang dag 
[\[178b.7\]]gis/_/bde gshegs 'khor lo dam pa 'gror bskor dang /_/mya ngan 'das pa yon tan tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dang /_chos rnam gnas pa'i dus kyang kho mos shes/_/dri med theg pa rgya mtsho'i tshul rnams dang /_/sems can rnam 'dul rnam yangs ji snyed dang /_/
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]'gro ba de dag gis ni gang bstan pa/_/so so kun la sna tshogs tshul gyis 'jug_/dga' ba'i gter dang mos pa'i dbyig gi rnams/_/kun tu snang ba rnam thar tshul 'di yin/_/kho mos bskal pa brgya mang rgya cher bsgoms/_/de tshul de la 
[\[179a.2\]]khyod kyang myur 'jug gis/_/rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/_dga' ba'i 'od 'phro ba yangs pa yang dag par 'byung ba 'di shes par zad na/_kho mos byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du thams 
[\[179a.3\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug pa'i smon lam rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi smon lam rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrub pa'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa gcig non pas byang chub sems dpa'i sa rgya mtsho thams 
[\[179a.4\]]cad yongs su gnon pa'i stabs la mkhas pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad spyod pa re rer yang dag par 'du ba'i smon lam dang /_spyod pa yongs su dag pa byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa re re la/_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 
[\[179a.5\]]thar pa rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su 'du bar rnam par spyad pa la dbang bsgyur ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/_yon tan brjod par nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu snying po byang chub 'di nyid mtshan mo'i lha mo'i 'gro ba thams cad bsrung ba'i smon lam la brtson 
[\[179a.6\]]pa'i 'od ces bya ba zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin cing 'dug gis/_de'i gan du song la/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba dang /_ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams 
[\[179a.7\]]cad yongs su sbyang bar bya ba dang /_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad shin tu mnyes par bya bas bsnyen bkur zhing rim gror bya ba dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la brtson par bya ba dris shig_/de nas tshong 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]mtshan mo'i lha mo shing thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pas bde bar gnas pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_mtshan mo'i lha mo shing thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pas bde bar gnas pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor 
[\[179b.2\]]bar byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/_mtshan mo'i lha mo shing thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pas bde bar gnas pa'i drung nas song ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba thams cad bsrung ba'i smon lam la brtson pa'i 'od gang na ba der song song nas/_
[\[179b.3\]]mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba thams cad bsrung ba'i smon lam la brtson pa'i 'od 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid na/_chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rab tu snang ba'i rin po che'i dra bas kun nas yog pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_gnyi zla dang gza' skar dang /_rgyu skar thams cad kyi gzugs 
[\[179b.4\]]brnyan yongs su ston pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyis rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ston pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi dbyibs dang 'dra bar rang gi lus rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par byed pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_
[\[179b.5\]]kha dog rgya mtsho yangs pa mtha' dang dbus [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ston pa'i lus dang ldan pa spyod lam thams cad la rnam par spyod pa'i tshul yongs su ston pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_sgo kun tu mngon par bltas par rnam par dmigs par byed pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_
[\[179b.6\]]chos kyi sprin gyi 'brug sgra kun tu sgrog cing rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyi phyogs thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/_'gro ba thams cad la mngon du gnas pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_dus thams cad du 'gro ba thams cad kyi don la mngon du bltas par nam 
[\[179b.7\]]mkha'i dbyings kyis klo ba'i lus dang ldan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal ba'i lus dang ldan pa/_sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bstsags pa la gces shing sngon du 'gro ba'i lus dang ldan pa/_de bzhin 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]gshegs pa thams cad las mngon du chos kyi sprin yang dag par len cing yongs su 'dzin pa'i smon lam grub cing yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i sems las phyir phyogs su ma gyur cing /_dran pas yongs su 'dzin pa'i lus dang ldan pa 
[\[180a.2\]]mtha' dang dbus med pa'i 'od kyis phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs ba'i lus dang ldan pa/_'gro ba thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi sgron ma'i 'od kun tu 'gyed cing /_snang ba yongs su ston pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_chos sgyu ma'i rnam 
[\[180a.3\]]pa lta bu'i ye shes kyi lus dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rab tu ston pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_chos kyi lus mun pa dang rdul du bral ba rab tu ston pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_chos nyid sgyu ma lta bu las byung ba'i lus dang ldan pa/_chos nyid rab tu rtogs pas mun pa med pa'i sems dang 
[\[180a.4\]]ldan par ye shes kyi snang ba sgo kun tu gsal ba rab tu thob pa/_shin tu nad med cing gdung ba med pa'i yid kyi lus dang ldan pa/_chos kyi sku mi shigs shing brtan pa dang ldan pa'i dbyings las byung ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs gnas med pa'i rang 
[\[180a.5\]]bzhin kun nas nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngang dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos nyid kyi lus rnam par dag pa'i lus dang ldan pa de rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba thams cad kyi gnas rab tu snang ba'i snying po can gyi stan la 'dug pa mthong ngo /_des de mthong nas spyi bos btud de mthong bar bya ba'i tshul 
[\[180a.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rjes su dran par byas nas sa'i gzhi las btud de rgyangs bcad pa zhig tu mngon par btud do/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]sa'i gzhi de las langs te thal mo sbyar nas/_mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba thams cad bsrung 
[\[180a.7\]]ba'i smon lam la brtson pa'i 'od de'i lus la bltas pa dang /_'du shes rnam par dag pa bcu thob par gyur te/_de dag thob pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad dang skal ba mnyam par rab tu thob par gyur to/_/bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_thams 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid du brtsams pa'i brtson 'grus la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa thams cad du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la rang gi sems kyi 'du shes rab tu thob par gyur to/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba yangs pa yongs su 
[\[180b.2\]]bsgrub pa grub par bya ba'i phyir/_rang gi las rnam par smyin pa rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'du shes rab tu thob po/_/smon lam thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i spyod pa la yang dag par gnas par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyan gyi 'du shes rab tu thob 
[\[180b.3\]]po/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyi gdams ngag gi lam la nan tan du bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu bsgrub pa'i 'du shes rab tu thob po/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul du gyur ba'i chos bla na med pa la rnam par spyod pa'i snang ba 
[\[180b.4\]]yongs su mthong bar bya ba'i phyir nyams su myong ba bskyed pa'i 'du shes rab tu thob bo/_/kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas 'byung ba'i smon lam dang /_spyod pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir 'byung ba gcig gi 'du shes rab tu thob par gyur to/_/dge ba'i chos yongs 
[\[180b.5\]]su bstsags pa thams cad rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsod nams rgya mtsho'i 'byung gnas kyi 'du shes rab tu thob bo/_/sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la brtson 'grus kyi shugs yongs su 
[\[180b.6\]]'phel bar bya ba'i phyir/_dge ba'i chos yongs su ma rdzogs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_yang dag par 'phel bar byed pa dang /_yongs su skyong ba'i 'du shes rab tu thob par gyur to/_/sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs 
[\[180b.7\]]par bya ba'i phyir/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'du shes rab tu thob par gyur to/_/byang sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos la dbang bsgyur ba rab tu gnas par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la don thams cad yongs 
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]su sgrub pa'i 'du shes rab tu thob ste/_'du shes rnam par dag pa bcu po de dag rab tu thob par gyur to/_/de dag thob pas mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba thams cad bsrung ba'i smon lam la brtson pa'i 'od snang ba las byang chub sems dpa' dang /_
[\[181a.2\]]bskal pa mthun pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thob par gyur te/_'di ltar phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dus gsum rjes su dran pa'i tshul la dran pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_chos rgya mtsho'i tshul thams cad tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad 
[\[181a.3\]]par khong du chud par bya ba la blo gros kyi skal pa mnyam pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rig pas rjes su shes par bya ba'i bye brag dang /_tshul tha dad par mkhas pa la reg pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_
[\[181a.4\]]blo nam mkha' dang mnyam pas dus gsum thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir blo'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_byang chub sems de'i thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho shes pa'i snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir dbang po rnam 
[\[181a.5\]]par dag pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad du sems can yongs su bsdu ba'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi yon tan la nan tan du bya ba'i rgyan gyi lam khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir sems rnam par 
[\[181a.6\]]dag pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul snang bar rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir spyod yul gyi skal ba mnyam pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i lam snang ba/_rnam pa thams cad rab tu 
[\[181a.7\]]thob par bya ba'i phyir tshul gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /_chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin shes shing khong du chud pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir/_don khong du chud pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /_chos kyi tshul rgya tsho thams cad la chos la 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]rnam par spyod pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rnam par gtor pa'i phyir mi 'jigs pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba rnams la rnam pa tha dad par yongs su bstan pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam par bris pa'i 
[\[181b.2\]]lus rnam par dag par rab tu thob bar bya ba'i phyir gzugs kyi lus rnam par dag pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i stobs yongs su rdzog sa pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa/_rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir stobs kyi skal 
[\[181b.3\]]ba mnyam pa dang /_sems dang bsam pa'i nam mkha' yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mi 'jigs pa'i phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jig pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_bskal pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pas [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyo ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi skal 
[\[181b.4\]]ba mnyam pa dang /_chos thams cad la sgrib pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir spobs pas skal pa mnyam pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i lus yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir zil gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]non 
[\[181b.5\]]pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mngon par dga' bar bya ba'i tshigs yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir ma zhum [{]myi [,]mi [}]dma' ba'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sgra rab tu bsgrag pa'i phyir 
[\[181b.6\]]dbyangs kyi skal ba mnyam pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi tshig rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tha snyad dang /_tshul rgya mtsho la dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdams ngag gi yon tan khong du 
[\[181b.7\]]chud pa rnam par dag par bya ba la yon tan rnam par dag pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las rnam par smyin pa yogs su dag par bya ba'i phyir chos dang las kyi rgyud du mi 'gal ba'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_sangs rgyas byung ba 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i phyir mchod sbyin gyis chos bzang po la rab tu gnas pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul dang ye shes la yang dag par gnas par bya ba'i phyir/_tshangs 
[\[182a.2\]]pa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i bskal ba mnyam pa dang /_byams pa'i tshul sna tshogs kyis skad cig re re la sems can rgya mtsho thams cad du rgyas par dgang bar bya ba'i phyir byams pa chen po'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_sems can gyi khams 
[\[182a.3\]]thams cad yongs su bskyabs pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi cher mngon par dbab pa'i phyir/_snying rje chen po'i tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par byed pa'i thabs kyi rgyud du skal ba mnyam par bya ba'i 
[\[182a.4\]]phyir lus kyi las kyi skal ba mnyam pa dang /_chos thams cad brjod cing smos pa la ngag gi las rnam par dag pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sems la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs pa nye bar bsgrub pa'i 
[\[182a.5\]]phyir yid kyi las kyi skal ba mnyam pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /_sangs rgyas 'byung ba rgya mtsho thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 
[\[182a.6\]]spyan sngar 'gro ba'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba gdab pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dus ma lus par mchod pa thams cad kyis rim gro 
[\[182a.7\]]bya ba'i phyir/_mchod pas rim gro bya ba'i skal ba'i mnyam pa dang /_sems can gyi khams thams cad du sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /_chos kyi tshul thams cad la snang ba rab tu thob pa'i skal ba 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]mnyam pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /_rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par dgang pa'i phyir kun tu rgyas par 
[\[182b.2\]]dgang ba'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul rgya mtsho la byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par spyod pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa la 'khor gyi skal ba mnyam 
[\[182b.3\]]pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad shin tu phra bar 'jug pa la 'jug pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu yangs pa thams cad du sems rnam par phye ba'i bskal ba mnyam pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho thams 
[\[182b.4\]]cad la 'jug pa rnam pa tha dad pa khong du chad par bya ba la khong du chud pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rnam par phye ba ye shes mtha' yas pas rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par bya ba la tshul 'byam klas 
[\[182b.5\]]pas kun tu rgyas par dgang ba'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du mngon par 'byung ba'i skal ba mnyam pa dang phyogs thams cad rgyas par dgang ba yang dag par gzhol pa thogs pa med cing phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog par bya ba'i 
[\[182b.6\]]phyir phyir mi ldog pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir mun pa rnam par sel ba'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /_sangs 
[\[182b.7\]]rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtshor rjes su phyin pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i sbyor ba la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad lus kyi dra 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]bas rgyas bar dgang ba'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho rjes su rgyu ba de dang de dag la ye shes mngon sum gyi skal ba mnyam pa dang /_rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyi tshul thams cad mngon du bya ba'i sbyor ba la nan tan 
[\[183a.2\]]gyi skal ba mnyam pa dang /_chos kyi mos pa shin tu shas che ba'i brtsam pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir btsal ba'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyis sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi rgyan yongs su bsgrub pa la rnam par dag 
[\[183a.3\]]pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_nyam nga ba'i rtog pa med pa'i sems kyi dkyil 'khor gyis chos thams cad kyi ye shes dkyil 'khor yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir yid kyi bskal ba mnyam pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi tshogs yang dag par 
[\[183a.4\]]brtsams pa mthar phyin par bya ba'i sbyor ba la brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la spyod pa'i rgyan gyi skal ba mnyam pa dang /_chos thams cad kyi mtshan ma khong 
[\[183a.5\]]du chud par bya ba la chags pa med pa rnam par spyad pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_chos la rnam par spyod pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par 'phrul pa de dang de dag tu thabs mkhas pa'i tshul gyi skal ba mnyam pa dang /_bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems 
[\[183a.6\]]can rnams la yul bstan pas yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir skye mched rnam par dag pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /_chos thams cad bsgom pa dang /_rnam par bsgom par rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob par 
[\[183a.7\]]bya ba'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi skal pa mnyam pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis rab tu thob par bya ba las yongs su gnan pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa thams cad la rab tu gnas pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis lung bstan pa la yongs su bstan pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /_skad cig gcig gi ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i tshul thams cad 
[\[183b.2\]]la ting nge 'dzin gyi skal ba mnyam pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mtshan nyid sna tshogs la ting nge 'dzin rnam par dgod pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_rjes su dran pa'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la rjes su dran pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_
[\[183b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba la phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal ba'i mur thug par zhe non pa la byang chub sems dpas spyad pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes tshad med pa la mos shing dga' ba'i shugs rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir 
[\[183b.4\]]mos pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_sgrib pa'i ri thams cad la rnam par bzlog pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i ye shes kyi skal ba mnyam pa dang /_
[\[183b.5\]]sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba'i dus su skye ba'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul gyi sgo la rnam par spyod pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyis khyu mchog gi 
[\[183b.6\]]mthu phyung ba'i yul la rab tu 'jug par bya ba'i phyir yul gyi skal pa mnyam pa dang /_gzhi thams cad yongs su choms pa'i sems su bya ba'i phyir gzhi med pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_chos mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la 'jug par bya ba'i 
[\[183b.7\]]phyir chos bstan pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs rang gi lus kyis yang dag par gnon pa'i phyir brtson pa'i skal ba mnyam padang /_'jig rten thams cad kyis khong du chud par bya ba'i nan tan gyi tshul 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]la mngon par shes pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_phyogs thams cad kyi zhing rgya mtsho 'jug par bya ba la mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rdzu 'phrul rab tu thob pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_gzungs rgya mtsho thams cad kyi snang ba rab tu 
[\[184a.2\]]thob par bya ba la gzungs kyi sa'i skal pa mnyam padang /_mdo sde'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i dgongs pa khong du chud par bya ba'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_nam mkha'i dbyings lta bu'i chos kyi tshul 
[\[184a.3\]]thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir chos zab mo la 'jug pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad du snang bar bya ba'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro bas rnam par dmigs par bstan pa 
[\[184a.4\]]la mngon par gsal ba'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_zhing gi byin gyi rlabs dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa sems can yongs su bstan pa'i phyir rab tu skyod pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_mthong ba dang thos pa dang /_rjes su dran pas sems can 'dul 
[\[184a.5\]]ba'i phyir don yod par spyad pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang /_smon lam rgya mtsho'i tshul thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas stobs bcu'i ye shes rjes su 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir 'byung ba'i skal ba mnyam pa yang rab tu thob par gyur to/_/de ltar tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[184a.6\]]shin tu dga' ba'i sems su gyur te/_mtshan mo'i lha mo'i 'gro ba thams cad bsrung ba'i smon lam la brtson pa'i 'od la bltas pas 'du shes rnam par dag pa thob par gyur te/_'di dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba thams cad bsrung 
[\[184a.7\]]ba'i smon lam la brtson pa'i 'od las skal ba mnyam pa'i tshul sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang thob par gyur to/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba thams cad bsrung ba'i smon lam la brtson pa'i 'od las blta ba'i tshul 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la zhugs pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi 'du shes rnam par dag pa mtha' dang dbus med pa rab tu thob pa skal ba mnyam pa'i tshul sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed pa la zhugs pas bla gos phrag pa 
[\[184b.2\]]gcig la gzar te/_mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba thams cad bsrung ba'i smon lam la brtson pa'i 'od gang na ba der thal mo sbyar te/_btud nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/de ni bdag gi sems la bdag dgongs te/_/byang chub mos pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog 
[\[184b.3\]]shin tu brtan/_/khyod kyi thugs la'ang bdag ni de bzhin du/_/bdag gi bzhin du de ring brtan par skyes/_/sdig to ma lus rnam par byang bar gyur/_/dge ba'i rnam smin mi mnyam bar tu thob/_/bdag gis lta na mdzes pa khyod mthong bas/_/chos dkar 
[\[184b.4\]]mi ngas bdag gis yongs su bstsags/_/bdag gi sems ni yon tan chu bos brgyan/_/sems can phan brtson rnam pa tha dad pas/_/brgyan gyur des ni phyi mtha'i bskal par yang /_/zhing rnams kun tu spyod pa spyad par bgyi/_/'phags mas bdag la 
[\[184b.5\]]thugs brtse mdzad slad du/_/chos rnams thams cad grub pa khyod kyis bstan/_/bdag la sman slad rjes su gzung dgongs te/_/chos kyi gdams ngag dam pa stsal du gsol/_/ngan 'gror lhung ba'i lam ni rnam par bzlog/_/mtho ris shul 
[\[184b.6\]]gtsang dam pa yongs su bstan/_/bde gshegs ma lus bzhud cing rjes bzhud pa'i/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i shul kyang khyod kyis bstan/_/dpe med rmad du byung mnga' khyod la bdag_/'byung ba'i 'du shes dam pa nye bar skyes/_/nam mkha' lta 
[\[184b.7\]]bur dri med tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i/_/thams cad mkhyen nyid chos sgo rnam par dag_/kun mkhyen tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]'byung gnas bzang po yi/_/'du shes de ring tshad med khyod la skyes/_/bsod nams rgya mtsho mkha' ltar tshad med pa'i/_/sems las byung ba skad 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]cig re rer 'byung /_/'phags ma pha rol phyin pas bdag bkur gsol/_/bsam yas bsod nams kyis kyang rnam spel gsol/_/yon tan dge ba thams cad yongs 'phel nas/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang myur thob mdzod/_/
[\[185a.2\]]dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la rtag par dga'/_/thams cad mkhyen lam rab rdzogs 'du shes te/_/de yi slad du bdag gi chos dkar rnams/_/myur du rdzogs par 'gyur zhes tshim par gyur/_/de slad 'di las don kun rab tu byung /_/dge ba'i yon 
[\[185a.3\]]tan ldan pa grub par gyur/_/brjod pa mtha' yas thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam/_/'di ni yongs su bsgrubs shing 'gro la brjod/_/yon tan tshad med khyod ni slob dpon gyur/_/thams cad mkhyen kyi chos la bdag 'dren pa/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[185a.4\]]grangs med pas/_/'phags ma khyod la bdag gis lan mi lon/_/de nas tshong dpon nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas/_mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba thams cad bsrung ba'i smon lam la brtson pa'i 'od la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[185a.5\]]lha mo khyod kyis bdag la byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba'i yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di ni bstan na lha mo rnam par thar ba 'di'i ming ni ci zhes bgyi/_lha mo khyod ni ci srid cig nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub tu zhugs ji srid cig na ni 
[\[185a.6\]]khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba thams cad bsrung ba'i smon lam la brtson pa'i 'od kyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[185a.7\]]rigs kyi bu rnam par thar pa 'di ni sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba la yang dag par bskul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'byung ba zhes bya ba ste/_rigs kyi bu kho mo rnam par thar pa 'di dang ldan pas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]khong du chud de chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la zhugs nas/_gnas med pa'i chos la brten te/_'jig rten thams cad las 'phags par gyur to/_/chos rnams kyi gzugs shin tu rnam par phye ba la zhugs te/_mi 'dra ba med pa'i kha dog dang /_sna tshogs med pa'i kha dog 
[\[185b.2\]]dang /_rnam par tha dad pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i kha dog dang /_mi rtog pa'i kha dog dang /_mi sngo ba'i kha dog dang /_mi ser ba'i kha dog dang /_mi dmar ba'i kha dog dang /_mi dkar ba'i kha dog dang /_mi 'thun pa med pa dang /_sna tshogs med pa dang /_rnam pa tha dad pa med pa dang /_rtog pa 
[\[185b.3\]]med pa dang /_mi sngo ba dang mi ser ba dang /_mi dmar ba dang mi dkar ba'i kha dog gi chos nyid la zhugs nas kha dog rnam par phye ba du ma'i gzugs kyi lus sna tshogs kyi kha dog can/_kha dog du ma dang kha dog tshad med pa dang /_kha dog rnam par dag pa dang rgyan thams 
[\[185b.4\]]cad 'byin pa'i kha dog dang kun tu snang ba'i kha dog dang /_'gro ba thams cad dang 'dra ba'i kha dog dang /_'jig rten thams cad la mngon du gyur cing lhag pa'i kha dog dang gzugs brnyan kun tu snang ba'i kha dog dang /_mi 'thun pa med pa'i kha dog dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad 
[\[185b.5\]]bzang pos rnam par sbyangs pa'i kha dog dang /_kha na ma tho ba med par spyod pa'i 'od dang ldan pa'i kha dog dang /_stobs chen pos rnam par gnon pa yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang /_zab mo thob par dka' ba'i kha dog dang /_'jig rten thams cad kyis mi thub pa'i kha dog dang /_
[\[185b.6\]]'gro ba thams cad kyi tshig gis mi zad pa'i kha dog dang /_skad cig re re la sna tshogs su 'gyur ba'i kha dog dang /_kha dog gi sprin sna tshogs yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang /_gzugs dang dbyibs sna tshogs kyi kha dog dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa tshad med 
[\[185b.7\]]pa ston pa'i kha dog dang /_shin tu yid du 'ong zhing rnam par snang ba'i kha dog dang /_bzang po dang mdzes pa thams cad 'bel ba'i kha dog dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba dang /_mthun pa'i kha dog dang /_bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]ba la mngon tu 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i kha dog dang /_thogs pa med par kun tu snang ba'i kha dog dang /_dang zhing rnyog pa med la rnam par gsal te/_'od dang ba'i kha dog dang /_mi shes pa'i lus kyis bsgrubs pas mdzes par gyur 
[\[186a.2\]]pa'i kha dog dang /_chos kyi tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu ston pa'i kha dog dang /_zil gyis [(]mnon [,]gnon [)]la zil gyis gnon pas thams cad zil du rlag par byed pa'i kha dog dang /_mun pa dang rab rib med pa'i kha dog dang /_mun pa thams cad rnam par 
[\[186a.3\]]sel ba'i kha dog dang /_dkar po thams cad shin tu bsgrubs pa'i kha dog dang /_bdag nyid che ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i kha dog dang /_sngon bla ma la rim gror byas pas shin tu bsgrubs pa'i kha dog dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa'i nam mkha' yongs su 
[\[186a.4\]]dag par byed pa'i kha dog dang /_mchog dam pa phul du byung bar shin tu yangs pa'i kha dog dang /_mi 'phrogs mi zad pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho rab tu ston pa'i kha dog dang /_'jig rten thams cad la mi gnas shing ma 'dres pa'i kha dog dang /_
[\[186a.5\]]thogs pa med par phyogs thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i kha dog dang /_sems can kyi skad cig 'byam klas pa la zhing rgya mtsho brjod du med par kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa du ma yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba'i 
[\[186a.6\]]shugs chen po rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'i kha dog dang /_sems can rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su sdud pa'i kha dog dang /_ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho ma lus pa'i sprin gyi sgra sgrog pa'i kha dog dang /_sems 
[\[186a.7\]]can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang /_mos pa rgya mtsho rnam par sbyong ba'i kha dog dang /_chos thams cad kyi don rnam par gdon mi za ba yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang /_'od gzer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor kha dog sna tshogs su snang ba'i kha dog dang /_
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]nam mkha' ltar dri ma med par snang ba'i kha dog dang /_rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par dag pa ltar rdul gyi dri ma med pa'i 'od la gnas pa'i kha dog dang /_chos nyid dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 'od kyi kha dog dang /_kha dog dpag tu med pa'i tshul rgya mtsho rnam pa tha dad pa yongs 
[\[186b.2\]]su ston pa'i kha dog dang /_phyogs kun tu snang bar byed pa'i kha dog dang /_dus la gang du bab par 'gro ba yongs su ston par ma 'dres pa'i kha dog dang /_zhi ba dang dul ba'i phyogs las byung ba'i kha dog dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed 
[\[186b.3\]]pa'i kha dog dang /_'gro ba bsod nams kyi zhing thams cad la rab tu ston pa'i kha dog dang /_'jigs pa thams cad rab tu sel ba'i kha dog dang /_don yod par 'gro ba rgyas par 'gengs pa'i kha dog dang /_ye shes kyi rnam par gnon pa chen po rab tu 
[\[186b.4\]]rjod pa'i kha dog dang /_chags pa med pa'i lus kyis kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i kha dog dang /_lus dam pa'i sprin gyi dbyangs kyis 'gro ba kun tu ston par byed pa'i kha dog dang /_byams pa'i rgya mtsho chen po yongs su sdud pa'i kha dog dang /_bsod nams kyi ri rab 
[\[186b.5\]]chen po yongs su sgrub pa'i kha dog dang /_'gro ba thams cad du mi gnas kyang 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad du gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i kha dog dang /_ye shes kyi stobs chen po rnam par sbyong ba'i kha dog dang /_'jig rten thams cad kyi rjes su dran pa dang /_
[\[186b.6\]]'grogs pa'i kha dog dang /_rin po che thams cad lta bu'i kha dog dang /_rnam par snang ba'i snying po ltar yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi mos pa'i tshul dang mthun pa'i kha dog dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa la mngon du gyur pa'i kha dog 
[\[186b.7\]]dang /_mig 'dzum gyis rgyas pas 'gro ba mos par byed pa'i kha dog dang /_rin po che'i rgyan dam pa'i 'od kyi kha dog dang /_'gro ba thams cad du thogs pa med pa la phyir phyogs pa med pa'i kha dog dang /_nges pa med cing mngon par zhen pa med pa'i kha dog 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]dang /_byin gyi rlabs kyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu 'byin pa yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang /_rdzu 'phrul thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[187a.2\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba snang bar byed pa'i kha dog dang /_chos kyi dbyings kha na ma tho ba med pa'i tshul rgyu mtsho la rab tu zhugs pa'i kha dog dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i kha dog dang /_kha dog sna tshogs rgya mtsho rab 
[\[187a.3\]]tu sgrub pa'i kha dog dang /_legs par spyad pa dang /_rgyu 'thun pa bzang pos byung ba'i kha dog dang /_'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar sgrub pa'i kha dog dang /_'jig rten thams cad kyis blta na mi ngoms pa'i kha dog dang /_'od dang ba rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[187a.4\]]kyi 'od du snang ba'i kha dog dang /_dus gsum gyi kha dog rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su bstan pa'i kha dog dang /_'od gzer kha dog thams cad dang ldan pa rgya mtsho rab du 'gyed pa'i kha dog dang /_'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho kha dog brjod du med pa sna tshogs rnam 
[\[187a.5\]]pa tha dad pa yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang /_spos thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba kun las 'das pa'i kha dog dang /_ba spu'i sgo re re nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang /_
[\[187a.6\]]zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs dri ma med cing yangs pa'i sprin gyi byin gyi rlabs kyi kha dog dang /_me tog yid du 'ong ba'i ri rab kyi sprin mtha' yas pa rab tu 'gyed pa'i kha dog dang /_phreng ba sna tshogs mngon par sgrub pa'i shing gi sprin gyi phreng ba 
[\[187a.7\]]thams cad kyi char rab tu 'bebs pa'i kha dog dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi pad+mo'i sprin yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang /_spos dang bdug spos thams cad kyi na bun gyi gzugs kyi sprin gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i kha dog du sems kyi 
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]skad cig re re la phye ma'i mdzod kyi sprin thams cad byin gyis brlabs shing /_phyogs bcur chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par bkang nas mthong bas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams dang /_thos pas 'dul ba dang /_rjes su dran pas 'dul ba dang /_
[\[187b.2\]]chos kyi 'khor lo sprul pa mngon par bsgrubs pas 'dul ba dang /_yongs su smyin par 'gyur ba'i dus la bab pas 'dul bar gyur ba dang /_gzugs kyi lus yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya bas 'dul ba dang /_khong du chud par 
[\[187b.3\]]bya bas 'dul ba dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_cho 'phrul sna tshogs yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa yongs su bstan pas btul ba'i sems can rnams kyi bsam 
[\[187b.4\]]ba'i dbang dang /_dus kyi dbang dang /_mi dge ba'i las las rnam par bzlog pa'i dbang dang /_dge ba'i lam yongs su bsgrub pa la so sor 'god pa'i dbang dang /_sngon smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrub pa'i dbang dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 
[\[187b.5\]]shugs kyi dbang dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba rgya chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu thob pa'i chos kyi dbang dang /_'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab par shin tu bsgrubs pa'i snying rje chen po'i stobs yongs su 'byung ba'i dbang dang /_byams 
[\[187b.6\]]pa chen po'i rgya mtsho rnam par dag pa yongs su bskyed pa'i bsam pa'i dbang gis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs yang dag par blang ba'i phyir rab tu 'jug go_/rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems 
[\[187b.7\]]can thams cad yongs su smin par byas pas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba la yang dag par bskul la rab tu gnas te/_rnam par dbye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos la zhugs nas mtha' dang dbus med pa'i lus kyi kha dog dang dbyibs yongs su bstan 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]te/_spyod pa'i lus re re las mtha' dang dbus med pa'i kha dog rgya mtsho 'jig rten du rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par byas te/_spyod pa'i kha dog re re las mtha' dang dbus med pa'i 'od gzer gyi sprin yongs su bkye zhing 'od gzer re re las 
[\[188a.2\]]kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi gzugs brnyan mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su bstan nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su bstan te/_de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing yang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' 
[\[188a.3\]]dang dbus med pa yongs su ston pa byed cing sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par bskul ba byed do/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyang yongs su bskyed do/_/bskyed pa rnams kyang yangs par byed do/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba yangs par byas pa rnams ni rnam 
[\[188a.4\]]par 'phel bar byed de/_kho mo ni sems kyi skad cig re re la yang /_sems can kyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu 'god par byed do//_//sangs 
[\[188a.5\]]rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po bcu gnyis pa/_rigs kyi bu gzhan yang khyod kyis 'di skad du smras te/_khyod bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs nas ni ji srid cig lon/_bskal pa brgya phrag ji snyed 
[\[188a.6\]]cig nas ni byang chub kyi spyod pa la spyod spyod ces zer ba de'i don kyang /_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bstan par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ni rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa'i yul dang ldan pa/_de la 'khor ba ring ba 
[\[188a.7\]]'am/_'khor ba thung bar rnam par dgod cing brjod par bya ba byed do/_/bskal pa kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_bskal pa rnam par dag pa'am/_bskal pa chung ba'am/_bskal pa che ba'am/_bskal pa mang ba'am/_bskal ba tha dad pa'am/_
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]bskal ba rnam pa sna tshogs su bya ba'am/_bskal pa rnam pa tha dad par bya bar yang rnam par dgod pa dang /_brjod par bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ni rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid kyis yongs su 
[\[188b.2\]]dag pa ste/_'du shes kyi dra ba thams cad dang bral ba sgrib pa'i ri thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i bsam pa la yongs su 'char te/_de'ang sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba'i dus su 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du snang bar byed do/_/
[\[188b.3\]]rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la nyin mtshan gyi grangs su bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_mi srid kyang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nub na ni nub mor snang ngo /_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar na ni nyin bar du snang zhing brjod pa yod do/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub 
[\[188b.4\]]sems dpa' ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par rtog pa med pa la rtog pa dang /_yongs su rtog pa thams cad [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_'khor ba na gnas pa'i 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad dang /_dus su bya ba thams cad kyang med mod kyi/_'on kyang byang chub 
[\[188b.5\]]sems dpa'i bsam pa las byung ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par rtog pa med pa ni sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba'i dus kyi dbang gis bskal par gnas pa dang /_'khor ba'i 'du shes kyi rnam par bgrang ba'i grangs 
[\[188b.6\]]su bgrang ba yin te/_ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par rtog pa med pa la sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i bskul par gnas pa'i 'du shes kyi rnam par bgrang ba yod do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na/_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni nam 
[\[188b.7\]]mkha'i dbyings la 'dug kyang /_rin po che'i ri thams cad dang /_rin po che'i shing thams cad dang /_rin po che'i snod thams cad dang /_rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad dang /_rgya mtsho thams cad dang /_mtsho dang mtshe'u thams cad dang /_
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]chu dang ba'i snod thams cad dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi sems la gzugs brnyan rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa snang ste/_sems can thams cad la mngon du gyur par snang ngo /_/rin po che thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams la nyi ma'i 
[\[189a.2\]]dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs brnyan byung bar snang yang /_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de ni rin po che'i ri rnams la'ang gnas pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rin po che'i shing nas rin po che'i rdul shin tu phra ba rnams kyi bar du'ang zhugs pa med/_rin po che'i 'bru rnams kyi khongs su 
[\[189a.3\]]chud pa'ang ma yin/_rin po che'i 'byung gnas rnams kyi rjes su song ba'ang ma yin/_rgya mtsho rnams kyi nang du song ba'ang ma yin/_chu'i snod thams cad kyi nang du zhugs pa yang ma yin mod kyi/_thams cad kyi khongs na 'dug par yang snang ngo /_/rigs 
[\[189a.4\]]kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las ni gyen du 'phags/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi nam mkha' la ni mngon par byung /_chos kyi rang bzhin nam mkha'i rgyud la ni rgyu zhing spyod/_
[\[189a.5\]]zhi ba'i nam mkha'i dbyings la ni gnas par gyur mod kyi srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud dang /_skye gnas thams cad du'ang sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba'i don du sems can thams cad dang 'dra ba'i lus su skye bar snang ste/_
[\[189a.6\]]'khor ba'i nyes pas gos par mi 'gyur ro/_/skye ba dang 'chi 'pho ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nye bar gdung ba med do/_/rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dag dang /_'grogs pa med do/_/bskal pa la'ang ring ba'i 'du shes sam/_thung ba'i 'du shes su 'gyur 
[\[189a.7\]]ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' phyin ci log las shin tu 'das pa dang /_'du shes dang sems dang lta ba'i phyin ci log las yongs su 'das pa dang /[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam lta bu'i 'jig rten thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ya 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]shes kyis khong du chud pa dang /_sgyu ma lta bu'i 'jig rten thams cad rab tu rtogs pa dang /_sems can [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ye shes kyi dbyings rab tu thob pa dang /_yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du chos rab tu mthong bas snying rje'i dkyil 'khor shin tu yangs pa dang smon lam chen 
[\[189b.2\]]po'i stobs kyis sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba'i don du sems can thams cad la mngon du gyur par snang ngo /_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na/_chu klung chen po la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa la gru ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems can yongs 
[\[189b.3\]]su bsgral ba la brtson pa ste/_nam ma zhigs kyi bar du rgyun gcod pa med kyang /_de la pha rol gyi ngogs la mngon par chags pa med/_tshu rol gyi ngogs la'ang mngon par chags pa med/_chu'i dbus na'ang gnas pa med do/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang 
[\[189b.4\]]chub sems dpa' yang pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'i gru'i mthus 'khor ba'i chu klung gi rgyud las sems can thams cad yongs su bsgral ba la zhugs pa yin te/_de la tshu rol gyi mus 'jigs pa med do/_/pha rol gyi mur bde bar 'gyur ba'i 'du shes med do/_/
[\[189b.5\]]'on kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bskal pa dpag tu med pa thams cad du gnas par bya bar zhe non pas sems can thams cad yongs su bsgral bar bya ba la zhugs pa yin te/_bskal ba'i rnam par tha dad pa la mngon 
[\[189b.6\]]par zhen pa med do/_/bskal pa 'da' bar bya ba la ring ba'i 'du shes su gyur cing byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod pa ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na/_chos kyi dbyings ltar yangs pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings nam mkha'i gzhi'i dkyil 'khor ni 
[\[189b.7\]]'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'du'am 'jig gam 'das par gyur kyang rnam par rtog pa med cing rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag la kun nas nyon mongs pa med de/_'khrug pa med cing bsgribs pa med la phyi ma'i mtha'i dus su zhing thams cad 'dzin kyang yongs su skyo 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]ba med do/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa ye shes nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor kyang smon lam chen po'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis kun nas bskor cing ngan song gi g.yang sa thams cad las sems can yongs su 'dzin kyang 
[\[190a.2\]]yongs su skyo ba med do/_/bde ba'i lam la 'god pa byed kyang yongs su sgyid lug pa med do/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam la 'god kyang zhum par byed pa med do/_/nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis kyang 'khrug pa med do/_/'khor ba'i nyes pa thams cad kyis kyang 
[\[190a.3\]]yongs su gdung ba med do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na/_sgyu ma'i rnam pa las grub pa'i mi yan lag dang nying lag shin tu tshang ba la lus la gnas pa'i chos bcu med de/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dbugs nang du rgyu ba'am/_dbugs phyir rgyu ba 
[\[190a.4\]]'am/_grang ba'am/_dro ba'am/_bkres pa'am/_skom pa'am/_dga' ba'am/_mi dga' ba'am/_skye ba'am/_rga ba'am/_na ba'am/_'chi ba dang /_gnod par 'gyur ba med do/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ye shes sgyu ma'i rnam pa las 
[\[190a.5\]]byung ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa/_chos kyi dbyings tha mi dad pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad du sems can yongs su smyin par byed pa'i don du skyes te/_bskal pa thams cad du gnas pa la'ang chos bcu med de/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta 
[\[190a.6\]]ste 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba'am/_'khor ba srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud du skye bas skyo bar 'gyur ba'am/_yul gyi dga' ba la 'dun pa'am/_khong khro ba'i sems sam/_longs spyod par 'dod pa'am/_nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis yongs su gdung ba 
[\[190a.7\]]'am/_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba nyams su myong ba'am/_lam nyam nga bar skye bas 'jigs pa'am/_srid par mngon par 'dun pa'am/_mngon par chags pa med do/_/'on kyang rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
