[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rgya chen po'i stobs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir bstan par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol de'i yang pha snga 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i 
[\[190b.2\]]dus na/_'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od ces bya ba zhig byung ste/_rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od de la bskal pa ni 'od bzang po zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/bskal pa 'od bzang po zhes bya ba de la ni sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu byung bar gyur te/_rigs kyi 
[\[190b.3\]]bu sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu po de dag las bskal pa'i dang po la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra nam mkha'i sprin gyi sgron ma rgyal po zhes bya ba mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig 
[\[190b.4\]]rten mkhyen pa bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/_lha dang mi'i ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/_de thams cad kyi thog ma la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[190b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa de gling bzhi ba'i dbus na rgyal po'i gnas dga' bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod pa dang /_tshod du yang rgyang mi ring ba zhig byung ste/_rgyal po'i gnas dga' bas brgyan pa de'i shar phyogs logs na/_nags tshal 'od bzang po zhes 
[\[190b.6\]]bya ba zhig yod de/_nags tshal 'od bzang po der snying po byang chub rin po che'i me tog gi sprin ces bya ba byung ngo /_/snying po byang chub rin po che'i sprin ces bya ba der gdan seng ge'i khri rin po che rnam par snang ba'i snying po can byung ste/_de la bcom ldan 
[\[190b.7\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra nam mkha'i sprin gyi sgron ma rgyal po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so/_/de'i tshe mi'i tshe'i tshad lo stong phrag bcu thub pa las 'jig rten du sems can srog 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_phra ma zer ba dang /_zhe gcod pa'i tshig smra ba dang /_tshig khyal pa zer ba dang /_chags sems dang ldan pa dang /_gnod sems yod 
[\[191a.2\]]pa dang /_log par lta ba can byung ste/_de ltar mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu rnam par rgyas par gyur nas rab tu brtan par gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra nam mkha'i sprin gyi sgron ma rgyal po des 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i 
[\[191a.3\]]sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa rnams dang /_'dzam bu gling gi [{]myi [,]mi [}]rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smyin par bya ba'i phyir snying po byang chub mchog tu gshegs te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos bstan to/_/de'i tshe rgyal po'i gnas dga' bas brgyan 
[\[191a.4\]]pa de na rgyal po rgyal ba'i 'od ces bya ba 'dug 'dug ste/_des mi ma byin par len pa/_rku ba/_sdig to byed pa/_srog gcod pa/_'dod pas log par g.yem pa/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]zer ba/_phra ma smra ba/_zhe gcod pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/_tshig khyal ba smra ba/_chags 
[\[191a.5\]]sems can gnod sems yod pa/_log par lta ba/_chos ma yin pa'i 'dod chags la zhen pa/_'dod pa mi bzad pas mngon par non pa/_log pa'i chos kyis kun nas 'khor ba/_sdig to byed byed pa/_khro gtum byed byed pa/_bsod nams ma 
[\[191a.6\]]byas pa/_'jigs pas bag tsha ba med pa/_mar mi shes pa/_phar mi shes pa/_dge sbyong du bya ba med pa/_bram zer bya ba med pa/_tshul mi shes pa g.yon dang ldan pa brgya stong du ma rab tu gdul bar bya ba'i phyir btson rar btsud par gyur to/_/
[\[191a.7\]]rgyal po rgyal ba'i 'od de la bu gzugs bzang ba shin tu mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/_kha dog bzang po dam pa rgyas pa dang ldan pa mi chen po'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan pa/_rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de/_khang pa glu snyan pa'i dbyangs 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]zhes bya ba'i steng du phyin te/_bud med kyi 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor cing 'dug 'dug pa las btson ra na 'khod pa'i sems can mtshon cha sna tshogs kyis dam du glags pa/_de dag gi sgra 'jigs 'jigs skad du 'bod pa thos par gyur to/_/thos nas mi dga' 
[\[191b.2\]]zhing shin tu nyams mi bde ba'i sems su gyur te/_snying rje chen po skyes nas khang steng de nas shod du babs te/_btson ra der phyin nas btson ra dam po na 'khod pa'i sems can shing sgrog dang lcags sgrog dang /_khong sgril dang /_ltung dang mdo rtod kyis 
[\[191b.3\]]bsgrogs shing brtod de gcig gi lus dang gcig tu sbrel nas mun pa mun nag tu btsud de/_dud pa'i rab rib kyis 'grigs shing /_rlung nad nyams su [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde bas nyam thag par gyur pa/_dbugs shin tu mi bde ba rgyu ba bkres pa dang /_skom pas 
[\[191b.4\]]mnar ba/_sgren mo gos med pa lus thams cad phyag dar dang rdul gyi nang na 'gre ba/_lus rang gis skras yog pa/_brla sgril gyis dam du bcings pa/_nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyis tho btsams pa sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas zil gyis mnan cing /_sdug 
[\[191b.5\]]bsngal nyams su myong bar gyur te/_mi bzad pa sna tshogs kyi smre sngags kyis bla zhing 'o dod 'bod pa de dag mthong nas snying rje chen po skyes te/_snying rje'i bsam pa rgya chen po byung nas gzhan la phan par bya ba'i sems skyes te/_btson ra'i thibs po na 
[\[191b.6\]]'khod pa'i sems can rnams btson ra nas thar bar bya'o/_/zhes dbugs bton nas des sems can de dag mi 'jigs pa byin te/_rgyal po rgyal ba'i 'od gang na ba der song ste/_'di skad ces gsol to/_/lha'i zhal snga nas mkhyen par mdzad tu 
[\[191b.7\]]gsol/_btson ra mi bde ba na mchis pa'i sems can rnams la glo ba rjes nas bdag gis mi 'jigs pa stsal na de dag dgye bar ci gnang zhes nas/_de nas rgyal po rgyal ba'i 'od kyis blon po lnga brgya po ba[{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]nas khyed ji snyam du sems 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_btson 'di rnams ni rgyal po'i phyag mdzod rku ba/_rgyal po'i sku la dar ba/_btsun mo'i 'khor du zhugs pa las bzung ba sha stag ste/_de dag ni mi dgum du'ang mi rung /_de dag gi chad pa ni 
[\[192a.2\]]dgum pas 'bra bar bas te/_ma lags na'ang btson rar gum na chad pa 'bra lags grang /_de dag gi mgon su bgyid pa de'ang rgyal po'i zhal sngar glo ba ring ngo /_/de nas rgyal po'i bu rnam par rgyal ba snying rje chen pos mi bzod ces nas blon po de dag la 
[\[192a.3\]]smras pa/_khyod kyis ji skad du smras pa/_de ltar yang rung ste/_ngas khong ta 'di dag gi don du sdug bsngal nyams su blangs pa thams cad kyang bzod par bya na de dag la khyod kyis ci bya/_de nga la gyis te nyes pa can de dag khye shig_/ngas de rnams btson ra nas 
[\[192a.4\]]dgrol ba'i don du mi bde ba thams cad nyams su blangs te/_lus dang srog yongs su dor bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gal te ngas sems can 'di rnams tsam zhig kyang btson ra nas dgrol bar ma nus na khams gsum pa'i btson ra na 'khod pa'i sems 
[\[192a.5\]]can sred pa'i zhags pas glags pa/_ma rig pa'i thibs po na 'khod pa/_gti mug gi mun par btsud pa/_phongs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis mnar ba ngan song gi rgyud zabs su ring zhing 'byung bar dka' bar chud pa/_dbyibs mi sdug la mdog mi sdug 
[\[192a.6\]]pa dang ldan pa/_dbang po'i sbyor ba thams cad dang bral ba/_nor ba'i yid dang ldan pa/_'byung ba mi mthong ba snang ba med pa khams gsum pa la mngon par zhen pa/_bsod nams dang /_ye shes kyi tshogs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_ye shes kyi skye mched dang 
[\[192a.7\]]skol ba nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyis sems dri ma can du gyur pa/_sdug bsngal gyi shing thags kyis 'khor ba dang /_bdud kyi dbang du gyur pa/_skye ba dang rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]bde ba dang /_'khrug pas mnar ba rnams kyang ji ltar khrol bar bya zhes nas/_rgyal po gzhon nu rnam par rgyal bas btson ra na 'khod pa'i sems can de dag bdag nyid yongs su gtang ba dang /_rnam pa thams cad du yongs su gtang bas/_g.yog 'khor 
[\[192b.2\]]thams cad dang /_nor gyi phung po thams cad kyis blus te/_brtson ra de dag nas yongs su bkye nas sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal nyams su blangs te/_phyir ldog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par gyur to/_/de nas blon po lnga brgya po de dag gis lag pa gyen du bsgreng ste/_'o dod 
[\[192b.3\]]bos nas rgyal po rgyal ba'i 'od kyi gan du song ste/_'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po'i zhal snga nas mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_gzhon nu rnam par rgyal ba'i mchid thabs su bgyis pas/_rgyal po'i chab srid kyang stor bar 'gyur/_bdag cag rnams kyang 
[\[192b.4\]]srog la 'bab par the tshom 'tshal te/_lha'i zhal snga nas rgyal po gzhon nu rnam par rgyal ba la bka' nan ma mdzad na ni/_ring po yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]thogs par lha'i zhal sngar sku la dar bar 'gyur ro zhes pa dang /_de nas rgyal po rgyal ba'i 'od shin tu khros nas/_
[\[192b.5\]]rgyal po'i bu rnam par rgyal ba dang /_g.yon dang ldan pa'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]de dag du bcas te gsad par byas so/_/de nas de'i ma skyed skyed pas thos nas [{]myi [,]mi [}]dga' ste/_bud [{]myed [,]med [}]kyi 'khor stong dang bcas te/_skra ni bshig_/lus kyi rgyan ni bor rang gi bzhin ni 
[\[192b.6\]]dral/_brang ni brdung mgo ni phyag dar gyis gang bar snying rje rje skad kyi nga ror ngu zhing rgyal po'i drung du phyin nas/_'khor dang bcas pas rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/_'di skad du gsol ba btab po/_/lha'i zhal snga nas thugs ci dgongs/_rgyal po 
[\[192b.7\]]gzhon nu rnam par rgyal ba gtang du gsol/_rgyal po gzhon nu rnam par rgyal ba'i srog stsal du gsol zhes nas/_de nas rgyal pos rgyal po gzhon nu rnam par rgyal ba mdun du bzhag ste/_'di skad ces smras so/_/gzhon nu g.yon dang ldan pa'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]'di rnams thong /_de ste [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong zhing de rnams kyi le lan du shi bar gyur ta re zhes pa dang /_des zhum pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems ma 'khums pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par brtson pa/_gzhan la phan par gzhol ba/_snying rje chen po sngon 
[\[193a.2\]]du 'gro bas 'chi bar khas blangs pa dang /_de'i mas rgyal po rgyal ba'i 'od la zla ba phyed cig tu phrad par gsol ba btab pa/_dgung zla phyed gcig tu gzhon nu 'di sbyin pa stsol du ci gnang /_de slan cad ni su ci dgyes pa de'ang mdzad par gsol zhes pa dang /_de de ltar 
[\[193a.3\]]gyis shig ces rgyal pos gnang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po'i gnas dga' bas brgyan pa de'i byang phyogs logs shig na/_sngon mchod sbyin gyi gnas su bya ba'i bza' shing gi ra ba chen po nyi ma'i 'od ces bya ba der gzhon nu de song nas/_su ci 'dod pa de la de byin te/_des 
[\[193a.4\]]gtan pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i mchod sbyin byas nas zla ba phyed du sbyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs byin te/_zas 'dod pa la zas byin/_skom 'dod pa la skom byin/_bzhon pa dang /_gos dang /_me tog dang /_phye ma dang /_byug pa dang /_chos gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan 
[\[193a.5\]]dang rin po che'i rgyan dang /_yo byad thams cad dang /_lhab lhub thams cad dang /_yo byad kyi rnam pa thams cad kyang de dag 'dod pa la yongs su btang ste/_de nas nyi ma tha ma la bab par gyur ba dang /_'gro ba mang po'i tshogs kun nas 'dus te/_rgyal 
[\[193a.6\]]po'i blon po dang /_bud [{]myed [,]med [}]kyi tshogs dang /_tshong dpon dang /_khyim bdag dang /_ljongs dang /_yul gyi [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_zhags pa 'thub pa thams cad kyang kun nas 'dus/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra nam mkha'i sprin gyi sgron ma rgyal po de bzhin 
[\[193a.7\]]gshegs pa de yang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba'i dus thugs su chud nas/_mchod sbyin gyi gnas der gshegs te/_lha'i dbang po'i tshogs kyis ni yongs su bskor/_klu'i dbang pos ni yang dag par mchod/_
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]gnod sbyin gyi dbang pos ni lus mngon par btud/_dri za'i dbang pos ni mngon par bstod/_lha ma yin gyi dbang pos ni lus shin tu btud nam mkha' lding gi dbang po gtsug gi rin po ches rnam par brgyan pas ni sems dang ba'i mchod pa'i rnam pas rab tu bkang /_
[\[193b.2\]{]myi'am [,]mi'am [}]ci'i dbang po rnams kyis ni dga' ba'i yid kyis yongs su mchod de/_bstod pa'i glu'i dbyangs kyis yongs su bskul/_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rnams kyis ni kun nas bskor cing zhal du blta ba de/_'gro ba'i tshogs chen po de dang /_rgyal po 
[\[193b.3\]]gzhon nu rnam par rgyal bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra nam mkha'i sprin gyi sgron ma rgyal po shin tu mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/_dbang po zhi ba thugs zhi ba/_shin tu dben 
[\[193b.4\]]par dbang po las rgyal ba/_glang po ltar shin tu dul ba/_mtsho ltar rab tu dang zhing gsal la rnyog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba dang /_cho 'phrul chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba chen pos ni rnam par mdzes/_
[\[193b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che bas ni rab tu 'bar/_sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan gyis ni sku mdzes par brgyan/_'jig rten thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor snang bas rgyas par 'gengs shing /_sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer 
[\[193b.6\]]gyis rab tu snang ba mdzad/_sku'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas ni/_spos rin po che'i ngad 'phro ba'i 'khor lo rab tu 'gyed/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu bskyod pa'i tshul du ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su bskyod pa mdzad cing /_rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyi 
[\[193b.7\]]char rab tu 'bebs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par gnon pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhal blta ba'i 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]byin gyis/_pha zad cig nas tshur gshegs pa mthong nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa la sems mngon par mos par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po gzhon nu rnam par rgyal ba dang /_'gro ba'i tshogs chen po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[194a.2\]]gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra nam mkha'i sprin gyi sgron ma'i rgyal po de/_pha zad du bsu nas mos pa'i sems kyis lus thams cad kyis phab ste phyag 'tshal nas/_zhabs gnyis la spyi bos gtugs te/_mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yang dag 
[\[194a.3\]]par mchod nas tshig 'di skad du brjod do/_/bcom ldan 'das tshur gshegs su gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa tshur gshegs su gsol/_de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag dgongs so/_/bde bar gshegs pas bdag cag yongs su bzung ngo /_/de nas rgyal 
[\[194a.4\]]po gzhon nu rnam par rgyal bas bcom ldan 'das la gdan dam pas bstabs te/_'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gdan bting ba 'dir bzhugs su gsol zhes nas bcom ldan 'das der gshegs pa dang gdan de yang gtsang sbra 
[\[194a.5\]]lhur len pa'i lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rin po che spos kyi rgyal po'i pad+mo'i snying po can du byin gyis brlabs nas/_gdan de la bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra nam mkha'i sprin gyi sgron ma'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[194a.6\]]bzhugs so/_/'khor gyi stan de dag la byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'khod de/_de'i zhal mthong ma thag tu 'khor de'i sems can thams cad kyang /_sgrib pa thams cad dang bral te/_nad thams cad kyang zhi bar gyur nas/_'phags pa'i chos kyi snod 
[\[194a.7\]]du gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra nam mkha'i sprin gyi sgron ma'i rgyal bos sems can de dag snod du gyur par thugs su chud nas/_bstan pa rim pas bka' stsal te/_'di ltar rgyu'i dkyil 'khor rab tu snang 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]ba zhes bya ba'i mdo sde yang dag par bstan nas zhal gyi sgo nas 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho dang /_nges pa'i tshig dang /_ngag gis dbyangs su brjod pa'i gsung dbyangs kyi yan lag stong dang ldan pa/_chos kyi yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa rab tu 
[\[194b.2\]]bsgrags pa dang /_de'i mod la 'khor de nas srog chags bye ba phrag brgyad cu ni rdul dang bral te/_dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]par gyur nas/_chos la chos kyi [{]myig [,]mig [}]skyes par gyur to/_/srog chags bye ba mang zhig gis ni/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]slob pa'i sa thob par gyur to/_/srog chags 
[\[194b.3\]]stong phrag bcu ni theg pa chen po la rnam par dul bar gyur to/_/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa kun tu bzang po dang /_smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshul la zhugs par gyur to/_/de ltar bcom ldan 'das des sangs rgyas kyi rnam 
[\[194b.4\]]par 'phrul pa chen pos chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i tshe/_phyogs bcu'i sems can sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed theg pa chen po la rnam par dul bar gyur to/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam 
[\[194b.5\]]klas pa sna tshogs su gtogs pa'i sems can mtha' dang dbus [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag gi yang ngan song gi sa rnam par bzlog par gyur to/_/sems can grangs las 'das pa zhig ni mtho ris su skye ba'i lam la rab tu bkod par gyur to/_/rgyal po gzhon nu 
[\[194b.6\]]rnam par rgyal bas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya bas/_bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba la yang dag par bskul ba 'di thob par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de la de'i tshe de'i dus 
[\[194b.7\]]na rgyal po gzhon nu rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba byung ste/_rang gi lus dang srog yongs su btang nas/_nor gyi tshogs dang /_'khor thams cad dang /[ {]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]'jig rten na 'tsho ba'i bde ba yongs su spangs nas btson ra na 'khong pa'i sems can de dag thar 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]bar byas pa/_mchod sbyin chen po gtan pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i mchod sbyin byed byed pa/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra nam mkha'i sprin gyi sgron ma'i rgyal po de la bsnyen 
[\[195a.2\]]bkur byed byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhal mthong ba'i mod la bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya bas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dge 
[\[195a.3\]]ba'i rtsa ba la yang dag par bskul ba yang thob par gyur ba de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na ni/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}]blta ste/_kho mo ni de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gzhon nu rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de ltar kho mo rgyal po gzhon 
[\[195a.4\]]nu rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya bar gyur te/_snying rje chen pos rab tu [{]myi [,]mi [}]dga' zhing 'gro ba thams cad la phan par zhugs te/_khams gsum la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa dang /_rnam par smyin pa'i lan la re ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_grags pa dang snyan pa dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]smos pa la mngon 
[\[195a.5\]]par dga' ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_bdag la bstod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_gzhan la smod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_dngos po thams cad la mngon par zhen pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_srid pa'i 'du shes las gyen du 'phags pa dang /_khams gsum pa la mngon par dga' ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[195a.6\]]dang /_'jig rten gyi yul gyi bde ba las phyir phyogs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la mngon tu gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa rdo rje yongs su grub pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad 
[\[195a.7\]]la byams pa chen pos nan tan du byed pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad la snying brtse bas sdug bsngal rnam par zhi bar bya ba la brtson pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs la bsam pa thag pa nas lhag par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]lam yongs su sbyang ba dang /_theg pa chen po'i rgyan gyis 'byung ba'i lam rab tu brgyan par bya ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgom mngon par blta bar bya ba'i tshul gyis de dag de lta bur dga' ba dag kyang byas par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu kho mos ni byang chub 
[\[195b.2\]]sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya bas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba la yang dag par bskul ba 'di yun de srid du ring ba zhig nas thob par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po 
[\[195b.3\]]rgyal ba'i 'od la log par gsol ba 'debs shing kho mo bsad pa'i phyir gros su gsol ba'i blon po lnga brgya po rnams gzhan dag gcig yin pa tsam du sems na ni/_de ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}]blta ste/_lhas byin gyis bcom ldan 'das dgrongs pa'i phyir skyes bu lnga brgya 
[\[195b.4\]]bkye ba de dag yin te/_de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed na bskal pa 'od bzang po zhes bya ba gcig la sangs rgyas lnga brgya sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan dang rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_
[\[195b.5\]]rigs dang rgyud sna tshogs su skyes pa/_pha dang ma sna tshogs su smos pa skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul ba sna tshogs yongs su ston pa mngon par 'byung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_byang chub kyi shing gi 'od sna tshogs yongs su ston pa/_snying po 
[\[195b.6\]]byang chub sna tshogs su nye bar 'dod ba'i sgo sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_bdud pham pa sna tshogs yongs su ston pa mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs yongs su ston pa/_chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i tshul dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang nges pa'i 
[\[195b.7\]]tshig sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_mdo sde'i tshul shin tu bstan pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_tshig gi lam dang skad sna tshogs rab tu ston pa/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mthu dang rgyan sna tshogs rab tu 'gyed 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]pa/_tshe'i tshad sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_bstan pa'i byin gyi rlabs sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_bstan pa rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_snying rje chen po'i lus su gyur pa sha stag tu 'gyur 
[\[196a.2\]]te/_de dag gi bskal pa'i dang po la de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen po mnga' ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen 'od du bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de'i rjes la 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid du 
[\[196a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis pa 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa'i smon lam bzla ba zhes bya ba 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsum pa thugs rje chen po'i seng ge zhes bya ba 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi pa 'jig rten thams cad la phan par 
[\[196a.4\]]mdzad pa zhes bya ba 'byung ba nas/_thams cad kyi tha ma de bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na 
[\[196a.5\]]g.yon dang ldan pa'i mi'i rgyal po la snying ring bar gyur te/_kho mos gsod ma [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]lag tu phyin pa las rang gi lus dang srog yongs su btang ste/_btson ra de dag nas bkye ba de rnams gzhan dag cig yin pa tsam du sems na ni/_de ltar 
[\[196a.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}]blta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sel la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /_de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa brgya stong phrag bcu dag ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[196a.7\]]pa stobs mtha' yas grags par brjod pa'i dpal yang dag par 'byung ba'i blo gros mthong bar gyur ma thag tu bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_da ltar phyogs bcu na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya bas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba la yang dag par bskul ba 'di yang sgom zhing shin tu rgyas par byed pa dag go_/rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe 
[\[196b.2\]]de'i dus na rgyal po rgyal ba'i 'od ces bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na ni/_de ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}]blta ste/_smra ba chen po bden pa can ni de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po rgyal ba'i 'od ces bya bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/_
[\[196b.3\]]de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i 'khor du gyur pa btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_btsun mo'i gnas kyi sgo ba'am/_'khor na gnas pa'am/_rjes su 'cha' ba de dag kyang gzhan dag cig yin pa tsam du sems na ni de ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}]blta ste/_zhags pa 'thub 
[\[196b.4\]]pa stong phrag drug cu po smra ba chen po bden pa can gyis smra ba'i rgyal mtshan yongs su gzung ba'i don du bcom ldan 'das la rgol du 'gro ba'i tshe/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar blags nas kun kyang zhing sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang /_bskal ba sna 
[\[196b.5\]]tshogs dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]sna tshogs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa dag go_/rigs kyi bu rgyal po gzhon nu rnam par rgyal ba de pha 
[\[196b.6\]]dang mas gnang nas/_sems can btson ra ba de dag yongs su bkrol ba'i 'og tu srid shin tu bde ba dang /_nor dang dbyig rin po che phun sum tshogs pa dag kyang bor/_bu dang chung ma dag kyang spangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[196b.7\]]pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra nam mkha'i sprin gyi sgron ma'i rgyal po'i zham ring du rab tu byung ngo /_/rab tu byung nas kyang lo stong phrag lngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/_de'i bar skabs su ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo stong phrag bcu yongs su bsgrubs so/_/
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]gzungs kyi sgo stong phrag bcu yang rab tu thob po/_/mngon par shes pa'i tshul stong phrag bcu la'ang rab tu zhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gter stong phrag bcu'ang rab tu thob bo/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i shugs stong 
[\[197a.2\]]phrag bcu'ang yongs su skyes so/_/bzod pa'i sgo stong phrag bcu yang yongs su sbyangs so/_/sems nges par bzhag pa stong phrag bcu yang mngon par bsgrubs so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi lus stong phrag bcu yang yongs su spel to/_/byang chub 
[\[197a.3\]]sems dpa'i ye shes kyi sgo stong phrag bcur yang rab tu zhugs so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul stong phrag bcu yang yongs su skyes so/_/sangs rgyas blta ba'i phyogs kyi sgo stong phrag bcu yang mngon du gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam 
[\[197a.4\]]stong phrag bcu yang mngon par bsgrubs so/_/de de lta bu'i chos dang ldan pas sems kyi skad cig re re la phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu yongs su gnon to/_/'jig rten gyi khams re re zhing yang sems kyi skad cig re re la sangs rgyas 
[\[197a.5\]]stong phrag bcu sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' rjes su dran no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa rgya mtsho stong phrag bcu phyogs bcur gshegs pa de dag kyang mthong zhing shes so/_/sems kyi skad cig re re la yang sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[197a.6\]]zhing stong phrag bcur gtogs pa'i sems can 'gro ba'i rgyud sna tshogs su skyes pa shi 'pho zhing skye bar 'gyur ba mtho ba dang /_dma' ba dang /_bde 'gro'i lam du phyin pa dang /_ngan song gi lam du phyin pa dang /_kha dog sdug pa dang /_kha dog [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug 
[\[197a.7\]]pa las ji bzhin du skyes par gyur pa thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to/_/sems can de dag gi shi 'pho dang skye ba yang khong du chud cing mthong ste/_sems kyi rgyud dang /_sems kyi spyod pa dang /_sems kyi 'dab 'brel ba dang /_bsam pa sna tshogs dang /_
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]dbang po rgya mtsho dang /_sbyor ba 'byam klas pa dang /_las mthar thug pa dang /_yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_rnam par gdul ba'i dus kyang khong du chud cing mthong ngo /_/rigs kyi bu rgyal po gzhon nu de de nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling 
[\[197b.2\]]de nyid du rgyal po'i gnas dga' ba dang ldan par rgyal po de nyid kyi rigs su skyes nas/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid thob par gyur to/_/de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i 
[\[197b.3\]]sgra nam mkha'i sprin gyi sgron ma'i rgyal po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi nam mkha' la dpal shin tu 'phags pa'i rgyal po bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu snying po byang chub de nyid du brgya byin du gyur te/_/de bzhin 
[\[197b.4\]]gshegs pa lha dbang snying po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid du rab mtshe ma'i lha'i rgyal por gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal ri bo'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid 
[\[197b.5\]]du rab dga' ldan gyi lha'i rgyal por gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i 'od rab tu bsgrags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid du rab 'phrul dga'i lha'i rgyal por gyur te/_de bzhin 
[\[197b.6\]]gshegs pa nam mkha' mdzes pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid du dbang bsgyur gyi lha'i rgyal por gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa stobs la thub pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/
[\[197b.7\]]de'i 'og tu 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid du lha ma yin gyi dbang bor gyur te de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi 'brug sgra bsgrags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid du tshangs pa'i dbang por gyur te/_
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo sprul pa kun tu snang ba'i dbyangs shes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen 'od de nyid du bskal pa 'od bzang po de nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa/_sangs 
[\[198a.2\]]rgyas stong phrag bcu byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang rgyal po gzhon nu rnam par rgyal bas bsnyen bkur to/_/rigs kyi bu bskal pa 'od bzang po de'i 'og tu bskal ba 'od gzer bzang po zhes bya ba byung ste/_bskal pa 'od gzer bzang po de la 
[\[198a.3\]]yang sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu byung ngo /_/kho mo yang bskal pa de la rgyal po blo gros chen po zhes bya ba zhig tu gyur te/_de'i tshe kho mo rgyal por gyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyi dpal ri bo zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu bskal ba de nyid la khyim bdag 
[\[198a.4\]]cig tu gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa phung po yongs su grub pa zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu bskal pa de nyid la blon po zhig tu gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sras zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu bskal pa de nyid la lha ma 
[\[198a.5\]]yin gyi dbang po zhig tu gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa shugs mnga' ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu bskal pa de nyid la shing gi lha mo zhig tu gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan nyid ri rab zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu bskal 
[\[198a.6\]]pa de nyid la ded dpon zhig tu gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa phyag dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu bskal pa de nyid la grong khyer gyi lha mo zhig tu gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge rnam par gnon pas bzhud pa zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/
[\[198a.7\]]de'i 'og tu bskal pa de nyid la ngal bso bo zhig tu gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa lha dbang gtsug phud ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu bskal pa de nyid la dri za'i rgyal po zhig tu gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa chos kyis 'phags pa 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu bskal pa de nyid la grul bum gyi dbang po zhig tu gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i cod pan zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa bcu po de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa bskal pa 
[\[198b.2\]]'od gzer bzang po de la skye ba'i rigs sna tshogs su skyes nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag drug cu bsnyen bkur te/_kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la mchod pa byas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i spyan sngar 'gro ba'i tshe'ang sems can gyi 
[\[198b.3\]]khams mtha' dang dbus [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smyin par byas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i spyan sngar 'gro ba'i tshe 'ang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sna tshogs rab tu thob par gyur to/_/gzungs kyi sgo sna tshogs dang /_
[\[198b.4\]]mngon par bsgrub pa'i tshul sna tshogs dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i tshul sna tshogs dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul rjes su rtogs par bya ba sna tshogs dang /_chos snang ba'i sgo thob par bya ba'i tshul sna tshogs dang /_ye 
[\[198b.5\]]shes kyi tshul khong du chud par dpyad pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_phyogs rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i snang ba sna tshogs dang /_zhing rgya mtsho sna tshogs la 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba'i snang ba sna tshogs dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho mthong bar bya ba rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[198b.6\]]pa'i snang ba sna tshogs kyang rab tu thob bo/_yongs su gnon to/_/rnam par dag go_/yongs su rdzogs so/_/yongs su gnas par gyur to/_/skyes so/_/byung ngo /_/rnam par 'phel to/_/yongs su 'phel to/_/rab tu byung ngo /_/rnam par byung ngo /_/bskal ba 'od gzer bzang po de la de 
[\[198b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa rnams ji ltar rim gror byas pa de bzhin du bskal pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du/_de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig byung bar gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig 'jig rten gyi khams/_
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]gzhan nas de dag tu byon te/_chos bstan par gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad las kyang kho mos chos bstan pa thos te/_thos nas kyang yongs su bzung ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang /_kho mos bsnyen bkur to/_/
[\[199a.2\]]rim gror byas so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/_de dag gi bstan pa yang kho mos yongs su bzung ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad las kyang kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya bas 
[\[199a.3\]]bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba la yang dag par bskul ba 'di thob par bya ba'i tshul sna tshogs dang /_rnam par thar pa'i tshul gyi sgo sna tshogs kyis thob par gyur to/_/de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba thams cad bsrung ba'i smon lam la brtson pa'i 'od 
[\[199a.4\]]kyis/_de'i tshe rnam par thar pa'i tshul 'di nyid yongs su brjod pa dang /_yongs su bstan pa'i phyir tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab rnam thar dam pa 'di/_/grags pa khyod kyis bdag la gang dris 
[\[199a.5\]]pa/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i byin gyis de bstan kyis/_/ma lus yang dag ji bzhin bdag las nyon/_/bskal pa bsam yas yangs pa mtha' yas pa/_/rgya mtsho'i zhing gi rdul dang grangs mnyam pa/_/de kun 'das pa'i snga rol mdangs dga' 
[\[199a.6\]]ba'i/_/'jig rten khams shig byung ba rin chen 'od/_/de tshe bskal pa bzang po'i 'od kyang byung /_/de la rgyal ba dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa skyes/_/thub pa'i dbang po de dag kho mo yis/_/rnam thar 'di la bsgom zhing bsnyen bkur to/_/rgyal po'i gnas rab 
[\[199a.7\]]yangs shing bzang byung ba/_/de yi [{]mying [,]ming [}]ni dga' bas brgyan pa ste/_/de tshe sems can rnam par ma dag sems/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]bzad ngan du spyod pa der byung gyur/_/de ni rgyal po rgyal ba'i 'od byung ste/_/sems can de dag chos kyis bskyang ba byas/_/de yi bu 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]ni rnam par rgyal ba ste/_/mdzes shing mtshan gyis yan lag brgyan pa'o/_/g.yon ldan stong phrag mang po de dag kyang /_/de tshe rgyal pos gsad par byas mthong nas/_/gzhon nu snying brtse [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]kun nas 'khor/_/myur du dgye bar rgyal po de la gsol/_/rgyal 
[\[199b.2\]]pos thos nas de tshe blon po rnams/_/ma lus kun bsdus de la bka' stsal nas/_/kun gyis de la phyag byas phyir gsol pa/_/de ni rgyal po khyod dgrongs thabs gcig lags/_/rgyal po de ltar log par thugs bcug nas/_/sras de gsad par de tshe byas gyur 
[\[199b.3\]]kyang /_/bdag srog phangs par ma brtsis ngom zung [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/rgyal po'i sras kyis gsad par byas ma btang /_/gsad par byas pa de yi mas thos nas/_/rgyal po de la 'khor bcas gsol ba 'debs/_/dgung zla phyed cig sbyin pa ma lus par/_/'jig rten stsol du 
[\[199b.4\]]gzhon nu btang bar gnang /_/rgyal po des kyang de ltar gnang gyur nas/_/des ni ci 'dod sbyin pa yongs su btang /_/zla ba phyed du nyin mtshan sbyin byas gnas/_/nyi ma'i tha mar tshogs par gyur pa yi/_/zhags pa 'thub pa gang rnams ci 'dod pa/_/de la de byin 
[\[199b.5\]]'chi bar sta gon gnas/_/rgyal po'i gnas der 'gro ba mang po dag_/cho nger ngu zhing kun kyang 'dus par gyur/_/byang chub shing drung bde gshegs de yi tshe/_/dam chos dbyangs mchog sgron ma'i rgyal bzhugs pas/_/'gro ba'i dbang po smyin par thugs chud 
[\[199b.6\]]nas/_/mchod sbyin ra bar thugs rje chen pos byon/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam 'phrul rnam phye bas/_/de yi 'khor du bde gshegs byon gyur nas/_/chos kyi sgron me'i sprin gyi sgra sgrog pa'i/_/mdo sde'i rgyal po bde bar gshegs pas bshad/_/
[\[199b.7\]]'gro ba mtha' dang dbus [{]myed [,]med [}]rnam btul nas/_/de tshe byang chub mchog tu lung yang bstan/_/rgyal po'i sras po rnam par rgyal ba yang /_/shin tu dga' bas byang chub mchog tu zhugs/_/bde gshegs bsnyen bkur mchod pa rnams yangs 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]pas/_/de la mchod byas dga' bar smras pa ni/_/'gro ba rnam 'dul skyabs su bdag 'gyur gyi/_/mgon dang gnas dang dpung du'ang de bzhin zhes/_/rgyal ba de yi zham ring thar bar zhugs/_/yang dag byang chub lam ni yongs tshol 
[\[200a.2\]]zhing /_/chos kyi rang bzhin rab tu brtag bya bas/_/der gnas bskal pa brgya phrag mang du spyad/_/sdug bsngal rgya mtshor lhung zhing mdongs gyur pa'i/_/'gro ba mgon [{]myed [,]med [}]kun la snying brtse bas/_/yang dag byang chub lam la yongs bsgoms nas/_/de tshe de'i rnam 
[\[200a.3\]]thar 'di thob bo/_/bskal pa de la bde gshegs gang byung ba/_/de dag kun la'ang dga' bas bsnyen bkur nas/_/de dag kun la mchod pa chen po byas/_/chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bzung bar gyur/_/de yi 'og tu bskal pa rgya mtsho rnams/_/zhing 
[\[200a.4\]]mang rgya mtsho rdul snyed kun la yang /_/rgyal ba ji snyed skyes par gyur pa dag_/rab tu mchod de de dag bsnyen bkur byas/_/rnam par rgyal zhes bya ba kho mo yin/_/nyam nga btson rar gnas pa'i btson mthong nas/_/de dag dgrol phyir lus kyang yongs su 
[\[200a.5\]]btang /_/rnam thar 'di yang de tshe thob par gyur/_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rdul phran rab 'grangs pa'i/_/bskal pa rgya mtsho mang por bsgom par byas/_/tshul mang mtha' dang dbus med mnyam [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_/skad cig re re dag tu rnam par spel/_/thub 
[\[200a.6\]]pa'i bdag po ji snyed mthong gyur pa/_/de dag spyan sngar sngan chad 'di thob ste/_/sgo tshul rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan dag gis/_/de dag gis ni rnam thar 'di yang bstan/_/de dag rnam thar ma nor bsam yas la/_/bskal pa bye ba mang por kho mos 
[\[200a.7\]]bslabs/_/de la rgyal bas bkod cing grol gyur pa/_/de dag dam chos sprin las cig car 'thung /_/phyogs bcu kun gyi zhing rnams thams cad du/_/thogs pa med par lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs/_/skad cig re rer zhing rgyud bsam yas pa'i/_/
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]dus gsum rgyud rnams kun la'ang rab tu 'jug_/dus gsum rgyal ba rgya mtsho ma lus pa/_/re re kun la'ang mngon du rab tu lta/_/de dag lus kyi gzugs brnyan rgyal ba la/_/sprin tu gyur pa rnams kyang spyan sngar 'grim/_/phyogs rnams kun tu nye bar phyin 'dong zhing /_/rgyal 
[\[200b.2\]]ba'i spyan sngar 'dong bas shin tu mdzes/_/rgyan rnams ma lus mngon par char 'bebs shing /_/rgyal ba rnams la de dag mchod pa byed/_/sangs rgyas rgya mtsho che la rnam yangs pa'i/_/zhu ba mtha' yas kun kyang zhu ba byed/_/rgyal ba'i chos sprin mngon par char 
[\[200b.3\]]'bab pa/_/kun kyang ma lus yongs su 'dzin pa byed/_/phyogs bcu ma lus kun tu de dag 'dong /_/rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor kun gyi spyan sngar 'bab/_/gzugs mang rnam pa sna tshogs bstan gnas shing /_/rnam 'phrul sna tshogs nye bar ston pa byed/_/kha 
[\[200b.4\]]dog mtha' yas rang gi lus gzugs kyis/_/phyogs rnams thams cad rnam pa stong du 'gengs/_/de dag lus gcig las kyang gzugs kyi rnams/_/mtha' dang dbus [{]myed [,]med [}]rnam par ston par byed/_/ba spu re re'i sgo nas grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i/_/'od gzer mang po 
[\[200b.5\]]rgya mtsho de dag 'gyed/_/skye dgu nyon mongs [{]mye [,]me [}]yis gdungs pa dag_/sna tshogs thabs kyis rab tu zhi bar byed/_/'di la gnas pa lus sprul sprin mang ba/_/ba spu re re'i sgo nas 'gyed byed cing /_/ngo mtshar rmad kyis phyogs kun rgyas bkang nas/_/chos chu'i 
[\[200b.6\]]char gyis sems can rnam par 'dul/_/tshul 'jug 'di ni bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab gzugs/_/rgyal sras kun gyi gnas su gyur pa ste/_/de la gnas shing phyi mtha'i bskal par yang /_/zhing rnams kun tu spyad pa rab tu spyod/_/bsam pa ji bzhin chos rnams ston 
[\[200b.7\]]byed cing /_/de dag lta ba'i dra ba rnam par bzlog_/mtho ris mya ngan 'das la sems can 'god/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa yang rnam par ston/_/'jig rten skye gnas thams cad ma lus par/_/kha dog mtha' yas lus mang bsam yas pa/_/bsam 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]pa bzhin du chos rnams rjodabyed de/_/de dag sems can kun gyi gzugs brnyan gzugs/_/'di dang gzhan dag tshad las 'das pa yi/_/yon tan rgya mtsho zhing mang rgya mtsho yi/_/rdul phran rab snyed bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa/_/rnam thar zhi ba 
[\[201a.2\]]'di ldan thob par 'gyur/_/rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/_sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya bas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba la yang dag par bskul ba 'di shes par zad na/_kho mos byang chub 
[\[201a.3\]]sems dpa' 'jig rten thams cad kyi lam gyi rgyud las 'das pa/_'jig rten gyi skye gnas thams cad du gzugs brnyan rab tu 'byung ba/_'jig rten gyi shes pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/_shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rnam 
[\[201a.4\]]par 'thor ba la brtson pa/_chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang /_mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /_mun pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la brtson pa/_chos thams cad rab tu dpyad pas mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/_bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[201a.5\]]pa'i chos mngon tu gyur pa/_sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]gcod pa/_chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]par rab tu rtogs pa dag gi lam gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i blo dang ldan pa/_de dag 
[\[201a.6\]]gi spyod pa shes pa'am/_yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'am/_ye shes kyi rnam par gnon pa yongs su shes par bya ba'am/_sems kyi gnas khong du chud par bya ba'am/_ting nge 'dzin la dbang bsgyur ba rtogs par bya ba'am/_rnam par thar pas rnam par 
[\[201a.7\]]'phrul pa yongs su shes par bya bar nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid kyi lum bi ni'i nags tshal na/_lum bi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal zhes bya ba 'dug gis/_de'i gan du song la 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba yin pa dang /_ji ltar na 'jig rten rnams la snang bar byed par 'gyur ba dang /_ji ltar na phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pas [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyo bar 'gyur ba dris shig_/de 
[\[201b.2\]]nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba thams cad bsrung ba'i smon lam la brtson pa'i 'od kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba thams cad bsrung ba'i smon lam la brtson pa'i 'od la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas 
[\[201b.3\]]phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_thal mo sbyar te phyir lta zhing mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba thams cad bsrung ba'i smon lam la brtson pa'i 'od kyi drung nas song ngo //_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po bcu gsum pa/_
[\[201b.4\]]de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba thams cad bsrung ba'i smon lam la brtson pa'i 'od kyi gdams ngag de rjes su dran par byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya bas bsam pa ci lta ba bzhin 
[\[201b.5\]]du dge ba'i rtsa ba la yang dag par bskul ba de la yongs su bsgom pa dang /_khong du chud par bya ba dang /_rgya cher byed cing mthar gyis lum bi ni'i nags tshal gang na ba der phyin te/_lum pi ni'i nags tshal la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_lum bi 
[\[201b.6\]]ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal yongs su tshol tshol ba las/_lum bi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal lum bi ni'i nags tshal na rin po che'i shing gi yal ga thams 
[\[201b.7\]]cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi khyim brtsegs pa zhig na/_seng+ge'i khri rin po che'i pad+mo'i snying po can zhig la 'dug cing /_nags tshal gyi lha mo khrag khrig brgya stong phrag nyi shu'i 'khor gyis kun nas bskor te/_mdun du byas nas chos bstan te/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]thams cad kyi skye ba rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba'i mdo sde yongs su ston cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rgyud du rigs dang ldan par skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yon tan rgya mtsho'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar byed 
[\[202a.2\]]cing 'dug pa mthong nas/_lum pi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_lum pi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi 
[\[202a.3\]]bos phyag 'tshal nas/_mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba lags 
[\[202a.4\]]pa'ang ma 'tshal/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams spyod pa la spyod cing sems can rnams la snang ba 'byin par 'gyur ba yang ma 'tshal to/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_lum bi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i 
[\[202a.5\]]dpal gyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skye ba ste/_de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes pa yin no/_/de dag las 
[\[202a.6\]]byung na byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems kyi skad cig re re la'ang byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur te/_thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang zhum pa med pa dang /_phyir ldog pa med pa dang /_rgyun gcod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_yongs su 
[\[202a.7\]]skyo ba med pa dang /_sgyid lug par 'gyur ba med pa dang /_nyams par 'gyur ba med pa dang /_nyams dma' bar 'gyur ba med pa dang /_yongs su yi 'chad par 'gyur ba med pa dang /_chud za bar 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyogs 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la yongs su gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu yongs su smyin pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa shin tu yangs par 'gyur ba dang /_pha rol 
[\[202b.2\]]tu phyin pa thams cad kyis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang /_'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad las rnam par ldog par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sar yongs su grub par 'gyur ba dang /_ye shes kyis mngon par shes pa shin tu byang bar 
[\[202b.3\]]'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos mngon du 'gyur ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul gyi don dang ldan par 'gyur ba'o/_/bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas thams cad la bsnyen bkur ba'i smon lam gyis sbyor ba'i snying po zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems 
[\[202b.4\]]dpa'i skye ba dang po'o/_/byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba gnyis pa'o/_/chos kyi tshul la nges par rtogs par gzhag pa'i sbyor ba'i tshul mngon du gyur pa 'byung ba'i snying 
[\[202b.5\]]po zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba gsum pa'o/_/dus gsum snang bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i snying po zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bzhi pa'o/_/kun nas snang ba'i 'od kyi snying po zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[202b.6\]]skye ba lnga pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rgyud du 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba drug pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs kyi 'od snang ba'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bdun pa'o/_/
[\[202b.7\]]ye shes kyi sgo kun nas rnam par dpyad pas yongs su 'grub pa 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba brgyad pa'o/_/chos kyi dbyings sprul pas brgyan par byed pa'i snying po zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba dgu pa'o/_/
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa yongs su gnon pa'i shugs drag po'i snying po zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bcu pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba dang po sangs rgyas thams cad la bsnyen bkur ba'i smon lam gyi sbyor 
[\[203a.2\]]ba'i snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' thog mar sangs rgyas mchod cing rim gror bya ba la 'jug ste/_de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_bsti stang dang /_mchod pa byed cing bsnyen bkur 
[\[203a.3\]]byed do/_/dgyes par byed la thugs byung par mi byed pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal blta bas mi ngoms pa sangs rgyas la rim gror bya bar brtson pa sangs rgyas la dga' ba'i shugs kyis rnam par spel ba'i shugs dang ldan pa/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[203a.4\]]pa mthong bas mos pa'i shugs drag po yongs su skyes pa/_de phyir mi ldog pa'i dad pas bsod nams yongs su sdud pa'i tshe/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i tshogs yongs su bsdu ba la brtson zhing sbyor ba rgyun mi gcod pa yin te/_
[\[203a.5\]]rigs kyi bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skye ba dang po/_sangs rgyas thams cad la bsnyen bkur ba'i smon lam gyi sbyor ba'i snying po zhes bya ba ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub pa yang dag par sdud par 'gyur ba'o/_/
[\[203a.6\]]rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba gnyis pa/_byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag yongs su grub par 'gyur ba 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems 
[\[203a.7\]]bskyed de/_'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir snying rje chen po'i sems dang /_shin tu dgyes par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur ba'i sems dang /_dngos po thams cad la phongs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtsi ba'i phyir/_sangs 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su btsal ba'i sems dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon du 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/_bsham pa chen po'i sems dang /_'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i sbyor bas rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir byams pa chen po'i sems dang /_
[\[203b.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go ca brtan par bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ba'i sems dang /_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa'i snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir g.yo dang sgyu med pa'i sems dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lam la 
[\[203b.3\]]nan tan du bya ba'i phyir kha 'og tu lus khrus pa'i sems dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam dang /_mi 'gal bar bya ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas thams cad la sku bslu ba med pa'i sems dang /_phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par sems can thams cad 
[\[203b.4\]]yongs su smyin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam chen po 'debs pa'i sems dang /_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag gi tshogs sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi yongs 
[\[203b.5\]]su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba gnyis pa/_byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'o/_/
[\[203b.6\]]rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba gsum pa chos kyi tshul la nges par gzhag pa'i sbyor ba'i tshul mngon du gyur pa 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos 
[\[203b.7\]]thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho yod do cog nges par rtogs pas mngon du bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam gyi rnam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bas mngon du bya bar gcig tu sems pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_kha na ma tho ba med 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]pa'i las la yang dag par spyad par sems pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba mngon du bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad la nan tan du bya bas 
[\[204a.2\]]yongs su grub par bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi rgyan thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshogs rgya chen po yongs su bsgrub pa bskal pa'i [{]mye [,]me [}]'bar bas kyang /_rgyun 
[\[204a.3\]]mi gcad par brtson par bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_'gro ba thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba la rab tu zhugs pas/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa kun tu bzang po mngon par bsgrub pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_yongs su spyod pa'i tshul thams cad la rab tu 
[\[204a.4\]]zhugs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la dngos po thams cad rnam par bsgom pas dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul la zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba gsum pa chos kyi tshul la nges 
[\[204a.5\]]par rtogs pas gzhag pa'i sbyor ba'i tshul mngon du gyur ba 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bzhi pa dus gsum snang bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la 
[\[204a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i dbyings la gya nom par yongs su dag pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la snang ba rab tu thob pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshul rgya mtsho la rab tu zhugs pa yin/_bsam pa brtan pa rdo rje'i khams lta bus 
[\[204a.7\]]yongs su zin pa'i sems dang ldan pas shin tu brtan pa yin/_srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud du skye ba las phyin phyogs su phyogs pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su grub par bya ba la mngon du gyur pa yin/_byang chub sems 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]dpa'i dbang po rnam par spel ba la khyad par du 'bogs pa rab tu thob pa yin/_lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu 'od gsal bar bya ba'i phyir sems shin tu dge ba yin/_smon lam brtan zhing rgya che ba rnam par 'phel bar bya ba la [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo ba yin/_sgrib pa thams cad 
[\[204b.2\]]kyi ri rnam par gtor ba'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par dgongs pa yin/_'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho bas mgon du gyur ba yin te/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bzhi pa 
[\[204b.3\]]dus gsum snang bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba lnga pa kun nas snang ba'i 'od kyi snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub 
[\[204b.4\]]sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba la rab tu zhugs pas sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa yin/_sbyin pa lhug par gtong bas dngos po'i 'du shes thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa yin/_tshul khrims mtha' yas pas 
[\[204b.5\]]mtha' las rgal bar rnam par dag pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la bzod pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la gnas pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa yin/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yangs par 'byung ba la 
[\[204b.6\]]zhugs pas brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa yin/_sgo kun tu lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pas bsam gtan la rab tu brtson pa yin/_chos snang ba thams cad rab tu thob pas shes rab kyi mthu'i 'od dang ldan pa yin/_
[\[204b.7\]]sangs rgyas blta ba rgya mtsho rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par bya ba la zhugs pas thogs pa med pa'i mig dang ldan pa yin/_'jig rten thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pas/_chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid la dbang bsgyur bas smos pa yin/_chos kyi tshul 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du thob par bya ba la rab tu brtson pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba lnga ba kun nas snang ba'i 'od kyi snying po zhes bya ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub 
[\[205a.2\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba drug pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rgyud du 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba yin/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[205a.3\]]pa'i rgyud du skyes pa yin/_tshul gyi sgo thams cad la shin tu grub pa yin/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi smon lam chen po rnam par dag pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[205a.4\]]la rang bzhin gcig pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bar gyur pa yin/_sangs rgyas thams cad dang lus gcig tu gyur pa yin/_chos dkar pos 'jig rten gzhan du 'gro ba yin/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs yongs su bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bdag 
[\[205a.5\]]nyid che ba'i chos kyis rnam par spyod pa yin/_dus la ji ltar bab pa bzhin du sems can rnam par dag par bya ba'i chos la zhugs pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su dris pa la spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems 
[\[205a.6\]]dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba drug pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rgyud du 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bdun pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs 
[\[205a.7\]]kyi 'od snang ba'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi stobs la 'jug pa'i snang bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba las phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog go_/byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rgya mtsho las phyir mi 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/chos thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam pa ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes par bya ba la gnas pas yongs su yi 'chad par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'jig rten thams cad rmi lam lta bur rab tu rtogs par byed do/_/gzugs su rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i gnas thams 
[\[205b.2\]]cad gzugs brnyan lta bur mngon par sgrub bo/_/mngon par shes pas rnam par 'phrul pa sprul pa lta bu la dbang rab tu thob par byed do/_/srid pa thams cad du skye ba grib ma lta bur gdong rab tu ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sgra brnyan 
[\[205b.3\]]lta bur rab tu shes so/_/thabs kyi tshul don sna tshogs dang ldan pa la rab tu brtson pas chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rab tu bstan pa la pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa thob pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bdun pa de 
[\[205b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs kyi 'od snang ba'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba brgyad pa ye shes kyi sgo kun nas rnam par dpyad pas yongs su 'grub pa 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba 
[\[205b.5\]]gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nur gyur cing byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa la rnam par gnas pa yin te/_de la gnas nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul la rnam par dpyod de/_ye shes kyi tshul gyi sgo re re la yang 
[\[205b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su ston pas bskal pa tshad med pa zad par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad la'ang pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pas dbang du 'gyur te/_sems kyi skad cig re re zhing sems kyi 
[\[205b.7\]]skad cig thams cad la yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zhabs kyi drung du skyes te/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa tha mi dad pas tha mi dad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go_/tha mi dad pa'i chos 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]rnams la tha dad pa'i ye shes kyi dbang yongs su ston to/_/[{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag kyang sgrib pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i dbyings su non par byed do/_/dmigs pa chung ngus kyang mtha' yas par bstan pa'i sa la yongs su 'jug go_/chos nyid tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[206a.2\]]pa yang chung ba'am/_che bar khong du chud par byed do/_/'jig rten thams cad kyang rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang mnyam par rab tu rtogs par byed do/_/chos kyi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa thams cad dang /_rnam par shes pa'i rgyud thams cad kyang bsgoms pas khong du chud par byed 
[\[206a.3\]]do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba brgyad pa ye shes kyi sgo kun nas rnam par dpyad pas yongs su 'grub pa 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub 
[\[206a.4\]]sems dpa'i skye ba dgu ba chos kyi dbyings sprul pas brgyan par byed pa'i snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi skad cig thams cad la rgyan sna tshogs dang /_rgyan du mar ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing byin gyis rlob 
[\[206a.5\]]ste/_sprul pa thams cad la mi 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa thob pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa thams cad la shin tu mkhas par gyur pa yin/_chos kyi sprul pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnam par dag pa yin/_chos kyi dbyings dam pa chags pa med pa'i 
[\[206a.6\]]spyod yul dang ldan pa yin/_bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi lus rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par bya ba'i byin gyi rlabs la mkhas pa yin/_sems can gdul ba la mkhas pa bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa dang ldan pa yin/_spyod pa sna tshogs kyi mngon par 
[\[206a.7\]]'tshang rgya ba yongs su ston pa yin/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sgrib pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa yin/_de'i rgyud kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la mkhas pa yongs su ston pa yin/_sems can mtha' dang dbus med pa gdul ba'i 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]thabs mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa yin/_rnam par snang mdzad kyi ye shes dbyig tu bya ba'i mdzod dang ldan pas sems can gdul ba'i dus la bab na rtag tu sta gon du gnas pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems 
[\[206b.2\]]dpa'i skye ba dgu pa chos kyi dbyings sprul pas brgyan pa byed pa'i snying po zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bcu pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa yongs su gnon pa'i shugs drag po'i snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_'di 
[\[206b.3\]]la byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_rang bzhin gcig pa'i yul la dbang bskur ba yin te/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'dab chags pa'i yul la rab tu 'jug pa yin/_sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi 
[\[206b.4\]]mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i shi 'pho dang /_skye ba'i sems rgyud chags par 'byung ba yang rab tu shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes 'dab chags pa'i yul yang rab tu shes so/_/'das pa dang ma byon pa dang de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas 
[\[206b.5\]]thams cad kyi mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'dab chags pa yang rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad kyi rgyud 'dab chags pa la mkhas par bya ba yang rab tu shes so/_/bskal pa 'jig pa dang 'du ba thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i 
[\[206b.6\]]mtha' dang da ltar byung ba rnams kyang [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang bcas/_sa tshigs dang bcas par 'dab chags par rab tu shes so/_/sems can tshul ji lta bur yongs su smyin par byas pa dang /_dus la gang du bab pa rnams la mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i 
[\[206b.7\]]rgyan dang /_rnam par 'tshang rgya bas gdul bar bya ba yongs su bstan pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes kyang mngon par sgrub bo/_/sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i drung du nye bar 'gro zhing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la mkhas 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]pa'i tshul 'dab chags pa yang /_sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa gdul ba'i thabs mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pas yongs su ston te/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bcu 
[\[207a.2\]]ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa yongs su gnon pa'i shugs drag po'i snying po zhes bya ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bcu rnams te/_de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams skye bar 'gyur ba'o/_/
[\[207a.3\]]'byung bar 'gyur ba'o/_/yang dag par sgrub par byed pa'o/_/yang dag par 'phel bar byed pa'o/_/rab tu rdzogs par byed pa'o/_/yongs su grub par byed pa'o/_/zhing ma lus pa thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir rgyan gcig gi lhab lhub la rgyan dang /_lhab lhub kyi rgyud rnam pa sna 
[\[207a.4\]]tshogs kyi byin gyis rlob pa'o/_/sems can gyi khams gdul ba rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par byin gyi rlabs kyis rgyun 'chad pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par byed pa'o/_/chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa sna tshogs dang /_shin 
[\[207a.5\]]tu bstan pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa sna tshogs du ma rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_chos mtha' yas pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rgyun mngon par 'tshang rgya bar byed pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa chos kyi dbyings kyis 
[\[207a.6\]]klas pa/_nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa yongs su ston pa'o/_/sems can tshad med pa spyod pa rgya mtsho sna tshogs dang ldan pa yongs su smyin par bya ba dang /_gdul bas yongs su 'dul ba rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yongs 
[\[207a.7\]]su bstan pa'o/_/sems can gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang mi 'bral bar byin gyis rlob pa'o/_/chos thams cad kyi sprin dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho brjod du med pas rnam par dag pa [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa thams cad las rab tu 'byung 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]ba rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par byed pa'o/_/tshad med par rnam par spyod pa la bsgribs pa med par rtogs pas khong du chud pa rnams chos yid du 'ong ba'i rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor bsam pa dang /_mos pa gang dang ldan pa'i 
[\[207b.2\]]tshul bzhin du sems can rnams la yongs su ston pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyis tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba rnams 'jig rten thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa'i don du chos kyi mdzod mtha' dang dbus med pa rab tu ston pa'o/_/de nas lum bi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha 
[\[207b.3\]]mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal gyis/_de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi don 'di nyid gsal bar brjod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 
[\[207b.4\]]tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_lhag pa'i bsam pa dri med rnyog pa med pa yis/_/gang rnams rgyal ba blta bas nam yang mi ngoms shing /_/rgyal ba kun gyi phyi ma'i mtha' yi rgyan sprin la/_/smon pa'i mkhas pa de dag skye ba'i thog ma gnas/_/dus 
[\[207b.5\]]gsum byung ba'i 'jig rten ma lus kun bkang ste/_/zhing dang sems can de bzhin chos dang sangs rgyas rnams/_/sems can dgrol phyir smon lam 'debs pas brgyan pa'i sems/_/de ni bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab rnams kyi skye ba gnyis/_/gang rnams 
[\[207b.6\]]chos kyi sprin 'thung nam yang mi ngoms shing /_/nges par rtogs pa'i yid kyis dus gsum chags med lus/_/mkha' dbyings dri med mnyam med sems kyi lus ldan pa/_/mtshungs pa med pa de ni de dag skye ba gsum/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa ri rab rdo rje mtshungs 
[\[207b.7\]]bstan pas/_/thams cad mkhyen tshul rgya mtshor rnam par 'jug byed cing /_/gang rnams snying rje chen po'i gang chen mtshor 'jug pa/_/de ni skyes bu khyu mchog rnams kyi skye ba bzhi/_/gang rnams byams pas phyogs bcu rgyas par yongs bkang zhing /_/
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]pha rol phyin pa dri med rgya mtsho mngon bsgrubs te/_/chos kyi 'od 'gyed 'gro ba yongs su smyin byed pa/_/de ni skyes bu chen po de dag skye ba lnga/_/chos kyi rang bzhin rab tu rtogs pas chags med sems/_/dus gsum dpe zla med pa'i 
[\[208a.2\]]sangs rgyas rigs byung zhing /_/gang rnams chos dbyings rgya mtsho'i tshul la 'jug byed pa/_/'di ni mkhas pa de dag skye ba yangs pa drug_/gang rnams chos lus yongs dag chags pa med pa'i sems/_/zhing rnams ma lus rang gi lus kyis dgang 
[\[208a.3\]]byas shing /_/sangs rgyas stobs rnams ma lus khong du chud rtogs pa/_/de ni mkhas pa rnams kyi skye ba bsam yas bdun/_/gang rnams ye shes rgya mtsho'i tshul la dbang ldan zhing /_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgo tshul rnam par dpyod byed la/_/ting 
[\[208a.4\]]'dzin kun tshul gang chen mtsho la yongs 'jug pa/_/de ni de bzhin nyid rten rnams kyi skye ba brgyad/_/gang rnams zhing kun 'byam klas yongs su sbyor byed cing /_/sems can thams cad yongs su smyin byed 'dul la rab brtson la/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[208a.5\]]rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan rnams rnam ston pa/_/de ni grags pa chen po rnams kyi skye ba dgu/_/gang rnams rgyal ba'i stobs rnams ji bzhin rab zhugs te/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i shugs drag yangs pa rnam spel cing /_gang rnams chos dbyings 
[\[208a.6\]]gzhi tshul tha dad chags med pa/_/de ni rgyal sras rnams kyi skye ba bcu yin no/_/rigs kyi bu skye ba bcu po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skye'o/_/de ltar na 'jig rten thams cad la snang bar byed pa yin no/_/
[\[208a.7\]]rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba bskal pa tshad med par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa thob pa'o/_/smras pa/_'phags ma byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba bskal 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]pa tshad med par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su bstan pa 'di'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi skye ba yongs su lta zhing /_nye bar 'gro ba'i smon 
[\[208b.2\]]lam yongs su grub pa ste/_rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi skye ba rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa la 'jug cing khong du chud pa ste/_'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba 
[\[208b.3\]]khong du chud par byed cing /_gling bzhi pa skul ba dang ldan pa'i 'dzam bu'i gling de'i lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba yongs su blta ba'i don du sngon gyi smon lam gyis skyes te/_da ltar kho mo 'di na byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba'i rjes 
[\[208b.4\]]su dran pa sgom zhing rnam par spyod do/_/de ltar kho mo 'di na gnas gnas te/_de phan chad lo brgya na bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi pho brang nas 'pho bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshe/_lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'dir sngon gyi ltas bcu byung bar gyur te/_bcu 
[\[208b.5\]]gang zhe na/_'di ltar lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams cad mthon dman med la/_ngam grog dang /_g.yang sa med cing mnyam par gnas par gyur ba 'di ni sngon gyi ltas dang po byung ba'o/_/yang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams cad gseg 
[\[208b.6\]]ma dang /_gyo mo med la sdom dum dang tsher ma dang bral te/_sa'i gzhi rdo rje las grub par gyur nas/_rin po che mang pos yongs su gang bar gnas par gyur pa 'di ni sngon gyi ltas gnyis pa byung ba'o/_/yang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams 
[\[208b.7\]]cad rin po che thams cad kyi shing dang sA la dang /_ta la'i phreng bas rnam par 'khrigs pas yongs su brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur pa 'di ni sngon gyi ltas gsum pa byung ba'o/_/yang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams cad lha rdzas las kyang 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]'das pa'i spos kyi myu gu kun nas 'thon pa dang /_phye ma thams cad kyi mdzod kun nas 'thon pa dang /_rgyal mtshan thams cad kyi sprin dang na bun yongs su byung ba dang /_spos kyi rin po che'i gzugs kyi shing drung kun 'khor te/_rgyan yongs 
[\[209a.2\]]su sbyangs par kun nas gnas par gyur pa 'di ni sngon gyi ltas bzhi pa byung ba'o/_/yang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams cad lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_lhab lhub sna tshogs kyis mdzod rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rgyas pa dang ldan par kun nas 
[\[209a.3\]]gnas par gyur pa 'di ni sngon gyi ltas lnga pa byung ba'o/_/yang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams cad kyi shing thams cad la nor bu rin po che dam pa'i mdzod mngon par grub par gyur ba 'di ni sngon gyi las drug pa byung ba'o/_/yang lum pi ni'i nags tshal 'di 
[\[209a.4\]]thams cad kyi pad+mo'i tshal thams cad du cha las skyes pa'i me tog thams cad kyang kha 'bus te/_sa'i gzhi las 'thon nas/_chu las mngon par 'phags par gnas pa 'di ni sngon gyi ltas bdun pa byung ba'o/_/yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i 
[\[209a.5\]]'dod pa la spyod pa dang /_gzugs la spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha'i lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_'jig rten gyi dbang po 
[\[209a.6\]]dang /_'gro ba'i dbang po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'di na thal mo sbyar cing 'khod par gyur te/_'di ni sngon gyi ltas brgyad pa byung ba'o/_/yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha'i bu mo'am/_klu'i 
[\[209a.7\]]bu mo'am/_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis mchod pa'i rnam pa thams cad lag na thogs shing blag 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]sha'i yal ga la mngon tu bltas te/_'dud cing phyag 'tshal bar 'khod par gyur ba 'di ni sngon gyi ltas dgu pa byung ba'o/_/yang phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku lte ba'i dkyil 'khor dag nas byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnam par 
[\[209b.2\]]'phrul pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i 'od zer mang po 'thon te/_lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams cad snang bar byas nas gnas par gyur te/_'od zer gyi sgo'i dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi skye bas rnam 
[\[209b.3\]]par 'phrul pa gzugs brnyan du gyur par snang ba dang /_thog ma bltam pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang bcas par byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dbyangs dang ldan par 'od zer gyi sgo'i dkyil 'khor de dag las 
[\[209b.4\]]sgrar 'thon cing grags par gyur pa 'di ni sngon gyi ltas bcu pa byung ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshe/_sngon gyi ltas bcu po de dag byung bar gyur te/_de byung bas 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[209b.5\]]'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar shes so/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo sngon gyi ltas bcu po de dag mthong bas kyang dga' ba'i shugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu thob bo/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang lha mo sgyu ma grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas nas byung ba'i tshe/_
[\[209b.6\]]lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'dir sngon gyi ltas snang ba chen po bcu byung bar gyur te/_de dag byung bas sems can tshad med pa rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyi snang bas dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar gyur to/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sa'i steng na 
[\[209b.7\]]gnas pa'i rin po che'i khang ba brtsegs pa thams cad du snang ba rab tu byung ngo /_/rin po che'i pad+mo kha ma bye ba kha 'bye bar gyur pa'i 'dab ma thams cad las snang ba rab tu byung ste/_bltam pa legs par bltam mo zhes bya ba'i sgra snyan pa yang de dag las byung bar 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]gyur to/_/phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis thog ma sems bskyed pa'i snang ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang /_lum pi ni'i nags tshal_'dir snang bar byas te mngon par shar to/_/phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[210a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad yongs su gnon pa'i snang ba rnam par 'phrul pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'dir byung ngo /_/phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su sgrub cing /_ye shes khong 
[\[210a.3\]]du chud_pa'i snang ba 'od ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'dir byung bar gyur to/_/phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams smon lam thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i ye shes snang ba'i 'od ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang lum bi ni'i nags 
[\[210a.4\]]tshal 'dir byung bar gyur to/_/phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams smon lam rgya chen po mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes snang ba'i 'od ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'dir byung bar gyur to/_/phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[210a.5\]]sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba dang /_gdul bar byed pa'i ye shes snang ba'i 'od ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'dir byung bar gyur to/_/phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyi ye shes 
[\[210a.6\]]khong du chud pa'i snang ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'dir byung bar gyur to/_/phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_skye ba dang mngon par 'byung ba dang /_byang chub tu rnam 
[\[210a.7\]]bar 'tshang rgya ba dang /_ye shes thugs su chud par mdzad pa'i snang ba'i 'od ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'dir byung bar gyur to/_/sngon gyi ltas snang ba chen po bcu po de dag rab tu byung bar gyur te/_de dag gis sems can mtha' 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]dang dbus [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems dang /_bsam pa'i mun pa thibs po thams cad kyang rab tu snang bar byas so/_/rigs kyi bu de la lha mo sgyu ma shing blag sha'i nags su phyin pa'i tshe/_'jig rten gyi dbang po 'dus pa thams cad dang /_'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i bu lha'i bu'i 
[\[210b.2\]]tshogs dang /_lha'i bu mo 'khor dang bcas te 'dus pa thams cad dang /_gzugs la spyod pa'i lha'i bu dri nga ba med pa thams cad dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po 'khor dang bcas te/_
[\[210b.3\]]tshogs pa byang chub sems dpa' la mchod par brtson pa thams cad kyi lus dang /_mchod pa'i tshogs thams cad kyang lha mo sgyu ma'i gzi brjid dang dpal dang kha dog dang gzugs kyis rab tu snang bar byas so/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[210b.4\]]'di na 'od gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang zil gyis mnan to/_/lha mo sgyu ma'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas byung ba'i 'od dang snang ba dag ni 'od gzhan gyis nyams par gyur ba med/_bsgribs par gyur pa med/_chod par gyur 
[\[210b.5\]]pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_thogs par gyur pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_des phyogs thams cad rgyas par bkang nas sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad dang /_byol song gi skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal thams cad dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad dang /_srid pa'i 
[\[210b.6\]]lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byas te/_lhag ge lham me lhang nger gnas par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa/_
[\[210b.7\]]lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba dang po'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe lha mo sgyu ma'i lus su stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di chud cing gzugs brnyan 'byung ba snang bar gyur pa des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]khams kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya'i 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyi rgyal po'i gnas ming sna tshogs dang ldan pa sha stag dang /_nags tshal gyi ming sna tshogs dang ldan pa sha stag dang /_shing drung rnam pa tha dad pa sha stag 
[\[211a.2\]]tu'ang lha mo sgyu ma phyin cing /_'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyis yongs su bskor te/_byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba la sta gon du sdod cing /_byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi ye shes kyi rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam pa 'di bzhin du snang 
[\[211a.3\]]bar gyur te/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba gnyis pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang lha mo sgyu ma'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re la yang sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod 
[\[211a.4\]]pa mnga' ba'i tshe/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig bsnyen bkur te/_rim gror mdzad pa dang /_bsti stang dang bkur stir mdzad de mchod pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su snang bar gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis chos 
[\[211a.5\]]ji snyed cig bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang ba spu'i bu ga de dag nas sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi yan lag dang ldan par ma lus par grags par gyur te/_dper na/_chu'i phor bu chung ngu 'am/_bser gyi rdul phra mo'am/_me long gi dkyil 'khor shin 
[\[211a.6\]]tu gsal ba'am/_chu shin tu dang ba la nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor gnyi zla dang /_gza' skar gyi tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa dang /_sprin gyi tshogs 'brug sgra zab mo 'byin pa can yang gzugs brnyan du gyur par snang ngo /_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du lha mo sgyu 
[\[211a.7\]]ma'i ba spu'i sgo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la'ang /_sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnams kyang yongs su snang /_chos bstan pa'i sgra thams cad kyang grags par gyur te/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]'phrul pa lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba gsum pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang lha mo sgyu ma'i lus thams cad dang /_ba spu'i sgo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang zhing ji snyed cig dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ji snyed cig dang /_
[\[211b.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa ji snyed cig dang /_'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud ji snyed cig dang /_'jig rten khams kyi ming du bya ba ji snyed cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad de/_zhing gi gzhi ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par
