[\[211b.3\]]gyur pa dang /_dbyibs ni ci 'dra ba dang /_rgyan ni ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyur pa dang /_lhun ni ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyur pa dang /_ri'i rgyan ni ji lta bu dag cig yod par gyur pa dang /_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_yul dang /_ljongs dang /_grong rdal gyi rgyan 
[\[211b.4\]]ni ji lta bu dag cig gnas gnas pa dang /_bza' shing gi ra ba dang /_mtsho dang /_lu ma dang /_rgya mtsho'i rgyan ni ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyur pa dang /_nam mkha' dang sprin gyi rgyan ni ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyur pa dang /_sems can gyi gnas ni ji lta bu zhig yod par gyur pa 
[\[211b.5\]]dang /_theg pa bstan pa ni gang dang yang ldan par gyur pa dang /_bskal pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang grangs ji snyed cig ces bya bar gyur pa dang /_sangs rgyas skye ba ni ji snyed cig byung bar gyur pa dang /_rnam par dag pa ni gang du 'du bar gyur pa dang /_sems can gyi tshe'i tshad ni ji tsam 
[\[211b.6\]]zhig dang ldan par gyur pa dang /_'jig rten gyi skye gnas ni gang du skyes par gyur pa dang /_sems can ji lta bu zhig dang 'grogs pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni ji lta bu zhig la brten brten pa dang /_dge ba'i chos ni ji lta bu zhig la brtson par spyod 
[\[211b.7\]]spyod pa dang /_chos kyi nan tan ni ji lta bu zhig la brtson par byas te/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod spyod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang yongs su snang bar gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i gnas brnyes nas/_sdon sku ni ji snyed 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]cig_/rnam par spyod pa ji lta bu zhig_/cha byad ni ji lta bu zhig_/longs su spyod pa ni ci dang ldan/_bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni ji lta bu zhig sku nyams su bzhes/_sku tshe'i rgyud ni ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyur te/_sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 
[\[212a.2\]]spyad par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas yongs su snang bar gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi skye gnas de dang /_de dag tu lha mo sgyu ma byang chub sems dpa'i yum du gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sku de dag 
[\[212a.3\]]thams cad kyang /_lha mo sgyu ma'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs brnyan byung bar gyur te/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa/_lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba bzhi pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan 
[\[212a.4\]]yang bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon sku ni ji snyed cig gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa dang /_kha dog ni ji lta bu zhig dbyibs ni ci 'dra ba zhig_/cha byad ni ji lta bu zhig_/da rod ni ji lta bu zhig_/longs spyod ni ci dang ldan/_bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 
[\[212a.5\]]ji lta bu zhig sku nyams su bzhes/_sku tshe'i rgyud ni ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang lha mo sgyu ma'i lus kyi ba spu'i sgo thams cad las gzugs brnyan du snang bar gyur te/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam 
[\[212a.6\]]par 'phrul pa lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba lnga pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe/_gtang bar dka' ba yongs su btang ste/_zhabs dang phyag yongs su btang ba'am/_
[\[212a.7\]]snyan dang shangs yongs su btang ba'am/_ljags dang tshems yongs su btang ba'am/_spyan dang dbu yongs su btang ba'am/_sha dang khrag yongs su btang ba'am/_rus pa dang rkang yongs su btang ba'am/_mkhal ma dang thugs yongs su 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]btang ba'am/_pags pa dang phri yongs su btang ba'am/_phyi nang gi dngos po yongs su btang ba'am/_sras po dang sras mo dang btsun mo yongs su btang ba'am/_sku yongs su btang ba'am/_longs spyod rin po che yongs su btang ba'am/_grong dang grong khyer 
[\[212b.2\]]dang ljongs dang /_yul dang khams dang /_rgyal po'i gnas yongs su btang ba'am/_nor dang 'bru dang mdzod dang bang ba yongs su btang ba'am/_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_baiDUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_gser dang /_dngul yongs su 
[\[212b.3\]]btang ba'am/_rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs yongs su btang ba'am/_mal cha yongs su btang ba'am/_khang pa dang gzhal med khang yongs su btang ba'am/_yo byad yongs su btang ba'am/_de ltar gtong ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sku gzugs 
[\[212b.4\]]dang /_rnam pa ji lta bur yongs su btang bar gyur pa dang /_len pa de dag kyang rnam pa ji ltu bus len par gyur pa dang /_sbyin pa'i dngos po rnam pa ji lta bu dag yongs su btang bar gyur pa dang /_yul gyi phyogs gang dag tu yongs su btang bar gyur 
[\[212b.5\]]pa dang /_de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor du gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /_lha mo sgyu ma'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad las gzugs brnyan du snang bar gyur to/_/slongs mo ba'i sgra de dag kyang grag par gyur te/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems 
[\[212b.6\]]dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba drug pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sngon gyi mtha'i rgyud du byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yum gyi sku nas bltams par gyur pa'i tshe/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang /_
[\[212b.7\]]lhab lhub ji snyed cig byung bar gyur pa dang /_sems can gyi rgyan rnam par phye ba dang /_bza' shing gi rgyan rnam par phye ba dang /_me tog dang bdug pa dang /_spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang /_na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang /_
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]ba dan gyi rgyan rnam par phye ba dang /_rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan rnam par phye ba dang /_rol mo dang glu dang /_bstod pa dang /_sil snyan gyi sgra ji snyed cig byung bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /_lha mo sgyu ma lum bi 
[\[213a.2\]]ni'i nags tshal du phyin pa'i tshe/_lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'dir yongs su byung bar gyur to/_/mngon par skyes so/_/'gro bas rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su yod par byung bar gyur te/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 
[\[213a.3\]]'phrul pa lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba bdun pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod lha'i dbang po thams cad kyi gnas kyi rgyan gyi longs spyod las yongs su 'das pa dang /_klu dang gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang lha ma yin dang /_
[\[213a.4\]]nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi'i dbang po thams cad kyi gnas kyi rgyan gyi longs spyod las 'das pa 'di lte ste/_rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i longs spyod dam/_rin po che'i rgyal po'i 
[\[213a.5\]]gzhal med khang gi longs spyod dam/_rin po che'i rgyal po'i dra ba'i longs spyod dam/_rin po che'i rgyal po'i 'bru'i longs spyod dam/_rin po che'i rgyal po'i gzugs kyi longs spyod dam/_rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi longs spyod dam/_spos kyi rgyal po thams cad kyi longs spyod dam/_
[\[213a.6\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa thams cad bzang zhing 'thun pa'i longs spyod kyang rung ste/_de dag thams cad lha mo sgyu ma'i rum nas ma 'dres par 'thon te/_lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'di yongs su brgyan cing kun nas gnas par gyur te/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub 
[\[213a.7\]]sems dpa' skye ba rnam par 'phrul pa lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba brgyad pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang lha mo sgyu ma'i lus las byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang /_sku gzugs dang sku mdog dang /_dbyibs 'dra ba mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan gyis 'dra bar brgyan pa dang /_'od 'dra ba dang /_'od zer 'dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa/_tshul dang 'gros stabs 'dra ba/_rtsal dang mthu 
[\[213b.2\]]'dra ba/_rnam par snang ba'i rnam par 'phrul ba 'thun pa/_'khor 'dra ba/_rgyan mtshungs pa mang po yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi legs pa rgya mtsho yongs su brjod cing 'thun par gyur te/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 
[\[213b.3\]]'phrul pa lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba dgu ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bltam par gyur pa'i dus la bab pa dang /_lha mo sgyu ma'i mdun du 'og gi rdo rje'i gzhi las sa chen po mngon par brtol te/_rin po che'i rgyal po 
[\[213b.4\]]pad+mo chen po rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyi dam pa zhes byang chub rin po che'i rgyal po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rdo rje chen po las grub pa/_rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i nang rim dang ldan pa/_ze ba'i rtse mo rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyis brgyan 
[\[213b.5\]]pa/_'dab ma'i phreng ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis brgyan cing shin tu rnam par phye ba/_lo ma'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i rgyal po sna tshogs kyis byas pa/_snying po mdzes pa rin po che yid bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa dang 
[\[213b.6\]]ldan pa/_ze ba'i phreng ba rnam par phye ba dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tshad med pa dang ldan pa/_rin po che'i rgyal po grangs med pa'i dra ba'i rgyan dang ldan pas yongs su yog pa/_rin po che'i rgyal po rdo rje mthu bo ches mi shigs pas lhun 
[\[213b.7\]]kun nas bkab pa/_lha'i ris thams cad kyis kun nas bskor ba/_klu'i dbang po thams cad kyis spos chu'i sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa/_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po thams cad kyis kun nas bskor cing lha rdzas kyi me tog snyim pa nas gtor ba/_
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]dri za'i dbang po thams cad kyis sngon gyi sangs rgyas la rim gror byas pa'i glu'i dbyangs snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i nga ro dang sbyar te bstod pa'i sprin gyis mngon par bstod pa/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po thams cad kyis nga rgyal dang rlom pa dang /_
[\[214a.2\]]dregs pa thams cad btang zhing shin tu btud de phyag bya ba/_nam mkha' lding gi dbang po thams cad kyis rin po che'i snam bu kun tu spyangs te/_nam mkha' kun nas brgyan par bya ba/_mi 'am ci'i dbang po thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan 
[\[214a.3\]]yongs su brjod cing rol mo dang glu'i dbyangs la brtson pa dang /_nyams rab tu bde bas kun nas blta ba/_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po thams cad kyis shin tu dga' ba dang /_mos pa skyes pas yongs su blta zhing sgra snyan pa phyung ste/_rgyan gyi sprin 
[\[214a.4\]]thams cad kyi char mngon par dbab pa byung bar gyur te/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba bcu pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa bcu po de dag 
[\[214a.5\]]lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byung bar gyur nas/_de'i rjes la byang chub sems dpa' 'od tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa mnga' ba/_blta na gtang [{]myi [,]mi [}]bra ba zhig lha mo sgyu ma'i rum nas bltam ste/_nam mkha'i dbyings rum nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[214a.6\]]shar ba lta/_sprin gyi tshogs rum nas glog gi phreng ba 'gyu ba lta/_ri chen po'i spo rum nas nyi ma shar ka'i sprin ko lta/_mun pa stug rum nas sgron ma chen po byung ba lta ste/_mngon par bltam par gyur to/_/de ltar byang chub 
[\[214a.7\]]sems dpa' lha mo sgyu ma'i lus las gzugs brnyan ltar bstan pa'i chos nyid dang /_rmi lam ltar bstan pa'i chos nyid dang /_sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i gzugs rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ltar bstan pa'i chos nyid dang /_'gro ba dang 'ong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]nyid dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa'i 'od rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa yongs su bstan pa'i chos nyid kyis mngon par 'byung ba yongs su bstan to/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo ni lum bu ni'i nags tshal 'di na gnas shing /_bcom ldan 
[\[214b.2\]]'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku tshe'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho la lta zhing khong du chud par byed de/_rigs kyi bu kho mo gling bzhi pa skal ba dang ldan pa 'di la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku tshe'i rnam par 'phrul pa la lta zhing khong du 
[\[214b.3\]]chud par bya bar gnas pa de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad kyi 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya thams cad na'ang /_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sku tshe'i rnam par 
[\[214b.4\]]'phrul pa bye ba phrag brgya la lta zhing khong du chud par byed do/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'dus pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rdul shin tu phra ba la 'jug 
[\[214b.5\]]pa'i ye shes kyis khong du chud pa dag tu yang sems kyi skad cig re re la sems kyis khong du chud par bya ba re res bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku tshe'i rnam par 'phrul pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la ltazhing khong 
[\[214b.6\]]du chud par byed do/_/de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams khongs su chud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag las sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer yang de dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba'i rnam par 
[\[214b.7\]]'phrul pa la lta zhing khong du chud par byed de/_tshul de lta bus sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re dag tu yang byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad la lta zhing /_
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]khong du chud par byed kyang /_rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad kyi rdul re re la zhing gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i mtha' rnyed par ma rung ngo /_/zhing thams cad kyi zhing re rer byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa 
[\[215a.2\]]yang mu rnyed par ma rung ngo /_/ji ltar kho mo 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i byang chub sems dpa' skye ba rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad la lta zhing khong du chud par byed pa/_de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa dang /_
[\[215a.3\]]rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad la'ang sems kyi skad cig re re'i sems kyi khong du chud par bya ba re re la/_byin gyi rlabs rgyun mi chad pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul ba thams cad la lta zhing khong du chud par byed do/_/
[\[215a.4\]]de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]lum bi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba 
[\[215a.5\]]bskal pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]par dmigs pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa 'di rnyed nas yun ji srid cig lags/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba'i rdul 
[\[215a.6\]]shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol de'i yang pha snga zhig tu 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas rin po che zhes bya bar bskal pa mnyam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu byung ba la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[215a.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang phyug gi yon tan gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas rin po che zhes bya ba der gling bzhi ba dbu ma rgyan sna tshogs kyi 'od ces bya ba byung ste/_gling bzhi pa de'i 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus su rgyal po'i gnas ri rab rnam 
[\[215b.2\]]par dag pa'i rgyan gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba byung ste/_rgyal po'i gnas der rgyal po rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i mig gi 'od ces bya ba byung ngo /_/rgyal po rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i mig gi 'od de la btsun mo rab tu dga' ba'i 'od la dbang bsgyur ba zhes bya 
[\[215b.3\]]ba mnga'o/_/rigs kyi bu dper na/_gling bzhi pa skal ba dang ldan pa 'di'i 'dzam bu'i gling du lha mo sgyu ma bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi yum du gyur pa de bzhin du de'i tshe/_de'i dus na gling bzhi pa rgyan sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi 'dzam bu'i gling 
[\[215b.4\]]du'ang rab tu dga' ba'i 'od la dbang bsgyur ba zhes bya ba yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug gi yon tan gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi yum du gyur te/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu bskal pa'i dang po la 
[\[215b.5\]]byung ste/_thog mar byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug gi yon tan gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi yum du gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i 'od la dbang bsgyur ba de byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i dus 
[\[215b.6\]]la bab pa dang /_bud med khrag khrig brgya stong phrag nyi shu dang lhan cig tu bza' shing gi ra ba chen po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gser gyi me tog ces bya ba der phyin te/_dbang phyug gi yon tan gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gzhon nu de yang byang chub 
[\[215b.7\]]sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas de ltar bltam mo/_de'i tshe bza' shing gi ra ba chen po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gser gyi me tog ces bya ba de'i dbus su pho brang brtsegs pa rin po che sna tshogs bzang po las 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]brtsegs pa zhes bya ba byung ste/_pho brang brtsegs pa de'i nang du shing 'dod pa thams cad 'byin pa'i yal ga la 'ju ste/_lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i 'od la dbang bsgyur ba las bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug gi yon 
[\[216a.2\]]tan gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan bltam mo/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bltam khar/_ma ma dri ma med pa skyed pa'i 'od ces bya ba sta gon du gnas gnas te/_byang chub sems dpa' de bltam par gyur ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi dbang po 
[\[216a.3\]]rnams kyis spos dri shin tu zhim pa'i spos chu'i bum pa/_me tog dri zhim zhing yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs mngon par 'thor bas sku bsil te/_de la tshul dang mthun pa'i mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab la grangs med pa mchog tu bya bas mchod nas ma ma dri ma med 
[\[216a.4\]]pa skyed pa'i 'od kyi pang du bzhag go_/ma ma des byang chub sems dpa' pang du blangs ma thag tu/_de'i mod la ma ma de dga' ba dang mos pa'i shugs chen po thob par gyur nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin yul kun tu lta ba zhes 
[\[216a.5\]]bya ba thob par gyur to/_/de thob par gyur ma thag tu des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bskal pa tshad med 
[\[216a.6\]]par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa 'di la'ang shin tu phra ba'i tshul gyis zhugs par gyur te/_de ni dper na/_ma'i mngal du zhugs ma thag pa'i rnam par shes pa lta bu'o/_/rnam 
[\[216a.7\]]par thar pa de thob par gyur pas kyang /_des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa/_yang dag par blta ba'i smon lam chen po yang mngon par bsgrubs so/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa'i ma ma dri ma med pas bskyed pa'i 'od ces bya ba byung bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na ni khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_kho mo ni de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i ma ma dri ma med pa skyed pa'i 'od ces bya bar gyur to/_/
[\[216b.2\]]rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na bud [{]myed [,]med [}]khrag khrig brgya stong phrag nyi shu byung bar gyur pa de dag gzhan dag cig yin pa tsam du sems na yang de ltar mi blta ste/_lha mo khrag khrig brgya stong phrag nyi shu po lum bi ni'i nags tshal na gnas 
[\[216b.3\]]pa kho mo'i 'khor du gyur pa 'di dag yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na dbang phyug gi yon tan gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gzhon nu'i yum rab tu dga' ba'i 'od la dbang bsgyur ba zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig 
[\[216b.4\]]yin pa tsam du sems na'ang de ltar mi blta ste/_lha mo sgyu ma 'di ni de'i tshe de'i dus na rab tu dga' ba'i 'od la dbang bsgyur ba zhes bya ba'i lha mor gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]
[\[216b.5\]]gi 'od ces bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na yang de ltar mi blta ste/_rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di ni de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'od ces bya bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo ni de phyin cad du bcom ldan 'das 
[\[216b.6\]]rnam par snang mdzad kyi byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho la lta zhing khong du chud par byed pa dang /_sems can rnam par 'dul ba'i khyu mchog gi mthus rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho la lta zhing khong du chud par byed pa dang /_skad 
[\[216b.7\]]cig thams cad du bral bar ma gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu kho mo ni mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho rdul shin tu phra ba 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]thams cad na yod pa la sems kyi skad cig thams cad du rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad las yongs su 'dal ba'i ye shes kyi mig gis lta zhing khong du chud par byed de/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba 
[\[217a.2\]]rgya mtsho dag kyang lta zhing khong du chud par byed la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho chen po dag la yang lta zhing khong du chud par byed pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[217a.3\]]kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho dang sems can rnam par gdul ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung bas/_rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho thams cad la'ang /_sems kyi skad cig thams cad du lta zhing khong du chud par byed do/_/ji 
[\[217a.4\]]ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir rdul shin tu phra ba 'byam klas pa thams cad gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug pas byang chub sems dpa' skye ba ma nor bar mngon du gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan la zhugs 
[\[217a.5\]]par gyur pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rdul shin tu phra ba 'byam klas pa thams cad kyi khongs su chud pa'i zhing rgya mtsho thams cad 
[\[217a.6\]]la'ang 'jug ste/_de dag tu'ang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa la 'jug go_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byang chub sems dpar gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnams kyang mngon du gyur par 
[\[217a.7\]]lta'o/_/de bzhin gshegs par gyur nas kyang mchod pa byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las kyang chos bstan pa nyan to/_/chos la yang gnyer ba'i chos kyi nan tan du byed do/_/de nas lum bi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal gyis de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bskal pa tshad med par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa 'di gsal bar bstan pa'i 
[\[217b.2\]]phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu'i rnam par bltas te/_tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/rim gro bskyed cing nga la gang 'dri ba/_/de dag bdag las rgyal ba'i sras nyon cig_/rgyal ba'i spyod yul blta dka' zhi ba ste/_/
[\[217b.3\]]rgyu dang rkyen gyi tshul gyis rnam par bstan/_/zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul phran rab snyed kyi/_/sngon gyi bskal pa bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab dran/_/bskal pa'i ming ni snga phyi mnyam zhes bya/_/de la rgyal ba bye ba brgyad cu byung /_/bskal ba'i dang por de bzhin 
[\[217b.4\]]gshegs byung ba/_/dbang phyug yon tan mi thub rgyal mtshan no/_/nags tshal dam pa gser mdog me tog tu/_/mgon po de 'khrungs dag gis mthong bar gyur/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]du dri [{]myed [,]med [}]skyed pa'i 'od ces bya/_/de yi ma ma mkhas par bdag gyur te/_/
[\[217b.5\]]bltam ma thag tu gser mdog dam pa'i 'od/_/'jig rten dbang pos bdag gi pang du bzhag_/gang zag dam pa pang du bzhag tshe yang /_/de yi spyi gtsug blta bar mi nus te/_/bsam yas de la g.yas dang g.yon du yang /_/bltas shing 
[\[217b.6\]]mtha' rnyed mthong bar ma gyur to/_/mtshan rab bzang pos de ni yongs su brgyan/_/dri med de sku blta na rab sdug ste/_/rin chen gzugs 'dra bdag gis mthong gyur nas/_/dga' ba'i shugs drag mtshungs [{]myed [,]med [}]rnam par 'phel/_/de yi 
[\[217b.7\]]yon tan dpag yas sems sems nas/_/kho mo'i bsod nams rgya mtsho dpag med 'phel/_/de yi rnam 'phrul rgya mtsho mthong gyur nas/_/rgya chen byang chub sems kyang skyes par gyur/_/rgyal ba'i legs pa rgya mtsho dga' smon nas/_/
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]smon lam rgya mtsho bdag gis rab tu bskyed/_/'byam klas zhing rnams thams cad rnam par sbyangs/_/ngan song lam rnams kun kyang rnam par bzlog_/zhing rnams 'byam klas kun gyi bde gshegs rnams/_/ma byon 
[\[218a.2\]]bsam gyis mi khyab mchod pa dang /_/sems can sdug bsngal rnam par dgrol ba'i phyir/_/smon lam rgya mtsho kho mos btab par gyur/_/mgon po de las bdag gis chos thos nas/_/rnam thar dam pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di yang thob/_/bskal pa 
[\[218a.3\]]zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul snyed du/_/spyad pa spyad de de yang rnam par sbyangs/_/de la mgon po ji snyed byung gyur pa/_/de dag ma lus bdag gis kun kyang mchod/_/rnam thar rgya mtsho 'di ni sbyong byed cing /_/de dag bstan pa kho mos yongs su bzung /_/zhing 
[\[218a.4\]]rnams bye ba'i rdul phran rab snyed kyi/_/stobs bcu mnga' ba ji snyed 'das byung ba/_/de dag chos kyi 'khor lo kho mos bzung /_/rnam thar dkyil 'khor 'di yang rab tu bsgoms/_/sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul phran ji snyed pa/_/rdul rtse 'byam klas kun 
[\[218a.5\]]la rnam par mthong /_/rdul phran re re la yang rgya mtsho'i zhing /_/sngon chad rgyal bas sbyangs pa rab tu mthong /_/zhing rnams 'byam klas de dag kun tu yang /_/mgon po thugs rgyud gcig la bsam yas pa'i/_/rnam 'phrul yangs pa yongs su ston 
[\[218a.6\]]mdzad cing /_/nags tshal mchog tu 'khrungs gyur bdag gis mthong /_/rgyal ba la la zhing rnams la la na/_/byang chub dam par 'tshang rgya thugs dgongs shing /_/dga' ldan 'jig rten nyid na bzhugs pa yang /_/zhing rnams bye ba bsam 
[\[218a.7\]]gyis mi khyab pa/_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i dbyings su rnam 'phrul pa/_/shin tu yangs pa skye ba'ang bdag gis mthong /_/na chung dam pa'i tshogs kyi dbus bzhugs shing /_/mgon po chos rnams ston pa'angade bzhin mthong /_/zhing rnams bye ba'i 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]rdul phran rab snyed kyi/_/dpa' bo sems kyi skad cig re re la/_/mngon par 'byung zhing shing rgyal drung gshegs dang /_/sangs rgyas spyod yul yangs pa ston pa mthong /_/zhing gcig rdul la bsam gyis mi khyab par/_/yul rnams gzhan dang gzhan 
[\[218b.2\]]dag ston mdzad pas/_/'gro rgyud sems can sdug bsngal sgrol mdzad cing /_/mi gtso rnam par 'tshang rgya bdag gis mthong /_/rdul phran re re'i rtse la mi zad pa'i/_/rang 'byung 'khor lo rab tu bskor mdzad cing /_/dbyangs rnams rgya mtsho mi zad 
[\[218b.3\]]sgrog mdzad pa/_/chos sprin rgya chen char 'bebs mdzad pa mthong /_/'gro ba kun la rnam pa du mar yang /_/skad cig re rer mya ngan 'das ston pa/_/zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul phran rab snyed kyi/_/sangs rgyas zhing gcig rdul las bdag gis 
[\[218b.4\]]mthong /_/rdul gcig bltas kyang zhing rnams rgya mtsho dang /_/rgyal ba 'byung ba ji snyed kun kyang mthong /_/tshe rabs kun tu lus mang khrag khrig gis/_/de dag mchod pa'i don du nye bar phyin/_/zhing tshul rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/
[\[218b.5\]]'gro rgyud mi zad ji snyed yod pa yi/_/'gro ba kun la mngon du kho mo ni/_/chos sprin yangs pa'i char yang rab tu 'bebs/_/rgyal sras kho mos bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/rnam thar dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di shes kyi/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag 
[\[218b.6\]]khrig bsam yas su/_/thams cad bstan pa kho mos nus re skan/_/rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bskal pa tshad med par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnam par 'phrul ba yongs su ston 
[\[218b.7\]]pa 'di shes par zad na/_kho mos byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi skad cig re re la bskal pa thams cad du zhugs pa'i mngal nas yongs su byung ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_chos kyi tshul thams cad nges par rtogs pa'i skye ba rab tu ston pa/_de bzhin 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa'i smon lam gyis bsam pa yongs su bskyed pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba la rab tu gzhol ba/_sems can thams cad kyi rigs dang rgyud kyi lam yongs 
[\[219a.2\]]su bstan pa la gzugs brnyan lta bur gyur pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du pad+mo'i nang nas skye ba 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba'i dus la mkhas pa/_sems can thams cad gdul ba la mngon par mos shing 
[\[219a.3\]]tsher skye bas rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa/_zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa'i sprin yongs su ston pa/_'gro ba thams cad kyi lam gyi rgyud du skye ba dang /_rigs su gzugs brnyan byung bar gyur pa de dag gi spyod pa shes 
[\[219a.4\]]pa'am/_yon tan brjod par nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas 'di na shAkya'i bu mo go ba zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba'i phyir/_
[\[219a.5\]]'khor ba na 'khor bar bya ba dris shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]lum bi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal gyi rkang ba gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_lum bi ni'i nags tshal 
[\[219a.6\]]gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/_/lum bi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal gyi drung nas song ngo //_//
[\[219a.7\]]sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po bcu bzhi ba/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]lum bi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal gyi drung nas song ste/_grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]gang na ba der phyin nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bskal pa tshad med par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa de nyid bsgom pa dang /_khong du chud par bya ba dang /_rgya cher bya ba dang /_
[\[219b.2\]]nan tan du bya ba dang /_shin tu sbyang ba dang /_yongs su bsam pa dang /_rnam par dbye ba byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'gro ba'i khang ba chos kyi dbyings rab tu snang ba'i 'od gang na ba der song ngo /_/der 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems 
[\[219b.3\]]dpa' yongs su bgro ba'i khang pa'i lha mo mya ngan [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i dpal zhes bya ba de la khyim gyi lha mo stong phrag bcu dang bcas bsu nas/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/skyes bu chen po shes rab dang /_ye shes chen pos rnam 
[\[219b.4\]]par gnon pa byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa sgom pa la lhag par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i smon lam gyi sems dang ldan pa/_chos yangs pa'i gzhal med khang gi spyod yul la spyod pa/_chos kyi grong khyer du mngon par gzhol ba/_
[\[219b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa'i thabs kyi tshul mtha' yas pas sems can 'dul ba la 'jug pa rgyun mi gcod pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho snang ba rab tu thob pa/_'gro ba thams cad rnam par gdul pa la rab tu snang ba'i spobs pa dang /_
[\[219b.6\]]ye shes mngon du gyur ba sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa shes pa'i lus kyis 'gro zhing rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i spyod pa la mngon du gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_'gro ba thams cad kyi sems kyi dga' ba rgya mtsho'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i smon 
[\[219b.7\]]lam dang ldan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos khong du chud par bya ba'i lam du zhugs pa/_khyod byon pa legs so/_/mig phyir glan pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas spyod pa dang /_spyod lam zab cing rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul can khyod la bltas na/_
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]khyod ni ring po [{]myi [,]mi [}]thogs par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs kyi rgyan rnam par dag pa bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rab tu thob ste/_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rab tu brgyan pa'i lus dang stobs bcu'i ye shes snang bas 
[\[220a.2\]]brgyan pa'i sems kyis 'jig rten du rnam par spyod par 'gyur ro/_/khyod kyi brtson 'grus dang rnam par gnon pa la bltas na/_khyod ni ring po mi thogs par dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du gyur bar mthong ba dang ldan zhing /_de bzhin 
[\[220a.3\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa'i chos zhi ba dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang gi dga' ba myong ba dang /_sangs 
[\[220a.4\]]rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa zab mor chud par 'gyur ro/_/de yang de ltar khyod dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang /_blta ba dang bsnyen bkur ba dang /_gdams ngag ma nor bar blang ba dang /_de'i yon tan la nan tan du bya ba'i tshul la brtson 
[\[220a.5\]]par byed pas yongs su mi skyo/_phyir mi ldog_/sgyid lug par mi 'gyur te/_khyod la bgegs sam/_bar du gcod pa'am/_sgrib pa gang gis kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]tshugs te/_bdud dam bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha rnams kyang mdun na gnas pa med pas 
[\[220a.6\]]de'i phyir khyod ni ring por mi thogs par sems can thams cad dga' bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'gro ba'i khang pa'i lha mo mya ngan med pa'i dpal la 'di skad 
[\[220a.7\]]ces smras so/_/lha mo khyod kyis ji skad du smras pa de ltar 'gyur ro/_/lha mo kho bo ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rnam par zhi bas dga' bar 'gyur te/_sems can thams cad kyi las nyam nga ba'i rnam par smyin pa'i phyir 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]ldog pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi bde ba 'grub pa dang /_sems can thams cad kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las la nan tan tu byed pas dga' ba dam pa nyams su tshor bar 'gyur ro/_/nam sems can de dag las dang nyon mongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[220b.2\]]bde ba'i sbyor bas sems rnam par 'khrugs shing ngan song du ltung bar 'gyur ba'am/_bde ba'i rgyud na gnas kyang lus dang sems kyi sdug bsngal dang yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba sna tshogs nyams su myong bar gyur cing /_mi dga' bar gnas pa de'i tshe/_byang chub sems 
[\[220b.3\]]dpa' rnams kyang shin tu yid mi bde bar 'gyur ro/_/lha mo 'di lta ste/_dper na/_mi shin tu ngang gis byams pa zhig la bu gcig pa sdug cing yid du 'ong ba zhig bdog par gyur la/_de'i yan lag dang nying lag bcad pa zhig mthong na shin tu ngang gis 
[\[220b.4\]]byams pa'i phyir rab tu yid mi bde zhing [{]myi [,]mi [}]dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/lha mo de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe 'ang sems can rnams las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis ngan song gsum gyi rgyud du lhung ba zhig 
[\[220b.5\]]mthong na rab tu mi dga' la shin tu nyams mi bde bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe sems can rnams lus dang ngag dang yid kyis legs par spyad pa yang dag par len pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas bde ba'i rgyud mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar gyur tam/_
[\[220b.6\]]lha dang mi'i lam gyi rgyud du lus dang sems kyi bde ba nyams su myong ba zhig tu gyur na/_de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' shin tu bde ba dang ldan zhing /_nyams bde ba dang yid dga' ba dang /_rab tu spro ba dang /_dga' ba'i yid nyams su bde ba dang ldan 
[\[220b.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/lha mo byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag gi don gyi phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon cing don du gnyer ba ma yin te/_'khor ba'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba sna tshogs nyams su myong bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin/_'dod pa'i 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]khams su gtogs pa'i dga' ba rnam pa tha dad par sna tshogs don du gnyer bas ma yin/_'du shes dang sems dang lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur ba'i dbang gis ma yin/_kun tu sbyor ba dang /_'ching ba dang /_bag la nyal ba 
[\[221a.2\]]dang /_kun nas 'khor ba'i dbang du gyur pas ma yin/_sred pa dang lta ba'i dbang du gyur pas ma yin/_sems can sna tshogs dang 'du zhing 'dzi ba'i dga' ba'i 'du shes kyis sems rnam par 'phel bas ma yin/_bsam gtan gyi dga' ba dang 
[\[221a.3\]]bde ba myong ba yongs su chags pas ma yin/_sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs shing 'khor ba'i rgyud na 'gro ldog pa ma yin gyi/_lha mo byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho na 'khod cing /_sdug bsngal dpag tu 
[\[221a.4\]{]myed [,]med [}]pas shin tu mnar ba rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed cing /_'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrubs te/_de dag snying rje chen pos smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i shugs kyis sems can yongs su 
[\[221a.5\]]smyin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba la brtson zhing 'khor ba na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par snang ngo /_/de dag ni sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i don du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sgrib pa med pa yongs 
[\[221a.6\]]su tshol zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur ba'i smon lam mngon par sgrub bo/_/de dag de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i smon lam gyi dbang gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas yongs su skyo ba [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[221a.7\]]de/_de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i zhing mthong na/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par sgrub bo/_/kun nas nyon mongs pa'i zhing yongs su sbyong 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]zhing sems can thams cad kyi skye mched sna tshogs mthong bar gyur pa'i tshe/_chos kyi sku tha dad pa med cing bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir smon lam mngon par sgrub bo/_/sems can rnams kyi lus dang ngag dang sems kun nas nyon mongs pa 
[\[221b.2\]]dang ldan par mthong na/_sems can thams cad kyi lus dang /_ngag dang /_sems kyi rgyan yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir smon lam mngon par sgrub bo/_/sems can skye mched ma tshang ba dang /_sems yongs su ma dag pa mthong na/_sems 
[\[221b.3\]]can thams cad kyi sems dang /_spyod pa yongs su sbyong zhing byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod pas yongs su skyo ba med do/_/lha mo de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni yongs su skyo ba med pa'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod 
[\[221b.4\]]pa mtha' dang dbus med pa la spyod de/_de ltar spyod pa ni lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa yongs su bskyed pas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyan du gyur pa yin/_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la rab tu 'god pa'i phyir pha dang mar gyur pa yin/_
[\[221b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa'i lam du 'dzud pas ma ma lta bur gyur pa yin/_ngan song gi g.yang sa'i 'jigs pa las bsrung ba'i phyir lhan cig skyes pa'i lha rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba lta bur gyur pa yin/_'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol ba'i phyir mnyan pa chen po 
[\[221b.6\]]lta bur gyur pa yin/_bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir skyabs su gyur pa yin/_shin tu bsil ba'i rang bzhin nye bar stobs pas gnas su gyur pa yin/_sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad du 'jug par byed pas 
[\[221b.7\]]mu stegs su gyur pa yin/_chos rin po che'i gling du skyel bas mgon byed par gyur pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyi me tog gis sems yongs su rgyas par byed pas me tog tu gyur pa yin/_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi 'od yangs 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]pa rab tu 'gyed pas rgyan du gyur pa yin/_kun nas mdzes pas dga' ba dang bde ba dam pa byed pa yin/_kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las la nan tan tu byed pas phrad na legs pa yin/_yan lag dam pa rnam pa thams cad du yongs 
[\[222a.2\]]su tshang ba'i lus dang ldan pas kun tu bzang ba yin/_blta na [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthun pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas gtang mi bra ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa yin/_ye shes kyi 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i phyir 'od byed pa yin/_chos kyi sgron ma 'dzin pa'i phyir snang ba byed pa yin/_byang 
[\[222a.3\]]chub kyi bsam pa yongs su dag par byed pa'i phyir gsal bar byed pa yin/_bdud kyi las rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir dmag dpon du gyur ba yin/_shes rab kyi 'od gzer gyi dra ba rab tu snang ba 'gyed pa'i phyir nyi mar gyur pa yin/_chos kyi nam 
[\[222a.4\]]mkha' la blo'i zla ba 'char bar byed pas zla bar gyur pa yin/_'gro ba thams cad du chos kyi sprin chen po'i char 'babs pas sprin du gyur pa yin te/_lha mo de ltar nan tan du byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad 
[\[222a.5\]]kyi yid du 'ong ba yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bgro ba'i khang pa'i lha mo mya ngan med pa'i dpal khyim gyi lha mo stong phrag bcu dang bcas pas/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i me tog dang /_
[\[222a.6\]]phreng ba dang /_bdug spos dang /_phye ma dang /_byug pa dang /_rin po che'i rgyan gyi char yid kyi rang bzhin mngon par phab ste/_kun nas bskor cing rjes su 'brangs nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i khang par 'gro ba'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag 
[\[222a.7\]]gis mngon par bstod do/_/byang chub rdzogs par thugs bskyed cing /_/sems can kun la thugs brtse bas/_/rgyal ba ye shes nyi ma rnams/_/bar 'ga' zhig na 'jig rten 'byung /_/bskal pa bye ba mang pos kyang /_/khyod kyi zhal 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]mthong shin tu dka'/_/'jig rten ma rig mdongs pa la/_/khyod kyi ye shes gnyi chen yin/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]shes rab rib bsgribs pa yi/_/'jig rten phyin ci log gzigs nas/_/thugs rje chen po rab bskyed de/_/khyod ni rang byung nyid du zhugs/_/khyod kyi dgongs 
[\[222b.2\]]pa rnam dag pas/_/sangs rgyas byang chub don du brtson/_/dge bshes bsnyen bkur bsten mdzad cing /_/lus srog phangs par mdzad mi mnga'/_/khyod ni 'jig rten rten mi mnga'/_/'du 'dzi mi mnga' gnas mi mnga'/_/'dres pa ma 
[\[222b.3\]]mchis mi rten pas/_/dgongs pa thogs med nam mkha' bzhin/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyod mdzad cing /_/bsod nams dkyil 'khor 'od bzang bas/_/ye shes sgron ma rab 'gyed pa/_/'jig rten tshad med kun tu 'char/_/
[\[222b.4\]]'jig rten nas kyang 'phags mi mdzad/_/'jig rten chos kyis yong [{]myi [,]mi [}]'go/_/chags pa med par 'jig rten spyod/_/mkha' la ser bu ji bzhin no/_/bskal pa'i me 'bar me bzhin du/_/rtag tu 'bar bas rab tu brtson/_/me lta bu yi 
[\[222b.5\]]brtson 'grus kyis/_/byang chub spyad pa spyod par mdzad/_/seng ge bzhin du shin tu dpa'/_/brtson 'grus rnam par gnon pa brtan/_/ye shes rnam par gnon dang ldan/_/gzhan gyis thub pa med par spyod/_/chos dbyings rgya mtsho 'di 
[\[222b.6\]]dag na/_/rgya mtsho'i tshul rnams ji snyed pa/_/der yang dge bshes bsnyen bkur bas/_/dpa' bo khyod ni 'jug par 'gyur/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bgro ba'i khang pa'i lha mo mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/_tshong 
[\[222b.7\]]dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod de/_de 'gro ba'i phyi bzhin chos 'dod pa'i don du 'brang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bgro ba'i khang pa chos 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]kyi dbyings rab tu snang ba'i 'od du phyin te/_nang du song nas shAkya'i bu mo go ba mthong bar 'dod de kun tu bltas na shAkya'i bu mo go pa byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bgro ba'i khang pa chos kyi dbyings rab tu snang ba'i 'od kyi 
[\[223a.2\]]dbus na/_stan rin po che byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gnas snang bar byed pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi pad+mo'i snying po can zhig la bud med rgyal po'i rigs su byung ba/_sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i skal ba mnyam pa/_
[\[223a.3\]]sngon sbyin pa'i yongs su bsdu bas shin tu bsdus pa/_tshig snyan cing 'jam par smra ba'i ngang tshul dang ldan pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du/_don mngon du bya bas shin tu bsdus pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par 
[\[223a.4\]]bsgrub pa la don mthun pas shin tu bzung ba/_snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas bu dang bu mo yongs su gzung ba'i tshul bcangs pa/_byams pa chen po dang ldan pa'i rang gi khyim thab kyi rjes su 'brang ba yongs su dag par byas pa/_sngon byang 
[\[223a.5\]]chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa/_bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pas yongs su smyin par byas pa/_stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i 'khor gyis kun nas bskor cing 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/bud med stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag kyang bla na med pa 
[\[223a.6\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la zhugs pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa/_chags pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_'khor 
[\[223a.7\]]ba'i dga' ba thams cad kyis skyo ba'i yid dang ldan pa/_chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul chags pa med pas yongs su dag pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon du bya ba'i sems kyi shugs dang ldan pa/_sgrib pa dang bar du gcod pa'i dra ba dang bral ba/_chags 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]pa'i lam thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/_chos kyi sku la legs par sprul pas rnam par spyod pa/_'jig rten thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba la mngon par phyogs pa/_bsod nams rgya mtsho dri ma med pas yongs su byung ba'i 
[\[223b.2\]]sems dang ldan pa/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /_smon lam gyis shin tu byung ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi shugs yangs pas ye shes kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis sems rab tu snang ba yang dag par bskyed pa sha 
[\[223b.3\]]stag go_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]shAkya'i bu mo go pa gang na ba der phyin nas/_shAkya'i bu mo go pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_langs nas mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma 
[\[223b.4\]]bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'khor ba na yongs su 'khor yang 'khor ba'i skyon gyis mi gos pa dang /_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yang khong du chud la nyan 
[\[223b.5\]]thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang mi gnas pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba yang rab tu thob la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang rgyun mi gcod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa la yang rab tu gnas la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[223b.6\]]yul yang yongs su ston pa dang /_'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad las kyang yongs su 'das la/_'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad du yang nye bar spyod pa dang /_chos kyi lus yongs su grub pa dang ldan yang /_gzugs kyi 
[\[223b.7\]]lus kha dog mtha' yas pa'ang mngon par sgrub pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i chos kyi sku la yang rab tu gzhol la 'gro ba thams cad kyi kha dog dang dbyibs kyi lus kyang yongs su ston pa dang /_chos thams cad brjod du ma mchis par 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]yang rab tu rtogs la/_ngag gi lam dang nges pa'i tshig thams cad brjod pas kyang /_sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /_sems can thams cad sems can med par yang rab tu shes la/_
[\[224a.2\]]sems can gyi khams gdul ba'i tshul las kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa dang /_chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang /_ma 'gags par yang khong du chud la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i sbyor ba las kyang phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[224a.3\]]ldog pa dang /_chos thams cad la las dang rnam par smyin pa ma mchis par yang rtogs la/_dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba'i sbyor ba las kyang /_phyir mi ldog pa ma 'tshal to/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_shAkya'i bu mo go pas 
[\[224a.4\]]tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i chos nyid rnam pa de lta bus dri bar sems pa legs so legs so/_/dri ba brjod pa de dag kyang kun tu bzang po'i 
[\[224a.5\]]smon lam dang spyod pa la mngon du gyur pa'i tshig go_/rigs kyi bu de bas na legs par nyon la shin tu yid la zung shig dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bstan par bya'o/_rigs kyi bu/_chos bcu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[224a.6\]]rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu mig 'phrul gyi gzhi'i dpe dang 'dra ba/_ye shes kyi 'od kun tu 'byung ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen rlabs po che la brten pa dang /_
[\[224a.7\]]mos pa rgya chen po rab tu thob pa dang /_dge ba'i bsam pa rlabs po che rnam par dag pa dang /_bsod nams dang ye shes rgya mtsho yangs pas rab tu brtan pa'i sems dang /_sangs rgyas skye ba 'byung ba'i chos bstan pa chen po thos pa rab tu 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]thob pa dang /_dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa la mos pa'i sems kyis gnas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs rab tu 
[\[224b.2\]]thob pa dang /_rang bzhin gyis snying rje chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang /_'khor ba'i 'khor lo thams cad rab tu gcad rab tu gcad pa'i sems kyi stobs shugs drag po dang ldan pa rab tu thob pa ste/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub 
[\[224b.3\]]sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu mig 'phrul gyi gzhi'i dpe dang 'dra ba 'od kun tu 'byung ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu de la brtson 'grus phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos de dag thob 
[\[224b.4\]]par gyur nas kyang mi zad pa'i tshul du mngon par sgrub cing /_bsgom pa dang shin tu rgya che bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur cing rnam pa bcus mngon par dga' bar byed do/_/bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_lus dang srog la phongs par 
[\[224b.5\]]mi rtsi ba dang /_'khor ba'i yo byad don du mi gnyer ba dang /_chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i smon lam las phyir mi ldog pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad la rnam par lta ba dang /_
[\[224b.6\]]srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa'i yid dang /_gnas med pa'i chos kyi nam mkha' la mi gnas mi rten pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam la bsgribs pa med pa dang /_zhing rgya mtsho thams cad du rab tu 'dul ba 
[\[224b.7\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bsgribs pa med pa shin tu sbyangs ba ste/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur cing mngon par dga' bar byed do/_/de nas shAkya'i bu mo 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]go pas don de nyid yongs su bstan par bya ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis phyogs bcur bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/rlabs chen dri med blo ldan gzhan gyi don zhugs shing /_dge bshes dam pa 
[\[225a.2\]]bsnyen brtson g.yo dang sgyu med pa/_/ston pa'i 'du shes thob cing skyo med brtson 'grus can/_/de dag spyod pa 'jig rten mig 'phrul 'dra 'di yin/_/gang rnams mos pa rlabs chen mkha' dang 'dra ldan zhing /_/de'i khongs su dus gsum 'jig 
[\[225a.3\]]rten chud pa dang /_/zhing dang sems can chos dang sangs rgyas de bzhin pa/_/ye shes 'od byed spyod pa de dag 'di yin no/_/gang rnams bsam pa mkha' 'dra mtha' dang dbus med la/_/kun nas nyon mongs dri mas ma gos rab dag cing /_/de 
[\[225a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi yon tan 'byung gyur pa/_/de dag spyod pa mig 'phrul gzhi yi rnam pa 'dra/_/kun mkhyen ye shes rnam yangs tshad med bsam yas dag_/yon tan rgya mtshos yid gsal ldan pa nyer brtan pa/_/de dag bsod nams 
[\[225a.5\]]rgya mtsho'i lus dang snying po ste/_/'jig rten spyod kyang 'jig rten dri mas gos mi 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i gsung gi yan lag sgra skad tshul kun gyis/_/chos kyi 'brug sgra nyan kyang gang rnams mi ngoms shing /_/chos tshul rjes su snyegs pa'i shes rab 
[\[225a.6\]]'od kyi sgron/_/de dag 'gro bar 'od gsal byed pa'i spyod 'di yin/_/gang rnams phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa/_/gzhan dang gzhan dag sems kyi skad cig kun sems shing /_/bde gshegs rgya mtsho thams cad lta zhing shes 
[\[225a.7\]]byed pa/_/sangs rgyas sems ldan de dag spyod yul 'di yin no/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi rnam par yangs pa'i 'khor mthong zhing /_/de dag ting nge 'dzin tshul rgya mtsho mang po dang /_/smon lam rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med tshul 'jug pa/_/mig 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]'phrul lta bu de dag spyod pa 'di yin no/_/phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba ma lus kun gyis byin brlabs te/_/phyi mtha'i bskal bar spyod byed kun tu bzang po rnams/_/zhing rnams 'byam klas kun tu gzugs brnyan byung gyur ba/_/chos 'od byed pa de dag spyod pa 'di yin 
[\[225b.2\]]no/_/gang rnams ye shes nyi ma'i snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can/_/'gro ba nyam nyes mthong zhing chos kyi 'od snang bas/_/'gro ba'i mun pa bstsal cing bstan pa 'char 'byung ba/_/nyi ma lta bur de dag spyod pa 'di yin no/_/skye dgu srid pa'i rgyud na 'gro ldog mthong 
[\[225b.3\]]gyur nas/_/yid gsal 'khor ba'i rgyud rnams phyir zlog rab gnas shing /_/chos kyi 'khor lo kun nas yongs su sgrub byed pa/_/spyod pa kun bzang dam pa'i blo can rab tu spyod/_/tshul 'dir bslabs pa de dag mtha' dang dbus [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i/_/lus 
[\[225b.4\]]rnams bsam pa ji bzhin 'gro bar nyer bstan te/_/gzugs brnyan mig yor 'dra ba'i rang lus tshad med pas/_/srid pa'i rgya mtsho dag na 'gro mang yongs sbyin byed/_/byams tshul shin tu yangs pas 'gro mang rgyas bkang ste/_/mos pa sna 
[\[225b.5\]]tshogs 'gro la rnam par spyod bstan nas/_/'gro bar bsam pa ji bzhin chos kyi char 'bebs shing /_/brtan pa byang chub don du sems can khrag khrig 'dul/_/de nas shAkya'i bu mo go bas tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor 
[\[225b.6\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i tshul thams cad la rnam par blta ba'i yul thob pa'o/_/nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]smras pa/_'phags 
[\[225b.7\]]ma byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i tshul la rnam par lta ba'i yul de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba 'di la snyoms par 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]zhugs na/_'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mthong zhing khong du chud do/_/bskal pa de dag gi sems can lam gyi rgyud thams cad du gtogs pa ji 
[\[226a.2\]]snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/sems can de dag gi shi 'pho dang skye ba'i sgo ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/mngon par 'grub pa'i sgo ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_las mngon par 'du byed pa yongs su sgrub pa ji 
[\[226a.3\]]snyed cig yod pa dang /_las rnam par smyin pa sna tshogs ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/de dag gi las yongs su blangs pa dge ba yang rab tu shes so/_/mi dge ba dang 'byung ba dang mi 'byung ba dang /_nges pa dang ma nges pa dang /_
[\[226a.4\]]log par nges pa dang /_bag la nyal ba dang bcas pa dang /_bag la nyal ba med pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba rgud par gyur ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su zin pa dang /_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su zin pa dang /_
[\[226a.5\]]dge ba dang mi dge ba yongs su zin pa dang /_de dag gi dge ba'i chos yongs su 'das pa dang /_sdig to'i chos yongs su 'dus pa'i las yongs su blangs pa yang rab tu shes so/_/bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba 
[\[226a.6\]]snyed po de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig byung ba de dag gi mtshan rgya mtsho yang shes shing khong du chud do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 
[\[226a.7\]]zhugs pa'i tshul rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so/_/smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par bsgrubs pa yang rab tu shes so/_/sngon gyi sangs rgyas byung ba rnams kyi drung du gshegs pa rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so/_/sngon gyi sangs rgyas la mchod cing rim 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]gror mdzad pa'i sbyor ba rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so/_/sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so/_/'byung ba'i rgyan rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 
[\[226b.2\]]sems can yongs su smyin par mdzad pa dang /_btul ba rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so/_/mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mdzad pa rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu dang rnam par 'phrul pa yang rab tu shes so/_/
[\[226b.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyang rab tu shes so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag na nyan thos ji snyed cig 'khod pa 
[\[226b.4\]]de dag gi 'byung ba'i tshul yang rab tu shes so/_/sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang rab tu shes so/_/lam bsgoms pa sna tshogs kyang rab tu shes so/_/ye shes thob par bya ba phun sum tshogs shing rnam par dag pa'i bye brag kyang rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin 
[\[226b.5\]]gshegs pa de dag gis sems can ji snyed cig rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la bkod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/rang sangs rgyas de dag gi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/rang sangs rgyas de dag gis rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 
[\[226b.6\]]khong du chud pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/rang sangs rgyas de dag gi zhi ba'i rnam par spyod pa la rnam par rtse ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/rang sangs rgyas de dag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam 
[\[226b.7\]]par 'phrul pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/rang sangs rgyas de dag gis sems can ji snyed cig yongs su smyin par byas pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/rang sangs rgyas de dag gi chos bstan pa ji snyed cig brjod pa de dag kyang 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]rab tu shes so/_/rang sangs rgyas de dag gi ting nge 'dzin mtha' yas pa la rnam par spyod cing rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rnam par brtse ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[227a.2\]]'das de dag gi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ji snyed pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ji snyed pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' de 
[\[227a.3\]]dag gis thog ma dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/thog ma sems bskyed pa'i smon lam dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas 'byung ba'i rgyan thams cad 
[\[227a.4\]]mngon par bsgrub pa rnam pa tha dad pa rab tu shes so/_/pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi yan lag gi tshogs rnam par dag par bya ba rnam pa tha dad pa yang rab tu shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i lam la nan tan du bya ba'i rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa yang 
[\[227a.5\]]rab tu shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon pa'i tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa yang rab tu shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon pa'i shugs drag po rnam pa tha dad pa yang rab tu shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa 
[\[227a.6\]]la bzem pa'i mthu dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa yang rab tu shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnod pas rnam par rtse ba dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon 
[\[227a.7\]]pa'i rnam par spyod pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu gnas pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa bsgom pa'i rgyud kyang rab tu shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]sbyang ba'i tshul dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa la yang dag par gnas par bya ba dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i mtshan ma dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i dbang dag kyang rab tu 
[\[227b.2\]]shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa nas sar 'phar ba'i ye shes dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su bsdu ba'i ye shes dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su smyin par bya ba'i ye shes kyang rab tu shes 
[\[227b.3\]]so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa la yang dag par gnas par bya ba yang rab tu shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgya yang rab tu shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rnam par brtse ba dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/
[\[227b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems kyi skad cig re re la ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho sna tshogs thob par 
[\[227b.5\]]byed pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi snang ba'i tshul thob par byed pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi glog gi snang ba'i sprin dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa thob pa'i tshul dag 
[\[227b.6\]]kyang rab tu shes so/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi rnam par gnon pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams zhing rgya mtshor rjes su bgrod par byed pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/chos rgya mtsho'i 
[\[227b.7\]]tshul la 'jug pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/sems can rgya mtsho'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dam par spyod pa'i tshul thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]smon lam gyi tshul sna tshogs rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho rnam pa tha dad pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/rigs kyi bu kho mo ji ltar mi mjed kyi 
[\[228a.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i 'das pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i bskal pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho la zhugs te/_khong du chud pa de bzhin du phyi ma'i mtha' gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de/_rgyun mi 'chad pa'i ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab 
[\[228a.3\]]tu shes so/_/mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab 
[\[228a.4\]]tu shes so/_/mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs su chud 
[\[228a.5\]]pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad kyi bskal ba rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams 
[\[228a.6\]]cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho rnams ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcur 'dab chags su gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi 
[\[228a.7\]]khams phyogs bcur 'dab chags su gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho rnams ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcur 'dab chags su gnas pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]dag na gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal brgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcur 'dab chags su gnas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya 
[\[228b.2\]]mtsho rnams ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun tu 'od rnam par snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/phyogs kun tu 'od rnam par snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[228b.3\]]khams kyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du phyogs kun tu 'od rnam par snang pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs bcur 'dab chags su gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dag la 
[\[228b.4\]]gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rnams kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/phyogs kun tu 'od rnam par snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs bcur 'dab chags su gcig nas gcig tu brgyud 
[\[228b.5\]]pa dag la gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal ba rgya mtsho rnams rab tu shes pa de bzhin du gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'dir gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa 
[\[228b.6\]]rnams kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams tshul du bya ba rnams dang /_de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor lo rnams dang /_'jig rten gyi khams kyi dkyil 'khor rnams 
[\[228b.7\]]dang /_'jig rten gyi khams kyi bye brag rnams dang /_'jig rten gyi khams kyi chu klung rnams dang /_'jig rten gyi khams kyi glong rnams dang /_'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'khyil pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams ri rab dang /_'jig 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]rten gyi khams yongs su 'byung ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo dang /_'jig rten gyi khams sdong po dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rta bgab dang /_'jig rten gyi [{]mying [,]ming [}]du bya ba rnams kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes 
[\[229a.2\]]so/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_'di ji ltar shes par gyur pa de bzhin du/_phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i 
[\[229a.3\]]mthas gtugs pa dag gi bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi smon lam rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/_/rjes su dran no/_/sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dag la'ang shes shing /_khong du chud do/_/sngon yongs su bsgrubs pa'i tshul rgya 
[\[229a.4\]]mtsho dag la'ang shes shing khong du chud do/_/bskal pa mtha' dang dbus med par byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la yang dag par bzhugs pa mdzad pa dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/_/zhing yongs su dag par mdzad pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong 
[\[229a.5\]]du chud do/_/sems can yongs su smyin par mdzad pa'i thabs kyi tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/_/sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur mdzad cing gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/_/sngon gyi 
[\[229a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cing rim gror mdzad pa'i sbyor ba'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/_/sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis chos bstan pa yongs su bzung ba'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/_/sngon byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[229a.7\]]ting nge 'dzin rab tu brnyes pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/_/yo byad la dbang bsgyur ba rab tu brnyes pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/_/sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la nan tan tu mdzad pa'i tshul dag kyang 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]shes shing khong du chud do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa mngon par bsgrub pa mdzad pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong 
[\[229b.2\]]du chud do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa brnyes pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs drag po rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/_/bsam gtan gyi yan lag thams cad yongs 
[\[229b.3\]]su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/_/shes rab kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag par mdzad pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/_/'jig rten gyi khams kyi skye gnas thams cad du sku'i 
[\[229b.4\]]gzugs brnyan yongs su bstan pa mdzad pa'i thabs kyi tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/_/kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor yongs sa dag par mdzad pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/_/zhing rgya mtsho 
[\[229b.5\]]thams cad yongs su rgyas par mdzad pa dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par mdzad pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang /_shes shing khong du chud do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[229b.6\]]thams cad las ye shes snang bar gyur pa/_rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub yongs su gnas pa mdzad pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/_/de bzhin 
[\[229b.7\]]gshegs pa'i ye shes snang ba rab tu brnyes pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du zhugs te thugs su chud pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]pa rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu dang rnam par rol ba'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/_/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud 
[\[230a.2\]]do/_/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/_/thog ma'i smon lam gyi tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/_/sems can yongs su smyin par byed pa 
[\[230a.3\]]dang /_gdul ba'i thabs kyi tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe/_sems can rgya mtsho yongs su smyin par mdzad pa de dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/_/sems 
[\[230a.4\]]can de dag gi sems kyi skad cig re re'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba'i thabs kyi tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/_/ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rab tu thob pa'i 
[\[230a.5\]]tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/_/spobs pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad yongs su gnon pa'i rnam par 'phrul 
[\[230a.6\]]ba'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/_/spyod pa'i dra ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/_/mthar gyis yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyogs pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes 
[\[230a.7\]]shing khong du chud do/_/de dag gi dbang po dang stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/_/
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho chos kyi dbyings thams cad du byung ba shes shing khong du chud de/_mngon par bsgrubs pa de bzhin du/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[230b.2\]]cad kyi sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho dang /_ye shes kyi sgyu ma'i dra ba mtha' yas pa la 'jug pa/_chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa rgyas par 'gengs pa/_sgo mtha' yas pa nas shin tu bstan par bya ba/_phyi 
[\[230b.3\]]ma'i mtha'i bskal par gnas pa la 'jig pas bstan par bya ba/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho chos kyi dbyings kyi klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs par byung ba thams cad kyang ma 'dres par shes shing /_
[\[230b.4\]]khong du chud de mngon par sgrub bo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par blta ba'i yul gyi yul ni de lta bu ste/_
[\[230b.5\]]de'i phyir de la snyoms par zhugs na sems can thams cad kyi sems dang /_spyod pa'i tshul rab tu shes so/_/sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i tshogs kyang rab tu shes so/_/sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa 
[\[230b.6\]]dang /_rnam par byang ba'i ye shes kyi tshul rnams kyang rab tu shes so/_/sems can thams cad kyi las sna tshogs kyang rab tu shes so/_/nyan thos thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang rab tu shes so/_/nyan thos thams cad 
[\[230b.7\]]kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sa yang rab tu shes so/_/rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa zhi bas rnam par 'phrul pa yang shes shing khong du chud do/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i tshul dag kyang rab 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]tu shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa'i tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa yang rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa'i tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa yang 
[\[231a.2\]]rab tu shes so/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]shAkya'i bu mo go pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams 
[\[231a.3\]]cad la rnam par lta ba'i yul 'di brnyes nas ji srid cig lags/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu/_sngon 'das pa'i dus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bskal pa 'das pa'i pha rol cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[231a.4\]]mi 'jigs pa byed pa zhes bya ba byung ste/_'jig rten gyi khams/_de'i bskal pa 'gro ba'i mchog ces bya bar gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams de'i dbus su/_gling bzhi pa bde ba yod pa zhes bya ba byung ste/_
[\[231a.5\]]gling bzhi pa de'i 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus su/_rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bo'i dpal zhes bya ba/_grong rdal stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i phul du bya ba byung ba ste/_rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bo'i dpal de dang /_
[\[231a.6\]]grong rdal stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag kyang so so nas sa'i gzhi baiDUr+ya sngon po las grub pa la gnas pa/_rin po che bdun las byas pa'i ra bas kun nas bskor ba/_'obs spos chus yongs su gang ba gzhi gser gyi bye ma bdal 
[\[231a.7\]]ba/_ut+pal dang /_pad+mo dang /_ku mu ta dang /_me tog pun+da ri ka shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam kha dog dang 'od kyi dra ba sna tshogs shing dri shin tu zhim pas kun nas khyab pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba/_rin po che las byas pa'i stegs 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]bu'i khri 'phang bdun las ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis kun nas dgrigs pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyi shing gi nags tshal gyi phreng ba dgrigs pas kun nas bskor ba ste/_steng nas gser gyi dra ba bres pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam 
[\[231b.2\]]par phye ba'i mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris mdzes par rnam par bres pas sa'i gzhi shin tu spa bar gyur ba/_dngos grub can gyi tshogs rnam par rgyu ba/_bya btsun pa'i khyus sgra skad yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs snyan pa phyung ba/_bza' shing 
[\[231b.3\]]gi ra ba bye ba brgya phrag stong gis mdzes par byas pa shin tu skyid cing phun sum tshogs par gnas pa skyes pa dang /_bud [{]myed [,]med [}]brgya stong rab tu dga' bas gang ba/_ser bu bde zhing yid du 'ong bas bskyed de/_me tog gi char mang po 
[\[231b.4\]]rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu 'grul ba/_sa'i bdag po dam pa brgya phrag stong gi gnas su gyur pa dag ste/_grong rdal chen po de dag gi rin po che'i shing thams cad dang /_gser gyi dra ba'i rgyan la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa rlung gis bskyod 
[\[231b.5\]]de/_rol mo mang po'i sgra dang mnyam pa'i sgra skad byung ba dag las yid du 'ong ba'i tshig 'di skad dag 'byung ngo /_/gsol cig mnobs shig chos la spyod cig_/byang chub tu sems skyed cig_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i sa la mnga' 
[\[231b.6\]]thob par mdzod cig_/khyed rnams bde bar gyur cig ces zer ro/_/rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bo'i dpal der khams kyi rgyal po nor gyi bdag po zhes bya ba byung ste/_de la btsun mo'i 'khor bud med stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yod 
[\[231b.7\]]do/_/blon po brgya phrag lnga yod par gyur te/_rgyal po nor gyi bdag po de la bu lnga brgya yod pa de thams cad kyang /_dpa' bo rtul phod pa yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa/_gzhan gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa shin tu mdzes pa/_
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]blta na sdug pa/_kha dog bzang po'i mchog shin tu rgyas pa dang ldan pa sha stag go_/rgyal po nor gyi bdag po de'i btsun mo dam pa ni pad+mo'i dpal dam pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba ste/_bud med stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po 
[\[232a.2\]]de dag gi nang nas gtso mor bya ba'o/_/de'i bu gzi brjid kyi dbang po zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba shin tu mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/_mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i lus dang ldan pa zhig yod par gyur te/_de la mi 
[\[232a.3\]]chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag yod par gyur to/_/de'ang 'di ltar rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po de rkang pa'i mthil shin tu gnas pa dang ldan te/_sa chen po la rkang pa'i mthil 'dor na mnyam par 'dor la/_
[\[232a.4\]]'deg na mnyam par 'deg ste/_gzhog na rkang pa'i mthil kun gyis sa chen po la mnyam par reg go_/de'i rkang pa'i mthil gnyis la 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa/_lte ba dang bcas pa mu khyud dang bcas pa/_rnam pa thams 
[\[232a.5\]]cad du shin tu tshang ba shin tu mdzes pa blta na sdug pa dag kyang byung bar gyur to/_/de'i rkang pa'i bo la gnyis kyang shin tu rgyas par gyur to/_/rkang pa'i steng gi mdog shin tu gsal la/_shin tu mdzes te/_me tog dam pa 
[\[232a.6\]]bas kyang lhag par mdog bzang zhing gsal bar gyur te/_de'i rkang lag gi sor mo dra bar 'brel par gyur te/_shin tu mdzes pa rnam par phye ba/_bu ga med pas zag pa med pa ni dper na ngang pa'i rgyal po gnas srung lta bur gyur to/_/de'i rkang 
[\[232a.7\]]pa'i rting pa yangs pa shin tu dag la shin tu gsal ba rin po che thams cad kyi 'od rab tu 'gyed par grub pa dang ldan par gyur to/_/de'i sor mo rnams kyang ring zhing zlum la tshigs bar mnyam zhing yangs pa dang ldan par gyur te/_de dag mnyam par 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]sa la 'jog go_/mnyam par sa las 'deg go_/de'i rkang pa dang lag pa'i mthil yang ka tsa lin+di bas kyang lhag par reg na bde bar gyur te/_des skyes pa 'am bud med dam/_khye'u dang bu mo gang la reg kyang rung ste/_de dag thams cad kyang 
[\[232b.2\]]bde ba dang /_yid dga' ba'i dam pas tshim zhing yid shin tu bde bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i byin ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]a ne ya'i byin pa ltar 'dug par gyur te/_rim gyis gzhol ba dang /_shin tu mdzes pa dang /_legs par grub par gyur pas/_
[\[232b.3\]{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po e ne ya ltar de la sus kyang bsnyegs pa 'am/_slebs par mi nus te/_'gro bas ngal zhing dub par mi 'gyur ro/_/rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi bajid kyi dbang po de bdun shin tu mtho ba dang ldan par gyur te/_de'i rkang pa 
[\[232b.4\]]gnyis la shin tu mtho ba zlum la shin tu legs pa dang /_shin tu rgyas pa dang /_tshigs mi snang ba dang /_shin tu yid du 'ong ba dang /_blta na sdug pa gnyis grub par gyur to/_/lag pa la gnyis/_thal gong gi lhun la gnyis/_ltag pa la gcig ste/_
[\[232b.5\]]de ltar bdun no/_/de'i mtshan gsang ba'i sbubs na 'dug par grub par gyur te/_de'i gsang ba'i gnas sbubs na 'dug pa shin tu mi mngon la nang du nub cing kun nas yog par 'dug pa ste/_dper na glang po cang shes sam/_rta cang shes ltar 'dug 
[\[232b.6\]]pas de gos ma gyon par 'dug kyang bud med dam/_skyes pa 'am/_khye'u 'am/_bu mo 'am/_rgan pa 'am/_dar la bab pa 'am/_bla ma 'am/_bla mar bya ba rnams kyis kyang mi mthong ste/_gzhan du na bdag longs par spyod pa 'am/_ched du bstan par byas te/_
[\[232b.7\]]'dod pas spyad pa ni ma gtogs so/_/rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po de ro stod seng ge ltar 'dug pa dang ldan par gyur te/_lus rim pas rgyas la ro stod shin tu yangs shing rdzogs pas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po bas kyang mdzes par dbyibs shin tu legs 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]pa'i ro stod dang ldan par gyur to/_/de'i thal gong rgyas shing lus shin tu rgyas pa lus rnam par phye ba/_lus kyi cha thams cad rkyen du 'bab par mnyam pa/_lus la dma' ba med pa/_lus la mtho ba med pa/_lus la zhum pa med pa/_lus la 
[\[233a.2\]]dgu ba med pa/_lus rin po che'i gtan pa shin tu phyis pa bas kyang lhag par gsal bar gyur to/_/de'i dpung mgo shin tu zlum zhing sha rgyas la shin tu mdzes par gang ba dang ldan par gyur to/_/des mi chen po'i mtshan lag pa shin tu ring ba thob par gyur pa des lus 
[\[233a.3\]]ma btud de/_lus drang por 'dug kyang pus mo'i lha nga gnyis la nyug cing reg go_/des mi chen po'i mtshan lus che zhing drang ba'ang thob par gyur te/_rnam pa thams cad du mchog tu gyur pa dang ldan la lus tshul dang 'dra bar mnyam pa dang /_lus rab tu gnyen pa dang /_
[\[233a.4\]]lus shin tu lji ba dang /_lus rab tu gsal ba dang /_lus shin tu sim par byed pa dang ldan par gyur to/_/des mi chen po'i mtshan mgul dung lta bu yang thob par gyur te/_mi dma' ba'i mgul dang /_de'i mgul gyi 'khor thams cad dang /_bzhin gyi 'khor thams 
[\[233a.5\]]cad na rtsa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang shin tu mnyam par gyur te/_kun kyang rab tu tshang bar gyur to/_/mi chen po'i mtshan seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu yang thob par gyur te/_za 'gram shin tu 'khregs pa dang /_bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu rgyas pa dang /_bzhin gyi 
[\[233a.6\]]dkyil 'khor shin tu legs shing yongs su dag pa dang /_kha'i sgo shin tu yangs pa dang ldan par gyur to/_/mi chen po'i mtshan so mnyam pa bzhi bcu dang yang ldan par gyur te/_so ma tshang ba med la zas shig zas yang lan gcig bldad pas chung ngu na 'bras chan gyi 'bru 
[\[233a.7\]]'ga' yang ma zhib par za ba med do/_/so thags bzang zhing mnyam par rab tu thob ste/_mtshams chu sgo med pa dang /_shin tu mnyam pa dang /_rkyen rkyen tu shin tu mdzes pa ste/_de kha zas shig za na yang 'go ba dang /_'chags pa dang /_zhen pa dang /_
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]ljan ljin tu 'gyur ba'am/_thogs par 'gyur ba'am/_gseb 'gang bar 'gyur ba med do/_/mi chen po'i mtshan so mnyam pa rab tu thob par gyur te/_so mnyam zhing rda rdo med pa dang /_so lhag med pa dang /_so zhum pa med pa dang /_so gyes pa med pa dang 
[\[233b.2\]]so thog drung mnyam pa dang /_so rdo ba med par gyur to/_/gzhon nu de'i mche ba shin tu dkar bar gyur te/_mche ba shin tu gsal ba/_mche ba shin tu dag pa/_mche ba shin tu brtan par gyur to/_/mi chen po'i mtshan lce shin tu yangs pa yang
