[\[233b.3\]]rab tu thob par gyur te/_de'i lce ni shin tu yangs la srab cing mnyen te/_shin tu 'jam pa dang /_las su rung ba dang /_yid du 'ong ba dang bsgyur na bde ba dang /_gdong gi dkyil 'khor kun tu 'gebs pa dang /_bden zhing phan par 'gyur ba'i don dang /_
[\[233b.4\]]yi ge dang ngag dang nges pa'i tshig thogs pa med par brjod par gyur to/_/gzhon nu de tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan par gyur te/_dbyangs yid du 'ong ba dang /_rol mo'i sgra dang /_glu'i nga ro dang /_sil snyan kyi dbyangs dang /_sgra skad dang brjod cing 
[\[233b.5\]]smra ba'i tshig gi las yid du 'ong ba brjod pas ngag gi las mngon par dga' ba skyed pa/_'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'dun par 'gyur bar tshangs pa las kyang lhag pa'i dbyangs kyi ngag rjod de/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor las kyang 
[\[233b.6\]]gud du/_mi 'da' bar thams cad kyi yid dang /_mthun par byed pa dang ldan par gyur to/_/gzhon nu de ni/_mig dkar nag 'byes par gyur te/_mig shin tu dang ba dang /_mig yongs su dag pa dang /_
[\[233b.7\]]mig la 'od chags pa dang /_mig rnam par gsal ba dang /_mig mngon par mdzes pa dang /_mig blta na sdug pa dang /_mig yid du 'ong ba dang /_mig 'dzum pa dang ldan par gyur to/_/gzhon nu de ni rdzi ma ba'i rdzi ma lta bu dang ldan par 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]gyur te/_mig gi skye mched rin po che pad+ma rA ga ltar shin tu dag pa/_mig gi sprin mnyam pa/_mig gi sprin mtshungs pa/_mig gi sprin legs pa/_mig gi sprin yangs pa/_mig gi sprin shin tu brtan par gyur to/_/de'i 
[\[234a.2\]]smin mtshams su mdzod spu skyes par gyur te/_'jam pa las su rung ba/_shin tu mnyen pa/_shing bal ltar reg na bde ba/_dang ba/_gsal ba 'od yod pa/_chab brom lta bu kha ba'i kha dog ltar 'dug pa/_'od zer dkar po'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od rab 
[\[234a.3\]]tu snang ba dang ldan par gyur to/_/de'i spyi bo la gtsug tor mngon par grub par gyur te/_shin tu legs pa/_kun nas zlum pa/_dbus su bab pa/_skra'i rgyan du gyur pa/_rin po che'i pad mo 'dab ma bye ba brgya phrag stong dang ldan pa ltar snang ba/_kun nas cha 
[\[234a.4\]]mnyam par gnas pa/_rin thang gdab tu tshad med pas gces pa'i gtsug tu gyur pa dang ldan par gyur to/_/gzhon nu de ni pags pa shin tu 'jam pa dang ldan par gyur te/_de'i lus la rdul lam/_dri ma'am/_rngul lam/_ser ga'am/_gnyer ma'am/_
[\[234a.5\]]lhod pa'am/_'khums pa'am/_'phyang ba'am/_slod bag tu gnas pa med par gyur to/_/gzhon nu de ni mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/_'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi mdog lta bu dang ldan zhing 'od kun tu 'dom gang ba dang /_gser 
[\[234a.6\]]ltar gcig tu 'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis mdzes par brgyan pa dang /_ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas dri zhim po'i 'od zer 'byung bas lus kyi rgyan rab rib med cing 'od gsal ba dang ldan par gyur to/_/gzhon nu de ni ba spu re rer byung ba dang ldan par 
[\[234a.7\]]gyur te/_ba spu'i bu ga re re nas ba spu re re skyes par gyur pa/_baiDUR+Ya sngon po'i kha dog lta bu g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba/_legs par skyes pa/_mthang la zha bar 'dug pa shin tu legs par gnas pa dang ldan par gyur to/_/gzhon nu de'i spu yan lag gyen du 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]'khyil par gyur te/_phyir mi zlog pa'i spu dang /_mi ldog pa'i spu dang /_ma 'dres pa'i spu dang ldan par gyur to/_/gzhon nu de mi chen po'i mtshan skra mthon ting du 'dug pa thob par gyur te/_de'i skra nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i mdog ltar mthon ting du 'dug pa/_
[\[234b.2\]]'jam pa snum pa/_legs par 'khyil pa/_g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba/_drung shin tu ran pa/_zad zed med pa/_'jam 'jam ltar 'dug pa/_mi 'dzing ba/_dbyibs mnyam zhing mthun par gnas pa dang ldan par gyur to/_/rgyal bu gzhon nu de shing n+ya gro d+ha 
[\[234b.3\]]ltar chu zheng gab pa'i mi chen po'i mtshan rab tu thob par gyur te/_kun nas gyen du ran pa dang /_kun tu bzang ba dang /_kun tu mdzes pa dang ldan par gyur te/_de ni mdun nas bltas na'ang ngoms mi shes shing blta na yid du 'ong ba rgyab dang g.yas g.yon dang /_'gro 
[\[234b.4\]]ba dang 'dug pa dang /_'greng ba dang nyal ba dang /_smra ba dang /_mi smra bar 'dug pa la bltas na/_yang ngoms mi shes shing yid du 'ong la blta na sdug par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu rgyal po gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po de mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di 
[\[234b.5\]]dag gis yongs su brgyan pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur te/_sems can thams cad kyi blta na yid du mi 'ong ba'i bag med pa blta na bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/_blta na sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba yongs su 'byung ba/_de lta bu 
[\[234b.6\]]zhig skyes par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de nas lan gcig cig rgyal po gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po de yab kyis gnang nas rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bo dpal gyi bza' shing gi ra ba spos kyi myu gu'i rtse mo las 'od kyi sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba der sa bzang po 
[\[234b.7\]]lta ba'i phyir bu mo stong phrag nyi shu dang lhan cig tu bsod nams kyi gzi brjid dang dpal gyi bskal pa bzang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan gyis byung nas skyes pa dang /_bud [{]myed [,]med [}]kyi tshogs kyis kun nas dga' bar bya zhing /_'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi shing rta 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]rdo rje rin po che'i 'khor lo chen po bzhi dang ldan pa/_rdo rje mthu bo che'i srog shing gi rtsa ba can tsan dan dam pa las bsgrubs pa'i yul bzang po dang ldan pa/_rin po che'i rgyal po spos sna tshogs kyi shing thags rnam par bkye ba/_rin po che thams cad kyi me tog sna tshogs 
[\[235a.2\]]kyis rab tu mdzes par byas pa/_rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/_seng ge'i khri rin po che dam pa'i dra ba'i rgyan gyi snying po can dbus su bshams pa/_bu mo lnga brgyas rin po che'i srad bu'i lda ldi nas yongs su gzung ba/_nam mkha' la chags pa 
[\[235a.3\]]med pa'i rlung ltar mgyogs pa'i rta cang shes stong dang bcas pa la zhon nas gdugs chen po rim gyis gzhol zhing blta na sdug pa/_steng yongs rin po che'i rgyal po'i baiDUR+Ya dkar po las byas pa/_'od dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa tshad med pa 'byung ba/_rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa rmad du byung ba sna tshogs 
[\[235a.4\]]thams cad kyis spa bar spras te/_rnam pa thams cad du mdzes par brgyan pa/_yu ba rin po che'i rgyal po baiDUr+ya sngon po las bsgreng bas ni bskyabs/_srog chags brgya stong mang pos ni yongs su bskor/_rol mo brgya stong mang po lha rdzas kyi dbyangs yid du 'ong ba snyan pa dang ldan pa dag ni rab 
[\[235a.5\]]tu blangs/_me tog gi char chen po ni mngon par 'bab/_lha rdzas kyi spos dri zhim pa'i bdug spos kyi snod bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis ni rab tu bdug cing 'gro bar gyur to/_/de de ltar 'gro ba'i tshe lam yang rgyud brgyad dang ldan par gyur te/_mthon dman [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_gseg 
[\[235a.6\]]ma dang gyo mo [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_gser dngul dang rin po che'i rgyal po sna tshogs kyi khams kyis sa'i gzhi rab tu bsgrubs pa dang /_gser gyi bye ma bkram pa dang /_rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog sil mas chal bar gang ba dang /_g.yas g.yon nas rin po che'i shing gi phreng bas dgrigs 
[\[235a.7\]]pa dang /_rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha ran bkye ba dang /_steng nas rin po che'i dril bu'i dra ba bres pa dang /_rin po che'i gnam yol sna tshogs kyis bkab pa dang /_rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_snam bu brgya stong rab tu brgyan pa du ma bsgreng zhing sbyangs 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]pas mdzes par brgyan pa dang /_g.yas g.yon nas rin po che'i stegs bu'i phreng ba rnam par bkod pas rnam par brgyan pa ste/_rin po che'i stegs bu la la la ni slongs mo ba'i tshogs la yongs su bstabs pa'i don du rin po che'i snod sna tshogs/_rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang 
[\[235b.2\]]ba bkod/_stegs bu la la la ni rgyan 'dod pa'i slongs mo ba rnams brgyan pa'i don du rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyi rnam pa yongs su bkod/_stegs bu la la la ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bkod/_
[\[235b.3\]]stegs bu la la la ni su ci 'dod pa de dag la de sbyin pa'i don du kha zas dang btung ba dang /_bro ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang ba'i snod mang po bkod/_stegs bu la la la ni rnam pa thams cad du mchog tu zhim pa'i ro dang /_kha dog dang dri dang /_bro dang /_reg yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa'i 
[\[235b.4\]]lha rdzas kyi kha zas kyi rnam pa bkod/_stegs bu la la la ni ro bro ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i lha rdzas kyi shing tog sna tshogs thams cad spungs/_stegs bu la la la ni gos 'dod pa rnams yid bzhin du spyod du gzud pa'i phyir lha rdzas kyi gos rin po che kha dog sna tshogs 
[\[235b.5\]]dang ldan pa mdog bzang po rnam pa sna tshogs dag dang ri mo sna tshogs shin tu spa bar rnam par phye ba shin tu btsun pa la 'os pa shin tu phra ba/_rab tu 'jam pa/_thags su ma btags pa/_bye ba brgya phrag stong snyed yongs su bkod par gyur to/_/stegs bu la la 
[\[235b.6\]]la ni byug pa 'dod pa'i sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su spyod du gzung pa'i phyir/_/lha rdzas kyi spos kyi rnam pa kha dog dang /_dri rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad dang ldan pa dag kyang bkod par gyur to/_/stegs su bu la la la ni sems can 
[\[235b.7\]]rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su spyod du gzud pa'i phyir yo byad thams cad kyi phung po dag kyang bkod par gyur to/_/stegs bu la la la ni na chung gzugs bzang ba rab tu mdzes pa shin tu sdug pa/_cha lugs sdug gu sna tshogs dang ldan 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]pa yid du 'ong ba'i gos sna tshogs gyon pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis mdzes par brgyan pa/_byug pa sna tshogs kyis tshul sdug gur brgyan cing mdzes par byas pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_bud [{]myed [,]med [}]kyi bzo dang sgyu dang /_shes nyen gyi tshul la mkhas pa dag kyang bkod 
[\[236a.2\]]par gyur to/_/de'i tshe rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bo'i dpal de nyid na sprul 'tshong ma'i dam pa rgyal po'i longs spyod du 'os pa/_blta na mdzes pa zhes bya ba zhig yod pa/_de'i bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing shin tu mdzes 
[\[236a.3\]]pa/_blta na sdug pa ha cang yang mi ring ha cang yang mi thung /_ha cang yang mi sbom/_ha cang yang mi phra/_ha cang yang mi dkar/_ha cang yang mi sngo ba/_skra mthon ting du 'dug pa/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]dkar nag 'byes pa/_bzhin yid du 'ong ba/_tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang 
[\[236a.4\]]ldan pa/_'jam zhing snyan par smra ba/_shes rab dang ldan pa/_shes nyen gyi tshul thams cad la mkhas pa gtsug lag thams cad la shes pa/_brtson pa/_le lo [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_rim 'gro yod pa/_mos pa dang ldan pa/_byams pa'i sems 'dogs pa/_
[\[236a.5\]]khong khro ba mi mnga' ba/_blta na mi ngoms shing yid du 'ong ba/_'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /_gti mug chung ba/_ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa/_drang zhing mnyen pa/_g.yo dang sgyu med pa zhig yod de/_de ma dang lhan cig tu bu mo du ma zhig gis yongs su bskor te/_rin 
[\[236a.6\]]po che'i shing rta la zhon nas rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bo'i dpal nas byung ste/_rgyal pos bka' stsal nas/_rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po'i mdun nas/_phar rgyal bu gzhon nu de glu len zhing 'dong 'dong ba las/_rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po mthong nas/_
[\[236a.7\]]'dod chags kyis sems shin tu mi bzang pa zhig g.yos te/_rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po shin tu yid du 'ong ches nas rjes su 'brang zhing sems la rang dbang med pas/_blta na sdug pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ma 'di ltar mkhyen par mdzod cig_/gal te bdag rgyal bu gzhon 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po la ma btad na ni 'gum pa 'am/_srog la 'bab pa'i sdug bsngal gcig tu 'gyur ro/_des smras pa/_bu mo de lta bu'i sems ma skyed cig_/gzhon nu 'di ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa ste/_de'i yab nor gyi bdag po 
[\[236b.2\]]mi bzhugs par gyur na/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la gnas par 'gyur ba'i gnas yod do/_/de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur bas/_de'i bud med rin po che nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'byung bar 'gyur la/_bu mo bdag cag kyang /_sbrul 'tshong 
[\[236b.3\]]ma dag cig ste/_'jig rten thams cad dga' bar byed pa yin gyi/_yu bus sems can 'ga' zhig la nam 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur [{]myi [,]mi [}]byar [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung ba'ang [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_yu bu ni rgyal po nor gyi bdag po'i bkas rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po'i rim 
[\[236b.4\]]'gror 'dong 'dong bar zad kyis de lta bu'i sems brtan par ma byed cig_/gnas de ni thob par yang shin tu dka'o/_/de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sku nyi ma dam pa zhes bya ba mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_
[\[236b.5\]]bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen par bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba lha dang /_mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i snying po byang chub chos kyi sprin shin tu sdug pa'i 'od ces bya ba yang bza' shing gi ra ba 
[\[236b.6\]]spos kyi myu gu'i rtse mo las 'od kyi sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba de'i nang du byung ste/_der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa thog mar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_zhag bdun lon pa de bu mo de shing rta la zhon bzhin du yur zhing 'chog 'chog 
[\[236b.7\]]pa'i rmi lam du mthong nas sad par gyur pa dang /_sngon gnyen bshes su gyur pa'i lha mo zhig gis bstan pa/_bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nyi ma dam pa de ni snying bo byang chub chos kyi sprin shin tu sdug pa'i 'od ces bya ba na rnam par spyod cing thog ma mngon par rdzogs par sangs 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]rgyas nas zhag bdun lon te/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_tshangs pa dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og 
[\[237a.2\]{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha'i tshogs kyis mdun du byas shing bzhugs te/_der sa'i lha mo thams cad kyang kun nas 'dus/_chu'i lha mo dang /[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]lha mo dang /_rlung gi lha mo dang /_rgya mtsho'i lha mo dang /_chu klung gi lha mo dang /_ri'i lha mo dang /_mtshan mo'i lha mo dang /_skya rengs 'char ba'i lha mo 
[\[237a.3\]]dang /_nags tshal gyi lha mo dang /_shing gi lha mo dang /_sman gyi lha mo dang /_lo thog gi lha mo dang /_grong khyer gyi lha mo dang /_rkang gis 'gro ba'i lha mo dang /_snying po byang chub kyi lha mo dang /_lus kyi 'od gzer gyi lha mo dang /_sems can gyi ris kyi lha mo dang /_nam mkha'i lha mo 
[\[237a.4\]]dang /_phyogs thams cad kyi lha mo dag kyang bcom ldan 'das sku nyi ma dam pa'i zhal blta ba'i phyir kun nas 'dus so zhes nas/_de ltar des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thos pas bag tsha [{]myed [,]med [}]pa thob par gyur te/_skabs su bab nas 
[\[237a.5\]]rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po'i mdun du de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/gzugs kyi mchog gis 'jig rten khyad par 'phags/_/yon tan rnams kyis thams cad phyogs su grags/_/shes rab stobs kyis bdag dang 'dra ma mchis/_/
[\[237a.6\]]sgyu rtsal dga' ba sgyu ma'i tshul kun 'tshal/_/srog chags mang po stong phrag du ma yis/_/'dod chags dbang gis bdag la rab bltas kyang /_/gzhon nu bdag ni 'jig rten gang la yang /_/glo ba chags par gyur pa gcig ma mchis/_/sems can gang la 
[\[237a.7\]]yang zhen par gyur pa 'am/_/gang la'ang khong khror bdag gi sems ma gyur/_/gang la'ang dgra [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid de zhe [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdang /_/bdag ni sems can sman par dga' ba lags/_/sku gzhan sku mchog yon tan rab mnga' khyod/_/gang tshe bdag gis gsal 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]bar mthong gyur pa/_/de tshe dbang po kun kyang nyams su bde/_/rgya che yangs par shin tu dga' bar gyur/_/khyod kyi dbu bzang lcang lor 'khril ba ni/_/rin chen rnam snang mdog tu mthon ting gsal/_/zhal gyi smin sdug 'phral ba shangs su mdzes/_/khyod kyi zhal sngar lus 
[\[237b.2\]]'di bdag 'bul lo/_/mtshan gyi rab 'chang gzi brjid che mnga' ba/_/sku gzugs gser gyi ri bo bzang po 'dra/_/khyod kyi spyan sngar bdag lta mi mdzes te/_/zil du rlag pas snag tsha'i gzugs kyang 'dra/_/spyan gsal ring la dkar nag 'byes pas mdzes/_/
[\[237b.3\]]shin tu zhal rgyas seng ge'i za 'gram can/_/khyod kyi gsung ni thogs pa ma mchis na/_/gsung mchog mnga' bas bdag ni gzung du gsol/_/khyod kyi zhal na ljags yangs mnga' ba ni/_/mdog dmar yangs pa rin chen mchog gi 'od/_/tshangs dbyangs yan lag mchog gi 
[\[237b.4\]]gsung mnga' bas/_/gsung zhing 'gro ba rab tu dga' ba mdzad/_/khyod kyi zhal na thags bzang tshems mnga' ba/_/dung ltar dri med shin tu rnam par gsal/_/'dzum zhing bzhad pa rnam par ston mdzad kyang /_/skyes bu dpal khyod 'gro ba dga' bar mdzad/_/khyod kyi sku la 
[\[237b.5\]]mtshan rab mdzes pa rnams/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis dag cing 'od kyang gsal/_/sku gzugs bzang po yongs su des brgyan pas/_/mi yi dbang po 'khor los sgyur ba byon/_/de nas rgyal bu gzi brjid kyi bdag pos/_bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs 
[\[237b.6\]]pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu mo khyod su'i/_khyod la yongs su srung ba ni gang zhig yod/_bu mo nga la ni gzhan gyis yongs su gzung ba'i bud med bdag gir byar mi rung ngo zhes nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so/_/blta sdug gzugs kyi yon tan legs ldan 
[\[237b.7\]]pa/_/mtshan bzang bsod nams rnam par dag pa'i lus/_/khyod la dri ba'i don 'di nga la smros/_/lus mchog khyod ni su yis yongs su gzung /_/khyod la pha dang ma ni yod dam [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/khyim thab [{]myed [,]med [}]dam khyod ni su zhig dbang /_/gzugs mdzes khyod la sems 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]can gzhan nam gcig_/bdag gi yin par 'du shes byed [{]myed [,]med [}]dam/_/khyod kyi yid ni gsod la [{]myi [,]mi [}]dga' 'grang /_/gzhan las ma byin phrogs par mi byed dam/_/'dod pas log par g.yem la [{]myi [,]mi [}]dga' 'grang /_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du brjod smrar yid ni mi 
[\[238a.2\]]mos sam/_/khyod kyi blo gros mdza' 'byed mi 'jug gam/_/tshig brlang gzhan la gnod par [{]myi [,]mi [}]smra 'grang /_/gzhan gyi nor la chags par sems [{]myed [,]med [}]dam/_/'gro ba rnams la gnod par [{]myi [,]mi [}]sems 'grang /_/blta ba'i 'brog dgon lam du ma zhugs 'grang /_/las kyi 
[\[238a.3\]]rgyud la ye brdam sems [{]myed [,]med [}]dam/_/g.yo mdog sgyu yi dbang du mi 'gro'am/_/mi 'thad 'jig rten gnod par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed 'grang /_/pha ma gnyen dang mdza' bshes bla ma la/_/sri zhu rim gror bya ba'i tshul 'chang ngam/_/phongs par gyur pa yongs su bsdu don du/_/khyed kyi 
[\[238a.4\]]yid la byin par sems yod dam/_/chos dang mthun par dus su 'doms byed cing /_/lus dang sems yid yongs su dag byed la/_/yang dag las su rung ba skyed byed pa'i/_/dge bshes rnams la dga' bar sems yod dam/_sangs rgyas rnams la rim gror 
[\[238a.5\]]byed ldan nam/_/sangs rgyas sras la dga' mchog yod dam [{]myed[,]med[}]/_gang las bde gshegs sras rnams skyer 'gyur ba'i/_/chos kyi dam pa de ni shes mi shes/_/chos yid mchog la gnas par khyod byed 'grang /_/chos min spyad pa'i blo gros med 'grang ngo /_/legs 
[\[238a.6\]]pa mtha' yas yon tan rgya mtsho la/_/gus pa'i sri zhu dga' sems mchog yod ma/_/skye bo mgon med phongs par gyur pa yi/_/'dren pa rnams la byams pa'i yid yod dam/_/ngan song 'gro ba'i lam la zhugs pa yi/_/shin tu nyam thag snying rje sems 
[\[238a.7\]]'grang ngo /_/gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa mthong gyur na/_/khyod ni dga' ba mchog dang ldan 'gyur ram/_/skye bo nyon mongs rnams kyis 'khol gyur la/_/shes rab mthu bskyed btang snyoms byed mi byed/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]shes gnyid log skye bo mang mthong na/_/byang chub dam 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]par smon lam 'debs byed 'grong /_/bskal pa mtha' yas spyad pa spyod byed na/_/smon lam dam pas skyo bar mi 'gyur 'grang /_/de nas bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa'i ma sprul 'tshong ma'i gtso mo blta na sdug pas rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag 
[\[238b.2\]]po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gzhon nu bdag gi bu mo 'di ni rdzus te byung ba/_pad mo'i nang nas skyes pa ste/_sngan chad khyim gyi nang nas phyi rol tu ma byung ngo zhes nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ces smras so/_/bu mo 'di la khyod kyis gang smras pa/_/de ni 
[\[238b.3\]]bdag gis rim pas khyod la brjod/_/ji ltar bu mo 'di skyes bskyed bskyed pa/_/bdag gis khyod la gsol gyis gsan du gsol/_/gang tshe dgung sangs khyod ni bltam gyur pa/_/de tshe bdag gi bu mo 'di skyes te/_/rdzus te dri med pad ma'i sbubs nas byung /_/
[\[238b.4\]]yan lag kun tshang [{]myig [,]mig [}]yangs 'di yang skyes/_/dus kyi nang na sos ka dus mchog la/_/sman dang lo tog myu gu 'thon pa'i tshe/_/sA la'i ra ba bza' shing rab mchog tu/_/bdag ni rtse dga' de khrod mchi mchi ste/_/sna tshogs yal ga'i lo ma rgyas gyur 
[\[238b.5\]]cing /_/zhugs shing me tog sdug rgyas sprin gyi mdog_/bya bran sna tshogs sgra snyan zhugs shing nang /_/nags khrod mya ngam ma mchis dgar mchis mchis/_/rgyan dang ldan zhing shin tu yid 'ong la/_/rin chen rad pa sna tshogs 'tshal pa rnams/_/rol mo glu 
[\[238b.6\]]la shin tu bslabs pa yi/_/bu mo brgya phrag brgyad dang bdag kyang ldan/_/spos mchog ldan pa'i bun da ri ka dang /_/rdzing 'gram me tog sil mas bltams pa yi/_/sa phyogs de na bud [{]myed [,]med [}]mang po dang /_/bdag cag de na dga' bar mchis mchis na/_/
[\[238b.7\]]chab dbus de nas rin chen pad mo'i mchog_/'dab ma stong dang ldan pa byung bar gyur/_/lo ma rin chen yu ba baiDUR+Ya/_/snying po 'dzam bu chu klung gser las bgyis/_/spos mchog rin chen dam pa'i ze ba can/_/'od chen 'dzam bu'i rgyal 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]mtshan kun tu 'phro/_/de tshe dgung la gdugs shig shar tam zhes/_/skye bo kun kyang yid gnyis 'tshal bar gyur/_/dgung sangs gyur nas pad mo chen po de/_/gdugs kyi 'od kyis rab tu rgyas bgyis nas/_/snang ba de dang sgra snyan rab kyang bkye/_/
[\[239a.2\]]'di 'byung de ni sngon gyi ltas su byung /_/bud [{]myed [,]med [}]rin chen 'di 'dra 'jig rten du/_/tshul khrims dam pa rnam par dag pas byung /_/sug las bgyis pa chab 'tshal mi 'gyur bas/_/'di ni sngon cad legs par spyad pa'i 'bras/_/skra ni mthon ting 
[\[239a.3\]]mig yangs ud pa la/_/tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan kha dog rnam dag ldan/_/phreng ba rgyan mchog cha lugs dbyibs su shis/_/dpal ltar dri [{]myed [,]med [}]pad mo'i mchog las skyes/_/lus ni rnam dag yan lag rgyan du mnyam/_/lus kyi dbyibs legs yan lag 
[\[239a.4\]]yongs su tshang /_/gser gyi gzugs la nor bus phyis pa 'dra/_/phyogs kun 'od kyis rnam par gda' bar gsal/_/lus las tsan dan rgyal po'i spos kyi dri/_/phyogs su rgyas par 'di yi lus las 'byung /_/sgra snyan lha rdzas yid du 'ong brjod tshe/_/kha nas 
[\[239a.5\]]ud pa la yi ngad kyang ldang /_/'di ni gang tshe 'dzum zhing rgod pa'i tshe/_/rol mo'i sgra snyan de tshe 'byung bar 'gyur/_/bud med rin chen 'jig rten 'dir byung ste/_/tha mal kun gyi dbang du 'gyur ma lags/_/khyod ma gtogs par mi yi 'jig rten na/_/'di yi 
[\[239a.6\]]bdag po gzhan ni gcig ma mchis/_/mtshan rab brgyan pa'i sku gzugs mdzes mnga' ba/_/khyod kyi zhal sngar bu mo 'di bzhes gsol/_/'di ni ha cang mi ring mi thung ste/_/ha cang mi sbom ha cang phra ma lags/_/lto ni gzhu 'dra nu ma shas kyang rgyas/_/
[\[239a.7\]]yan lag skyon bral 'di ni khyod la 'os/_/grangs dang yi ge shes bgyi tshul rnams dang /_/lag brda'i tshul dang gtsug lag tshul la mkhas/_/'jig rten kun na bzo rnams ji snyed pa/_/ma lus de la 'di ni pha rol phyin/_/mda' gzhu'i tshul la 'ang rnam 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]pa rgyus su mkhas/_/'phong gi cho ga rnam par nges par rtogs/_/dgra yid bzhong zhing dbab pa kun la yang /_/'di ni mchog tu pha rol phyin par gyur/_/lus rnams kun la rin chen rnam dag pa'i/_/'od mchog 'khor gyis shin tu mdzes pa ste/_/sngon bgyis 
[\[239b.2\]]legs pas shin tu sdug par brgyan/_/'di ni khyod kyi phyag rjed khyod la 'os/_/mi yi 'jig rten gnas rnams ji snyed pa/_/de dag gso ba'i tshul gyi cho ga 'tshal/_/de dag ma lus thams cad zhir bgyi na'ang /_/ma nor sman gyi cho gas gso la mkhas/_/'dzam 
[\[239b.3\]]bu'i rgyal mtshan skad rnams thams cad dang /_/skye bo'i nges tshig ma lus bye brag dang /_/'jig rten tha snyad brjod pa'i mtshams sbyar ba/_/sna tshogs kun la'ang 'di ni pha rol phyin/_/dbyangs kyi yan lag mngon par bsgrub pa'i tshul/_/de dag bye brag tshul la'ang rab tu 
[\[239b.4\]]zhugs/_/'jig rten glu gar rnam pa ji snyed pa/_/ma lus de rnams kun gyi tshul yang 'tshal/_/rol mo sil snyan dag gi thabs rnams dang /_/bzhad gad rol mo'i tshul la rnam par mkhas/_/chags dang ma chags mi rnams mngon 'tshal kyang /_/khong khro chags par 
[\[239b.5\]]'gyur ba ma mchis so/_'jig rten bud med sgra rnams ji snyed pa/_/khyad par nang du de la ma lus 'tshal/_/bud [{]myed [,]med [}]skye bo'i skyon du bgyi ba rnams/_/grangs med de dag 'di la gcig ma mchis/_/thil gyis blta dang zur gyis blta ba dang /_/yan lag stabs dang 
[\[239b.6\]]yan lag rnams bstan dang /_/shes nyen kun la mkhas pa'i mthar phyin te/_/khyod kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid/_/'di ni phrag dog ser sna ma mchis te/_/'dod pa zhe dug mi ldang sdig mi bgyid/_/bzod cing drang la mnyen zhing des pa ste/_/
[\[239b.7\]]mi khro mi brlang shin tu mkhas pa lags/_/ldang ba'i ngang tshul yid du 'ong ba'i ngag_/rtag tu bla ma'i thugs dang sbyor ba ste/_/sku nyams gar bde lta zhing srid zhu che/_/khyod kyi spyod mthun rjes snyegs tshul dang mthun/_/rgas shing gtugs dang nad dang ldan pa dang /_/
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]phongs pa shin tu sdug bsngal gyur pa dang /_/mig dang bral zhing mgon skyabs ma mchis la/_/'di ni snying brtse rtag tu bskyed pa lags/_/'di ni rtag tu gzhan don sems la brtson/_/bdag la sman pa sems par bgyid ma mchis/_/'jig rten 
[\[240a.2\]]kun la sman par dga' ba ste/_/rlabs chen sems kyi yon tan kun gyis brgyan/_/mchis sam nyal la ma mchi'am 'greng yang rung /_/smra'am mi smra 'dzum zhing rgod kyang rung /_/rtag tu bag mchis dran pa shes bzhin te/_/'di ni 'jig rten kun gyis rtag tu bsngags/_/
[\[240a.3\]]bsod nams ldan pas kun tu rnam par snang /_/'gro ba kun kyang rtag tu dga' ba ste/_/'di la lta bas 'jig rten ngoms [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_/'di ni gang la'ang chags par ma mchis lags/_/dge bshes rnams la sri zhu 'di che ste/_/de dag mthong bar rtag par rab tu dga'/_/rjes su ci 'byung 
[\[240a.4\]]lta zhing skyon med tshul/_/sems bdag brtan pa ri rab ri dang 'dra/_/'di ni bsod nams mchog gis rtag tu brgyan/_/mi mdza' dgrar len 'di la yod ma mchis/_/'di'i shes 'dra bud [{]myed [,]med [}]gcig ma mchis/_/rgyal sras khyod la 'di ni tshul dang 'thun//_//sangs rgyas rmad ga 
[\[240a.5\]]cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po bco lnga ba/_de nas rgyal bu gzi brjid kyi bdag po bza' shing gi ra ba spos kyi myu gu'i rtse mo las 'od kyi sprin 'byung bar phyin te/_/bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa'i ma sprul 'tshong ma'i gtso mo blta na sdug 
[\[240a.6\]]pa'i mdun du/_bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu mo nga ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa yin te/_de bas na ngas thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshogs ni tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig bstsags par bya dgos 
[\[240a.7\]]bskal pa mtha' dang dbus med pa zhig tu byang chub sems dpa'i sbyad pa spyod de/_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad ni yongs su rdzogs par bya dgos/_phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod par bya dgos te/_sangs 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa ni yongs su gzung bar bya/_sangs rgyas kyi zhig thams cad ni yongs su sbyang par bya/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs ni mi gcad par bya/_sems can gyi rgyud thams cad ni yongs su smyin par bya/_sems can thams cad kyi 
[\[240b.2\]]'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ni rnam par bzlog par bya/_mtha' las rgal bar bde ba la ni sems can rab tu dgod par bya/_sems can thams cad kyi ye shes kyi [{]myig [,]mig [}]ni yongs su dag par bya/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bsgrub pa la ni brtson par bya/_
[\[240b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la ni gnas par bya/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sa ni yongs su bsgrub par bya/_sems can gyi khams thams cad ni yongs su sbyang bar bya/_sems can thams cad kyi phongs pa yongs su 
[\[240b.4\]]gtsang pa'i phyir bdag gi nor thams cad ni gtang bar bya/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin la spyod pa'i tshe/_kha zas dang /_btung ba'i sbyin pas ni sems can yongs su tshim par bya/_yo byad kyi dngos po thams cad yongs su gtang bas ni 
[\[240b.5\]]slong ba'i tshogs thams cad yongs su tshim par bya dgos te/_de ltar nga bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong pa la nan tan nyams su len pa'i tshe/_phyi nang gi dngos po gang ci rung ste/_yongs su mi gtang ba de lta bu med pas de ltar ngas bu dang bu mo 
[\[240b.6\]]dang /_chung ma yang sbyin par bya dgos/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]dang mgo dang rka lag dang /_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad kyang yongs su gtang dgos na/_/de'i tshe khyod gzhan byin na/_nga'i sbyin pa'i bgegs su 'gyur ro/_/bu yid du 'ong ba yongs su gtang na 
[\[240b.7\]]yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/lus dang sems kyi sdug bsgal yang mang po zhig nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/_/nga la bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar byas na ser sna'i sems su 'gyur ro/_/nga'i yan lag dang nying lag gtubs shing slongs 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]mo pa rnams la gtong ba'i tshe/_yid mi dga' bar yang 'gyur ro/_/nam zhig na ngas khyod bor te de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dus kyang yod de/_de'i tshe'ang khyod yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes 
[\[241a.2\]]nas rgyal bu gzi brjid kyi bdag bos de'i tshe/_bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_/ngas ni 'gro kun snying rje rab bskyed de/_/yun ring mchog nas byang chub rab zhugs pas/_/yang dag byang chub tshogs chen rgya 
[\[241a.3\]]mtsho rnams/_/tshad med thams cad yongs su rdzogs bya dgos/_/bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_/mkha' ltar tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]smon lam rnam sbyangs shing /_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i sa yi rnams/_/bskal pa mtha' 
[\[241a.4\]]yas yongs su sbyangs yang dgos/_/rgyal ba dus gsum 'byung ba thams cad kyi/_/pha rol phyin pa'i lam la ngas bslabs te/_/ye shes bla na med pa'i tshul chen gyis/_/byang chub lam mchog rnam par sbyangs yang dgos/_/phyogs rnams kun gyi 
[\[241a.5\]]zhing rnams thams cad kyang /_/kun nas nyon mongs rnam par sbyang bar bya/_/'jig rten kun gyi mi khom thams cad dang /_/ngan song kun kyang rnam par bzlog dgos so/_/nyon mongs bsgribs shing gti mug mun 'thoms pa'i/_/sems can kun kyang 
[\[241a.6\]]ma lus rnam sbyang dgos/_/sna tshogs thabs kyis yongs su sbyang byas te/_/thams cad mkhyen la tshul la dgod kyang dgos/_/chags med sa rnams kun kyang ngas sbyangs te/_/bskal pa rgya mtshor rgyal ba mchod par bya/_/'gro ba ma lus 
[\[241a.7\]]kun la byams bskyed de/_/'jig rten dag tu ma lus sbyin gtang dgos/_/slong ba kun nas 'dus shing 'ongs mthong nas/_/thams cad gtang bar rtag tu brtson gyur na/_/de tshe khyod ni nga sems mi 'thun te/_/zhum zhing dma' la 'jungs par 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]mi 'gyur ram/_/nga'i mgo 'dod 'ongs pa ngas mthong ste/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod gyur na/_/de tshe khyod ni sdug bsngal ba gdungs gyur gyis/_/'di 'dra'i don thos rab tu bstan par gyis/_/nga'i rka lag gtubs pa mthong gyur na/_/khyod ni mi 
[\[241b.2\]]dga' de tshe slong ba la/_/bud [{]myed [,]med [}]ngang gis tshig drag mi bzod smra/_/don 'di thosashing sems la yongs su soms/_/'phags pa'i dngos dag de bzhin bu rnams dang /_/khyod kyang slong ba'i tshogs la sbyin dgos kyis/_/don 'di thos te mi dga' 
[\[241b.3\]{]myed [,]med [}]na lta/_/khyod dga' thams cad de bzhin bya la rag/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pas/_rgyal bu gzi brjid kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gzhon nu ji skad gsungs pa de ltar bgyi'o/_/bdag ni 
[\[241b.4\]]khyod ci dgyes pa dang /_/ci bzhed par longs spyod pa dang /_gang du dgyes par mchi ba dang /_thams cad du yang slad nam las par rjes su 'brang ba dang /_rtag tu zham ring slebs pa dang /_don thams cad la brtson pa dang /_thugs dang 'thun par spyad pa 
[\[241b.5\]]dang /_med par nyams su blang ba dang /_/mi 'thun pa ma mchis bar nan tan tu bgyi ba'i tshul la spyad par bgyi'o/_/zhes nas bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pas/_rgyal po'i sras gzi brjid kyi bdag po la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_
[\[241b.6\]]bdag gi las 'di sems can dmyal ba yi/_/zhugs kyis yongs su gdungs zhu bar gyur kyang rung /_/khyod spyod skal ba mnyam pa'i phyag rjed du/_/tshe rabs rgya mtshor bdag gi spro bar bgyi/_/tshe rabs mtha' yas skyes pa re re zhing /_/bdag 
[\[241b.7\]]gi las ni shin tu gtubs gshags kyang /_/brtan dam sems kyis rab tu spro bar bgyis/_/dad dge khyod kyis bdag gi khyim thab mdzod/_/khor yug ri yis bskal pa mtha' yas su/_bdag gi mgo ni yongs su btags gyur kyang /_/
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]sems la mi bde ma mchis dad par bgyid/_/khyod kyis rtag par bdag gi khyim thab mdzod/_/khyod kyis tshe rabs grangs med thams cad du/_/bdag la thugs brtan thugs kyis mnga' mdzad de/_/lan lag sha gtubs gzhan la 
[\[242a.2\]]stsal bar mdzod/_/khyod kyi chos la bdag kyang brtan gzhag gsol/_/bdag gi las ni slad na ma las par/_/skyes bu lha yi sras po khyod la dbul/_/bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe/_/skye bo slong ba rnams la dgyes par gsol/_/
[\[242a.3\]]sems can kun la thugs rje mtha' yas pa/_/bskyed de sems can rgya mcho bsdu slad du/_/byang chub dam pa mchog tu khyod bzhugs pas/_/de slad bdag kyang thugs rjes gzung ba mdzod/_/logs spyod don dang nor gyi don ma lags/_/'dod spyod dga' ba 
[\[242a.4\]]bskyed pa'i don slad du/_/sems can mchog khyod khyor 'tshal ma lags kyi/_/khyod dang sbyong pa 'thun par spyad slad du'o/_/spyan gsal mdzes shing byams pa'i thugs mnga' ba/_/khyod ni 'jig rten gzigs pa ci tshul lags/_/thugs rje 
[\[242a.5\]]che yi 'dod chags thugs mi mnga'/_de la thub dbang 'gyur ba gdon mi 'tshal/_/khyod kyi zhabs kyis bcags pa'i sa rnams kyang /_/dri med rin chen 'od du gnas pa las/_/khams gsum kun tu 'khor los sgyur bar yang /_/
[\[242a.6\]]mtshan rab yongs kyis brgyan byon gdon mi 'tshal/_/bdag gis g.yar lam mthong ba dgung zhig la/_/chos bzang sprin 'od byang chub snying po yi/_/shing dbang drung na de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs/_/sangs rgyas sras mang du mas mdun 
[\[242a.7\]]du bdar/_/rgyal pa'i dbang po sku mchog nyi ma de/_/'dzam bu chu klung rin chen 'tsher ba 'dra/_/g.yar lam mthong bar phyag gis bdag mgo byug_/de nas sang nas glo ba rab tu dga'/_/dga' ba'i 'od ces bgyi ba rnam dag lus/_/
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]sngan chad gnyen bshes gyur pa'i lha mo yis/_/bdag la bstan pa bde gshegs de nyid ni/_/snying po yang dag byang chub yongs la zhugs/_/sngon yang gzhon nu gzi brjid khyod blta zhes/_/bdag gi sems bskyed de ltar bsam par gyur/_/mdang 
[\[242b.2\]]sum dgung la lha mo dge ba yis/_/gzhon nu de ni mthong bar 'gyur zhes bstan/_/bdag gi bde gshegs g.yar lam [{]rmyis [,]rmis [}]pas mthong /_/yongs su dag pa'i sems can khyod kyang mthong /_/yid bzhin bsam grub khyod dang bdag bcas pas/_/
[\[242b.3\]]de ring rgyal ba de la mchod par bgyi/_/de nas rgyal po'i bu gzi brjid kyi bdag pos/_de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa'i mtshan thos te/_sangs rgyas blta ba'i skabs byung nas dga' ba dang mos pa'i shugs chen po skyes te/_bu mo dga' ba'i 'od 
[\[242b.4\]]kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa la nor bu rin po che lnga brgyas mngon bar gtor nas/_gtsug gi rin po che dpal gyi 'od 'bar ba zhes bya ba yang de la byin no/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]mdog ltar 'dug pa'i nor bu rin po che dam pas brgyan pa'i gos rin po ches kyang de 
[\[242b.5\]]bkab po/_/de de ltar rim gror byas kyang dga' bar gyur pa'am/_/nyams bde bar gyur pa lta bu'ang med la dga' ba dang mos par yang ma gyur gyi/_gzhan du na thal mo sbyar cing [{]myig [,]mig [}]mi 'gebs par gzhon nu gzi brjid bdag gi gdong la blta zhing gnas 
[\[242b.6\]]bar gyur to/_/de nas sbrul 'tshong ma'i gtso mo blta na sdug pas/_rgyal ba gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_/bu mo 'di ni khyod gsal bgyi snyam nas/_/yun ring snga nas bdag gis bsam bsam ste/_/gzugs 
[\[242b.7\]]mdzes de yang de ring khyod la phul/_/bsod nams legs brgyan yon tan rab dang ldan/_/tshul khrims blo dang yon tan gzhan gyis kyang /_/bu mo dam pa 'di dang 'dra ba ni/_/mi yi 'jig rten gang na'ang ma mchis te/_/'jig rten kun gyi bud 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]med nang na mchog_/pad mo'i sbubs nas skyes pas rigs smos su/_/skyon gyi dri mas ma gos 'thad ma lags/_/ma lus skyon gyis ma gos sems dang ldan/_/rtag par khyod kyi spyod tshul mthun par 'gyur/_/reg na bde la kun nas 
[\[243a.2\]]'phags pas na/_/'di yi lus ni shin tu 'jam pa ste/_/bro 'tshal nad pa gang la reg gyur kyang /_/de'i mod la bro dang bral bar 'gyur/_/'di'i lus las spos kyi ngad 'byung ba/_/spos mchog gzhan rnams mngon par zil gyis gnon/_/de yi dri 
[\[243a.3\]]zhim ma tshor na rnam dag pa'i/_/tshul khrims gnas par mi rnams kun kyang 'gyur/_/'di yi lus ni gser gyi mdog 'dra ste/_/pad mo'i mchog ltar rnam par rab tu gsal/_/khros pas bltas na byams pa'i sems ldan par/_sems can ma lus 
[\[243a.4\]]kun kyang rab tu 'gyur/_/'di yi tshig snyan yid du 'ong ba ste/_/nyams su bde bas 'gro ba nyan par dga'/_/thos na de rgyus skyon gyi mun pa dang /_/mi dge'i sug las bgyid par mos mi 'gyur/_/'di ni bsam dag yid la dri med de/_/'di la kun tu g.yo 
[\[243a.5\]]dang sgyu ma mchis/_/ji smra de dag yid la'ang de bzhin te/_/tshig dbyangs des ni 'gro ba tshim par bgyid/_/sgyu yis sems can 'drid par mi 'gyid de/_/nor gyi don du 'gro ba yongs mi slu/_/yid bsdams khrel gyis 'dzem dang ldan pa ste/_/rgan nam 
[\[243a.6\]]gzhon la'ang rtag tu srid zhus spyod/_/rigs rgyud gzugs kyis dregs pa ma mchis te/_/'di ni 'khor gyis dregs pa'ang yod ma mchis/_/nga rgyal rlom sems yongs dang bral ba ste/_/'gro ba rnams la rtag tu gus par 'dud/_/de nas rgyal po'i bu gzi 
[\[243a.7\]]brjid kyi bdag po bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_bu mo stong phrag nyi shu dang /_'khor thams cad dang bcas par bza' shing gi ra ba spos kyi myu gu'i rtse mo nas 'od kyi sprin 'byung ba de nas byung ste/_snying po byang chub chos kyis 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]'phags pa'i 'od gang na ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa gang na ba der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa'i zhal blta ba dang /_de la phyag 'tshal ba dang /_mchod pa dang bsten bkur bya ba'i phyir dong ste/_/de rta 
[\[243b.2\]]babs sa'i bar du bzhon pas song nas babs te rkang pas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa'i drung du song ngo /_/de nas rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag pos rgyang ring zhig nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[243b.3\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu bzang ba blta na sdug pa dbang po zhi ba thugs zhi ba/_dbang po bsdams pa/_glang po ltar shin tu dul ba/_mtsho ltar dang zhing rnyog pa med la rnam par gsal ba mthong ngo /_/de ltar mthong nas de'i sems mngon 
[\[243b.4\]]bar mos par gyur te/_de ltar sems mngon par mos par gyur nas sangs rgyas mthong ba'i dga' ba dang /_mos pa'i shugs chen po rnam par spel de dga' ba dang mos pa dang /_spro pa chen pos yongs su rgyas pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das de la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas 
[\[243b.5\]]bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa 'khor thams cad dang bcas pas/_bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_rin po che dam pa'i pad mo stong phrag lnga brgyas bcom ldan 'das de la mngon par gtor te/_bcom ldan 'das de'i gtsug 
[\[243b.6\]]lag khang lnga brgya nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po spos sna tshogs las byas pa rin po che'i rgyal po sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa/_lnga brgya brtsigs so/_/gtsug lag khang re re zhing yang nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po stong phrag lnga brgyas rab tu brgyan to/_/de nas bcom 
[\[243b.7\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pas gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas mdo sde sgo kun tu lta ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan to/_/des de thos nas chos thams cad kyi tshul la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rgya mtsho phrag bcu thob par gyur 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]te/_'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob bo/_/dus gsum snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob bo/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor mngon du gyur 
[\[244a.2\]]bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgor rab tu thob po/_/sems can 'byam klas pa thams cad rab tu snang bar bya ba la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob po/_/'jig rten thams cad du 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba la zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi 
[\[244a.3\]]sgo rab tu thob po/_/sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho la 'jug pa snang ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob bo/_/'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i ye shes kyi sprin ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob po/_/'gro ba thams 
[\[244a.4\]]cad yongs su smyin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba la mngon du gyur pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob po/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra rnams [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob po/_/
[\[244a.5\]]kun tu bzang bo'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag par byed pa'i smon lam gyi sprin ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob ste/_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bcu po 'di dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]ba chos kyi tshul thams cad la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rgya mtsho phrag bcu rab tu 
[\[244a.6\]]thob par gyur to/_/bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pas kyang ye shes thub par dka' ba rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sems nges par gzhag pa rab tu thob par gyur te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir mi 
[\[244a.7\]]ldog par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po'i bu gzi brjid kyi bdag pos/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa'i zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]nas/_bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa dang /_'khor thams cad dang bcas te/_bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan snga nas dong ngo /_/de nas rgyal po'i gnas sdong bo ri bo'i dpal gang na ba dang /_rgyal po yab nor gyi bdag po gang na ba der dong ste/_drung 
[\[244b.2\]]du phyin nas/_rgyal po yab nor gyi bdag po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_don 'di brjod do/_/lha'i zhal snga nas mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sku nyi ma dam pa zhes 
[\[244b.3\]]bgyi ba mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo bsgyur ba/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/_khyod kyi khams 'di nyid kyi snying po byang chub 
[\[244b.4\]]chos kyi sprin shin tu sdug pa'i 'od na rnam par spyod de/_mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lags so/_/de nas rgyal po nor gyi bdag pos/_gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gzhon nu khyod la don 'di lha 'am mi 'am 
[\[244b.5\]]su zhig gi sbran/_des smras pa/_bdag la bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pas sbran to/_/de nas rgyal po nor gyi bdag pos sangs rgyas byung bar thos nas/_sangs rgyas skye ba la ni gter rab tu thob tsam du sems/_sangs rgyas 
[\[244b.6\]]rin po che dang phrad par ni dka' bar sems/_de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas ni ngan song gi g.yang sa'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyang rnam par ldog par sems/_nyon mongs pa'i nad chen po rab tu zhi bar bya ba la ni sman pa'i rgyal po chen po dang phrad pa tsam du 
[\[244b.7\]]sems/_'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las ni yongs su 'grel ba yin par sems/_shin tu bde zhing ldan pa la ni rab tu gzhog par sems/_rab rib med pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba ni yang dag par ston par sems/_ma rig pa'i mun pa bstsal 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]ba la ni sgron ma chen po byung ba tsam du sems/_'jig rten mgon med pa las ni chos kyi tshul gyi mgon dang phrad par sems/_'jig rten 'dren pa med pa las ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi theg pas 'dren pa skyes par sems shing sangs rgyas byung 
[\[245a.2\]]bar thos pas mos pa dang /_spro ba chen po skyes nas rgyal rigs dang bram ze dag ljongs kyi mi dang /_yul gyi mi dang /_blon po dang zham ring ba dang /_gzhon nu dang rgyal phran dang /_khams kyi bdag po dang /_'khor thams cad kyang kun nas bsdus nas/_
[\[245a.3\]]sangs rgyas byung bar sgra snyan pa sgrog pa'i gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po la rgyal po'i srid de yang chos kyi dgab bar byin no/_/de ltar gzhon nu de rgyal srid la dbang bskur nas/_srog chags stong phrag bcu dang lhan cig tu/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku 
[\[245a.4\]]nyi ma dam pa gang na ba der song ste/_spyan sngar phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das de la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar rang gi 'khor dang 
[\[245a.5\]]bcas te 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pas/_rgyal po nor gyi bdag po dang /_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la gzigs nas/_de'i tshe mdzod spu nas 'od gzer 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba rab 
[\[245a.6\]]tu bkye'o/_/des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byas te/_'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad mngon sum du bkod nas/_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bstan te/_sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can 
[\[245a.7\]]rnams kyi bsam pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par sbyangs nas/_de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi sku 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi gsung dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho thams 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]cad dang ldan pas/_gzungs kyi sgo chos thams cad la rab rib med pa'i don gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba gzungs kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang bcas par yang dag par bstan to/_/de nas rgyal po nor gyi bdag pos gzungs kyi sgo de thos nas chos thams cad la chas 
[\[245b.2\]]kyi snang ba chen po skyes par gyur to/_/'khor de'i byang chub sems dpal 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kyang chos thams cad la rab rib med pa'i don gyi sgron ma'i gzungs rab tu thob par gyur to/_/khrag khrig drug cus ni nye bar len pa med par zag pa las 
[\[245b.3\]]sems can rnam par grol lo/_/srog chags stong phrag bcus ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med par rnam par dag par gyur to/_/sems can grangs med pa zhig gis ni sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa yongs su bskyed do/_/
[\[245b.4\]]phyogs bcur yang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bstan pa des sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa theg pa gsum gyis dul bar gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po nor gyi bdag po chos kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/_de'i yid la 'di 
[\[245b.5\]]snyam ste/_khyim na gnas pas ni rnam pa 'di lta bu'i chos kyang khong du chud par mi nus la ye shes rnam pa 'di lta bu yang bsgrubs par mi nus kyis bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zham ring du rab tu 'byung ngo snyam nas/_rgyal po nor gyi bdag pos/_bcom ldan 'das de la 'di 
[\[245b.6\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zham ring du rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong gi tshul la mchis par ci gnang zhes nas/_bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po de'i dus la dbab par shes na rung ngo /_/
[\[245b.7\]]de nas rgyal po nor gyi bdag po srog chags stong phrag bcu dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa'i zham ring du rab tu byung ngo /_/de ltar rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon par gzungs kyi sgo chos thams cad la rab rib med pa'i don gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba de 'khor dang 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]bcas par yongs su bsgrubs so/_/bsgoms so/_/shin tu bsgoms so/_/de snyed kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo yang rab tu thob par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bcu yang rab tu thob bo/_/so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshul rgya mtsho 
[\[246a.2\]]la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to/_/phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du 'gro ba thogs pa med pa'i spyod yul zhes bya ba'i lus yongs su dag pa yang rab tu thob ste/_des bcom ldan 'das de'i chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par blangs so/_/yongs su bzung ngo /_/
[\[246a.3\]]gtam gyi skyes bu yang byas so/_/chos smra ba chen po yang byas so/_/bstan pa yongs su gzung ba yang byas so/_/mngon par shes pa thob pa'i stobs kyis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/_bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams 
[\[246a.4\]]la lus yongs su bstan nas/_sangs rgyas byung ba de rab tu brjod pa dang /_sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su bsgrub pa'i chos nyid mngon par brjod pa dang /_sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa de dag yongs su brjod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul 
[\[246a.5\]]pa'i mthu de dag yongs su brjod par bya bas bstan pa yongs su gzung ba byas so/_/rgyal po'i sras gzi brjid kyi bdag pos kyang de'i nyin par zla ba nya ste/_rgyas pa'i tshe rin po che bdun rab tu thob par gyur te/_de khang ba'i steng na bud med kyi tshogs kyis 
[\[246a.6\]]bskor cing 'dug pa'i mdun du 'khor lo rin po che chen po shugs la thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba rtsibs stong phrag brgya dang ldan pa rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_lha rdzas kyi 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser las grub pa/_'od kun tu 'byung ba rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan 
[\[246a.7\]]ba byung bar gyur to/_/glang bo rin po che chen po rdo rje rin po che'i ri'i gzi brjid ces bya ba 'byung bar gyur to/_/rta rin po che ri sngo rlung gi shugs shes bya ba byung bar gyur to/_/nor bu rin po che chen po nyi ma'i snying po 'od sprin rgyal po zhes bya ba byung bar gyur to/_/bu mo dga' 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa de yang bud med rin po cher byung bar gyur to/_/khyim bdag rin po che nor kyi phung po mang po zhes bya ba byung bar gyur to/_/blon po rin po che mig dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yang byung bar gyur to/_/de ltar bdun no de de ltar rin po che bdun dang ldan pa'i 
[\[246b.2\]]rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba gling bzhi la dbang ba chos dang ldan pa/_chos kyi rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba dang ldan pa yul gyi mthu dang brtson 'grus su ldan par gyur te/_de la bu dpa' la brtul phod cing yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms 
[\[246b.3\]]pa stong yod par gyur te/_des sa chen po 'di skyon med pa dang /_dgra med pa dang /_gnod pa med pa dang /_'tshe ba med pa dang /_skyid pa dang phun sum tshogs pa dang /_bde ba dang lo legs pa dang /_mdangs dga' ba dang /_skye bo'i mi mang pos yongs su gang ba yang ri 
[\[246b.4\]]dang rgya mtsho'i mthas klas par chos kyis mngon par brgyan te/_gnas par byas so/_/de sa 'dzam bu'i gling de'i rgyal po'i gnas stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dag tu yang rgyal po'i gnas re rer gtsug lag khang lnga brgya byed du btsud de/_thams cad kyang rnam pa'i 
[\[246b.5\]]mchog thams cad dang ldan pa sha stag go_/longs spyod dang yo byad kyi rnam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa sha stag go_/bza' shing gi ra ba dang /_khang pa dang 'chag sa dang /_dus thams cad du bde bar spyad pa'i nags tshal gyi phreng bas rnam par brgyan 
[\[246b.6\]]pa sha stag go_/gtsug lag khang re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten brtsigs pa ni lhun gyi rgya shin tu che bar byas pa ste/_nang rin po che rnam pa mang pos brgyan pa/_rin po che'i rgyal po sna tshogs kyis rnam par spras pa sha stag ste/_
[\[246b.7\]]rgyal po'i gnas de thams cad du'ang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa 'khor dang bcas pa/_grong khyer du gshegs par bya ba'i phyir spyan drangs so/_/rgyal po'i gnas de dag kun tu yang de bzhin gshegs pa de la de bzhin 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]gshegs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa thams cad du bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchod de/_sangs rgyas grong khyer du gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rnam par 'phrul pas sems can tshad med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir gshegs su 
[\[247a.2\]]gsol to/_/der yang sems can ma dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams ni dad pa thob par gyur to/_/dad pa dang ldan pa'i sems cad rnams ni sangs rgyas mthong bas dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar gyur to/_/dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel ba'i 
[\[247a.3\]]sems can rnams ni byang chub kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa thob par gyur to/_/byang chub kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i sems can rnams ni snying rje chen po'i sems skyes par gyur to/_/sems can la phan par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[247a.4\]]thams cad yongs su btsal ba la brtson par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul gyi rnam pa la mkhas pa'i sems can rnams ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir sems mngon par gzhol bar gyur to/_/chos mnyam pa nyid la zhugs 
[\[247a.5\]]pa'i sems can rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa'i phyir/_sems mngon par gzhol bar gyur to/_/dus gsum gyi ye shes snang ba thob pa'i sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par bya ba'i don du 
[\[247a.6\]]ye shes snang ba la zhugs par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par bya ba la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams ni 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i don du sems can mngon par gzhol bar gyur to/_/'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsdu 
[\[247a.7\]]ba la brtson pa'i sems can rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir smon lam skyed par gyur to/_/lam gyi mnyam pa nyid la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]ye shes snang ba skyed par gyur to/_/chos rgya mtsho rnam par dbye ba la mngon par mos pa'i sems can rnams ni zhing gi dra ba thams cad rang gi lus kyis rgyas par gang ba'i don du sems mngon par gzhol bar gyur to/_/zhing mnyam pa nyid la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams ni 
[\[247b.2\]]sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir smon lam 'debs par gyur to/_/'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dpyad pa la brtson pa'i sems can rnams ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir bsam 
[\[247b.3\]]pa rnam par dag par gyur to/_/sems can rnam pa de lta bu dag gi don rnam pa de lta bu de dag 'grub par 'gyur ba mthong nas/_rgyal po gzi brjid kyi bdag pos sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan pas sems 
[\[247b.4\]]can de dag yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba'i don du rgyal po'i gnas de dag thams cad du de bzhin gshegs sku nyi ma dam pa gshegs su gsol to/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i bu gzi brjid kyi bdag po zhes bya 
[\[247b.5\]]bar gyur pa de bzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na ni/_khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa 'di ni de'i tshe de'i dus na/_rgyal po'i bu gzi brjid kyi bdag po zhes bya ba 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la dbang ba de bzhin 
[\[247b.6\]]gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa de yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po nor gyi bdag po gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po'i yab du gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na ni de ltar mi blta ste/_de bzhin 
[\[247b.7\]]gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog gi 'od ces bya ba ni de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po nor gyi bdag po zhes bya bar gyur pa ste/_da ltar shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]rgya mtsho chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i gzugs brnyan gyi sprin ces bya ba na/_'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud dbu ma dus gsum rab tu snang ba'i rin po che'i rgyal po yongs su 'byung ba'i dbyings shes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi dkyil 
[\[248a.2\]]'khor dpal gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba na/_snying bo byang chub thams cad la dbang ba'i lus rab tu snang ba zhes bya bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[248a.3\]]'khor gyis bskor cing chos ston to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i 'od ces bya ba des sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i gzugs brnyan du snang ba'i sprin yongs su 
[\[248a.4\]]dag par mdzad de/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho der de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig byung bar gyur pa dang /_'byung ba dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog gi 'od des sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 
[\[248a.5\]]mdzad pa'i tshe/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smyin par mdzad pa sha stag go_/rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i btsun mo pad mo dpal gyi snying po 'byung ba zhes bya ba byung ste/_gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag 
[\[248a.6\]]po'i yum du gyur pa bud med stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i gtso mor gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na ni/_de ltar mi blta ste/_rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das kyi yum lha mo sgyu ma byang chub sems dpa' bskyed bskyed pa rnam par thar pa kun tu snang zhing sgrib pa 
[\[248a.7\]]med pa la rab tu gnas pa/_sngon de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su bsgrubs pa mngon du gyur pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba thams cad yongs su bstan pa'i tshul la mkhas pa 'di ni de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po nor gyi bdag pa'i btsun mo dam pa pad mo dpal gyi snying 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]po 'byung ba zhes bya bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na sprul 'tshong ma'i gtso mo blta na sdug pa zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na ni de ltar mi blta ste/_shAkya lag na khar pa'i chung ma kho mo'i ma mig mdzes 
[\[248b.2\]]shes bya ba 'di ni de'i tshe de'i dus na sprul 'tshong ma'i gtso mo blta na sdug pa zhes bya bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa/_zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin ba tsam du sems na 
[\[248b.3\]]ni de ltar mi blta ste/_kho mo ni de'i tshe de'i dus na/_sprul 'tshong ma'i bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa zhes bya bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gzi brjid kyi bdag po'i 'khor du gyur pa de 
[\[248b.4\]]rnams gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na ni/_rigs kyi bu de ni de ltar mi blta ste bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /_smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la dgod dgod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 
[\[248b.5\]]'khor 'di nyid na 'khod cing /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gzugs brnyan rab tu byung ba'i lus dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rnam par spyod pa las mnyams pa'i sems dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhal 
[\[248b.6\]]mngon du mthong bar rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i mig dang de bzhin mig dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi yan lag gi sprin nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bsgrags pa'i dbyangs rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i rna ba dang /_chos thams cad la rnam par spyad par 
[\[248b.7\]]dbang bsgyur ba'i dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rjes su grags pa'i ming gi sgra dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du nye bar 'gro ba rgyun mi gcod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang /_
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]sems can thams cad la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par ston pa'i lus yongs su smyin bar bya ba dang /_gdul ba la rjes su mthun pa mngon par bsgrubs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /_smon lam 
[\[249a.2\]]yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_yang dag par bsgrubs pa phyogs kyi dra ba ma lus pa thams cad du 'dal te/_ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa thams cad du rgyun mi 'chad pa dang ldan pa sha stag_/bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'khod 
[\[249a.3\]]pa 'di dag yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa de ni 'khor los sgyur ba gzi brjid kyi bdag po dang /_kho mos nam bzhugs kyi bar du na bza' dang bshos dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun gyi rkyen sman dang yo byad kyis bsnyen 
[\[249a.4\]]bkur to/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa sku shin tu dang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de yang kho mo cag gis bsnyen bkur to/_
[\[249a.5\]]rim gror byas so/_/bsti stang du byas so/_/phu dud du byas so/_/mchod do/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa sku thams cad la ye shes kyi gzugs brnyan gyi zla ba snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de yang kho mo cig gis lha'i dbang por gyur te/_
[\[249a.6\]]bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu chu klung gi gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa sku mtshan gyis rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[249a.7\]]'od gzer sna tshogs 'bar ba'i zla ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rnam par gzigs pa'i ye shes dpal zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes chen po'i 'od gzer shin tu yangs pa'i 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]rgyal po zhes bya ba bsten bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mthu bo che'o brtson 'grus zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i mthu zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin 
[\[249b.2\]]gshegs pa kun tu rnam par gzigs pa'i ye shes shes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dri ma med pa phun sum tshogs pa'i sprin ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i 'od 
[\[249b.3\]]ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer 'bar ba'i gtsug phud ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'od gzer rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ye 
[\[249b.4\]]shes nyi ma'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa sku rin po che'i pad mo shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams sgron ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/
[\[249b.5\]]de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od gzer gyi sprin gyi 'od ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rnam par snang ba'i zla ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan dang gdugs kyi dbyangs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba 
[\[249b.6\]]bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes snang bas rnam par gnon pa'i seng ge zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi yul gyi blo gros zla ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin 
[\[249b.7\]]gshegs pa sems can nam mkha'i sems snang ba'i gzugs zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi ba'i spos kyi gtsug bzang po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i dbyangs kun tu 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]bsgrags pa zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rab tu brtan pa'i 'od gzer kyi dra ba'i gzugs kyi phung po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i ri bo'i gzi brjid ces bya ba 
[\[250a.2\]]bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya tsho'i 'brug sgra sgrog pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas nam mkha' snang ba'i gtsug phud ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin 
[\[250a.3\]]gshegs pa 'od gzer zla ba mdzod spu'i sprin ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi zhal shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i me tog snang ba zhes bya ba bsnyen 
[\[250a.4\]]bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro ba'i ri bo dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya chen po gzi brjid kyi 'od ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs 
[\[250a.5\]]pa ting nge 'dzin gyi ri rab mngon par 'phags pa'i ye shes shes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba'i mtshan zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa sku 'od 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba 
[\[250a.6\]]bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mchog 'od kyi gzi brjid ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi spyod pa kun tu thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs 
[\[250a.7\]]pa 'od 'phro rgya mtsho'i sgo'i sgron ma zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi gzhal med khang gi dbyangs kyi rgyan zhes bya ba bsnyen 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mi mtshungs grags pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rab tu brkyang pa zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa sngon gyi smon 
[\[250b.2\]]lam gyi 'phrul pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i ye shes don gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyis 'phags pa'i nam mkha'i dbang phyug ces bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/
[\[250b.3\]]de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dpal gyi snying po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos mthu bo che'i dpal zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal zhes 
[\[250b.4\]]bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho'i pad mo zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur to/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa 'jig rten gyi khams der sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu byung 
[\[250b.5\]]ste/_de dag thams cad kho mo cag gis na bza' dang /_bshos dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun gyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad kyis bsnyen bkur to/_/rim gror byas so/_/bsti stang du byas so/_/phu dud du byas so/_/mchod do/_/rigs kyi 
[\[250b.6\]]bu sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu po de dag thams cad kyi tha mar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos rgya chen po la mos pa yang dag par 'byung ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba byung ste/_bcom ldan 
[\[250b.7\]]'das de grong khyer du gshegs pa la kho mo rgyal po'i chung mar gyur te/_khyim thab dang bcas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa mchod pa'i sgo rnam pa thams cad du bshams pas mchod pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das de las chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]pa thams cad skye ba 'byung ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba thos so/_/de thos nas kho mos ye shes kyi mig rab tu thob ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par lta ba'i yul 
[\[251a.2\]]'di yang rab tu thob par gyur te/_rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo rnam par thar ba 'di la sgom zhing byang chub sems dpa' dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod cing bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig tu rgyu rgyu ste/_sangs rgyas 
[\[251a.3\]]kyi zhing de snyed kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bskal pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' dang dbus med pa zhig bsnyen bkur nas/_bskal pa la la ni de bzhin gshegs ba bskal par bzhugs pa gcig kyang bsnyen bkur to/_/bskal pa la la ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[251a.4\]]pa gnyis kyang bsnyen bkur to/_/bskal pa la la la ni de bzhin gshegs pa brjod du med pa'i bar dag kyang bsnyen bkur to/_/bskal pa la la la ni de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang bsnyen bkur te/_de srid du kho mos byang 
[\[251a.5\]]chub sems dpa'i sku yang tshad ni ji tsam zhig_/dbyibs ni ji lta bu zhig/_sku mdog ni ci 'dra ba zhig yin pa khong du chud do/_/sku'i phrin las kyang khong du ma chud/_gsung gi phrin las dang thugs kyi phrin las kyang khong du ma chud do/_/ye shes kyi gzigs 
[\[251a.6\]]pa dang /_ye shes kyi spyod yul dang /_ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi yul yang khong du ma chud do/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cig gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa mthong nas/_byang chub sems dpal la dga' ba'i sems skyes te/_
[\[251a.7\]]brda sna tshogs dang bsnyen pa sna tshogs kyis mos pa bskyed par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thabs sna tshogs kyis yongs su bzung ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor du gyur ro/_/de dag kyang byang 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe 'khor du 'grogs 'grogs pas bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya chen po la mos pa yang dag par 'byung 
[\[251b.2\]]ba'i gzi brjid kyi zhal mthong ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul rgya mtsho la rnam par lta ba'i yul 'di thob nas/_rnam par thar pa 'di sgom zhing byang chub sems dpa' dang bskal ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag 
[\[251b.3\]]stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig tu 'grogs 'grogs te/_bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig byung bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mos bsnyen bkur to/_/mchod do rim gror byas so/_/
[\[251b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad las kyang kho mos chos bstan pa thos te/_yongs su blangs so/_/yang dag par gzung ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad las kyang kho mos rnam par thar pa 'di tshul sna tshogs dang /_mdo sde'i 
[\[251b.5\]]tshul gyi gsung sna tshogs dang /_rnam par thar pa'i rang bzhin sna tshogs dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo sna tshogs dang /_rnam par thar pa'i rgyud sna tshogs dang /_dus la 'jug pa sna tshogs dang /_zhing rgya mtsho la 'jug pa sna tshogs dang /_sangs 
[\[251b.6\]]rgyas blta ba rgya mtsho rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par bya ba sna tshogs dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa sna tshogs dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rgya mtsho'i tshul gyi lam sna tshogs dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par 
[\[251b.7\]]bsgrub pa sna tshogs dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'byam klas pa sna tshogs kyis thob par gyur kyang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i tshul ni khong du ma chud do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]kun tu bzang po rnams kyi rnam par thar pa'i tshul ni nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas par tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sems can gyi ming du bya ba thams cad kyi dbyings ltar tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dus gsum gyi rgyud rgya mtsho'i dbyings ltar tshad med do/_/phyogs rgya 
[\[252a.2\]]mtsho'i dbyings ltar tshad med do/_chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyings ltar tshad med do/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rnams kyi rnam par thar pa'i tshul gyi lus ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang mnyam pa'o/_/de ltar rigs kyi bu kho mos 
[\[252a.3\]]bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i sku la lta lta yang blta bas ma ngoms te/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_gcig tu 'dod chags la spyod pa'i skyes pa dang bud med phan tshun nas phrad bar dus byas pa 
[\[252a.4\]]gnyis la ni sems kyi rgyud tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa las byung ba gtsang ba'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par rtog pas myos pa las byung ba tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig skye'o/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i sku la lta na ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang 'jig 
[\[252a.5\]]rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'byam klas pa mtha' dang dbus med pa tshad med par shin tu bstan pa gzhi sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_mtshams kyi rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan pa ri'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa sa'i gzhi'i rgyan sna tshogs bstan du yod pa sprin sna 
[\[252a.6\]]tshogs dang ldan pa'i nam mkha' kun nas khyab pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/_tshul dang [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang grangs sna tshogs su brjod pa sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud sna tshogs 'byung ba snying po byang chub kyi rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[252a.7\]]chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_mdo sde'i tshul sna tshogs shin tu bstan pa'i sgra 'byung ba/_theg pa'i tshul sna tshogs mngon par bsgrub pa 'byung ba dang ldan 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]pa/_yongs su dag pa'i 'od dang snang ba sna tshogs kyi rab tu snang ba mtshan ma sngan chad ma mthong ba dag sems kyi skad cig re re zhing [{]myig [,]mig [}]lam du snang ngo /_/ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa snying po byang chub kyi rgyan sna tshogs mnga' ba chos kyi 
[\[252b.2\]]'khor lo bskor ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa mdo sde'i tshul sna tshogs sgrog pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang ldan pa dag kyang rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshul du sems kyi skad cig re re la [{]myig [,]mig [}]lam du snang ngo /_/ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang sems can rgya mtsho mtha' 
[\[252b.3\]]dang dbus med pa khyim dang kun dga'i ra ba dang ri dang gzhal med khang dang chu klung dang rgya mtsho la gnas pa gzugs dang lus sna tshogs can longs spyod kyi yul sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_spyod pa dang spyod yul dang sbyor ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_dbang po sna tshogs su 
[\[252b.4\]]bsgrub pa'i tshul dang ldan pa dag kyang sems kyi skad cig re re la [{]myig [,]mig [}]lam du snang ngo /_/ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang dus gsum rgya mtsho la 'jig pa'i tshul mtha' dang dbus med pa zhig mig lam du snang ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rgya mtsho mtha' dang 
[\[252b.5\]]dbus med pa zhig ni rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang yongs su snang ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa mtha' dang 
[\[252b.6\]]dbus med pa dag kyang yongs su snang ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang yongs su snang ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang yongs su snang 
[\[252b.7\]]ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa chen po'i tshul rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang yongs su snang ngo /_/sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba'i mthu dang thabs rgya mtsho dag la'ang 'jug cing khong du chud 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]do/_byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po'i sprin gyi tshul rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang yongs su 'grub bo/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba'i shugs chen po rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang rnam par 'phel te/_sems kyi skad 
[\[253a.2\]]cig re re la yang sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i tshul rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang rab tu 'grub bo/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo bskal ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag tu byang chub sems dpa' ba spu'i sgo re re zhing sems kyi skad 
[\[253a.3\]]cig re re la chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la zhugs te/_khong du chud par byas kyang mthar thug par ma gyur te sngon khong du chud pa la bzlas te/_khong du chud par byas pa'ang med do sngon thos pa la bzlas te/_thos bar bya ba'ang med do/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar 
[\[253a.4\]]don thams cad grub pa btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs shing bud med kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor bar bzhugs pa'i tshe'ang kho mo ni ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang dus gsum gyi tshul rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i tshul rgya mtsho khong du chud 
[\[253a.5\]]par bya bas yongs su 'jug go_/rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par lta bu'i yul 'di shes te/_mnyam par gzhog par zad na kho mos byang chub sems dpa' thabs kyi tshul 
[\[253a.6\]]rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la zhugs pa sems can thams cad dang mnyam zhing 'dra ba'i dbyings su gnas pa'i lus rnam par dmigs pa yongs su ston pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa dang ma mthun par spyod pa yongs su ston pa ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sprul 
[\[253a.7\]]pa'i sprin rab tu 'gyed pa lus med pa'i chos nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin shin tu rnam par dag pa nam mkha'i mtshan nyid du 'gro ba'i rang bzhin khong du chud pas rnam pa rtog pa med pa thams cad du rjes su song ba'i blo rnam par gdon mi za bas de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam pa 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]rnam par 'phrul pa la brtson pa rnam par thar pa'i yul mtha' dang dbus med pas rnam par 'phrul pa la zhugs pa chos kyi dbyings shin tu rgya chen por sems bskyed pas 'jug pa la rnam par spyod cing dbang bsgyur ba chos kyi gnas sgo thams cad dang ldan pa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho la rnam 
[\[253b.2\]]par rtse ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am yon tan gyi gter ma lus par bstan par nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhabs kyi drung 'di nyid na khri rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po sIng mo'i snying po can la byang 
[\[253b.3\]]chub sems dpa'i yum lha mo sgyu ma zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi chos kyi dri ma thams cad kyis mi gos pa yin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i nan tan la rgyun 
[\[253b.4\]]mi chad pa yin pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi mtha' thams cad las phyir mi ldog pa yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa la 'jug pa la sgrib pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ba yin pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par spyod pa thams cad la 
[\[253b.5\]]gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa yin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mngon du gyur par gnas pa yin pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i nan tan las phyir mi ldog pa yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par byang chub sems 
[\[253b.6\]]dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la gnas par bya ba las phyir mi ldog pa yin pa dang /_theg pa chen po'i smon lam las phyir mi zlog pa yin pa dang 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su gzung ba dang rnam par spel ba la sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ba yin pa 'dris shig_/de nas 
[\[253b.7\]]shAkya'i bu mo go pas rnam par thar ba'i sgo'i tshul 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/yang dag byang chub spyod la brtson pa yi/_/sems can dam pa sems can sus mthong ba/_/mos pa'i 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]sems sam khong khro ldan yang rung /_/de yi bsdu bas kun kyang yongs su 'du/_/zhing brgya'i rdul phran rab tu phra snyed kyi/_/bskal pa mang po kho mos 'di nas dran/_/de yi pha rol bskal pa rnam brgyan la/_/'jig rten khams rab ri bo'i 'od byung ngo /_/de la thub pa stong phrag 
[\[254a.2\]]'grangs pa ni/_/bye ba khrag khrig sum cu drug byung ste/_/de kun tha mar thub dbang byung ba ni/_/'gro ba'i sgron ma chos kyi rgyal mtshan no/_/de tshe rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid byung /_/thub dbang de ni mya ngan yongs 'das nas/_/dgra yi 'khor bcom 
[\[254a.3\]]'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dir/_/bka' la thogs med mnga' bdag dam par gyur/_/de la bu ni brgya phrag lnga yod de/_/kun kyang dpa' zhing brtul phod gzugs dang ldan/_/yan lag kun rdzogs rnam par dag pa'i lus/_/gong na med pa'i dpal 
[\[254a.4\]]gyis rab tu brgyan/_/rgyal po sras bcas bde gshegs 'dun par gyur/_/rgyal pa'i mchod pa rgya chen rab kyang byas/_/de ni rtag tu dam chos yongs bzung pa'i/_/chos la mngon brtson rab tu brtan par gyur/_/rgyal po de sras 'od gzer bzang po ni/_/
[\[254a.5\]]sems can rnam dag gzhon nu 'khrungs gyur pa/_/shin tu blta mdzes yid 'ong gzugs ldan te/_/yan lag mtshan rab sum cu gnyis kyis brgyan/_/rgyal srid yongs su spangs nas mi yi 'khor/_/bye ba lngas bskor de tshe rab tu byung /_/rab tu 
[\[254a.6\]]byung nas brtson 'grus brtan ldan te/_/rgyal ba'i chos kyang yongs su gzung bar gyur/_/pho brang dam pa sdong po ldan pa ni/_/grong mchog bye ba stong gis kun nas bskor/_/nags tshal yal ga sna tshogs der byung ba/_/rab tu sgra zhi bla na med pa'i 
[\[254a.7\]]dpal/_/de na 'ong bzang brtul zhugs rab ldan pa/_/'jigs med shes rab spobs dang ldan pa bzhugs/_/des ni sems can nyon mongs sbyangs pa'i phyir/_/rgyal pa'i chos kyang yongs su bstan pa mdzad/_/shes rab ldan pa de ni bsod 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]snyoms la/_/spyod lam mdzes shing cha byad zhi ba dang /_/mi g.yeng spyan gyis dgongs pa mkhyen bzhin du/_/tshul zab brtan par bzhud pas grong du byon/_/grong mchog dga' ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar/_/tshong dpon legs pa snyan grags der byung
