[\[254b.2\]]ste/_/kho mo de yi bu mo yid 'ong gyur/_/gzugs mdzes ldan te nyi ma'i 'od ces bya/_/khyim gyi dam pa de yi sgo nas su/_/'od gzer bzang po 'khor bcas kho mos mthong /_/yan lag mtshan brgyan shin tu mdzes pa ste/_/de la kho mo mos pa 
[\[254b.3\]]mchog cig skyes/_/de ni kho mo'i khyim gyi sgor byon nas/_/nor bu de yi lhung bzed nang du gsol/_/rgyan rnams kun kyang bkrol te mos sems kyis/_/shin tu 'dun par de la bdag gis phul/_/bde gshegs sras po 'od gzer bzang dpal 
[\[254b.4\]]la/_/'dod chags sems kyis mchod pa rnams bsgrubs pas/_/bskal pa'i dam pa nyis brgya lnga bcur yang /_/ngan song gang du'ang song bar ma gyur to/_/lha yi yul du lha rigs ldan par skyes/_/mi yi yul du rgyal po'i sras mor gyur/_/
[\[254b.5\]]kha dog mtha' yas sku yi mdog mnga' bas/_/kun tu kho mo mngon par zhal yang bstan/_/bskal pa nyis brgya lnga bcu 'das gyur nas/_/sprul 'tshong gtso mo blta na sdug pa ste/_/mi 'jigs byed pa'i bu mor skyes par gyur/_/de tshe 
[\[254b.6\]]shin tu sbyangs shes bya ba yin/_/rgyal bu gzi brjid 'od kyi bdag mthong nas/_/kho mos de la dga' bas mchod pa byas/_/bdag nyid de la yongs su dbul byas nas/_/kho mo de yi dbang gyur chung mar gyur/_/drang srong chen po'i sku mchog 
[\[254b.7\]]nyi ma la'ang /_/bdag cag bsdoms te legs par mchod pa byas/_/mos pas sangs rgyas de yi zhal bltas nas/_/bdag gis byang chub mchog tu sems kyang bskyed/_/rgyal pa bye ba drug cu tshang pa yang /_/bskal ba de la kho 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]mos rim gro byas/_/rgyal ba de dag tha ma'i dus kyi tshe/_/sangs rgyas mos pa'i gzi brjid byung bar gyur/_/der ni kho mo'i chos [{]myig [,]mig [}]rnam par dag_/chos kyi rang bzhin bdag gis khong du chud/_/tshul [{]myin [,]min [}]rnam rtogs rab tu zhi 
[\[255a.2\]]bar gyur/_/de tshe tshun chad kho mos snang ba thob/_/rgyal sras rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi yang /_/de phyi tshun chad rnam par mthong bar gyur/_/sems kyi skad cig gcig gis rgya mtsho'i zhing /_/bsam las rnam 'das phyogs su kho mo 'jug_/
[\[255a.3\]]phyogs rnams kun gyi sna tshogs rnam dag pa'i/_/zhing rnams tshad med rmad mthong kho mos mthong /_/mthong yang de dag la ni chags pa med/_/nyon mongs bcas la'ang khong khro sdang ba med/_/zhing rnams de dag ma lus thams cad kyi/_/snying po byang chub 
[\[255a.4\]]sangs rgyas ma lus mthong /_de dag 'od kyi rgya mtsho tshad med pa'ang /_/sems kyi skad cig gcig gis rnam par blta/_/de dag 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho yang /_/sems cig thogs pa med pas khong du chud/_/rnam par thar pa tshad med thams 
[\[255a.5\]]cad dang /_/de dag ting 'dzin ma lus de bzhin shes/_/de dag spyod pa yangs pa'ang khong du chud/_/sa tshul ma lus kun kyang kho mos shes/_/smon lam grags med rgya mtsho chen po yang /_/skad cig re res mtha' yas khong du chud/_/bskal pa mtha' 
[\[255a.6\]]yas spyad pa spyod byed cing /_/skyes bu dam pa'i sku la lta lta ste/_/de yi ba spu rnam par 'phrul ba yang /_/nam yang mur phyin bdag gis ma nus so/_/de yi ba spu gcig gi rtse la yang /_/zhing mang rgya mtsho grangs las 'das pa mthong /_/rlung gi phung po chu bo 
[\[255a.7\]]chen po dang /_/sa yi lhun rnams me yis yongs gang mthong /_/gzhi rnams sna tshogs rnam phye'i gzugs ldan zhing /_/dbyibs tshul sna tshogs khong du chud bya ba/_/dbyibs dang lus kyi rnam pas sna tshogs shing /_/lus dang rnam pa mtha' yas gzugs ldan pa'i/_/brjod yas khams rnams 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]zhing rnams rgya mtsho dag_/tshad med rnams su tha dad gsal bar mthong /_/chos kyi gsung gis 'gro ba gdul don du/_/brtson ba'i rgyal ba de nyid bzhugs pa mthong /_/bskal par spyod pa yangs pa spyod pa'i tshe/_/sku yi phrin las kho mos de ma shes/_/
[\[255b.2\]]gsung dang thugs min de gnyis phrin las min/_/rdzu 'phrul rnam 'phrul tha dad tshul ma shes/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]shAkya'i bu mo go ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_shAkya'i bu mo go ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs 
[\[255b.3\]]su bskor ba byas nas/_yang dang yang bltas te/_shAkya'i bu mo go ba'i drung nas song ngo //_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po bcu drug pa/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]lha mo sgyu ma'i gan du 'gro bar mngon du bltas nas/_sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul gyi rgyud kyi ye 
[\[255b.4\]]shes la zhugs pa des 'di snyam du bsams so/_/bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'jig rten thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa'i skye mched drug dang ldan pa/_gnas med pa la rab tu gnas pa/_chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_
[\[255b.5\]]chags pa med par 'gro ba'i lam du zhugs pa chos kyi lus shin tu rnam par dag pa/_lus kyi las sgyu mas legs par sprul pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_ye shes sgyu ma'i rnam pas 'jig rten na rnam par spyod pa/_smon lam sgyu ma'i gzugs dang lus su ldan pa/_
[\[255b.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus dang ldan pa/_ma skyes ma 'gags pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_'ongs pa med pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_bden pa med pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa med pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_ma 'phos ma zhig pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_
[\[255b.7\]]ma byung mi 'jig pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_gnyis la chags pa dang bral ba'i lus dang ldan pa/_kun gzhi med pa la gnas pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_mi zad cing nyams pa med pa'i lus dang 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]ldan pa/_gzugs brnyan ltar rnam par rtog pa med pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_rmi lam dang mnyam par rnam par rgyu ba'i lus dang ldan pa me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar 'pho ba med pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_/phyogs med pa ltar rab tu zhi bar khong du chud pa'i lus 
[\[256a.2\]]dang ldan pa/_phyogs kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_dus gsum du tha mi dad pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_lus med pa'i sems kyi lus rnam par mi rtog pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_'jig rten thams cad kyi [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi lam las yongs su 'das pa'i lus dang 
[\[256a.3\]]ldan pa/_kun tu bzang po'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rgyud kyis rnam par shes par bya bas 'dul ba'i lus dang ldan pa/_chags pa med pas/_nam mkha'i spyod yul dang ldan pa rnams mthong bar bya ba'am/_bsnyen bkur bar bya ba'am/_mngon gsum du phrad par 
[\[256a.4\]]bya ba'am/_'grogs par bya ba 'am/_mtshan ma gzung bar bya ba 'am/_dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par rig par shes par bya ba'am/_tshig gi rgyud yongs su shes par bya ba'am/_gdams ngag yongs su gzung bar bya bar thabs ji lta bu zhig tu 
[\[256a.5\]]nus par 'gyur snyam nas/_de ltar sems shing yid la byed pa la brtson par gnas pa'i tshe/_grong khyer gyi lha mo rin chen mig ces bya ba nam mkha'i lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba zhig gis/_bdag gi lus rgyan sna tshogs kyis yongs su 
[\[256a.6\]]brgyan pa/_bdag gi lus rgyan gyis rnam par klubs par nam mkha' la 'dug par nye bar bstan nas/_lha rdzas kyi me tog rnam pa dang /_kha dog du ma can snyim pa nas mngon par gtor te/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs 
[\[256a.7\]]kyi bu khyod kyis 'khor ba'i yul la dga' bar mi gnas pas sems kyi grong khyer yongs su bsrung ba la brtson par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la dmigs pas sems kyi grong khyer brgyan pa la brtson par gyis shig_/
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phrag dog dang /_ser sna dang g.yo dang bral bas sems kyi grong khyer yongs su sbyang ba la brtson par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs par bya bas sems kyi grong khyer gyi yongs su gdung ba rab tu zhi 
[\[256b.2\]]bar bya ba la brtson par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs la brtson 'grus chen po'i shugs rnam par spel bas sems kyi grong khyer rnam par spel ba la brtson par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms 
[\[256b.3\]]par 'jug pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_chos kyi gzhal med khang yangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa la dbang bsgyur bas sems kyi grong khyer dang /_gnas kyi mdzod brgyan pa dang /_bsrung ba la brtson par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[256b.4\]]khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i sa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu thob par 'tshal bas/_sems kyi grong khyer snang bar bya ba la brtson par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin 
[\[256b.5\]]gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i thabs kyi lam gyis rang gi sems kyi grong khyer du gzhol bar bya bas sems kyi grong khyer nye bar brtan pa la brtson par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod 
[\[256b.6\]]pa dang smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i sems rnam par dag pas sems kyi grong khyer gyi ra ba brtan pa mngon par bsgrub par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nyon mongs pa dang /_bdud kyi ris kyi sdig to'i grogs po dang /_bdud kyi 'khor gyis mi 
[\[256b.7\]]choms par bya bas sems kyi grong khyer brgal dka' ba dang /_shigs par dka' ba mngon par bsgrub pa la brtson par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes snang bas khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir sems kyi 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]grong khyer snang bar bya ba la brtson par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yongs su gzung bar sems kyi grong khyer mngon par brlan pa la brtson par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de 
[\[257a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsod nams rgya mtsho rang gi sems kyis yang dag par blang bas sems kyi grong khyer brtan pa la brtson par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byams pa chen pos 'gro ba thams cad rgyas par dgang bas sems kyi grong khyer rab tu 
[\[257a.3\]]rgyas par bya ba la brtson par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis mi dge ba'i chos kyi gnyen po chos kyi gdugs yangs pa bsgrub pas sems kyi grong khyer yongs su dag pa la brtson par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis snying rje chen po shin tu yangs pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi don du 
[\[257a.4\]]sems g.yo bar bya bas sems kyi grong khyer rab tu bskyod pa la brtson par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phyi nang gi dngos po 'gro ba thams cad la yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sems kyi grong khyer gyi sgo dbye ba la brtson par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 
[\[257a.5\]]'khor ba'i yul thams cad la dga' ba las phyin phyogs su blta bas sems kyi grong khyer rnam par dag par bya ba la brtson par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis mi dge ba'i chos kyi rgyud thams cad mi srid par bya bas sems kyi grong khyer gyi srog rab tu mkhrang ba 
[\[257a.6\]]mngon par bsgrub pa la brtson par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs yang dag par bsgrub pa'i brtson 'grus las phyir mi ldog par bya bas sems kyi grong khyer brtan par bya ba la brtson par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod 
[\[257a.7\]]kyis dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad dran pa nyid du snang bar bya bas sems kyi grong khyer rab tu gsal bar bya ba la brtson par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i mdo sde 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]sna tshogs kyi chos kyi sgo rab tu dbye ba'i ye shes la mngon par mkhas par bya bas sems kyi grong khyer rnam par dbye ba'i tshul la mkhas par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'gro ba thams cad dang mngon sum du gnas pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgo dang /_lam gyi 
[\[257b.2\]]tshul yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sems kyi grong khyer dmigs par bya ba la brtson par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho rang gi smon lam du mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir sems kyi grong khyer byin gyi 
[\[257b.3\]]brlab pa'i tshul la mkhas par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad du bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po rnam par spel bas sems kyi grong khyer gyi tshogs kyi mthu rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i thabs la mkhas par gyis shig_/rigs 
[\[257b.4\]]kyi bu khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi sems dang bsam pa dang /_dbang po dang mos pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang bar shes par bya bas sems kyi grong khyer nas 'od kun tu dgye ba'i thabs la mkhas par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[257b.5\]]khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad yang dag par bsdu bas sems kyi grong khyer du dbang bsgyur ba'i tshul la mkhas par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dran zhing snang bar bya bas sems kyi grong khyer 'od gsal bar bya ba 
[\[257b.6\]]la brtson par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis lus med pa'i chos kyi tshul thams cad khong du chud par bya bas sems kyi grong khyer gyi rang bzhin yongs su shes par bya ba la brtson par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyi grong khyer 
[\[257b.7\]]du 'gro bar bya bas sems kyi grong khyer sgyu ma lta bur brtag pa la brtson par gyis shig dang /_rigs kyi bu de ltar sems kyi grong khyer yongs su sbyang ba la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa thob par nus so/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]zhe na/_de ltar sems kyi grong khyer yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de'i mdun ni sangs rgyas mthong bar bya ba la sgrib pa'am/_chos mnyan par bya ba la sgrib pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing rim gror bya ba la sgrib pa'am/_sems 
[\[258a.2\]]can yongs su bsdu ba'i sbyor ba la sgrib pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la sgrib pa yang rung ste/_sgrib pa thams cad mi gnas so/_/rigs kyi bu sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen 
[\[258a.3\]]yongs su btsal ba la mngon par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni las gron chu dus dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong bar 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag las pa yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/
[\[258a.4\]]de nas lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha mo chos kyi pad mo dpal gyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba dang ngo tsha shes pa'i dpal gyi dog pa'i 'od ces bya ba gnyis shig lha mo'i tshogs tshad med pas yongs su bskor nas/_lha mo sgyu ma'i legs pa brjod cing snying po byang chub nas 
[\[258a.5\]]'thon te/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]mdun gyi nam mkha' la 'khod nas/_rang rang gi rin po che'i rna cha las 'od gzer gyi dra ba rin po che'i kha dog du 'dug pa du ma dang /_spos dang /_'dug pa dri ma med pa/_'od 'phro ba'i kha dog du 'dug pa du ma dang /_
[\[258a.6\]]sems dang bsam pa mos pa byed pa'i kha dog dang /_sems kyi dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'i kha dog dang /_lus kyi gdung ba sim par byed pa'i kha dog dang /_lus rnam par dag pa yongs su ston pa'i kha dog dang /_lus kyi mthu thog pa med 
[\[258a.7\]]par 'byung ba'i yul dang ldan pa'i 'od gzer gyi dra ba mang po bkye bas/_zhing rgya che na po snang bar byas nas/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku thams cad du khyab pa/_thams cad la mngon du gyur pa yongs su bstan nas 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]'jig rten thams cad la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]spyi bo'i gtsug tu shar nas/_spyi bo'i gtsug man chad ba spu'i bu ga thams cad du zhugs te lus kun tu khyab par gyur to/_/de ltar lha mo de dag gi 'od gzer gyis/_tshong dpon 
[\[258b.2\]]gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la phog ma thag tu de'i mod la mun pa thams cad dang /_mi gnas pa'i mig rdul dang bral ba'i 'od snang ba zhes bya ba thob par gyur to/_/sems can gyi rang bzhin khong du chud par byed pa'i mig rab rib dang bral ba zhes bya ba thob par gyur to/_/
[\[258b.3\]]chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par lta ba'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]rdul dang bral bas dbang bsgyur ba zhes bya ba thob par gyur to/_/zhing thams cad la rnam par lta ba'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]rnam par dag pa la dbang bsgyur ba zhes bya ba thob par gyur to/_/de bzhin 
[\[258b.4\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sku la rnam par lta ba'i mig rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba thob par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku yongs su grub pa rnam par phye ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rnam par lta ba'i mig rnam par dag pa'i blo gros 
[\[258b.5\]]shes bya ba thob par gyur to/_/zhing rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba dang /_'jig pa rnam par phye ba la rnam par lta ba'i mig chags pa med pa'i 'od ces bya ba thob par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[258b.6\]]thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i mdo sde'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyogs la rnam par lta ba'i mig kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba thob par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_sems can 'dul ba'i byin gyi rlabs la rnam 
[\[258b.7\]]par lta ba'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]kun nas yul du 'gyur ba zhes bya ba thob par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du byung ba'i sangs rgyas skyes pa la rnam par lta ba'i mig kun tu lta ba zhes bya ba thob par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]yang dag par 'gro ba'i khang pa'i sgo srung srin po'i dbang po srin po stong phrag bcu'i gtso bo [{]myig [,]mig [}{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]shes bya ba chung mar bcas bu dang bcas/_rang gi gnyen bshes dang 'khor du bcas pas/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la me tog kha 
[\[259a.2\]]dog sna tshogs yid du 'ong bas mngon par gtor te/_'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad dang nye bar bsnyen pa yin te/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar bsam pa yongs su 
[\[259a.3\]]dag pa/_g.yo dang sgyu med pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad yongs su sdud pa la tha mi dad pa'i snying rje chen po dang /_sems can thams cad la sems can med pa'i rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa'i rab tu rtogs pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs thams 
[\[259a.4\]]cad mkhyen par 'gro ba las phyir mi ldog pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor la mngon par 'dun pa'i mos pa'i stobs dang /_chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dri ma med pas rnam par dag pa'i mig dang /_sems can gyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[259a.5\]]thams cad la tha mi dad pa'i byams pa chen po dang /_bsgribs pa thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba dang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad kyi gnyen po gdugs su gyur pa'i chos kyi sprin chen po dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyud thams cad la rab tu 
[\[259a.6\]]zhugs shing /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang ba mngon du gyur pa'i ye shes kyi mig ste/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad dang nye bar bsnyen pa yin no/_/ting nge 'dzin 
[\[259a.7\]]la nges par gzhag pa'i sgo bcus rnam par lta ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad dang mngon tu gyur pa thob pa yin te/_bcu gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin la nges par gzhag pa'i sgo chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar rdul dang 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]bral bar rnam par dpyod pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /_ting nge 'dzin la nges par gzhag pa'i sgo phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad mngon du gyur pa'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]dang /_ting nge 'dzin la nges par gzhag pa'i sgo [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa thams cad la rnam par mi rtog rnam par mi dpyod pa dang /_
[\[259b.2\]]ting nge 'dzin la nges par gzhag pa'i sgo phyogs thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprin yongs su 'byung ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin la nges par gzhag pa'i sgo thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /_bsod nams rgya mtsho [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa'i snying po dang /_ting nge 
[\[259b.3\]]'dzin la nges par gzhag pa'i sgo sems bskyed pa thams cad la dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'byung ba dang /_'bral ba med cing nye bar gyur pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin la nges par gzhag pa'i sgo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan dge ba'i bshes gnyen 
[\[259b.4\]]gyi khar las pas yongs su grub pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin la nges par gzhag pa'i sgo dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad dang yongs su mi 'bral ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin la nges par gzhag pa'i sgo dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis 
[\[259b.5\]]rtag par kun tu nye bar 'gro ba'i sbyor ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin la nges par gzhag pa'i sgo dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi thabs kyi spyod pa thams cad kyis dub pa med pa'i sbyor ba ste/_rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin la nges par gzhag pa'i sgo bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i 
[\[259b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad dang /_mngon tu gyur pa thob pa yin te/_ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par thar pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi kha nas grags pa zhes bya ba yang thob 
[\[259b.7\]]pas de la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas thams cad tha mi dad cing mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ba yang rab tu 'thob bo/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen tha mi dad cing thams cad du khyab pa'ang rab tu thob par 'gyur to/_/srin po'i dbang po 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]mig [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]nam mkha'i dbyings la bltas te 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa bdag la thugs brtse bar mdzad de/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pas sman yon btags pa 
[\[260a.2\]]ma nongs so/_/da dung yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba'i slad du/_ji ltar brtson par bgyi ba dang /_phyogs gang logs su mchi bar bgyi ba dang /_gnas gang zhig du yongs su btsal ba dang /_dmigs pa gang zhig bsam par bgyi ba'i thabs kyi 
[\[260a.3\]]sgo ma nor bar bstan du gsol/_smras pa rigs kyi bu de bas na phyogs kun tu rab tu 'dud pa'i lus dang /_dmigs pa thams cad du dge ba'i bshes gnyen dran pa dang /_'brel pa'i bsam pa dang /_kun tu 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_
[\[260a.4\]]sems kyi shugs rmi lam lta bu dang /_yid kyi lus gzugs brnyan lta bus rnam par rgyu ste/_'gro bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gan du song shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]srin po'i dbang po mig [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]ji skad du gtams pa de 
[\[260a.5\]]ltar nan tan du byas pa dang /_mdun gyi sa'i nang nas pad mo chen po rdo rje rin po che thams cad las grub pa'i chu ba can/_nang rim rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba rgya mtsho sna tshogs las byas pa/_rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad las 'dab ma'i phreng ba 
[\[260a.6\]]grub pa/_rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba'i snying po can spos kyi rin po che'i rgyal po rin po che thams cad kyi mdog gi ze ba dang ldan pa/_rin po che'i dra ba grangs med pas kun nas yog pa byung ba mthong ngo /_/rin po che'i rgyal po'i pad mo 
[\[260a.7\]]chen po de'i snying po la'ang /_khang pa brtsegs pa chos kyi phyogs su yang dag par gzhol ba'i snying po zhes bya ba shin tu spa la blta na sdug pa sa'i gzhi rnam par snang ba'i dbyibs dang ldan pa/_rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad las byas 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]pa'i ka ba stong tshang bas mdzes par brgyan pa/_rgyan thams cad du rin po che thams cad bkram pa/_'dzam bu chu klung gi gser dri ma med pa'i lha rdzas kyi gzhi bting ba/_mu tig gi phreng ba sna tshogs kyi dra ba grangs med pa kun nas bres pa/_rin po che'i 
[\[260b.2\]]rgyal po sna tshogs rab tu spa bar spel bas brgyan pa/_'dzam bu chu klung gi nor bu rin po ches kun nas rnam par phye ba/_rin po che'i khri 'phang grangs med pas kun nas bskor ba/_phyogs thams cad nas rin po che'i rgyal po'i them skas mdzes par 
[\[260b.3\]]bkye ba gnas par mthong ngo /_/khang pa brtsegs pa de'i dbus na yang khri nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi pad mo'i snying po can/_nor bu rin po che'i gzugs 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i dbyibs lta bu'i rten gyis bzung ba/_nor bu rin po che'i 'bru thams 
[\[260b.4\]]cad kyi kha dog du 'dug pa/_dbang po'i rgyal mtshan rab tu snang ba'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/_rdo rje rin po che'i 'khor lo'i sa la rten pa/_rin po che'i rgyal po sna tshogs kyi phreng bas brgyan pa/_rin po che'i khri 'phang du ma las blangs pa/_rin po che'i rgyal 
[\[260b.5\]]po snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis rab tu spras pa/_rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan pa/_rin po che'i rgyal po'i stan lha rdzas las 'das pa legs par bting ba/_gos rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa sna tshogs kyi gzhi thams cad du bkram 
[\[260b.6\]]pa/_rin po che'i gos thams cad kyi gnam yol bres pas/_nam mkha' rab tu brgyan pa/_rin po che thams cad kyi dra ba kun tu bres pa/_phyogs kun nas rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dgrigs pa'i sgra 'byung ba/_rin po che thams cad 
[\[260b.7\]]kyi snam bu'i rgyal mtshan phur lab du lding ba/_spos kyi rin po che thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan rnam par bres pas kun nas brgyan pa/_me tog thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan las me tog gi glong sna tshogs char du mngon par 'brul pa/_rin po 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]che'i dril bu'i rgyal mtshan 'khrol ba'i sgra yid bde ba'i dbyangs snyan par grag pa/_khang pa'i kha thams cad nas rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba rab tu sbyangs pa/_rin po che'i gzugs sna tshogs kyi kha nas spos chu kha dog du ma dang ldan 
[\[261a.2\]]pa'i char 'bab pa/_nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba las glang po dam pa'i gzugs su byas pa'i kha nas pad mo'i dra ba 'byung ba dang ldan pa/_rdo rje sna tshogs kyi seng ge'i kha nas spos kyi sprin kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu 'byung ba/_rin 
[\[261a.3\]]po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba/_tshangs pa'i gzugs su 'dug pa'i kha nas byams pa chen po'i tshul tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi nga ro sgrog pa dang ldan pa/_rin po che sna tshogs shin tu mdzes pa'i gzugs kyi kha nas dkar po'i phyogs kyi legs pa rab tu 
[\[261a.4\]]brjod pa'i nga ro 'byung ba dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gser gyi dril gyi phreng ba las sgra snyan pa'i dbyangs su 'byung ba dang ldan pa/_nor bu rin po che dam pa'i dril gyi phreng ba las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra yid du 'ong ba 
[\[261a.5\]]'byung ba/_rdo rje'i dril sna tshogs las byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam thams cad kyi sgra rab tu 'byung ba/_rin po che'i rgyal po zla ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi phreng bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu 'byung ba'i dbyangs sna tshogs rab tu bsgrag 
[\[261a.6\]]pa/_nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po snying po dag pa'i phreng bas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku tshe gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i gzugs brnyan rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par bya ba/_rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i snying 
[\[261a.7\]]po'i phreng bas nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs kyi dbyings su 'od zer yongs su bstan pa/_rin po che'i rgyal po snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi phreng bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]dkyil 'khor snang ba rab tu bkye ba/_nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba'i phreng bas sprul pa'i sprin 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cing rim gror byed pa'i 'od rab tu dgye ba/_rin po che'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi phreng bas 
[\[261b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i rnam par 'phrul pas skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings su rgyas par dgang ba/_rin po che'i rgyal po ri bo'i rgyal mtshan gyi phreng bas/_lha'i dbang po thams cad kyi khyim gyi lha mo'i dbyangs snyan pa rab tu bsgrag pa dang 
[\[261b.3\]]ldan zhing khri de/_dmigs pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa la bstod pa'i sprin 'gyed pas yon tan dang /_legs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa brjod du yod pa dang /_rin po che'i rgyan grangs med pa'i 'khor gyi stan gyis bskor bar mthong ngo /_/
[\[261b.4\]]khri de la lha mo sgyu ma 'jig rten gsum las yang dag par 'das pa'i gzugs 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par gnas pa dang /_srid pa'i rgyud thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa'i gzugs 'gro ba thams cad kyis rnam par dmigs su yod 
[\[261b.5\]]pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad kyis ma gos pa'i gzugs bsod nams yangs pas byung ba dang /_'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam zhing 'dra ba'i gzugs sems can thams cad la rang bzhin mngon par ston pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba 
[\[261b.6\]]dang /_gdul bar mthun pa'i gzugs sems can thams cad dang mngon sum du 'dal ba dang /_dus gsum thams cad du 'gro ba nam mkha' la rnam par dmigs pa tha mi dad pa'i gzugs 'gro ba thams cad kyi mthas klas par dmigs su yod par byin gyis rlob 
[\[261b.7\]]pa dang /_'gro ba med pa'i gzugs 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad 'gag pa dang /_'ong ba med pa'i gzugs 'gro ba thams cad du ma byung ba dang /_ma skyes pa'i gzugs mi skye bar mnyam pa'i chos la brtson pa dang /_ma 'gags pa'i gzugs 'jig rten 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]gyi rnam par spyod pa thams cad la gzhol ba dang /_yang dag par dmigs pa'i gzugs bden pa med pa dang /_'jig rten gyi rnam par dmigs pa'i gzugs [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa med pa dang /_'pho ba med pa'i gzugs shi 'pho ba dang /_skye ba las 
[\[262a.2\]]'das pa dang /_mi 'jig pa'i gzugs chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa med pa dang /_mtshan nyid med pa'i gzugs dus gsum tshig gi lam du gzhol ba dang /_mtshan nyid gcig pa'i gzugs mtshan nyid med pas byung ba dang /_gzugs brnyan 
[\[262a.3\]]lta bu'i gzugs 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dmigs pa dang /_sgyu ma lta bu'i gzugs ye shes sgyu mas yongs su grub pa dang /_smig rgyu ba lta bu'i gzugs 'gro ba'i 'du shes bzhin du byin gyis rlob pa la gzhol ba dang /_grib ma lta 
[\[262a.4\]]bu'i gzugs sngon gyi smon lam gyis 'gro ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_rmi lam lta bu'i gzugs bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro bas dmigs pa la ma 'dres pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gzhol ba'i gzugs nam mkha'i dbyings ltar rang 
[\[262a.5\]]bzhin yongs su dag pa dang /_snying rje chen pos byung ba'i gzugs sems can gyi rgyud thams cad yongs su bskyang ba la brtson pa dang /_chags pa med pa'i sgos byung ba'i gzugs skad cig re res chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa dang /_mtha' dang 
[\[262a.6\]]dbus med pa'i gzugs rnyog pa med par 'gro ba thams cad la rten pa dang /_tshad med pa'i gzugs tshig gi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa dang /_mi gnas pa'i gzugs 'gro ba thams cad gdul ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis grub pa dang /_
[\[262a.7\]]byin gyis ma brlabs pa'i gzugs byin gyi rlabs kyis 'gro ba'i don la brtson pa dang /_ma byung ba'i gzugs smon lam sgyu mas yongs su grub pa dang /_zil gyis ma non pa'i gzugs 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang /_yang dag pa ma yin 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]pa'i gzugs zhi gnas kyi snang bas rnam par dmigs pa dang /_mi 'byung ba'i gzugs 'gro ba'i las ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang ba dang /_rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po ltar bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[262b.2\]]bya ba'i smon lam yongs su grub pa dang /_rnam par mi rtog pa'i gzugs 'gro ba thams cad kyi yongs su rtog pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa dang /_mi rtog pas rtog pa med pa'i gzugs 'gro ba thams cad kyis rnam par dmigs pa dang /_thogs pa med pa'i 
[\[262b.3\]]gzugs 'khor ba las bzlog pa la rab tu brtson pa dang /_rnam par dag pa'i gzugs de bzhin nyid dang /_mnyam par rnam par mi rtog pa dang /_rnam pa de lta bu'i gzugs gzugs med par gzugs su snang ba dang /_tshor ba med pa'i gzugs kyis 
[\[262b.4\]]'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rab tu zhi bar bya ba la brtson pa dang /_'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa'i gzugs sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi rnam pas rnam par dmigs pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i chos nyid 
[\[262b.5\]]kyis byung ba'i gzugs chos sgyu ma'i rnam pas grub pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i yul las yongs su 'das pa'i gzugs byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam kyi ye shes las byung ba dang /_rang bzhin med pa'i gzugs 'gro ba thams cad kyi tshig gi lam la 
[\[262b.6\]]gzhol ba dang /_gdung ba yongs su bstsal ba'i gzugs chos kyi sku bsil ba dam pa dang ldan pas/_lha mo sgyu ma bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i gzugs kyi lus yongs su ston pa dang /_sems can gyi bsam pa'i dbang du 'gro ba thams cad dang 
[\[262b.7\]]mnyam zhing 'dra ba'i gzugs kyi lus 'gro ba thams cad kyi gzugs kyi lus las 'phags pa ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/de la sems can la las ni lha mo sgyu ma de bdud kyi bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug la bdud kyi bu mo'i gzugs bas kyang lhag par 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]mthong ngo /_/la las ni dbang bsgyur gyi lha'i bu mo'i gzugs pas kyang lhag par mthong ngo /_/la las ni rab 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu mo'i gzugs pas kyang lhag par mthong ngo /_/la las ni rab dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu mo'i gzugs bas kyang 
[\[263a.2\]]lhag par mthong ngo /_/la las ni rab mtshe ma'i lha'i bu mo'i gzugs pas kyang lhag par mthong ngo /_/la las ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu mo'i gzugs pas kyang lhag par mthong ngo /_/la las ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu mo'i gzugs 
[\[263a.3\]]pas kyang lhag par mthong ngo /_/la las ni grul bum gyi bu mo'i gzugs bas kyang lhag par mthong ngo /_/la las ni lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i bu mo'i gzugs pas kyang lhag par mthong ngo /_/sems can la las ni lha mo sgyu ma de mi'i dbang po'i 
[\[263a.4\]]bu mo'i gzugs pas kyang lhag par mthong ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'gro ba thams cad kyi gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral yang sems can pha rol gyi bsam pa la 'jug pa des sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i rnam pa la lha mo sgyu ma 
[\[263a.5\]]'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba'i bsod nams dang ldan pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bsod nams kyis bsgrubs pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sbyor ba tha mi dad pa dang ldan pa/_'gro ba thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi zhugs 
[\[263a.6\]]pa/_snying rje chen po'i lhas su sems can thams cad yongs su sdud pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad la nan tan du byas pas byung ba/_bzod pa thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi brtson 'grus 
[\[263a.7\]]kyi shugs kyis sems can rnam par spel ba/_chos kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba la phyir mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/_chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs pas byung ba/_bsam gtan gyi yan lag dang 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]tshul thams cad las yongs su grub pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_bsam gtan gyi yan lag tha mi dad pa'i yul yongs su 'dzin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba rab tu thob pa/_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rgya mtsho 
[\[263b.2\]]bskam pa la shin tu gdon mi za bar byas pa'i nges par rtog pa sna tshogs la gnas pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rnam par dbye ba'i tshul la mkhas pa/_chos thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho rnam par dpyad pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa/_
[\[263b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bas ma ngoms pa/_dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la rnam par lta ba'i rgyun mi gcod pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad lta ba'i sgo la mngon du gyur ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[263b.4\]]cad kyis yongs su bsgrubs pa'i lam yongs su dag par bya ba rnam pa tha dad pa'i tshul la mkhas pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul nam mkha' dang mnyam pa sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i thabs kyi tshul la mkhas pa/_'gro 
[\[263b.5\]]ba mtha' dang dbus med pa/_bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba'i snang ba rab tu thob pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rnam par dag pa rnam pa tha dad pa la zhugs pa/_zhing rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su dag par bya 
[\[263b.6\]]ba'i smon lam dang ldan pa/_sems can gyi khams thams cad rnam par gdul ba'i byin gyi rlabs mthar thug par bya ba'i smon lam yongs su dag pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul thams cad mchod pas rgyas par dgang ba'i sems dang /_
[\[263b.7\]]ldan pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad la brtson pas byung ba/_chos kyi sku bla na med pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa/_gzugs kyi lus mtha' yas pa yongs su ston pa/_bdud kyi dpung thams cad rab tu 'joms pa/_
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu rgya chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa/_chos kyi stobs rab tu skyes pa'i blo can/_sangs rgyas kyi stobs snang ba rab tu thob pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams cad kyi stobs yongs su rdzogs pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[264a.2\]]nyid kyi shugs kyi stobs yongs su skyes pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes glog gis shes rab snang bar byas pa/_sems can mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sems rgya mtsho rnam par dpyad pa la mkhas pa/_'gro ba shin tu mang ba'i bsam pa la zhugs 
[\[264a.3\]]pa/_sems can pha rol gyi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa shes par bya ba'i tshul la mkhas pa/_sems can mtha' yas pa'i mos pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i rgyus la mkhas par khong du chud pa/_phyogs bcu'i zhing rgya mtsho tshad med pa lus kyis rgyas par 
[\[264a.4\]]'gengs pa/_'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad shes par bya ba'i tshul dang /_rnam pa la mkhas pa/_zhing tha dad pa'i tshul thams cad shes par bya ba'i tshul la mkhas pa'i rjes su song ba/_ye shes kyi lta ba phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du 
[\[264a.5\]]rab tu 'dal ba/_dus rga mtsho thams cad du khyab pa'i blo dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad la mngon sum du 'dud pa'i lus can/_chos kyi sprin rgya mtsho'i char thams cad yang dag par gzung ba la/_mngon tu gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_de bzhin 
[\[264a.6\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan rab tu rdzogs par bya ba'i nan tan gyis 'byung ba la rab tu brtson pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i blo dang ldan pa/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rab tu 'jug 
[\[264a.7\]]pa la rnam par dpyod pa'i mthu yod pa/_byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag thams cad yongs su grub pa/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongs su bskyang ba la rab tu brtson pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi legs pa'i sprin kun tu snang ba rab tu ston pa/_
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' dang rgyal ba thams cad skyed pa'i smon lam gyis byung ba dang /_de dag la sogs pa mthong ba'i tshul 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis lha mo sgyu ma tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]mthong bar gyur to/_/des de mthong nas lha mo sgyu ma 
[\[264b.2\]]ji snyed yod pa de snyed du bdag gi lus byin gyis brlabs nas/_phyogs thams cad la mngon tu bltas pa'i lha mo sgyu ma la thams cad du khyab pa'i lus kyis phyag byas so/_/des de ltar phyag byas ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mtha' dang dbus med pa thob par gyur te/_
[\[264b.3\]]des ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo de dag la rnam par bltas nas/_mtshan mar bya ba dang /_bsgom pa dang /_lhur blang ba dang /_rjes su dran par bya ba dang /_rgyas par dgang ba dang /_rab tu rgya cher bya ba dang /_blta ba dang /_rnam par spel ba dang /_mngon par bsgrub 
[\[264b.4\]]pa dang /_rgyas gdab par byas te/_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo de dag las langs nas lha mo sgyu ma 'khor dang bcas/_gnas dang bcas/_stan dang bcas pa la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/_mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te/_'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[264b.5\]]'phags ma bdag ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur ba la yongs su bskul ba bgyis pa ste/_de ltar bdag dge ba'i bshes gnyen nas dge ba'i 
[\[264b.6\]]bshes gnyen du bsnyen bkur bgyid cing mthar gyis khyod kyi zhabs kyi drung 'di'i bar du mchis pa lags na/_'phags ma ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslabs na/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'grub pa lags/_
[\[264b.7\]]des smras pa rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa smon lam chen po'i ye shes sgyu ma'i rnam pas rnam par brgyan pa thob pa ste/_rigs kyi bu kho mo rnam par thar pa de dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]thams cad kyi 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i srid pa'i tha ma la skye bas rnam par 'phrul pa ji snyed cig yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i srid pa'i tha ma pa de dag thams cad so so'i mar gyur ba ste/_
[\[265a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i lto na gnas pa kho mo'i lto g.yas pa nas 'byung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu skal ba dang ldan pa'i gling bzhi pa 'di nyid kyi grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas su yang /_rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i btsun mo'i rigs dang 
[\[265a.3\]]ldan pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' don grub/_byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pas bskyed do/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i pho brang na 'dug 'dug pa las byang chub sems 
[\[265a.4\]]dpa' dga' ldan gyi pho brang nas 'pho ba'i dus la bab pa dang /_ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang 'od zer de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum gyi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor las byung ba'i snang ba zhes bya ba mang po byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[265a.5\]]thams cad kyi yum gyi yon tan gyi rgyan sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'thon nas/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas te/_kho mo'i lus la shar nas/_spyi bo man cad ba spu'i bu ga thams cad du 'phros par 
[\[265a.6\]]gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i 'od zer ming gcig la/_byang chub sems dpa'i yum gyi rnam par 'phrul ba dang /_rgyan dang rnam par thar ba sna tshogs rab tu 'gyed pa de dag kho mo'i lus su dong ma thag tu de'i mod la kho mo'i 
[\[265a.7\]]lus su byang chub sems dpa'i 'od zer gyi sgo'i dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par dmigs par byas te/_byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul dang rgyan thams cad yongs su snang bar gyur to/_/khyim dang 'khor la yang de bzhin du snang bar gyur 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]to/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i 'od zer de dag kho mo'i lus su dong ma thag tu de'i mod la byang chub sems dpa'i 'od zer gyi sgo'i dkyil 'khor de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gi skye ba'i tshul dang /_rnam par 'phrul ba rnam par 
[\[265b.2\]]dmigs par byas pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mos mthong bar gyur te/_de dag thams cad kyang snying po byang chub tu gshegs nas/_seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs shing byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyis bskor te/_'jig rten gyi dbang po 
[\[265b.3\]]rnams kyis bskor cing /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mang po mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe/_de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig bsnyen bkur ba de dag thams cad kyang kho mos dang po 
[\[265b.4\]]thugs bskyed pa dang /_skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_mya ngan las 'da' ba'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang bcas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i rgyan dang 
[\[265b.5\]]bcas par mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mos mthong bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo'i lus su byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[265b.6\]]'od zer de dag dong ma thag tu kho mo'i lus kyang 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags par gyur te/_rum nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs par gyur kyang mi'i lus las lhag par yang mi snang ngo /_/phyogs bcu na byang chub sems dpa'i mngal gyi 
[\[265b.7\]]gnas dang /_khang khyim dang rgyan ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i lus kyi khongs su chud pa dang /_kho mo'i lus su shong bar gyur par snang bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo'i lus su byang chub sems dpa'i mngal 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]gyi gnas dang /_khang khyim dang rgyan dang longs spyod byung bar gyur pa dang /_de'i mod la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gcig pa skal ba mnyam par 
[\[266a.2\]]spyod spyod pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig pa rgyan gcig pa/_rnam par thar pa gcig la rnam par spyod pa/_ye shes kyis gcig la gnas pa/_rnam par 'phrul pa gcig gis byung ba/_smon lam gcig gis grub pa/_spyod pa gcig gis 
[\[266a.3\]]byung ba/_chos kyi lus yongs su dag pa/_gzugs kyi lus mtha' dang dbus med pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang ldan pa/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /_smon lam dang rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba dag dang /_rin po 
[\[266a.4\]]che'i klu'i dbang po'i snying po'i khang pa brtsegs pa na 'khod cing /_klu'i rgyal po gang chen mtsho la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa klu'i dbang po stong phrag brgyad cu dang /_'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyis kyang mngon par mchod cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[266a.5\]]rnam par 'phrul ba dga' ldan gyi pho brang thams cad nas shi 'pho yongs su ston pas/_dga' ldan gyi gnas re re nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'dal ba'i gling bzhi par skye ba len pa yongs su ston pa/_sems can yongs 
[\[266a.6\]]su smin par bya ba'i thabs kyi tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mkhas pa'i rjes su song ba dang sems can bag med pa thams cad yongs su bskul zhing mngon par zhen pa/_thams cad las gyen du bskyod pa dang /_'od zer gyi dra ba chen po rab tu dgye bas 
[\[266a.7\]]'jig rten gyi mun pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /_ngan song thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar byed pa dang /_sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad nas rnam par bzlog pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi las yongs su 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]bskul ba dang /_sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob pa dang /_sems can thams cad la lus mngon par ston pas dga' ldan gyi pho brang nas 'phos te/_'khor dang bcas par kho mo'i lus su zhugs nas de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i 
[\[266b.2\]]khong na gom pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du yangs pa nas/_'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du yangs pa'i 'gros kyis rgyu zhing spyod do/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[266b.3\]]khams 'byam klas pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor brjod du med pa dag kyang sems kyi skad cig re re la byang chub sems dpa'i mngal gyi gnas dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa lta ba'i 
[\[266b.4\]]phyir kho mo'i khong du 'dong ngo /_/rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_brgya byin dang rab mtshe ma dang rab dga' ldan dang rab 'phrul dga' dang dbang bsgyur gyi lha'i dbang po rnams dang /_tshangs pa rnams kyang mngal gyi gnas na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[266b.5\]]dpa' la lta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i gtam nyams su myong bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar dong yang kho mo'i rum 'dis de snyed kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor cig yongs su bzung yang yangs par gyur pa yang med/_
[\[266b.6\]]mi'i lus tha mal pa las kho mo'i lus khyad par can du gyur ba yang med mod kyi/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de snyed kyang yongs su bzung ngo /_/lha dang mi de dag thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod sna tshogs dang /_rgyan yongs su dag 
[\[266b.7\]]pa yang mthong bar gyur to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa smon lam chen po'i ye shes sgyu ma'i rnam pa 'di nyid shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar kho mo skal ba dang ldan pa'i gling bzhi pa 'di'i 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]'dzam bu'i gling na byang chub sems dpa' khong na yongs su 'dzin pa de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad kyi 'dzam bu'i gling dag na yang rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan gyi tshul 'di nyid kyis yongs su 'dzin par 
[\[267a.2\]]byed de/_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba smon lam chen po'i ye shes sgyu ma'i rnam pa 'di nyid shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir kho mo'i lus 'di gnyis su gyur pa'ang med/_mi gnyis pa'ang med/_gcig la gnas pa yang med/_mang po la gnas pa yang med do/_/rigs 
[\[267a.3\]]kyi bu ji ltar kho mo bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'di'i yum du gyur pa de bzhin du sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' dang dbus med pa dag gi yang yum du gyur to/_/la la zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' pad mo'i sbubs nas rdzus te skye ba zhig tu gyur 
[\[267a.4\]]na yang pad mo'i tshal gyi lha mor gyur cing kho mo byang chub sems dpa' len te/_'jig rten rnams kyis kyang kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i yum yin par shes so/_/la la zhig tu thu bar skye bar gyur na yang de dag tu yang kho mos thu bar blangs te/_byang chub 
[\[267a.5\]]sems dpa'i yum du gyur to/_/la la zhig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing du de bzhin 'byung bar gyur na yang de dag tu 'ang kho mo snying po byang chub kyi lha mor gnas gnas so/_/rigs kyi bu thabs kyi sgo ji snyed cig gis byang chub sems dpa'i srid pa'i tha ma ba 'jig rten du 
[\[267a.6\]]'byung ba yongs su ston pa de snyed kyi thabs kyi sgos kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i yum du gyur te/_rigs kyi bu kho mo 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su bstan pa dag tu 
[\[267a.7\]]yum du gyur pa/_de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa log pa dad sel dang /_gser thub dang bsod skyabs kyi yum du yang gyur to/_/de bzhin du ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa bskal ba bzang po ba rnams kyi yang yum du 'gyur te/_
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs shing shi 'pho yongs su ston pa'i dus la bab pa dang /_'od zer byang chub sems dpa' thams cad skye bar 'byung zhing mngal na bzhugs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa'i 'od bkye nas 
[\[267b.2\]]chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi tshul dang gzhi rab tu snang bar byas te/_chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul dang /_gzhi ji snyed cig tu byang chub sems dpa' byams pas [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]'jig rten gyi mi'i dbang po'i rigs su tsher skye ba yongs su bstan pas sems can gdul bar bya ba ji snyed cig 
[\[267b.3\]]yod pa de dag thams cad du'ang kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i yum du 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i yum du ji ltar 'gyur ba de bzhin du byams pa'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 
[\[267b.4\]]bar 'gyur ba/_seng ge dang /_de bzhin du rab tu snang ba dang /_dpal dang spyan bzang po dang /_me tog dang /_me tog dpal dang /_rgyas pa dang /_rgyal dang /_thugs bzang po dang /_rdo rje dang /_rdul dang bral ba dang /_zla ba sgron ma 'dzin pa dang /_
[\[267b.5\]]grags pa dang /_rdo rje dag pa dang /_don gcig tu ston pa dang /_mi dkar yan lag dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i ri bo dang /_sgron ma chen po 'dzin pa dang /_pad mo dam pa dang /_sgra rnam par grags pa dang /_yon tan dpag tu 
[\[267b.6\]]med pa mnga' ba dang /_mar me'i dpal dang /_yan lag rnam par brgyan pa dang /_legs par bzhud pa dang /_byams pa'i dpal dang /_sprul ba bzang po dang /_gnas dang bral ba dang /_gzi brjid 'bar ba dang /_gsung mtha' yas pa dang /_
[\[267b.7\]]len pa med pa'i spyan dang /_len pa med pa'i mu khyud dang /_yid gnyis rnam par sel ba dang /_yongs su dag pa dang /_'od shin tu yangs pa dang /_grags pa dag pas byung ba dang /_sprin gyi dpal dang /_gtsug phud rnam par mdzes pa dang /_shing 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]gi rgyal po dang /_rin po che'i dkyil 'khor rin po che thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa'i kha dog dang /_blo gros rgya mtsho dang /_rin po che bzang po dang /_stobs la thub pa med pa dang /_dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_dbang phyug chen po 
[\[268a.2\]]dang /_dbang po'i dpal dang /_me'i dpal dang /_mchog gi dpal dang /_tsan dan gyi sprin dang /_mi dkar rings po'i spyan dang /_blo gros dam pa dang /_blo gros rnam par bsgoms pa dang /_sgrub pa'i rgyal po dang /_sbyong ba'i rgyal po dang /_rdo rje blo gros dang /_
[\[268a.3\]]rnam par brgyan pa dang /_phun sum sna tshogs dang /_ze ba dga' ba dang /_dbang phyug lha dang /_gtsug tor dpal dang /_ye shes rdo rje'i ri bo dang /_dpal gyi snying po dang /_gser gyi dra bas sku rnam par brgyan pa dang /_shin tu rnam par phye ba dang /_
[\[268a.4\]]dbang phyug lha dang /_dbang chen lha dang /_mi dmigs pa'i dpal dang /_rnam par dag pas dgyes pa dang /_'od 'phro mnga' ba dang /_chu'i dpal dang /_rnam dag blo gros dang /_theg pa dam pa dang /_mnyams pa'i yon tan 'byung ba dang /_dgra las 
[\[268a.5\]]dben pa dang /_gsung sgrog pa dang /_dbang du gyur pa'i yon tan gzi brjid dang /_rnam par snang mdzad dpal dang /_dri zhim po'i longs spyod dang /_dri zhim po rnam par phye ba dang /_yan lag rnam par phye ba dang /_sa ga bzang po dang /_zhal nas 
[\[268a.6\]]spos thams cad 'od du 'phro ba dang /_rdo rje rin po ches rnam par brgyan pa dang /_rab tu bzhad pa'i spyan dang /_'dod chags rdul bcom dang /_sku mchog tu 'khrungs pa dang /_lha'i dbyig dang /_rlabs chen lta dang /_'gog par gzhol ba dang /_
[\[268a.7\]]thugs rnam par sangs rgyas pa dang /_rdul rnam par bstsal pa dang /_'od 'phro mnga' chen dang /_nye bar zhi ba mnga' ba dang /_sa ga'i lha dang /_rdo rje ri bo dang /_ye shes 'od 'phro 'bar ba'i sku dang /_bde mdzad ba dang /_bskrun pa'i stag dang /_
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]dge ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_grags pa yid du 'ong bas bzang ba dang /_mthus rnam par gnon pa dang /_don dam pa rnam par gnon pa dang /_zhi ba'i 'od zer dang /_gcig tu 'phags pa dang /_dbyangs zab mo dang /_sa'i bdag po dang /_dpag tu 
[\[268b.2\]]med pa dang /_dbyangs kyi dpal dang /_rnam par grags pa dang /_longs spyod 'thun pa dang /_longs spyod tshogs pa dang /_sman pa'i dam pa dang /_yon tan zla ba dang /_bzhad pa'i gzi brjid dang /_yon tan bstsags pa dang /_zla ba 'phags pa dang /_
[\[268b.3\]]nyi ma'i lha dang /_'jigs par grags pa dang /_'od zer gyi zhal dang /_sA la'i dbang po'i lhun dang /_grags pa dang /_sman gyi rgyal po dang /_rin chen mchog dang /_blo gros rdo rje dang /_dkar po'i dpal dang /_gzhi shin tu sbyangs ba 
[\[268b.4\]]dang /_rin [{]cen [,]chen [}]rgyal po dang /_grags pa chen po dang /_shugs drag 'dzin pa dang /_mi dpogs 'od dang /_'od 'phro chen pos bzhugs pa dang /_don yod pa'i chos la mnga' ba dang /_brtson 'grus mnyams pa dang /_dag pa'i lha dang /_'od brtan pa dang /_
[\[268b.5\]]kun gyi bshes gnyen dang /_rnam par grol ba'i dbyangs dang /_rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po dang /_tshig gcod pa dang /_tsam pa ka dri ma med pa'i 'od dang /_kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' ba dang /_zla ba rnam par 'phags pa dang /_sgron ma 'dzin pa dang /_
[\[268b.6\]]sku rnam par mdzes pa dang /_brjod du med par 'phags pa dang /_'gro ba'i bshes gnyen dang /_'od zer mang po dang /_dbyangs kyi yan lag dpa' bo dang /_chu'i lha'i spyan dang /_mos pa'i blo gros mnga' ba'i gzi brjid dang /_me tog kun da'i 
[\[268b.7\]]dpal dang /_mchod pa'i zla ba dang /_blo mi mnga' ba dang /_chags pa mi mnga' ba dang /_mi dmigs pa'i blo gros dang /_phung po bstsags pa dang /_ngan song rab tu 'joms pa dang /_me tog dam pa dang /_seng ge rnam par sgrog pa dang /_don mi 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]dma' ba dang /_bsgribs pa med par gzigs pa dang /_pha rol gyi tshogs 'joms pa dang /_rlung gi mu khyud dang /_snying bo mi g.yo ba dang /_snying po bzang po dang /_gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i ri bo dang /_mi gnas ye shes dang /_mtha' yas bzhugs pa 
[\[269a.2\]]dang /_g.yul du brtan pa dang /_spyod pas grub pa dang /_bla mas bon pa dang /_mchog tu dga' ba dang /_rjes su 'dzin pa'i zla ba dang /_lhun mi g.yo ba dang /_thugs drag po dang /_thugs brtse ba'i blo gros dang /_shin tu mtho 'dzin pa dang /_
[\[269a.3\]]'od zer mu khyud dang /_mtshan dpe med pa dang /_gzi brjid mnyam pa dang /_thams cad kha dog dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i shes rab dang /_mi g.yo ba'i lha dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal dang /_rnam par thar ba'i zla ba dang /_
[\[269a.4\]]bla na med pa'i rgyal po dang /_zla ba'i phung po dang /_mchod pa'i tshangs pa dang /_spyan mi 'gyur ba dang /_byams pa'i rigs dang /_phrin las 'phags pa dang /_gnyer ba'i chos kyi blo gros dang /_bla na med pa'i dpal dang /_tshangs pa'i 
[\[269a.5\]]lha dang /_yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od dang /_bla na med pa'i chos kyi spyod yul dang /_mtha' yas bzang po dang /_tshul dang 'dra ba'i gzungs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' shin tu mtho ba'i lha dag ste/_rigs kyi bu de ltar stong gsum gyi 
[\[269a.6\]]stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]te/_smos pa 'di dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum 
[\[269a.7\]]du'ang kho mo nyid 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul mtha' dang dbus med pa la zhugs te/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i yum du yon tan gyi khyad 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]par brjod du med pas 'gyur ba de bzhin du yon tan gyi khyad par brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge nas de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i bar gyi yum du 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa bskal ba bzang po ba rnams 
[\[269b.2\]]kyi yum du'ang 'gyur ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thams cad dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams 
[\[269b.3\]]cad na 'dzam bu gling yod pa thams cad du phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyad pa spyod cing bskal pa thams cad du sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul bar byin gyis brlabs te/_ma byon pa'i 
[\[269b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba thams cad kyi yum du yang 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]lha mo sgyu ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[269b.5\]]rnam par thar ba smon lam chen po'i ye shes sgyu ma'i rnam pas rnam par brgyan pa 'di brnyes nas ji srid cig lags/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_sems kyi yul las 'das pa rigs dang ldan pa'i 
[\[269b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa'i mig gi lam gyis rnam par dmigs pa rnam par shes pas bgrang ba las yongs su 'das pa'i pha rol cig tu bskal pa dge ba'i 'od ces bya ba zhig byung ste/_bskal pa dge ba'i 'od de la 'jig rten gyi khams ri bo shin tu mtho 
[\[269b.7\]]ba'i dpal zhes bya ba rnam par dag la kun nas nyon mongs pa rin po che du ma las grub pa khor yug dang bcas pa ri rab dang rgya mtshor bcas pa/_'gro ba lnga'i rgyud dang bcas pa/_sna tshogs blta na mdzes pa zhig byung ste/_'jig rten gyi khams ri bo 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]shin tu mtho ba'i dpal der gling bzhi pa bye ba brgya phrag bcu byung ste/_gling bzhi ba bye ba brgya phrag bcu po de dag gi dbus na gling bzhi pa dbu ma seng ge rgyal mtshan dam pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba zhig yod par gyur te/_gling bzhi ba der rgyal po'i 
[\[270a.2\]]gnas bye ba brgya phrag brgyad cu byung bar gyur to/_/rgyal po'i gnas bye ba brgya phrag brgyad cu po de dag gi dbus su rgyal po'i gnas dbu ma rgyal mtshan gyi dam pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba byung ste/_der 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gzi brjid chen po'i mthu zhes bya ba 
[\[270a.3\]]byung ngo /_/rgyal po'i gnas rgyal mtshan gyi dam pa dang ldan pa der snying po byang chub yal ga sna tshogs kyi 'od ces bya ba zhig byung ste/_de na snying po byang chub kyi lha mo mig gi dpal zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug go_/snying po byang chub yal ga sna tshogs kyi 
[\[270a.4\]]'od de la byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan dri ma med pa zhes bya ba zhig thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir 'dug pa las de'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos khong du chud par bya ba la bar chad bya ba'i phyir bdung kha dog bzang po'i 
[\[270a.5\]]'od ces bya ba bdud kyi sde chen po'i 'khor dang ldan pa zhig lus mi snang bar ma byas par drung du phyin par gyur to/_/'khor los sgyur ba gzi brjid chen po'i mthu de yang byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thob pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pas 
[\[270a.6\]]byung ba zhig ste/_des bdud kyi sde de bas kyang 'phags la ches mang ba'i dpung gi tshogs chen po mngon par sprul te/_bdud kyi sde pham par bya ba'i phyir snying po byang chub de'i 'khor kun nas yongs su bskor ba dang /_des bdud kyi sde chen po de yang 
[\[270a.7\]]rnam par gtor bar gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal mtshan dri ma med pa des kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/de nas snying po byang chub kyi lha mo mig gi dpal gyis 'khor los sgyur 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]ba'i rgyal po gzi brjid chen po'i mthu la bu'i 'du shes bskyed nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der 'khor los sgyur ba gzi brjid chen po'i mthu 'di bdag 
[\[270b.2\]]gi bur gyur cig_/nam 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe'ang /_bdag nyid de'i mar gyur cig_/ces nas des smon lam de skad du btab ste/_snying po byang chub yal ga sna 
[\[270b.3\]]tshogs kyi 'od de nyid la gnas shing bskal ba 'od bzang po de nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa khrag khrig phrag bcu bsnyen bkur to/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na snying po byang chub kyi lha mo mig gi dpal zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin 
[\[270b.4\]]pa tsam du sems na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_kho mo ni de'i tshe de'i dus na snying po byang chub kyi lha mo mig gi dpal zhes bya bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba gzi brjid chen po'i 
[\[270b.5\]]mthu zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thob pa/_rdzu 'phrul chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba bdud kyi sde chen po rnam par 'thor bar byed byed pa de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na ni de ltar mi blta ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[270b.6\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad 'di ni de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gzi brjid chen po'i mthu zhes bya bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo de nas nye bar bzung nas gang dang gang du skyes pa de dag thams cad 
[\[270b.7\]]du'ang 'di ni kho mo'i bur gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing 'gro ba'i rgyud kyi sgo thams cad dang /_skye gnas kyi sgo thams cad dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgo thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyud 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]kyi tshul thams cad dang /_skyes pa'i rabs kyi tshul thams cad dang /_lha'i dbang po'i tshe thams cad dang /_'jig rten gyi dbang po'i 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad dang /_dbang phyug gi sa thams cad dang /_'gro ba'i rgyud du snang ba thams 
[\[271a.2\]]cad gang dang gang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad du yang kho mo nyid 'di'i yum du gyur te/_srid pa thams cad du yang kho mo nyid dang 'bral ba med par yum du gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba'i sgo thams 
[\[271a.3\]]cad du skad cig skad cig byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa bstan par gyur ba de dag thams cad du'ang kho mo nyid 'di'i yum du gyur to/_/'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' dang dbus med pa tshad med pa dag gi yum du'ang kho mo 
[\[271a.4\]]gyur to/_/phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar byung ba mtha' dang dbus med pa tshad med pa dag gi yum du yang kho mo gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig gi srid pa tha ma la kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i yum du gyur pa'i de bzhin 
[\[271a.5\]]gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi sku lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas 'od zer mang po byung zhing kho mo'i lus dang sems rab tu snang bar mdzad do/_/rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa smon lam chen po'i ye shes sgyu ma'i rnam pas 
[\[271a.6\]]rnam par brgyan pa 'di shes par zad na/_kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po'i snying po dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul bas mi ngoms pa'i lto can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa/_
[\[271a.7\]]ba spu'i rtse mo las 'byung bar ston pa la dbang bsgyur ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/_yon tan brjod par nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu sum cu rtsa gsum gyi dbang po'i gnas de nyid na lha'i bu dran pa dang ldan pa'i bu mo lha dbang 'od ces bya ba 'dug 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]gis/_de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]lha mo sgyu ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su 
[\[271b.2\]]bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te lha mo sgyu ma'i drung nas song ngo //_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po bcu bdun pa/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs su[,]bzang du[}]ma cu rtsa gsum gyi dbang po'i gnas gang na ba dang /_lha'i 
[\[271b.3\]]bu dran pa dang ldan pa'i bu mo lha dbang 'od gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_lha'i bu mo lha dbang 'od kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_lha'i bu mo lha dbang 'od la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_lha'i bu mo lha dbang 'od 
[\[271b.4\]]kyi mdun du 'dug ste/_thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma lha mo bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba 
[\[271b.5\]]dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/_'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/_'phags ma lha mo ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab 
[\[271b.6\]]par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bstan du gsol/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_lha'i bu mo lha dbang 'od kyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba 
[\[271b.7\]]dran pa thogs pa med la rnam par dag pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba thob pa ste/_rigs kyi bu kho mos mngon par dran pa bskal pa ud pa la zhes bya ba zhig byung ba la kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung gang gA'i bye ma snyed cig bsnyen bkur te/_de dag mngon 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]par byung ba'i tshe'ang yongs su bsrung ba byas so/_/mchod pa byas so/_/longs spyod pa'i don du bza' shing gi ra ba gsol to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byang chub sems dpar gyur te/_yum gyi sku na bzhugs pa dang /_
[\[272a.2\]]bltam pa dang gshegs stabs bdun du bzhud pa dang /_seng ge'i nga ro chen po sgrogs pa dang /_gzhon nu'i sa la bzhugs pa dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa'am/_mngon par 'byung ba'am/_byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang 
[\[272a.3\]]rgya ba 'am/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'am/_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongs su ston pa mdzad pa'i tshe/_sems can yongs su smin pa dang /_rnam par gdul ba mdzad pa de dag thams cad kyang thugs dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung 
[\[272a.4\]]ba tshun cad dam pa'i chos mthar thug par zad kyi bar du kho mos shes so/_/dran no/_/rjes su dran no/_/bzung ngo /_/yongs su bzung ngo /_/nye bar bzung ngo /_/rjes su 'brang bar byed do/_/bskal pas bzang po zhes bya ba zhig byung ba de la/_kho mos 
[\[272a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung gad+gA bcu'i bye ma snyed cig bsnyen bkur to/_/bskal pa grags pa bzang po zhes bya ba zhig byung ba de la kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig bsnyen bkur to/_/bskal pa dmigs su 
[\[272a.6\]]med pa zhes bya ba zhig byung ba de la kho mos sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bsnyen bkur to/_/bskal pa 'od bzang po zhes bya ba zhig byung ba de la kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig bsnyen bkur to/_/
[\[272a.7\]]bskal pa 'od gzhal du med pa zhes bya ba zhig byung ba de la kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung gang+gA nyi shu'i bye ma snyed cig bsnyen bkur to/_/bskal pa dpal shin tu 'bar ba zhes bya ba zhig byung ba de la kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung gang gA'i bye ma 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]snyed cig bsnyen bkur to/_/bskal pa snying rje bzang po zhes bya ba zhig byung ba de la kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung gang gA brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed cig bsnyen bkur to/_/bskal pa rgyal bar gyur pa zhes bya ba zhig byung ba de la kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung 
[\[272b.2\]]gang+gA drug cu'i bye ma snyed cig bsnyen bkur to/_/bskal pa zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba zhig byung ba de la kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung gang gA bdun cu'i bye ma snyed cig bsnyen bkur to/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar tshul de bzhin du kho mo rtag tu rgyun ma chad par 
[\[272b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang bral bar ma gyur pa ni bskal pa chu klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed cig dran te/_kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad las byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dran 
[\[272b.4\]]pa thogs pa med la rnam par dag pas brgyan pa 'di thos so/_/thos nas kyang yongs su bzung ngo /_/ji skad du gsungs pa bzhin du khong du chud do/_/rnam par thar pa 'di nyid la kho mo rtag tu rgyun ma chad par rjes su zhugs par gnas gnas 
[\[272b.5\]]te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi byang chub sems dpa'i sa nye bar bzung ba nas dam pa'i chos gnas pa zad pa'i mthar thug gi bar gyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dran pa thogs pa med 
[\[272b.6\]]la rnam par dag pas brgyan pa 'di dran no/_/rjes su dran no/_/bzung ngo /_/yongs su bzung ngo /_/nye bar bzung ngo /_/rjes su 'brang bar byed do/_/rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'di shes par zad na/_kho mos 
[\[272b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' mun pa'i mun nag dang bral ba/_'khor ba'i nam nangs pa/_sgrib pa dang bral ba/_gnyid med pa la mos shing /_dga' ba snyoms pa dang /_le lo rnam par spangs pa/_lus kyi 'du byed shin tu byang ba/_rtag par chos thams cad kyi rang 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]bzhin khong du chud pas shin tu dag pa/_stobs bcu rnam par dag pa khong du chud pa/_de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/_yon tan brjod par nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas na byis pa'i slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen 
[\[273a.2\]]zhes bya ba 'dug gis/_de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dga' rangs te/_mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde 
[\[273a.3\]]ba skyes nas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i shugs drag po rnam par 'phel bas/_lha'i bu mo lha dbang 'od kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_lha'i bu mo lha dbang 'od la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_yang 
[\[273a.4\]]dang yang bltas te/_lha'i bu mo lha dbang 'od kyi drung nas song ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs su[,]bzang du[}]ma cu rtsa gsum gyi dbang po'i gnas nas babs te/_mthar gyis grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas su byis pa'i slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen gang na ba 
[\[273a.5\]]der song ste/_phyin nas/_byis pa'i slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_byis pa'i slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_byis pa'i slob dpon kun gyi bshes 
[\[273a.6\]]gnyen gyi mdun du 'dug ste/_thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi 
[\[273a.7\]]ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan tu bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/_'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do/_/zhes bdag gis thos na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan tu bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_byis pa'i slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen gyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu tshong dpon gyi bu bzo 
[\[273b.2\]]mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' las yi ge'i shes pa slob slob pa yin gyis 'di'i gan du song ste dris dang /_'di ni khyod la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan tu bya 
[\[273b.3\]]ba ston par 'gyur ro zhes nas/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs[,]bzang[}]/_tshong dpon gyi bu bzo mngon par shes pa gang na ba der song ste/_phyin nas tshong dpon gyi bu bzo mngon par shes pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/_tshong dpon gyi bu bzo mngon par 
[\[273b.4\]]shes pa'i mdun du 'dug ste/_thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba 
[\[273b.5\]]dang /_ji ltar nan tan tu bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/_'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do/_/zhes bdag gis thos na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab 
[\[273b.6\]]par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan tu bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/_des smras pa/_rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bzo mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa thob pa ste/_rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo yi ge'i ma mo 
[\[273b.7\]]slob pa'i tshe yi ge a brjod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i mthus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo yul tha mi dad pa zhes bya ba khong du chud do/_/ra zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo gzhi'i bye brag mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]khong du chud do/_/pa zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi yang dag par 'dren pa zhes bya ba khong du chud do/_/tsa zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'khor lo rnam par phye ba kun 
[\[274a.2\]]nas gcod pa zhes bya ba khong du chud do/_/na zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]pas gzhi thug pa med pa zhes bya ba khong da chud do/_/la zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang bral te/_gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]pas 
[\[274a.3\]]dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba khong du chud do/_/da zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo sbyor ba phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa zhes bya ba khong du chud do/_/ba zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba khong du chud 
[\[274a.4\]]do/_/Da zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo kun tu 'khor ba zhes bya ba khong du chud do/_/Sha zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba khong du chud do/_/ba zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi 
[\[274a.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo kun nas rnam par 'phel bar rnam par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba khong du chud do/_/ta zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo skar ma'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba khong du chud do/_/ya zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[274a.6\]]rol tu phyin pa'i sgo phung po tha mi dad pa zhes bya ba khong du chud do/_/Sh+Ta zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo gdung ba kun nas zhi bar byed pa'i 'od ces bya ba khong du chud do/_/ka zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo sprin tha 
[\[274a.7\]{]myi [,]mi [}]dad pa zhes bya ba khong du chud do/_/sa zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo char mngon par 'bab pas khyab par zhes bya ba khong du chud do/_/ma zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo shugs chen pos brgyan pa'i rtse 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]mo zhes bya ba khong du chud do/_/ga zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo kun nas rnam par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba khong du chud do/_/tha zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo de bzhin nyid tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad pa'i snying po zhes bya ba khong du 
[\[274b.2\]]chud do/_/dza zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'gro ba'i 'khor ba rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba khong du chud do/_/swa zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo sangs rgyas thams cad dran pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba 
[\[274b.3\]]khong du chud do/_/d+ha zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo chos kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dpyod pa rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba khong du chud do/_/sha zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 
[\[274b.4\]]gdams ngag gi 'khor lo snang ba zhes bya ba khong du chud do/_/kha zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mngon par 'du bya ba'i rgyu dang sa'i ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba khong du chud do/_/k+sha zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[274b.5\]]phyin pa'i sgo las zhi ba rgya mtsho'i mdzod rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba khong du chud do/_/sta zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par 'thor bas rnam par dag pa'i snying po zhes bya ba khong du chud do/_/nya 
[\[274b.6\]]zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'jig rten 'byung ba rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa zhes bya ba khong du chud do/_/pha zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'khor ba dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthun pa'i 'khor lo'i ye shes dkyil 'khor 
[\[274b.7\]]ces bya ba khong du chud do/_/b+ha zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo gnas kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par brgyan pa zhes bya ba khong du chud do/_/tsha zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]bstsags pa dam pa'i thabs kyi spyod pa'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor tha dad pa zhes bya ba khong du chud do/_/sma zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo sangs rgyas thams cad blta ba'i phyogs la mngon du gyur ba zhes bya ba 
[\[275a.2\]]khong du chud do/_/hwa zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo sems can thams cad kyis dog la rnam par lta ba'i stobs shin tu skyes pa rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba khong du chud do/_/yas zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[275a.3\]]pa'i sgo yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad kyi nan tan rtogs par 'jug pa zhes bya ba khong du chud do/_/g+ha zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo chos thams cad kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgya mtsho brtan pa zhes bya ba khong du chud do/_/Ta 
[\[275a.4\]]zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam gyi phyogs su mngon par 'gro ba zhes bya ba khong du chud do/_/na zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo yi ge 'khor lo [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa'i mtha' rnam 
[\[275a.5\]]par 'byed pa zhes bya ba khong du chud do/_/spa zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i mthar phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba khong du chud do/_/ska zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[275a.6\]]rol tu phyin pa'i sgo sa'i snying po so so yang dag par rig pa thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par snang bas 'khor lo rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba khong du chud do/_/sma zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos shin tu bstan 
[\[275a.7\]]pa'i yul zhes bya ba khong du chud do/_/sh+tsa zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo sems can gyi nam mkha' las chos kyi sprin gyi 'brug sgra byung bas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba khong du chud do/_/Tha zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo sems can gyi don bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i dgos pa mthar phyin par zin pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba khong du chud do/_/d+ha zhes bya ba brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo chos kyi 'khor lo tha mi dad pa'i snying po zhes bya ba khong du chud do/_/rigs kyi 
[\[275b.2\]]bu kho bo de ltar yi ge'i ma mo slob pa'i tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo tshad med grangs med pa zhig khong du chud de/_rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bzo mngon par 
[\[275b.3\]]shes pa dang ldan pa 'di thob pa ste/_rigs kyi bu kho bos de shes par zad na/_kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzo'i gnas thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa/_bzo'i gnas thams cad la 'jug pa 
[\[275b.4\]]dang /_yi ge dang grangs dang rtsis dang shod thabs thams cad khong du chud par bya ba dang /_sngags dang sman thams cad kyi tshul la mkhas pa rab tu thob par bya ba dang /_'byung po dang /_gza' dang skar ma dang /_brjed byed dang /_byad stems dang /_ro langs kyi gdon 
[\[275b.5\]]thams cad gso ba dang /_sems can gyi khams gso bar bya ba'i sman dang thabs kyi rgyus dang khams kyi thabs yongs su bsdu ba'i cho ga dang /_gser dang nor bu dang /_mu tig dang baiDUr+ya dang /_dung dang man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_mu tig dmar po dang /_mu sa ra gal
