[\[275b.6\]]ba dang /_ge sar dang /_dpal gyi snying po dang /_rin po che thams cad 'byung zhing skye ba dang /_rigs dang 'byung khungs dang /_rin thang gi rgyus shes par bya ba dang /_bza' shing gi ra ba dang /_dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang /_grong dang grong khyer dang /_ljongs dang khang pa 
[\[275b.7\]]dang /_rgyal po'i gnas mngon par bsgrub pa dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_'khor lo dang /_mtshan ma blta ba dang /_sems can gyi mtshan gyi ltas dang /_sa g.yo ba dang /_phyogs tshig pa dang /_skar mda' lhung ba dang /_dge [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge dang /_mu ge dang lo legs pa la 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa 'jig rten gyi tha ma lag thams cad kyi rgyus khong du chud par bya ba dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnam par phye ba thams cad brjod cing bstan pa dang /_khong du chud par bya ba dang /_yang dag pa nyid rjes su rig par bya ba'i 
[\[276a.2\]]rgyus la sgrib pa 'am/_the tsom mam/_yid gnyis sam/_nem nur ram/_tsham tshom mam/_mgo rmongs pa'am/_'khor ba'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba'am/_sgyid lug pa'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]shes pa'am/_khong du mi chud pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/_yon 
[\[276a.3\]]tan brjod par nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu yul ma ga ng+ha 'di nyid kyi ljongs dag pa zhes bya ba'i grong khyer 'tsho ba zhes bya ba na dge bsnyen ma bzang mo'i mchog ces bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 
[\[276a.4\]]bslab par bya ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan tu bya ba dris shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]tshong dpon gyi bu bzo mngon par shes pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_tshong dpon gyi bu bzo mngon par shes pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su 
[\[276a.5\]]bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/_tshong dpon gyi bu bzo mngon par shes pa'i drung nas song ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ljongs dag pa'i grong khyer 'tsho ba gang na ba dang /_dge bsnyen ma bzang mo'i mchog gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_dge

[\[276a.7\]]'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan tu bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/_'phags ma ni byang chub sems 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do/_/zhes bdag gis thos na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan tu bgyi ba 'phags mas bdag la bstan du gsol/_

[\[276b.3\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du [{]myig [,]mig [}]thogs pa med pa la 'jug go_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rna ba thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sna thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du lce thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa

[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_yang dang yang bltas te/_dge bsnyen ma bzang mo'i mchog gi drung nas song ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mthar gyis lho phyogs kyi rgyud du song ste/_grong khyer

[\[277a.3\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan tu bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/_'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams

[\[277a.5\]]rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dran pa thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la rnam par dag pas rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba shes te/_kho bos ni phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zhabs kyi drung na chos yongs su tshol ba rgyun mi gcod pa'o/_/
[\[277a.6\]]rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dran pa thogs pa med pa la rnam par dag pas rnam par brgyan pa 'di shes par zad na/_kho bos byang chub sems dpa' bag tsha ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par seng ge'i nga ro sgrog pa bsod nams dang ye shes chen po la 
[\[277a.7\]]gnas pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/_yon tan brjod par nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu rgyas pa'i 'gram gyi grong khyer 'di nyid na khyim bdag zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba rtag tu khyim snang bar gyur pa dang ldan pa zhig 'dug gis de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub/_
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]gser 'tshong gces pa gtong ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_gser 'tshong gces pa gtong ba la lan brgya stong

[\[277b.4\]]bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/_'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do/_/zhes bdag gis thos na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 
[\[277b.5\]]'phags pas bdag la bstan du gsol/_smras pa rigs kyi bu kho bos ni rnam par thar pa ye shes dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba thob ste/_rigs kyi bu kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 'od 'di shes par zad na/_kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i

[\[277b.7\]]ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]khyim bdag zla ba bzang po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_khyim bdag zla ba bzang po la lan brgya 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_yang dang yang bltas te/_khyim bdag zla ba bzang po'i drung nas song ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mthar gyis grong khyer [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi gnas gang na ba der song ste/_khyim bdag mi pham sde gang na ba 
[\[278a.2\]]der phyin nas/_khyim bdag mi pham sde'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas 
[\[278a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/_'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do/_/zhes bdag gis thos na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang 
[\[278a.4\]]chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba thob ste de thob pas ni/_sangs rgyas mi zad pa mthong ba'i 
[\[278a.5\]]gter rab tu thob par 'gyur to/_/song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi chos kyi yul gru na bram ze zhi 'dzin mchog ces bya ba zhig 'dug gis/_de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /_

[\[278a.7\]]bdag mi pham sde'i drung nas song ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mthar gyis chos kyi yul grur song nas/_bram ze zhi 'dzin mchog gang na ba der phyin te/_bram ze zhi 'dzin mchog gi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas mdun du 'dug ste/_thal 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan tu bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/_'phags 
[\[278b.2\]]pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do/_/zhes bdag gis thos na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la 
[\[278b.3\]]bka' stsal du gsol/_/des smras pa/_rigs kyi bu kho bo ni bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis spyod pa ste/_bden pa'i tshig gang gis dus gsum du byang chub sems dpa' gang yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog ldog par mi 'gyur 
[\[278b.4\]]zhe na/_bden pa'i tshig gi byin gyi rlabs des/_bdag gi dgos pa 'di dang 'di zhig grub par shog shig ces byas na yang des kho bo'i bsam pa thams cad de bzhin du 'grub bo/_/rigs kyi bu kho bo ni bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs de lta bus dgos pa thams cad sgrub ste/_
[\[278b.5\]]rigs kyi bu kho bos bden pa'i byin gyis rlabs 'di shes par zad na/_kho bos byang chub sems dpa' bden pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i tshig rab tu thob pa rnams kyi spyod pa shes pa'am/_yon tan brjod par nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 
[\[278b.6\]]'di nyid na grong khyer yid bzang po'i sgo zhes bya ba yod de/_de na khye'u dpal 'byung ba zhes bya ba dang /_bu mo dpal gyi blo gros ma zhes bya ba gnyis shig 'khod kyis de'i gan du song la/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par 
[\[278b.7\]]bya ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]chos kyi rim gro cher bskyed de/_bram ze zhi 'dzin mchog gi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bram ze zhi 'dzin mchog la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]phyogs su bskor ba byas te/_yang dang yang bltas nas/_bram ze zhi 'dzin mchog gi drung nas song ngo /_de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mthar gyis grong khyer yid bzang po'i sgor song ste/_khye'u dpal 'byung ba dang /_bu mo dpal gyi blo 
[\[279a.2\]]gros ma gang na ba der phyin nas de gnyis kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/_ji ltar byang 
[\[279a.3\]]chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan tu bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/_'phags pa dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do/_/zhes bdag gis thos na/_
[\[279a.4\]]ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags pa dag gis bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/_de nas khye'u dpal 'byung ba dang /_bu mo dpal gyi blo gros mas tshong dpon gyi 
[\[279a.5\]]bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu bdag cag gnyis kyis ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgyu ma'i rnam pa zhes bya ba thob ste/_mngon du byas so rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo cag rnam par thar pa 'di dang ldan pas/_'jig rten thams cad sgyu 
[\[279a.6\]]ma'i rnam par rgyu rkyen sgyu ma las byung bar mthong ngo /_/las dang nyon mongs pa sgyu mar shes pas/_sems can thams cad kyang sgyu ma'i rnam par shes so/_/ma rig pa dang /_srid pa dang /_sred pa'i rgyu las byung bas 'gro ba thams cad kyang sgyu ma'i rnam par 
[\[279a.7\]]mthong ngo /_/phan tshun gyi rkyen gyi rgyu las byung bas chos thams cad kyang sgyu ma'i rnam par mthong ngo /_/phyin ci log gi sgyu ma las byung bas khams gsum thams cad kyang sgyu ma'i rnam par mthong ngo /_/yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rtog pa'i rgyus bskyed pas sems can 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]thams cad kyi shi 'pho dang /_'byung ba dang /_skye ba dang /_rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams kyang sgyu ma'i rnam par mthong ngo /_/'du shes dang sems dang lta ba phyin ci log gi rgyu las dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 'du shes 
[\[279b.2\]]kyis rmongs te/_byung bas zhing thams cad kyang sgyu ma'i rnam par mthong ngo /_/ye shes kyis spong ba'i rgyu las brtag ste/_/bskyed pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang sgyu ma'i rnam par mthong ngo /_/sgyu mar mngon par bsgrub pa las grub ste/_sprul pa'i 
[\[279b.3\]]spyod pa dang /_'dul ba'i sgyu ma'i rang bzhin pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /_smon lam gyis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_'dul ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yang sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bur shes so/_/smon lam dang ye shes sgyu mas mngon par 
[\[279b.4\]]bsgrubs te/_yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa sgyu ma'i rang bzhin yin pas sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor yang sgyu mar mthong ngo /_/rigs kyi bu bdag cag gnyis kyis ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba sgyu ma'i rang bzhin 'di 
[\[279b.5\]]shes par zad na/_kho bo cag gis byang chub sems dpa' las sgyu ma mtha' yas pas rnam par bsgrubs pa'i dra ba khong du chud pa rnams kyi spyod pa shes pa'am/_yon tan brjod par nus re skan/_de nas khye'u dpal 'byung ba dang /_bu mo dpal gyi blo gros mas tshong 
[\[279b.6\]]dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs drag po bsam gyis mi khyab pas mngon par brlan nas rang gi rnam par thar pa'i yul bstan te/_'di skad ces smras so/_/song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi phyogs kyi sgo'i gnas rgya mtsho'i 'gram zhes bya ba 
[\[279b.7\]]de na bza' shing gi ra ba rgyan chen po zhes bya ba yod de/_de'i nang na khang pa brtsegs pa chen po rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par smin pa las mngon par grub pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i sems 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]dang yid la bya ba las byung ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam las mngon par skyes pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i dbang las byung ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis sprul ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas 
[\[280a.2\]]pa las byung ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs kyis rdzogs pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen pos sems can rnam par gdul ba'i don du bstan pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs rnam par phye bas bsgrubs pa/_byang chub 
[\[280a.3\]]sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas la 'jug pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa yod de/_de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa zhes bya ba skye ba'i sa la gnas pa'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]rnams rjes su gzung ba dang /_pha dang ma dang gnyen du gyur pa rnams yongs su smin 
[\[280a.4\]]par bya ba dang /_der skyes ba'i byang chub sems dpa' skal ba mnyam pa rnams kyi theg pa chen po rab tu brtan par bya ba dang /_de ma yin pa'i sems can gzhan rnams kyang gar 'os pa'i sar dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_rang gi rnam par 
[\[280a.5\]]thar pa'i tshul la 'jug par bya ba yongs su bstan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba la dbang bsgyur ba thams cad kyi rjes su song ba rab tu brjod pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi skye ba yongs su bstan pa la mngon par gzhol bar bya bas sems can yongs su smin 
[\[280a.6\]]par bya ba mi gtang ba dang /_'gro ba thams cad yongs su gzung ba mi smad pas byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po'i stobs bstan par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i gnas gzhi rten thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa khong du chud par bya ba dang gnas med 
[\[280a.7\]]pa la gzhol bar srid par skye ba thams cad na gnas pa yongs su bstan pa'i don du 'dug gis/_de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yongs su dri ba dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongs su 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]dag par bya ba dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la nan tan du bya ba dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub kyi sems yongs su sbyang bar bya ba dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub par 
[\[280b.2\]]bya ba dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs yongs su bsags par bya ba dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon par bya ba dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[280b.3\]]yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa la 'jug par bya ba dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i nan tan gyi yon tan la gnas par bya ba dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas dge 
[\[280b.4\]]ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur bar bya ba dris shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' byams pa zhes bya ba de ni/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la zhugs pa'o/_/de ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang bsam pa 
[\[280b.5\]]rtogs par khong du chud pa'o/_/de ni sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i rjes su zhugs pa'o/_/de ni sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba la mngon du gyur pa'o/_/de ni pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs 
[\[280b.6\]]par byas pa'o/_/de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad la rab tu gnas pa'o/_/de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad la rab tu gnas pa'o/_/de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa thams cad rab tu thob pa'o/_/de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs pa'o/_/de ni lung bstan 
[\[280b.7\]]pa thams cad yang dag par blang ba'o/_de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba thams cad la rnam par rtse ba'o/_/de ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs thams cad yongs su blang ba'o/_/de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul la dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen de khyod la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis ni mngon par brlan par byed do/_/byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni rnam par 
[\[281a.2\]]'phel bar byed do/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa'i dbyings ni rab tu brtan par byed do/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad ni shin tu byang bar byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po'i shugs ni yang dag par 'phel bar byed do/_/chos kyi phyogs bsgribs pa med 
[\[281a.3\]]pa ni yongs su ston par byed do/_/gzhi kun tu zug pa'i sa khong du chud par bya ba ni rtogs par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyi sar 'byung ba'i sgo la ni gzhog par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod 
[\[281a.4\]]pa dang /_smon lam gyi yon tan yongs su grub pa ni yang dag par rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa thob par bya ba'i skye ba'i sgo ni yongs su ston par 'gyur gyis/_rigs kyi bu khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig la chags 
[\[281a.5\]]par ma byed cig_/chos kyi sgo'i 'od snang ba gcig la gzhol bar ma byed cig_/spyod pa gcig yongs su rdzogs pas chog par ma sems shig_/smon lam gcig pu mngon par bsgrub pa lhur ma len cig_/lung bstan pa gcig gis mthar thug pas 
[\[281a.6\]]rgyun gcad par ma byed cig_/bzod pa gsum la 'jug pas chog par bya ba'i 'du shes su ma byed cig_/pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ba rgyun ma gcod cig_/sa bcu thob pas mthar thug par ma byed cig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad yod pa yongs 
[\[281a.7\]]su gzung ba dang /_yongs su dag par bya ba ma smon cig_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen tshad yod pa dga' bar bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bas ngoms par ma byed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa yongs su 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]bsdu bar bya dgos so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs tshad med pa shin tu bsgrub dgos so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi rgyu tshad med pa yongs su bstsags dgos so/_/yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul tshad med pa la bslab par bya dgos so/_/sems 
[\[281b.2\]]can gyi khams tshad med pa yongs su smin par bya dgos so/_/sems can gyi bsam pa'i khams tshad med pa la 'jug par bya dgos so/_/sems can gyi dbang po tshad med pa yongs su shes par bya dgos so/_/sems can gyi mos pa tshad med 
[\[281b.3\]]pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bya dgos so/_/sems can gyi spyod pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa khong du chud par bya dgos so/_/sems can tshad med pa gdul bar bya dgos so/_/nyon mongs pa dang bag la nyal ba tshad med pa yang dag par gzhom dgos so/_/las kyi 
[\[281b.4\]]sgrib pa tshad med pa yongs su sbyang dgos so/_/lta ba'i rnam pa tshad med pa rnam par bzlog dgos so/_/sems kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa tshad med pa bstsal bar bya dgos so/_/sems rnam par dag pa tshad med pa bskyed par bya dgos so/_/sdug bsngal gyi 
[\[281b.5\]]zug rngu tshad med pa yang dag par dbyung dgos so/_/srid pa'i rgya mtsho tshad med pa yongs su bskam par bya dgos so/_/ma rig pa'i mun pa tshad med pa rnam par bsal dgos so/_/nga rgyal gyi ri tshad med pa rab tu bsnyil dgos so/_/'khor ba'i bcings 
[\[281b.6\]]pa tshad med pa shin tu gtub dgos so/_/srid pa'i chu bo tshad med pa brgal dgos so/_/tshe'i rgya mtsho tshad med pa bskam dgos so/_/sems can 'dod pa'i 'dam du thogs pa tshad med pa yongs su dgrol dgos so/_/sems can khams gsum 
[\[281b.7\]]gyi khyim du thogs pa tshad med pa gdon par bya dgos so/_/sems can tshad med pa 'phags pa'i lam la dgod dgos so/_/'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi spyod pa tshad med pa rab tu zhi bar bya dgos so/_/bdud kyi zhags pa tshad med pa las 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]yang dag par 'da' bar bya dgos so/_/bdud kyi las tshad med pa rnam par bzlog dgos so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i khams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su sbyang dgos so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor ba tshad med pa rnam 
[\[282a.2\]]par 'phel bar bya dgos so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po tshad med pa yongs su bskyed dgos so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa tshad med pa yongs su sbyang dgos so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i mnyam pa nyid tshad med pa la 'jug par bya dgos so/_/byang 
[\[282a.3\]]chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i khyad par tshad med pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bya dgos so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan tshad med pa yongs su dag par bya dgos so/_/byang chub sems dpas bya ba'i spyod pa tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya dgos so/_/'jig 
[\[282a.4\]]rten gyi spyod pa tshad med pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bya dgos so/_/'jig rten gyi rjes su 'brang ba tshad med pa yongs su bstan dgos so/_/dad pa'i stobs tshad med pa yongs su bskyed dgos so/_/brtson 'grus kyi stobs tshad med pa nye bar brtan dgos so/_/dran pa'i 
[\[282a.5\]]stobs tshad med pa yongs su dag par bya dgos so/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya dgos so/_/shes rab kyi stobs tshad med pa bskyed par bya dgos so/_/mos pa'i stobs tshad med pa brtan par bya dgos so/_/bsod nams 
[\[282a.6\]]kyi stobs tshad med pa yang dag par bsgrub dgos so/_/ye shes kyi stobs tshad med pa rnam par spel dgos so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i stobs tshad med pa yang dag par bsgrub dgos so/_/sangs rgyas kyi stobs tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya dgos so/_/
[\[282a.7\]]chos kyi sgo tshad med pa rab tu dbye dgos so/_/chos kyi phyogs tshad med pa la 'jug par bya dgos so/_/chos kyi sgo tshad med pa yongs su sbyang dgos so/_/chos kyi snang ba tshad med pa yang dag par bskyed dgos so/_/chos kyi gsal ba tshad med par rab tu bya dgos so/_/
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]dbang po'i rgyud tshad med pa snang bar bya dgos so/_/nyon mongs pa'i nad tshad med pa yongs su shes par bya dgos so/_/chos kyi sman tshad med pa yang dag par bsdu dgos so/_/nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis btab pa'i sems can gyi khams tshad med pa gso dgos so/_/
[\[282b.2\]]bdud rtsi'i tshogs tshad med pa yang dag par bsdu bar bya dgos so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa 'da' bar bya dgos so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa mchod dgos so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor tshad med par 'jug 
[\[282b.3\]]par bya dgos so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa tshad med pa yongs su gzung dgos so/_/sems can gyi gnod pa tshad med pa bzod par bya dgos so/_/mi khom pa dang ngan song gi lam tshad med pa yongs su gcad dgos so/_/sems can gyi 
[\[282b.4\]]bde ba tshad med pa nye bar bsgrub dgos so/_/sems can bsdu ba tshad med pa bya dgos so/_/gzungs kyi sgo tshad med pa yongs su sbyang dgos so/_/smon lam gyi sgo tshad med pa mngon par bsgrub dgos so/_/byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po'i stobs 
[\[282b.5\]]tshad med pa yongs su bsgom dgos so/_/chos yongs su btsal ba la brtson par bya ba tshad med pa rgyun mi gcad par bya dgos so/_/nges par rtogs pa'i stobs tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rjes su 'jug dgos so/_/mngon par shes pa mngon du bsgrub pa tshad med pa bskyed 
[\[282b.6\]]dgos so/_/rig pa dang ye shes kyi snang ba tshad med pa rnam par dag par bya dgos so/_/sems can gyi rgyud tshad med pa'i rjes su 'gro bar bya dgos so/_/srid par skye ba tshad med pa yongs su gzung dgos so/_/lus rnam par phye ba tshad med pa yongs su bstan 
[\[282b.7\]]dgos so/_/skad rnam par phye ba tshad med pa yongs su shes par bya dgos so/_/sems can gyi sems rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pa khong du chud par bya dgos so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul rgya chen po'i rjes su 'jug par bya dgos so/_/byang chub sems 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]dpa'i gnas shin tu yangs par rjes su spyad dgos so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par spyod pa zab mo la rnam par blta dgos so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i yul rtogs par dka' ba khong du chud par bya dgos so/_/byang chub sems 
[\[283a.2\]]dpa'i lam bgrod par dka' ba bgrod par bya dgos so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i shugs bsgrub par dka' ba yongs su gzung dgos so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa 'jug par dka' ba la 'jug par bya dgos so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 
[\[283a.3\]]rnam pa sna tshogs khong du chud par bya dgos so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad du khyab pa kun tu bstan dgos so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sprin yongs su gzung dgos so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dra ba mtha' dang 
[\[283a.4\]]dbus med par rab tu rgyas par bya dgos so/_/byang chub sems dpas pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya dgos so/_/byang chub sems dpas lung bstan pa tshad med par yang dag par mnod dgos so/_/byang chub sems dpas bzod 
[\[283a.5\]]pa'i sgo dpag tu med pa la 'jug par bya dgos so/_/byang chub sems dpas grags [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su sbyang bar bya dgos so/_/byang chub sems dpas chos kyi sgo dpag tu med pa yongs su dag par bya dgos so/_/byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[283a.6\]]zhing brjod du med pa yongs su sbyang dgos so/_/byang chub sems dpas bskal pa mtha' yas par go cha bgo dgos so/_/byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa mchod par bya dgos so/_/byang chub sems dpas smon lam 
[\[283a.7\]]mngon par bsgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab par mngon par bsgrub dgos so/_/rigs kyi bu mdor na sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni sems can thams cad dang mnyam par bstan to/_/bskal 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]pa thams cad du gnas pas bskal pa thams cad dang mnyam par bstan to/_/thams cad du skye ba yongs su ston pas skye ba thams cad dang mnyam par bstan to/_/dus gsum gyi ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir dus thams cad dang mnyam par 
[\[283b.2\]]bstan to/_/chos thams cad la nan tan du byed pas chos thams cad dang mnyam par bstan to/_/zhing thams cad yongs su dag par byed pas zhing thams cad dang mnyam par bstan to/_/smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pas/_smon 
[\[283b.3\]]lam thams cad dang mnyam par bstan to/_/sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa mngon par bsgrub pas/_sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par bstan to/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam dang gcig tu 'gyur ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[283b.4\]]dpa' thams cad dang mnyam par bstan to/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad la bsnyen bkur byed pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad dang mnyam par bstan to/_/rigs kyi bu de bas na khyod kyis dge 
[\[283b.5\]]ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su btsal ba la skyo bar mi bya'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong bas ngoms pa bskyed par mi bya'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la yongs su dri bas chog shes par mi bya'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa las bsam 
[\[283b.6\]]pa phyir ldog par mi bya'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la phu dud dang /_rim gro'i sbyor ba rgyun gcad par mi bya'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag dang /_rjes su bstan pa la log par gzung bar mi bya'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi yon 
[\[283b.7\]]tan thob par 'gyur ba la the tshom mi bskyed do/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis 'byung ba'i sgo bstan pa la yid gnyis su mi bya'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi thabs kyi bsam pa dang /_'jig rten gyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i rgyud la zhe sdang bskyed par mi bya'o/_/dge ba'i 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]bshes gnyen la mos pa rnam par bskyed pas lus dang sems rnam par ldog par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad thos pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag las pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[284a.2\]]yon tan yongs su rdzogs par bya ba thams cad ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi rgyun thams cad ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis 
[\[284a.3\]]bskyed pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bsgrubs pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sgo snang ba thams cad ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba'i sgo rnam par dag pa thams 
[\[284a.4\]]cad ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la nan tan du bya ba thams cad ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag las pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi chos thams cad ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la gnas pa'o/_/byang 
[\[284a.5\]]chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa thams cad ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen rtsa bar gyur pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa brtan pa thams cad ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen las skyes pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs 
[\[284a.6\]]dang spobs pa'i sgo snang ba thams cad du khrid pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen no/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dag pa'i sgo'i mdzod thams cad ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba thams cad ni dge 
[\[284a.7\]]ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yang dag par bskyed pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam khyad par can thams cad ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag na 'dug pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi tshul gyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pa thams cad ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]la brten pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par bsgrub pa khyad par can mnyam pa thams cad ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rgyud las byung ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba'i gnas thams cad ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi mdzod na 'dug pa'o/_/byang 
[\[284b.2\]]chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi 'byung gnas nas byung ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po'i shugs kyi myu gu thams cad ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rnam par spel ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes rgya mtsho thams 
[\[284b.3\]]cad ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yang dag par spel ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gter gyi mdzod thams cad ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bskyangs pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams bstsags pa thams cad ni dge ba'i 
[\[284b.4\]]bshes gnyen gyis bsrungs pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshe rnam par dag pa thams cad ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bskyed pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i chos mnyan pa'i sprin thams cad ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi kha nas byung ba'o/_/
[\[284b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba'i lam la 'jug pa thams cad ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi khong na yod pa'o/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro byas pas thob pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad 
[\[284b.6\]]ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan brjod pa thams cad ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bstan pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi phyogs kyi rjes su 'brang ba thams cad ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis 
[\[284b.7\]]yongs su bstan pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang lhag pa'i bsam pa'i bdag nyid che ba ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yang dag par brjod pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa chen po'i stobs ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ba'o/_/
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje chen po'i stobs ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bskyed pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams cad ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yan lag 
[\[285a.2\]]thams cad ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bskyed pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i phan pa nye bar bsgrub pa thams cad ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yang dag par zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ngan song 
[\[285a.3\]]du mi ltung ngo /_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni theg pa chen po las [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog go_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bsam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa dang 
[\[285a.4\]]'gal bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis shin tu bsrungs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dong ngo /_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bskyangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[285a.5\]]chos las nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yang dag par zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni so so'i skye bo'i sa las yongs su 'da'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bsrungs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 
[\[285a.6\]]nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par mi 'jug go_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bskyangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jig rten las mngon par 'phags pa yin no/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yang dag par bskyed pa'i byang 
[\[285a.7\]]chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jig rten gyi chos kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]gos pa yin no/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni spyod pa thams cad la mi 'khrul par spyod pa yin no/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bsgrubs 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnams ni brtsam pa thams cad las phyir mi ldog go_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni las dang nyon mongs pas thub par dka' ba yin no/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi stobs kyis 
[\[285b.2\]]brtan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdud thams cad kyis mi thub pa yin no/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rten la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad kyis rnam par 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi 
[\[285b.3\]]bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni bsgrib par 'gyur ba'i chos thams cad las rnam par sbyong ba'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni sdig to las rnam par bzlog pa'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni mi bya ba rnams khong du chud par byed pa'o/_/bag med pa'i gnas 
[\[285b.4\]]las yang dag par bzlog pa'o/_/ma rig pa'i mun pa rnam par sel ba'o/_/lta ba'i 'ching ba 'thub pa'o/_/'khor ba'i grong khyer nas 'don pa'o/_/'jig rten gyi gnas 'dor bar byed pa'o/_/bdud kyi zhags pa las thar bar byed pa'o/_/sdug 
[\[285b.5\]]bsngal gyi zug rngu 'byin pa'o/_/mi shes pa'i thibs pa las thar bar byed pa'o/_/lta ba'i mya ngan las yongs su zlo ba'o/_/srid pa'i chu bo las sgrol ba'o/_/'dod pa'i 'dam nas 'byin pa'o/_/lam mi bde ba nas rnam par zlog pa'o/_/byang 
[\[285b.6\]]chub sems dpa'i lam yang dag par ston pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i yi dam la gzhog pa'o/_/nan tan la rab tu 'god pa'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gro ba'i phyogs rab tu ston pa'o/_/shes rab kyi mig rnam par sbyong ba'o/_/byang chub kyi 
[\[285b.7\]]sems rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'o/_/snying rje chen po yang dag par skyed pa'o/_/spyod pa yongs su ston pa'o/_/pha rol tu phyin pa'i gdams ngag rab tu ston pa'o/_/sa la rab tu 'god pa'o/_/bzod pa rnam par 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]'byed pa'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su 'grub par byed pa'o/_/tshogs thams cad skyed par byed pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad stobs pa'o/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung 
[\[286a.2\]]du phyin par byed pa'o/_/yon tan thams cad yongs su ston pa'o/_/don thams cad yang dag par len du 'jug pa'o/_/nan tan la gzengs bstod pa'o/_/'byung ba'i sgo ston pa'o/_/lam gol ba las yongs su srung ba'o/_/chos snang ba'i sgo snang 
[\[286a.3\]]bar byed pa'o/_/chos kyi sgo mngon par brlan par byed pa'o/_/chos thos par bya ba'i sprin gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa'o/_/lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad las rnam par zlog pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[286a.4\]]thams cad la gnas par byed pa'o/_/'di ltar yang rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skyes pas ma lta bu'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni phan pa rgya chen por sgrub pas pha lta bu'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni sdig pa thams cad 
[\[286a.5\]]las srung bas ma ma lta bu'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa khong du chud par byed pas slob dpon lta bu'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam du 'dzud pas lam mkhan lta bu'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni 
[\[286a.6\]]nyon mongs pa'i nad las thar bar byed pas sman pa lta bu'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni ye shes kyi sman rnam par 'phel bar byed pas gangs ri lta bu'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni 'jigs pa thams cad las srung bas dpa' bo lta bu'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen 
[\[286a.7\]]ni 'khor ba'i chu bo chen po las sgrol bas mnyan pa lta bu'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rin po che'i gling du phyin par byed pas skyab 'dzin pa lta bu'o/_/rigs kyi bu de lta bas na de ltar yid la bya ba rgyun ma chad pas khyod kyis dge 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen par gyis shig_/khur thams cad bkur bas yongs su mi skyo ba'i phyir sa lta bu'i sems dang /_mi phyed pa'i phyir rdo rje lta bu'i sems dang sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi sgul ba'i phyir 'khor yug lta bu'i sems dang /_ci dga' bar bka' 
[\[286b.2\]]nyan pas bran lta bu'i sems dang /_ngag thams cad mi gcag pas slob ma lta bu'i sems dang /_las thams cad nyams su blang ba la mi smad pas 'jig rten gyi bran lta bu'i sems dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi skyo ba'i phyir ma ma lta bu'i 
[\[286b.3\]]sems dang /_bya'o cog la mthun par gzung bas g.yog lta bu'i sems dang /_nga rgyal dang mtho ba'i nga rgyal spong bas phyag dar ba lta bu'i sems dang /_dus dang dus ma yin par mthon dman du 'gyur bas zla ba nya ba lta bu'i sems dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]srun pa thams cad 
[\[286b.4\]]rnam par spong bas rta cang shes lta bu'i sems dang /_khur lci ba bkur bas theg pa lta bu'i sems dang /_dul ba dang cang shes kyi bsam pas glang po lta bu'i sems dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]sgul [{]myi [,]mi [}]bskyod pas ri lta bu'i sems dang /_mi khro bas khyi lta bu'i sems dang /_
[\[286b.5\]]nga rgyal dang dus med pas gdol ba lta bu'i sems dang /_dregs pa thams cad med pas khyu mchog rwa bcad pa lta bu'i sems dang /_rlom sems med pas mtshan bu lta bu'i sems dang /_'gro zhing 'ong bas mi skyo bas gru lta bu'i sems dang /_dge ba'i 
[\[286b.6\]]bshes gnyen gyi ngag gi mthar phyin par byed pas zam pa lta bu'i sems dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi ngor blta bas bu mdzangs pa lta bu'i sems dang /_chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' las mi 'gal bar bya bas rgyal po gzhon nu lta bu'i sems kyis dge ba'i bshes 
[\[286b.7\]]gnyen la bsnyen par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bdag la ni nad par 'du shes bskyed do/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni sman pa'i 'du shes dang /_gdams ngag la ni sman gyi 'du shes dang /_nan tan nyams su blang ba la ni nad 'tsho ba'i 'du shes 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]bskyed par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bdag la ni dron po'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni lam mtshon pa'i 'du shes dang /_gdams ngag la ni lam gyi 'du shes dang /_nan tan la ni phyogs bde bar 'gro ba'i 
[\[287a.2\]]'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bdag la ni pha rol tu 'gro ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni mnyan pa'i 'du shes dang /_rjes su bstan pa la mu stegs kyi 'du shes dang /_nan tan la ni gru'i 'du shes bskyed par 
[\[287a.3\]]bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bdag la ni zhing pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni klu'i dbang po'i 'du shes dang /_gdams ngag la ni char pa'i 'du shes dang /_nan tan la ni lo tog 'grub pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/rigs 
[\[287a.4\]]kyi bu khyod kyis bdag la ni dbul po'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni ngal bso po'i 'du shes dang /_gdams ngag la ni nor dang don gyi 'du shes dang /_nan tan la ni dbul ba sel ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[287a.5\]]khyod kyis bdag la ni slob ma'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni slob dpon gyi 'du shes dang gdams ngag la ni bzo ba'i 'du shes dang /_nan tan la ni bzo khong du chud pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bdag la ni 
[\[287a.6\]]'jigs pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni dpa' bo'i 'du shes dang /_gdams ngag la ni mtshon cha'i 'du shes dang /_nan tan la ni dgra sel ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bdag la ni tshong ba'i 'du shes 
[\[287a.7\]]bskyed par bya'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni skyab 'dzin pa'i 'du shes dang /_gdams ngag la ni rin po che'i 'du shes dang /_nan tan la ni rin po che sdud pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bdag la ni bu dam pa'i 'du shes bskyed par 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]bya'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni pha ma'i 'du shes dang /_rjes su bstan pa la ni rigs kyi bu'i tshul gyi 'du shes dang /_nan tan la ni tshul ma nyams pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bdag la ni rgyal po gzhon nu'i 'du shes bskyed 
[\[287b.2\]]par bya'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni chos kyi rgyal po dang blon po dam pa'i 'du shes dang /_gdams ngag la ni rgyal po'i khrims kyi 'du shes dang /_nan tan la ni ye shes kyi rgyal po'i cod pan dang rgyan dang /_chos kyi thabs mgo la 'ching ba dang /_chos kyi rgyal 
[\[287b.3\]]po'i grong khyer la rnam par lta ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya ste/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de lta bu'i 'du shes yid la bya ba yongs su sgom ste/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la nye bar bsnyen par gyis shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu de ltar dge ba'i 
[\[287b.4\]]bshes gnyen la lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi ngag thams cad nyams su len pa'i tshe/_gangs kyi ri la rten pa'i rtswa dang gel ba dang /_sman dang nags tshal lta bur dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 
[\[287b.5\]]kyis rnam par 'phel lo/_/rgya mtsho chen po chu'i snod du gyur pa ltar chos thams cad kyi snod du 'gyur ro/_/gang chen mtsho chen po rin po che mang po'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa ltar yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su 'gyur ro/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]drod kyis gser yongs 
[\[287b.6\]]su 'byang ba ltar byang chub kyi sems yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/rgya mtsho chen po las 'phags pa'i ri rab ltar 'jig rten las mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro/_/pad mo la chus [{]myi [,]mi [}]chags pa ltar 'jig rten gyi chos kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]gos par 'gyur 
[\[287b.7\]]ro/_/rgya mtsho chen po ro rul pa dang mi 'grogs pa ltar/_spyod pa ngan pa thams cad dang mi 'grogs so/_/yud du yar gyi zla ba ltar chos dkar pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/'dzam bu'i gling snang bar byed pa'i nyi ma ltar chos kyi dbyings su snang 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/pha ma dang 'grogs pa'i bu ltar byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi lus thams cad yang dag par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar mdor na rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la zhugs pa'i byang chub 
[\[288a.2\]]sems dpa' rnams ni yon tan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu ni rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu ni yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong 
[\[288a.3\]]phrag bcu ni rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/byin gyi rlabs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu ni rnam par spyod par 'gyur ro/_/sgrib pa'i chos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu ni rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ro/_/sgrib pa'i chos grangs med pa brgya stong phrag 
[\[288a.4\]]bcu ni yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/bdud grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu las ni yang dag par 'das par 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi sgo grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu la ni rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo grangs med pa bye ba 
[\[288a.5\]]khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu ni yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/spyod pa grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu ni kun nas dag par 'gyur ro/_/smon lam chen po grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu ni mngon par grub par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar mdor na byang chub 
[\[288a.6\]]sems dpa'i spyad pa thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa la 'jug pa thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad dang /_
[\[288a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs dang spobs pa'i snang ba thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i bsngo ba'i ye shes dang mngon par shes pa tshad med pa thams cad dang /_byang chub 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]sems dpa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu thob cing yongs su grub pa rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag las pa dag go_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rtsa bar gyur pa dag go_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ba dag 
[\[288b.2\]]go_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen skye gnas su gyur pa dag go_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen skye mched du gyur pa dag go_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen las yongs su skyes pa dag go_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su spel ba dag go_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rab tu rten pa dag go_/
[\[288b.3\]]dge ba'i bshes gnyen rgyur gyur pa'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen las rab tu skyes pa dag go_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]rnam pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi yon tan dang /_bsngags pa rjes su bstan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa tshad 
[\[288b.4\]]med pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po thos nas dga' rangs te mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/_khye'u dpal 'byung ba dang /_bu mo dpal gyi blo gros ma gnyis kyi rkang pa la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_khye'u dpal 'byung ba dang /_bu mo dpal gyi blo gros ma gnyis la 
[\[288b.5\]]lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_khye'u dpal 'byung ba dang /_bu mo dpal gyi blo gros ma'i drung nas song ngo //_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad pa/_de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gis 
[\[288b.6\]]sems mngon par brlan pa de byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rjes su bstan pa de ni rjes su rnam par sems/_sngon gyi mtha'i lus mang po yang dag par spyod pa nyams su ma blangs par chud zos pa la bsam pas ni lus kyi stobs rab tu brtan par byed/_sngon gyi mtha'i mur 
[\[288b.7\]]thug pa'i lus dang sems yongs su dag kyang don med par 'khor ba'i sems kyi rgyud du gyur pa la bsam pas ni sems dang yid la bya ba rab tu sbyong /_sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i las yang dag pa ma yin pas 'jig rten gyi don du g.yen spyo ste/_mig ces par sha thang ba 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]la bsam pas ni da ltar byung ba'i don shin tu gces pa la legs par bsgrub pa rnam par sems/_sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i yongs su rtog pa yang dag pa ma yin par rnam par brtags pa las byung ba phyin ci log gis yid la bya ba kun nas 
[\[289a.2\]]glags pa la bsam pas ni/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yang dag pa'i rtog pas mngon par 'du bya ba'i stobs yang dag par bskyed/_'das pa'i lus kyis bdag gi don gyi sbyor ba la rtsom rtsom pa'i yul la yongs su bsam pas ni/_sems can 
[\[289a.3\]]thams cad kyi sbyor ba las khyad par du 'phags par lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs rab tu brtan par byed/_sngon 'dod pa yongs su tshol tshol ba'i spyod pa ro [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la yongs su bsam pas ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'thob pa'i sbyor bas dbugs phyin 
[\[289a.4\]]pa chen po 'thob pa'i dbang po'i shugs drag po rnam par 'phel bar byed/_'das pa'i dus kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa phyin ci log dang ldan pa'i sbyor ba la yongs su bsam pas ni/_da ltar byung ba'i dus su phyin ci log med pa dang ldan pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /_byang chub 
[\[289a.5\]]sems dpa'i smon lam la yi dam bca' bas sems kyi rgyud yongs su rgyas par byed/_sngon gyi mtha'i brtson 'grus brtsams pa mi cha la don ma yin pa dang /_yongs su ma grub pa'i brtson 'grus nyams su blangs pa la yongs su bsam pas ni/_da ltar byung ba'i 
[\[289a.6\]]dus su sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsdu ba la sta gon du gnas pa'i brtson 'grus chen po rtsom pa'i rnam par gnon pas lus dang sems kyi gzengs mtho ba yang dag par bskyed/_sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i 'gro ba lnga'i rgyud kyi ngan song du bdag dang gzhan bor ba la 
[\[289a.7\]]brtag pas lus 'tsho ba med pa yongs su gzung ba la yang dag par bsam pas ni/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad bsnyen bkur bar nus pa'i lus 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]yongs su bzung bas dga' ba dang mos pa'i shugs drag po rgya chen po rnam par 'phel bar byed/_da ltar byung ba'i tsher mngon par grub kyang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang mya ngan gyi 'byung gnas su gyur te 'du ba dang 'bral ba'i/_gter du gyur pa'i lus kyang phyi ma'i 
[\[289b.2\]]mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa la brtson pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsdu ba la brtson pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal lta zhing zhing thams cad du rgyu ba dang /_chos 
[\[289b.3\]]smra ba thams cad la rim gror bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa yongs su bzung ba la brtson pa dang /_chos thams cad yongs su btsal ba'i grogs su gyur pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad mthong bar bya ba dang /_sangs 
[\[289b.4\]]rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsdu ba la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang /_ye shes kyi lus kyi rgyu dang rkyen du gyur ba la bltas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dbang po dang /_shugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par 'phel bar byed cing de lta 
[\[289b.5\]]bu'i sems dang /_de lta bu'i yid la bya ba dang /_tshul bzhin de lta bu la rab tu brtson pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mos pas yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i dad pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su bsgrubs pa'i 
[\[289b.6\]]nye bar sems pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lhag pa'i bsam pas sgro btags pa'i rim gro dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang po dang bar sgro btags pa'i phu dud dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ston pa la 
[\[289b.7\]]mos pas yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i dbang po dang ba'i shugs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rim gros byung ba'i sems kyi mos pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dad pa las yongs su byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs dang /_
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad las yongs su grub pa'i mchod pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mnyam pa'i lus kyi thal mo sbyar ba dang /_'gro ba'i lus thams cad du yongs su byung ba'i 
[\[290a.2\]]mig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis blta ba dang /_'gro bar ming btags pa thams cad du sgro btags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyis sprul pa las byung bar sgro btags pa'i lus kyis 
[\[290a.3\]]btud cing phyag bya ba tshad med pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa las byung ba'i legs par brjod pa'i rgyan mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' dang da ltar byung ba'i dus su byung ba'i sems can gyi gnas thams cad yongs 
[\[290a.4\]]su rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang mngon du byas pa'i 'du shes kyi rnam pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul bas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba thams cad du khyab pa dang /_skra'i rtse mo gcig las kyang lhag pa 
[\[290a.5\]]med par byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs ba'i rjes su song ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mig gi lam rnam par dag par sgro btags pa'i mngon par shes pa snang bas rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_phyogs kyi dra ba tha dad 
[\[290a.6\]]pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i yid kyi skye mched dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi tha dad pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs dang /_chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i sgo nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas te/_mthas gtugs pa thams cad du 
[\[290a.7\]]khyab la/_dus gsum du tha mi dad cing rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /_dad pa dang mos pa la 'jug pa'i stobs dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag snang ba'i phyogs la zhugs pas yul rgya mtsho'i 'gram gang na ba der phyin te/_de ltar tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rim 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]gro dang /_phu dud dang /_mchod pa dang /_bstod pa dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_blta ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_smon lam dang /_'du shes kyi rjes su song ba de lta bu'i yid dang ldan pa dang /_ye shes kyi spyod yul tshad med pa'i sa de lta bu la zhugs pa'i ye shes kyi mig gis khang pa 
[\[290b.2\]]brtsegs pa chen po rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i snying po'i sgo nas lus thams cad kyis phab ste/_phyag byas so/_/des rnam pa de lta bu'i mngon par bsgrub pa'i tshul yud tsam tu rnam par dpyad de mos pa dang dad pa las byung ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_smon lam gyis 
[\[290b.3\]]mngon par bsgrubs pa'i mthus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du bdag nyid rgyun mi 'chad par byin gyis brlabs so/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mngon sum du gnas pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gnas thams cad dang /_de bzhin 
[\[290b.4\]]gshegs pa'i mchod rten thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i pho brang thams cad dang /_chos rin po che'i gnas thams cad dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas dang /_
[\[290b.5\]]mchod rten thams cad dang /_mngon sum du gnas pa nas/_'phags pa'i tshogs dang sbyin pa'i gnas dang /_bla ma dang pha ma thams cad kyi bar gyi 'gro ba'i tshogs thams cad dang /_mngon sum du gnas pa rgyun mi 'chad par ye shes kyi lus tha mi dad pa'i tshul la 
[\[290b.6\]]'jug pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang /_'du shes kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_ye shes yid la bya bas byin gyis brlabs so/_/khang pa brtsegs pa chen po rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i snying po'i sgo nas ji lta ba de bzhin du gong du brjod pa'i dmigs pa 
[\[290b.7\]]thams cad la yang /_chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i 'dud cing phyag bya bar byin gyis brlabs so/_/de bzhin du phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par rgyun 'chad pa med par byin gyis brlabs te/_nam mkha'i dbyings tshad med pa dang mnyam pa nyid dang /_
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]chos kyi dbyings sgrib pa med pa dang mnyam pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang /_mnyam pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid rnam par mi rtog pa dang mnyam pa nyid dang /_grib ma lta bu'i ye shes dang /_'du shes kyis 
[\[291a.2\]]rgyas par dgang ba mnyam pa nyid dang /_rmi lam lta bu'i rnam par dpyod pa dang mnyam pa nyid dang /_gzugs brnyan lta bu'i 'jig rten dang /_'gro ba thams cad rnam par dmigs pa'i mnyam pa nyid dang /_rgyu dang rkyen las byung bas sgra brnyan lta bu'i mnyam pa nyid dang /_'byung 
[\[291a.3\]]ba dang 'jig pa mi skye ba dang /_mnyam pa'i mnyam pa nyid dang /_rkyen dang rten pa'i rgyud dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin dang mnyam pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis las ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su byung ba'i rnam par smin pa la ni mos par byed/_rgyu ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su byung ba'i 
[\[291a.4\]]'bras bu la ni mos par byed/_bstsags pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su byung ba'i bya ba thams cad la ni mos par byed/_dang ba las yongs su byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba thams cad la ni mos par byed/_mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su byung ba'i sangs rgyas 
[\[291a.5\]]mchod pa'i sprul pa thams cad la ni mos par byed/_rim gro las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa thams cad la ni mos par byed/_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs las yongs su byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos nyid la ni mos par byed/_shes rab dang 
[\[291a.6\]]thabs las yongs su byung ba'i rgyan yid kyi rang bzhin tu bsgrubs pa thams cad la ni mos par byed/_smon lam las yongs su byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la ni mos par byed/_bsngo ba las yongs su byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad dang /_
[\[291a.7\]]chos kyi dbyings thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul du gyur pa rnam par bsgrub pas rgyas par dgang ba'i rgyan la ni mos par byed cing yongs su bsngo ba'i ye shes chad pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba dang /_skye ba med pa'i ye shes rtog pa'i 'du shes med pa dang /_yang dag 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]pa'i spyod pa la 'jug cing rgyu nye bar [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa'i ye shes rgyu dang bya ba'i lta ba med pa dang /_phyin ci log med pa'i ye shes phyin ci log gi lta ba dang bral ba dang /_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i ye shes dbang phyug tu lta ba med pa dang /_rten pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes bdag dang 
[\[291b.2\]]pha rol gyi 'du shes kyi lta ba dang /_bral ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes mthar 'dzin pa'i lta ba dang bral ba dang /_gzugs brnyan lta bur mngon par grub pa'i ye shes 'pho ba'i lta ba med pa dang /_mi skye mi 'gag pa'i ye shes 
[\[291b.3\]]skye ba dang /_'jig pa'i lta ba dang bral ba dang /_stong pa nyid kyis mi skye ba'i ye shes lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang bral ba dang /_smon lam mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dbang phyug med pa'i chos nyid rab tu rtogs pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i mtha'i sgo dang ldan pa'i ye shes 
[\[291b.4\]]mtshan ma thams cad dang bral bas sa bon las myu gu chud mi za ba'i chos nyid dang /_rgya las rgya'i gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i chos nyid dang /_gzugs las gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i chos nyid dang /_sgra brnyan dang sgrar mnyam pa rnam par dmigs pa'i chos nyid 
[\[291b.5\]]dang rnam par dpyod pa dang /_rmi lam du mnyam par rnam par dmigs pa'i chos nyid dang /_sgyu ma'i rnam pa ltar las las yongs su byung ba'i chos nyid dang /_sems gzugs med pas 'jig rten yongs su bskyed pa'i chos nyid dang /_rkyen dang rgyu 
[\[291b.6\]]ji ltar bstsags pa bzhin du/_'bras bu 'byung ba'i chos nyid dang las ji ltar bstsags pa dang /_mnyam par rnam par smin pa 'byung ba'i chos nyid dang /_thabs mkhas pas rnam par bsgrubs pa'i chos nyid dang /_chos dang chos ma yin pa mnyam pa nyid kyi mngon par 
[\[291b.7\]]brlan pa'i chos nyid dang /_ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa de lta bus mngon par bsgrubs pa'i 'du shes dang /_yid la bya bas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i snying po'i sgo nas rnam pa de lta bur btud 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]de/_phyag 'tshal nas yun ring mo zhig lon pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs bsam gyis mi khyab pas mngon par brlan pa'i sems dang ldan pa lus dang sems shin tu sim par gyur pa de/_khang pa brtsegs pa'i sgo'i gnas nas langs te/_
[\[292a.2\]]yud tsam zhig tu khang pa brtsegs pa chen po rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i snying po de la mig mi 'gebs pas bltas nas/_thal mo sbyar te lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_de lta bu'i 'du shes dang /_yid la bya bas bskul ba'i sems dang 
[\[292a.3\]]ldan pas/_tshig tu brjod pa 'di ni stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa rnams kyi gnas so/_/'di ni chos thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa rnams kyi gnas so/_/chos kyi dbyings tha mi dad pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa sems can gyi 
[\[292a.4\]]khams mi dmigs pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/_chos thams cad mi skye ba'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/_'jig rten thams cad gnas med pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/_'gro ba thams cad kyi gnas gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/_gnas 
[\[292a.5\]]thams cad rnam par bsgoms pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/_brten pa thams cad la mi rten pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/_lus thams cad la mi rten pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/_'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad bstsal ba'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa 
[\[292a.6\]]rnams kyi gnas so/_/'di ni chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa rnams kyi gnas so/_/rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang /_yongs su rtog pa thams cad du/_rnam par mi rtog pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/_'du shes dang sems dang 
[\[292a.7\]]yid thams cad kyis rnam par dben pa'i gnas la spyod pa/_lam thams cad blang ba med pa dang /_dor ba med pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la 'jug pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/_sgo kun nas chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]'gengs pa thabs kyi gnas la rnam par spyod pa/_nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi zhing nye bar zhi ba'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/_lta ba dang srid pa dang /_nga rgyal thams cad spongs pa'i shes rab shas che ba'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar 
[\[292b.2\]]ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_rig pa bskyed pa thams cad la rnam par rol ba'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul bsgoms pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa 
[\[292b.3\]]rnams kyi gnas so/_/'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na nye bar gnas pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa rnams kyi gnas so/_/'di ni gang de dag bskal pa gcig la bskal pa thams cad dang /_bskal pa thams cad la bskal ba gcig tu 'jug 
[\[292b.4\]]pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/_gang de dag zhing gcig dang zhing thams cad dang /_zhing thams cad dang zhing gcig tu tha mi dad pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/_gang de dag chos gcig dang chos thams cad du/_chos thams cad dang chos gcig tu [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal 
[\[292b.5\]]ba'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/_gang de dag sems can gcig dang /_sems can thams cad dang /_sems can gcig tu tha mi dad pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/_gang de dag sangs rgyas gcig dang /_sangs rgyas thams 
[\[292b.6\]]cad du sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas gcig tu [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/_gang de dag dus thams cad la skad cig gcig gis 'jug pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/_gang de dag sems bskyed pa gcig gis zhing thams cad du 
[\[292b.7\]]'gro ba'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/_gang de dag sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gzugs brnyan snang ba'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/_gang de dag 'jig rten thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i sems kyi gnas la rnam par spyod pa/_gang de dag thob par bya ba thams cad 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]rang la rag las pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa de dag gi gnas so/_/'di ni gang de dag 'jig rten gyi gnas thams cad las gyen du 'phags kyang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad kyi gnas na snang 
[\[293a.2\]]ba dang /_gang de dag zhing thams cad la mi gnas kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir zhing thams cad du rjes su spyod pa dang /_gang de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rgyan yongs su gzung ba'i phyir zhing thams cad du rjes 
[\[293a.3\]]su spyod kyang gnas nas g.yo ba med pa dang /_gang de dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes su mngon par zhen pa dang bral ba dang /_gang de dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad la rten pa'i gnas la rnam 
[\[293a.4\]]par spyod kyang 'gro ba thams cad na de'i ye shes la mnyam zhing 'dra ba med pa dang /_gang de dag bdud kyi gnas thams cad na spyod kyang 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi dga' ba dang bral ba dang /_gang de dag 'du shes kyi rnam pa'i gnas thams cad la rnam par spyod kyang 'du shes 
[\[293a.5\]]kyi rnam pa thams cad rnam par bstsal ba'i yid dang ldan pa dang /_gang de dag 'gro ba thams cad du khyab pa'i lus dang ldan yang bdag dang sems can du gnyis su bya bar mi spyod pa dang /_gang de dag 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi khongs su chud pa'i lus dang ldan 
[\[293a.6\]]yang /_chos kyi dbyings tha dad du bya ba'i gnas la rnam par mi spyod pa dang /_gang de dag ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa thams cad du gnas par bya ba'i smon lam dang ldan yang /_bskal pa ring ba dang /_thung ba'i 'du shes kyi rnam pas rnam par mi spyod pa dang /_gang de dag skra'i rtse mo 
[\[293a.7\]]gcig nas mi g.yo yang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang ba de lta bu bsgrub dka' ba'i chos kyi phyogs la 'jug pa rnam par spyod pa de dag gis gnas so/_/'di ni zab mo'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa mi gnyis pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/_mtshan 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]nyid med pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/_gnyen po med pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/_mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/_spros pa med pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/_nyan thos dang /_
[\[293b.2\]]rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis chud par dka' ba'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/_bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/_'jig rten gyi yul thams cad kyis ma gos pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[293b.3\]]thams cad kyi gnas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas dang mthun pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod pa rnams kyi gnas so/_/gang de dag mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba'i gnas la rnam par spyod kyang nyan thos kyi skyon med 
[\[293b.4\]]par mi 'jug pa dang /_gang de dag chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod kyang mi skye ba'i chos nyid du mi ltung ba dang /_gang de dag mi sdug pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid mngon du mi byed de 'dod chags kyi chos 
[\[293b.5\]]dang yang lhan cig mi gnas pa dang /_gang de dag byams pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod kyang zhe sdang gi dri ma'i rjes su song ba'i sems med pa dang /_gang de dag rten cing 'brel ba'i gnas la rnam par spyod kyang chos thams cad la shin tu rmongs pa med pa dang /_
[\[293b.6\]]gang de dag bsam gtan bzhi'i gnas la rnam par spyod kyang bsam gtan gyi dbang gis mi skye ba dang /_gang de dag tshad med pa bzhi'i gnas la rnam par spyod kyang sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba'i don du gzugs kyi khams kyi lam gyi rgyud du mi 'dong ba 
[\[293b.7\]]dang /_gang de dag gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i gnas la rnam par spyod kyang snying rje chen pos yongs su zin pas gzugs med pa'i khams kyi lam gyi rgyud du mi 'dong ba dang /_gang de dag zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi gnas la rnam par spyod 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]kyang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_bdag gis rig pa'i rnam par grol ba mngon tu mi byed pa dang /_gang de dag btang snyoms chen po'i gnas la rnam par spyod kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su mi gtong ba dang /_gang de dag stong pa nyid 
[\[294a.2\]]kyi gnas la rnam par spyod kyang lta ba'i rnam pa la mi gnas pa dang /_gang de dag mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul dang ldan yang mtshan ma la spyod pa'i sems can rnam par gdul ba la brtson pa dang /_gang de dag smon lam thams cad dang bral ba yin yang byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[294a.3\]]spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /_gang de dag las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad la dbang bsgyur yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du las dang nyon mongs pa'i rjes su 'brang bar snang ba dang /_gang de dag shi 'pho dang skye ba yongs su shes kyang tshe'i shi 'pho dang skye ba 
[\[294a.4\]]yongs su ston pa dang /_gang de dag 'gro ba thams cad las rnam par log kyang sems can gdul ba'i dbang gis 'gro ba thams cad du 'dong ba dang /_gang de dag byams pa la rnam par spyod kyang gang la yang chags par rnam par spyod pa med pa dang /_gang de dag snying rje la rnam 
[\[294a.5\]]par spyod kyang gang la yang chags par lta bas rnam par spyod pa ma yin pa dang /_gang de dag dga' ba la rnam par spyod kyang sems can sdug bsngal ba la rnam par blta bas rtag tu mi dga' ba dang /_gang de dag btang snyoms la rnam par spyod kyang gzhan gyi don la 
[\[294a.6\]]rtag tu 'bad pa dang /_gang de dag mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la rnam par spyod kyang 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba la mi smod pa dang /_gang de dag skye ba thams cad la mi gnas par rnam par spyod kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du bya ba la rnam par mi 
[\[294a.7\]]spyod pa dang /_gang de dag rnam par thar pa gsum la rnam par spyod kyang nyan thos kyi rnam par thar pa thob par bya ba la rnam par mi spyod pa dang /_gang de dag 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnam par lta ba la rnam par spyod kyang 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i phyir rnam par mi spyod pa dang gang de 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo brtags pa la rnam par spyod kyang shin tu 'gog par ltung bar rnam par mi spyod pa dang /_gang de dag 'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad bsgom pa la rnam par spyod kyang shin tu 'byung ba la rnam par mi spyod pa dang /_gang de dag so so'i skye 
[\[294b.2\]]bo'i sa las shin tu 'das par rnam par spyod kyang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba la rnam par mi spyod pa dang /_gang de dag nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga yongs su shes pa la rnam par spyod kyang phung po shin tu 'gog par ltung ba la rnam par mi spyod pa dang /_gang 
[\[294b.3\]]de dag bdud kyi las bzhi las shin tu 'das par rnam par spyod kyang bdud du rtog pa la rnam par mi spyod pa dang /_gang de dag skye mched drug las shin tu 'das par rnam par spyod kyang shin tu mngon par 'grub pa la rnam par mi spyod pa dang /_gang de dag de bzhin nyid la rnam 
[\[294b.4\]]par spyod kyang yang dag pa'i mthar ltung ba la rnam par mi spyod pa dang /_gang de dag theg pa thams cad kyis 'byung ba yongs su ston pa la rnam par spyod kyang theg pa chen po las nyams pa la rnam par mi spyod pa de dag de lta bur yon tan gyi gnas thams cad la rnam par spyod 
[\[294b.5\]]pa rnams kyi gnas so/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/'di la thugs rje chen po brnyes pas rnam dag pa/_/byams pa bshes gnyen dpal chen 'jig rten phan brtson pa/_/dbang bskur sa gnas 
[\[294b.6\]]rgyal ba'i sras kyi thu bo ste/_/sangs rgyas yul la rjes su dgongs shing rnam par spyod/_/rgyal ba'i sras po grags pa chen po mnga' ba rnams/_/ye shes chen po'i spyod yul rnam thar bzhugs pa dag_/gang rnams chos dbyings kun tu thogs med rnam 
[\[294b.7\]]rgyu ba/_/dpe zla med pa de dag gnas ni 'di 'dra yin/_/dus sbyin tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus stobs kyis 'phags/_/bsam gtan mngon shes stobs kyi mthar phyin shes rtogs pas/_/shes rab thabs dang smon lam stobs la gnas pa rnams/_/
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]theg chen pha rol phyin pa rnams kyi gnas 'di yin/_/'di ni chags med blo gros bsam pa rgya chen te/_/nam mkha'i spyod yul ldan pa mi gnas mi rten pa/_/dus gsum thams cad rgyas 'gengs bsgribs pa med pa'i rnams/_/srid kun dngos po 
[\[295a.2\]]rnam par bsgoms pa rnams kyi gnas/_/gang rnams chos kun mi skye'i tshul la zhugs pa rnams/_/chos kyi rang bzhin nam mkha'i dngos nyid rtogs mdzad la/_/ci la'ang gnas pa mi mdzad nam mkha'i bya bzhin te/_/mkhyen pas bsnyengs pa mi mnga' de dag gnas 
[\[295a.3\]]'di yin/_/gang rnams 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rang bzhin dngos/_/rtog pa'i rgyus bskyed phyin ci log las byung mkhyen nas/_/'dod chags bral ba'ang rnam par rtog pa mi mdzad pa/_/zhi dang nye bar zhi ldan de dag gnas 'di yin/_/gang rnams rnam par 
[\[295a.4\]]thar dang bden tshul 'phags lam dang /_/phung po de bzhin khams dang skye mched rten pa'i dngos/_/yongs su rtogs mdzad mkhas pa zhi bar mi ltung ba/_/shes rab thabs la mkhas pa de dag gnas 'di yin/_gang rnams sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes phyogs 
[\[295a.5\]]zhugs shing /_/rgyal ba'i zhing la yongs rtog rnam rtog kun zhi la/_/chos rnams dngos po'i rang bzhin med par rtogs mdzad pa/_/zhi bar gzhol ba de dag gnas ni 'di 'dra'o/_/gang rnams chags med spyod pas chos dbyings 'di dag tu/_/dngos dang bral bar 
[\[295a.6\]]rnam spyod mkha' yi rlung 'dra ba/_/dngos po kun dang bral zhing dngos med rnam spyod pa/_/mi gnas blo mnga' de dag gnas ni 'di yang 'dra/_/gang rnams ngan song rgyud du 'gro ba song gyur te/_/sdug bsngal nad pa mi bde nyams su myong gzigs shing /_/byams 
[\[295a.7\]]pa'i 'od kyis ngan song thams cad zhi mdzad pa/_/byams dang thugs rje'i thugs mnga' de dag gnas 'di yin/_/nyam nga'i 'khor na gnas shing 'phags lam gol gyur te/_/'dron pa dmus long [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]dang bral bar 'gyur 'dra ba'i/_/'jig rten 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]gzigs shing thar lam rab la 'god mdzad pa/_/'dron po'i bsel rab 'dra ba de dag gnas 'di yin/_/gang rnams skye dang mya ngan rga shi dbang gyur pa'i/_/'gro ba bdud kyi zhags pas yongs su bcings gzigs shing /_/rnam par bkrol nas mi 'jigs phyogs 
[\[295b.2\]]bder 'don mdzad pa/_/dpa' bo de dag thub par dka' ba'i gnas 'di yin/_/nyon mongs nad pa'i 'gro mang gang gis gzigs gyur cing /_/ye shes bdud rtsi sman chen yongs su bsdu mdzad nas/_/thugs rje chen po bskyed cing yongs su 'grel mdzad pa/_/sman 
[\[295b.3\]]pa'i rgyal po chen po 'dra ba'i gnas 'di yin/_/gang gis 'gro mang sdug bsngal mgon med gyur pa rnams/_/nyon mongs gtos su lhung ste tsham gyi mtshor lhung ba/_/gzigs shing dge ba'i chos kyi gru chen yongs sbyar ste/_/sgrol mdzad mnyan pa'i bu 'dra 
[\[295b.4\]]de dag gnas 'di yin/_/gang gis nyon mongs rgya mtsho spyod pa'i 'gro gzigs shing /_/thams cad mkhyen thugs rin chen dgongs dag sems can mchog_/srid pa'i rgya mtshor gshegs shing mngon par 'dren mdzad pa/_/mnyan pa'i bu ltar spyod pa de dag 
[\[295b.5\]]gnas 'di yin/_/smon lam gnas na bzhugs shing thugs rje byams spyan gyis/_/gang rnams sems can gnas su rnam par gzigs mdzad cing /_/srid pa'i rgya mtsho gnas pa'i 'gro mang mngon 'don pa/_/mkha' lding gzhon 'dra de dag gnas ni 
[\[295b.6\]]'di 'dra'o/_/gang rnams chos dbyings mkha' la nyi zla 'dra tshul du/_/sems can gnas su 'od kyis khyab par rnam spyod pa/_/smon lam dkyil 'khor ye shes dri med bzang po'i 'od/_/'jig rten snang bar mdzad pa de dag gnas 'di yin/_/gang 
[\[295b.7\]]rnams sems can gcig ni yongs su smin bya'i phyir/_/phyi mtha'i bskal pa bye ba zad du brtan gnas la/_/sems can gcig la ji bzhin de bzhin 'gro ba kun/_/'jig rten mgon du gyur pa de dag gnas 'di yin/_/gang rnams 'byam klas zhing gcig phyi mtha'i 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]bskal bar yang /_/'gro don brtson 'grus skyo med spyod pa rnam spyod pa/_/zhing gcig ji bzhin de bzhin phyogs rnams kun tu ste/_/bsam pa rdo rje bzhin brtan de dag gnas 'di yin/_/gang rnams phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs rnams kyi 
[\[296a.2\]]chos sprin la/_/stan gcig gnas bzhin rmongs pa med par 'thung byed kyang /_/phyi mtha'i bskal pa khrag khrig 'grangs par mi ngoms sems/_/blo chen rgya mtsho lta bu'i gnas ni 'di 'dra'o/_/gang rnams zhing mang rgya mtsho brjod du med 'dong zhing /_/
[\[296a.3\]]mgon po'i 'khor rnams rgya mtshor yongs su 'jug byed la/_/rgyal ba'i mchod pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho rab byed pa/_/chags med spyod yul mnga' ba de dag gnas 'di yin/_/brtan pa grangs rnams smon lam rgya mtshor 'jug byed cing /_/spyod pa rgya mtshor 
[\[296a.4\]]mtha' dang dbus med zhugs gyur te/_/'gro la phan phyir bskal pa rgya mtsho mang spyod pa/_/yon tan 'byung gnas de dag gnas ni 'di 'dra 'o/_/gang rnams skra rtse gcig tu zhing rnams thams cad dang /_/sangs rgyas thams cad bskal pa mtha' dang dbus 
[\[296a.5\]]med pa/_/'dzud cing de yi tshul la 'jug kyang rmongs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_/chags pa med pa'i mig can rnams kyi gnas 'di yin/_/gang rnams sems kyi skad cig gcig la rgya mtsho yi/_/bskal ba 'dzud byed zhing dang sangs rgyas 'gro ba rnams/_/de bzhin 
[\[296a.6\]]'dzud byed bsgribs med ye shes dran gnas pa/_/yon tan mthar phyin de dag gnas ni 'di 'dra'o/_/gang rnams zhing mang thams cad rdul du bgrang byas shing /_/chu bo ma lus thams cad thigs pas tshad bzung ste/_/de snyed grangs su smon lam mngon 
[\[296a.7\]]par sgrub byed pa/_/chags med bgrang ba de dag gnas ni 'di 'dra'o/_/smon lam gzungs dang ting 'dzin sgo la 'jug bya ba/_/bsam gtan rnam thar smon lam sgo rnams de bzhin te/_/bskal pa mtha' yas mngon par sgrub cing rnam 
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]spyod pa/_/bde gshegs sras po dgongs ldan de dag 'dir 'dong ngo /_/'di na gnas pa rgyal sras rnam pa sna tshogs te/_/tshig dang don ldan gtsug lag mang po mngon par sgrub/_/'gro la bder 'gyur bzo yi gnas su bya ba dag_/rjes su sems shing dam 
[\[296b.2\]]pa'i gnas na rnam par spyod/_/'di na gnas pa mngon shes thabs dang ye shes kyis/_/phyogs bcu'i sems can 'gro rgyud sna tshogs ji snyed pa/_/kun tu skye zhing 'chi ba'i khyad par rnam par ston/_/rnam thar sgyu ma'i tshul gnas chags med spyod dang ldan/_/
[\[296b.3\]]'di na gnas pa thog mar sems bskyed nyer bzung zhing /_/chos bzang mthar thug chos kyi spyod pa yongs su ston/_/sprul pa'i sprin gyis chos dbyings yongs su rgyas bkang zhing /_/de bzhin rnam 'phrul brgya mang kun kyang nye bar ston/_/gang rnams 
[\[296b.4\]]sems kyi cha gcig byang chub rnam sangs rgyas/_/ye shes blo gros mtha' dang dbus med las 'jug pa/_/thos te rnam par bsams na 'jig rten rmongs su rung /_/thub par dka' ba de dag gnas ni 'di 'dra'o/_/'di ni chags med blo gros rnams/_/chos 
[\[296b.5\]]dbyings bsgribs pa med pa'i rnam par spyod byed pa/_/[{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa med pa'i spyod yul can/_/dri med bsam pa'i blo gros gnas yin no/_gang rnams chags pa med spyod cing /_/zhing rnams kun tu gnas pa med par rnam spyod pa/_/mi gnyis shes la spyod pa 
[\[296b.6\]]yi/_/mnyam pa med pa de dag gnas 'di yin/_/gang rnams nam mkha'i rang bzhin dang /_/mnyam pa'i chos rnams gnas med zhi ba rtogs gyur te/_/gang rnams mkha' yul rnam spyod pa/_/rdul dang bral ba de dag gnas 'di yin/_/'di na snying rje'i 
[\[296b.7\]]sems ldan pa/_/gnas shing 'gro ba sdug bsngal gzir ba mthong gyur nas/_/'jig rten phan par bsam brtson te/_/snying rje chen po brnyes pa rnam par spyod/_/'di nas mi snang med gsal bar/_/sems can kun gyi gnas su thogs pa med par snang /_/nyi ma zla ba'i dkyil 
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]'khor bzhin/_/'khor ba'i zhags pa kun las rnam par grol/_/rgyal sras de dag 'di na gnas/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi zhabs drung thams cad kun na yang /_/zhing rnams kun tu rab tu 
[\[297a.2\]]snang /_/mtha' yas bskal pa rnams kyang zad par mdzad/_/'di nas 'gro ba'i lus mnyam dang /_/rgyal sras kun gyi lus dang grangs mang mnyam pa yi/_/sprul pa'i sprin gyis phyogs kyi rnams/_/ma lus thams 
[\[297a.3\]]cad rgyas par 'gengs pa mdzad/_/'di na bzhugs pa'i dpa' bo rnams/_/rgyal ba'i spyod yul thams cad yongs su 'jal byed cing /_/bskal pa bye bar rnam spyod kyang /_/yongs su ngoms par 'gyur ba'i dus 
[\[297a.4\]]med do/_/'dir ni ting 'dzin bye ba rnams/_/brjod du med pa skad cig re re rtogs byas shing /_/ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul bzhin du/_/sangs rgyas yul rnams rnam par ston pa mdzad/_/'dir ni skad cig brjod med pa'i/_/
[\[297a.5\]]bskal ba zhing rnams sangs rgyas mtshan la rab bzhugs te/_/shin tu yangs pa'i blo ldan pa/_/bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i mthar yang 'byin/_/'di na gnas shing tshad med pa'i/_/bskal par sems rgyud gcig gis rab tu 'jug 
[\[297a.6\]]pa byed/_/yongs rtog 'du shes med bral yang /_/'gro ba'i 'du shes dbang du ston pa byed/_/de dag ting 'dzin 'di gnas su/_/zhugs kyang dus gsum thams cad gsal bar mngon du mthong /_/skad cig yud la gnas 
[\[297a.7\]]brten cing /_/rnam thar gnas la rnam par spyod pa mdzad/_/de dag rnam spyod gnas 'di na/_/ma g.yos lus kyis skyil mo krung du 'khod bzhin du/_/zhing rnams thams cad kun tu yang /_/thams cad khyab par cig car yongs su snang /_/khyu mchog 
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]de dag 'di na gnas/_/bde gshegs rnams las chos kyi rgya mtsho yang dag 'thung /_/ye shes rgya mtshor rab tu zhugs/_/mi zad yon tan rnams kyi pha rol phyin/_/'di na zhing rnams kun grangs dang /_/bskal pa'i grangs dang de bzhin chos kyi grangs rnams dang /_/rgyal 
[\[297b.2\]]ba kun gyi mtshan gyi grangs/_/sgrib med sems dpa' rnam par dgongs pa mdzad/_/rgyal sras de dag 'di na gnas/_/dus gsum zhing mang 'grangs pa thams cad ma lus par/_/de dag skad cig gcig gis kyang /_/yongs su 'byung dang 'jig pa rnam par 'byed/_/
[\[297b.3\]]rgyal sras de dag 'di na gnas/_/rgyal ba'i spyod pa smon lam 'gro ba'i dbang po rnams/_/gnas na rnam par spyod byed kyang /_/rgyal sras blo la thogs pa med pas mthong /_/rdul phran gcig la gang yod pa'i/_/'khor rnams rgya mtsho zhing mang sems can de 
[\[297b.4\]]bzhin du/_/bskal pa rdul phran kun mnyam pa/_/sgrib pa med par mthong ba rnams kyis mthong /_/rdul phran kun rtser de bzhin du/_/'khor dang zhing dang bskal pa thams cad ma lus par/_/kun kyang gzugs brnyan thabs tshul du/_/shin tu rnam phye 
[\[297b.5\]]yongs su mthong ba yin/_/'di nas de dag chos rnams kyi/_/rang bzhin zhing rnams kun dang dus dang bskal pa dang /_/yang dag sangs rgyas de bzhin te/_/rang bzhin dngos bral 'byung ba'i tshul gyis mkhyen/_/'di gnas sems can mnyam nyid dang /_/chos 
[\[297b.6\]]rnams mnyam pa nyid dang sangs rgyas mnyam nyid dang /_/zhing dang smon lam mnyam pa nyid/_/dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la'ang de bzhin 'jug_/sems can khrag khrig rnam par 'dul/_/sangs rgyas khrag khrig rnams kyang de bzhin gzhan mchod byed/_/
[\[297b.7\]]gzhan rnams chos la rnam par rtog_/'on kyang brtan pa gnas mchog 'di na 'khod/_/bskal pa khrag khrig mang pos kyang /_/de dag smon lam ye shes yul blo'i rnam pa dag_/bdag gis brjod par mi nus te/_/mtha' yas blo mnga' rnams kyi shin tu 
[\[298a\]]
