[\[298a.1\]]yangs/_/de dag smad pa mi mnga' ba/_/bsgribs med spyod yul rab la shin tu dgyes pa yi/_/pho brang 'di la thal sbyar te/_/bdag kyang lus btud gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyal ba'i sras kyi thu bo ste/_/bsgribs med spyod pa mnga' ba 'phags 
[\[298a.2\]]pa byams pa de/_/rnam dag blo mnga' dpe med la/_/de yi rjes su bsams te phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]khang pa brtsegs pa chen po rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan kyis brgyan pa'i snying po na 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[298a.3\]]la/_de dag dang byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa gzhan tshad med pa dag gis kyang /_mngon par bstod de shin tu btud nas phyag 'tshal te/_rab tu gus par bltas nas rim gror byas te/_mngon du byas nas mchod de khang pa brtsegs pa chen po rnam par 
[\[298a.4\]]snang mdzad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i snying po'i sgo na/_byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po byams pa la blta bar ni mos/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang phrad par ni dga' zhing sdod sdod pa las des byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[298a.5\]]byams pa khang pa brtsegs pa/_de'i phyi rol gyi phyogs gzhan zhig nas srog chags brgya stong du ma'i 'khor dang /_lha dang klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po du mas 
[\[298a.6\]]mdun du byas te/_g.yas g.yon nas brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten gyi mgon po rnams kyis phyag bya zhing yul de na gnas pa gnyen bshes su 'ong ba'i bram ze brgya stong mang pos bskor cing mdun du byas te/_khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par snang 
[\[298a.7\]]mdzad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i snying po logs su 'ong ba mthong nas dga' rangs te/_mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa gang na ba der logs su mngon du bltas te/_thag ring po nas byang chub sems 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]dpa' byams pa la lus thams cad kyis phab ste phyag byas so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la bltas te/_'khor kun la lag pa g.yas pas bstan nas yang dag pa'i yon tan gyis bsngags te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag 
[\[298b.2\]]smras so/_/ltos shig bsam pa yongs su dag pa 'di/_/nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]nor rnams rab tu brtan pa'i bu/_/byang chub spyod pa dam pa yongs tshol zhing /_/mkhas pa nga'i drung du nye bar 'ongs/_/legs par 'ongs sam snying rje byams byung khyod/_/byams pa'i dkyil 
[\[298b.3\]]'khor yangs pa legs 'ongs sam/_/legs par 'ongs sam blta na rab zhi ba/_/spyad pa spyod tshe dub par ma gyur tam/_/rnam dag bsam ldan tshur shog 'ongs pa legs/_/skyo med yid ldan tshur shog 'ongs pa legs/_/dbang po ma zhum tshur shog 
[\[298b.4\]]'ongs pa legs/_/mkhas pa spyod tshe dub pa med grang ngo /_/chos rnams thams cad rnam phye'i don byung ba/_/'gro ba thams cad rnam gdul rab brtson pa/_/bshes gnyen thams cad bsnyen bkur rab zhugs pa/_/brtul zhugs mi g.yo brtan pa 
[\[298b.5\]]khyod 'ongs legs/_/dge ba'i lam gyis 'ongs pa bder 'ongs sam/_/yon tan lam la gnas pa bder 'ongs sam/_/rgyal ba'i lam la zhugs pa bder 'ongs sam/_/lam rnams gang du'ang ngal bar ma gyur tam/_/yon tan rang bzhin tshur shog bder 
[\[298b.6\]]'ongs sam/_/dge bas mngon brlan tshur shog bder 'ongs sam/_/mtha' yas spyod yul legs par bder 'ongs sam/_/'gro ba kun na khyod mthong shin tu dkon/_/thob dang ma thob mnyam pa'i yid ldan pa/_/smad dang sdug bsngal ma grags rnam 
[\[298b.7\]]par spangs/_/'jig rten chos la uta pal pad mo bzhin/_/yid la 'khrul med legs par bder 'ongs sam/_/g.yo dang sgyu bral bsam pa dge ldan pa/_/nga rgyal dregs med snod kyi dam pa po/_/khro dang 'tshig med khengs shing 'gying ba med/_/
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]blta na sdug pa khyod mthong legs pa yin/_/tshur shog phyogs kun spyod yul mngon gyur pa/_/tshur shog rgyal ba'i mdzod rnams sgrub byed pa/_/tshur shog rgyal ba'i mdzod rnams 'phel byed pa/_/yid la dub med legs par khyod 'ongs 
[\[299a.2\]]sam/_/tshur shog dus gsum yul ldan 'ongs pa legs/_/chos kyi dbyings la mos pa'i dkyil 'khor ldan/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan snying por byung /_/mkhas pa legs par 'ongs sam ming la lam/_/tshur shog 'jam dpal ye shes pad mo'i mchog_/tshur 
[\[299a.3\]]shog sprin dpal char pas rnam spel ba/_/rgyal ba kun gyi sras kyis btang ba tshur/_/khyod la bsgribs pa med pa'i phyogs kyang bstan/_/ltos shig smon lam dra ba ci 'dra ba/_/chos dbyings rgyas 'gengs bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[299a.4\]]spyod la lam bsgrubs pa/_/rgya che yangs byed nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'dir 'ongs so/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i spyod yul tshol byed cing /_/rdul dang bral ba'i spyod pa 'gro ba'i phyir/_/smon lam rlabs chen yongs su 'dri byed cing /_/skyo ba'i yid med 'di ni 'dir 
[\[299a.5\]]'ongs so/_/'das pa'i mgon pos gang la bslabs mdzad de/_/de bzhin ma byon rnams kyang slob 'gyur la/_/bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i spyod par bya ba rnams/_/yongs su dris phyir 'di ni 'dir 'ongs so/_/'di ni bdag gis dge bshes chos 
[\[299a.6\]]smra ba/_/chos kun nan tan yongs su ston byed pa/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod lam yongs ston pa/_/yin zhes sems gcig bsam nas 'dir 'ongs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' bdag gis blo bskyed pa/_/sangs rgyas sras po byang chub bskyed 
[\[299a.7\]]byed pa/_/'di dag bdag bshes sangs rgyas bsngags pa zhes/_/de ltar dge ba'i sems kyis 'dir 'ongs so/_/'di dag bskyed pas bdag gis ma lta bu/_/yon tan 'o ma ldud pas ma ma 'dra/_/byang chub yan lag yongs su skyong ba yin/_/dge 
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]bshes 'di dag gnod pa rnam par zlog_/rga shi mthar byed sman pa lta bu ste/_/bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs brgya byin lha dbang 'dra/_/zla ba lta bu dkar po'i phyogs kyis rgyas/_/zhi ba'i phyogs ston nyi ma gsal ba 'dra/_/dgra dang 'grogs la ri bo 'dra ba ste/_/
[\[299b.2\]]rgya mtsho bzhin du mi 'khrug sems dang ldan/_/yongs su skyong dang mnyan pa 'dra ba zhes/_/de 'dra'i sems kyis nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'dir 'ongs so/_/'jigs med skyob pas dpa' bo lta bu ste/_/ded dpon mgon dang skyabs su gyur pa yin/_/'di dag bdag la bde 
[\[299b.3\]]stobs [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]yin zhes/_/de 'dra'i sems kyis dge bshes bsnyen bkur byed/_/chos kyi phyogs rnams rtag tu ston pa ste/_/sangs rgyas yon tan ye shes ston pa yin/_/ngan song ngan 'gro thams cad sbyong bar byed/_dge bshes 'di dag 
[\[299b.4\]]bdag la dge ba ston/_/'di dag rgyal ba'i mdzod kun stobs pa yin/_/'di dag rgyal ba kun gyi mdzod srung ste/_/'di dag rgyal ba kun gyi gsang 'dzin ces/_/de ltar mkhas pa 'di ni dge bshes bsnyen/_/ye shes phun ldan 'di las rnam par dag_/
[\[299b.5\]]gzugs dang longs spyod cho rigs phun sum tshogs/_/'di las phun sum tshogs kun dkon pa min/_/bsam pa de 'dras 'di ni 'dir 'ongs so/_/bsam pa rlabs chen 'di la kun kyang ltos/_/mkhas pa'i dge bshes rnams la 'di sten cing /_/mkhas 
[\[299b.6\]]pa 'di blo ci 'dra skyed pa ltos/_/khyod kyis rtag tu de ltar bslab par bya/_/'di ni sngon gyi bsod nams dge ba'i rgyus/_/byang chub zhugs te 'jam dpal mthong gyur nas/_/de yi gdams ngag rjes su mthun spyod cing /_/skyo ba med par rgyu ba 'di la ltos/_/
[\[299b.7\]]'di ni dga' bde thams cad kun spangs te/_/lha rdzas lta bu'i khyim yang yongs su spangs/_/pha ma ma ma skyid pa rgya chen kun/_/yongs su spangs shing bran ltar bshes gnyen sten/_/mkhas pa 'dis ni bsam pa rnam sbyangs te/_/bdag gis ma lus yongs su 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]spangs byas nas/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi pho brang 'gro bar 'gyur/_/de phyir 'bras bu de 'dra'ang thob par gyur/_/'dis ni rga dang nad kyis mnar ba yi/_/srog chags sdug bsngal brgya yis gtses pa rnams/_/skye shi mya ngan 'jigs pas gdung mthong 
[\[300a.2\]]nas/_/de dag don du snying rje'i sems kyis spyod/_/'gro rgyud lnga yi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du/_/sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor btsir ba'i 'gro mthong nas/_/sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor 'khor lo 'joms pa yi/_/ye shes rdo rje sra ba 'di tshol lo/_/'dod chags zhe 
[\[300a.3\]]sdang rtswa sdong tsher ma can/_/lta chags rtsa mang yongs su 'dzings pa yi/_/sems can zhing ni yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir/_/shes rab gzhol brtan bzang po 'di tshol lo/_/gti mug ma rig thibs po'i bsam pa can/_/'gro ba shes rab mig stor [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[300a.4\]]med pa/_/de la phyogs bde ston pa'i mthu yod pa'i/_/'gro ba'i ded dpon bzang por 'di 'gyur ro/_/bzod pa'i go bgos rnam thar bzhon pa zhon/_/ye shes ral gris mya ngan dgra 'joms pas/_/mi 'jigs stobs pa'i dpa' bor gyur pa 'di/_/
[\[300a.5\]]'gro ba rnams kyi lam ston 'gyur ba yin/_/'di ni chos kyi gru rab sbyor ba ste/_/ye shes rgya mtsho'i lam la bslabs pa'o/_/zhi ba rin chen mchog gis gling skyel ba/_/'di ni khams gsum mtsho yi skye ba 'dzin/_/ye shes 'od zer smon lam dkyil 'khor 
[\[300a.6\]]can/_/sems can kun gyi gnas su snang byed pa'i/_/chos dbyings mkha' la 'od chen rab ldan par/_/'di ni sangs rgyas nyi mar 'char bar 'gyur/_/byams pa'i dga' ldan ting 'dzin dang bsil ba'i/_/sems can kun la snyoms sems 'od bzang la/_/
[\[300a.7\]]dkar po'i chos kyis dkyil 'khor yongs rgyas pa'i/_/sangs rgyas zla ba 'di ni 'char bar 'gyur/_/bsam pa'i gzhi rten brtan la rab gnas pa/_/byang chub spyod pas rim gyis 'phags pa ste/_/chos kun rin chen 'byung gnas ldan pa yi/_/ye shes 
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]rgya mtsho'i mchog tu 'di 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems kyi klu yi dbang gis phyung /_/chos kyi dbyings kyi mkha' la mngon par 'phags/_/dkar po'i 'bras bu'i lo tog 'phel byed pa'i/_/'di ni 'gro bar chos sprin char 'bebs 'gyur/_/dag pa'i 
[\[300b.2\]]snying po'i dri gsum mun sel ba/_/byams pa'i snum yod dran pa'i snod brtan la/_/dri med byang chub sems me 'od bzang po'i/_/chos kyi mar me 'di ni 'bar byed 'gyur/_/byang chub sems ni mar mer snying rje sko/_/byams pa rdol pa mi g.yo bsam pa 'khregs/_/
[\[300b.3\]]byang chub yan lag mthar gyis byung ba yi/_/sangs rgyas sras su 'di ni yang dag skye/_/bsod nams snying po mngon par 'phel bar byed/_/ye shes snying po yongs su spyod par 'gyur/_/'di ni shes pa'i snying po 'char bar byed/_/smon lam ci bzhin snying 
[\[300b.4\]]po yang dag byung /_/snying rje byams pas sprul pa 'di 'dra ba/_/sems can dgrol blo phan pa'i bsam ldan pa/_/rnam dag yid can 'di ni ci 'dra ba/_/de 'dra'i 'gro ba lha dang mir bcas dkon/_/'di 'dra'i bsam pa rab tu rtsa brtan la/_/'di 'dra'i sbyor ba brtan 
[\[300b.5\]]pas rnam 'phel cing /_/srid gsum yog par byed pa 'di 'dra ba'i/_/ye shes shing chen 'bras bu 'byung ba dkon/_/'di ni yon tan kun sgrub don du gnyer/_/chos rnams thams cad yongs su dri bar mos/_/the tshom thams cad rnam par gsal 
[\[300b.6\]]don du/_/le lo med par bshes gnyen thams cad sten/_/'di ni bdud kyi dkrugs ma nyon mongs 'joms/_/'di ni lta ba'i dri ma sred pa sel/_/'di ni 'gro ba thams cad dgrol la brtson/_/mkhas pa 'di ni rtag tu khyad par tshol/_/yon tan lam la 
[\[300b.7\]]ma nor 'di gnas pas/_/'di ni ngan song thams cad sbyong bar 'gyur/_/mtho ris lam yang nye bar ston par 'gyur/_/thar pa'i lam du 'gro ba 'dzud par 'gyur/_/'di ni 'gro rgyud kun gyi sdug bsngal sel/_/'di ni 'gro rgyud kun gyi bde ba 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]stobs/_/'di ni srid pa kun gyi zhags pa 'thub/_/srid pa'i 'gro rgyud thams cad sel bar 'gyur/_/lta ba dogs pa rnam par 'byed par 'gyur/_/srid pa'i 'khri shing dra ba gcod par 'gyur/_/chags pa'i 'dod chags nye bar sbyong bar 'gyur/_/
[\[301a.2\]]srid gsum lam yang yongs su ston par 'gyur/_/'di ni 'jig rten mgon dang skyabs yin te/_/'di ni 'gro ba kun la 'od byed pa'o/_/rnam pa kun tu srid pa sel la mkhas/_/sa gsum kun gyi 'dren par 'di 'gyur ro/_/nyon mongs gnyid log 'gro ba sad 
[\[301a.3\]]par byed/_/'dod pa'i 'dam las mkhas pa 'di sgrol te/_/'du shes chags las yongs su 'di yang 'grel/_/bcings pa kun las thar bar byed par 'gyur/_/chos dbyings gzhi yi bye brag snang bar byed/_/'jig rten khams kyi bye brag sbyong bar 'gyur/_/
[\[301a.4\]]chos kun gzhi yi bye brag pha rol phyin/_/nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod ni dga' ba skyed par 'gyur/_/mkhas pa khyod kyi sbyor ba'i tshul dag dang /_/dag cing khyod la smad pa med tshul dang /_/khyod kyi bsam pa'i yon tan ldan tshul las/_/bsam pa thams cad yongs 
[\[301a.5\]]su rdzogs par 'gyur/_/khyod kyi bdag nyid dge bar byas tshul gyis/_/ring por mi thogs sangs rgyas kun mthong 'gyur/_/ring por mi thogs zhing rnams kun 'gror 'gyur/_/chos kun ring por mi thogs shes par 'gyur/_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho 
[\[301a.6\]]rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur/_/sems can rgya mtsho rnam par 'grel bar 'gyur/_/spyod pa rgya mtsho yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_/khyod kyi yon tan rgya mtsho de 'dra'o/_/khyod kyi mos pa'i dkyil 'khor tshul las na/_/khyod ni yon tan rnams kyi snod 
[\[301a.7\]]du 'gyur/_/khyod ni dge ba yang dag 'byung gnas 'gyur/_/khyod ni rgyal ba'i sras dang mnyam par 'gyur/_/khyod kyi smon lam dkyil 'khor tshul las na/_/khyod kyis bdud kyi dkyil 'khor pham par byas/_/khyod kyis las kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]sbyangs/_/nyon mongs dkyil 'khor khyod kyis dag par byas/_/ye shes rgyud ni rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur/_/chos kyi rgyud ni rab tu brjod par 'gyur/_/las dang nyon mongs sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor rgyud/_/ring por mi thogs rnam par zlog par 'gyur/_/
[\[301b.2\]]'jig rten 'khor lo srid pa'i 'khor lo rten/_/shu ba'i lam rgyud lnga yi 'khor lor rmongs/_/'gro kun sdug bsngal 'khor lo gcod pa yi/_/chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa bskor bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas rigs ni rjes su 'dzin par 'gyur/_/chos kyi rigs 
[\[301b.3\]]ni yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur/_/dge 'dun rigs ni yongs su bsdud par 'gyur/_/rin chen 'byung ba'i 'byung gnas khyod 'gyur ro/_/sred pa'i dra ba rnam par zlog par 'gyur/_/lta ba'i dra ba thibs po de bzhin te/_/'gro ba'i sdug bsngal dra ba 'grel 
[\[301b.4\]]par 'gyur/_/smon lam dra ba de 'dra khyod kyis sbyangs/_/sems can khams ni yongs su smin byed 'gyur/_/'jig rten khams ni yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur/_/ye shes khams ni shin tu dag byed 'gyur/_/khyod kyi bsam pa'i khams ni de 'dra'o/_/nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[301b.5\]]dga' ba 'phel bar byed pa khyod/_/sems can kun la phan bde dga' byed 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' rigs rgyud dga' byed cing /_/sangs rgyas thams cad smon lam dga' byed 'gyur/_/sems can kun gyi 'gro ba'i gnas ston pa/_/zhing 
[\[301b.6\]]rnams thams cad gzugs brnyan snang ston pa/_/chos rnams thams cad snang ba rab ston pa'i/_/lta na bzang ba'i rgyal bar khyod 'gyur ro/_/chos dbyings snang bar byed pa'i 'od ldan pa/_/sems can khams rnams bde byed 'od ldan pa/_/ngan song thams cad 
[\[301b.7\]]zhi byed 'od ldan pa'i/_/srid gsum sdug bsngal zhi bar byed par 'gyur/_/mtho ris lam ni nye bar ston par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas lam ni 'gro la 'byed par 'gyur/_/thar ba'i lam du 'gro ba khrid par 'gyur/_/de 'dra'i lam ni khyod kyis rnam par 
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]sbyangs/_/log pa'i lam ni rnam par zlog par 'gyur/_/skye bo 'phags pa'i lam la 'dul bar 'gyur/_/brtan pa'i blo gros le lo med pa khyod/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]yeng byang chub lam ni de ltar tshol/_/srid pa'i rgya mtshor gnas pa'i lus can rnams/_/
[\[302a.2\]]sdug bsngal mthar 'byin bya ba khyod brtson pas/_/'gro ba srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol bar 'gyur/_/khyod kyi yon tan mtsho chen de 'dra'o/_/ye shes nyi ma mchog gi 'od gzer mtshos/_/lus can nyon mongs rgya mtsho yongs skams shing /_/de dag nan tan mtsho 
[\[302a.3\]]la dgod byas nas/_/ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu dgod par 'gyur/_/blo gros rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/_/spyod pa rgya mtsho rnam par sbyang bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi smon lam rgya mtsho la/_/ring por mi thogs yongs su 'jug par 'gyur/_/
[\[302a.4\]]mkhas pa khyod ni blo gros rgya mtsho'i mthus/_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho mang por phyin par 'gyur/_/'khor rnams rgya mtsho mang po mthong bar 'gyur/_/tshes mang rgya mtsho yongs su 'thung bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas sprin mang khrag khrig mthong bar 'gyur/_/
[\[302a.5\]]mchod sprin shin tu rgya chen byed par 'gyur/_/chos kyi sprin mang khrag khrig thos par 'gyur/_/khyod ni smon lam de 'dra'i sprin kyang byed/_/sems can thams cad gnas mang rgyas 'gengs 'gyur/_/zhing rnams kun gyi gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/_/
[\[302a.6\]]sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas su phyin par 'gyur/_/khyod ni de 'dra'i phyogs su zhugs pa yin/_/khyod ni ting 'dzin gnas su 'jug par 'gyur/_/khyod kyis rnam thar gnas rnams thob par 'gyur/_/khyod ni mngon shes gnas la spyod par 'gyur/_/chos kyi 
[\[302a.7\]]dbyings kyi gnas la rab tu gnas/_/nyi zla'i gzugs rnams rab tu snang ba ltar/_/sems can kun gyi gnas su 'char bar 'gyur/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi spyan sngar mngon 'byung 'gyur/_/khyod kyi 'byung ba'i lam chen de 'dra'o/_/'jig rten kun 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]la mi gnas spyod yul dang /_/nam mkha'i spyod yul bzang por khyod spyod 'gyur/_/khyod kyi spyod yul rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/_/khyod kyi mngon shes spyod yul de 'dra 'o/_/mig 'phrul 'dra ba'i bye brag gzhi mkhas khyod/_/zhing gi dra ba'i bye brag ji snyed gzhi/_/ser 
[\[302b.2\]]bu mkha' la chags pa med pa ltar/_/ring por mi thogs rgyas par 'gengs par 'gyur/_/chos dbyings 'byam klas khong du chud par 'gyur/_/'byam klas 'jig rten khams su 'gro bar 'gyur/_/dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byam klas kun/_/
[\[302b.3\]]mthong bar 'gyur gyis nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dga' bar gyis/_/khyod kyis de 'dra'i rnam thar de lta bu/_/mthong la mthong zhing da dung mthong bar 'gyur/_/de bas mkhas pa skyo bar ma byed cig_/dga' yangs zang zing med pa nyams su long /_/nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod ni 
[\[302b.4\]]yon tan snod bzang ste/_/khyod ni rgyal ba rnams kyi gdams ngag mthun/_/khyod kyis tshul 'di yongs su gzung bar nus/_/de bas rnam par 'phrul pa 'di dag mthong /_/sangs rgyas sras po gnas med spyod yul can/_/gang rnams mthong bar bskal pa khrag khrig du/_/
[\[302b.5\]]shin tu dga' na legs brjod mi smos pa/_/de dag spyod legs spyod tshe khyod kyis mthong /_/de ltar 'jam dpal mngon du mthong gyur te/_/de 'dra'i yon tan snod du gyur byas pa/_/khyod kyis thob pa rgya cha bsam mi khyab/_/mi yi srid par khyod ni legs par 
[\[302b.6\]]'ongs/_/ngan song lam rnams thams cad rnam par zlog_/mi khom ngan 'gro thams cad rnam par sbyangs/_/sdug bsngal chos rnams khyod kyis thams cad bor/_/mi dga' thams cad yongs su spang bar gyis/_/byis pa'i sa ni khyod kyis rnam par zlog/_/
[\[302b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan sa la gnas/_/ye shes sa yi dam pa yongs bskang zhing /_/sangs rgyas sar ba ring por mi thogs thob/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho steng /_/sangs rgyas ye shes nam mkha'i mdzod dang mtshungs/_/de yi tshad kyi 
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]smon lam gang chen mtsho/_/khyod kyis btsal zin shin tu dga' bar gyis/_/de ltar dbang po yongs su mi skyo la/_/bsam pa brtan zhing sbyor ba nges pa rnams/_/gang dag 'di 'dra'i bshes gnyen bsten byed pa/_/de dag ring bor mi thogs 
[\[303a.2\]]mgon por 'gyur/_/khyod kyi byang chub spyod pa sna tshogs kyis/_/sems can mang po dul bar gyur mthong zhing /_/chos kun sgo yi byang chub spyod pa la/_/nam yang yid gnyis byed par ma gyur cig_/de ltar phun sum tshogs pa 'di 'dra 'di/_/sangs rgyas sras po 
[\[303a.3\]]de ring 'dir mthong ba/_/don chos yon tan dang ba phun sum tshogs/_/khyod kyi bsod nams phun ldan bsam mi khyab/_/de ltar rgyal sras rnams kyi rgyun 'brel bar/_/rang rang so so'i smon lam bstan byas te/_/khyod kyi de dag ma lus mthun rtogs pa/_/khyod 
[\[303a.4\]]mthong thob pa chen po ci 'dra ltos/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i snod gyur pa/_/de 'dra'i srid pa brgyar yang dkon pas na/_/de phyir rgyal sras de dag rgyun 'brel bar/_/khyod la rnam thar tshul rnams yongs su ston/_/bskal ba khrag khrig bye bar 'gro ba gang /_/
[\[303a.5\]]bde gshegs sras dang lhan cig 'grogs gyur pa/_/de dag de rnams spyod yul mi shes te/_/de dag yon tan snod du bdag ma byas/_/khyod kyis 'di 'dra'i tshul 'di thos par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rnam 'phrul ba/_/'gro ba kun na 
[\[303a.6\]]dkon pa khyod kyis mthong /_/de ltar nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dga' ba'i yid du gyis/_/khyod la sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs pa mdzad/_/byang chub sems dpa' khyod gzung phyir yang gnas/_/khyod kyang de dag rjes su bstan la gnas/_/legs so nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod 
[\[303a.7\]]kyi 'tsho ba dge_/byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyi chos la gnas/_/khyod ni rgyal sras yon tan rnams la slob/_/bde bar gshegs rigs rnam par 'phel byed 'gyur/_/nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dga' ba rgya chen nyams su long /_/sangs rgyas mnyam med thams cad 
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]khyod kyi pha/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad khyod dang spun/_/byang chub yan lag thams cad khyod kyi gnyen/_/khyod ni bde gshegs thugs las skyes pa'i sras/_/chos kyi rgyal po rig pa'i rgyud 'dzin pa/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rigs rgyud 'phel bar 
[\[303b.2\]]byed/_/ring por mi thogs chos rgyal thob 'gyur gyis/_/nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dbang po tshim zhing dga' bar gyis/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur dam pa yang /_/ring por mi thogs rmad byung thob par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sras dang mtshungs shing mnyam par 'gyur/_/
[\[303b.3\]]khyod kyi spyod pa'i tshul mthun de 'dra'o/_/mi gang ci 'dra'i sa bon 'debs byed pa/_/de ni de 'dra'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/_/dga' ba rgya chen bsam yas nyams su long /_/ngas ni de ring khyod kyi dbugs kyang dbyung /_/tshe gcig khyod kyis gang rnams thob gyur pa/_/
[\[303b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig bsam yas pa/_/bskal ba khrag khrig byang chub spyad spyod pa/_/de dag gis kyang phun sum 'di ma rnyed/_/'di rnams thams cad mos pa'i 'bras bu ste/_/brtson 'grus bsam pa dag ni de bzhin no/_/gang zhig spyod pa 'di 
[\[303b.5\]]'dra dka' ba yang /_/nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]spyod pa gang yin de la spyod/_/spyod pa thams cad smon lam byung ba yin/_/chos rnams thams cad mos las yongs su byung /_/nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de ltar khyod kyis yongs su bsgrubs/_/rtag tu khyad par spyod pa btsal bar 
[\[303b.6\]]gyis/_/klu yi bsam pa ji snyed byung gyur pa/_/de snyed char pa yongs su 'bab par 'gyur/_/smon lam ye shes spyod yul ji snyed pa/_/de snyed byang chub spyod pas rgyas par 'gyur/_/nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bzang po'i spyod ces bya ba 'di/_/tshul ni khyod la bstan pa 
[\[303b.7\]]'di yin gyis/_/de shes gyis la dge bshes rang bzhin gyis/_/bsnyen bkur byed tshe 'jug par ma byed cig_/lus rnams bye ba sngan cad khyod kyis kyang /_/'dod pa'i don du don med zad byas soms/_/da ni byang chub yongs su tshol gyur na/_/brtul shugs 
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]bzang po brtul bas zhig go 'dang /_/khyod kyis bskal pa bye ba 'das byas te/_/'dus byas sdug bsngal thams cad nyams su myong /_/gang gA'i bye snyed sangs rgyas mnyes ma byas/_/'di 'dra'i tshul yang thos par ma gyur to/_/de las da ni khom 
[\[304a.2\]]par mir yang skyes/_/sangs rgyas 'byung mthong dge bshes 'di 'dra ste/_/byang chub mchog gi spyod pa'ang thos par 'gyur/_/rnam dag sems su da go cir mi 'gyur/_/bde bar gshegs pa yang du 'byung bar 'gyur/_/dge bshes de bzhin chos mnyan thos par 'gyur/_/
[\[304a.3\]]gal te bsam pa yongs su ma sbyangs na/_/tshul 'di phyin chad thos par dka' ba yin/_/de bas dad dang mos dang bsam pa rnams/_/yongs su bskyed la bla ma phud dud gyis/_/the tsom lta ba yongs su skyo spangs la/_/yang dang yang du 'di 'dra tshul nyon cig_/
[\[304a.4\]]gang gis spyod la 'jug pa 'di 'dra 'di/_/thos nas de 'dra'i smon lam mngon bsgrubs pa/_/de dag thob pa dam pa bsam mi khyab/_/de dag mi yi srid par legs par 'ongs/_/gang gis de 'dra'i mos ba sbyangs pa ni/_/de la bde gshegs thams cad mi 
[\[304a.5\]]dkon no/_/de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi sras dang spun/_/de la phyin chad byang chub the tsom med/_/gang zhig 'di 'dra'i tshul 'dir zhugs gyur pa/_/des ni log par ltung ba thams cad spangs/_/des ni sdug bsngal chos rnams thams cad bstsal/_/des ni yon tan 
[\[304a.6\]]thams cad bsdu ba byas/_/lus ni bor nas ring por mi thogs su/_/yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gnas su 'jug par 'gyur/_/phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur/_/nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod kyi 
[\[304a.7\]]sngon gyi rgyu sdug pas/_/da ltar byung la mos pa nges pa yis/_/khyad par don gnyer dge bshes bsten byas pas/_/chu las uta pal bzhin de phyir 'phel/_/dge bshes thams cad phu dud bsam pa dang /_/sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes bya'i bsam pa dang /_/
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]chos kun yongs su dri ba'i bsam pa can/_/brtul zhugs bzang po ldan pa dal gyis longs/_/chos kyi nan tan kun la rab gnas pa/_/lam rnams rjes su kun tshol rab gnas pa/_/sangs rgyas sras kyi smon lam rab gnas pa/_/yon tan chos rnams 
[\[304b.2\]]kun gyi snod khyod longs/_/mos pa phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra bas/_/khyod kyis nga la phyag 'di byas pa ni/_/sangs rgyas thams cad 'khor du mngon sum du/_/ring por mi thogs yongs su 'byung bar 'gyur/_/skyo ba'i yid med nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]legs pa yin/_/
[\[304b.3\]]sangs rgyas kun gyi smon lam sems ldan pa/_/brtul zhugs brtan khyod ring por mi thogs par/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan mthar phyin 'gyur/_/ye shes spyod yul rnam par mthar phyin pa'i/_/'jam dpal gan du nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod song ste/_/bzang 
[\[304b.4\]]po spyod pa dam pa mchog dris shig_/de tshul khyod 'jug de nas byed par 'gyur/_/de ltar byams pa chags med spyod yul gyis/_/nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yang dag legs pas 'phags mthong nas/_/'khor rnams kun la mngon par bstan byas te/_/de yi 
[\[304b.5\]]yon tan legs mdzod 'di brjod do/_/'di 'dra'i rjes su bstan pa dam pa dang /_/gdams ngag de 'dra nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]thos gyur nas/_/dga' ba'i shugs kyis dbang po mngon brlan pas/_/mchi ma'i rgyud mang rab tu des kyang blags/_/dga' ba'i 
[\[304b.6\]]nyams chen nyams su myong bar 'gyur/_/dbang po tshim nas shugs kyis dbugs kyang phyung /_/nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]langs te thal mo rab sbyar nas/_/byams pa de la bskor ba rab tu byas/_/de yi lag tu 'jam dpal sems dbang gis/_/me tog phreng ba 
[\[304b.7\]]rin chen mdzes pa dag_/byang chub sems dpa'i smon pas mngon 'thon pa/_/yid du 'ong ba mang po byung bar gyur/_/nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de tshe rab tu dga' gyur nas/_/dga' bar de dag byams pa de la gtor/_/de tshe de yi mgo la kun nas byugs/_/
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]byams pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras/_/rgyal ba'i sras po nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]legs so legs/_/de ltar khyod ni yongs su mi skyo bas/_/nga dang 'jam dpal ci 'dra ci bzhin du/_/yon tan snod du khyod ni myur de 'gyur/_/thos nas nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[305a.2\]]dga' ba'i tshig brjod pa/_/'di 'dra'i dge bshes bdag dang phrad pa ni/_/srid pa brgya phrag 'grangs par shin tu dkon/_/bdag gis de ring 'dir phyin shin tu legs/_/yon tan kun gyi pha rol phyin gyur pa/_/'jam dpal khyod kyi byin rlabs bzang po yis/_/bdag gis 
[\[305a.3\]]bshes gnyen 'di dag dkon pa rnyed/_/khyod dang bdag tu myur du 'grogs par ro//_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po bcu dgu pa/_de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[305a.4\]]po byams pa'i mdun du 'dug ste/_thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs na ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar 
[\[305a.5\]]nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/_'phags pa byams pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sku tshe gcig gis thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa ste/_gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sku tshe gcig gis thogs 
[\[305a.6\]]pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'god pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa lags/_de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par rab tu zhugs pa lags/_de ni pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa lags/_de ni bzod pa'i sgo 
[\[305a.7\]]thams cad du zhugs pa lags/_des ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad rab tu brnyes pa lags/_de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba'i sgo thams cad la rnam par rol pa lags/_des ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su bsgrubs pa 
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]lags/_/des ni byang chub sems dpa'i rgyud thams cad rtogs par thugs su chud pa lags/_des ni gzungs dang spobs pa snang ba'i tshul thams cad la rab tu brnyes pa lags/_/des ni byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams cad la mnga' thob pa lags/_des ni byang 
[\[305b.2\]]chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad shin tu bstsags pa lags/_des ni shes rab dang thabs mkhas pa'i tshul la rnam par rol pa lags/_des ni mngon par shes pa chen po dang /_rig pa dang ye shes snang ba'i tshul bskyed pa lags/_de ni bslab pa thams cad las 
[\[305b.3\]]byung ba lags/_des ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyangs pa lags/_des ni smon lam gyis 'byung ba'i sgo thams cad mngon par bsgrubs pa lags/_des ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lung bstan pa rab tu blangs pa lags/_de ni theg pa 
[\[305b.4\]]thams cad kyis 'byung ba'i sgo la mkhas pa lags/_des ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag par blangs pa lags/_des ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub yongs su bzung ba lags/_des ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 
[\[305b.5\]]chos kyi mdzod bzung ba lags/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mdzod 'dzin pa lags/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi spyi bor phyin pa lags/_de ni nyon mongs pa'i dpung thams cad 
[\[305b.6\]]rnam par dkrugs pa la shin tu dpa' ba lags/_de ni 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon par lus pa rnams kyi lam ston pa lags/_de ni nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis thebs pa rnams kyi sman par gyur pa lags/_de ni sems can thams cad kyi phul du phyin pa lags/_
[\[305b.7\]]de ni 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi dbang po lags/_de ni 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad kyi thu bo lags/_de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gtso bo lags/_de ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho la rgyu ba rnams kyi skyabs 'dzin pa lags/_des ni sems 
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]can gdul ba'i thabs kyi rgya mtsho chen po bshal ba lags/_des ni 'gro ba yongs su smin pa rnams kyi dbang po rnam par gzigs pa lags/_de ni sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba la brtson pa lags/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 
[\[306a.2\]]yongs su bskyang ba la brtson pa lags/_de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba thams cad la yang dag par 'gro bar brtson pa lags/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na gnas pa lags/_de ni 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du mngon par 'phags 
[\[306a.3\]]pa lags/_de ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi gnas su gzugs brnyan snang ba lags/_de ni 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa lags/_de ni bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa lags/_de ni sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad kyi rjes su bzhud pa 
[\[306a.4\]]lags/_de ni byang chub sems dpa'i yul thams cad la sgrib pa med pa brnyes pa lags/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod par brtson pa lags/_de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur ba lags/_de ni dbang bskur ba'i thabs thob 
[\[306a.5\]]pa lags/_de ni chos kyi rgyal srid chen po la gnas par 'gyur ba lags/_de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul la dbang bskur ba lags/_de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu 'byung ba lags/_de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dbang bsgyur 
[\[306a.6\]]ba'i mthar phyin pa lags na/_'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas nan tan du bgyis na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thob par 'gyur 
[\[306a.7\]]ba dang /_sems can gyi khams ji ltar gnyer ba'i tshul bzhin du rim gror bgyid par 'gyur ba dang /_yi dam ji ltar bcas pa'i tshul bzhin du mthar phyin par 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chen po brtsams pa grub par 'gyur ba dang /_lha dang bcas pa'i 
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]'jig rten dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ba dang /_bdag dang sems can dang sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun bslu bar mi 'gyur ba dang sangs rgyas kyi rigs rgyun mi gcod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rigs stong bar mi 'byin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[306b.2\]]tshul yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad la bltas te/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la nye bar bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu dag tshong 
[\[306b.3\]]dpon gyi bu 'di 'di ltar nga la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang yon tan yongs su bsgrub pa 'dri ba la ltos/_bzod pa can dag tshong dpon gyi bu 'di ni brtson 'grus brtsams pa 'di lta bu dang don du gnyer ba 'di lta bu dang mos pa'i yi dam 'di lta bu dang lhag pa'i bsam pa 
[\[306b.4\]]brtan pa 'di lta bu dang brtson 'grus mi zlog pa 'di lta bu dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis mi ngoms par 'di lta bu dang /_khyad par yongs su btsal ba 'di lta bu dang mgo'i thod la me 'bar ba lta bur spyod pa 'di lta bu dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong bar 'dod pa 'di lta bu dang /_
[\[306b.5\]]dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur bas skyo ba med pa 'di lta bus dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad yongs su tshol zhing yongs su dri ba dang /_bsnyen bkur ba byed cing 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas btang nas grong khyer dpal gyi 'byung gnas nye bar bzung ba nas 
[\[306b.6\]]lho phyogs kyi rgyud thams cad du rgyus te/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen brgya rtsa bcu la yongs su dri ba byed cing /_tha ma nga'i drung 'di'i bar du skyo ba thams cad dang bral ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pas phyin te/_rigs kyi bu dag rnam pa 'di lta bur theg pa chen po la yang dag par 
[\[306b.7\]]zhugs pa yi dam chen po la yang dag par gnas pa dang /_bsam pa chen po la rab tu rtul ba'i yid dang ldan pa/_snying rje chen po'i go bgos pa'i ngad dang ldan pa/_byams pa chen pos sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i blo gros can brtson 'grus chen po'i pha 
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]rol tu phyin pa la rab tu brtson pa/_sems can gyi lam grogs mang po yongs su bskyang ba la mngon par brtson pa/_'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po las sems can bsgral ba la zhugs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam chen po la zhugs pa/_
[\[307a.2\]]chos kyi gru chen po yang dag par bsham pa la brtson pa/_chos chen po dang bsod nams rin po che yongs su bsdu ba la rab tu rtul ba/_chos kyi mchod sbyin chen po'i tshogs bstsags pa la/_brtson pa rnams kyi ming thos pa'am/_gzugs kyi lus mthong 
[\[307a.3\]]ba'am spyod yul du 'grogs pa'am/_spyod pa dang skal ba mnyam pa ni shin tu dkon no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu skyes bu dam pa 'di ni 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i don du byung ba ste/_sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las yongs su 
[\[307a.4\]]thar bar bya ba dang /_ngan song thams cad yang dag par bstsal pa dang /_mi khom pa'i lam thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang /_lam nyam nga ba thams cad yongs su spang ba dang /_mi shes pa'i mun pa nag po thams cad rnam par bstsal ba dang /_'khor 
[\[307a.5\]]ba'i 'brog dgon pa thams cad las yang dag par bzla ba dang /_'gro ba'i rgyud kyi 'khor lo thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang /_bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par bzla ba dang /_gnas kyi rten thams cad las gyen du bskyod pa dang /_rten gyi gzhi 
[\[307a.6\]]thams cad las bskul ba dang /_'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad du mi gnas par bya ba dang /_'dod pa'i 'dam nas yang dag par 'don pa dang /_dga' ba'i 'dod chags spang ba dang /_lta ba'i bcings pa gtub pa dang /_'jig tshogs la mngon par 
[\[307a.7\]]zhen pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /_'du shes kyi zhags pa yang dag par gcad pa dang /_phyin ci log gi lam nas rnam par bzlog pa dang /_nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan bsnyal ba dang /_bag la nyal ba'i zug rngu yang dag par dbyung ba dang /_sgrib pa'i sgo glegs 
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]gzhom pa dang /_sgrib pa'i ri rnam par gtor ba dang /_sred pa'i dra ba nas gdon pa dang /_ma rig pa'i kun tu sbyor ba las dbye ba dang /_srid pa'i chu bo las bsgral ba dang /_g.yo dang sgyu spang ba dang sems kyi rnyog pa gdang ba dang /_the tshom dang yid gnyis dang nem nur 
[\[307b.2\]]bstsal ba dang /_mi shes pa'i chu bo chen po las bsgral ba dang /_'khor ba'i skyon thams cad rnam par smad pa'i phyir rab tu zhugs pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu skyes bu dam pa 'di ni sems can rnams chu bo bzhi las yongs su bsgral ba'i phyir chos kyi gru chen po yang dag par 
[\[307b.3\]]bsham par 'dod pa'o/_/lta ba'i 'dam du bying ba rnams chos kyi rkang stegs chen po dgod par 'dod pa'o/_/gti mug gi mun par 'thoms pa rnams la ye shes kyi snang ba dbyung bar 'dod pa'o/_/'khor ba'i mya ngam du 'khyams pa rnams la 'phags 
[\[307b.4\]]pa'i lam bstan par 'dod pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i nad chen pos gzir ba rnams la chos kyi sman sbyin par 'dod pa'o/_/skye ba dang rga ba dang 'chi bas gtses pa rnams la 'chi ba med pa'i dbyings sbyin par 'dod pa'o/_/me gsum rab tu 'bar ba rnams la zhi 
[\[307b.5\]]gnas kyi chus rab tu zhi bar bya bar 'dod pa'o/_/mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pas gdungs pa rnams la dbugs phyin pa chen po sbyin par 'dod pa'o/_/srid pa'i btson ras 'khor ba rnams la ye shes kyi mtshon cha sbyin par 'dod pa'o/_/
[\[307b.6\]]lta ba'i bcings pas glags pa rnams la shes rab kyi mtshon chas bsdud par 'dod pa'o/_/khams gsum gyi grong khyer gyi 'khor ba rnams la thar ba'i sgo bstan par 'dod pa'o/_/phyogs mi bde bar mngon par gzhol ba rnams la bde ba'i phyogs bstan par 'dod 
[\[307b.7\]]pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i chom pos gtses pa rnams la dbugs phyin pa chen po sbyin par 'dod pa'o/_/ngan song gi g.yang sas 'jigs shing skrag pa rnams la 'ju sa'i lag pa brkyang bar 'dod pa'o/_/phung po'i gshed mas gtses pa rnams la mya ngan las 'das 
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]pa'i grong khyer bstan par 'dod pa'o/_/khams kyi sbrul gyis kun nas 'khor ba rnams la 'phags pa'i lam gyis 'byung ba bstan par 'dod pa'o/_/skye mched kyi grong stong pa na gnas pa rnams la shes rab kyi snang bas gdon 
[\[308a.2\]]par 'dod pa'o/_/mu stegs ngan pa la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mu stegs su gzud par 'dod pa'o/_/bshes gnyen ma yin pa'i lag tu ltung ba rnams la yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bstan par 'dod pa'o/_/byis pa'i chos kyi spyod yul la 
[\[308a.3\]]mngon par mos pa rnams 'phags pa'i chos la rab tu dgod par 'dod pa'o/_/'khor ba'i khyim la mngon par dga' ba rnams gyen du bskyod de thams cad mkhyen pa'i pho brang du gzud par 'dod pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu dag de ltar skyes bu dam pa 'di ni sems can 
[\[308a.4\]]yongs su bskyob pa'i blo gros de lta bus byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnam par dag par bya ba yongs su btsal ba la rgyun mi 'chad pa'o/_/theg pa chen po yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir yongs su skyo ba med pa'o/_/chos kyi sprin thams cad las 'thung bas mi ngoms pa'o/_/
[\[308a.5\]]tshogs thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir rtag tu brtson pa'o/_/chos kyi sgo thams cad yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir mi gtong ba la brtson pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad spyad pa'i phyir brtson 'grus mi gtong ba'o/_/smon lam thams cad 
[\[308a.6\]]mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad mthong bar bya bas mi ngoms pa'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad bsnyen bkur bas lus la dub par 'gyur ba med pa'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen 
[\[308a.7\]]thams cad gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa la mthun par 'dzin pa ste/_rigs kyi bu dag sems can gyi 'jig rten na sems can gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa de lta bu'i sems can dkon no/_/de 
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]bas kyang gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs te/_brtson 'grus brtsam pa'i tshul 'di lta bus sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su sdud pa dang /_mos pa drag po 'di lta bus byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongs su tshol ba dang /_
[\[308b.2\]]don du gnyer ba 'di lta bus byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag par byed pa dang /_nyon mongs pa 'di lta bus dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_mgo'i thod la me 'bar ba ltar spyod pa 'di lta bus dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi ngag dang 
[\[308b.3\]]'gal bar mi byed pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pas nan tan tu byed pa 'di lta bus dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la nan tan du byed pa dang mthun par len pa 'di lta bus byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su sgrub pa dang /_khe dang bkur sti dang snyan 
[\[308b.4\]]pa don du mi gnyer ba 'di lta bus byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa'i khams dang 'gal bar mi byed pa dang /_khyim dang longs spyod dang 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba dang /_pha ma dang gnyen gshes dang /_dngos po thams cad la ltos pa med par yongs su 
[\[308b.5\]]btang ba 'di lta bus byang chub sems dpa'i grogs yongs su tshol ba dang /_lus dang srog la 'phangs par mi rtsi ba 'di lta bus thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par mos par byed pa de lta bu'i sems can ni ches dkon no/_/rigs kyi bu dag 'dis 
[\[308b.6\]]ji ltar tsher skyes pa 'di gcig la ji snyed cig thob pa dang /_khong du chud pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' de ma yin pa gzhan gyis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /_smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[308b.7\]]bya ba thob pa dang /_khong du chud pa'am/_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu nye bar 'gyur ba'am/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'am/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba'am/_chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes la 
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]'jug pa'am/_pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsgrub pa'am/_spyod pa'i dra ba rgya cher bya ba'am smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'am/_bdud kyi las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'am/_dge ba'i bshes 
[\[309a.2\]]gnyen bsnyen bkur ba'am/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub par bya ba dang yongs su dag par bya ba'am/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la 
[\[309a.3\]]yang dag par 'byung ba med do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor ba zangs kyi yon tan dang legs pa yang dag par yongs su brjod pa byas nas/_de las brten te srog chags brgya phrag stong gis byang chub 
[\[309a.4\]]kyi yan lag gi bsam pa brtan par byas nas/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis 'jig rten thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i don du sangs 
[\[309a.5\]]rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu de ltar sems bskyed pa ni khyod 
[\[309a.6\]]kyis thob par bya ba legs par thob bo/_/khyod kyis mi'i lus legs par thob bo/_/'tsho ba'i 'jig rten du khyod legs par 'tshos so/_/khyod kyis sangs rgyas 'byung ba dgyes par byas so/_/khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'jam dpal 
[\[309a.7\]]legs par mthong ngo /_/khyod kyi bsam pa'i rgyud snod bzang por gyur to/_/khyod ni dge ba'i rtsa bas mngon par brlan to/_/khyod ni dkar po'i chos kyis legs par brten to/_/khyod kyis mos pa rlabs chen po dang dge ba'i bsam pa legs par shin tu 
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]sbyangs so/_/khyod sangs rgyas thams cad kyis legs par dgongs so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis legs par bzung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sa bon lta bu'o/_/'gro ba 
[\[309b.2\]]thams cad kyi chos dkar po rnam par 'phel bar byed pas zhing lta bu'o/_/'jig rten thams cad rab tu rten pas sa lta bu'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad dag par byed pas chu lta bu'o/_/'jig rten thams cad brtan pa med pas rlung lta bu'o/_/lta ba'i nye bar len 
[\[309b.3\]]pa'i rtsa thams cad rab tu sreg pas me lta bu'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi gnas snang bar byed pas nyi ma lta bu'o/_/chos dkar po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rgyas par byed pas zla ba lta bu'o/_/chos kyi snang ba byed pas sgron ma lta bu'o/_/mnyam pa dang 
[\[309b.4\]]mi mnyam pa yongs su mthong bar byed pas [{]myig [,]mig [}]lta bu'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer du phyin par byed pas lam lta bu'o/_/mu stegs ngan pa thams cad rnam par spong bas mu stegs lta bu'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon par gnas pas 
[\[309b.5\]]bzhon pa lta bu'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi sgor 'jug par byed pas sgo lta bu'o/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi khang pa na gnas par byed pas gzhal med khang lta bu'o/_/chos kyi dga' ba dang mos pa nyams su myong bar byed pas bza' shing gi ra ba lta bu'o/_/
[\[309b.6\]]'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pas gnas lta bu'o/_/'jig rten thams cad la phan pa skyed pas rten lta bu'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad spyod par byed pas gzhi lta bu'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongs su srung bas pha lta bu'o/_/
[\[309b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi ma lta bu'o/_/thams cad las yongs su skyong bas ma ma lta bu'o/_/slob pa dang mi slob pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems zil gyis gnon pas rgyal po lta bu'o/_/smon lam thams cad kyis khyad par 
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]du 'phags pas dbang po lta bu'o/_/yon tan thams cad yang dag par 'du bas rgya mtsho chen po lta bu'o/_/sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pas rin po che lta bu'o/_/'jig rten thams cad rten pas khor yug lta bu'o/_/
[\[310a.2\]]ye shes kyi sman rnam par 'phel bar byed pas gangs kyi ri lta bu'o/_/yon tan gyi spos thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pas spos kyi ngad ldang ba lta bu'o/_/yon tan rgya che bas nam mkha' lta bu'o/_/'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis mi gos pas pad mo lta 
[\[310a.3\]]bu'o/_/sems dul zhing cang shes pas glang po lta bu'o/_/rgod pa thams cad dang bral bas rta cang shes lta bu'o/_/theg pa chen po yongs su skyong ba'i sngon du 'gro bas kha lo sgyur ba lta bu'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i nad sos par byed pas sman lta bu'o/_/
[\[310a.4\]]mi dge ba'i chos thams cad zad par byed pas sa'i 'og lta bu'o/_/chos thams cad nges par khong du chud par byed pas rdo rje lta bu'o/_/yon tan gyi dri zhim par byed pas spos kyi snod lta bu'o/_/'jig rten thams cad kyis blta na mngon par dga' bas 
[\[310a.5\]]me tog dam pa lta bu'o/_/'dod chags kyi gdung ba bsil bar byed pas kha ba'i tsan dan lta bu'o/_/chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pas a ga ru nag po lta bu'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad 'joms pas sman gyi rgyal po blta 
[\[310a.6\]]na sdug pa lta bu'o/_/bag la nyal ba'i zug rngu thams cad yang dag par 'byin pas 'bral bar byed pa'i sman lta bu'o/_/dbang po thams cad la dbang sgyur bas dbang po lta bu'o/_/dbul ba thams cad yongs su sel bas ngal bso po lta bu'o/_/yon 
[\[310a.7\]]tan thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byed pas dpal lta bu'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mdzes par byed pas lhab lhub lta bu'o/_/nyes byas thams cad sreg pas bskal pas tshig pa'i me lta bu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par 
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]'phel bar byed pas rtsa ba ma grub pa'i sman gyi rgyal po chen po lta bu'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i dug thams cad rnam par sel bas klu'i rin po che lta bu'o/_/rnyog pa thams cad sel bas nor bu rin po che chur dang lta bu'o/_/don thams cad yongs su sgrub pas yid bzhin 
[\[310b.2\]]gyi rin po che'i rgyal po lta bu'o/_/bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pas bum pa bzang po lta bu'o/_/yon tan thams cad kyi rgyan gyi char mngon par 'bebs pas 'dod sbyin gyi shing lta bu'o/_/'khor ba'i skyon thams cad dang ma 'dres pas 
[\[310b.3\]]gos dang ris can lta bu'o/_/rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas shing bal gyi rgyud lta bu'o/_/sems can gyi bsam pa'i zhing rnam par spyod pas gshol lta bu'o/_/'jig tshogs kyi go ca rtol bas mde'u thung lta bu'o/_/sdug bsngal gyi 'ben nges par 'bigs 
[\[310b.4\]]pas mda' lta bu'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i dgra las rnam par rgyal bar byed pas mdung lta bu'o/_/tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa 'gebs pas go ca lta bu'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i klad 'gems pas ral gri lta bu'o/_/nga rgyal dang dregs pa dang rlom pa'i go 
[\[310b.5\]]ca 'dral bas ral gri'i so lta bu'o/_/bag la nyal gyi go cha gshog pas mda' ste'u ka lta bu'o/_/nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan snyol bas dpa' bo'i ru mtshon lta bu'o/_/mi shes pa'i shing sgyel bar byed pas lag cha lta bu'o/_/sdug bsngal gyi shing rab tu 
[\[310b.6\]]gcod pas sta re lta bu'o/_/gnod pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pas mtshon cha lta bu'o/_/pha rol tu phyin pa'i lus yongs su srung bas lag pa lta bu'o/_/yon tan thams cad la so sor 'god pas rkang pa lta bu'o/_/ma rig pa'i pri'i ling tog yongs 
[\[310b.7\]]su sel bas mig mkhan lta bu'o/_/'jig tshogs kyi zug rngu yang dag par 'byin pas skam pa lta bu'o/_/bag la nyal gyi tsher ma 'byin pas tsher zung lta bu'o/_/'khor ba'i bcings pa las yongs su 'grel pas mdza' bo lta bu'o/_/gnod pa thams cad 
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]sel bas nor bu lta bu'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyis 'byung ba'i lam mngon par shes par byed pas gtsug lag lta bu'o/_/bsod nams mi zad pas gter lta bu'o/_/ye shes mi zad pas chu mig lta bu'o/_/chos 
[\[311a.2\]]thams cad kyi gdong gi gzugs brnyan ston pas me long gi dkyil 'khor lta bu'o/_/'go ba med pas me tog pun da ri ka lta bu'o/_/pha rol tu phyin pa dang bsdu ba'i dngos po rgyun tu 'bab pas chu klung chen po lta bu'o/_/chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'beb 
[\[311a.3\]]pas klu'i rgyal po chen po lta bu'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje chen po yongs su 'dzin pas 'tsho ba'i dbang po lta bu'o/_/'chi ba med pa'i dbyings su phyin par byed pas bdud rtsi lta bu'o/_/'dul ba'i sems can thams cad 
[\[311a.4\]]yongs su sdud cing 'dren pas kun nas 'khor ba'i snying lta bu'o/_/'khor ba'i chu la rgyu ba mngon par 'don pas mchil pa lta bu'o/_/yon tan thams cad kyi dri zhim po 'dzin pas spos kyi snod lta bu'o/_/shin tu nad med par byed pas dug sman lta bu'o/_/
[\[311a.5\]]'dod pas dga' ba'i dug med par byed pas dug gi gnyen po lta bu'o/_/tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i dug thams cad 'byang bar byed pas sngags dang gzungs lta bu'o/_/sgrib pa dang bar chad kyi rtswa thams cad rnam par 'thor bas rlung gi dkyil 'khor lta bu'o/_/
[\[311a.6\]]byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pas rin po che'i gling lta bu'o/_/chos dkar po thams cad 'byung bas rigs lta bu'o/_/yon tan gyi chos thams cad skye ba'i sgor gyur pas 'byung gnas lta bu'o/_/byang chub sems 
[\[311a.7\]]dpa'i tshong pa thams cad kyis spyod pas tshong dus lta bu'o/_/las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang dri ma thams cad yongs su sbyong bas chu'i khams lta bu'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed pas sbrang rtsi'i gnas lta bu'o/_/
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i pho brang du phyin par byed pas lam lta bu'o/_/chos dkar po thams cad yongs su 'dzin pas snod lta bu'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad mi ldang bar byed pas char pa lta bu'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[311b.2\]]rnam par dgod pa thams cad ston pas gnas lta bu'o/_/nyan thos kyi rnam par grol ba dang mi 'dre bas rdo ba khab len lta bu'o/_/rang bzhin gyis dri ma med pas baiDUr+ya lta bu'o/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'jig rten shes pa thams cad zil du 
[\[311b.3\]]rlag pa dang /_zil gyis non par byed pas in+d+ra nI la lta bu'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i gnyid kyis log pa'i sems can sad par byed pas tho ras kyi rnga lta bu'o/_/rnyog pa med pas chu dang ba lta bu'o/_/'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas la spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i 
[\[311b.4\]]tshogs zil du brlag par byed pas 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi rgyan lta bu'o/_/'jig rten gsum las mngon par 'phags pas ri'i rgyal po chen po lta bu'o/_/skyabs tshol ba yongs su mi gtong bas skyabs lta bu'o/_/don ma yin pa 'joms pas don lta bu'o/_/
[\[311b.5\]]snying dga' bar byed pas dbyig lta bu'o/_/'gro ba thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pas mchod sbyin gyi yo byad lta bu'o/_/'gro ba thams cad kyi sems kyi gtso bo dang thu bor gyur pas na rgan pa lta bu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'dzin pas gling gzhi 
[\[311b.6\]]lta bu'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang smon lam thams cad sdud pas mdo lta bu'o/_/'jig rten thams cad skyong bas rdzi lta bu'o/_/sdig to thams cad las rnam par zlog pas srungs ma lta bu'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i lha ma yin 'dren pas dbang po'i 
[\[311b.7\]]mig 'phrul lta bu'o/_/'dul ba 'dren pas chu'i zhags pa lta bu'o/_/bag chags dang bag la nyal ba dang nyon mongs pa thams cad gzhob du klog pas dbang po'i me lta bu'o/_/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams la mchod rten lta bu'o/_/
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub kyi sems ni yon tan de dag dang yon tan gyi khyad par gzhan dag kyang tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/_rigs kyi bu mdor na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ji snyed pa de snyed du byang chub kyi sems la 
[\[312a.2\]]yon tan dang legs pa yod par blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di las ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu 'byung ste/_'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[312a.3\]]de bas na gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pas shin tu bzung bas yon tan tshad med pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na 'jigs 
[\[312a.4\]]pa med pa zhes bya ba'i rtsi yod de/_de 'chang na 'jigs pa lnga mi 'byung ste/_'di ltar mes mi tshig go_/dug gis mi tshugs so/_/mtshon gyis mi chod do/_/chus mi khyer ro/_/du bas mi 'chi'o/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems kyi 
[\[312a.5\]]rtsi 'chang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'dod chags kyi mes mi tshig go_/yul gyi dug gis mi tshugs so/_/nyon mongs pa'i mtshon gyis mi chod do/_/srid pa'i chus mi khyer ro/_/yongs su rtog pa'i du bas mi 'chi'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta 
[\[312a.6\]]ste dper na/_rnam par mi gtong ba zhes bya ba'i rtsi yod de/_de 'chang na gzhan gyis gnod par bya ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems kyi ye shes kyi rtsi 'chang ba la'ang 'khor ba'i gnod pa'i 'jigs 
[\[312a.7\]]pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_mchu zhes bya ba'i rtsi yod de/_de 'chang na dri tshor ba tsam gyis sbrul thams cad 'byer ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems kyi rtsi 'chang ba'i yon tan gyi dri tsam gyis kyang nyon 
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]mongs pa'i sbrul thams cad 'byer bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rtsi 'chang ba ni dgra yi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems 
[\[312b.2\]]gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rtsi 'chang ba yang bdud dang phyir rgol ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis thub par dka'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i rtsi yod de/_de bcangs na zug rngu thams cad 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub 
[\[312b.3\]]sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems rnam par sel ba 'chang ba ni 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi zug rngu thams cad mi 'byung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rtsi'i rgyal po chen po blta na sdug pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de bcangs na nad thams cad sel 
[\[312b.4\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems rtsi'i rgyal po chen po blta na sdug pa 'chad pa yang nyon mongs pa dang mi shes pa'i nad thams cad rab tu sel bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rtsi'i shing chen po sbyor ba zhes 
[\[312b.5\]]bya ba yod de/_de'i shun pas rma la reg ma thag tu thams cad 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_gang nas bshus pa de'i shun phrags kyang phyir skye'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems kyi sa bon las skyes pa'i shing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor ba yang mthong ma thag tu 
[\[312b.6\]]rigs kyi bu dad pa rnams kyi las dang nyon mongs pa'i rma yongs su 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shing de la yang 'jig rten thams cad kyis rmad byung ba'am nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rtsi chen po'i 
[\[312b.7\]]rnam pa rtsa ba ma grub pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de'i mthus 'dzam bu'i gling gi shing thams cad kyang yan lag thams cad du rnam par 'phel lo/_/de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems rtsa ba ma grub pa'i rtsi chen po'i mthus kyang /_slob pa dang mi slob pa dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems 
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos kyi shing rnams rnam par 'phel lo/_/'di lta ste dper na/_dga' ba 'thob pa zhes bya ba'i rtsi yod de/_de su'i lus la thogs pa de'i lus dang sems nad med par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems 
[\[313a.2\]]dga' ba 'thob par byed pa'i rtsi yang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus dang sems nad med pa yongs su skyed do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_dran pa 'thob pa zhes bya ba'i rtsi yod de/_de bcangs na sems kyi dran pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen 
[\[313a.3\]]pa nyid du sems bskyed pa dran pa 'thob par byed pa'i rtsi yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i dran pa rnam par dag par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na/_pad ma chen po zhes bya ba'i rtsi yod de/_de zos ba tsam gyis tshe'i tshad 
[\[313a.4\]]bskal par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems kyi pad mo chen po'i rtsi zos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang bskal pa grangs med pa'i tshe la dbang gi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_mi snang ba zhes bya ba'i rtsi yod de/_de bcangs na 
[\[313a.5\]]mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems kyi rtsi mi snang bar 'gyur ba bcangs te 'dres pa rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang bdud kyi yul thams cad du mi snang ngo /_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na 
[\[313a.6\]]nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chen po rin po che thams cad yongs su sdud pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du ma 'phos na rgya mtsho chen po la bskal pas tshig pa'i me thams cad kyis kyang tal tsam yang bskam par nus pa'i gnas med skabs [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de bzhin du 
[\[313a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa nor bu rin po che thams cad yongs su sdud pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chen po bsam pa dang /_sems kyi rgyud la yod pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngos pa 'ga' zhig rnam par chud za 
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas med skabs med de/_de ni mi srid de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa yongs su btang ba zhig tu gyur na ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang bskam par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_nor bu rin po che chen po 'od thams cad yongs su 
[\[313b.2\]]'dus pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de mgul du btags na nor bu rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyang zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems 'od thams cad yongs su 'dus pa'i rin po che chen po bsam pa'i rgyan du thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang nyan 
[\[313b.3\]]thos dang rang sangs rgyas su sems bskyed pa'i rin po che'i rgyan thams cad zil gyis gnon to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_nor bu rin po che chen po chu 'dang zhes bya ba yod de/_de chur bcug na 'dam dang rnyog pa thams cad rab tu dang bar byed do/_/de 
[\[313b.4\]]bzhin du byang chub kyi sems chu 'dang gi nor bu rin po che yang nyon mongs pa'i 'dam dang /_rnyog pa thams cad rab tu dang bar byed do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_nor bu rin po che chen po chu dang 'grogs pa zhes bya ba thogs pa'i nya pa ni chur mi 
[\[313b.5\]]'chi'o/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems chu dang 'grog pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad du mi 'chi'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_nor bu rin po che klu'i nor bu'i go cha zhes 
[\[313b.6\]]bya ba yod de/_de lag na 'dug na nya ba la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa/_chu las 'tsho ba rnams klu'i gnas thams cad du 'dong yang klu'i sbrul thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i ye shes klu'i nor bu'i go ca 'chang ba'i byang 
[\[313b.7\]]chub sems dpa' yang 'dod pa'i gnas kyi khams thams cad du 'gro ba yang nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_nor bu rin po che brgya byin mngon par chags pa thogs pa'i lha'i rgyal po brgya byin ni/_lha'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis gnon to/_/de bzhin du 
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems brgya byin mngon par chags pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chen po smon lam gyi cod pan mgo la thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang khams gsum pa thams cad zil gyis gnon to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta 
[\[314a.2\]]ste dper na/_nor bu rin po che chen po yid bzhin gyi rgyal po thogs pa'i mi ni phongs pa thams cad kyis mi 'jigs so/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i nor bu rin po che chen po thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[314a.3\]]yang yo byad dang 'tsho bas bag tsha ba thams cad kyis mi 'jigs so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_nor bu rin po che nyi mas mdzes pa ni nyi ma la bstan na mi 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa nyi mas mdzes pa'i nor bu 
[\[314a.4\]]rin po che yang shes rab kyi 'od zer gyis phog na ye shes kyi me 'byin to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_nor bu rin po che zla bas mdzes pa zhes bya ba la zla ba'i 'od kyis phog na chu'i rgyun 'byin to/_/de bzhin du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa zla bas mdzes pa'i rin po 
[\[314a.5\]]che chen po yang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngos pa'i zla ba'i 'od kyis phog na dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi smon lam gyi chu'i rgyun 'byin to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i cod pan thogs pa'i klu'i rgyal po chen po rnams la 
[\[314a.6\]]gzhan gyi gnod par bya ba'i 'jigs pa med do/_/de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems snying rje chen po'i nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la'ang ngan song dang ngan 'gros gnod par bya ba'i 'jigs pa med do/_/rigs kyi 
[\[314a.7\]]bu 'di lta ste dper na/_nor bu rin po che chen po 'gro ba'i rgyan dam pa zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bas nam yang byang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi rgyan gyi dam pa'i nor bu rin 
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]po che chen po yang sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya bas nam yang byang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po ni mun pa thams cad yongs 
[\[314b.2\]]su sel cing 'gro ste/_khyim gyi nang na gnas na yang rab tu snang bar byed do/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i nor bu rin po che yang ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel cing 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad du 'gro ste/_'dod pa'i 
[\[314b.3\]]khams na gnas na yang ye shes kyi snang ba chen por rab tu 'gyed do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_gang ci yang rung ste nor bu rin po che chen po in dra nI la'i 'od kyis phog pa de dag thams cad ni nor bu rin po che chen po in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog tu 'gyur ro/_/de 
[\[314b.4\]]bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po in dra nI la yang chos gang dang gang la rnam par spyad pa dang /_yongs su btang ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci yang rung ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pas yongs su bsngos 
[\[314b.5\]]pa de dag thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi nor bu rin po che chen po'i kha dog tu 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_nor bu rin po che baiDUr+ya ni lo brgya phrag stong du mi gtsang ba'i nad zhig na 'dug kyang dri mi zhim pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas 
[\[314b.6\]]te/_de'i rang bzhin 'od gsal ba ni de bzhin du gsal zhing shin tu dri ma med do/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che bai[(]rU[,]DU[)]r+ya yang bskal pa brgya phrag stong zhig tu 'dod pa'i khams thams cad du gnas kyang 'dod pa'i 
[\[314b.7\]]khams kyi skyon thams cad kyis kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur te/_chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba ni de bzhin du shin tu dag par gnas so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_nor bu rin po che chen po dri ma med pas rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces 
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]]bya ba ni rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad zil gyis gnon to/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po dri ma med pas rnam par dag pa'i 'od kyang so so'i skye bo dang /_slob pa dang mi slob pa dang /_
[\[315a.2\]]rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas zil gyis gnon to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rin po che chen po me 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni gcig pu gnas kyang mun pa thams cad rnam par sel to/_/de bzhin du thams cad 
[\[315a.3\]]mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che me 'byung ba lhag mthong dang ldan pa gcig pu yang tshul bzhin yid la bya bas mi shes pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par sel to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rgya mtsho chen po nas grus blangs 
[\[315a.4\]]pa'i nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa tshong pa'i lag du 'ong ba ni grong khyer du phyin na nor bu 'ching bu brgya phrag stong yang kha dog dang rin thang gis zil gyis gnon to/_/de bzhin du 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po na gnas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 
[\[315a.5\]]sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po rin thang med pa smon lam gyi grur bcug pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pas lhag pa'i bsam pa'i rgyud la 'dug ste thams cad mkhyen pa'i grong khyer du ma phyin kyang rnam par grol ba'i grong khyer du phyin 
[\[315a.6\]]na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas nor bu 'ching bu lta bu thams cad zil gyis gnon to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_nor bu rin po che chen po dbang gi rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de/_de ni 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas kyang dpag tshad stong phrag bzhi bcu 
[\[315a.7\]]na gnas pa'i gnyi zla'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyim gyi gzhal med khang gi gzugs brnyan gyi rgyan yongs su ston to/_/de bzhin du yon tan thams cad kyis yongs su sbyangs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po dbang gi rgyal po yang 
[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]'khor ba'i gnas na 'dug bzhin du/_chos kyi dbyings kyi nam mkha'i spyod yul las rgyu ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i gnyi zla dang sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi rgyan yongs su ston to/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[315b.2\]]'di lta ste dper na/_ji srid du gnyi zla'i dkyil 'khor 'od kyis snang bar byed pa de srid du nor dang /_'bru dang /_rin po che'i rnam pa dang /_gser dang dngul dang /[ {]mye [,]me [}]tog dang spos dang phreng ba dang /_gos dang longs spyod gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis nor bu 
[\[315b.3\]]rin po che chen po dbang gi rgyal po'i rin du mi chog go_/de bzhin du ji srid du dus gsum la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes chos kyi dbyings kyi yul snang bar mdzad pa de srid du lha dang mi dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[315b.4\]]zag pa yod pa 'am/_zag pa med pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po dbang gi rgyal po'i rin du mi chog go_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_nor bu rin po che chen po rgya mtsho'i rgyan kyi 
[\[315b.5\]]dam pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de ni rgya mtsho'i rgyan thams cad yongs su ston to/_/de bzhin du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po rgya mtsho'i rgyan gyi dam pa yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul rgya mtsho'i rgyan thams cad yongs 
[\[315b.6\]]su ston to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_nor bu rin po che chen po yid bzhin gyi rgyal po ma gtogs par lha rdzas kyi 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser las lhag par 'phags pa gang yang med do/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes nor bu rin po che 
[\[315b.7\]]chen po yid bzhin gyi rgyal po ma gtogs par byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i lha rdzas kyi 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser las lhag par khyad par du 'phags pa gang yang med do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_klu'i tshogs grub par gyur pa'i sbrul 'dul ba ni klu dang 
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]sbrul thams cad la dbang bsgyur ro/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i nan tan gyi klu'i dkyil 'khor grub pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sbrul 'dul ba yang nyon mongs pa'i klu dang /_sbrul thams cad la dbang bsgyur ro/_/
[\[316a.2\]]rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_dpa' bo lag cha dang ldan pa ni dgra'i 'khor gyis tshugs par dka'o/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i lag cha dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang nyon mongs pa'i dgra'i dkyil 'khor thams cad 
[\[316a.3\]]kyis thub par dka'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_lha rdzas kyi tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma srang gcig gis ni stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dri zhim pos rgyas par 'gengs te de zho gcig tsam la yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin 
[\[316a.4\]]po ches yongs su gang ba rin du mi chog go_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa lha rdzas kyi tsan dan sbrul gyi snying pos lhag pa'i bsam pa gcig la gnas pa'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings thams cad yon tan gyi dri zhim por rgyas par 
[\[316a.5\]]'gengs te slob pa dang mi slob pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems kyang zil gyis gnon to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_tsan dan rin po che chen po kha ba'i tsan dan zhes bya ba ni gdung ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed de/_lus 
[\[316a.6\]]thams cad kyang rab tu bsal bar byed do/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i kha ba'i tsan dan rin po che yang nyon mongs pa'i kun tu rtog pa dang /_'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gis gdung ba thams cad kyang rab tu 
[\[316a.7\]]sel to/_/ye shes kyi lus kyang rab tu sim par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi drung du ji snyed cig nye bar 'dod pa de dag thams cad gser gyi kha dog gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du gang su yang 
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]rung ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i drung du nye bar 'ongs pa de dag thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi kha dog tu kha dog gcig par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_shing sus 
[\[316b.2\]]kyang mi tshugs pa dang /_kun nas 'du ba'i shun phrags kyi dri zhim po 'byung ba de lta bu ni 'dzam bu gling gi me tog par shi ka dang /_me tog dza ti dang /_me tog su ma na la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa me tog gi rnam pa thams cad la yang med do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems 
[\[316b.3\]]dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i sa bon las byung ba'i smon lam gyi shing gi yon tan dang ye shes kyi shun phrags kyi dri zhim po'i ngad 'byung ba 'di lta bu ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dma' ba dang ldan pa thams cad dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[316b.4\]]kyi me tog par shi ka dang /_me tog dza ti dang /_me tog su ma na'i tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba zag pa med pa dang ldan pa thams cad la yang med do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta 
[\[316b.5\]]ste dper na/_shing sus kyang mi thub pa dang /_kun nas 'du ba kha 'bus par gyur na/_me tog stong phrag mang po'i 'byung gnas su gyur par shes par bya'o/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i shing kun nas 'du ba dge ba'i rtsa bas kha 
[\[316b.6\]]'brus par gyur na/_/lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i byang chub kyi me tog zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa'i skye gnas su 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_shing kun nas 'du ba'i me tog gis nyi ma gcig tu bsgos 
[\[316b.7\]]ba'i gos sam/_til mar las dri zhim po'i ngad 'byung ba de lta bu yang me tog tsam pa ka dang /_me tog su ma nas nyi ma brgya phrag stong du bsgos pa'i gos sam til mar las kyang mi 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyi rgyud tshe 
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]gcig tu yongs su bsgoms pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan dang ye shes kyi dri zhim po'i ngad phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhabs kyi drung du ldang ba de lta bu ni bskal pa brgya phrag stong du bsgoms pa'i nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 
[\[317a.2\]]thams cad kyi sems las kyang zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_chos kyi ye shes kyi dri zhim po mi 'byung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_shing gi rigs ni li ki ri zhes bya ba rgya mtsho gnod pa dang bral ba nas skye ba yod de/_de'i 
[\[317a.3\]]rtsa ba yan chad me tog gi bar du yang dus thams cad du nam yang sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ba med do/_/de bzhin du snying rje chen po dang smon lam gyi rtsa bas yang dag par skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang thog ma thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[317a.4\]]nyid du sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ba phyin chad dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i mthar thug gi bar du nam yang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi nye bar 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ba med do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_dngul chu'i rigs gser du 
[\[317a.5\]]snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de ni srang gcig gis kyang lcags srang stong gser du 'gyur ro/_/dngul chu srang gcig po de ni lcags srang stong po des zad par bya ba 'am lcags su bsgyur bar mi nus so/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed 
[\[317a.6\]]pa'i ro'i khams dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba'i ye shes kyis bzung ba ni las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i lcags thams cad zad par byas te/_chos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi kha dog tu byed kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i 
[\[317a.7\]]ro'i khams gcig po de ni las dang nyon mongs pa'i lcags thams cad kyis kyang kun nas nyon mongs par bya ba'am/_zad par mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_me ni ji tsam du chung du zin kyang rkyen ji tsam dang phrad pa de tsam gyi me 
[\[317b\]]
[\[317b.1\]]lce yongs su bskyed do/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i [{]mye [,]me [}]ci tsam du chung du zin kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa rgya chen po'i tshogs kyi rkyen ji tsam dang phrad pa de tsam du ye shes kyi 'od 'phro ba rab tu dgye bas rnam par 'phel bar byed do/_/
[\[317b.2\]]rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/[ {]mye [,]me [}]mar gcig las [{]mye [,]me [}]mar bye ba brgya phrag stong zhig bus kyang me mar de ni [{]mye [,]me [}]mar de snyed byung bas mi zad de mthar thug pa med do/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i me mar gcig las 'das pa 
[\[317b.3\]]dang ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du thugs bskyed pa'i me mar mang po 'bar yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i me mar gcig po de ni de snyed kyi thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[317b.4\]]nyid du sems bskyed pa'i me mar 'byung bas mi zad de mthar thug pa med do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_me mar gcig cig khyim 'am/_khang bu ji lta bur bcug kyang rung ste/_bcug ma thag tu lo stong du bsags bsags pa'i mun pa yang rnam 
[\[317b.5\]]par sel cing snang bar byed do/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa gcig kyang sems can gyi bsam pa'i khyim thibs po ma rig pa'i mun pa dang ldan pa ji lta bu yang rung ste/_de'i rgyud du phyin na de phyin ma thag tu bskal pa brgya stong brjod 
[\[317b.6\]]du med par bstsags pa'i las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /_mun pa thams cad rnam par sel cing ye shes kyi snang ba yongs su bskyed do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_me mar ni snying po ji tsam pa de'i rkyen tsam du snang bar byed de/_mar gyi tshogs ji 
[\[317b.7\]]srid du gnas pa de srid du 'bar ro/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i me mar yang byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi snying po'i khyad par ci 'dra ba de lta bur chos kyi dbyings yongs su snang bar byed de/_snying rje chen pos spyod pa'i mar 
[\[318a\]]
[\[318a.1\]]gyi tshogs ci srid du gnas pa de srid du sems can gdul ba dang /_zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sku don bsgrub pa la yongs su 'bar bar gnas so//_//shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas 
[\[318a.2\]]rmad gcad ces bya ba/_bam po nyi shu pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_lha rdzas kyi 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi rgyan lha'i rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi mgo la thogs pa ni 'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs so/_/de bzhin du thams cad 
[\[318a.3\]]mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa lha rdzas kyi 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi rgyan nan tan dang yon tan la rab tu gnas pa byang chub sems dpa' phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa rnams kyi sman lam chen po'i mgo la thogs pa ni byis pa tha dad pa'i skye bo dang /_slob pa dang /_mi slob pa dang 
[\[318a.4\]]rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ge'i nga ros ni seng ge'i phru gu skyes nas/_ring por ma lon pa'ang nyams su bde zhing rta'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]thams cad ni kun tu 'byer bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin 
[\[318a.5\]]du de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu'i seng ge chen po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi nga ro byang chub kyi sems yongs su brjod pa phyung bas ni las dang po ba'i byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i phru gu rnams sangs rgyas kyi nyams su bde zhing rta'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa la gnas pa'i 
[\[318a.6\]]sems can thams cad ni kun tu 'byar ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_seng ge'i rgyus pa las rgyud du byas pa'i pi bang gi sgras ni pi bang thams cad kyi rgyud yongs su chad do/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge pha rol tu phyin pa'i sku 
[\[318a.7\]]mnga' ba'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i rgyus pa'i yon tan brjod pa'i sgras 'dod pa'i rgyud kyi dga' ba'i pi bang thams cad kyi rgyud yongs su chad par 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang /_yon tan gyi gtam thams cad 
[\[318b\]]
[\[318b.1\]]kyang yongs su 'gags par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rgya mtsho chen po ba dang /_ma he dang /_ra'i 'o mas yongs su gang ba'i nang du seng ge'i 'o ma thigs pa gcig blugs pas 'o ma de dag thams cad 'gyes par 'gyur te 'dur mi gtub 
[\[318b.2\]]bo/_/de bzhin du bskal pa brgya phrag stong du bstsags pa'i nyon mongs pa kun gyi 'o ma'i rgya mtshor yang de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu'i seng ge chen po'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i 'o ma thigs pa gcig blugs pas thams cad ma lus par 
[\[318b.3\]]zad par 'gyur te/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa rnams kyang mi gnas mi 'du'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_bya ka la ping ka'i phru gu sgo nga'i sbubs nas ma byung ba la nga ro'i mthu'i khyad par yod pa de lta bu ni/_gangs kyi ri 
[\[318b.4\]]la gnas pa'i bya'i tshogs mthu dang shugs thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa thams cad la yang med do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ka la ping ka'i phru gu las dang po ba 'khor ba'i sgo nga'i sbubs na 'dug pa la snying rje chen po dang byang chub kyi sems kyi nga ro 
[\[318b.5\]]mthu'i khyad par yod pa de lta bu ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la med do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' lding chen po'i phru gu skyes nas ring po ma lon pa la gshog pa'i rlung gi stobs dang mthu bdog pa dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yongs su 
[\[318b.6\]]dag pa'i yon tan yod pa de lta bu ni de ma yin pa'i bya lus tshad du phyin pa gzhan thams cad la yang med do/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' lding chen po'i rigs dang rgyud du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' lding chen po'i 
[\[318b.7\]]phru gu sems dang po bskyed pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i gshog pa'i rlung gi stobs dang shugs bdog pa dang /_snying rje chen po dang lhag pa'i bsam pa'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]yongs su dag pa'i yon tan yod pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas bskal 
[\[319a\]]
[\[319a.1\]]ba brgya stong tshang bas byung ba thams cad la [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu chen po'i lag nas spyad pa'i mde'u thung gis ni go ca ji tsam du sra yang rtol to/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' brtson 
[\[319a.2\]]'grus brtan po dang ldan pa'i lag nas spyad pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i mde'u thung gis kyang lta ba dang bag la nyal ba'i go ca thams cad mi rtol ba med do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_mthu bo che chen po khros te 
[\[319a.3\]]rngam pa'i 'phral ba la thor bu ji srid du gnas pa de srid du 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad kyis kyang mi thub bo/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' mthu bo che chen po snying rje chen pos rngam pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i gdong la thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[319a.4\]]nyid du sems bskyed pa'i thor bu ji srid du gnas pa de srid du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i bdud thams cad dang bdud kyi las thams cad kyis kyang mi thub bo/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_'phong gi slob dpon gyi mchan bu ma byang 
[\[319a.5\]]ba 'phong gi thabs la ma goms pa la 'phong gi gnas dang thabs kyi mthu dang khyad par bdog pa de lta bu ni thams cad la byang yang 'phong mi shes pa rnams la med do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' cang shes las dang po ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[319a.6\]]kyis lam goms pa la smon lam gyi ye shes dang /_mos pas spyod pa'i mthu'i khyad par ci bdog pa de lta bu ni byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sems can thams cad dang slob pa dang /_mi slob pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad la 
[\[319a.7\]]med do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_'phong slob pa'i 'phong gi rgyus thams cad la ni dang por rkang pa'i stangs la gom par bya ba sngon du 'gro'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sa la slob pas sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[319b\]]
