[\[319b.1\]]chos thams cad khong du chud par bya ba la yang dang por thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par gnas pa sngon du 'gro'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po sgyu ma'i rnam pa dang yul thams 
[\[319b.2\]]cad yongs su ston pa'i bya ba thams cad ni dang por sngags kyi dngos grub mngon par bsgrub pa yid la byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i yul dang rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongs su ston pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub 
[\[319b.3\]]sems dpa'i yul thams cad la yang dang po sems bskyed pa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa ni yongs su grub pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i sngags dang rig sngags thams cad ni gzugs med pa la bstan du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yin yang 
[\[319b.4\]]sems bskyed pas sgyu ma'i sprul pa dang gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad yongs su ston to/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa yang gzugs med pa la bsten du med de/_chos kyi dbyings thams cad sems bskyed pa la dbang bsgyur ba tsam 
[\[319b.5\]]gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad yon tan gyi rgyan rnam par phye ba thams cad kyis rnam par sgrub bo/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_byi la'i mig gis bltas pa tsam gyis byi ba thams cad kun tu 'byer ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad mkhyen 
[\[319b.6\]]pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sbyor ba tsam gyis las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad 'byer bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi rgyan btags na rgyan thams cad zil gyis gnon to/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems 
[\[319b.7\]]dpa' byang chub kyi sems 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi rgyan thogs pa yang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyan zil gyis gnon to/_/zil du rlag par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rdo ba khab long gi rgyal po'i 
[\[320a\]]
[\[320a.1\]]khams ji tsam du chung yang lcags sgrog sra ba thams cad zhig par byed do/_/de bzhin du sems thag pa nas bskyed pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i khams ji tsam du chung yang lta ba'i rnam pa dang /_ma rig pa dang 
[\[320a.2\]]sred pa'i sgrog thams cad zhig par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rdo ba khab long gi khams ni gang dang gang du bzhag pa de dang der lcags phal pa thams cad 'gyes shing mi gnas la mi 'du'o/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i 
[\[320a.3\]]khams kyang las dang nyon mongs pa'am/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba gang dang gang du byung ba de dang de dag gi las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa thams cad kyang 'byer zhing mi 'khod 
[\[320a.4\]]mi 'du'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_chu srin gyi tshil gyi zegs ma gcig zos pa'i nya ba ni chu'i srog chags thams cad kyi 'jigs pa dang bral ba yin te/_chu srin gyis sos btab kyang lus la mi tshugs so/_/de bzhin du lhag pa'i bsam 
[\[320a.5\]]pas byang chub kyi sems kyi cha gcig zos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'khor ba'i las dang nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba yin te/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par khong du chud par bya ba'i nang na 'dug kyang yang dag pa'i 
[\[320a.6\]]mtha' mngon du bya ba'i lam gol bar ltung bas gnod par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_bdud rtsi'i chu 'thungs pa'i skyes bu ni gzhan gyi gnod par bya ba thams cad kyis mi 'chi'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 
[\[320a.7\]]mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i bdud rtsi'i chu 'thungs pa yang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sar mi 'chi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po'i smon lam las kyang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_
[\[320b\]]
[\[320b.1\]]bsku ba grub pa'i skyes bu ni mi'i gnas thams cad na rnam par spyod kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]kun gyis mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i shes rab dang smon lam gyis nye bar bstan pa bdud kyi yul thams cad rnam par spyod kyang 
[\[320b.2\]]bdud thams cad kyis mi mthong ngo /_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rgyal po chen po la rten pa'i skyes ba ni skye bo ma rabs thams cad kyis mi 'jigs so/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa chos 
[\[320b.3\]]kyi rgyal po chen po la rten pa yang sgrib pa dang bar chad dang ngan song thams cad kyis mi 'jigs so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_sa phug gi khyim na gnas na sa'i gse ba thams cad rlan gyis yongs su gang bas me'i 'jigs pa med do/_/
[\[320b.4\]]de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi rgyud byang chub kyi sems kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas mngon par brlan pa la'ang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i ye shes kyi myes 'jigs pa med do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_dpa' bo la rten 
[\[320b.5\]]pa'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]ni dgra thams cad kyis mi 'jigs so/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa dpa' bo la rten pa yang spyod pa ngan pa'i dgra thams cad kyis mi 'jigs so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_
[\[320b.6\]]lha'i dbang po brgya byin rdo rje'i lag ca thogs pa ni lha ma yin gyi tshogs thams cad rab tu 'jom mo/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa brtan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rdo rje'i lag ca thogs pa 
[\[320b.7\]]yang bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba'i lha ma yin gyi tshogs thams cad rab tu 'jom mo/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rtsi ro'i bcud 'thungs pa'i skyes bu ni tshe shin tu ring bar gnas so/_/nyam chung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rga bar mi 
[\[321a\]]
[\[321a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i ro'i bcud kyi tshogs 'thungs pa yang bskal pa grangs med par 'khor ba na 'khor yang yongs su skyo ba med la 'khor ba'i 
[\[321a.2\]]skyon gyis mi gos so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_sman gyi ro sbyar ro cog thams cad du chu ni sngon du 'gro ba ste/_gang la'ang skyon du mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /_smon lam gyi tshogs sbyar ba thams 
[\[321a.3\]]cad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa ni sngon du 'gro ba ste/_gang la yang skyon du mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_mi'i don du bya ba thams cad la ni srog gi dbang po sngon du 'gro'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems 
[\[321a.4\]]dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par blang ba la'ang byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu srog gi dbang po dang bral ba ni las thams cad la mthu med pas pha ma dang gnyen bshes kyi tshogs 
[\[321a.5\]]kyis kyang nye bar 'tsho bar byar med do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa dang bral ba yang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thob par bya ba la mthu med pas sems can thams cad kyis kyang thams cad 
[\[321a.6\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan gyis nye bar 'tsho bar byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rgya mtsho chen po ni dug thams cad kyis gdug par mi nus so/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa rgya mtsho chen po yang las 
[\[321a.7\]]dang nyon mongs pa dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su sems bskyed pa'i dug thams cad kyis gdug par mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni skar ma thams cad kyi 'od kyis thub par mi nus so/_/
[\[321b\]]
[\[321b.1\]]de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi skar ma thams cad kyi yon tan zag pa med pa'i 'od kyis mi thub bo/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rgyal po'i bu skyes nas yun 
[\[321b.2\]]ring du ma lon pa yang blo'i mchog tu bya ba nas rgan pa thams cad rigs su rigs dang ldan par skyes pa dang /_dbang gis zil gyis gnon to/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ring po ma lon pa 
[\[321b.3\]]chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes pa las dang po ba yang yun ring po nas tshangs par spyod spyod pa'i nyan thos nas rgan pa thams cad byang chub kyi sems kyi snying rje chen po'i dbang gi zil gyis gnon to/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[321b.4\]]'di lta ste dper na/_blon po ji tsam du nas rgan pas kyang rgyal bu gzhon nu ji tsam du chung ba la yang phyag bya dgos so/_/rgyal po'i bus kyang blon po rgan po la rim gror mi bya ba ma yin no/_/de bzhin du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas ji tsam du rgan la ji tsam 
[\[321b.5\]]du tshangs pa'i spyod pa ring du spyod spyod pa rnams kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' las dang po ba la gdud par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpas kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la rim gro med par bya ba ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper 
[\[321b.6\]]na/_rgyal po'i bu thams cad kyis mi dgos par bya ba zhig na'ang rgyal po'i mtshan dang ldan na rigs kyi btsun pas rgyal po'i blon po dam par bya ba thams cad dang yang mi mnyam mo/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' las dang po ba las dang nyon 
[\[321b.7\]]mongs pa'i nye bar len pa thams cad kyis non pa yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i mtshan dang ldan na/_sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyis btsun zhing che bas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas mchog tu phyin pa thams cad dang yang mi mnyam mo/_/
[\[322a\]]
[\[322a.1\]]rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_nor bu rin po che yongs su dag pa ni mig la rab rib kyi skyon yod na yongs su ma dag par snang ngo /_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa rin po che rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa 
[\[322a.2\]]yang sems can dad pa'i mig mi shes pa'i rab rib kyi skyon dang ldan pa rnams la yongs su ma dag par snang ngo /_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rtsi'i gzungs sngags dang rtsi thams cad bsdus te byas pa ni/_reg gam mthong ngam/_'grogs na yang 
[\[322a.3\]]sems can gyi nad rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems kyi smon lam dang ye shes kyi lus dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs dang shes rab dang thabs kyi sngags dang rtsi thams cad las bsgrubs pa byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa ni thos sam mthong 
[\[322a.4\]]ngam/_'grogs sam rjes su dran pa'i tshul gyis kyang sems can gyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_gos dang ba'i mtshan nyid can ni 'dam gyi nyes pa thams cad kyis mi gos so/_/de bzhin du byang chub kyi 
[\[322a.5\]]sems kyi gos dang pa'i mtshan nyid can ni 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i 'dam gyi skyon thams cad kyis kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_shing gi gzugs mgo gzer gyis btab pa ni yongs su 'gyes par mi 'gyur te/_
[\[322a.6\]]bya ba thams cad kyang byed do/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon pa'i ye shes kyi lus kyi spyi bo byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i smon lam gyi gzer gyis btab pa yang byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba thams cad la mthu yod de/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 
[\[322a.7\]]smon lam gyi ye shes las lus su grub pa yin pas yongs su 'gyes par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_gzer dang mi ldan pa'i 'khrul 'khor ni shing gi yan lag de nyid yin yang dgos pa bya ba'i mthu med do/_/de bzhin du byang chub 
[\[322b\]]
[\[322b.1\]]sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang mi ldan na/_byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs de nyid yin yang sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgrub pa la mthu med do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 
[\[322b.2\]]la rin po che'i a ga ru nag po glang po'i snying po zhes bya ba yod pa des bdugs ma thag tu rgyal po'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i yan lag bzhi'i dpung gi tshogs thams cad kyang nam mkha' la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[322b.3\]]du sems bskyed pa a ga rus bdugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang khams gsum pa thams cad las rnam par 'das te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes nam mkha'i spyod yul 'dus ma byas pa thams cad kyi mthar 
[\[322b.4\]]thug par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rdo rje ni rin po che ma rabs kyi 'byung khung nas mi 'byung gi rdo rje'i 'byung khung ngam/_gser gyi 'byung khungs nas 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa rdo rje 
[\[322b.5\]]lta bu'ang sems can gyi bsam pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma rabs kyi rin po che'i 'byung gnas nas mi skye ste/_gzhan du na sems can yongs su skyob pa'i snying rje chen po'i rdo rje'i 'byung khung ngam/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la lhag par 
[\[322b.6\]]dmigs pa'i gser gyi 'byung khungs chen po nas 'byung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_shing gi rigs rtsa ba med pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de'i rtsa ba mthar thug pa mi dmigs mod kyi shing rnams la yal ga dang lo ma dang 'dab ma dang me tog shin 
[\[322b.7\]]tu rgyas pa dra ba lta bur gyur pa yang snang ngo /_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthar thug pa'ang mi dmigs mod kyi 'jig rten gyi skye gnas thams cad du yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bsod nams dang ye shes dang 
[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]mngon par shes pa'i me tog shin tu rgyas pa smon lam chen po'i dra bar gyur pa yang yongs su snang ngo /_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rdo rje ni snod ngan pa'i gzhi la 'dug na mdzes par mi snang ngo /_/snod ma rdol ba ma gtogs par snod rdol 
[\[323a.2\]]ba dang /_bu ga can gyis gzung bar mi nus so/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i rdo rje chen po yang sems can mos pa zhen pa'i snod dang /_ser sna can nam tshul khrims ngan pa can nam gnod sems can nam/_le lo can nam/_dran pa 'khrug 
[\[323a.3\]]pa'am/_shes rab 'chal ba can rnams la mi mdzes te/_/byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rin po che'i snod ma gtogs par sems can lhag pa'i bsam pa log pa la zhugs pa blo mi brtan pa'i snod kyis kyang gzung bar mi nus so/_/
[\[323a.4\]]rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rdo rje ni rin po che thams cad 'bugs so/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa rdo rje yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rin po che thams cad phugs par khong du chud par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta 
[\[323a.5\]]ste dper na/_rdo rje ni brag thams cad shigs par 'jom mo/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa rdo rje yang /_lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad kyi brag shigs par 'jom mo/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rdo rje rin po che ni chag 
[\[323a.6\]]kyang thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i gser gyi rgyan zil gyis gnon to/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa rdo rje rin po che bsam pa log par zhugs pas chag par gyur kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan 
[\[323a.7\]]gyi gser gyi rgyan zil gyis gnon to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rdo rje rin po che ni chag kyang phongs pa thams cad rnam par sel to/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa rdo rje rin po che nan tan med pas chag par gyur kyang /_'khor ba'i 
[\[323b\]]
[\[323b.1\]]phongs pa thams cad rnam par sel to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rdo rje'i khams ni ji tsam zhig tu chung yang nor bu dang rdo thams cad gcog pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/de bzhin du dmigs pa ji tsam du chung ba la zhugs kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed 
[\[323b.2\]]pa rdo rje'i khams ni mi shes pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rdo rje rin po che ni skye bo ma rabs kyi lag tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa rdo rje rin po che yang ma 
[\[323b.3\]]rabs kyi bsam pa dang ldan pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon can gyi lha dang mi'i lag tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rin po che yongs su brtag pa la mi mkhas pa'i skyes bu ni rdo rje rin po che'i yon tan mi shes pas de'i yon tan 
[\[323b.4\]]nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du shes rab 'chal pa'i ngang tshul dang ldan pa'i skyes bu gang zag kyang byang chub kyi sems rdo rje rin po che chen po'i yon tan la mi mkhas pas kyang de'i yon tan gyi khyad par nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[323b.5\]]rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rdo rje ni zhu bar mi nus so/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgyur gyur pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rdo rje yang zhu bar mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rdo rje'i lag ca chen po ni gzhan du na mthu bo 
[\[323b.6\]]che chen po'i stobs ltar khyad par du 'phags pa'i mthu stobs kyi shugs drag po ma gtogs par stobs po che chen pos kyang gzung bar mi nus so/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i rdo rje'i lag ca chen po yang gzhan du na byang chub 
[\[323b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgyu'i stobs kyis brtan pa dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa'i mthu bo che chen po'i stobs ltar khyad par du 'phags pa stobs kyi shugs chen po rab tu thob pa ma gtogs par nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas stobs po che thams 
[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]]cad kyis kyang yongs su gzung bar mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_mtshon cha thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa gang du yang rdo rjes mi tshugs pa med de kha mi 'bab bo/_/de bzhin du sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba'am/_dus gsum 
[\[324a.2\]]gyi bskal par spyad pa'i sdug bsngal dang 'grogs par bya ba gang du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi smon lam dang ye shes kyi mtshon chas rdugs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i rdo rje'i mtshon cha chen po thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[324a.3\]]yongs su skyo ba'i yid med pas ni mi bzod pa med de/_kha mi 'bab bo/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rdo rje ni gzhan du na rdo rje nyid las gyur pa'i gzhi ma gtogs par sa'i phyogs gang gis kyang gzung bar mi nus so/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[324a.4\]]'byung ba'i smon lam gyi tshogs rdo rje ni gzhan du na lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rdo rje brtan pa'i sa gzhi ma gtogs par/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gzung bar mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rgya mtsho 
[\[324a.5\]]chen po'i snod rdo rje'i gzhi sra zhing gseb med pas chu gsang du 'dzag par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub kyi sems rdo rje gseb med pa yongs su bsngos pa'i gzhi can la gnas pa yang srid par skye ba thams 
[\[324a.6\]]cad kyis zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rdo rje'i gzhi la brten pa'i sa chen po ni 'jig par mi 'gyur ro/_/dma' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rdo rje sra ba'i gzhi la brten pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam 
[\[324a.7\]]rnams kyang khams gsum thams cad du 'jig par mi 'gyur dma' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rdo rje ni chus bangs pa'am rul bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rdo rje yang las dang nyon mongs pa thams 
[\[324b\]]
[\[324b.1\]]cad kyi chur bskal par gnas kyang rul bar mi 'gyur bangs par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rdo rje ni me thams cad kyi drod kyis kyang tshig par mi 'gyur yongs su gdung bar yang mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems 
[\[324b.2\]]bskyed pa rdo rje yang 'khor ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]drod thams cad kyis mi tshig go_/nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]gdung bas gdung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[324b.3\]]pa'i sangs rgyas snying po byang chub la bzhugs shing /_bdud rgol tu gzhug pa mdzad pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba rnams kyi gdan ni gzhan du na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdo rje'i lte 
[\[324b.4\]]ba'i sa'i gzhi ma gtogs par sa'i phyogs gzhan gyis gzung bar mi nus so/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa dang spyad pa spyod pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 
[\[324b.5\]]rdzogs par byed pa dang /_bzod pa la 'jug pa dang sa thob par byed pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_lung bstan pa yongs su nod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi tshogs thams cad nye bar ston pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[324b.6\]]thams cad la mchod pa byed pa dang /_chos kyi sprin chen po yongs su 'dzin pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang shugs dang drag shul de dag kyang gzhan du na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa smon lam thams cad kyi ye shes rdo rje sra 
[\[324b.7\]]ba'i lte ba can ma gtogs par sems can gzhan gyis yongs su gzung bar mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa ni yon tan de dag dang gzhan tshad med pa nas/_yon tan gyi khyad par brjod du med pa'i yang 
[\[325a\]]
[\[325a.1\]]brjod du med pa dang ldan pa ste/_sems can gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag kyang /_yon tan gyi chos de lta bu dang ldan par gyur to/_/ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de bas 
[\[325a.2\]]na rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_yon tan 'di dag rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol ba ni khyod kyis thob par bya ba legs 
[\[325a.3\]]par thob bo/_/rigs kyi bu khyod na re ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad par bya/_ji ltar nan tan du bya zhes zer ba ni rigs kyi bu khang pa brtsegs pa chen po rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i snying po 'di nyid kyi nang du song ste 
[\[325a.4\]]ltos shig dang /_der khyod kyis ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /_bslabs nas kyang yon tan ji lta bu yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba shes par 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]byang chub 
[\[325a.5\]]sems dpa' byams pa la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa pho brang brtsegs pa'i chab sgo dbyer gsol nang du mchi'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi 
[\[325a.6\]]rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i snying po'i sgo drung du phyin te/_lag pa g.yas pas se gol gtogs te/_sgra phyung ba dang /_de'i sgo de yang rang bye bar gyur pa dang /_des smras pa/_rigs kyi bu da khang pa brtsegs pa 'dir song shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[325a.7\]]ngo mtshar chen po thob par gyur te/_khang pa brtsegs pa de'i nang du phyin pa dang /_phyin ma thag tu sgo de yang rang chad par gyur to/_/des mthong ba khang pa brtsegs pa de shin tu rgya che zhing yangs la rgyar dpag tshad brgya stong mang po dang ldan pa/_nam mkha'i 
[\[325b\]]
[\[325b.1\]]dbyings kyi tshad kyis gzhal ba/_'khor thams cad du nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan gyi rgyan grangs med pas brgyan pa/_rin po che grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_mu tig gi phreng ba grangs med 
[\[325b.2\]]pa rab tu sbyangs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_rin po che 'i phreng ba grangs med pa rab tu spyangs pa'i rgyan gyi brgyan pa/_mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba grangs med pa rab tu sbyangs pa'i rgyan gyi brgyan pa/_seng ge'i mu tig gi phreng ba grangs med pa rab tu sbyangs 
[\[325b.3\]]ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_seng ge'i rgyal mtshan grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_zla ba dang /_zla gam grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_dar gyi lda ldi sna tshogs grangs med par rab tu sbyangs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_dar gyi ba dan sna tshogs 
[\[325b.4\]]grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_rin po che mang po grangs med pa'i 'od kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_gser gyi dra ba grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_rin po che'i snam bu grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_gser gyi lcags phod rin 
[\[325b.5\]]po ches spras pa grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_dril bu sgra snyan pa 'byung ba grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_rin po che'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba bskyod na yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ba grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_lha rdzas 
[\[325b.6\]]kyi me tog mang po'i char mngon par 'bab pa/_grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_lha rdzas kyi phreng ba'i lda ldi mngon par sbyangs pa grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_gam yo nas spos kyi snod nas bdug spos 'thul ba'i yo byad grangs 
[\[325b.7\]]med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_gser phye ma'i char rab tu 'bab pa/_grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_pu shu'i dra ba grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_skar khung grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_rta babs grangs med pa'i rgyan 
[\[326a\]]
[\[326a.1\]]gyis brgyan pa/_ba gam grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/[ {]mye [,]me [}]long gi dkyil 'khor grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_rin po che'i pha gu grangs med pa gtams pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_rin po che'i rtsig pa 
[\[326a.2\]]grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_rin po che'i ka ba grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_rin po che'i gos kyi sprin grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_rin po che'i shing grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_rin po che'i khri 'phang 
[\[326a.3\]]grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_rin po che'i lam grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_rin po che grangs med pa'i bad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_sa'i gzhi rgyan sna tshogs grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_rin po che grangs med pa 
[\[326a.4\]]las brtsegs pa'i khang pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_rin po che'i khri grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_rin po che'i bu mo grangs med pa'i rgyan brgyan pa/_rin po che'i snam bu grangs med pa bting ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_
[\[326a.5\]]'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi chu shing gi ka ba shin tu rnam par phye ba/_grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_rin po che thams cad kyi gzugs grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i lus grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan 
[\[326a.6\]]pa/_bya'i tshogs sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin pa grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_rin po che'i pad mo grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_rin po che'i srog shing 'dzin pa grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_rdzing bu grangs med pa'i rgyan 
[\[326a.7\]]gyis brgyan pa/_me tog pun da ri ka grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_rin po che'i them skas grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_rin po che'i stegs bu rnam par bkod pa grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_sa rin po che sna tshogs grangs 
[\[326b\]]
[\[326b.1\]]med pas spras pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_nor bu rin po che chen po'i 'od grangs med pa rab tu 'gyed pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_rin po che thams cad rnam par phye ba/_grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_yon tan dang legs pa phun sum tshogs pa/_grangs 
[\[326b.2\]]med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par 'dug pa mthong ste/_khang pa brtsegs pa de'i nang na yang /_khang pa brtsegs pa gzhan brgya stong 'di lta bu'i rgyan dang /_lhab lhub kyis brgyan pa/_rin po che'i gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_lha'i ba dan grangs med 
[\[326b.3\]]pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa nas/_yon tan dang legs pa phun sum tshogs pa/_grangs med pa'i bar gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pas gang bar mthong ngo /_/khang pa brtsegs pa de dag thams cad kyang /_de ltar rgya che zhing yangs la de ltar tshad med de/_
[\[326b.4\]]nam mkha'i mdzod du gyur pa/_kun nas shin tu spa bar 'khod par mthong ngo /_/des khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par phye ba de dag thams cad kyang /_dmigs pa gcig la phan tshun ma 'dres pa dang /_phan tshun ma 'dzings pa dang /_phan tshun sal sal por 
[\[326b.5\]]'dug par gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du de la snang bar gyur te/_dmigs pa gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du/_dmigs pa ma lus pa de dag thams cad la yang snang bar mthong ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis[,]bzang gis[}]/_khang pa brtsegs pa chen po rnam par 
[\[326b.6\]]snang mdzad kyis rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i snying po'i yul dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam pa de lta bu dag mthong nas/_dga' ba'i shugs dpag tu med pa rnam par 'phel ba'i spro ba dang /_mos pa chen pos lus dang /_sems mngon par 
[\[326b.7\]]brlan pa dang /_'du shes kyi rnam par thams cad rnam par bsal ba'i yid dang /_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i sems dang /_rmongs pa thams cad rnam par bral ba dang /_'khrug pa med pa'i phyogs la rab tu gzhol ba dang /_sgra thams 
[\[327a\]]
[\[327a.1\]]cad la thogs pa med pa'i dran pas/_rnam par dmigs pa'i rna ba dang ldan pa dang /_yid la bya ba'i rnam par 'khrug pa thams cad dang bral ba dang /_rnam par thar ba sgrib pa med pa'i tshul gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i blo dang /_dmigs 
[\[327a.2\]]pa thams cad la sgrib pa med par mig rab tu 'gro bar gyur nas/_phyogs kyi rgyud thams cad la mngon du bltas pa'i lus kyis phyag bya bar/_mngon par sgrub pa'i stobs thams cad du khyab pa dang ldan pa'i lus thams cad kyis phab ste/_phyag byas so/_/
[\[327a.3\]]de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]phyag byas ma thag tu/_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus khang pa brtsegs pa/_de dag thams cad kyi nang du bdag nyid phyin par shes par gyur to/_/khang pa brtsegs pa de dag thams cad 
[\[327a.4\]]du yang rnam par 'phrul pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul can rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa mang po yang mthong bar gyur te/_khang pa brtsegs pa la lar ni/_byang chub sems dpa' byams pas thog ma rigs ni gang du skyes te/_ming ni 
[\[327a.5\]]ci zhes bya bar gyur pa zhig gis/_dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dang yongs su bskul ba gang dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang gi yang dag par bskul ba dang /_tshe'i tshad ni ci tsam zhig tu/_bskal pa'i ming ni ci zhes bya bar/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang la 
[\[327a.6\]]rgyan ni ji lta bu zhig dang ldan pa'i zhing du 'khor ni ji lta bu zhig tu smon lam gyi khyad par ni ji lta bu zhig mngon par bsgrubs te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/_smon lam gyi sems bskyed pa de dag thams cad kyang 
[\[327a.7\]]mthong bar gyur to/_/shes par gyur to/_/khong du chud par gyur to/_/de'i tshe sems can de dag dang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku tshe'i tshad dang tshe'i tshad ji srid cig tu gyur pa de tsam gyi dus su/_de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhabs kyi 
[\[327b\]]
[\[327b.1\]]drung na bdag nyid 'dug par yang shes par gyur te/_bya ba de dag thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to/_/khang pa brtsegs pa la lar ni/_byang chub sems dpa' byams pas thog ma gang du/_byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur pa dang 
[\[327b.2\]]dus gang nas bzung ste/_de'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]byams pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de dag mthong bar gyur to/_/la lar ni gang du spyod pa spyad pa dang /_la lar ni gang du pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa dang /_la lar ni gang du bzod pa la zhugs pa dang /_
[\[327b.3\]]la lar ni gang du sa non pa dang /_la lar ni gang du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan yongs su bzung ba dang /_la lar ni gang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yongs su bzung ba dang /_la lar ni gang du mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur ba dang /_la lar 
[\[327b.4\]]ni gang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang /_rnam pa ni ji lta bu zhig tu lung bstan pa dang /_lung ni sus bstan pa dang /_yun ni ji srid cig gis lung bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to/_khang pa brtsegs 
[\[327b.5\]]pa la lar ni/_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur te/_sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu 'god pa mthong bar gyur to/_/la lar ni 'jig rten gyi mgon por gyur te/_'jig rten gyi phan 
[\[327b.6\]]pa dang /_bde ba thams cad kyis sems can rnams la nye bar sdud pa dang /_la lar ni brgya byin du gyur te/_'dod pa'i yon tan gyi dga' ba las sems can rnams rnam par zlog pa dang /_la lar ni tshangs par gyur te/_bsam gtan 
[\[327b.7\]]dang /_tshad med pa'i dga' ba sems can rnams la yongs su brjod pa dang /_la lar ni lha'i dbang po rab mtshe mar gyur te/_tshad med pa'i yon tan sems can rnams la yongs su brjod pa dang /_la lar ni lha'i dbang po rab dga' ldan du gyur te/_
[\[328a\]]
[\[328a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' tshe gcig gis thogs pa'i yon tan brjod pa dang /_la lar ni lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dgar gyur te/_lha'i 'khor du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sprul pa'i rgyan yongs su ston pa dang /_la lar ni 
[\[328a.2\]]lha'i rgyal po dbang bsgyur du gyur te/_lha rnams la chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba yang dag par ston pa dang /_la lar ni bdud du gyur te/_lha rnams la phun sum tshogs pa thams cad mi rtag par ston pa dang /_la lar ni lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i gnas su skyes 
[\[328a.3\]]te/_lha ma yin gyi 'khor nang rgyal dang /_dregs pa dang /_rlom pa thams cad rab tu spang ba dang /_ye shes kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par bya ba dang /_chos kyi ye shes kyi rgyu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston pa mthong ngo /_/khang pa brtsegs pa la 
[\[328a.4\]]lar ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten mthong bar gyur te/_de na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'od kyis/_sems can dmyal ba thams cad snang bar byed cing /_sems can dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi/_sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thams 
[\[328a.5\]]cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa mthong ngo /_/khang pa brtsegs pa la lar ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi gnas mthong bar gyur te/_de na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa/_sems can [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi gnas su skyes pa rnams la/_kha zas dang /_btung ba mang po nye bar bsgrub cing 
[\[328a.6\]]bkres pa dang /_skom pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa mthong ngo /_/khang pa brtsegs pa la lar ni byol song gi skye gnas na skye ba'i skye mched rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs kyis byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i/_sems can mang po 'dul bar mthong ngo /_/khang 
[\[328a.7\]]pa brtsegs pa la lar ni rgyal po chen po'i khams su gtogs pa'i/_lha'i 'khor na 'jig rten gyi mgon po rnams la chos ston pa mthong ngo /_/la lar ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi 'khor na/_la lar ni lha'i rgyal po/_/rab mtshe ma'i 'khor na/_
[\[328b\]]
[\[328b.1\]]la lar ni lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyi 'khor na/_la lar ni lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga'i 'khor na/_la lar ni lha'i rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi 'khor na/_la lar ni bdud kyi 'khor na/_khang pa brtsegs pa la lar ni/_tshangs pa'i 
[\[328b.2\]]dbang po'i 'khor na/_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa chos ston pa mthong ngo /_/la lar ni klu dang lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor na/_la lar ni gnod sbyin dang srin po'i 'khor na/_la lar ni dri za dang mi'am ci'i 'khor na/_la lar ni lha ma 
[\[328b.3\]]yin dang gsod 'phrog gi dbang po'i 'khor na/_la lar ni nam mkha' lding gi dbang po chen po'i 'khor na/_la lar ni mi'i 'khor na/_khang pa brtsegs pa la lar ni lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_
[\[328b.4\]]nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'khor na/_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa chos ston pa mthong ngo /_/la lar ni nyan thos kyi 'khor na/_la lar ni rang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor na/_la lar 
[\[328b.5\]]ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor na/_khang pa brtsegs pa la lar ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems thog ma bskyed pa las dang po ba rnams la/_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa chos ston pa mthong ngo /_/la lar ni spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams la/_la lar 
[\[328b.6\]]ni bzod pa thob cing phyir mi ldog pa rnams la/_la lar ni tshe gcig gis thogs shing dbang bskur ba rnams la/_khang pa brtsegs pa la lar ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sa dang po la gnas pa rnams la sa'i khyad par yongs su brjod pa mthong ngo /_/
[\[328b.7\]]la lar ni sa bcu la gnas pa'i bar gyi/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang lhan cig tu/_byang chub sems dpa' byams pas thams cad kyi khyad par yang dag par bgro bar bskyod pa mthong ngo /_/la lar ni pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs 
[\[329a\]]
[\[329a.1\]]su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_la lar ni bslab pa thams cad la mngon du 'jug par bya ba kun tu mtha' yas pa dang /_la lar ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo la 'jug pa rgya chen po dang /_la lar ni rnam par thar pa'i tshul zab mo dang /_
[\[329a.2\]]la lar ni bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_mngon par shes pa zhi ba'i yul gyis rgyas par dgang ba dang /_la lar ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /_'dul ba dang /_thabs kyi sgo la 'jug pa dang /_
[\[329a.3\]]la lar ni smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa rgya che ba dang /_khang pa brtsegs pa la lar ni/_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa skal ba mthun par spyod pa'i/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang 'grogs shing /_'jig rten la phan par bya ba'i don 
[\[329a.4\]]du/_bzo'i gnas sna tshogs dang /_gtsug lag gi khyad par sems can thams cad la/_phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba dang /_'byor ba rnams yang dag par 'gro ba mthong ngo /_/la lar ni byang chub sems dpa' tshe gcig gis/_thogs pa rnams 
[\[329a.5\]]dang 'grogs shing /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes la dbang bskur ba'i sgo yang dag par 'gro ba mthong ngo /_/khang pa brtsegs pa la lar ni/_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing /_lo brgya stong du mar mi gtong ba la 
[\[329a.6\]]brtson pa mthong ngo /_/la lar ni lung dpog pa dang /_kha ton bya ba la brtson par/_la lar ni chos kyi sgo rab tu brtags pa la brtson par/_la lar ni dam pa'i chos bgro ba la brtson par/_la lar ni dam pa'i chos bri ba la brtson par/_
[\[329a.7\]]la lar ni byams pa la mnyam par gzhag par/_la lar ni bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa thams cad la mnyam par gzhag par/_la lar ni rgyas pa'i skye mched dang /_rnam par thar pa thams cad la mnyam par gzhag par/_khang 
[\[329b\]]
[\[329b.1\]]pa brtsegs pa la lar ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa'i thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin la/_mnyam par gzhag par mthong ngo /_/khang pa brtsegs pa la lar ni byang chub sems dpa'i/_ting 
[\[329b.2\]]nge 'dzin sprul pa yod pa la mnyam par bzhag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mang po mthong ste/_de dag gi lus thams cad dang /_ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sprul pa thams cad kyi sprin mang po 'byung ba mthong ngo /_/la la'i lus dang /_ba 
[\[329b.3\]]spu'i sgo thams cad nas ni/_lha'i ris kyi sprin mang po 'byung ba mthong ngo /_/la la'i lus dang ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas ni klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye 
[\[329b.4\]]chen po dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten gyi mgon po dang /_'khor los sgyur ba'i sprin mang po 'byung ba dang /_la la'i lus dang ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas ni/_khams kyi rgyal po'i sprin mang po 'byung ba dang /_la la'i 
[\[329b.5\]]lus dang ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas ni/_rgyal bu gzhon nu'i sprin mang po 'byung ba dang /_la la'i lus dang ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas ni/_tshong dpon dang /_blon po dang /_khyim bdag gi sprin mang po dang /_la la'i lus dang ba spu'i sgo 
[\[329b.6\]]thams cad nas ni/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sprin mang po dang /_la la'i lus dang ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i sprin mang po dang /_la la'i lus dang ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas ni/_
[\[329b.7\]]sems can thams cad du sprul pa'i/_sprin tshad med pa 'byung ba mthong ngo /_/la la'i lus dang ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas ni/_chos kyi sgo rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba thos par gyur te/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan bsngags pa'i sgo 
[\[330a\]]
[\[330a.1\]]dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab dang /_thabs dang /_smon lam dang /_stobs dang /_ye shes kyi pha rol 
[\[330a.2\]]tu phyin pa'i sgo dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_rig pa dang /_gzungs dang /_spobs pa dang /_bden pa dang /_so so 
[\[330a.3\]]yang dag par rig pa dang /_zhi gnas dang /_lhag mthong dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang /_rten pa dang /_chos kyi mdo dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi 
[\[330a.4\]]rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam dang /_theg pa chen po'i gtam dang /_sa dang bzod pa dang /_spyod pa dang /_smon 
[\[330a.5\]]lam gyi sgo dang /_de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi sgor 'jug pa'i sgra mang po 'byung ba thos so/_/khang pa brtsegs pa la lar ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du kun nas 'dus par mthong ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi 
[\[330a.6\]]rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs skye ba dang /_rigs rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_sku rnam par phye ba tshad med pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_sku tshe rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_zhing rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_bskal pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_chos bstan pa rnam pa 
[\[330a.7\]]tha dad pa dang /_'byung ba'i sgo rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_dam pa'i chos gnas pa rnam pa tha dad pa nas/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du/_rnam pa tha dad pa dag kyang ma lus par mthong bar gyur to/_/khang pa brtsegs 
[\[330b\]]
[\[330b.1\]]pa chen po rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i snying po/_de'i dbus su khang pa brtsegs pa gcig cig gzhan pas che la yangs shing /_khang pa brtsegs pa gzhan thams cad kyi rgyan ma lus pa thams cad pas kyang ches lhag 
[\[330b.2\]]par 'phags pa'i rgyan gyis/_yang dag par brgyan pa zhig 'dug par mthong ste/_khang pa brtsegs pa de'i nang na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[330b.3\]]de nas yang /_gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya dang /_'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya dang /_dga' ldan gyi gnas bye ba phrag brgya 'khod par mthong ngo /_/'dzam bu'i gling de dag thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' byams pa pad mo'i nang du skye ba 
[\[330b.4\]]dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pas yongs su blangs pa dang /_gom pa bdun du 'gro ba dang /_phyogs bcur rnam par bltas pa dang /_seng ge'i nga ro chen po sgrog pa dang /_gzhon nu'i sa thams cad yongs su ston pa dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor gyi 
[\[330b.5\]]nang na gnas pa dang /_bza' shing gi ra bar 'gro ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon du phyogs te/_mngon par byung nas rab tu 'byung ba dang /_dka' ba'i spyod pa yongs su ston pa dang /_zas za ba dang /_snying po byang chub tu 'gro ba dang /_
[\[330b.6\]]bdud rgol du 'jug pa dang /_byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_byang chub kyi shing la [{]myig [,]mig [}]mi 'gebs par lta ba dang /_tshangs pa chen pos gsol ba gdab pa dang /_mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i 
[\[330b.7\]]yul sna tshogs yongs su bstan pa dang /_rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_tshul dang [{]mying [,]ming [}]rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_tshe'i tshad sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan sna tshogs tha dad pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam 
[\[331a\]]
[\[331a.1\]]par dag pa'i tshul bstan pas sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_spyod pa dang smon lam brjod pa sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_chos bstan cing rnam par dgod pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i thabs sna tshogs rnam pa tha 
[\[331a.2\]]dad pa dang /_ring bsrel bgo ba dang /_bstan pa gnas pa'i byin gyi rlabs yongs su bstan pa sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing lha'i gnas su 'gro ba mthong ste/_de dag thams cad na'ang tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]nyid rkang pa'i 
[\[331a.3\]]drung na 'dug par rang rang gis shes par gyur to/_/de'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang /_bya ba thams cad yongs su bstan pa dang /_tshe'i tshad rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad la dran pa ma nyams pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams 
[\[331a.4\]]cad khong du chud pa'i ye shes kyi sa la gnas pas/_khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi dril dang /_dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang /_rol mo dang /_glu la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ci snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad las/_chos kyi sprin gyi 'brug sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa 
[\[331a.5\]]'byung ba thos par gyur te/_la la las ni byang chub kyi sems rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_la la las ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa dang /_smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_la la las ni sa tshad med pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_la la las ni mngon par shes 
[\[331a.6\]]pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_la la las ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_la la las ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_la la las ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[331a.7\]]chos kyi sprin tshad med pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi sgra gong du ji skad du brjod pa thams cad thos par gyur to/_/la la las ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'jug pa'i sgra thos te/_'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig ces bya 
[\[331b\]]
[\[331b.1\]]bar byang chub sems dpa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang /_che ge mo zhig gi chos kyi sgo ni che ge mo zhig ces bya ba thos/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_che ge mo zhig gis yang dag par bskul/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni che ge mo zhig gi zhabs kyi drung du bskal pa'i ming 
[\[331b.2\]]ni 'di zhes bya bar/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni 'di lta bu zhig tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ni 'di lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba ni 'di lta bu zhig bskyed nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan ni/_'di lta bu dag gcig 
[\[331b.3\]]thos te/_lhag pa'i bsam pa ni 'di lta bu dang /_smon lam gyi rnam pa ni 'di 'dra ba zhig gis/_byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_des bskal pa ni 'di snyed cig tu/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad de/_bskal pa 'di snyed cig 
[\[331b.4\]]gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/mtshan ni 'di zhes bya/_sku che'i tshad ni 'di tsam zhig ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan dang /_rgyan phun sum tshogs 
[\[331b.5\]]pa 'di 'dra ba dang /_smon lam gyi khyad par 'di lta bu zhig dang /_sems can rnam par gdul ba 'di 'dra ba zhig dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor kun nas 'dus pa 'di 'dra ba zhig go_/de yongs su mya ngan 
[\[331b.6\]]las 'das nas kyang /_bskal ba 'di snyed cig tu dam pa'i chos gnas par 'gyur ro/_/sems can gyi don ni 'di tsam zhig tu 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba'i sgra thos so/_/la la las ni 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[331b.7\]]ming dang /_che ge mo zhig sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/_gtang bar dka' ba 'di lta bu'i yongs su gtong ba brgya ni byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' che ge mo zhig ni/_tshul khrims srung ngo /_/bzod pa sgom mo/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/bsam 
[\[332a\]]
[\[332a.1\]]gtan la snyoms par 'jug go_/shes rab kyis rnam par dbye ba la brtson no/_/byang chub sems dpa' che ge mo zhig ni dam pa'i chos yongs su btsal ba'i don du rgyal po'i srid yongs su gtong bar byed do/_/
[\[332a.2\]]rin po che yongs su gtong ba dang /_bu yongs su gtong ba dang /_chung ma yongs su gtong ba dang /_rka lag dang [{]myig [,]mig [}]dang /_mgo yongs su gtong ba byed do/_/myer mchong ba byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i ming dang che ge mo zhig gis ni de bzhin 
[\[332a.3\]]gshegs pa'i bstan pa bzung ste/_chos smra bar byed do/_/chos kyi sbyin pa gtong ngo /_/chos kyi mchod sbyin byed do/_/chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng ngo /_/chos kyi rnga rdung ngo /_/chos kyi dung 'bud do/_/chos kyi char 'bebs so/_/de bzhin 
[\[332a.4\]]gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'dzin to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten brgyan pa byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs brgyan pa byed do/_/sems can la bde ba'i yo byad kyis sdud do/_/dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod srung ngo zhes bya 
[\[332a.5\]]ba'i sgra thos so/_/la la las ni 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig ces bya ba na/_de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan che ge mo zhes dbang bskur ba [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang che ge mo zhig gis 'khor 'di lta bu zhig na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di lta bu zhig dang /_
[\[332a.6\]]bskal pa 'di lta bu zhig la sku tshe'i tshad 'di tsam zhig dang chos bstan pa 'di lta bu dang /_sems can 'dul ba 'di 'dra ba dang /_'di lta bu'i smon lam gyi mngon par 'tshang rgya bas da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin du 
[\[332a.7\]]dril dang dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang /_rol mo la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa'i dmigs pa thams cad las chos kyi sgo rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pa'i sgra thos par gyur te/_sgra de dag thams cad thos pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dga' ba'i shugs 
[\[332b\]]
[\[332b.1\]]rgya chen pos mngon par brlan pa'i sems kyis chos kyi sgo de dag thos nas la lar ni gzungs kyi sgo mang po thob par gyur to/_/la lar ni spobs pa'i sgo mang po thob par gyur to/_/la lar ni bzod pa'i sgo mang po thob par gyur to/_/la lar ni spyod pa'i sgo mang po 
[\[332b.2\]]thob par gyur to/_/la lar ni smon lam gyi sgo mang po thob par gyur to/_/la lar ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mang po thob par gyur to/_/la lar ni mngon par shes pa'i sgo mang po thob par gyur to/_/la lar ni rig pa dang ye shes snang ba'i sgo mang po thob par gyur to/_/
[\[332b.3\]]la lar ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo mang po thob par gyur to/_/la lar ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sgor 'jug pa mang po thob par gyur to//_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po nyi shu gcig pa/_me long gi dkyil 
[\[332b.4\]]'khor de dag las kyang gzugs brnyan gyi rgyan rnam par dmigs pa tshad med pa mthong bar gyur te/_la lar ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa mthong ngo /_/la lar ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 
[\[332b.5\]]gyi dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang /_la lar ni nyan thos kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang /_la lar ni rang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs 
[\[332b.6\]]pa dang /_la lar ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang /_la lar ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i zhing gi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang /_la lar ni rnam par dag pa'i zhing gi gzugs 
[\[332b.7\]]brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang /_la lar ni kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa'i zhing gi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang /_la lar ni rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa'i zhing gi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs 
[\[333a\]]
[\[333a.1\]]pa dang /_la lar ni sangs rgyas dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang /_la lar ni sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang /_
[\[333a.2\]]la lar ni chung ba'i 'jig rten kyi khams kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang /_la lar ni che ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang /_la lar ni phra ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang /_

[\[333b.1\]]dang /_la lar ni dri ba yongs su 'dri ba dang /_la lar ni phung po gsum pa'i bshags pa dang /_yongs su bsngo ba la brtson pa dang /_la lar ni smon lam mngon par sgrub pa byed pa mthong ngo /_/ka ba de dag las kyang rin po che'i rgyal po

[\[338a\]]
[\[338a.1\]]dag kyang /_mthong bar gyur la/_gnod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang gnod par bya zhing /_tshor ba de dag kyang nyams su myong ba tsam du shes par gyur te/_sems can dmyal ba pa de dag kyang /_
[\[338a.2\]]me'i gdung bas/_sdug bsngal ba zhig tu mthong ngam/_bdag gis myong bar gyur tam/_las dge ba'i tshogs kyis lha'i khang pa dang /_gnas shig mthong bar gyur tam/_lha'i 'khor dang /_lha mo'i tshogs dang /_
[\[338a.3\]]rgyan rnam par phye ba thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur te/_bza' shing gi ra ba dang /_dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang /_chu klung dang /_rdzing dang /_rin po che'i ri dang /_yid bzhin gyi shing dang /_longs spyod mang po 
[\[338a.4\]]mthong ngo /_/nyams su myong par gyur te/_tshe'i yun kyang de dang mnyam par shes par gyur na/_de ni 'di nas kyang 'phos pa med/_der yang skyes pa med de/_mi snang bar ma gyur bzhin du/_las kyi yul bsam gyis 
[\[338a.5\]{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pas bya ba'i rnam pa de lta bu dag shes shing mthong la nyams su myong bar rung ngo /_/de bzhin du tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/_rgyan rnam par 
[\[338a.6\]]sprul pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to/_/'di lta ste/_dper na/_skyes bu 'byung po'i gdon gyis non pas ni gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs mang po mthong ste/_ci dris pa de dag gi lung yang ston to/_/de bzhin 
[\[338a.7\]]du tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes dang byin gyis rlabs kyi mthus rgyan de dag thams cad mthong bar gyur to/_/'di lta ste dper na/_klu'i khang par phyin pa'i skyes bu ni/_klu'i 'du shes 
[\[338b\]]
[\[338b.1\]]kyi rnam pa la zhugs pas/_nyi ma gcig gam/_nyi ma bdun nam/_zla ba phyed dam/_zla ba gcig gam/_lo gcig gam/_lo brgyar yang 'du shes kyi rnam par shes te/_klu'i 'du shes kyi rnam pa dang /_bral nas/_
[\[338b.2\]]mi'i 'du shes kyi rnam par na yid tsam las ma lon par mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes kyi rnam pa ma btang ba'i blo dang ldan pas kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' byams 
[\[338b.3\]]pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/_yud tsam gcig po de yang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por shes par gyur to/_/'di lta ste/_dper na/_tshangs pa chen po'i gzhal med khang 'gro ba thams cad na rgyan gyi dam pa phul 
[\[338b.4\]]zhes bya ba yod de/_de'i nang du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang /_gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du dmigs pa thams cad dang ma 'dres par gsal bar snang ngo /_/de bzhin du tshong dpon gyi 
[\[338b.5\]]bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]kyang /_rgyan de dag thams cad dmigs pa thams cad du/_phan tshun ma 'dres pa dang /_phan tshun ma 'dzings par gzugs brnyan rab tu byung ba mthong ngo /_/'di lta ste/_dper na/_
[\[338b.6\]]rgyas pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la rnam par spyod pa'i dge slong ni/_gcig pu gnyis su med par khang bu'am/_'chag sa 'am/_'dug pa'i gnas na 'dug gam/_'greng yang rung ste/_'jig 
[\[338b.7\]]rten thams cad rgyas pa'i skye mched gang la snyoms par zhugs pa'i/_yul bzhin du bsam gtan pa'i yul/_bsam gyis mi khyab par mthong zhing /_nyams su myong ngo /_/de bzhin du tshong dpon gyi 
[\[339a\]]
[\[339a.1\]]bu/_nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]kyang yul gang la zhugs pa'i tshul bzhin du rgyan de dag thams cad mthong zhing shes te/_nyams su myong bar gyur to/_/'di lta ste dper na/_dri za'i grong khyer rnams kyi rgyan dang lhab 
[\[339a.2\]]lhub thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings la byung ba ni yongs su snang yang ci la yang sgrib par mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste dper na/_gnod sbyin gyi gzhal med khang mi'i khang pa na 'dug pa'am/_mi'i khang pa gnod sbyin gyi khang pa'i khongs na 
[\[339a.3\]]'dug pa ni phan tshun tha mi dad de las kyi yul rnam pa ji ltar dag pa'i tshul bzhin du snang ngo /_/'di lta ste dper na/_rgya mtsho chen po la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang rgya'i gzugs brnyan ltar snang ngo /_/'di 
[\[339a.4\]]lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po ni sngags dang rig sngags dang /_rtsi'i mthu dang byin gyi rlabs kyis gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad dang bya ba thams cad kyang yongs su ston to/_/de bzhin du tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]kyang 
[\[339a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_ye shes sgyu ma bsam gyis mi khyab pa la zhugs pas byang chub sems dpa'i dbang dang byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes chos thams cad shes pa sgyu ma'i stobs kyi mngon par bsgrubs pa'i 
[\[339a.6\]]mthus rgyan gyi yul rnam par sprul pa de dag thams cad mthong bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas khang pa brtsegs pa de'i nang du song ste/_byin gyi rlabs de dag brtul nas/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[339a.7\]]la se gol gyi sgra byas te/_'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid yin gyi longs rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni rnam par bsgrub na nye bar 'grub pa'i mtshan nyid de/_byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi byin 
[\[339b\]]
[\[339b.1\]]gyis brlabs pa'o/_/rang bzhin de lta bu ste yongs su ma grub pa'o/_/sgyu ma dang rmi lam dang gzugs brnyan lta bu'o/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]se gol gyi sgra des ting nge 'dzin de las langs par gyur pa dang /_de la byang chub 
[\[339b.2\]]sems dpa' byams pas smras pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs rnam par 'phrul pa mthong mod/_khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi mthu dang rgyu mthun pa mthong mod/_khyod kyis byang chub sems 
[\[339b.3\]]dpa'i smon lam gyi ye shes kyis rnam par bsgrubs pa mthong mod/_khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i gnas mdangs dga' ba mthong mod/_khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su bsdu ba mthong mod/_khyod kyis byang chub sems 
[\[339b.4\]]dpa'i 'byung ba'i sgo thos mod/_khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan dang rgyan tshad med pa mthong mod/_khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa'i khyad par mthong mod/_khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[339b.5\]]rnam par thar ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rjes su 'brang bar byas mod/_khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' ba dang bde ba myong mod nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]smras pa 'phags pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi byin gyi rlabs dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen 
[\[339b.6\]]gyi dgongs pa dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi mthus mthong ngo /_/'phags pa rnam par thar pa 'di'i ming ci zhes bgyi smras pa/_rigs kyi bu rnam par thar pa 'di ni dus gsum gyi dmigs pa thams cad la shes pa rab tu zhugs pa'i dran pa 
[\[339b.7\]]nyams pa med pas brgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba ste/_rigs kyi bu rnam par thar pa 'di lta bu brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag ni tshe gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thob bo/_/nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]smras pa/_
[\[340a\]]
[\[340a.1\]]'phags pa rgyan de dag gang du mchis/_smras pa gang nas 'ong ba der ro/_/nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]smras pa gang nas mchis smras pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs mngon par bsgrubs pa las 'ongs so/_/
[\[340a.2\]]de ni byin gyi rlabs de nyid la gnas shing gang du yang song ba med la 'phos pa med do/_/phung por gyur pa med do/_/tshogs su gyur pa med do/_/brtsegs par gnas pa med do/_/dngos por gnas pa med do/_/yul na gnas pa ma yin no/_/phyogs 
[\[340a.3\]]na gnas pa ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_klu rnams kyi sprin gyi dra ba ni lus la yang mi gnas/_sems la yang mi gnas nang la yang mi gnas mod kyi klu'i sems kyi dbang dang klu'i dbang bsam gyis mi khyab pas char gyi rgyun tshad med pa bkye 
[\[340a.4\]]ba ni med pa ma yin te snang ngo /_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du rgyan de dag kyang nang na'ang gnas ma yin/_phyi rol na gnas pa yang ma yin te/_byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi dbang dang /_khyod kyi snod bzang po'i phyir mi snang bar yang 
[\[340a.5\]]ma yin no/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i mkhan pos ni sgyu ma'i yul thams cad yongs su bstan kyang gang nas kyang 'ongs pa med bshig kyang gang du yang 'gro ba [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_'pho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]mod kyi sngags dang rtsi'i mthus yongs 
[\[340a.6\]]su mi snang ba ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du rgyan de dag kyang gang du yang song ba med/_gang nas kyang 'ongs pa med la gang du'ang phung por gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]mod kyi/_byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes sgyu ma bsam gyis mi khyab pa la shin tu bslabs pa 
[\[340a.7\]]dang /_sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_ye shes kyi dbang gis yongs su mi snang ba ma yin no/_/nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]smras pa/_'phags pa shul ji srid cig nas gshegs smras pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[340b\]]
[\[340b.1\]]'gro ba ni 'ong ba med par 'gro'o/_/g.yo ba dang gnas pa med par 'gro'o/_/gnas dang brten med par 'gro'o/_/shi 'pho dang skye ba med par 'gro'o/_/gnas pa dang 'pho ba med par 'gro'o/_/g.yo ba dang ldang ba med par 'gro'o/_/ltos 
[\[340b.2\]]pa dang gnas med par 'gro'o/_/las dang rnam par smin pa med par 'gro'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba dang mi 'gag par 'gro'o/_/rtag pa med pa dang chad pa med par 'gro'o/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba ni 'dul 
[\[340b.3\]]ba'i sems can la lta bas snying rje chen po'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba ni sdug bsngal ba'i sems can yongs su skyob pas byams pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba ni gang du dga' bar skye bas tshul khrims so/_
[\[340b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba ni sngon gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis smon lam mo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba ni thams cad du bzhin yongs su ston pas mngon par shes pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba ni de bzhin 
[\[340b.5\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas g.yo ba med pas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba ni lus dang sems yongs su mi gtong bas len pa dang 'dor ba med pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[340b.6\]]kyi 'gro ba ni sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bas shes rab dang thabs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba ni mig yor dang gzugs brnyan dang /_sprul pa lta bu yin pas sprul pa yongs su ston pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[340b.7\]]gzhan yang khyod lam ji srid cig nas 'ongs shes khyod kyis smras pa ni/_rigs kyi bu nga ni tshe'i sa yul phreng ba stobs kyi grong rdal khang khyim can zhes bya ba de na tshong dpon sa skyong zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de sangs rgyas kyi chos la bzhag 
[\[341a\]]
[\[341a.1\]]nas tshe'i sa'i mi rnams la snod kyi tshul bzhin du chos bstan pa byas te/_pha ma dang bram ze dang khyim bdag dang gnyen bshes su 'ong ba rnams theg pa chen po la yang dag par bskul nas 'dir 'ongs so/_/nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[341a.2\]]kyis smras pa/_'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa gang lags/_smras pa rigs kyi bu bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_byang chub kyi sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[341a.3\]]rigs su skyes pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa'o/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rigs su skyes pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa'o/_/sa la gnas pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i rigs su skyes pas 
[\[341a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa'o/_/smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa ni spyod pa'i rigs su skyes pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa'o/_/snying rje chen po ni bsdu ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi rigs su skyes pas byang chub 
[\[341a.5\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa'o/_/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos rtogs par bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rigs su skyes pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa'o/_/theg pa chen po ni thabs mkhas pa'i rigs su skyes 
[\[341a.6\]]pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa'o/_/sems can yongs su smin par ba ba ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rigs su skyes pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa'o/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis ni mi skye ba'i chos 
[\[341a.7\]]kyi bzod pa'i rigs su skyes pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyi yon tan ni 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su skyed pas byang chub 
[\[341b\]]
[\[341b.1\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa ste/_rigs kyi bu bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa'o/_/rigs kyi bu thabs mkhas pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma'o/_/sbyin pa'i 
[\[341b.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'o ma'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma ma'o/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni lhab lhub dang rgyan to/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bskyed pa'o/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni spyod pa rnam par dag par byed 
[\[341b.3\]]pa'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bslab pa la spyod du 'jug pa'o/_/byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad ni grogs po'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad ni gnyen bshes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ni phu nu'o/_
[\[341b.4\]]byang chub kyi sems ni rigs so/_/nan tan ni rigs kyi chos so/_/sa'i gnas ni rigs kyi gnas so/_/bzod pa thob pa ni rigs su rigs dang ldan par skyes pa'o/_/smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa ni rigs kyi gzhung thob pa'o/_/spyod 
[\[341b.5\]]pa rnam par dag pa ni rigs kyi chos kyi rjes snyegs pa'o/_/theg pa chen po la yang dag par bskul ba ni rigs kyi rgyun mi gcod pa'o/_/dbang bskur nas tshe gcig gis thogs pa ni chos kyi rgyal po'i sras kyi thu bo'o/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[341b.6\]]pa nyid du yang dag par bsgrub pa ni rigs kyi rgyud yongs su dag pa ste/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i byis pa tha dad pa'i skye bo'i sa las shin tu 'das pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs pa yin/_de 
[\[341b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su yang dag par byung ba yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud la rab tu gnas pa yin/_dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi gcad pa la zhugs pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i rigs yongs su 
[\[342a\]]
[\[342a.1\]]bsdu ba la mngon par brtson pa yin/_rigs dang rus kyi yongs su dag pa yin/_mnad kyi rgyud kyi smad du med pa yin/_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /_bdud dang bcas pa dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /_
[\[342a.2\]]dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i nang na rigs la smos pa'i skyon thams cad kyi kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi rigs dam par skyes la smon lam chen po'i lus dang ldan pas rigs kyis btsun pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu rgyud kyi 
[\[342a.3\]]rigs de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos thams cad gzugs brnyan lta bur yongs su shes pas 'jig rten gyi skye gnas thams cad du smad pa med pa yin te srid pa'i skye gnas thams cad sprul pa lta bur yongs su shes pas srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud 
[\[342a.4\]]du skye zhing gnas pa thams cad kyis kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro/_chos thams cad la bdag med par khong du chud pa'i sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul bas yongs su mi skyo'o/_/byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po'i 
[\[342a.5\]]lus dang ldan pa'i phyir sems can thams cad la phan gdags par ngal bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'khor ba thams cad rmi lam lta bur yongs su rtogs pas bskul pa thams cad du gnas pas sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro/_/phung po thams 
[\[342a.6\]]cad sgyu ma lta bur yongs su shes pas skye ba dang shi 'pho ba dang 'chi ba yongs su bstan pa thams cad kyis dub par mi 'gyur ro/_/khams dang skye mched chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du rab tu rtogs pas yul thams cad kyi rma mi 'byung ngo /_/
[\[342a.7\]]'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad smig rgyu lta bur shin tu bsgoms pas 'khor ba'i dga' ba thams cad kyis mos par mi 'gyur ro/_/sgyu ma lta bu'i chos thams cad la rnam par brtse bas bdud kyi yul thams cad kyis mi dogs so/_/chos kyi las 
[\[342b\]]
[\[342b.1\]]su byung bas nyon mongs pa thams cad du smos su med do/_/skye ba la dbang rab tu thob pas 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad rtogs par khong du chud pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar nga ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi skye gnas kyi khongs su chud pa'i lus 
[\[342b.2\]]dang 'gro ba thams cad kyi gzugs dang mnyam pa'i kha dog gi khyad par dang sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa'i nges pa'i tshig gi bye brag dang /_'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi mos pa dang 
[\[342b.3\]]mnyam pa'i spyod lam dang 'gro ba rnam par gdul ba thams cad dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_sems can rnam par dag par bya ba thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshe dang /_rigs su skye ba yongs su bstan pa dang /_byis pa'i 
[\[342b.4\]]spyod pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i bya ba la 'jug pa'i sgo dang /_sems can gyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i yongs su shes par bya ba la 'jug pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi sprul pa thams cad dang mnyam 
[\[342b.5\]]pa'i lus yongs su bstan cing brjod pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/_sngon skal ba mnyam par spyod spyod pa'i sems can byang chub kyi sems stor bar gyur pa rnams yongs su smyin par bya ba dang /_'dzam bu'i gling du skyes 
[\[342b.6\]]pa'i tshe yongs su bstan pa dang /_lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di'i yul phreng ba stobs kyi grong rdal khang khyim dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'di'i bram ze'i rigs su skyes pa rnams dang /_pha ma dang gnyen bshes su 'ong ba rnams rnam par gdul ba dang /_
[\[342b.7\]]bram ze'i rigs dang /_rgyud kyi khyad par gyis rigs kyi nga rgyal can du gyur pa 'di dag nga rgyal can du gyur pa 'di dag nga rgyal [{]myed [,]med [}]par byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su bskyed pa'i don du 'dir skyes so/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar nga lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di na 
[\[343a\]]
[\[343a.1\]]thabs rnam pa 'di lta bus sems can bsam pa'i tshul ji lta bu dang ldan pa dang /_rnam pa ji lta bur 'dul ba rnams yongs su smyin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba byed cing khang pa brtsegs pa chen po rnam par snang mdzad kyi 
[\[343a.2\]]rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i snying po 'di na 'dug go_/'di nas nga shi 'phos nas kyang bsam pa'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /_dga' ldan gyi rigs su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu skal ba mnyam par spyod spyod 
[\[343a.3\]]pa rnams yongs su smyin par bya ba dang /_'dod pa'i khams nas yongs su 'das pa thams cad la 'ang byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams dang ye shes dang /_sprul pa'i rgyan yongs su bstan pa dang /_'dod pa'i dga' ba'i sred pa las 
[\[343a.4\]]rnam par bzlog pa dang /_'du byed thams cad [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa nyid du bstan pa dang /_lhar skyes pa thams cad kyang mthar gud par gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang /_ye shes chen po'i chos kyi sgo 'chi 'pho'i rnam pa zhes ba ba tshe gcig gis 
[\[343a.5\]]thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang yang dag par bgro bar bya ba dang /_lhan cig yongs su smin par gyur pa rnams der skye bar yongs su bsdu bar bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bkye ba'i 'dul ba'i pad mo rnams kyang 
[\[343a.6\]]kha dbye ba'i phyir dga' ldan gyi gnas su skye ba yongs su ston te/_dus la bab pa la bsam pa yongs su rdzogs nas ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par byed kyis/_ngas byang chub thob nas kyang rigs kyi bu khyod dang /_'jam 
[\[343a.7\]]dpal gzhon nur gyur par bcas pas da dung yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/song rigs kyi bu da dung yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /_
[\[343b\]]
[\[343b.1\]]ji ltar kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug par bya ba dang /_ji ltar mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_ji ltar smon par bya ba dang /_ji ltar rgyas par bya ba dang /_ji ltar rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /_ji ltar yongs su sbyang bar bya ba dang /_ji ltar 
[\[343b.2\]]khong du chud par bya ba dang /_ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dris shig dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen des khyod la ston par 'gyur ro/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas spyod pa mngon par bsgrub pa de lta bu'i smon lam 
[\[343b.3\]]gyi khyad par ni byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong la yang med do/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa ni tshad med do/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yon 
[\[343b.4\]]tan gyi khyad par thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa ni tshad med do/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi yum lta bu'o/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag 
[\[343b.5\]]khrig brgya phrag stong la gdams ngag ston pa'o/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba la rab tu brtson pa'o 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni phyogs bcu'i 
[\[343b.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams su [{]mying [,]ming [}]gi 'khor los rnam par rgyas par gyur pa'o/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du gtam gyi skyes bur gyur pa'o/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur 
[\[343b.7\]]pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags shing bstod pa'o/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba ste chos zab mo'i ye shes la rnam par spyod pa'o/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur 
[\[344a\]]
[\[344a.1\]]pa ni rnam par thar ba thams cad kyi tshul thams cad la ring du song ba'i spyod yul dang ldan pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa kun tu bzang po la zhugs pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen de ni khyod de bzhin 
[\[344a.2\]]gshegs pa'i rigs su skyed pa'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su 'phel bar byed pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs mang po rab tu sgrub pa'o/_/yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ston pa'o/_/yon tan thams cad la yang dag 
[\[344a.3\]]par skul ba'o/_/smon lam chen po'i dra ba thams cad du 'jug pa'o/_/smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa thams cad la rab tu gzhog pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang ba thos par byed pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i bsam 
[\[344a.4\]]gyis mi khyab pa thams cad yang dag par ston pa'o/_/sngon gyi tshe'i gnas su skal ba mthun par spyad pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de bas na khyod da ltar yang 'jam dpal gyi rkang pa'i drung na 'dug gis yon tan gyi gdams ngag thams cad thob par bya ba la 
[\[344a.5\]]yongs su skyo ba ma skyed cing yongs su sgyid lug par ma byed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen ji snyed cig mthong ba dang /_spyod pa'i sgo ji snyed cig thos pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i tshul ji snyed cig la zhugs 
[\[344a.6\]]pa dang /_smon lam gyi khyad par ji snyed cig khong du chud pa de dag thams cad kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mthu dang byin gyi rlabs su blta ste/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni thams cad la'ang pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa'o/_/de 
[\[344a.7\]]nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/_byang chub sems dpa' byams 
[\[344b\]]
[\[344b.1\]]pa'i drung nas song ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]grong khyer brgya rtsa bcu kun tu rgyus te/_phyogs kyi gnas yid bde ba mngon du 'gyur ba zhes bya ba zhig na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sems shing rnam par lta bas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur 
[\[344b.2\]]ba mthong bar mos shing /_smon lam phrad par dga' bas sdod cing 'dug 'dug pa dang /_de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/_dpag tshad brgya rtsa bcu'i pha rol nas lag pa brkyang ste/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]grong khyer yid bde ba mngon du 'gyur 
[\[344b.3\]]ba na 'dug pa'i spyi bor bzhag ste/_'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/dad pa'i dbang po dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa sems skyo ba can bsam pa zhum pa can sbyor ba bor ba brtson 'grus ldog pa/_yon tan cung zad kyis dga' bar rtsi ba/_
[\[344b.4\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig la zhen par gnas pa/_spyod pa dang smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma bzung ba/_sangs rgyas kyis ma dgongs pa rnams kyis ni chos nyid 'di lta bu yongs su shes par bya ba dang 
[\[344b.5\]]tshul 'di lta bu dang /_spyod yul 'di lta bu dang /_gnas 'di lta bu yongs su shes par bya ba 'am/_rnam par shes par bya ba 'am/_khong du chud par bya ba 'am/_'jug par bya ba 'am/_yid ches par bya ba 'am/_brtag par bya ba'am/_rtogs 
[\[344b.6\]]par bya ba'am/_thob par bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/zhes te des de la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan pa dang /_yang dag par bskul pa dang /_gzengs bstod pa dang dga' bar byas te chos kyi sgo grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_ldan par byas nas ye shes 
[\[344b.7\]]mtha' yas pa'i snang ba chen po thob par byas te/_byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs dang /_spobs pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ye shes mtha' yas pa'i byin gyis byin du brlabs par byas te/_kun tu bzang pa'i spyod pa'i 
[\[345a\]]
[\[345a.1\]]dkyil 'khor la bzhag nas bdag gi yul la'ang rab tu bzhag ste/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]drung nas song ngo /_shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba las sdong pos brgyan pa'i le'u ste/_
[\[345a.2\]]bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o//_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po nyi shu gnyis pa/_de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dge ba'i bshes gnyen stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 
[\[345a.3\]]rdul shin tu phra ba snyed bsnyen bkur ba/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du tshogs bsags pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyi gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa la mthun par 'dzin pas zhugs pa/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams 
[\[345a.4\]]cad kyi drung du bsam pa mnyam par 'gro ba/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad dga' bar bya bas yid mi 'byung ba'i blo dang ldan pa/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyi gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i rjes su song ba snying rje chen po'i 
[\[345a.5\]]bsam pa rgya mtsho las yang dag par byung ba'i snying po dang ldan pa/_byams pa chen po'i tshul gyi sprin gyis 'gro ba thams cad rnam par snang bar byas pa/_dga' ba chen po'i shugs rnam par 'phel ba'i lus dang ldan pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 
[\[345a.6\]]thar pa rgya chen po la rab tu zhi bar rnam par dpyod pa sgo thams cad nas lhug par 'phro ba'i gtong ba'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]dang ldan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho'i nan tan rab tu rdzogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mos pa'i lam du 
[\[345a.7\]]zhugs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs la brtson 'grus kyi shugs rnam par 'phel ba byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems dang bsam pas shin tu sbyangs pa'i blo dang ldan pa/_dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig 
[\[345b\]]
[\[345b.1\]]nas gcig tu brgyud pa la zhugs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho khong du chud pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo'i tshul rgya mtsho'i rjes su song ba/_'jig rten gyi skye gnas thams cad du gzugs brnyan 
[\[345b.2\]]yongs su ston pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyi tshul rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/_bskal pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rab tu zhugs pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yul snang ba 
[\[345b.3\]]rab tu thob pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po thams cad rnam par 'phel ba/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam snang ba rab tu thob pa/_phyogs thams cad du sgrib pa med pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa/_chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi tshul la 
[\[345b.4\]]rab tu zhugs pa'i blo dang ldan pa/_zhing gi tshul thams cad la snang ba rab tu grub pa sems can 'byam klas pa thams cad kyi don bya ba la rgyud dang mi 'thun pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par rjes su song ngo /_/sgrib pa'i g.yang sa'i ri thams cad rnam par 'thor ba/_
[\[345b.5\]]sgrib pa med pa'i chos nyid kyi rjes su song ba byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sa'i gzhi kun tu gnas pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po can la rab tu zhi bar rnam par dpyod pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul rjes su tshol ba/_
[\[345b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa de/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod yul la rnam par dpyod cing 'dug par gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]thos pa dang /_
[\[345b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thos pa dang /_smon lam gyi khyad par thos pa dang tshogs yongs su bsgrub pa la 'jug pa dang gnas pa'i khyad par thos pa dang /_mngon par bsgrub pa dang 'byung ba'i lam gyi khyad par thos pa dang /_kun tu 
[\[346a\]]
[\[346a.1\]]bzang po'i sa'i tshul gyi rgyud thos pa dang /_sa'i tshogs thos pa dang sa thob par byed pa'i shugs thos pa dang sa yongs su gnon pa thos pa dang /_sa la gnas pa thos pa dang /_sa sngon du 'dor bas rnam par gnon pa 
[\[346a.2\]]thos pa dang /_sa'i spyod yul thos pa dang /_sa'i byin gyi rlabs thos pa dang sa la yang dag par gnas pa thos nas/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar dga' zhing skom ste/_nam mkha'i dbyings ltar shin tu yangs pa'i sems mngon par 
[\[346a.3\]]zhen pa thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa dang /_zhing gi 'du shes shin tu bsgoms pa dang /_chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i sems chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i spyod yul can dang /_thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems phyogs rgya mtsho thams 
[\[346a.4\]]cad rgyas par 'gengs pa dang /_sgrib pa med pa'i sems thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yul yongs su gnon pa dang /_shin tu rnam par dag pa'i sems snying po byang chub kyi rgyan lhag mthong gis yongs su dag pa dang /_shin tu rnam par phye ba'i sems sangs rgyas 
[\[346a.5\]]thams cad kyi chos rgya mtsho la zhugs pa dang /_shin tu yangs pa'i sems sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba rgyas par 'gengs pa dang shin tu phye ba'i sems sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par byed pa dang /_
[\[346a.6\]]tshad med pa'i sems sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gzugs brnyan rab tu 'byung ba dang /_bskal pa thams cad du gnas pas [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad cing mthar thug pa med pa'i sems de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs dang mi bsnyengs pa dang /_sangs 
[\[346a.7\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i mthar thug pas snying po byang chub rdo rje dam pa'i snying po can de la pad mo'i stan rin po che thams cad kyi lhun can zhig la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan seng ge'i khri la mngon par bltas te 'dug go_/de ltar tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de 
[\[346b\]]
